1b1(rgyud): rgyu gar skad du/badz+ra shr-i khar ma hA gu h+yA yo ga tAn+ta/bod skad/
1b2(rgyud): du/gsang ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud rdo rje rtse mo/i kun tu bzang po la phyag
1b3(rgyud): 'tshalo//de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad la phyag 'tsholo//de bzhin
1b4(rgyud): gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshalo//de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'chang /
2a1(rgyud): kun mchog sbrid pa'i dbang phyug gis//'khor lo de ni brtags byas nas//rnal 'byor
2a2(rgyud): can ni mi gsung bzhugs//mgon po chen po sangs rgyas kun//ma lus thub pa'i sgros mchog gis//
2a3(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che//thub pa'i dbang phyug lo gsol 'debs//rnal 'byor tshul chen sgrub byed cing //
2a4(rgyud): cho ga sna tshogs yang dag 'byung //rigs kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor 'byung ba'i//'khor lo mchog ni bshad du
2a5(rgyud): gsol//mgon po khyed ni skal chen te//khyod ni bya ba don sems byed//gsang ba mkhyen cing dgongs
2b1(rgyud): bAshud mabyokhyen//rnal m+b+hir rig pas mchog sgyur gsu ste//deny-i rjes kyi de nyid ldan//rnal byor bdag nyi rnam
2b2(rgyud): na pa chub sems//gsangs rlogagasungs shig+sa tshul chen te//dgas kyi stsol lo ba 'khor
2b3(rgyud): lo ste/ rdo rje rnal 'byor sna tshogs drudug/grwa spang ba'i snying po g+hil+le 'khyor che//chos kyi tshul nI sgrub byed pa//rtog pa
2b4(rgyud): med pa'i tshe sde rnams kyi//chos kyi don 'di ci yin brjod//'drir ni rtog pa ji lta bu//sgrub pa'idon ni ji ltar legs//
2b5(rgyud): ci phyir 'di ni rgyud phyi ma//rgyud don ci yin brjod par bgyi//ci phyir rgyud dang phyi ma legs//rgyud kyi don ni ji ltar byung //
2b6(rgyud): rdo rje 'chang drug 'dis ni//drug ze 'don ni ji ltar byung //sbyin po'i rkye nog/tsa ma bya'i ni zhi bar brjod/
3a1(rgyud): /na sa kyi //rdo rje gtum tho ci zhig lpags//ts+li smai n+ti gad+hAn po brjod//rdo rjenas
3a2(rgyud): gsungs pa//ci phyir rdo rje brjod par bgyi//rdo rje 'chang zhes gsungs 'di ci//dri yi rdo rje ji lta bu//rdo rje'i'achung ba rnam san du//
3a3(rgyud): rdo rje rigs kun gong gi leg sa//chen+d+ha b+ho g+han si grang zhig na gnas//rigs ni rnam du yin brjod//tsis+yai b+hi na rigs su
3a4(rgyud): brjod//rigra bdag rang bzhin 'di ci zhig/ci yi phyir na sems dpa' brjod//rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam pa du//tsi yau rdo rje sems
3a5(rgyud): dpa' legs//rdo rje rgyal po ci yin brjod//rdo rje chags pa 'di don ci//rdo rje legaso bcu yin brjod//rdo rje rin chene ci yi phyir/
3a6(rgyud): rdo rje gzi rjid tu yin brjod//rdo rje rgya la mtshan bzhed pa che//gsungs shig ci yin brjod pa gsungs//ci yi phyi na rje
3b1(rgyud): chos//rdo rje rnon pa ci yin brjod//rdo rje rgyu ni 'khor lo che//rdo rje smra ba ci yin brjod//rdo rje las dang gnod sbyin che//rdo rje gnod sbyin drag po che/
3b2(rgyud): rdo rje sdud pa khu tshur che//gsungs shig ci yin brjod par gsungs//sems dpa' 'di rnams gang las byung //de bzhin pha dang mi ni gang //dang po gang
3b3(rgyud): zhig gling gzhi dang //dmigs pa'i rkyen ni gang zhig lags//gsang ba 'di ni gang las byung //khyab bdag 'di rnams gang nas byung //thog ma tha ma
3b4(rgyud): med 'di ni//gsang ba'i dbang phyug tshon pos gsungs//rab tu dga' nyid rab bzang nyid//rdo rje stong bdag ji lta bur//ci yi phyir na kun tu bzang //
3b5(rgyud): de bzhin rdo rje rdo rje 'chang //dang po'i rigs ni ji ltar byung //chos kun skye ba med pa dang //'byung ba ji ltar rung bar 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' ci
3b6(rgyud): yin brjod//tsai phyir sangs rgyas brjod par bya//de bzhin gshegs pa ci yin brjod//bcom ldan 'das bcom ci yin brjod//de bzhin ston pa'i
3b7(rgyud): ston pa ci//ci yi phyir ni ye shes brjed//shes rab ye shes ci yin brjod//ci phyir shes rab brjod par bya//de bzhin shes rab pha rol phyin//
4a1(rgyud): tshul ni ci zhig ting 'dzin gang //bsam gtan rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ci//srid gsum 'jig rten gsum don ci//ci yi phyir yang
4a2(rgyud): khams gsum pa//'khor ba'i don ni ci zhig yin//mya ngan 'das pa'ang ci yin brjod//rtag dang 'jig dang de bzhin drag/theg pa chen po ci yin brjod/
4a3(rgyud): na mkha' yang ni ci yi phyir//sa nyid kyang ni ci yin brjod//'byung ba chen po gang las 'byung //'gog pa ci zhig gang gis byed//ci yi phyir na phyag rgyar
4a4(rgyud): brjod//ci phyir sngagasu brjod par bya//ci yi phyir na rig sngags brjod//de bzhin kho nar gzung sngags rnams//phyag rgya yau ni mtshan nyid gsungasau//smya Da
4a5(rgyud): kyi mtshan nyid brjod par bya//rigs sngags kyi ni mtshan nyid gsungs//de bzhin kho nar gzungs sdigs rnams//rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i gnas ni gang //ji
4a6(rgyud): ltar bcing ba thub chen po//phyag rgya dag ni 'ching ba na//ji ltar rdo rje can kun mnyes//rig sngags ji ltar bzlas par bgyi//thub pa chen po de gsungs
4a7(rgyud): shig/rig sngags dag ni bzlos pa ni//ji ltar yid kyi rdo rje bltas//dri bo'i tshogs mdor snyan pa'o//oM ni ci zhig yin par bshad//yi ge hUM na
4b1(rgyud): //rnam rgyu rnam smyan//d+hA sa pasbyin spyad// rlu sgyur rlos //do da na sa nga/ nan
4b2(rgyud): 'khor yin//kyis 'khor dung po gas y-i//skyes pa ya na du med // h+la ga zheg //sa sa shig //thub
4b3(rgyud): la 'khyir thugaso la//rlom pa d+hi ltar sbyin par //de'i sa srog+sas spyor yang ni//dang po 'i b+hag zhi ldad //rnas kyi n-i b+h+ya /de ldan
4b4(rgyud): sgyogs N+DI/kregs rnams pa nas / dzin ltu bsgyud pa y-i//dashar che Sh+T+ra //sar+b+ba sus pa sa
4b5(rgyud): spros dang me ga de bzhin du//myur me mchod stobs ji ltar 'grus//dkyil khor byA/glu pa ji lta bur//gzug pa yang ni ji ltar lugs//dam tshig mi zhig sbyin
4b6(rgyud): shad//rdo rje ma'i tshig pad+ma/snron du sbyin pa d+harA hU~M//sgrub pa doni n-i d+hi lags/nga pa'i rnas b+h+yo hrISh+T+rI T+Ta/mas 'jugyu d+hi
4b7(rgyud): zhig 'gas//midun du dathugs pa'i dan ji lta legs//ji chags pa'i ji swA~M dru/nga bya ni ///dran pa rnam na
5a1(rgyud): par ji ltar 'gyur//ji ltar 'dir ni gshegs su gsol ba lags//dkyil la dang mchog ni ji ltar gdog byung bcoM//'gro pa byA ba yang d+han+ta
5a2(rgyud): gyi//lhas kyi kloga'i bya ba ji ltar bgyi//dge ba stug po gsung chen ji lta bu//las rnams tha dad bya ba dri lta bu//phyag rgya phyag rgya'i lan ni ji ltar big+h+nAM//mchod de
5a3(rgyud): mchod pa'i lan ni ji ltar blang //dkyil 'khor gyi ni 'khor lo ji ltar 'byung //'khor lo'i rnam pa'i bye brag du zhig mchis//dngos dang dngos med ji ltar spang ba
5a4(rgyud): legs//bla ma gsang byung 'od zer gsang ba ni//sbyin sreg rnam pa du ru ba rjod//thab khung ji lta bu zhig lags//sbyin sreg mdor bsdus ji lta bu//las rnams rnam
5a5(rgyud): pA du ru brjod//gsang ba rnams ni rnam pa du//mchog tu gsang ba ji ltar brjod//de nyid ji lta bu zhig lags//phyog rgya nye ba'i phyag rgyu ci//mchod pa'i phyag rgya
5a6(rgyud): jiltar lags//rigs kyi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis//ji ltar sgrub bya shin tu bsgrub//rdo rje phra mo ji ltar brjod//dgegs ni ji ltar bas la bar bani//mdor ni rig pa
5a7(rgyud): 'dzin pa dang //slob dpon ji lta bu zhig lags//dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang ldan pa'i//'khor lo rnam pa du ru brjod//dngos grub mtshan nyid sgrub byed pa'i//sna tshogs
5b1(rgyud): smyos// rnams pa da // ba spyod/ byung rdzogs sgyu/ pa na nga su/ na nga
5b2(rgyud): jug d+d+hem+b+ha/nAgan ga nyid la mA~M/ myur ni dz+dza lags/ji n+d+ha hU~M skyed pa /hU~M hrIn+d+ha rje ga lags//de nyid rig pa
5b3(rgyud): rtagats+tsha//rdo rje ye shes dzi wA na//gzhan yang dgongs pa 'i lta hA//sgyi ba ji lta bu zhig lags//gang yang rung ba'i rtags las byu//mI dang ming min shes pa'i mtshan//las 'bras myed
5b4(rgyud): par bying ba dang //'dzin pa byung ba gang las bshad//lus ninam mkha' bzhin 'byung ba//gang las byung bar brjod par bya//tsaM yi byi na byung ngo ma rnal 'byor ba den nI yin brjod/
5b5(rgyud): rdo rje d+his ni bskyed byed po'o//rdo rje mo'i rnal 'byor gang //gzhan yang rang gi rigs dag las//rnal 'byor rdul zhugs ji ltar bcom//madror na dang du byo ba dang //de nyid gas
5b6(rgyud): /lpags//byig pa chen po mdan banas pa d+mo//gsang byug rten las basmras pa/glos pan par du du yesa?/hr-I gsungs shig tu gas so//rnal 'byor rnam padun
5b7(rgyud): na la 'byor las byung du/ 'i drung du rjod /khrisang pa'i rigs 'i snre gu// chu 'a hU~M/khangs ni pa'i rkyenas shing da shos sbyi hU~M/
6a1(rgyud): /mya ngan 'das//ji skad bshad pa'i gsang ba gzhan//rdo rje can nyid khyab 'jug rang nyid yin//nyi ma zla ba gshin rje drag po nyid//rang nyid skye dgu'i bdag ste phra mA yin//
6a2(rgyud): 'gal ba'i tshig ni/ji ltar rung bar 'gyur//dri ba'i tshogs gnyis pa mdor snyan pa'o////tshangs pa 'jig rten gsum lus dbang phyug che//gdong drug tshogs bcas lha'i rigs
6a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rnams//gzhan yang bzla dang tshogs sogs gang yin pa//nga bdag nyid ces ji ltar rung bar 'gyur//nga ni 'dod pa thar pa nga //nga ni dmyal ba'i dmyal ba pa//nga ni yi dgas/
6a4(rgyud): dud 'gro bdag/tshig de ji ltar rung bar 'gyur//de nas gzhan yang 'dod la chags sems ldan//lta bcas tshig ldan 'dzin pa'i lha la chags//mu stegs theg dman mngon
6a5(rgyud): dga' skye dgu'i rigs//ji ltar 'dod bzhin don rnams rtog byed cing //ji skad bshad pa'i sna tshogs rigs dkyil 'khor//dag pa'i chos kyi 'byung gnas dgongs mi shes//rang
6a6(rgyud): bri 'dod pas mu ngan rtog byed pa//de la skye dgu bdag chen brtsebs gsungs//mchod byos chen po mchog dang po yi gnas//gsang ba'i bsdang mchog mngon sdus dbye bar bsro
6a7(rgyud): skye dgu'i bdag po'i dkyil 'khor gsong mdun du//dam tshig ma chad pas ji ltar mchod par bya//'dod yon lngar bcas rol par byed pa yis//dngos grub tshogs mchog
6b1(rgyud): chen po thob par 'gyur//dmun pa'i 'dod las rigs kyi dngos grung 'byung //'gul ba'i cho ga dag de ltar rung bar 'gyur//de bzhin b+ha ga ji ltar rtags ci 'dra//de 'jug pa yang nirnga
6b2(rgyud): ltar 'gyur//rdzas de dag ni ji ltar rab tu sgrub//'jig rten gsum ni dmin pa ji ltar 'gyur//de nas 'dod chags zhen pas dngos grub thob//'did chags dag phyir de ni ji ltar rung //chags
6b3(rgyud): bral sdig pas chags dang bral ba la//gsang bstan pas sdig dngos ji ltar 'gyur//bai to bas bsod nams mchog thab ji lta buM//skyes dgu bsad pas bsod nams ji lte b+ha/ma byin
6b4(rgyud): blang ngas bsod nams 'gyur zhes pa'i//'gal ba'i tshig dag ji ltar rung bar 'gyur//dga' ba chen po'i bud med sten pa yis//tshe 'od la ni sangs rgyas mchog 'grub pa//mau ga
6b5(rgyud): 'dod pa sten pas sangs rgyas dang //rdo rje sems dpa' 'byung ba ji ltar 'gyur//'dir ni rdzun dang mtshungs pa'i bsod nams med//ji ltar brdzun ni bsad nams ldan par brjod//'dir ni
6b6(rgyud): sems tsun+da gzhan bsad bza' bar bya//'gal ba'i tshig ni ji ltar rung bar gyud 'khor ba spangs kyang chos min 'gyur ba dang //mya ngan drangs la gzhol ba chos ma yin//sangs rgyas rnam
6b7(rgyud): 'byor gyi ni rjes 'jug pa//chos min 'gyur nas ji ltar rung bar 'gyur//dregs dang ser sna sdang ba'i sems ldan pa//chos min spyod cing brdzun pa'i tshig la chags//'dod pa'i
7a1(rgyud): 'dod chags bcas pa'i lhag par rgyu la//rigs kyi rnal 'byor las byung ji ltar 'grub//bla n+ded go 'phang dngos grub 'dod pa yi//ngag cing rnal 'byor rnal 'byor
7a2(rgyud): lhur blud bya//sbyor gcin mthung dang bshang ba za ba yau//dag cing mchog gyur rnal 'byo rI dngos grub 'doH//mi gtsang ba shrang gci zos shing 'thung ba yis//yid 'dod dngos grub ji//
7a3(rgyud): ltar dngos grub 'dod//bud med bcas par ldan cig chos spyod cing //gnyis ka lhan cig gyur pas dag gtsang mchod//ji ltar bud med lhan cig dkyil 'khor mchod//dngos grub
7a4(rgyud): dam pa mchog tu ji ltar 'gyur//gzhan yang rdo rje rigs 'byung kun ldan zhing //mchog tu mi bzang drag po'i las can te//dag cing shin tu sdug la mtho bar 'gro//'gal ba de ni
7a5(rgyud): ji ltar rung bar 'gyur//gzhan yang rdeg drang bsad pa lhur len zhing //bskyed dang drug pa'i lus can de dag ni//dag cing shin tu sdug la mtho bar 'gro/'gal ba de ni ji ltar rung ba yin/
7a6(rgyud): bgazhan yang bza' dang btung ba lhur len cing //snying byin pa yis dag par 'dod pa nyid//de ni dag cing sdug la mtho bar 'gro//'gal pra de nAM ji ltar rung ba yin//gzhan yang nor
7a7(rgyud): bu rin chen 'phrog pa yis//sdug cing bstan la dag cing mthor 'gro dang //gzhan yang nga rgyal ser sna lhur len pas//dag par 'gyur ba nyid ni 'gal ba yin//gzhan yang las kyi
7b1(rgyud): rig pa byung bu yis//myi dge ba yod las rnams thams cad bya//'khrig sogs las kyi ni tshogs rnam mang po'o//las byed pa ni ji ltar skyon mi 'gyur//gzhan yang brdzun chog dri bzhin
7b2(rgyud): 'khrig po yis//dge 'dod 'phags pa min pas gsang bya yi//rgyal ba'i dbang chen 'dod pas bdud rtsi ltar//sdug cing mthor 'gro ji ltar rung byar 'gyur//kye mgon khyod ni dag pa'i chos
7b3(rgyud): tshogs te//khyod ni rtag tu rnal 'byor 'gyur//kye mgon khyod ni dgyes chen bdud rtsi 'chang ba dam chos bsang ba'i 'gyur gnas te//kye rgyal khyod ni dri med nyi ma bzhin du mi shes kun tu sbyod
7b4(rgyud): mdzad pa//khyab byeng rgyal ba'i ngang tshul 'jig rten gsum gyi 'dren rten byang sems dga' ston kye//mdor bsdus pa'o//kun mchog thams cad rib pa ste//kun mkhyen dri ma gsum spong
7b5(rgyud): pa//byang sems sangs rgyas rgyal po che//de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid ni//ting nge 'dzin las bzhed nas kyang //phyogs rnams kun tu gzigs mdzad te//thub pas mgron rnams rab btud
7b6(rgyud): nas//sangs rgyas kun la 'di skad gsungs//kye ma'o rnam dag ye shes bdag/kye ma'o sangs rgyas nyer thob po//kye ma'o gar mkhan 'khor lo 'dra//rang gi ye shes 'dri bar byed//rtig
7b7(rgyud): pa thams cad kun bsdus pa'i//mchog tu gsang ba bshad par bya//shin tu rnyed dka' dam pa yi//rin chen sgrom gyi kha dbye bya//bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi//rgyal mtshan dam pa
8a1(rgyud): bsteng bang bya//rin chen sgrom gyi kha phye nas//shes rab kyi ni spang bar bya//da nas gsad pa mchog gyur bya//dam pa yang dag bshad par bya//bya ba sgrub par
8a2(rgyud): thas chen po//rtog pa thams cad dasdus pa dang //gro slong ba'i bye brag 'byed byed cing //rnol 'byor darmongs pa rnam dang grol//de nyid dam pa shes byed pa'o//rtog pa thams cad
8a3(rgyud): bsdus pa dang //rdo rje rnal 'byor cho ga dang //'khor lo'i rnal 'byor cho ga ste//mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya de'i//rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang //dus blosum khyab pa'i bya bar ldan
8a4(rgyud): gsang ba rnal 'byor kun 'byung zhing //bya ba kun gyi thabs chen gyi//rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang //sangs rgyas rnal 'byor cho ga de ldan//rdo rje chos ni rab 'jug pa//sku gsum zhes
8a5(rgyud): bya gsang chen gyi//rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang //rdo rje rnal 'byor cho ga ldan//ma rungs thams cad 'dul byed pa//khams gsum rnam rgyal zhes bya yi//rtog pa thams cad
8a6(rgyud): bsdus pa dang //chos kyi rnal 'byor cho gar ldan//pad+ma gar mkhon bskyed byed pa//'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i//rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang //sbyin pa bzhi dang yang dag ldan//
8a7(rgyud): rin chen 'khor lo bskyed byed cing //byang chub sems dpa' yid ches byed//rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang //sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs chen po//sna tshogs gar mkhan
8b1(rgyud): skyed byed pa//las kyi rnal 'byor cho ga yi//rtog pa thams cad dkyus pa dang //de nyid shes shing dgongs pa shes//rdul chen mcho ba ni shes byed cing //mchog gi dang po sangs rgyas
8b2(rgyud): mchog//rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa ste//go rims bzhin du 'jug byed pa'o//gcig par sems can bya ba byed//bya ba chen po mchog zhi ba//chos dang longs spyod mchog gyur pas//sangs
8b3(rgyud): rgyas gang mkhan 'khor lo ni//mchog tu ngo mtshar gyur pa 'di//ska la ba ji bzhin gsang ji bzhin//ji ltar sems can 'dul 'gyur bshad//sngon 'gyur 'das pa'i dus su ni//byang chub
8b4(rgyud): sems ni yongs 'dzin cing //thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yi//byang chub sems dpar byung ba na//sprob chen pos ngo mtsher che'i//dka' ba dpag tu med pa spyad//go ri mo bzhin du
8b5(rgyud): de yis ni//dbang bskur bar du legs thob 'gyur//shes rab chen po so sa mthar phyin//gos kyi dbang ni thob gyur nas//'og min stug po nyams dga' bar//blo gros chen po zhugs
8b6(rgyud): par gyur//bdag ni seng rgyas mchog 'gyur zhes//rnal 'byor pa yis bsams nas ni//bya ba mthar phyin bdag gis ni//sems can don 'byung thob bya nas//bya ba de yi dgongs nas ni//ston
8b7(rgyud): dang phyi mar bde chen med//chos kyi dga' ba rmad chen po'o//dka' ba spyad par bya snyam ste//byang chub shing drung bzhugs gyur nas//bya dka'i bya bo kun ldan de//dbug 'byung rngub pa 'gog
9a1(rgyud): pa dang //sems dang 'o myod cing g.yo ba med/lus mi bar yang mi 'brubya zhing //yan lag spyod par mi byed do//de bas g.yod med chos la//yun ring du ni gnas par
9a2(rgyud): 'gyur//phyogs bcu yi ni thub dbang po//sangs rgyas kun gyis dgongs gyur pa//'di ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub ngos//sdug bsngal bya bar rigs pa min//de bas bdag cag kun lhan cig skur
9a3(rgyud): bde bya phyir 'gro snyam du//dgongs nas thams cad rab chas te//sdug pa ru ni byon par gyur//byon nas thub pa thams cad kyis//bskul ba mchog ni mdzad par 'gyur//oM badz+ra ut+pa
9a4(rgyud): tetiSh+Tha tsas pa'i//rigs pas se go lnga brdabs nas ni//byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bslang //phyogs rnams kun tu bltas pa na//sangs rgyas kyi ni rgya mtsho mthong //thub pas mgon
9a5(rgyud): rnams la btud de//bka' stsol zhes ni gsol ba btib//mgon chen sangs rgyas thams cod kyis//gsung gcig gis ni bka' stsal pa//sems kyi spyod yul ci 'dra zhes//rang
9a6(rgyud): gi sems ni so sor rtogs//sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung thos nas//rang gi sems la rtog bzhin du//yun ring du ni gnas pa ni//sems kyi rnam pa ma mthong ste//yan lag kun gyis
9a7(rgyud): rab btud nas//zhus pa bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs//sems kyi rnam pa ma mthong ste//sems kyi mtshan nyid ji lta bu//de nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa//sems kyi spyod yul shes
9b1(rgyud): par dka'//khyod la snying po rab sbyin gyis//phra mo'i bzlas pa rab tu spyod//oM tsit+taM pra ti be d+hi kA ro mi//drI dA po dag pa blangs na ni//rang gi sems la rtog drazhin du//thang cig de la gnas
9b2(rgyud): ba na//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du mthong //de nas sems 'di ci zhig yin//nyon mongs sa bon can nam ci//dge ba'am mi dge ba yi sems//kun bzhi'i sa bon can sems sam//
9b3(rgyud): chos kyi rgyu 'thun rtogs gyur nas//pha rol phyin pa drug bsten pa//'di ni sems can dag pa ste//kun nas nyon mongs gnas ma yin//yun ring du ni bsod nams dang //ye shes
9b4(rgyud): tshogs chen bsags pa ste//ji ltar zla ba grang ba 'di//dag cing dang la rnyog ma med//de bzhin tshogs ni rdzogs pa'i phyir//sems ni zla ba dang dang mtshungs//dngos po yod
9b5(rgyud): dang med min pa//ji ltar zla ba mtshungs nyid yin//'on kyang bsod nams ye shes che//rdzogs pa zla ba dang mtshungs bston//legs byas tshogs ldan rang sems kyi//zla bar
9b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor mthong nas ni//dga' zhing mgu ba skyes nus kyang //slar yang tshig tu rab smras pa//bcom ldan mgon po bdag gis ni//nyon mongs dri ma kun dag cing //
9b7(rgyud): gzungs dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba'o//rang sems zlo ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong //sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa//thag mar byung ba'i sems 'di bzang //dang por
10a1(rgyud): /blo bur nyon mongs rnams//byang chub sems kyis dag par byed//dngos po thams cad rnams spangs pa'i//dgu pa yi ni snying po 'dis//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
10a2(rgyud): dbus su ni//byang chub kyi ni sems la rtogs//oM bi d+hi tsit+taM ud pA da yA mi//snying po dag pa blangs nas ni//sems kyi dbus su rtog pa na//zla ba'i dbus su yang zla ba'i//dkyil
10a3(rgyud): 'khor gnyis pa mthong ba ni//thub pa rnams la tshig smras pa//dkyil 'khor gnyis pa dgu mthong ngo //de nas sangs rgyas kun bsungs pa//byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin brtam
10a4(rgyud): brtan par bya ba'i ched du ni//de na legs par sgrub par gyis//khyod la snying po sbyin bya ste//zlos shing de ni bstan par dgongs//oM tiSh+Tha badz+ra/dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i dbus
10a5(rgyud): gnas pa'o//rdo rje chen po sems byed cing //thong cig so sor brtags pa na//shin tu brtan pa mthong gyur nas//smras pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams//dkyil 'khor dbus
10a6(rgyud): su rdo rje mthong //zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa yi//dbus na rdo rje dang ldan mthong //de nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa//lha rnams kun gyi rdo rje che//rdo rje dbyings ni bskyed
10a7(rgyud): pa yi//shin tu brten pa 'di smos shing //oM badz+ra At+ma ko&haM//snying po dag pa blangs nas ni//rdo rje'i lus su rnam bsgoms pas//de ni sra brtan khong stong med//
10b1(rgyud): sman+d+hu thob gyur nas//smras pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams//rlung ba dag rdo rje'i sgrar mthong ngo //de nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa//sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam par skyem/
10b2(rgyud): oM ya thA sarba ta thA ga ti s+tha b+hU a haM//snying po dag pa blangs nas ni//sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam bsgoms pasngo//rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i//kun mkhyen ye shes thob par
10b3(rgyud): gyur//sangs rgyas kunal rab btud nas//smras pa bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs//mgon po bdag la byin rlong cing //bdag gi byang chub byastan par mdzod//grags chen
10b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis//rdo rje dbyings kyi tshig thos nas//mngon rnams thugs kar zhugs par gyur//rdo rje yi ni rnal 'byor bsungs//oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi sa ma po
10b5(rgyud): dr-iT+TA badz+ra ban+ta//grags nen sangs rgyas thams cad kyis//rig sngags chen po brjod pa na//rdo rje dbyings ni shin tu brtan//de nyid ye shes mngon sangs rgyas//de nas sangs rgyas thams cad ni/
10b6(rgyud): rdo rje thugs ka nas byung ste//chos kyi dbang bskur bzhi po yi//de tshe thub pa dbang bskur 'gyur//rdo rje sems dpa' byas pa yi//byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur ba//'bras bu byang chub sems
10b7(rgyud): ldan gang //rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur yin//bskal pa grangs med gsum de gang //sbyin dang sbyin pa'i 'bras bzang dang //mkha' mtshungs rin chen thob byed pa//ner bu rin chen
11a1(rgyud): /dbang bskur yin//bskul pa grangs med gsum du ni//gzhan gyis dka' ba spyad pa dang //brtson 'grus kyis ni 'bras sgrub pa//rdo rje las kyi dbang bskur yin//de bzhin
11a2(rgyud): gshegs pa'i snying po dag/chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul chen te//nyon mongs 'dam gyis ma gos pa//rdo rje pad+ma'i dbang bskur yin//byang chub sems rdzogs rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi//dbang bsku
11a3(rgyud): bzhi po de rnams chos kyi dbyings//de nas gzhan yang gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba//sangs rgyas rang bzhin yon tan dam pa'i tshogs//rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur bas//ngo bo nyid///
11a4(rgyud): kyi sku ru 'dod//rdo rje chos kyi dbang bskur bas//longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ru 'dod//rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur bas//de bzhin mtshan dang dpe byad ngo //sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes tshe//
11a5(rgyud): mkha' mtshungs chos nyid snying po can//rdo rje las kyi dbang bskur bas//sprul pa yi ni skur 'dod do//gsang ba bzhi yi dbang bskur bas//rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob//de
11a6(rgyud): nas ming gi dbang bskur bas//thub de rnam snang mdzad chen gyur//chos nyid kyi nga ni yang dge rtogs//chos dang longasnga spyod rdzogs par brtag/chos kun dngos po med pa ste//mtshan ma
11a7(rgyud): med cing gsal byed med//mtshan nyid med cing mkha' dang mtshungs//dmigs pa rnam par spangs pa ste//rang bzhin med cing brjod du med//chos kun tshig gi spyod yul min//gzhan///
11b1(rgyud): yang gsang byar brtags pa ste//de phyir 'dir ni rtogs par brjod//rtog pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi//chos kyi don 'di ci yin brjod//bdug med dngos po yod pa min//chos rnams med cing rtag/
11b2(rgyud): pa med//'on kyang chos nyid yang dag rtogs//chos dang longs spyod rdzogs par rtogs//rtogs pa nyams su myong bar brjod//'dir ni ngo mtsharwa nyid du rtogs//chos kun gzugs
11b3(rgyud): can min pa dang //gzugs can du yang 'di ru bstan//chos kun tshig gi spyod yul min//sgra ru yang na 'dir bston te//de bas ngo mtshar chos 'di ru//rtog pa rtog pa yin par
11b4(rgyud): brjod//ci phyir 'di ni ngo mtshar chos//de nyid gsang ba sgrub pa'i phyir//los rnams drug pa nyid dang ni//gzugs can tshig gi mthu ngag dang //'bras phyir sdom pa'i ngo mtshar te//
11b5(rgyud): de phyir 'di ni dro mtshar chos//de phyir 'di ni rtogs par brjod//de bas ngo mtshar chos 'di ru//rtog pa 'bra' shig rtog pa yin//yang 'dir rtog pa ji lta bu//sems can//
11b6(rgyud): kun gyi don bya'i phyir//byang chub tu ni sems bskyed na//pha rol phyin drug spyod pa dang //sten pa rtog pa nyid yin no//sgrub pa'i dron ni ji lta bu//gang zag chos las bdag
11b7(rgyud): med dang //gzung dang 'dzin pa spangs pa yi//rab tu dga' bo'i sa sgrub po//de tshe sgrub pa'i don yin no//ci phyir 'di ni rgyud phye ma//rgyud ni rgyun chags zhes bya ste//'khor
12a1(rgyud): brgyud du 'dod pa yin//phyi ma zhes bya pha rol te//rgyud ni rgyun chags zhes bya ste//phyi ma snga ma las byung ba'i//de nyid gsang ba sbas shes pa//rgyud ni phyi mar brjod pa
12a2(rgyud): yin//ci phyir rgyud dang phyi ma yin//sa mthar phyin po'i rgyal ba mchog/srid pa'i brtson ro las rgal yin//yang na gang zhig rgal gyur pa//rgyud ni phyi ma yin par bshad//
12a3(rgyud): rgyud kyi don ni ji ltar byung //sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir//sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos longs spyod//sangs rgyas thugs rjes bskul ba ni//rgyud don yang dag byung
12a4(rgyud): ba yin//sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs byung ba'i//chos dang longs spyod byung ba ste//sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen ni//rgyud don yang dag byung ba yin//rdo rje 'chang drag 'di/
12a5(rgyud): ci zhig /sangs rgyas gzugs kIs mi 'dul ba'i//sems can gdug tshogs de yi phyir//rang gi ye shes byang chub sems//rdo rje drag por yang dag 'byung //drag po'i don ni/
12a6(rgyud): ji ltar 'byung //drag po drag po'i mig gis ni//drag po'i khro bo zhes su bstan//drag po'i las ni spyod byed rnams//'chos shing bzlog par bya ba yin//rdo rje zhi ba 'di ci zhig/
12a7(rgyud): gdug pa de kun btul nA ni/slar yang 'i bar yang dag byung //de nyid rgyal po rdo rje 'chang //sems can don gyi thabs ston mdzad//bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad ni//khro bo'i
12b1(rgyud): dbang phyubla dab tu bstan//de nyid ni dang drag po dang //b+ha bla na rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che//ci yi phyir na zhi bar brjod//sna tshogs gzugs can rnal 'byor che//sems can smin bya 'ba'
12b2(rgyud): shig phyir//nyon mongs gangul la brtser dgongs shing //zhi ba'i don ni yang dag byung //phyag na rdo rje ci yi phyir//nyon mongs gdug pa nyid bzho mo phyir//byang chub sems kyi rang ban
12b3(rgyud): bzang //rdo rje phyag na bsnams mdzad pa//da ni phyag na rdo rjer brjod//dus gsum bdud rnams de bzhin du//mi mthun phyogs kyis mi shig pa//byang snyoms rang bzhin rdo rje ni/
12b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa'i tshogs//de nas sangs rgyas kun dang ldan//gsang chen rdo rje de lta bu//phyag na rtag tu bsnams pas na//de ni phyag na rdo rjer brjod//rdo rje gtum
12b5(rgyud): po'i don tsa zhig/rdo rje gtum po gnod sbyin che//rdo rje gnod sbyin shin tu brtan//nga rgyal nyon mongs zhags pa za//byang chub sems dpa' rang byung ba//ci yi phyir nA gtum
12b6(rgyud): por brjod//gtum gdug drag po chen po ni//rang byung nga nyid kho nu ste//sred pa'i zhags pa gcod byed cing //dragro po'i dron ni gtum po ya ni//rdo rje khro be ni yin+da brjod /
12b7(rgyud): gsad dang sprod pa drag po ste//de ni khro bo'i don du brjod//nga ni rdo rje me ltar 'bar//nyon mongs phyogs rnams sreg byed yin//rdo rje rdo rje zhes gsungs pa//ci phy-ir
13a1(rgyud): rjer brjod par bya//sra zhing po khong stong med//bcad dung gzhig par bya ba min//bsreg par bya yin 'jig med pas//stong nyid rdo rjer brjod par bya//'gro drug
13a2(rgyud): 'khor lo spong byed cing //sdig pa bral bar byed pa yi//byang chub sems gang de rdo rje//nyon mongs thams cad sel bar byed//rdo rje 'chang zhes gsungs 'di ci//sangs rgyas
13a3(rgyud): kun gyi ye shes dang //byang sems brtan pa gang yin pa//dri ni rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin//de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag/de yi rdo rje ji lta bu//rtag pa thams cad bral zhing
13a4(rgyud): chos su 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa//chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid//stong pa nyid ni rdo rjer brjod//gzugs sogs chos kyi rang bzhin gang //'gyur ba med pa'i de bzhin
13a5(rgyud): nyid//chos kyi dbyings ni brtan pa gang //de lta bu ni 'di rdo rje//rdo rje rigs kyi don 'di ci//bden zhing don yod de bzhin nyid//'gyur ba med cing skye ba med//'gag med de/
13a6(rgyud): khon nyid gang //de lta bu ni rdo rje yin//don yod 'gyur ba med pa yi//dri lta bu yi rigs gyur pa//byang chub sems dpa'i rigs su brjod//de ni rdo rje'i rigs zhes bya//thag
13a7(rgyud): ma tha ma med pa'i chos//byang chub sems dpa' zhes su brjod//bden zhing slu ba med pa yi//byang chub sems gang ded rigs yin//rdo rje 'chang ba rnams ni du//phyogs
13b1(rgyud): rnams thams cad kun khyab pa'i//byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa ni//tshos dbyings dang mnyam thug pa spyod//rdo rje 'chung rnams de spyod do//rdo rje'i rigs kun gang gi yin/
13b2(rgyud): chos kyi bdag po bla med pa//rnam par snang mdzad rdzogs sangs rgyas//mgon dos yongs su gzung ba de'i//de yi dkyil 'khor yin gsungs pa//ston pa gang zhig 'di rnams
13b3(rgyud): su'i//rjes su ston par byed pa gang //de yi spyod lam bya ba ci//gsang ba kun tu bsdus pas gsungs//'di yi ston pa byang chub sems//rjes su ston byed shes rab thabs///
13b4(rgyud): phyag rgya rnams ni spyod lam ste/sngags rnams dra yi bya ba yin//rdo rje 'chang gi rigs gang yin//rdo rje 'chang ba de kun gyi//ri gas ni byang chub sems yin te//byang chub sems dpa'/
13b5(rgyud): brtul zhugs bzang //sangs rgyas kyi yang de nyid yul//chen po gnas khring zhig na gnas//chos rnams kun la granas med de//rtse ba med sems spyod yul lo//chos rnams
13b6(rgyud): thams cad gzugs can min//chos kyi dbyings te spyod yul med//rigs ni rnam pa du yin brjod//rigs ni rnam pa brgyar gsungs te//mdo ru bsdun rnam pa lnga//sangs
13b7(rgyud): rgyas rdo rje rin chen dang //chos dang las dang rnam pa lnga//ci yi phyir na rigs su brjod//mchog dang dman pa'i bye brag gis//rigs zhes bya ba de rnam gnyis//sems
14a1(rgyud): can lam ngan zhugs pa yi//rigs ni dman pa yin par brjod//lam ngan 'gro ba spangs nus ni//byang chub sems la 'jug pa chos//de bas rdo rje rigs
14a2(rgyud): brjod pa//rigs de yang ni lnga pa yin//rigs bdag rang bzhin 'di ci zhig/byang chub sems ni rgyal po che//rdo rje sems dpa' 'jigs pa med//mgon po chen po rigs kyi
14a3(rgyud): bdag/de ni rigs kyang lnga pa yin//ci yi phyir na sems dpar brjod//sems dpa' zhes bya rnam gsum ste//byis pa de bzhin mkhas pa dang //de bzhin byang chub
14a4(rgyud): sems dpa' dang //rnam gsum sems dpa' brjod par bya//yang gsungs pa/ci yi phyir ni sems dparar+ya brjod//sems dpa' ci yin byis pa brjod//sems dpa'
14a5(rgyud): mkhas pa ci yi phyir//byang chub sems dpa' ci yin brjod//gnas gang zhig tu brjod bya ba//de ni de yi sems dpar brjod//chos som yang na chos min dang //legs
14a6(rgyud): byas nyes par byas pa la//mi shes mun pas bsgribs gyur cing //chos la nyon mong so bdag nyid 'dzin//dman zhing gti mug rigs can gyur//de lta bu ni byis
14a7(rgyud): por brjed//nyon mongs kun la chags pa dang //de bzhin srid pa ngan song gsum//mi shes mun pa la chags pa//de 'dir byis par brjod par bya//sems dpa'i
14b1(rgyud): mkhas pa gang zhig yin//dri ma las 'das nyon mongs spyod //rnal 'byor ldan zhing brtul zhugs che//mi shes ling tog 'joms byed pa//de ni sems dpa' mkhas par
14b2(rgyud): brjod//'dir ni byang chub sems dpa' gang //chos kyi de nyid rtogs gyur cing //'khor ba'i gnas nas sad 'gyur te//sems can rnams ni sad byed pa//dro ni
14b3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpar brjod//rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam pa du//de la byang chub rnam gsum ste//dman dang mchog dang bar ma'o//dman pa nyan thos sems yin te/
14b4(rgyud): bor ma rang rgyal byang chub bo//mchog ni byang chub sems yin te//de ni mi 'gyur rdo rje yin//sku gsung thugs rnams bzhag pa gang //byang chub mchog tu brjod par bya//
14b5(rgyud): ci phyir rdo rje sems dpa' yin//byang chub mchog gi ye shes gang //de ni rdo rje nges par brjod//ye shes rdo rje las byung ba//de ni rdo rje sems dpar brjod//rdo rje 'chang//
14b6(rgyud): ba kun gyi rgyal//ci yi phyir na sems dpar brjod//rdo rje sems dpa' mgon po che//dga' chen de ni chags sam ci//sems can thams cad dgrol ba'i phyir//sems/
14b7(rgyud): can rnams la chags pa ste//de ni rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po//rdo rje sems dpa' zhes su bsgrags//byang chub sems kyi 'bras bu ni//sangs rgyas ye shes bla med gang //de ni
15a1(rgyud): rdo rje sems rang bzhin//chos dang longs spyod sprul pa'o//rdo rje rgyal ba ci yin brjod//rdo rje rigs kun rgyal po ste//rdo rje lcags kyu zhes su brjod//dgug dang
15a2(rgyud): dbab pa'i rdo rje ni//da ni rdo rje rgyal por brjod//bsdu ba yi ni dngos po bzhi//bcom ldan 'das kyis gang spyad pa//sems can dgug po'i thabs zhes pa//rdo rje rgyal byor
15a3(rgyud): yang dag byung //rdo rje chags pa 'di don ci//sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byed pa//rjes su chags pa zhes su brjod//rdo rje chags pa bdud chen po//de ni rdo rje
15a4(rgyud): chags par brjod//sems can sman phyir bcom ldan gyi//glang tshe byang chub spyod pa spyad//byang chub spyod pa rjes chags pa//rdo rje chags par yang drug 'byung //
15a5(rgyud): rdo rje legs pa ci yin brjod//sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byed cing //legs so zhes bya rab stor byed//byang chub sems dpa' kun mgu byed//de ni rdo rje legs//
15a6(rgyud): bir brjod//sems can dag pa mgu byed cing //rdo rje 'tshang rnams sgrub par byed//sems can mo khrus rnams dga' byed cing //gsang po 'dzin pa rangs pa
15a7(rgyud): bye//chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sgo'i phyir//bcom ldan 'das 'di chos rnam drug/gang gi tshe ni sngon bsgrubs pa//rdo rje legs par yang dag byung //rdo rje rin
15b1(rgyud): chen ci yi phyir//byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa gang //mkha' mnyam rin tshon lta bu ste//rdo rje rin chen skal ba che//de ni rdo rje rin chen brjod//sems dpa' chen po'i dang pa/
15b2(rgyud): bskur te//sems can kun gyi dbang bskur ba//byang chub snying po'i dbang bskur gyis//rgyal ba'i sras rnams 'dzin par byed//sangs rgyas kun gyi sbyin pa gang //mkha'
15b3(rgyud): mtshungs rdo rje yang drag byung //de ni rin chen don yod dri//de ni rdo rje rin chen brjod//ma rig ling tog 'khor ba yi//mi shes mun pa 'joms byed cing //thar pa'i snang ba
15b4(rgyud): gzi brjid che//de ni rje rje gzi brjid brjod//ci phyir rdo rje rgyal mchin yin//rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin//thar pa'i lam 'gro rgyal mtshon te//chos kyi rgyal mtshan
15b5(rgyud): rgyal mtshan che//de ni rdo rje rgyal mtshan brjod//rdo rje bzhud pa ci yin brjod//rnal 'byor chen po rdo rje bzhad//sangs rgyas thams cad bzhad byed cing //byang chub sems dpa'
15b6(rgyud): kun dbugs 'byin//don rdo rje bzhad par brjod//tse yi phy-ir na rdo rje chos//rnal 'byor chen po sangs rgyas chos//sangs rgyas sems can rtogs byed pa//dge ba de bzhin
15b7(rgyud): gshegs snying po//de ni rdo rje ches su badzad//rdo rje rnon po ci yin brjid//shes rab rnon po ye shes ni//shin tu sdug pa'i nyon mongs gcod //shes phyi'i sgrib pa'ang gcod pas
16a1(rgyud): //de ni rdo rjernon por darjod//rdo rje rgyu yi don ci zhig/'khor lo sangs rgyas gar byed pas//chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu brtan//dam chos ro yi bcud la/
16a2(rgyud): byung //de ni rdo rje rgyu zhes bya//rdo rje smra bci yin brjod//sangs rgyas kun gyi chos chen po//mkha' mtshungs tshig dang bral ba ste//tshig mod tshig las yang dag byung //de ni
16a3(rgyud): rdo rje smra bar brjod//tsi yi phyir nardo rje las//sems can smin dang grol ba yi//sangs rgyas kun gyi las gang dang //sangs rgyas lu ni bdag med pa//de ni rdo rje la sa zhes bya//
16a4(rgyud): rdo rje bsrung ba ci yin brjod//byang chub sems dpa'i srung ba ste//theg pa dman pa spong byed cing //rtse mo nas lhung srung byed pa//de ni rdo rje srung bar brjod//rdo rje gnod sbyin
16a5(rgyud): 'di don ci//sdig pa thams cad zad byed cing //nyon mongs thams cad nges par gtsed//srid pa za byed ga ni de sprin tshe//de ni rdo rje gnod sbyin brjod//rdo rje khu tshur ci
16a6(rgyud): yin brjod//bden zhing gzhan min de bzhin nyid//'gyur med de kho na nyid gang //sangs rgyas de bzhin nyid ye shes//de ni rdo rje khu tshur brjod//sngon du byang chub sems
16a7(rgyud): 'gyur kang //rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag byung //bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po ni//rdo rje rgyal por yang dag byung //sems can smin byed chags pa'o//byang chub spyod pa
16b1(rgyud): legs pa ste//de nyid ces bya dam tshig che//byang chub sems lngas yang dag byung //ston gyi sbyin pa'i spyod gyur gang //de ni rdo rje rnan chen brjod//sems can kun la myi 'dug
16b2(rgyud): sbyin//de ni rdo rje gzi brjid brjod//'byung po kun la byams pa ni//rdo rje rgyal mtshan yang dag drung //chos kyi sbyin pa bzhed pa ste//dbang bsgyur bzhi por bsten pa yin//rdzogs
16b3(rgyud): sang+yas rgyas kyi ting 'dzin gang //rdo rje chos ni dri las byung //nyon mongs gcod byed rdo rje che//rdo rje rnon por yang dge byung //mngon shes dang ni mthu la sogs//de ni rdo rje rgyur
16b4(rgyud): brjod//gzungs la sogs pa grub pa ni//rdo rje smra bar yang dag byung //ye shes chen po chos chen po//dam tshig ces bya'i dga' chen po//ye shes mngon par rtogs te dag/
16b5(rgyud): rje chos las yang dag byung //brtson 'grus pha rol phyin rgyal po//rdo rje las su yang dag byung //theg pa dman pa spong byed pa//de phyir rdo rje srung bar brjod//nyon mongs srid
16b6(rgyud): pa'i gdon chen po//rdo rje gnod sbyin yang dag byung //dri nyid ye shes sngon byang chub/de nyid rdo rje khu tshur brjod//las kyi dam tshig bzhi po ste//las kyi sems dpa' bdag nyid
16b7(rgyud): che//las kyi 'khor lo las byung ba'i//rdo rje las ni de las byung //gzhan yang byang chub sems ni bskyed pa las//rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag byung //rdo rje rang bzhin sems de
17a1(rgyud): /yang//rnam pa bani ru byung ba ste//sgrol ba dang ni grol ba dang //dbugs 'byin mya ngan 'das 'god byed//sems dpa' rgyal po chags pa che//rdo rje lab
17a2(rgyud): par yang drug byung //bsod nams ye shes tshogs nyid las//rdo rje rin chen rab tu bsgragaso//bsod nams rung bzhin rin chen de/rnam bzhi ji skad bshad pa bzhin/
17a3(rgyud): ye shes kyi ni tshogs brjod pa//de ni rdo rje chos zhes bya//ye shes rlung bzhin chos de yang //rnam pa bzhir ni yang dag byu//brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa nyid//de ni dza//
17a4(rgyud): rje las su brjod//brtson 'grus rang bzhin las de yang //rnam pa bzhir ni yang dag byung //brtson dang sbyong ba zhes bya dang //so sor rtog dang sgrub pa ste//brtson 'grus
17a5(rgyud): de bzhin las bzhi po//de las mthar gyis byung ba yin//sems dpa' 'di rnams gang las byung //rdo rje sems sogs de bzhin du//byang chub sems las yang dag byung //
17a6(rgyud): pha rol phyin dug spyod pa las//rdo rje can rnams byung bar 'dod//de bzhin pha dang ma ni gang //ma ni shes rab pha rol phyin//pha ni thabs la mkhas pa ste//pad+ma las ni
17a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas sras//rdo rje can rnams gang las byung //rdo rje rgyal po de bzhin chags//rdo rje rin chen rgyal mtshan dang //rdo rje chos dang de bzhin no//de rnams shes rab
17b1(rgyud): tso bor stun//rdo rje se sa dang 'ardo rje legs//gzing rjing de bzhin bshad pa nyid//rgyu dang smra ba sems dpa' rje//de rnams thangs lus thung ba yin//rdo rje las dang rdo rje srung // dang /
17b2(rgyud): sbyin de bzhin khu chung nyid//shes ra'i thabs su grags pa ste/'thun pa chen po tshogs su bshad//rdo rje rigs rnams kun byi ga tso//rdo rje lcags kyi me ru bshed// rini/
17b3(rgyud): chen mchog gyur pa/rdo rje sems dpa' dri bzhin pa//pa n+ti rdo rje rgyal po rgyu//mA nI rdo rje rnon po ste//paN+Di'i rigs chen bzang po yi//pid 'dzin gang las byung ba'o//rdo rje
17b4(rgyud): ga'i brjid rin chen pa//rgyu la mtshan ma ni yin par bstan//nor bur bri chen bai nang bu me//rin chen gang las byung ba'o//pa ni rgyal po rdo rje laste//ma ni gnod sbyin srung ba ste//
17b5(rgyud): las kyi rigs can bzang po yi//lus rnams gang las byung ba'o//drang po gang zhig ci zhen//dngos kun dang pos don te//rdo rje can kun deng po sems//'dun dang drin dang /
17b6(rgyud): denge 'dzin//rigs rnams kun gyi dang por bshad//ying gleng gzhi ci yin zhen/rigs gzhi la ni yang dag byung //tshangs pa'i gan chen dang ldan pa//snying rje 'dag nyid can
17b7(rgyud): rnams kyi//snying rje chen po gleng gzhi yin//dmigs pa gang zhig yin zhe na//rtog pa med cing dmigs pa med//dang por byang chub sems byung ba'i//pha rol phyin pa mchog
18a1(rgyud): drug ni//de yi dmigs bya yin par bshad//rkyen pa na/ga tu sri dgasam mngon dga' ba//sems rgyun sgrug bsnga la gyur bltas nas//snying rje dang ni stan pa
18a2(rgyud): yi/byang chub sems kyis bskul ba'o//gsang ba 'di ni gang du byung //'og min stug po nyams dga' zhing //stug po'i zhing khams 'jig meng pa//de nas sangs rgyas rnams kyi
18a3(rgyud): chos//rdzogs par longs spyod tshul 'dri byung //khyab bdag 'di rnams gang nas byung //rdo rje rin chen mchog chen gyi//gzhal yas khang pa yid 'ong zhing //sangs rgyas rnams
18a4(rgyud): kyi chos ldan pa//de nas khyab bdag 'di rnams byung //thog ma tha ma med 'di ci//gsang ba'i dbang phyug chen pos gsungs//sems can kun gyi shes pa dang //de bzhin
18a5(rgyud): gshegs pa'i snying po gang //ches dbyings rdo rje chen po ste//thog ma tha ma med par bshad//rab tu dga' ba nyid 'di ci//bde chen rab tu grub bya'i phyir//sangs rgyas
18a6(rgyud): byang chub bla na med//rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal blo che//rab tu dka' ba nyid ces bshad//rab bzang nyid ni ji lta bu//dngos po kun mchog rdo rje ni//byang chub kyi ni sems
18a7(rgyud): sa //sangs rgyas skyeng byed pazang po yi//rdo rje rab parang nyid ces bshad//rdo rje snying ba dag ji lta bri//gdul bya 'phags pa'i skyes mchog nyid//de ni rdo rje snying
18b1(rgyud): par brjod//de rnams bdag po rgyal po ni//rdo rje snying po'i bdag por bshad//ci yi phyir na kun tu dazang //byang chub sems pa'i gnas ldan pa'o/'gro ba skyed pa'i skye gnas
18b2(rgyud): gang //de kun rtag tu bzang bson//kun tu bezeng por brjod par bya//rdo rje rdo rje 'tshang ba gi'o//byang chub sems gang de rdorje//rdo rje gang de rdo rje 'chang //rdo rje sem pa'
18b3(rgyud): rgyal po che//rdo rje rdo rje 'chang bar brjod//dang po'i rigs ni ji ltar byung //rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyis//grags chen rdzogs par byang chub pa//de ni dang po'i
18b4(rgyud): rigs byung ste//de kho na nyid rigs rigs las so//yadra na rab tu mkhas pa rnams//bskul ba grongs med 'dus nas ni//rab tu dga' bo'i sa zab kyang //de ni dang po'i//
18b5(rgyud): rigs byung yin//chos kun skye ba med pa dang //'byung ba ji lta ru bar 'gyur//de nyid rtogs shing shes pa yis//chos rnams thams cad rtog pa med//chos dang gang zag
18b6(rgyud): bdag med las//rigs de byung ba nyid du 'dod//chos rnams 'ga' yang skye ba med//chos rnams 'gag par 'gyur ba med//rnam par rtog pa nyer zhi gang //de nyid sangs rgyas
18b7(rgyud): rigs chen yin//byang chub sems dpa' ci yin brjod//chos rnams thod rtogs pa dang //'khor ba'i gnas las sang gyur cing //sems can rnams kyis rtogs byed pa/
19a1(rgyud): de ni byang chub sems dpar brjod//ci phyir sangs rgyas brjod par bya//de bzhin nyid dang na shin tu brtan//de kho na nyid gang rtogs nas//chos kun rtog/
19a2(rgyud): pa zhes bya grang //de ni rtogs pas sangs rgyas brjod//de bzhin gshegs pa ci yin brjod//chos kyi de bzhin yang dag gnas//slar yang gzhan du mi 'gyur zhing //de
19a3(rgyud): nyid la mo ni ston byed pa//de ni de bzhin gaushegs zhes bya//bcom ldan 'das ni ci yin brjod//las dang nyon mongs de bzhin skye//de bzhin nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib
19a4(rgyud): mi mthun phyogs kyi chos rnams gang //de bcom pas na bcom ldan brjod//de yi bcom pa ci yin brjod//bcom ldan de bzhin bcom par brjod//'dod pa'i 'dod/
19a5(rgyud): chags gtsod byed cing //nyon mongs 'joms shing pham byed pa//de ni de yi bcom par brjod//de bzhin ston pa'i ston pa ci//nyon mongs bdud sogs gcod byed cing
19a6(rgyud): skye dbu ma lus thabs chen gyis//ngan 'gro srid la so skyob byed pa//ston pa'i ston par brjod pa yi//ci yi phyir na ye shes brjod//de nyid shes pas ye shes to//slar
19a7(rgyud): yod chos su rtog pa min//rtag dang chad pa spong byed cing //'tsho med de bzhin ye shes yin//shes rab ye shes ci yin brjod//rnam pa mang po shes byed cing //rtogs//
19b1(rgyud): pas sdug bsngal las grol byed//kun nas nyon mongs chos spyod ba//shes rab ye shes zhes su brjod//ci phyir shes rab brjod par b+ha//rab zlar sbyor ba shes 'gyu \u0f7fbla
19b2(rgyud): khyad par du ni rtogs par byed//bden pa de bzhin nyid shes pa'i//shes rab shes rang zhes su de shing //shos rabya pha rnam byin rngon ci//nyan thos rang rgyal phyiral gyi/
19b3(rgyud): shes rang las ni bla mar brjod//de bzhin nyid gnol pha rol phyin//shes rang pha rol phyin zhes pa shAng //rdul zhes bya don ci yin brjod//na ni dgag pa'i don tshon to//dngos mo/
19b4(rgyud): dngos po med min pas//gang du dri ma med gyur pa//de ni de yi tshul du brjod//ting 'dzin don 'di ci yin pa rjod//chos kun dngos po med ces pa'i//mnyam pa nyid du rab gnas
19b5(rgyud): pa'o//shes rang can gyis lhag par bsten//sems la dmags pa ra brjod par bya//ci yi phyi na byasam gtan brjod//sdug bsngal thams cad spong byed cing //nyon
19b6(rgyud): mos dru ba rab 'joms pa'i//shes rab bcas phyur sems pa'aM//srid pa'i rnams par byed po'i mchog/rna 'byor na ni na yin yodzod//chos r+b+ba lce chen po dam pa dang /
19b7(rgyud): zab mo'i mchog tu gyur pa des//kun shes kun rig ldan 'byar ba'i//rnal 'byor ru ni brjod par bya//rnal 'byor bo na co yin brjod//shes rab kyi na nges sems pa//rnam
20a1(rgyud): khyod rgyal 'byur dran sams shing //sems can kun don sems gang //dran napa ra bden padzod //ni kun gyi rgyul b+h+yo//thams cad rig nga
20a2(rgyud): thams cad ster//rdo rje 'tshong chen dang blo b+h+yo//bde ba yi ni r+g+ha 'di yus//de bzhin ni 'jig rten ga sgom//khams gsum rnal 'byor rig pa'i mchog/de bzhin la
20a3(rgyud): ba mya ngan 'das//bde 'gro dang ni ngan 'gro dang //'dod pa lcel longs spyod pa ni//srid gsum 'di yi don ci zhig/sems can kun gyi sems gang yin//srid
20a4(rgyud): gsum du brjod par bya//'dod dong gzugs dang gzugs med las//'di ltar thams cad rig pa mchog/bdag meng byed pa po yang med//chos kyang yod pa ma yin
20a5(rgyud): te//dge dang mi dger byed pa yi//bag chags kyis ni kun tu bsgribs//chos ni zlog med dus can te//byed pa po ni yod ma yin//rtog pas nyams pa'i sems ldan
20a6(rgyud): sa//rgyu dang 'bras bur mthong bar 'gyur//kun grA nis pan+da thams chud pa//de ni chos kun bskyed par byeda'o//bsgos shing dag chags dang ldan pa//de ni sred pa gsum
20a7(rgyud): zhes bya//'dod de'i las skyes khams gsum gyi//rgyur ni kun gzhi de nyid snang //gzugs dang gzugs med 'gro ba yi//chos rnams kun gyi gnas kyang yin/
20b1(rgyud): kun rnam par dag pa'i phyir//nyes pa kun drung bral ba ste//thog ma med 'byung chos snying ngo //DUr dri mas nyon mongs 'gyur//da ni kho na chos chen po//nga ni chos kyi snying por
20b2(rgyud): bshad//de bas dri ni rgyal po che//de ni srid pa gsum du bsgrags//'jig rteni gdu yin brjod//'dod pa 'jig rten de bzhin gzugs//gzugs med pa yi skye dgu rnams
20b3(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum po zhes pa de//rang byung nyid kho na yin//'drid pa zhes bya chos chen te//dag pa btsal bar bya ba'i phyir//gzung 'dzin chos rnams zhes bya ba'i//den
20b4(rgyud): nyid las so sor rtog/chos kyi dbyings dang dbyer med phyir//nga ni chos de dag par byed//de bas nga ni rgyal po che//'jog rten gsum gyi bdag por bstan//ji ltar 'dod
20b5(rgyud): pa de bzhin gzugs//de bzhin gzugs med rab tu bsgrags//stong pa nyid dang dbyer med pas//nga ni snying po'i bdag por bshad//khams gsum pa yi don ci zhig 'dod/
20b6(rgyud): khams de bzhin gzugs khams dang /gzugs med pa ni nyid dag drung //khams gsum bzang po 'di dag ni//rlung byung nga nyid kho na yin//'di ni khams dang rgyu dang don//
20b7(rgyud): khams gsum gyi ni rgyu sems pa//stong dang mtshan ma med bshad cing //smon pa med pa nyid bstan//'khor ba'i do ni ni ci zhig yin//byis pa rnams ni kun tu 'byung //
21a1(rgyud): de bzhin yang dang snang du 'khor//'khor ba dag pa'i bdag nyid do//rang 'byung nga nyid khyon sbyin//gang la 'khor ba yod pA yi//chos ni rdul tsam
21a2(rgyud): yod ma yin//yang dag ma yin kun brtags phyir//de ni dog mtha' med pa yin//med glang de ni stong pa ste//stong pa nyid grung nga nyid do//de bas 'khor ba de
21a3(rgyud): nyid ni//rdo rje 'chang rgyal de nyid bsgragasra//mya ngan 'das pa ci yin brjod//glang zhig de bzhin nyid rtog stong //bden bzhi rang bzhin bzang po nyid//mtshan nyid dang
21a4(rgyud): ni drangos po gzugs//mtshan ma nyid kyang rnam par spangs//tshig dang sgra yis gzung bya min//rnam par rtog pa yod ma yin//de bas mya ngan 'das sgra ru/
21a5(rgyud): dwa nyid kho na rab shes bya//de yi rtag pa'i don ci zhing //rtag nyid rtag la 'byung gnas te//rnam par rtog pa dang bral gang //rtag pa de nyid kho na ni//mya ngan 'das
21a6(rgyud): pa'i sgra ru bsgrags//'jig pa yang ni ci yin brjod//gang zhig 'khor par mi 'jug cing //thams cad mi rtag pa nyid dang //sdug bsngal 'byung 'gog byed pa yi//
21a7(rgyud): 'jig pa mya ngan 'das sgra yin//dag pa yang ni ci yin brjod//yod pa'ang ma yin med pa'ang mini//brjod bya brjod byed ma yin min//dag pa mya ngan 'das nyid yin//theg
21b1(rgyud): pa chen po ci yin brjod//sangs rgyas thams cad gshegs gyur cing //thag pa kun las nges rgyal ba//yang dag gyur pa'i sems can ni//theg pa rin po zhes su bsdum
21b2(rgyud): mthu dang las rnams 'jug pa dang //tshogs rnams rnal 'byor ngo mtshar rnams//rgyu che zhes pa thog chen te//sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo mtshar mchog/nam mkha'i don ni ci nis
21b3(rgyud): yin//sa nyid kyang ni ci yin brjod//'byung ba med cing rdzas kyang med//skye ba med cing 'chi ba med//dus gsum dngos po dang bral mchog/nam mkha' zhes pa'i sgyur
21b4(rgyud): bstan//yang dang yang du skye ba dang //de bzhin nyon mongs kun bdag nyid//grangs med dpag med dang bral ba//de ni sa nyid brjod par bya//'byung ba chen po grang
21b5(rgyud): lngalas byung //'gog pa ci yino gang gis byed//ma rig nyon mongs la sogs las//'byung ba chen po yang dag 'byung //sa bon kun ldan kun gzhi ni//phyi dang nang gi bdag
21b6(rgyud): nyid 'a dong //gnas na yongs su gyur pa dang //kun gzhe sa bon mi 'byung zhing //rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba//'byung ba chen po 'gog pa yin//rtog pa chen po'i
21b7(rgyud): rgyal po mchog tu gsang zhing sbas pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud rdo rje rtse mo las shin tu gsang ba stug po'i tshogs kyi las thams cad bsdus pa ste/drug pa las sems dpa'
22a1(rgyud): bcu drug gi bshad pa zhes bya ba bshad pa'i dang po rdzogs so//ci'i phyir ni phyag rgyar brjod//gang gis phyag rgya bcings gyur pa//de ni srog chags gdug
22a2(rgyud): kun dang //'gro ba snog can thams cad dang //rtag tu rgyus ni btab par 'gyur//nI phy-ir sdug na su brjod par bya//gsang sngogs rnams ni 'bod byed cing //gdu/pa thams
22a3(rgyud): sgriskro par byed//nyon mongs sngags rnams 'joms byung cing //sangs rgyas chos ni spyan 'dren yin//ci phyir zhe na rig sngags brjod//'dod chags mun pa rnams 'dul zhing /
22a4(rgyud): nyinyon mongs rnams kyang rnam par 'dul//ma rig pa ni bzlog byed pa//de ni rig sngagaso legs par brjod//gzungs sngags rnams ni ci yin brjod//chos rnams kyi ni rten byed
22a5(rgyud): cing //srid pa'i phyogs ni rab 'joms byed//sangs rgyas chos rnams thob byed cing //dge ba la rten sbyin pa'ang yin//phyag rgya yi ni mtshan nyid brjod//sangs rgyas kun
22a6(rgyud): dang brtul zhugs ldan//byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ni//rdo rje 'chang ba thams cad dag/spyod lam phyag rgyas mtshon par byed//sngags rnams kyi ni mtshan nyid kyang //
22a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs yon to//chos kyi snying po sgrub byed cing //chos kyi dbyings dang yang dag ldan//sngags kyi mtshan nyid yin par brjod//rig sngags kyi ni mtshan nyid
22b1(rgyud): gsungs//'khor bar myong ba'i sdug bsngal dang //'dod chags la sogs nyes pa'i tshogs//rigs dang bcas pa zhi byed pa'i//rig sngags kyi ni mtshan nyid brjod//de bzhin kho nar
22b2(rgyud): gzungs sngags kyi//sangs rgyas chos rnams 'dzin byed cing //chos rnams 'dzin par byed pa dang //dge ba zhes bya 'dzin byed pa//gzungs sngags kyi ni mtshan nyid brjod//rtsa ba'i phyag
22b3(rgyud): rgya'i gnas ni gang //ji ltar bcing ba thub chen po//phyag rgya dag ni 'ching ba na//ji ltar rdo rje can kun mnyes//dang po kho nar khrus bya zhing //de bzhin phyogs dag bcing ba dang //log
22b4(rgyud): 'dren rnams kyang bcing bya ste//gos dag gtsang ma bgo bya zhing //grong dang yul 'khor dag dang ni//grong khyer dang ni grong rdal rnams//de yi dbus su phyag rgya dang //nam yang bcing
22b5(rgyud): bar mi bya ste//lha khang yang na dgon pa 'am//ri bo yau ni phug drag gam//rnam pa sna tshogs kyis dben zhing //'du 'dzi med pa'i gnas gtsang ma//der ni skyi la krung bca' bar bya//
22b6(rgyud): bak+Sha shis skyil krung nyid bya ste//ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' yis//byang chub snying por bcings pa bzhin//der ni mige drug btsum bya zhing //sol so ni bzhag par bya//mchu
22b7(rgyud): gnyis dag kyang mnyam bya zhing //dran pa rtse gcig byas nas kyang //skyer med sbyar ba'i sngags bzla zhing //phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya//phyag rgya'i rnam pa de lta bu'i//bcings
23a1(rgyud): /bswA rdo rje can kun mnyes//rig sngags ji ltar bzla bar bya//dbang phyug chen po gasnang ba gsungs//rig sngags dag ni bzlas bran//ji ltar yid kyis rdza
23a2(rgyud): bzlas//skyil krung ji lta ba bzhin bya//dAn dang yid ni ma yengs pas//rlig sngags dag ni bzla bya zhing //sku nyid kyang ni bsam par bya//mu chu yIs ma yin lngas kyang min/
23a3(rgyud): dkon nyid kyis kyang ma yin te//lci dang rgog mas kyang ma yin//rtag tu snying ka nas kyang min//shin tu phra ba'i yid kyis ni//sems ni chos nyid nang chud bya//de ltar bzlas
23a4(rgyud): pa byas na ni//yid kyis rdo rje bzlas pa yin+da//oM ni ts+tshi zhig yin pa ra bI shid//mchog dang nor ster dpal dang g.yeng //skal bzang rnam pa dang ldan zhing //dam bca' ba
23a5(rgyud): dang bkra shes don//nor bu 'dzin pa'i sbyong po yin//yi ge hUM ni ci yin brjod//sdug bsngala'i chos shing 'joms par byed//srid pa'i zhegs pa gcod byed cing //
23a6(rgyud): gdug pa sngangs shing gsod byed pa'i//hUM ni mchog tu dran par bya//yi ge phaT ni ci yin brjod//gdug dung sdug bsngal 'joms byed cing //bde ba dag ni 'gugs pa
23a7(rgyud): byad//phaT ni 'joms byed sgra yin te//grogs dang bcas po 'joms par byed//swA hA zhes pa ci yin brjod//sdig pa thams cad zhi byed cing //dge ba'i tshogs ni
23b1(rgyud): 'phel bar byed//nyes par byas pa 'phrog byed cing //rtag bsngal thams cad 'joms pa'i mchog/mAchod pa ci phyir brjod par bya//mchod par byed pas mchod pa ste//
23b2(rgyud): gang du bsrang bya mi 'jigs pa'i//de yi mchod pa rnam mang 'gyur//phyi rol gyi ni mchod pa min//'di ni sangs rgyas kun gyis mchod//de bzhin du ni mthar pa'i mchod
23b3(rgyud): gsang ba'i mchod pa de rnams ni//'jigs med rgyal sras rnams kyis ni//sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin dang //nyid kyi sras kyi mtshungs med pa'i//cho ga sgrub pa'i
23b4(rgyud): gsang ba ni//rtag tu rig pa 'dzin pa'i mchog/de bzhin dam tshig shes nyid kyang //zhugs pa gang dang gang yin pa//don dam tshig shes pa yin//dam tshig/
23b5(rgyud): sgoms par byed pa yang //du ma tshig shes pa yin par brjod//bskal pa grangs med 'das pa yi//byang chub sems dang mtshungs par 'gyur//gsang ba'i dam tshig
23b6(rgyud): la zhugs pa//de yi dam tshig shes par brjod//ci yi phyir na dkyil 'khor yin//dam pa'i chos kyi bcud snying ngo //'byung bas de ni dkyil 'khor brjod//dkyil
23b7(rgyud): 'khor chen po gsang ba che//chos chen shin tu bstan pa'o//dkyil 'khor cho ga ji lta bu//cho ga chos dang rnal 'byor te//gsang ba'i mthar pa yang dag 'byung //skye ba 'di
24a1(rgyud): na//nyid kho n+da la//rangab dga' sgrub par byud pa'i mchog/dkyil 'khor du ni zhugs pa yi//skyes pa'am yang na du med kyis//bya brag zhig bya ba /
24a2(rgyud): gsungs shig gsung ba'i dbang phyug che//dkon mchog gsum la skyabs 'gro dang //byang chub sems chen bskyed pa dang //de bzhin du ni sgrub pa'i mchog/shin tu
24a3(rgyud): bstan par bya ba yin//thub pa'i dkyil 'khor zhugs pa la//sdom pa ji ltar sbyin par bya//khyod kyis srog tshogs bsad mi bya//ma byin par yang blang mi bya//'dod//
24a4(rgyud): pas log por g.yem mi bya//brdzun du yang ni smra mi bya//nyes pa kun gyi rtsa ba yi//chang dog 'thung ba spyang bar bya//bye ba ma yin thams cad dor//mchog tu/
24a5(rgyud): sems can gdul bar bya//dam pa rnams la rim gro dang //rnal 'byor pa rnams bsnyen bkur bya//rnal 'byor rig par sgrub po'i phyir//mkhas pa rnams la bsnyen
24a6(rgyud): par bya//lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang //ngag gi yang ni rnam pa bzhi//yid kyi rnam po gsum dag kyang //ci nus par ni bsrung bar bya//slob dpon brnyas
24a7(rgyud): par mi bya ste//bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs//sngags dang phyad rgya rnams la yang //nam yang brnyas par mi bya'o//'khor lo rje rje pad+ma sogs/
24b1(rgyud): mtshan ma'i phyag rgya gang yin pa//'brom pa nyid du mi bya zhing //bza' byar yang ni mi d+ha'o//de bzhin sman mU l+yA yi thig/rkang pa dag gis brdzi mi bya//de yi steng du 'dug mi bya/
24b2(rgyud): slar yang ba nog par mi bya'o//lha yi phyag mtshan brting po dang //lha yi banon pa'i mtshan ma rnams//'di ma ning byirtas par mi bya ste//sems can lto ni gnod mi bya//de yis
24b3(rgyud): srog gi phyir yang ni//'dor bar mi bya gang zhig yin//'tsho de'i srog gi phyir yang ni//byang chub sems ni dror mi bya//rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya ni//num yod dor bar mi bya'o//
24b4(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la dad pa yang //rnam pa kun tu btang mi bya//sdom pa btang bar mi bya zhing //bdag nyid gdung bar mi bya'o//khrus kyi las ni ji ltar bya//mi drug
24b5(rgyud): brar+d+ha ni spangs nas so//dge ba bcu ni sten byed cing //'byung po rnams de phyan 'dod pa//rlung gi bdag nyid khrus su 'dod//bdag nyid rab tu dag byu'i phyir//bdag nyid
24b6(rgyud): phyag rgya rgyas gdab phyir//phyag rgya thams cad de yang dag bats+tshe //rnal 'byor pa yi khrus su brjod//gsang bya'i mkhas ldan khas len pa'i//chu yi khrus ni bya ba ste/
24b7(rgyud): los 'od rnam par rtog pa'i khrus//rdo rje slob dpon dag gis bya//yang na tshogs khrus bya ba//mchog tu ngo mtshar bshed bya ste//dang por bdag nyid go bgo zhing /
25a1(rgyud): klu buM s+yAng ni dran par b+hu//don kun rab tu stu pyod pa'o// gnyis don snabyung blo yin//rdorjeganod sbyin drug chen dang //khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba
25a2(rgyud): /oM drAk+ki li k+ShI lA badz+re hU~M phaT+Ta//oM d+h+r-ig cha'o//oM d+hI A rdo rje gnod sbyin d+hi'o//oM a mr-i te hUM phaT/bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i'o//rdo rje'i gsing sngags 'di
25a3(rgyud): dang ni//rdo rje'i ba de'i phyag rgya yis//rdo rje 'bar rab bzod dka' bas//bdag nyid dag ni 'bar bar bya//oM d+b+ha pa d+hU prI k+Sha ya d+hU pi pra dza la ni swA hA//chu yi nang du
25a4(rgyud): 'jug pa dang //snyim pa gsum ni drugs pa dang //sangs rgyas kun gyi rigs dag la//rig sngag sa 'di ni 'dod pa yin//rig sngags mngon par bzlas pa yi//
25a5(rgyud): sa yi phung po gsum dag ni//bdag gi stong dang smad dang dbus//rab tu dag byed mchog yin no//oM b+hu dza la hUM/sangs rgyas thams cad rjes dran pas//rig
25a6(rgyud): stesngags thams cad mngon bzlas pa'i//chu ni phyag rgya kun gyis blang //rig sngags 'di ni gsang bar 'dod//phyogs ni ji ltar bcing ba yin//me lha rgyal chen shAr
25a7(rgyud): phyogs su//lho yi phyogs su gshin rdzing ngo //nub tu rlung lha nyid dang ni//byang du chu lha gzhom par 'dod//rnal 'byor pa yis gzugs bzhi ni//phyogs pani
25b1(rgyud): du/tu nges par bcing //de nas snang 'og marnams rnams su//rdorje nag mos nges par bcad//bzlog cing da ni ji ltar lags//dom du chur rab 'bar dang //rdodz+nyA ny+tsi ma ra/
25b2(rgyud): 'bar dang //rdo rje can g+hi phyag rgya yis//bgegs bcing ba ni brtan par 'gyur//dga' ba chen po ji lta bu//rab tu gus bcas phyag dag bya//phyag rgya bzhi yis phyogs bani
25b3(rgyud): rA//lnga pa brtsegs pa'i phyug rgya yis//steng dang 'og dang mtsham sa rnams su//stong dang bcas pa'i phyag bya'o//rdo rje srob du yon sgrol chen gyi/tshig tu gsang pa'i dam pa
25b4(rgyud): yis//rtsegs pa'i phyag rgyu'i dkyil 'khor du//de bzhin du ni bcing bar bya//mchod pa ji ltar yin zhen//rig stegs mngon par bzlas mchod dang //phyag rgya bcing ba lhur len
25b5(rgyud): drung //rnal 'byor sgom po mchod pa dang //sgrub pa dag gri mchod pa'o//sbyin sreg las ni ji lta bu//lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang //ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang /yid
25b6(rgyud): kyi rnam pa gsum dag dang //sreg bya sbyin sreg mchog yin no//rdo rje rnal 'byor las byung ba'o//de nas rdo rje rig 'dzin gyi//snying po gsang ba kun bsdus pa'i//shin tu
25b7(rgyud): smras pa dam pa'i mchog/de kho na nyid bshad par bya//rdo rje slob dpon spyod chen ldan//dkyil 'khor gsang bar rab tu zhugs//slob dpon las ni dbang skur thob//gsang
26a1(rgyud): dang dgongs kudu shes shing //dpa' zhing brtan la brtson 'grus che//yid 'ang sa 'dzin rnying gdul brla ldan//dub drang ba shes gnyen can dag gis//rdo rje slob dngon
26a2(rgyud): nyid bya'o//dang por ji srid tshigs bar du//zla ba 'am yang na zla ba phyed//yang na lo yi bar du ni//rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad par bya//gal te de ni sangs rgyas kyi//rig
26a3(rgyud): 'dzin grub pa rnam gsum mo//ji ste rdo rje can gyi yin//rnam pa gsum du nges pa yin//nor bu rigs can bzang po la//rnal 'byor bzhi pa nyid bya'o//ji ste pad+ma 'byung ba la//nAm
26a4(rgyud): 'byor bzhi ni rab tu sgrub//ji ste las kyi rang bzhin bzang //las rnams kun gyi rigs las mi//sbyor ba bzhi ni yang dag byung //rnam pa bco brgyad dag tu 'gyur//snga dro phyi na
26a5(rgyud): byephyed dang //nam gyi gung slad gung la ni//bya ba chen po kun bya ste//de bzhin sangs rgyas rdo rje'i rigs//dang por re shig rnal 'byor che//chen pos phyogs kun phyag bya ste//
26a6(rgyud): rdo rje rnal 'byor cho ga yis/rdo rje slob dpon nyid bya'o//shisI rab chen po sangs rgyas kun//yang dang yang du dran bya ste//bdag nyid chen po sangs rgyas kun//rdo rje sngags kyis
26a7(rgyud): bskul bar byo//oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzo pa pra brta nA ya At+ma naM nir+yA tA yA mi/sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra satwa a d+hi tiSh+Thi swa mA~M/shar gyi phyogs su song nas no//yan lag kun gyis
26b1(rgyud): byugats+tsha bi ti//rdo rje'i gastang rtags 'ad sa ni//bdag nyid dbul bar bya ba yin//oM sarba twA thA ga ta b+hUdz+dza a b+hI ka ya At+ma ni nIr+yAt+tA l+yA ma~M/s+yArba t+yA thAg+hA ta badz+rA rat+ta ASh+NISh+T+rIts+tshas+t+wa~M/dzaH
26b2(rgyud): gos nga sngags 'di yis ni//lho phyogs su ni phyag byas te//sangs rgyas dag ni thams cad la//bdag ni dbul bar bya ba yi//de nas nub kyi phyogs su ni//sngags 'di yis ni phyag
26b3(rgyud): byas te//oM sarba ta thA gra ta b+hU dz+nyo pra bar+d+ha nA ya At+manA~M nir+yA ta yA mI//sarba ta thA ga tA badz+ra d+har+m+ma pra bat+tA yA mAM/drug pa'i chos can slob dpon ches//nub phyogs su ni phyag byas te//rdo rje
26b4(rgyud): sngags 'dis skul bya zhing //bdag nyid rab tu dngul bar bya//oM sarba tathA ga te pU dza~M karma NI At+ma nA~M nir+yA tA yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta badz+rA karma ku rA mAM/mchod dang dbang sgor
26b5(rgyud): les ldan zhing //byeng du chos la nges sbyor bas//byang phyogs su ni phyag byas te//bdag nyid rdo rje las su 'gyur//shar du mchod pa'i las yin te//lho phyogs su ni dbang bskur
26b6(rgyud): ba//nub phyogs su ni chos chen po//byang du chos la nges par sbyor//thub pa kun gyi nyi ma'o//mgon po chen po rab btud gnas//phyogs rnams kun tu sngags 'ang yIs//
26b7(rgyud): phyag ni rab tu btsal bar bya//oM sarba ti thA ga ta kA ya bAka tsit+ta pr-i Na me na badz+ra ban d+ha naM kA ro mi/de nas ji skad bshad pa'i phyag bya ba//sangs rgyas la dmigs sems kyis ni//rab
27a1(rgyud): tu gus bcas phyug rgyu rnams//myur du bsnyen pa'i bsgrub pa yin//phyag byas 'ag tu langs nas ni//dang ga nyid kyis ni lhas rnams bya//bdag nyid dbung
27a2(rgyud): babazang po y-i//sangs rgyas sunI le da ste//ma lus phyogs bzhugs mchog sbyor ba//sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol//'di ltar nye brlani pa bdag
27a3(rgyud): ce nas rdo rje nyid gyur mdzod//rdo rje rigs kyi mchog gyur pa//sangs rgyas sras bcas thams cad la//rtag tu rnam pa thams cad kyis//bdag nyid dag ni dbul bar
27a4(rgyud): bya//rdo rje'i gsang sngags de yis ni//bdag nyid dbul ba 'gyur ba yin//sangs rgyas sras bcas thams cad ni//yang nas yang du rjes dran te//sdig pa la sogs
27a5(rgyud): nyon mongs kun//mye ngan 'das par bshugs par bya//skye ba 'dri'am gzhan dag gi/sdig pa thams cad rnam spang nas//sangs rgyas sras bcas thams cad kyi//
27a6(rgyud): bsod nams ye shes tshogs skyed dang //de bzhin sems can kun gyi la//rjes su yi rang bya ba yin//byang chub mya ngan myi 'da' bar//sangs rgyas kun la gsol pa
27a7(rgyud): gdang //byang chub sems ni thobs chen gyis//sems can sangs rgyas rjes dran bya//shin tu ngo mtshar mchod pa ni//ci nus par yang bsgrub par bya//yang na mya ngan
27b1(rgyud): 'das snabs dang //rnal 'byor dpe ba sogs pa la//nga mnor gyur pa'o mchod pa yis//mchod pa'i skyon dag dngul bar bya//gnas 'di'am nI bzhan dag na//lha sags
27b2(rgyud): bdag phyir ma byas pa'i//me tog chu skyes thang skyes rnams//thabs chen sangs rgyas thams cad dang //de yi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor nas//thub pa'i dbang po rnams la dbul/
27b3(rgyud): rdo rje'i rnal 'a byor 'di yis ni//mi tog mchod pas rab mchod cing //phyag rgya rnal 'byor bcas pa yis//phyogs rnams kun tu nges par spro//oM sarba ta thA ga tA puSh+pa p+pa
27b4(rgyud): dedom b+hAs+yA mu dr-i s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM//gang dag spos kyi shing bzang po//thub pa'i dbang phyug rnams la dbul//lho yi spos sogs rgyud 'byung ba//phyogs rnams kun tu skyeb
27b5(rgyud): bya//oM sarba tra thA ga tat+tap+ta b+hU dza me b+ha sa mu dra s+phA rA Na sa ma ye hUM//dri yi shing rnams bzang po ni//thub pa'i dbang phyug rnams la ni//phyag rgyur bcas rab bskul nas ni/phyogs
27b6(rgyud): rnams kun tu spro bar bya//oM sarba ta thA ga ta gan+d+ha pU dzim+me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa yai hUM/rin chen rang bzhin rgya mtsho dang //rin chen rI ba~M la sogs mchog/mchod po'i sprin ni sprob
27b7(rgyud): yis//phyogs rnams kun tu dngul bar bya'o//oM sarba ta thA ga te bo d+h+yang gi rat+na a li kA ra pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM//rtsed 'jo bde ba dga' chen dang //rgyud dang /
28a1(rgyud): sgrog la sogs pa'i tshogs//phyogs rnams kun tu thams cad nas//dga' ba'i mchog ni spro bar bya//oM sarba ta thA na ta s+t+rai s+ye ra ti so khyA a nuH
28a2(rgyud): /ra pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM//gos dang rgyan sngogs 'byung ba yi//de bzhin dpag bsam shing bzang po//de yi sngags ni bArjid byi zhing //sangs rgyas
28a3(rgyud): /kun+da la dbul bar bya//oM sarba tA thA ga ta a nut+ta ro bo d+hi a lang kA ra was+t+ra pU dza me g+ha su mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM//rin chen bzang po cher 'bar dang //snang ba'i
28a4(rgyud): shing las byung ba dang //zla ba nyi ma la sogs 'od //phyogs rnams kun tu spro bar bya//oM sarba ta thA ga ta a lo kaM pU dzA me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM//sems
28a5(rgyud): can kun gyi sdug bsngal che//yang dang yang du rjes dran nas//snying rje bskyed pa'i sbyor ba yis//byang chub sems ni byaskyed par bya//byang chub tu na sems bskyed//
28a6(rgyud): na//sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir//sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya zhing //phyogs rnams kun tu spyo bar bya//oM sarba tA thA ga ta badz+ra bi d+hi tsit+taM pU dzA me g+has/
28a7(rgyud): mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma yi hUM//sems can kun la bde logs dang //'byung po kun la byamos pa dang //dud 'gro kun la mi 'jigs sbyin//ngan 'gro thams cad zhe 'dong
28b1(rgyud): dang //byams dang snying rnga btang snyoms dang //dga' ba tshungs pa'i rnal 'byor byung //rdo rje'i sngags ni brjod bya zhing //sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya//oM sarba ta thA gA tA
28b2(rgyud): a nut+tA r-i ma hA brah+ma bih+ma ra pU dza ma~M g+ha s+yA mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM//sems can thams ca de dpal dang ni//nor dang ldan pa grub par shog/bde ba ma tshang med par shog/
28b3(rgyud): zhes pas dbul zhing spro bar bya/oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA bodz+ro d+hU bA dA na pU ra mi tA pU dza me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU~M//sems can thams cad byang chub dang //sdom
28b4(rgyud): la rab tu gnas par shog/rgyags sogs nyes pa chen po rnams//ni 'gyur kun tu spro bar bya//oM sarba ta thA ga ta oM nr-it+ta ra ma hA bo d+hi hA ra shI lA pa ro mi tAM pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra/
28b5(rgyud): s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM//'jigs dang khon sogs sdug bsngal la//sogs pa'i 'jigs kun zhi gyur cig/byams dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis//chos la bdag med
28b6(rgyud): bsgrub par bya//oM san+na ta thA ga ta a nut+ta ra ma hU~Md+har+m+mA e pra b+hon+tik+Shin+d+ha pA ra mi rbA pA dz+nyA me g+has+yA mu dr-i s+phA ra Na sa ma yai hUM/'khor ba mthar thog bar du ni//bdug 'tshang rgya/
28b7(rgyud): bar ma gyur cig/de bzhin sems can thams cad ni//de nyid sgrib pa byed par shog/oM sarba ta thA ga ta san snar pa ri t+ye ka a nut+ta ra bar+ya pA ra ma tA pU dza me g+ha sa mu dr-i/
29a1(rgyud): ra Na sa s+ye hUM//srog chags kun gyi 'dod chags stsogs//nyon mongs chen po zhi bar shog/sems can thams cad g.yeng med cing //bsam
29a2(rgyud): gtan bzhi dang ldan par sh+log/oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nut+ta ra ma hA sau khya bI hA ra d+h+ya na pA ra mi tA pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa mA ye hUM//sangs rgyas ye shes shes rab
29a3(rgyud): cha//sdug bsngal gcod byed bla na med//shes rab sbyor bas dag byed pa'i//sangs rgyas sems can dag gyur cig/oM sarba ta thA gA ta oM nut+ta ra kle sha r+g+ha da sAr+tha
29a4(rgyud): d+har+m+ma sa min+ta d+hA na ma hA pradz+nyA pA ri ma tA pU dza me g+ha sa mu dra s+pho ra Na sa ma yau hUM//stong gsum gyi ni rdul snyed kyi//bdag nyid kyis ni rnam bsam zhing //mchod pa'i phyi
29a5(rgyud): ni rnams bA saMms nas//sangs rgyasaM kun laM dbul bar bya//oM sarba ta thA gaM ta kA ya nir+yA ta na pU dza me g+ha sa mu drA s+pha ra Ne sa ma ye hUM//stong gsum gyi ni rdul snyed kyi//
29a6(rgyud): bdag nyid kyis ni rnams bsam zhing //lce ni de nyid ldan dang bcas//sangs rgyas sngags pa badz+rod par bya//oM sarba ta thA ga ta bAkau nir+yA ta na pU dza me g+ha s+yA mu dra s+pha ra Na
29a7(rgyud): sa ma ye hUM//de nas rnal 'byor de nyid kyis//lus dang ngag sems byung ba yi//mchod pa dag ni bsdus nas su//sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya//oM sarba ta thA ga ta/
29b1(rgyud): tsitonad+hA tan pU dza ma g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra NA sa ma ye hU~M//grags chen ldan pa'i sangs rgyas rnams//ma lus kun la mchod nas ni//dge ba dag ni bsdus byas nas//sems can don du sngo
29b2(rgyud): ba bya//sangs rgyas thams cad rjes dran nas//sems dpa' skyel krung btso' bar bya//byams sogs rnal 'byor chen po rnams/phyogs rnam kun tu spro bar bya//go cha mchog
29b3(rgyud): gi yid gnyis kyis//blo ldan bdag nyid go bgo zhing //rig sngags gang zhig mngon 'dod pa'i//rig sngags dri ni dazla bar bya//rgyud chen gsang ba 'di ru ni//rnal 'byor chen po'i sngags//
29b4(rgyud): bzlas pa//brgya rtsa bcu ru bshad pa yin//yang na nyi shu rtsa gcig go/tshe ga'i sbyor ba 'bring la ni//thun myong du ni rnam lngar bau shad//gang gis sdig can 'grub 'gyur ba'i//gsang
29b5(rgyud): ba'i bzlas pa rnal 'byor che//de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs mchog la//bzlas pa 'di ni mchog yin no//bkra shis skyil krung bcas nas ni//sems kyis sangs rgyas la dmigs
29b6(rgyud): nanus//blo dang ldan pa bdag nyid ni//rtag tu kun mkhyen sangs rgyas bsam//gtsug tor la sogs mtshan bzang dang //ldan par bdag gis lus bsams te//sangs rgyas
29b7(rgyud): snying po nang 'dug cing //nga nyid sangs rgyas zhesu paso//sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las byung ba'i//gang gis 'khor lo rnam sprul pa//mngon par byang chub chen po yis//chos rgya
30a1(rgyud): 'khor lo bskor bar bya//gdul bya'i tshogs ni longs spyod pa'i//chos dang longs spyod sprul pa'ang 'grub//gnas ni yongs su gyur pa yis//sems ni kun
30a2(rgyud): bzhi las byung min//bsod nams ye shes rab rdzogs phyir/zla bo grang bar rnam par brtag/zla ba gang ba dri med pa//snying ka ru ni bsgom
30a3(rgyud): par bya//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni//rig pa'i yi ge rnam par sgom//de lta bu yi tshul mchog gis//zla ba phyed na 'grub par 'gyur//mtshams med lnga po
30a4(rgyud): byed pa yang //lo gcig nu ni 'grub pa g+ha/ srid skyo bar mi 'gyur ba'i//de srid rnal 'byor chen pos bzlas//lus nr-i nga lo bar gyur pa na//phyag rgyu bcing ba brnam par bya//
30a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bzlas pa'i//de tshe byang chub mchog bcing bya//yang na chos 'byung zhes pa 'am//shin tu rmad 'byung dpal bo'u'o//de nas rdo rje'i rigs
30a6(rgyud): bzlas pa//phyag na rdo rje rang bdag nyid//byang chub snying pa la gnas bdag/bdag ni phyag na rdo rje bstan//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni//rdo rje'i gzugs ni rnam par
30a7(rgyud): sgom//gsang chen rdo rje'i dbus su ni//rig pa'i yi ge rnam par sgom//de nas pad+ma'i rigs bzlas pa//pad+ma sems dpa' rang bdag nyid//zla ba'i dbus su pad+ma che//pad+ma'i
30b1(rgyud): dbus cu mi dgo rnams//de bzhin rin chen rigs bzlas pa'i//rin chen rgyal po rigs bdag nyid//zla ba'i dbus su rin chen che//rin chen dbus su'ang yi glo rnams//de nas/
30b2(rgyud): las myi rigs bzang po//rnal 'byor don kun sgrub byed la//sangs rgyas snying po rang bdag nyid//rdo rje las su rnam par sgom//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni//rin chen
30b3(rgyud): rnam par sgom//rin chen rje myordo ni//de yi dbus su'ang yi ge rnams//rigs lU yi ni bzlas pa 'di//glasang po'i bzlas pa brjod par bya//de nas gzhan yang bshad
30b4(rgyud): bya ste//bzlas rgyud gsang ba mchog 'dzin pa//de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bzlas pa'i//sangs rgyas bdag nyid bkra shis 'dzin//stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'dir//sang
30b5(rgyud): rgyas gzugs su rnam par sgom//sangs rgyas de yis thugs dbus su//rig pa'i yi ge rnam par sgom//rang gi lus ni bdag med cing //chos dang gang zag stong pa nyid//
30b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas de dag gi gzugs ni//bdag med par ni rnam par bsam//lus ni sangs rgya zhes brjod pas//sangs rgyas de yang yod ma yin//phung po dang ni skye mched khams
30b7(rgyud): chos zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas med//gang zag nyid kyis sangs rgyas med//sangs rgyas med pa yang ma yin no//pha rol phyin drug sa bon te//shes rab sa bon sbyong mdzad pa'i
31a1(rgyud): gnas dang gnas min skal ldan pa//de nyid byang chub bdag med 'dzin//de lta bus ni gsang chen gyis//de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs paHsa na//
31a2(rgyud): bar slob dpon chen po yis//rab tu dga' ba 'grub par 'gyur//de nas rdo rje rigs bzlas pa//rdo rje sems dpa' rang bdag nyid//stong gsum gyi nu 'jig rten 'dir//
31a3(rgyud): rdo rje'i gzugs su rnam par sgom//rdo rje de yi lte dbus su//rig pa'i yi ge rnam par sgrom//dngos ming zhes bya rdo rje de//byang chub 'bras bu gang yin pa'o//gang zhig
31a4(rgyud): zhes su bshad//gang zhig de nyid 'gyur med pa'i//lus kyi de nyid zhes brjod la//gang zhig chos dang chos 'a stong //gzugs la sogs pa'i chos chen po//'byung
31a5(rgyud): ba che sgra 'dzin pa med//lus ni gzugs zhes bya bar brjod//gzugs zhes bya ba yod ma yin//gzugs de yang ni rnam phye la//phra mo'i 'du shes rnam par sgom
31a6(rgyud): tshwa shas su ni rnam phye na//gzugs zhes bya ba yod ma yin//gzugs ni stong pa zhes bshad de//'di ni rdo N+DI zhes byar bston//gzugs sogs chos rnams thams ca
31a7(rgyud): ni//stong pa nyid ni rnam par skam//de lta bu yi rnal 'byor gyis//rab tu dga' de bsgrub par bya//rdo rje rin tshon rigs bdag nyid//stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten
31b1(rgyud): 'dir//stong nyid nan ma par rnam par sgom//de ni nam mkhar rnab 'byor chas//rtog pa dang bcas yi ger bsam//chos kun dngos med zhes bya ba//skyong nyid de bzhin nyid
31b2(rgyud): ces brjod//dngos med ces bya'i gzugs med de//mkha' mtshungs sbyangs rgyas spyod yul lo//gang la gzugs ni yod min pa'i//mig ces bya ba ci yin brjod//mgo //
31b3(rgyud): yang ni gang zhig gi/mig ces bya ba yin par brjod//bdag po rgyal po 'dri gong zhog/'di yi skye ba'ang ji lta bu'i//'byung ba chen po bzhi 'dus las//mig gi dbang po
31b4(rgyud): yang dag byung //megu de la'ang gzugs med la//ci zhig byed de yod pa'ang min//mig ni ji lta ba bzhin du//thams cad gzung dang 'dzin pa spangs//zlas dra'i sbyor ba 'di yis/
31b5(rgyud): ni//chos chen po yi dbang bskur 'gyur//de nas pad+ma'i rigs bzlas pa//pad+ma'i sems dpa'i rang bdag nyid//stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'drir//pad+ma'i gzugs su rnams
31b6(rgyud): par sgom//pad+ma shin tu dag de la//rig pa'i ye shes rnam par sgom//shes rab chen po pad+ma de//chos kyi snying por bsam par bya//pad+ma chu yi sa ma gos shing //'dom gyi
31b7(rgyud): nyes pas gos mi 'gyur//sems can thams cad de bzhin dag/chos ni bzod las ma skyes pa'i//de bzhin gshegs nyid 'ong gang zhig/chos dang chos nyid stong gang /
32a1(rgyud): yin//gzugs sogs chos rnams thams cad kyi//chos nyid dri bzhin nyid du 'dod//de nas las kyi rigs bzlas pa'i//las kyi rnal 'byor rnam par
32a2(rgyud): bsam//sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'khor lo 'di//chos dang longs spyod thob byed yin//gang la chos zhes bya du med//sangs rgyas kyi ni rnam 'phrul snang //e ma'o sangs
32a3(rgyud): rgyas de dag //rang gi las kyang sgrub par mdzad//de lta bu yi rnal 'byor gyis//rdo rje slob dpon dka' thubo che//tshe 'di nyid la dam pa yi//sangs rgyas nyid ni mchog thob
32a4(rgyud): 'gyur//rdo rje'i snying sogs phyag rgya ni//rdo rje rigs la bdag por bshad//rin chen la sogs dbang bskur zhing //dag pa'i mchog ni pad mchog 'dzin//sangs
32a5(rgyud): rgyas sku ni chos chen la//rdo rje rnal 'byor nges bstan bya//byang chub mchog ni kun 'dul ba//'di ni zlas pa dam par 'dod//de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'dzin//phreng ba des
32a6(rgyud): por sten par bya//gang du zla ba bye bo byed//rnam gnyis rnam gsum nyung ba'ang rung //phreng ba sangs rgyas la 'dzub bcas//gung mos rdo rje'i rnal 'byor skyes//srin
32a7(rgyud): lag steng du rin chen skyes//mthe'u chung gis ni pad kha phye//las kyi phreng bas las byed pa//sor mo kun gyi bya bar bshad//rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin pa yi//'di ni
32b1(rgyud): gasnang ba'i bzlas pa che//sangs rgyas rnal 'byor po de tse//rdo rje can l+ya ru rag sha/phyi rol rdor rigs dbang po s+ho//mu tig nor bu'i rnal 'byor can//pad+ma'i snying po'i dring //
32b2(rgyud): bya ni//pad+ma'i rigs rnams kun la bsngags//yang na kun las mchog gyur pa//bau de rtse de srog 'dzin pa//lcags kyi zlas pa nyis 'gyur te//zungs kyi yid ni bzhi 'gyur
32b3(rgyud): ru rAgr-i sha yi bye bye gnyis//mu tig gi rgyur 'gyur ro//dbang po'i stong 'gyur rnal 'byor te//dngul gyi'i bum du 'gyur ba yin//pad+ma'i bye ba brgya 'gyur brjod/
32b4(rgyud): dz+haiM yi grangs mod do//lag pa g.yon gyis phyag rgya cing //g.yas pa phreng ba dang wAr b+h+yo//ji ltar sngar bshad bsre pa sogs//rma dri 'byung chen po'i zlas pa
32b5(rgyud): ci yi phyir na bzlas pa brjod//dge ba la brtson rgyal 'gyur zhing //rlud 'byung rnams kyang mthing 'gyur zhing //byang chub spyod pa rgyal 'gyur zhing //sangs rgyas rol pa
32b6(rgyud): mngon par 'gyur//bzlas pas skyon langs nas ni//phyag rgya dag ni btsong byer bya//sems can+da kun gyi don byi'i phyir//phyogs kun tu ni 'dud pa bshad//byang chub
32b7(rgyud): sems tshul tha byung pa'i//mdo sogs gsang ba bklag par bya//bsod nams tshogs ni bskyed pa'i phyir//sangs rgyas mchod po yang dag bya//de nas zas kyi dus su //
33a1(rgyud): rnam pa kun tu chang bu sbyin//sangs rgyas rAgs pas mngon bsrungs pa//bza' ba dag pa dbul bar bya//sangs rgyas bdag nyid bza' ba dbul//legs par/
33a2(rgyud): bgos nas bzo' ba dbul//snga dro snga mo pa blang bya ste//de nyid nyi phyed dang mtshams su//nyin dang mtshan mo len gsum du//sangs rgyas rdo rje nor bu dang //pad+ma byed pa'i rnal
33a3(rgyud): 'byor gang //rnam pa bzhi po de las sbyor//sangs rgyas chos dang tshigs byang chub//nyin dang mtshan lnga rnam pa drung //rdo rje dril bu tshogs slob dpon//rdo rje cin rnams de bzhin//
33a4(rgyud): drug/zang zing mi 'jigs chos dang ni//byams po nyon zhag kun la brgyad//chos gsum tshangs pa bzhi zhes pa//rnam pa brgyad du bzlas par bya//'di yi chos chen gsum po
33a5(rgyud): la/rtag tu snyoms par 'jug par bya//gsang mchog dkyil 'khor mchog dang ni//de bzhin las kun byed pa'o//gang du sdig par mi 'gyur ba'i//thams cad bza' zhing //
33a6(rgyud): thams cad len//lus nas lhag mar gyur pa spang //de bzhin dri ma thams cad spang //nyin re bzhin ni lan gsum du//khrus gsum bya zhing gsang blang ba//gos kyang lan gsum//
33a7(rgyud): brje bar bya//gtsang gos lan gsum yang ni sbyin//sha dang chang gtsong la sogs pa//dri ngan kha yis sgregs pa dang //'khrig pa 'dod dang bsten pa dang //sems can tshe la dga'
33b1(rgyud): mi bya//brtson zhing las mkhas spyod par ldan//skyon zhing dul la dga' dang gtsang //byang byed cing bla ma khur//dge legs rgyan ni 'chang bar byed//kun rdzob don dam rnam pa gnyis/
33b2(rgyud): slaslob pa'i sdom pa byung bar bya//kha~M ni nang du lta yi chos//sngags dang phyag rgyu rig sngags dang //gzungs dang lU dang bla ma dang //rdo rje la sogs mtshon che bzang //lha yi gnas dang
33b3(rgyud): yang dag ldan//'jigs min g.yo dang sgyu can min//mi brtan pa yi blo can min//mya ngan 'das la dga' ba min//blo ldan 'jig rten 'dir mi dga'//de bzhin pha rol dga' ba min//lus
33b4(rgyud): srog btang snyoms mi bya zhing //slab po las ni 'da' mi bya//skrag ldan nga rgyal ljon pa min//'jig rten bya ba 'dod mi bya//de lta'i ngo mtshar tshul la ni//rnal 'byor pa yis bsgrub par
33b5(rgyud): bya//smra ba spring zhing brjod chen ldan//rnyed pa spang zhing legs rnyed ldan//dpa' zhing rten la bla ma gus//sdig pas 'jigs shing kun tu bsnams//ji nus ji ltar spro bar bya//zla ba'am
33b6(rgyud): yid na lo re 'am//nyin zhag gcig la lan gnyis su//de bzhini bla ma blta bar bya//mtshams med lde po byed pa yang //de lta bu yi tshul gnas shing //phyag rgya rnam pa brgyad bcing
33b7(rgyud): nas//rtag tu 'grub par 'gyur ba yin//brtul zhugs tshangs par rdzogs 'gyur nas//rnal 'byor mkhar 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du//rdo rje 'chang ba slob dpon la//sangs rgyas kun
