34a1(rgyud): /gyis dbang bskur 'gyur//rig pa kun bdag rgyal po ste//dkyil 'khor kun gyi de nyid rig/rnal 'byor cho ga de nyid shes//de bzhin lha yi rigs rnams mthong //sdom pa
34a2(rgyud): byung zhing rnam par mA pas//rig pa'i slob dpon dbang bskur 'gyur//lam rnams chen po byed rgyal po//rig pa ldan zhing de nyid shes//na dang ni gnod pa shes/rgyal po gra pa kun dab byed/na sbyin
34a3(rgyud): ts+tshe bang sa smras//shA pa'i rgyal ngom dag gzug pa//'di ni chos kyi grul gnas//sangs rgya sgra mtshad pa legs me chung byed//byang chub sems papa'i tshigs rgyal po//mchod 'dun tog/
34a4(rgyud): gsang ba 'dzin//'khor lo grang khyer chen por gnas//byang chub sems dpa'i tshul 'dzin pa'i//dam chos bcud kyi rnying po skyes//snying po 'dzin cing dkyil 'khor mchod//dgongs par
34a5(rgyud): nyid tshul shas 'di//theg pa chen po'i tshul don shes//mchod sbyin lhag pa'i mchod dam pa'i//gsang ba yi ni dkyil 'khor bya//rdo rje khro bo ting 'dzin gyis//gang zhig gi ni thog mar du
34a6(rgyud): bkyigs kun nges par 'joms pA ye//gsang sngags drag po brjod par bya//bkra shis sdig pa 'joms byed pa//bzlas brjod sbyini sreg cho ga yang //nga ni rdo rje me ltar 'bar//drag po'i
34a7(rgyud): 'bod dga' ye shes 'dzin/dkyil 'khor mchod pa bya ba na//yo byed yongs su rtag par bye//yang na phyinas byed pa yis//kyi rigs par ni rtag par bya//de pag tshang las sdug sa
34b1(rgyud): zhing //khru drug las ni chung ba min//sgrub pa bcu gnyis zhes bya ste//gzhan yang byed pa bcu gnyis so//gal te de ni rgyal por 'gyur//dpag tshad kyi ni khyon tsam bya//yang na kun nas bzang po
34b2(rgyud): ste/dngos po ni ngag dang yang dag ldan//yid na sgrub pa blon po yin//khru stong yod pa mchog yin no//yang na kun nas bzang ba yi//khru drug pa las chung mi bya//yang na ded dpon yin yang rung //ngos//
34b3(rgyud): bzhi dag dang yang dag ldan//lnga pa las ni chung mi bya//yang na gang zhig gzhan dag gam//sgrub pa po dag yin yang rung //bcu pa las ni chung mi bya//zur bzhi dag dang yang dag ldan//rgya cher//
34b4(rgyud): yang ni mi bya'o//yang ni sgrub bying slob dpon yin//drug pa bas ni chung mi bya//yang na dpa gi tshad dang ldan pa'o//yang na lo byad ldan par bya//gal te sgrub byed de rgyal po//rin chen phye ma rab tu
34b5(rgyud): bya//rin chen btags las legs bya shing //shin tu khyad 'phags yid du 'ong //in+d+ra ni la sngon po che//tshon rtsi sngon po rab tu bya//pad+ma rA ga rA ga tsho//tshon rtsi dmar po yang dag ldan//
34b6(rgyud): tshon rtsi ser po mdog bzang po//dri ma med pa'i 'od zer ldan//tshon rtsi dkar po ldan pa yi//dkar po dag ni shel las bya//bai DUR+Ya dang brtsod mdog ste//tshon rtsi lnga zhes bya bar bshad//gal te
34b7(rgyud): de ni ma 'byor na//rin po che dang bsres pas bya//tshong dpon yang na ded dpon rung //tshon rtsi dag la rab tu bya//yang na gzhan ni 'ga' zhig yin//tshan rtsi gzhan ni dam par sbyar//thal ba
35a1(rgyud): yis kyang dus ci bzhin//'dir ni slob dpon dag gI bya//rin chen phye mar yang dag ldan//yang na yo byad dang ldan pa//grul te sgrub byed de rgyal po//sna tshogs bya ba
35a2(rgyud): tshe de du bya//yang na 'bum dang yang dag ldan//stong las nyung bar mi bya'o//spos drong mar me mchod bstod dang //dri yi bum pa nyid dang ni//de bzhon bum gang gtor mi dang //bum
35a3(rgyud): pa rnams dang mar me dag/tshong dpon yang na ded dpon rung //bcu los nyung bar mi bya'o//gzhan dga' zhig ni 'ongs kyang rung //bca' ba dag ni stong phrag bcu//bcu las nyung bar
35a4(rgyud): mi bya'o//bza' ba dag ni brgya'am stong //bcu las nyung bar mi bya'o//g.yos kyi rnam pa kun dang ni//de bzhin dri rnams thams cad kun//rol mo sgeg dang rtsed mo dang //de bzhin
35a5(rgyud): puphun sum tshogs pa kun//de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis//de tshe mchod pa byas nas su//ci nas sang ni khyed rnams cag/grub par bya phyir brtul zhugs brtsam//rang nyid khrus byas yan lag/
35a6(rgyud): byugs//dag cing gtsang mi'i gos gyon cing //rnam par dben pa'i gnas 'dug ste//sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bya//me tog spos snod lag thob shing //phyogs rnams kun
35a7(rgyud): tu phyag bya'o//sangs rgyas ye shes mchog ldan pa'i//sangs rgyas la sogs kun gshegs shing //gsang ba'i skyon ni 'gugs pa yi//rdo rje phyag rgya bcing bar bya//rdo rje sngags dang
35b1(rgyud): phyag rgya yis//sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bya//de nas gnas ni yang dag sgrub//dben zhing kun tu g.yeng ba med//ri po 'am ni dgon pa'am//de bzhin phug gi nang dag gam//
35b2(rgyud): shing drung gi ni gnas dag gam//chu bo'i 'gram 'am yang na ngogs//dngos grub gnas su 'dug nas ni//lha rnams myur du gshegs par 'gyur//rdo dang gseg ma rus par ldan//thal ba
35b3(rgyud): dz+nyAn ljin mi gtsang bcas//rtsub cing rtsa ba'i khyab la sogs//de 'dra'i sa gzhi rnam par spang //shin tu bzang zhing 'od bzang snum//tshad dang ldan zhing gseg ma med//'dom gang yang na khru gang
35b4(rgyud): ci ma//dkyil 'khor gnas ni skyeng bar bya//grong dang yul 'khor nyid dag dang //grong khyer dag dang ljongs dang ni//rgyal po'i pho brang tshong dus drang //dkyil 'khor chen po bya ba min//de 'dri/
35b5(rgyud): sa bzhi sgrubs nas ni//steng gi tshor ni sgrub par bya//'dom gang yang na khru gang tsam//skas gdang bzhi dang ldan pa ru//sbyangs te de nas gnas kyi ni//dbus su phur pa gzugs par bya//rdo
35b6(rgyud): rje phur bu'i phyag rgya yin//mchod pa'i sa gzhi mdzes par bya//rig pa 'dzin pa byed pas bcag/bgegs bcing ba yi phyag rgya yis//bgeg rnams kun tu bcing bar bya//me dang gau shin//
35b7(rgyud): rjechu dang ni//rlung dang dbang po rdo rje phyogs//rdo rje bzod dka'i phyag rgya dang //rdo rje sngags kyi sbyang bar bya//mchod gnas dpag tshad tshad tsam du//bco lnga nas ni yang dag rtsa mo//gnyis pa 'am ni
36a1(rgyud): /gsum pa yi//nyam ltos par mi 'gyur ro//ci ste 'byor pa med na ni//zla ba cug rtsam rab tu sbyar//lo lnga lngas ni yang dag rtsam//bco lnga la ni rdzogs par bya//ci ste
36a2(rgyud): baphyed tsam du//bco lnga la ni rnam par sbyang //ci ste rings na tshes brgyad nas//bco lnga la ni rdzogs par bya//tshes dgu dang ni bcu dang ni//bcu gsum pa dang bcu bzhi pa//bdun pa lnga//
36a3(rgyud): pa nyid nas ni//nyal nyes par mi 'gyur ro//ci ste nyin zhag de tsam nas//de nyid la ni yongs rdzogs bya//rnal 'byor chen po dag bya'i phyir//rnal 'byor sa gzhi rab tu sgrub//rang nyid khrus/
36a4(rgyud): byas yan lag byug/rnam pa sna tshogs gos bdo zhing //rgyan rnams kun gyis rab tu spras//rdo rje slob dpon rnam par rgyan//gtsang zhing gtsang ma'i gos dang ldan//gtsang ma'i grogs
36a5(rgyud): dang lhan cig tu//sems can kun don yang dag ldan//byang chub sems ni yang dgra bzung //bskal pa brgya phrag stong du yang //ci nas mngon par brtson byas kyang //gang zag bzhi po 'dzi
36a6(rgyud): rten tu//bsgrub kyang 'grub pa nyid mi 'gyur//sems ni bskyod par ma gyur dang //dad med 'grub par mi'i gyur nyid//the tshom 'dzin pa nyid dag dang //bka' bsgo ba ni mi bya'o//dri yi chu yi
36a7(rgyud): legs skus pa'i//de nas dkyil 'khor gnas de ni//dri dang ldan pa'i chu dag gi/phyogs rnams kun tu chag chag btab//ba yi skyibs legs sbyang ste//dri dang bcas pas legs byugs//
36b1(rgyud): tote//de nas gur gum la sogs pa'i//dri dag gtsang mar sbyar bar bya//rdo rje dkyil 'khor phyag rgya ris//dkyil 'khor yang dag byin gyi brlab//rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya yis//pad+ma'i mig
36b2(rgyud): can dag gi blta//dkyil 'khor bar dang tha mu ru//sbyin sreg las ni yang dag rtsam//sbyin srog las ni rnam par sbyar//rig pa'i dngos grub chog la//sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam//
36b3(rgyud): de bzhin sngags dang phyag rgya tshogs//de 'dra'i sngags dang phyag rgya'ang min//sngon la bgegs rnams gzhom par bya//de nas sbyin sreg yang dag brtsam//de 'og gsang ba'i mchod chen gyi/
36b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor kun tu bri bar bya//sbyin sreg rnam pa lnga ru bshad//yang na bcu drug dag du 'gyur//rang rang gau ni tshig bzhi no//sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam//dgongs pa'i gang zhig/
36b5(rgyud): sgrub pa'i phyir//gang zhig mchod po yang dag brtsam//gal te mi nus skal chen gyis//bza' ba dag ni rab tu bya//dri dang bcas po dang sbyar ba'i//yang na dkar gsum za bar bya//'di
36b6(rgyud): ltar rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin//byin gyi rlob pa mdzad par 'gyur//bgag rnams nges 'joms nga yi ni//slob dpon gyi ni las bzang po//bgag rnams zlog par byed pa'i mchog/btsong pa dam
36b7(rgyud): par bya//rtag tu rdo rje khro ba dang //rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag bya zhing //rdo rje ljags kyu'i phyag rgya yis//bgag rnams thams cad dgug par gyi//rdo rje nags pa'i phyag rgya mas//bgeg
37a1(rgyud): //rnams thams cad drang ba bya//rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya yis//gegs rnams thams cad dan+d+ha tu dgu//sdig pa med kyis mi 'jigs shing //sems can rnam par 'tsho ba'ang/
37a2(rgyud): med//rang gi rnam rtog las byung bsreg/mi rig las byed mi dge bzhin//rdo rje lcags sgrog phyag rgya yis//bgegs rnams thams cad bcing bar bya//rdo rjer ba'i phyag rgyu yis//thams
37a3(rgyud): cad rdo rje rang bzhin bya//rdo rje gnod sbyin phyag rgya yis//bgegs rnams thams cad gzir bar bya//rdo rje lu gu rgyud phyag rgya yis//bgegs rnams thams cad bkri bar bya//rdo rje
37a4(rgyud): dpa'i pa'i phyag rgya yis//bgegs rnams thams cad kun tu dbab//rdo rje gdab pa'i phyag rgya yis//bgegs rnams thams cad brdab par bya//rdo rje 'bar ba'i phyag rgya yis//bag
37a5(rgyud): rnams thams cad sbyar bar bya//rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya yos//bgegs rnams thams cad bcad par bya//rdo rje cod pan phyag rgya yis//bgegs rnams thams cad brdung ba
37a6(rgyud): bya//rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya yis//bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig par bya//rdo rje 'phrul 'khyer phyag rgya yis//bge gos rnams thaM btsir bar bya//rdo rje khan+ti phya/
37a7(rgyud): rgyo yis//bgegs rnams thams cad btub par bya//rdo rje mdung thung phyag rgya yis//bgegs rnams thams cad dbug par bya//rdo rje sregs byed phyag rgya yis//bge gas
37b1(rgyud): rnams thams cad bsreg par bya//rdo rje 'khor byed phyag rgya yis//bsregs rnams thams cad bskor bar bya//rdo rje srad bu'i phyag rgya yis//bgegs rnams thams cad bskyod par bya//rdorje 'dug
37b2(rgyud): byed phyag rgya yis//bgegs rnams thams cad rnam par brlag/rdo rje 'joms byed phyag rgya yis//bgogs rnams thams cad gzhom par bya//rdo rje 'jigs byed phyag rgya yis//bgegs rnams/
37b3(rgyud): thams cad 'jig par byed//rdo rje za byed phyag rgya yis//bgegs rnams thams cod bzo' bar bya//rdo rje 'cha' byed phyag rgya yis//bgrogs rnams cad 'tsha' bar bya//rdo rje dral ba'i phyag rgya
37b4(rgyud): yos//bgegs rnams thams cad dril bar bya//rdo rje skyel byed phyag rgya yis//bgegs rnams thams cad skyel bar bya//rdo rje slong ba'i phyag rgya yis//bgegs rnams thams cad bslang bar
37b5(rgyud): bya//rdo rje gsang ba'i phyag rgya yis//bgegs rnams thams cad bas dpar bya//rdo rje 'tsho byed phyag rgya yis//bogogs rnams thams cad 'tshe bar bya//rdo rje sgrub pa'i phyag rgya yis//bgegs
37b6(rgyud): rnams thams cad yang dag sgyung//rdo rje rgyas 'debs phyag rgya yis//gdug pa thams cad rgyas gdab bya//rdo rje rlung gi phyag tu yis//bgegs rnam sa ts+tsha rlud la bskur//rdo rje chu yis phyag rgya
37b7(rgyud): yis//bgegs rnams thams cad tshul g.yeng //rdo rje me ni rab rno bas//bgegs rnams thams cad sreg par bya//rdo rje rgyal byed phyag rgya yi sa//bgegs rnams thams cad rgyal ba
38a1(rgyud): bya//rdorjehU~M mdzad phyag rgya yis//bgegs rnams thams cad sbyin sreg bya//rdo rje bsdu pa'i phyag/rgya yi//bgegs rnams thams cad bzung bar bya//rdo rje mche ba'i phyag
38a2(rgyud): yis//bdebras rnams thams cad sos gdab bya//rdo rje 'big pa'i phyag rgya yis//bgegs rnams bems cad dbug par bya//rdo rje 'jigs byed phyag rgya yis//bgegs rnams
38a3(rgyud): thams cad gzhag par bya//rdo rje bka' bzhin byed pa yis//bkug nas bka' la dgod par bya//rdo rje bsdigs mdzub phyag rgya yis//bge gos rnams thams cad bsdigs par bya//
38a4(rgyud): rdo rje 'ges byang phyag rgya yis//bgegs rnams thams cad dgra par bya//rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag rgya yis//bgegs kyi rigs kun gzhom par bya//rdo rje gnod sbyin bzod dga' dang /
38a5(rgyud): me ltar 'bar ba dang //rdo rje 'jigs byed phyag rgya yis//rdo rje rkang pas snum par bya//bgegs 'jom pa pi phyag rgya //de na steng gi bgegs gzhom bya//mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i mcho
38a6(rgyud): rdo rje chen po'i gsang rgyud las//rdo rje khro bo'i snyoms 'jug bya//brgya dang rtsa bcu lhag pA dang //rdo rje slob dpon bsang ba ni//rgyas pa ru ni yongs su bstan//bgegs la sogs pa
38a7(rgyud): bdug pa kun//chang po bcad phyir 'dus pa yin//dkyi mo 'khor chen po bskur byi'i phyir//sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam//rnam pa brgyad dang rtsa bcu ltag/rdo rje thob dpon gas
38b1(rgyud): ba ni//'di ni gsang ba'i rgyud chen po//rgyud de las ni rab tu bshad//gsang ba'i sbyin sreg tshe gar bcas//gzhan yang dang por rab bshad bya//rnal 'byor chen po gsang ba'i lus//sbyin sreg
38b2(rgyud): las ni rgyun mi nang//las rnams thams cad 'atus pa yi//gsang ba rgyud chen 'di ru ni//sbyin sreg rnam pa nyi shu yis//thams cad bsdus par 'gyur ba yin//zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang //
38b3(rgyud): mngon spyod kyi ni las dang ni//tshe spel ba dang dgug pa dang //nor dang 'bru ni 'phel ba dang //skyong dang srung ba min dang bgegs//sdig pa thams cad rab gzhom dang //bcing dang bsad dang drag/
38b4(rgyud): po dang //chags dang rjes su bcom pa dang //dbang du bya dang gzugs bzeng nyid//'drod dga'i gzugs su snang ba dang //mkha' lnga 'gro dang dngos grub kyi//rdzas ni grub par bya ba la//sgrub
38b5(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor byed pa yi//rdo rje slob dpon gyis de bya//de lta bu yi rnam pa yi//sbyin sreg bzang po nyi shur bshad//ji ltar sbyin sreg cho ga bzhin//sngon du thab khung bya ba yin//gru bzhi la
38b6(rgyud): ni rgyas pa ste//zlum po la ni zhi ba'o//gang zhig 'gug par byed pa yi//rdo rje rnam par yang dag bya//de bzhin pad+ma'i rnam po bzhin//mngon spyod la ni gru gsum ste//sdig pa thams
38b7(rgyud): cad rab gzhom phyir//zlum po rno babs ldan pa yin//rin chen rnam pa rigs rgyas la//tshe 'phel ba dang 'grib pa dang //shin tu dag phyir phyag rgya'i dbyibs//srung le go cha lta bu yin/
39a1(rgyud): /bcing ba la ni 'bas kyis bskor//bsad pa che ba dang ldan pa'o//ci 'did gzungs lnga byung yang rung //mi snang ba la ga Ta dang ldan//phyogs dang mkha' 'bur la d+ha/
39a2(rgyud): //bka' byed phyag rgyu sgrub pa dang //dkyil 'khor ched po sgrub de la//'khor lo'am n+ya gru bzhi'o//rdzas dang sman ni 'grub pa li//thag khyeng bud med yan lag mtshungs//
39a3(rgyud): ni thun mongs dngos grub kyi//dkyil 'khor yang dag bri bar bya//dkyil 'khor 'khor lo ji lta ba//sbyin sreg thag khung de mtshungs 'gyur//r-ig 'dzin dngos grub papang ldan zhing //
39a4(rgyud): thams cad dun tshogs de ltar 'gyur//'khor lo sogs lo cung zad mthar//sbyin sreg thag khung bsgo bar bya///b+hag khung ny+tsidakyil 'khor cho ga thams cad la//thA
39a5(rgyud): khung gang zhig mthong tsam gyis//sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur//thab khrong bstan pa bshad par bya//sngon du thig ni gdab bya zhing //tshon gyis sa phyogs legs par bri//
39a6(rgyud): gru bzhing thig brgyud zhes bya ba//dbus kyi 'khor lo 'byung bar bya//gru bzhi'i cha ni mnyam pa ste//legs par bgos shing leg so bris pa//rta 'bab bzhi dang yang dag ldan/
39a7(rgyud): sgo khyud rnams kyi legs por spras//sgo bzhi dag dang yang dag ldan//sgo ni cha brgyad ldan par bya//dra ba zla ba phyed pas spras//rdo rje sgo khyud rdo rjer ldan//pad+ma'i nags kyi lkugs
39b1(rgyud): ma dang //phreng ba rab tu 'khor ba dang //spyi thugs phyag rgya chen po dang //shar gyi phyogs kyi rnga ru bri//rtse gsum zla ba phyed pa dang //ral gri khyu mchog mdzes rgyal mtshan//'od bcas/
39b2(rgyud): bde ba phyag rgya che//lho yi phyogs su bri bar b+ha//'khor lo drung dang dbyug to dang //rta byas glang po dang ni phag/byig rgya nub tu bri bar bya//midung thung dril bu bu dan dang //rma bye de bzhi/
39b3(rgyud): rwaru skyes dang //khyim bya 'thab mo la phyogs po//byang gi phyogs su bri bar bya//de yi dam tshig 'khor lo la//sangs rgyas phyag rgya yang dag bri//dbus kyi gnas su cod pan te//phyi rol rje
39b4(rgyud): rjenyo bar spras//rdo rje 'bar ba 'bar ba ste//rdo rje shor gyi phyogs cha ru//lho ru nor bu sna tshogs pa//nub tu pad+ma rdo rje'o//byang du rdo rje hU~M mdzad de//gdug pa thams cad 'joms mdzad pa'o//
39b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas rdo rje thabs chen rnams//phyi rol phyag rgya bcu drug tu//thab khung bskas pa gang yin pa//de yi blo de rnam par sgom//me tog shing dang spos sogs kyis//ji bzhin du ni dkyil
39b6(rgyud): 'khor mchod//rang nyid khrus chus yan log byugs//sna tshogs gos dang rgyan ldan pa//rgyan rnams kun gyis rab tu spras//dri dag bzang pos dbang bskur 'gyur//nga ni pad 'dzin rgyal
39b7(rgyud): bo ste//thor tshugs dbus ni de bzhin gshegs//yang ni rdo rje sems dpa' 'am//rdo rje sems dpa' dbang bskur ldan//bud meng sdug dang lhan cig tu//dpung pa dam du bsdams byas
40a1(rgyud): mtshan ma bgreng bar rab gyur na//sbyin srog las ni yang dag brtsam//e ma'o bde ba bde chen po//'dod chags bde ba bla na med//rdo rje sems dpa' 'dod
40a2(rgyud): chags che//'jig rten dbang phyugs pa dag grub mdzad//'dod chags bde ba rjes dran nas//'dod pa'i 'dod chags brtag mi bya//bud med khams ni bkug nas su//'khrig pa
40a3(rgyud): bdun ni spang bar bya//mtshan ma langs par rab gyur nas//dbang po nye bar zhi byas te//'dod chags rjes dran gyur nas ni//sbyin sreg las ni yang dag brtsam//mtshan ma
40a4(rgyud): phyag mtshan zhes brjod do//langs pa lhag par bya ba yin//rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya mtshan//mkhas pas lhag par bcang bar bya//rdo rje can dang byang sems kyi//byang chub sems
40a5(rgyud): ni brtan pa dang //pha rol phyin pa drug gi mtshan//brtse bas rjes chags dngos grub ster//shes rab thabs la dga' ba bstan//rtag tu bsten par bya ba yin//mtshan ma langs
40a6(rgyud): par rob gyur nas//lhag par yang ni bsten par bya//mngon 'dod rig ma sdug gang yin//de la rnal 'byor pas 'o bya//lhag pas phyag rgya cher gyur nas//dpung pa dam du bsdam//
40a7(rgyud): bar bya//rab tu dga' ba mang po gang //de ni rab dga'i sa ru 'dod//gang lo chags par rab brtags po//yang dang yang du dran par bya//rtsi dang byams pas yang dag byugs//khril
40b1(rgyud): snod pa yi gos kyi dga'//tshul khrims brtul zhugs yang dag byugs//byang chub kyi ni sems kyis rgyan//de 'dra'i brtul zhugs ldan pa yi//tshon rtsi chen po ston par bya//gzhan yang
40b2(rgyud): phyi yi yan lag dag/gang phyir rdo rje can gyis 'dzin//sbyin sreg las kyi tshi ga bzhin//shar du kha ltas sbyin sgeg bya//ji skad gzhung las gsungs pa bzhin//rdo rje slob dpon gyis de
40b3(rgyud): byo//zhi lnga sangs rgyas byang chub mchog/rgyas la rdo rje rin chen gyis//rdo rje khro bo mngon spyod la//lcags kyu yis ni 'gugs par bshad//bcud kyi len la rdo rje'i sman//tshe 'phel
40b4(rgyud): de bzhin mi g.yo ba'i//rdo rje sman kyi rgya chen dang //rdo rje rtse mo nor 'phel la//srung la 'kho lo cho ga ste//bzlog pa la ni rdo rje gsung //g.yon pa lcags sgrog phyag rgya ches//
40b5(rgyud): sdig pa gzhom par bya bar bshad//bcing la rdo rje bcing ba ste//gsod la rdo rje gsod byed do//chags la rdo rje chags pa yis//rjes su bstan pa la yang bshad//dbang la rdo rje/
40b6(rgyud): dbang gis so//ci 'dod gzugs la sna tshogs te//mkha' la 'gro ba'i dngos grub la//rdo rje'i dngos grub rnam 'phrul gyis//pad+ma'i sman gyi phyag rgya ches//rjes grub pa yi bde
40b7(rgyud): mchog yin//dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i grub pa la//rdo rje dkyil 'khor phyag rgya yis//rig pa kun bdag rgyal po yi//phyag rgya'i tshogs de yongs su gzung //dngos grub thams
41a1(rgyud): /cad sgrub pa la//pad+ma chen po'i sman mchog gis//lag pa g.yon pas phyag rgya ba cing //g.yas pa yis ni spyan sreg bya//rdo rje sna tshogs phyag rgya yis//skyon/
41a2(rgyud): sreg les lta rgyas gli dbu bya//glu yon pa hUM ldan ba sdigs mdzub ste//g.yas pa mche bo gtsigs pa ste//mngon spyod sbyin phyag rgyu yis//rus pa'i phye mos phyogs rnams
41a3(rgyud): bcing //oM suM b+hani suM b+h+yo hUM/gr-ih+Na gr-ih+NA d+hI/gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya~M hU~M/A na ya ho b+hA ga bAn bid+yA rA d+na hU~M phaT/g.yon pa chos 'chad dang ldan zhing //g.yas pa yis ni
41a4(rgyud): sbyin sreg bya//sangs rgyas chos ni snyoms 'jug pas//til bsregs pas ni sdig pa sreg/oM sadrA pA paM dA ha na badz+rA ya swA hA//lag pa g.yon pa rin chen 'gyur/
41a5(rgyud): gleyas pa yis ni sbyin sreg bya//'bru bdun yang na rin chen nas//yo byed kun gyis mnyes par bya//oM ma Ni r+yAt+na kra mi ka yai swA hA//shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas
41a6(rgyud): ni//mngar bas mo ni rab sbar te//rnal 'byor pas ni 'bras bsregs no//khyim ni nges par rgyas par 'gyur//oM badz+ra puSh+pa ye swA hA/shin tu dngar ba'i bud shing gis//
41a7(rgyud): me ni rab tu spang byas te//ku sha'i myug gu til bcas pas//sbyin sreg byas na srung don mchog/oM badz+ra a pra ti ha ta badz+ra swA hA//yam shing mngar po nyid dang ni//de bzhin
41b1(rgyud): dungur ba'i myu gu dag/mar byugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya yis//bsreg sun tshe 'phel byed pa'i mchog/oM badz+ra A yu She swA hA//bud shing tshad rnams kyi na//rdo rje khro bdag ting 'dzin gyis//
41b2(rgyud): thag khung du ni me sbar te//tsher ma rnams kyi dgug par bya//oM badz+ra A kaR+Sha ye swA hA//de bzhin sna tshogs thams cad kyis//mkhris pa yis ni mi sbarA te//rtag tu chu skyes skyen
41b3(rgyud): sreg byas//rdo rje 'ching bar 'gyur ba yin//oM badz+ra ban d+ha ya baM//de bzhin sbyor ba'i cho ga yis//mkhas pas yam shing bsreg bya zhing //'bras bu kha ba'i sbyin sreg byas//skad
41b4(rgyud): cig gis ni gsod par 'gyur//oM badz+ra mA ra Na ye hUM//de bzhin pa la shong mar po//sregs na dbang du byed par 'gyur//oM badz+ra rA ga na ye hrIHsha pus pas ni sbyin sreg
41b5(rgyud): byas//de bzhin chags par byed pa'i mchog/oM badz+ra shaM kra ra ya swA hA//khros pas 'dod pa'i 'bras bsrogs na//ci 'dod gzugs ni thob par 'gyur//oM badz+ra kA ma ru pa/
41b6(rgyud): NI swA hA//oM badz+ra rA tsi ri nau swA hA//bud shing ro ni kha ba yis//shin tu phros pas me sbar te//khros pas rdo rje me tog bsregs//rdo rje bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur//
41b7(rgyud): hUM badz+ri shaM ka ra ye swA hA/oM b+hU ta shi ka rA ya swA hA/dngos grub kun gyi cho ga bzhin//mkhas pas nyungs kar sbyin sreg bya//yungs kar shin tu bkra shes pas//dngos grub sbyin sreg
42a1(rgyud): mchog yin no//oM sarba sid d+ha ye swA hA//rlig pa 'dzin pa grub bya'i phyir//mkhas pas+ya swasti ka bsreg bya//grub pa'i dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis//sbyin sreg
42a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du//oM sid d+ha sid d+ha ye swAhA/oM dA la a ti pa ta yaM swA hA//maN+Dal ba d+hi pa ta ye swAhA//oM b+hu swA hA//oM b+h+ru~M ba swA hA//oM swe swA hA//oM b+hur b+hA ba swA hA/oM swan+ti
42a3(rgyud): swAhA//oM swasti nA ma swA hA//oM sid d+hi pra b+hU ha yai swA hA//oM sarba duHkha u pa sha ma ne sne hA//oM badz+ra sadri d+ha ye swA hA/oM kAr+ya kar ne pusta shan ti ke swA hA//yi ge phaT ni/
42a4(rgyud): mngon spyad la//yi ge dza yis 'gugs par 'gyur//yi ge ba ni bcing la sbyar//dbang du bya la yi ge shrI//yi ge hU~M ni bsdigs la sbyar//bsad pa la yang yi ge hUM//ha ni
42a5(rgyud): srung ba bzang po la//yi ge hUM ni bzlog pa la//shrIs ni sna tshogs gzugaso bsgrub bya//oM ni mi snang bstan pa la//ho ni chags dang dgug pa la//u ni gsang ba'i dag pa
42a6(rgyud): 'dzin//mngon spyod ldan la yi ge hUM//hUM ni rdzu 'phrul sgrub byed pa//lha mo chen po sgrub la aH//oM ni kun la nges par sbyar//yam shing ser po rgyas pa la//zhi ba la ni dka
42a7(rgyud): po'o//dbang du bya ba dmar po ste//nag po mngon spyod las la'o//zhi la mar gyis byug pa ste//rgyas pa la ni 'o ma bcas//dbang du bya la lan tshwar ldan//tsha ba dang bcas
42b1(rgyud): mngon spyod la//dbye ba rgya chen dag gis ni//sbyin sreg las rnams shes par bya//de nyid sbyin sgeg nyi shu 'di//rdo rje 'chang gis gsang ba yin//den nyi shu bzhi bya ba sbyin sreg gi gsang ba'o//
42b2(rgyud): de nas dngos grub thabs chen po//thams cad 'grub 'dod dkyil 'khor du//sgrub pa'i sbyor ba'i cho ga yis//dngos grub tshegs kyi sbyor ldan zhing //rdo rje yi ni slob dpon che//brtan bcas rig
42b3(rgyud): su yang dag skyes//theg pa chen por yang dag gnas//bskal pa grangs med mthar thug par//chos kyi shing rta che la zhon//shos rab thabs dang yang dag ldan//sems can kun gyi don//
42b4(rgyud): la brtson//sangs rgyas kun gyi yongs su bzung //slob dpon chen po'i tshul la gnas//mchog tu sa yi mthar phyin pa//sangs rgyas kun gyi rigs su skyes//rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che//
42b5(rgyud): bgegs rnams thams cad bsal nas ni//dkyil 'khor gnas su yang dag ldan//sbyin sreg cho ga byas nas kyang //chos sbyin chen po yang dag brtsam//dam chos snying po bcud las byung //
42b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas mchod pa bla med pa//byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul//shes rab thabs kyi tshul thob byed//rgyal chen shes rab chen po dang //thabs kyi rmad 'byung chos nyid do//bram ze
42b7(rgyud): bzhin du rigs mchog skyes//byang chub sems dpa'i gsang chen 'dzin//gal te nus na skal chen gyis//gang tshe mchod brtsom pa nas//ji srid zin par gyur gyi bar//bza' ba dag ni
43a1(rgyud): mi bya'o//dri dang bcas pa'i legs sbyar ba'i//yang na dkar gsum bza' bar bya//gang phyir rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin//byin gyi rlob pa mdzad par 'gyur//ci ste bzod ldan nyin
43a2(rgyud): mtshan du//bza' ba drug ni mi bya ste//gang phyir chos kyi rang bzhin zas//tshim par 'gyur bar the tshom med//dkyil 'khor dag ni dag byas shing //dri rnams kun gyi mngon 'dus byas//
43a3(rgyud): sngags kyi bsang ba'i chu yis ni//thams cang kun nas chag chag gangadab//gang tshe mchod par byed pa na//phyogs rnams kun nas phyag bya zhing //bshags dang gsol ba gdab nyid
43a4(rgyud): dang //mchod pa'i sprin dang rjes yi rang //bdag nyid dbul ba la sogs pa'i//las rnams rim bzhin byas nas ni//dkyil 'khor chen po mnyam dbus su//sems dpa'i skyil/
43a5(rgyud): krung bca' bar bya//dkyil 'khor thams cad bsdus pa yi//skyil krung rnam pa bcu ru bshad//gsang chen de nyid mchog 'di ni//dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod pa'o//dpal dang
43a6(rgyud): bkra shis bsdigs mdzub byed//de bzhin g.yas kyi phyed krung nyid//phyi rol brkyang dang bzhugs pa'o//de bzhin rin rang bzhin te//de dag bcu ru rang bzhin bshad//skyil krung/
43a7(rgyud): brgya dang bcu lhag pa//gosang ba'i rgyud kyi gsang ba yi//rgyud de las ni rab tu bshad//sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas te//sangs rgyas la dmigs sems kyis ni//rgyu dang mi rgyu
43b1(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum//byams pa chen po rjes dran nas//dang po sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin mchog/rnal 'byor pas ni snyoms 'jug bya//de nas dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog/de nas yang ni las rgya
43b2(rgyud): po//ting 'dzin lhag po'i bzang po nas//bcu phrag gcig lha go brgya ru bshad//las thams cad po gsum du brjod//gsong ba'i rgyud las rab tu bshad//ting 'dzin sbyor ba med par ni//
43b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor brtan par mi 'gyur ro//dkyil 'khor sbyor ba med por ni//dngos grub nyid ni 'byung mi 'gyur//de bas rtag tu 'bad pas ni//ting 'dzin dngos grub dkyil 'khor bya//
43b4(rgyud): gal te mchog tu gsang ba ni//bla med theg pa'i gsang 'dod na//ting 'dzin gsum ni yang dag bya//dang po'i rgyud las bshad pa bzhin//de nas yang dag bshad par bya//de nas byang
43b5(rgyud): sems rnam 'phrul du//so so'i skye bas mi nus so//de rnams kyi ni ting 'dzin mchog/sems nyid kyis ni yang dag bya//dang po'i rgyud las bshad pa bzhin//sangs rgyas kyi ni
43b6(rgyud): rnam 'phrul bshad//blo ldan byang sems ting 'dzin gyi//bdag nyid rdzu 'phrul chen por bsam//dka' thub sna tshogs drag po ni//bdag gis byas pa bsam par bya//'og min zhes bya
43b7(rgyud): gnas yin pa//lha yi gnas ni bsam par bya//sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yis//dag pa'i 'dus pa rnam par bsam//dang por sangs rgyas phyag byas nas//de nas thub rnams la
44a1(rgyud): /de bzhin//bka' mnos ji skad bstan pa yi//slar yang skyil krung bca' ba bya//mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga//kun tu dga' byed bsam par bya//mtshan/
44a2(rgyud): nyid thams cad kyis rgyan pa'i//bdag nyid sangs rgyas sku dang ni//sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang skur ba//lnga ni bdag nyid la bsam bya//rdo rje'i gnas su 'dug bya zhing //
44a3(rgyud): rtse mo mngon por bsam par bya//dang por sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to////rdo rje shar du 'dug bya zhing //sangs rgyas 'khor lo rnam par 'phrul//byang chub sem
44a4(rgyud): dpan rnams kyang spro//'khor lo'i dkyil 'a khor rnam par sprul//rgyal po dang bcas rigs dkyil 'khor//sgo srung sgeg mo la sogs dang //lha mo dang bca sa phyag rgya yi//
44a5(rgyud): sbyor bas rdo rje can dbang bskur//rdo rje las su yang dge bya'o//bdag nyid kyis ni mkha' dbyings su//sangs rgyas thams cad mos byas te//sangs rgyas kun gyi ring bzhin
44a6(rgyud): nyid//dbang bskur bar ni yang dang bya//rdo rje chos 'dzin rgyal po ru//dkyil 'khor bkod la brtag par bya//sangs rgyas thams cad dgug bya zhing //rdo rje can rnams/
44a7(rgyud): mchog gzhug bya//bsgrub pa dang ni dbang du bya//bya ba 'di ni mchog yin no//rang gi rigs gang dkyil 'khor du//gnas de lhag par mos par bya//'khor lo ji bzhin
44b1(rgyud): kod pa zhin//phyugar+b+ha sprin dbyung byas pa'o//las kyi mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//rang nying khrus byas yan lag byugs//rgyan dang gos ni sna chags ldan//dpung /
44b2(rgyud): rgyun gdub nyid dang ni//de bzhin song gau byu bu rgan bcas//gser skud mu tig drang ldan pa'i//lag 'i rkang pa de nas skye//lus kuni rnam par rgyun 'gyur gyi/de bzhin
44b3(rgyud): ga pa'o//bsna ga bzung po bags shing gsang //yang na ni sre gas 'dzin paste//sangs rgyas phyag tu rgyal mtshan zhin//gal te hU~M brags dge slong /
44b4(rgyud): de'i khyim mi myong gi m+b+ha byA'i//spyan \u0f7f bAraH//yang nA rlung shinag la sa/bdag da sum srung 'am//yang ni rdo rjelas suk+Sh+ma//rna m+b+hi nga zhin
44b5(rgyud): gas med par//dngos smrab bang pos myi 'gyur//dkyil 'khor dbus sum nyi mA du//ni rlig sa byu ni 'dug nas su//shar dri la ba ltos ldangs nas s+ho//khengs pa
44b6(rgyud): mang cing ma 'khrul byung //rdo rje rnams par yongs su bsgyur//mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni//lan cig tu ni brjid pa bya//stong pa byas nas rang bdag nyid//dngos grub sbyar
44b7(rgyud): yang nga rgya// ni paskyer ba mis//bdig gis drang srong tshul ba //rdo sems dpa' sems pa ni//ngan ming so mug /
45a1(rgyud): //rgyu chu sa smrad da/ mang//'ongs pa 'dzin yo sa rkyen/la kho da //sa na ba 'gyu na/
45a2(rgyud): rnams dang bdag gru ma d-i//rnga m-i ng+ge yang dag du nga //phyogs rnam ste kun tu yang ga pa/dekyil ba rdzogs pa byu //rdo na'aM hrI d+hAs d+ha
45a3(rgyud): d+hi//slang yang skyil makrung bcas te/d+ha ni rang nyid 'khor los bsgyur//phyug rgya'i tshogs ni bting ba la//stong las nyung bar mo bya'o// no rdo rje sems dpa' ni//de nyid byu/
45a4(rgyud): rgyu yongs su gzung //longs nas tshig ni brjod par bya//bdag ni rdo rje se mos dpa' ste//dkyil 'khor chen po rab sgrub pa//rdo rje la sogs kun gshegs shig/
45a5(rgyud): nirgyal po rdo rje 'dzin//rdo rje sems dpar bdag grub mdzod//tshon chen kha sbyar dri ldan pa'i//srad bu lhag pa grims par sgril//rdo rje srad bu phyag rgya ches//dkyil 'khor chen//
45a6(rgyud): ba thig gdab bye//'khor lo dza bzhin bkod ji bzhin//ji bzhin bzhung gi rjes 'brings nas//kyil 'khor 'khor lo ji bzhin bri//rdo rje'i thig ni yongs su gang ba//de nas de yi rang rig
45a7(rgyud): gsang //'khor lo chen po rab tu grub//dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'khor lo ni//go rims bzhin du bshad par bya//gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa//rta babs bzhis ni mdzes byas
45b1(rgyud): bya//thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan//dUr drang phreng bas rnam par rgyun//mtshams kyi cha ni thams cad dang //blo yi sgo khyud mtshams su ni//rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras//
45b2(rgyud): yI dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya//de yi nang gi rim pa ni//'khor lo lta bur bri bar bya//rdo rje phreng bas yongs su bskor//ka ba brgyud kyisku nye bar mdzes//rdo rje ka ba'i 'dun gnas
45b3(rgyud): pA'i//dkyil 'khor lnga yis rnam par rgyan//ji ltar phyi dang rlung gnas pa'o//dkyil 'khor r-i rer rnam par dbye//dkyil 'khorarI g+hi ni dbus nyid du//dkyil 'khor lta bris gang
45b4(rgyud): yin te//ka ba mchog ni brgyad kyis spros//dkyil 'khor bzhi pa yin par bshad//dbus kyi shin tu dbus song nas//chos 'dzin rgyal po chen po ste//rnam par snang mdzad khya
45b5(rgyud): bdag che//sang sa rgyas gzugs ni dgod par bya//sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun tu//dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbus su ni//dam tshig mchog rnams bzhi po yang //go rims
45b6(rgyud): bzhin du yang dag bri//rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che//mdun rgyab du ni gnas pa yini//rdo rje lcags kyi g.yas phyogs su//nub kyi phyogs su bdud 'joms pa//rdo rje legs pa
45b7(rgyud): rgyal po che//chos 'dzin chen po dbang dang ldan//chos 'dzin po ni byed duste//mdun du rdo rje bsnyems tshul lo//de la de yi snying po gos //shin tu rtogs par byed pa'i mchod
46a1(rgyud): sdug bsngal kun las rA grol byung //byang chub sems ni rab skul du//hU~Mdz+dzaHhos//shar phyogs ma y-i kyil 'khor du//rdo shugs kyi stong nas nA~M//
46a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor de yi dbus de ru/mi bskyod pa ni dgod par bya//rdo rje shugs kyi snying po ni//the tshom gcod pa sngon 'gro can//tshogs sngon 'gro ba bzang po ste//sdig pa
46a3(rgyud): thams cad rab 'joms byed//oM be g+h+ra kr-i ma ho//sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba che//thub pa skyes mchog myi spyod pa//glang po phyag rgya la gnas shing //zhi ba'i phyag rgyu
46a4(rgyud): yongs su 'dzin//de la snying po 'di yin te//hUM/de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du//rdo rje mchog rnams dgod po ni//rgyun rnams thams cad kyis spras shing //lo khros
46a5(rgyud): bcas bzhin ni 'dzum ldan pa'i//rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che//rdo rje lcags kyang bstan pa che//rdo rje 'dod chags bdud chen po//rdo rje legs pa rdzu 'phrul che//rdo rje
46a6(rgyud): rin chen dgod par bya//rdo rje chags pa gang bshad pa//rdo rje chos ni dgod par bya//rdo rje legs par gang bshad pa//rdo rje las ni yongs su bzung //dam tshig rnam pa bzhi
46a7(rgyud): po ni//'khor los bsgyur ba dgod par bya//thams cad sangs rgyas cod pan ldan//'khor los sgyur bar dbang bskur ba//rdo rje rin chen de bzhin las//pad+ma sna tshogs
46b1(rgyud): dga' chen po//bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad kyis//byang chub mchog de yang drug bzung //yan ldag 'gyur ba lhag ma rnams//rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs dgod//de nas
46b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas rigs bzhag ste//rdo rje'i rigs kyi snying po lo//phyag rgya dang ni snying po bshad//rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su gzung //hUM dza ho sa?//yi ge dza sogs bshad pa la//yi ga
46b3(rgyud): oM ni yang dag dgod//ha~M d+hI chos dbyings yaM go a//yi ges ni yongs su spyad//rdo rje shugs kyis lhor song nas//rin chen 'drung ldan dkyil 'khor lo//bcom ldan mtshag
46b4(rgyud): ni yongs su 'dzin//de yi phyogs rnams thams cad ngu//rdo rje rin chen la sogs bri//rin chen gzi brjid rgyal mtshan dang //rin chen so yi rgyun bcas pa//de la de
46b5(rgyud): rnams kyi snying bya na/oM At+paH/nub kyi phyogs kyi la bor du//rdong shugs kyis song nas su//de y-i dngos su rdo rje chos//'o dag med ni dkod par bya'o//
46b6(rgyud): nAMh+ni de yi phyogs rnams thams dra//rdo dzI pad+ma la sogs bri/pad+ma rnon po de bzhin //sgrib pad+ma phyag rgya bcus//de la 'ang rnams kyi skyeng
46b7(rgyud): ni/hrI d+hi ma~M ro/rdo rje shugs kyi sang nas ni//byang gi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni//bcom ldan 'das ni don mo dgrub/sangs rgyas nyid ni dgod par bya//de yi stong po
47a1(rgyud): ni//de yi phyogs rnams rnams cad du//rdo rje las la sogs pa b+h+rUM//rnam su na srung ba gnod sbyin che//las dang khu tshur shin tu brgyan//de la 'drirnams d+d+hi
47a2(rgyud): bo ni/kaM haM hUM baM/dbus kyi 'khor lho'i grwa bzhi ru//lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri//rdo rje rin chen de bzhin las//pad+ma lha mo bzhi ru bshad//de la de rnams kyi snying po na/
47a3(rgyud): oM a hrI a~M/thams cad kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor chen po las cha dang po'i dkyil 'khor dbus ma rdzogs so////dkyil 'khor dbus ma rdzogs nas ni//phyag rgya
47a4(rgyud): thams cad yongs su bri//phyag rgya de ni byin rlab pa//rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su gzung //byang chub mchog tu dbus nas mchog/shis pa shar gyi phyag rgya ste//lho yi phyogs
47a5(rgyud): su mchog sbyin no//nub tu chos kyi 'khor lo 'dzin//byang du mi 'jigs sbyin zhes bya//don yod grub pas yongs su gzung //phyag rgya lhag ma phyag mtshan bcas//de nas
47a6(rgyud): rdorje sems tshogs bri//dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyalnga po dkyil 'khor chen po las rdo rje 'khor lo chen po'i dbus kyi cha zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho//rdo rje shugs kyi song
47a7(rgyud): nas su//shar phyogs kyi ni dkyil 'khor la//rdo rje rigs chen nyams dga' ba'i//dkyil 'khor lngani yang dag bri/ka ba brgyad ni rdo rje che//dkyil 'khor lnga yis
47b1(rgyud): rnam par brgyan//dkyil 'khor ba ni dang ldan pa yi//rdo rje'i la mang ma yongs su dgod//de mi shar gyi dbus su ni//sangs rgyas gzugs can yang dag bri//ud pa la sngon po 'ong chen ldan//la
47b2(rgyud): brnyes bzhin ni 'dzum ldan pa'i//drag po 'bar de'i phreng bas khyab//rdo rje ti rin ti ri 'dzin//khro bo rdo rje'i lta ba 'dzin//gtum pa thams cad rab 'dul byed//sangs rgyas mdun du
47b3(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin//'bar ba'i dbus su dgod par bya//de bzhin 'bar dbus pad+ma dang //de bzhin rin chen sna tshogs mtshan//de nyid shar gyi 'khor lo che//shar gyi cha ru song nas ni//
47b4(rgyud): yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni//rdo rje hUM mdzad yang dag bri//zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa//phyag rgya brgyad ni yongs su 'dzin//mche bA dag ni cung zad gcig//khro bcas bzhin ni 'dzum
47b5(rgyud): ldan pa'i//lcags kyu rdo rje lcag sgrog dang //zhags pa phyag rgya bzhi ru bshad//mda' dang gzhu ni gnyis su 'dzin//gnyis ni yi ge hUM gis bsdus//des ni rkang pa g.yon pa yis//
47b6(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po mnan par bya//g.yas pas lha mo u na yi//nu ma'i bar du mnan pa ste//g.yon kyang pi yis legs par gnas//'bor ba'i phreng bas khyab 'od ldan//sku mdog sngon po/
47b7(rgyud): drag pa ste//sangs rgyas thams cad 'jigs byed pa//de'i phyogs rnams thams cad du//rdo rje khro ba dgod par bya//thams cad khro ba'i 'bar bas khyab//mche ba dag ni cung zad gtsigs//
48a1(rgyud): /khro ba sems dpa' khro rdo rje//de bzhin khro bo chags pa ste//khro bo legs pa drag pa ste//dbus kyi dkyil 'khor bskor bar bya//rdo rje shugs kyi song nas ni//khro bo'i rgyal/
48a2(rgyud): po g.yas phyogs su//khro bo'i bdag nyid chen pos bskor//dbus su khro bo khro gnyer can//de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du//khro bo rdo rje'i dbang bskur ldan//thams cad bri zhing
48a3(rgyud): yang dag dgod//khro gnyar can gyi dkyil 'khor mchog/de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du//rin chen khro bo dgod par bya//khro gnyer nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dang //khro bo bzhang
48a4(rgyud): pa shin tu byung //dkyil 'khor dam pa gsum pa ru//rdo rje shugs kyi song nas ni//khro bo'i bdag nyid chen por bskor//rdo rje'i sde ni yang dag bri//de yi phyogs rnams thams cad
48a5(rgyud): du//pad+ma'i khro bo dgod par bya//chos dang rnon po de bzhin rgyu//bzhad pa khro bo rdzu 'phrul che//rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni//las kyi rigs mchog chen po la//las kyi rgyal po
48a6(rgyud): bdag nyid che//rdo rje dbab po yang dag bri//de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du//las kyi khro bo la sogs bri//las kyi gnod sbyin srin po dang //bsdu ba'i rdzu 'phrul khu tshur che//
48a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor lnga po kun tu bri//de ni rdo rje'i rigs su bshad//dkyil 'khor chen po che zhes bya//gsang ba de nyid tshogs kyi bdag/de nas kun gyi snying po ni//rdo rje rigs kun nyams
48b1(rgyud): dga' ba'i//yi ge hUM ni 'dir brjod do//drag po ha ha zhes sgrogs hUM//hUM hUM zhes sgrog 'jig par byed//de yi dkyil 'khor rgyal po ni//rdo rje gsang ba legs 'dus bya//'khor la
48b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor grwa rnams su//lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri//khro bo'i sems ma rin chen dang //pad+ma dang ni las zhes bya//kun nas mtshams rnams dag tu ni//phyag rgya dam bcas de dag
48b3(rgyud): bzung //dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po las cha gnyis pa rdzogs so////shar phyogs kyi cha'i dkyil 'khor yang rdzogs so////dbus kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yi//
48b4(rgyud): ka dra'i phyi rol dkyil 'khor du//sgeg mo phreng ba de bzhin klu//gar ma lha mo phyag rgya bcas//shar gyi rdo rje rigs nyid la//phyi rol gnas su de bzhin nyid//nyi ma la skyed bzhi po ni//rdo rje
48b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor sbyor 'byung ba//yi ge hUM ni kun tu dgod//de bzhin sangs rgyas rigs rgyal po//yi ge hUM ni 'dir brjod do//phyag rgya rang gi yan lag 'gyur//rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su
48b6(rgyud): gzung //phyag rgya thams cad rab sbyor bas//de dag gsang zhing mchog gsang bshad//dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po mchog tu gsang ba zhizhes bya ba las rdo rje rigs
48b7(rgyud): chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs so////lho yi rin chen dkyil 'khor du//rdo rje shugs kyi song nas kyang //de na phan tshogs dkyil 'khor gyi//'khor lo lnga po dgod par bya//de yi dkyil
49a1(rgyud): /'a 'khar lo la//sangs rgyas gzugs ni dbod par bya//rin chen chen po rtol bache bsdu//sangs rgyas nyi ma de bzhin gshegs//'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab
49a2(rgyud): pa'i sku//'od zer phreng bas kun tu khyab//rIn rjen phreng ba mchog 'dzin pa'i//rgyan rnams thams cad kyis brgyun pa//so yi phreng ba rab bzhad cing //so yi phreng ba'i phyag rgyar
49a3(rgyud): ldan//mthe bo'i rtse mo rgyal mtshon 'dzin//nyi ma'i dbus na sangs rgyas che//zla bI lta bu'i bdud rtsi'i sku//rdo rje nyi ma'i rigs mchog go//de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/
49a4(rgyud): rin chen sems dpa' yang dag ldan//rin chen sems dpa' pad+mo dang //de bzhin rdo rje las nyid do//rgyun rnams thams cad kyis smras pa//'kho los bsgyur bsna rnam
49a5(rgyud): du rgyan//rin chen chen po ribs las 'byung //nor bu'i rdo rje nyi ma 'dzin//de nas snying po na tAM//lho yi shar gyi dkyil 'khor du//rdo rje shugs kyi song nas ni//
49a6(rgyud): de yi dbus su sems dpa' che//nor bu'i 'od can yang dag bri//rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spros pa//sangs rgyas rdo rje'i dbang bskur ldan//de yi phyogs rnams tham
49a7(rgyud): cad du//rin chen de bzhin yang dag bri//rin chen sems pa de bzhin chags//rgyal po legs pa rdzu 'phrul che//rdo rje rin chen sogs phyag rgya//rong gi phyag rgya
49b1(rgyud): phyogasacan phrag//rdo rje shugs kyis sang nas kyang //b+ho yi gnas kyi steng 'dug nas//rin chen rigs chen bzang po la//rdo rje rin chen bzang ba bri//rin chen dazhi yi dbang bsdu/
49b2(rgyud): doden//sangs rgyas spyi bo 'dzin pa'i mchod//rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras pa//rin chen phreng ba'i dbang bskur ldan//de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du//sems dpa'
49b3(rgyud): bzhi ni yang drag bri//rin chen rgyal po rgyal mtshon dang //bzhad dang rlon chen rgyal po che//rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang //nub kyi rdo rje dkyil 'khor la//pad+ma rin chen bdag
49b4(rgyud): nyid che//rin chen phreng bas dbang bskur 'di//rin chen pad+ma'i mchog 'dzin pa//sangs rgyas dbu rgyan sems dpa' che//rin chen zhi ba yongs su 'dzin//zur mig 'dod
49b5(rgyud): chags chags pa'i spyan//skyes bu 'dul ba la gzigs pa//pad+ma 'dzin pa'i rgyal po che//'jig rten dbang phyug tshe dpag med//de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du//rin chen
49b6(rgyud): pad+ma yang drag bri//rin chen pad+ma de bzhin no//de bzhin rgyu dang spyi ba 'dzin//rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang //byang gi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor la//rin chen las chen
49b7(rgyud): rgyal po ni//bdag nyid chen pos yang dag bri//bcom ldan thub pa'i dang po don yang grub//las kun 'dzin pas sangs rgyas rnams 'phrul ba'i//rdo rje las te rgyal po ma
50a1(rgyud): /'dzin pa//'khor los sgyur ba'i gtso bo mchog dam pa//sangs rgyas dbu rgyan las rnams bzhi dang ldan//rgyan rnams kun gyis yan lag legs/
50a2(rgyud): par brgyan//las kyi rin chen dam pas rgyas gdab cing //rin chen dkyil 'khor tshogs chen mchog gyur pa'i//de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du//las kyi rin chen
50a3(rgyud): yang dag bri//las kyi srin po gnod sbyin dang //de yi bsdu ba'i khu tshur 'dzin//de nas kun gyi snying po ni//trAM/rin chen rigs chen rnal 'byor pa//yi ge trAM ni brjod par
50a4(rgyud): bya//ci rigs par ni rang nyid kyi//phyag rgya phyag mtshan yang dag byi//dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po las rgung pa gsum pa rdzogs so//
50a5(rgyud): /lho phyogs cha'i dkyil 'khor yang rdzogaso////de nyid kyi nau grwa bzhi ru/lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri/phyi yi dkyil 'khor mdun gnasu//lha mo bdi ni spu dag gi/sems ma'i rin chen de bzhin chos//lA ma
50a6(rgyud): 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du//sgeg mo phreng ba de bzhin glu//gar mA rnam par sgeg mo yi//nor bu rigs chen bzang po ni//rin chen phyag rgyas kun khyab la//phyag mchog/
50a7(rgyud): rang gi phyag rgyas mtshon//'od zer phreng bas khyab 'od ldan//rin chen rdo rje dbang bskur ba//rang rang phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin//rin chen mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs
50b1(rgyud): rin chen las byung rin chen ldan//rin chen rang bzhin khang par gnas//spos dang rin chen me tog bcas//rin chen mchog chen la gnas shing //lus la rin chen gos
50b2(rgyud): gyon pa//dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po gsang ba mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las nor bu'i rigs chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs so///
50b3(rgyud): rdo rje shugs kyi song nus kyang //nub kyi pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor la//pad+ma'i rigs chen bzang po ni//dga' ba chen pos yang dag bri//de yi nub kyi dkyil 'khor lnga/
50b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor lnga ni yang dag bri//dbus kyi lte ba'i 'khor lo la//sangs rgyas gzugs ni dgod par bya//pad+ma bzang po mdab ma brgyad//mdab ma brgyad pa yid 'ong
50b5(rgyud): ba//chos dbyings brtan pa'i rnal 'byor can//pad+ma'i phreng bas rnam par mdzes//de yi dbus su rgyal po che//sna tshogs gzugs can rang bzhin mchog/sangs
50b6(rgyud): rgyas shes ra thabs ldan pa//chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su 'dzin//pad+ma cig po de gnas shing //de yi dkyil 'khyil rten pa//pad+ma'i sems dpa' bzhi po bri//'khor
50b7(rgyud): los sgyur ba 'jigs pa med//rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras pa//sangs rgyas pad+ma dbang bskur ldan//rdo rje pad+ma la sogs bri//pad+ma'i sems dpa' 'jigs pa med//kun
51a1(rgyud): na gyu// natshun rdzu/sgyu rgyas phrus dus ma na//
51a2(rgyud): sems dang de bzhin rgyal//rin chen ches ni tshul chen po//dam tshig mchog rnams bzhi po ni//rim pa bzhin du yang dag bri//nub kyi shar gyi dkyil 'khor du
51a3(rgyud): rdo rje shugs kyi song nas kyang //de yi dbus su rgyal po che//sna tshogs 'khor lo dgod par bya//chos kyi snying po rab tu gnas//pad+ma mdab ma brgyad la ste//pad+ma'i gi
51a4(rgyud): sar dbus su ni//sna tshogs gshugs can dgod par bya//rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras pa//gshugs bzang ldan pa'i sku mnga' ba//sangs rgyas lnga yi dbang
51a5(rgyud): skur ldan//spyan gsum phyag ni brgyad pa ste//thor tshugs tshangs pa dpral bar dbang //me tog mtshon tshwa smin mtshams su//mig la nyi ma zla ba dgod//tha kar
51a6(rgyud): gzhon nu rna ba lo//khyab 'jug sna yi rtse mo ste//mche ba nag po gsus po che//lce la dbyangs can ma yin te//gsung dbyang la ni dbyang chen ma//ku mu da dang pad
51a7(rgyud): phreng can//kha dang 'gram pa dag la gnas//spyan la shes rab pha rol phyin//gdong gi phyed ni sprul par byed//phrag pa g.yos par seng ge ste//g.yon pa phrag ni
51b1(rgyud): yang dag gnas//sna yi bu gu gnyis pa ni//rgya mtsho nye bar gdung ba dag/dga' bo nye dga' dpung pa la//lto ba la ni rgya mtshog nas//brla gnyis pa la dpung chen gnas//
51b2(rgyud): tshogs kyi dbang phyug dpung pa la//lha chen dbang phyug chen po ni//mtshan ma'i steng gi sgo na gnas//dpal be'u snying ka la gnas te//lhag pa lha mo chen mo dpal//'og gi/
51b3(rgyud): kha yi sgo ru ni//gshin rje'i rgyalnga po rnam par rten//rdzong dang 'jigs byed lha mo che//dbus mo la ni yang dag gnas//rkang pa'i sor mo bcu la ni//ma me bcu ni kun tu
51b4(rgyud): gnas//drag po rje rang gnas pa nyid//chu yi lha mo rgyab na gnas//dpyid dang sos ka dbyar dang ni//ston dang dgun dang dgun smad la//g.yas pa dang ni g.yon pa yi//
51b5(rgyud): rkang pa dag la yang ngag gnas//'og gi 'khor lo rtsibs stong la//drag po'i phung po 'chang ba dang //sgra can thag bzangs ra sI snang byed//lha ma yin rnams kun tu gnas//
51b6(rgyud): lag pa bcu yi thal mo la//pha rol phyin pa bcu dag gnas//mngon par 'dod pa nyid dag gi/lha chen la sogs 'di dag bri//zhal bzhi phyag ni brgyad pa ste//zhal re
51b7(rgyud): zhing na spyan gsum pa'i//gos dang gzugs ni bzang por ldan//de 'dra'i rang bzhin thub pa dgod//de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du//pad+ma'i sems dpa' yang dag bri//
52a1(rgyud): pad+ma ri sems dpa' lcags kyu dang //mda' dang pad+ma legs par sbyin//nub kyi lha mo'i phyogs mchog tu//pad+ma'i shugs kyi song nas kyang //de la
52a2(rgyud): dbus sems dpa' che//rin chen pad+ma yang dag bri//zhal ni bcu gnyis ldan pa nyid//phyag bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i mchog/rin chen pad+mar yang dag bzhugs//rin chen
52a3(rgyud): las ni 'byung bar 'dod//de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du//pad+ma'i rin chen drag sogs bri//khro gnyer nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dang //de bzhin zhal ni bcu gcig pa//
52a4(rgyud): nub kyi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du//rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang //de yi dbus su sems dpa' che//'od dpag meng ni dgod par bya//pad+ma chen po rab ster ba//pad+ma/
52a5(rgyud): brar gyi dbang phyug gtso//spyan dang phyag ni stong par ldan//phyag rgya mtshon cha thams cad bcang //zhal bcu gnyis pa bzang po ste//pad+ma'i lha mo yang dag ldan//pha rol
52a6(rgyud): byin pa bcu dang ldan//tshogs kyi dbus na rnam par rol//de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du//pad+ma'i sems dpa' yang dag bri//sgrol mi gzhon nu'i mthu can dang /
52a7(rgyud): makren sngon tshangs pa'i mdog las byung //nub kyi byang gi cha ru ni//rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang //de yi dbus su sems dpa'i tshe//pad+ma la sogs dgod par bya
52b1(rgyud): zhal drug phyag ni bcu gnyis pa'i//byug r+b+ha mtshon cha 'dzin pa'i mchog/rnon po sna tshogs rab ster bya//pad+ma las ni yang dag bri//de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du//
52b2(rgyud): pad+ma ga gyi dbang phyug rgyal//dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun gnas pa//pad+ma'i srin po gnod sbyin dang //pad+ma'i khu tshur yang dag bri//g.yas dang blo yon dang rgyu ba dang ni//mdun nyi/
52b3(rgyud): kyi ni dkyil 'khor ro//de nas snying po ni he/sangs rgyas kyi snying po hA ste//thams cad stong po yin no//dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rtul po dkyil 'khor chen po gsang zhing mcho
52b4(rgyud): tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las rgud pa bzhi pa rdzogs so////pad+ma'i rigs kyi tshogs dag gi/dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs nas ni//de yi 'khor lo grwa bzhi ru//lha mo
52b5(rgyud): bzhi ni yang dag bri//pad+ma'i sems dpa'i rin chen dang //las dang chos ma yang dag bri//sgeg mo phreng ba de bzhin glu//gar mA 'di ni yang dag bri//dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi
52b6(rgyud): rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen chen po las pad+ma'i rigs chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs so////byang gi las kyi dkyil 'khor du//rdo rje shugs kyi song nas kyang //de yi dkyil 'khor
52b7(rgyud): rgyal po ni//'khor lo lnga lnga dgod par bya//de yi dbus su los chen po//sangs rgyas gzugs ni dgod par bya//chos 'dzin pa yi rgyal po che//nam mkha' lding gi gdan
53a1(rgyud): /la bzhugs//de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du//las kyi phyag rgya yang dag bri//las kyi sems dpa' rin chen dang //de bzhin las dang ches nyid do///
53a2(rgyud): rdo rje shugs kyi song nas ni//byang gi shor gyi dkyil 'khor la//mi bskyod pa ni skyengs rgyas che//rdo rje las ni dgod par bya//de yi mchod pa mtshon cha bcas//de yi
53a3(rgyud): phyag rgya bcas pa bzung //las chen 'dzin pa bzang po ste//rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang //de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du//las kyi sems dpa' yang dag bri//
53a4(rgyud): sems dpa' chags pa'i rgyal po che//legs pa de bzhin las nyid do//rdo rje shugs kyi song nas kyang //byang gi lho yi cha ru ni//rin chen ting 'dzin rgyal po che//rin
53a5(rgyud): chen las ni yang dag bri//rin chen char ni rab 'bebs shing //sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu 'joms//de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du//rin chen las ni
53a6(rgyud): yang dag bri//sems dpa'i gzi brjid rgyal mtshan dang //las dang bzhad pa rnam sbyong ba//las kyi rin chen bzang po la//rin chen dkyil 'khar yang dag ldan//rdo rje/
53a7(rgyud): shugs kyi song nas kyang //byang gi nub kyi cha ru ni//pad+ma'i las kyi sems dpa' tshe//dkyil 'khor dbus su yang dag bri//de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du//pad+ma
53b1(rgyud): las ni yang dag blo//bad+hAdon pa de zhon d+ha//do shon smra ba las yin no//rdo rngo shugs kyi song nas kyang //byang gi byang phyogs snre la ba la//las chen 'dzin pa dang dz+nyAn
53b2(rgyud): pa//lus kyi rgyal po yang dag bri//de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du//las kyi sems dpa' dgod par bya//lus kyi srin po gnod sbyin dang //de bzhin bdu ba'i
53b3(rgyud): khru tshur nyid//de nas snying ze na yaM//sangs rgyas kyi snying po ni a ste//thams cad kyi snying po yin no//dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po 'khor lo'i dkyil la phyir
53b4(rgyud): chen po gsang ba zhes bya ba las rnyeng ba lnga ba rdzogs so///byang gi cha'i dkyil la dzer 'a rdzogs so///byang du ji ltar rigs byas te//las kyi dkyil 'khor
53b5(rgyud): rdzogs nas ni//dri yo'i khor lo ga bzhi du//lha mo bzhi ni dgod par bya//sngar gyi dam tshig bzhi po ni//thams cad sum cu rtsa gsum yin//dbus ma zhes bya gsum cu
53b6(rgyud): gsum//shar gyi phyogs na sum cu gsum//de bzhin nub kyi phyogs chu'o//byang dang lho yang de bzhin no//dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen
53b7(rgyud): baM gsang /zhing mchog tu gsang ba las las kyi rigs nas bya ba rdzogs so////dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo thams cad kyang rdzogs so///brgya drug tuHldan
54a1(rgyud): 8/don sa pa la 'khor 'khor la mchog/thar pa'i rang bzhin grong khyer che//'khor lo chen po'i n+d+he ba'i ru//dkyil 'khor bzhin nye bar bya//'khor lo sbyor chen
54a2(rgyud): shar lho ru//zla ba'i gzugs su dgod par bya//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni//rdo rje sems dpa' dgod par bya//'dzum zhing zla ba'i mdog can te//'od zer dmar po sna
54a3(rgyud): tshogs 'bar//sems dpa'i sgrol krung yang dag bzhugs//rdo rje bsnyems tshul 'chang ba'i mchog/phyag g.yas pa na rdo rje bsnams//de bzhin g.yon na dril bu bsnams//
54a4(rgyud): mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems dpa' tshe//sems can kun gyi don sems pa//de yi pad+ma yang dag gnas//de 'od dkyil 'khor la brten pa//lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri//gsang
54a5(rgyud): ba lnga ni yang dag bstan//dang po dang ni gnyis pa ni//g.yas kyi phyogs na yang dag gnas//gsum pa dang ni bzhi pa ni//g.yon logs na ni rab tu gnas//lha mo rdo rje cartsa
54a6(rgyud): sgrogs//dbus ma khyud rang gi lha mo de//de yi glo na mgo bsgyur zhing //'dzum bcas kun tu lta ba ste//bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag la 'jus//chu srin gyi ni rgyal mtshan sbrang //
54a7(rgyud): de yi glon bzhad bcab shing //rdeg byed skye dgu'i bdag mo yi//rdo rje ca co'i sgra sgrogs dang //de bzhin rdo rje don yod dga'//lha mo rdo rje 'dod dbang phyug/gzi brjid dag
54b1(rgyud): ba'i rdo rje ma//lho dang nub kyi mtshams su ni//rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang //de yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni//pad+ma chen po dgod par bya//pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su
54b2(rgyud): ni//pad+ma'i sems dpa' dgod par bya//zhal bzhi phyag ni brgyad pa ste//'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor 'od bcas pi//de yi pad+mar yang dag gnas//de 'od dkyil
54b3(rgyud): 'khor la brtan pa//pad+ma'i rigs can las byung ba//lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri//kun nas gsang ba'i lha mo yi//de nas ming ni rab bshad bya//rnga rje dpal dang rdo rje dkar
54b4(rgyud): rdorje sgron ma rdo rje can//rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang //nub byang mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor du//nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni//rdo rje nyi ma yang dag ldan//
54b5(rgyud): nyi mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni//rin chen sems dpa' dgod par bya//sngon mar gyi ni 'od kyis khyab//rgyan rnams thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i//de yi pad+ma yang
54b6(rgyud): dag gnas//de 'od dkyil 'khor la brtan pa//rin chen rigs tshan las byung ba'i//lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri//nam mkha' las byung mkha' rdo rje//na mkha'i
54b7(rgyud): mdog can skye dgu'i bdag/rin chen dpal ldan lha mo che//rin chen dang bcas rigs mdzes ma//rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang //byang shar mtshams kyi 'khor lo
55a1(rgyud): sa//da nan ud pal stan pa'i mdag//dkyil 'khor yang dag bri bar \u0f7f//ung nga la skyon po drang ngas su//las rnams 'dzin pa chen po'i mchog/
55a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun la 'ogs bshad pa//rdo rje'i las ni dkod par d+ha//de yi pad+mar yang ngo //gnas//de'i dkyil 'kho rol brtan cing //las kyi rigs can las
55a3(rgyud): byung ba'o//lha mo bzhini yang dag bri//las kyi rdo rje rin chen mo//l-Isi ma chos ma dpal ldan che//ji ltar sngon du rdo rje'i rigs//de bzhin dkyil 'khyer thams
55a4(rgyud): /de nyid pheM nya mo ru gnas//de nyid lha mor yang dag gnas//de nyid sgeg mo rnam sgeg sogs//phyag rgya'i rgya mtsho gzhan yang byed//ser mo dmar po nyim mtshungs
55a5(rgyud): ud pal sngon po'i ming ba 'drar 'gyur//bsnyams bcas zhi ba'i dbang bskur ldan//rang gi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin//de nas snying po ni hU~M d+hI A~M A/dkyil lo kha
55a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po gsang zhing mchog tu gsung ba zhes bya ba las rkang pa drug pad+h+r-igs so////mtshams rnams kyi dekyib 'khor yang
55a7(rgyud): rdzogs so///brgya dang brkyang nuH lngar ldan//'khor lo yongs su rdzogs nas kyang //de yi mtshams kyi logs rnams su//lta ba ni dag ni yang dag //
55b1(rgyud): kung du na nas 'ang ga// gas can ma sa / spyo ba dang ldan /rnam na na gdug/ du
55b2(rgyud): chen chu sprin rnams//rin chen rigs chen mdzan ma ste//sangs rgyas chos kyi 'byung gnas brjod//nub tu sa lha bri bAr byA//rdul ldan skyes bu zhes bya//dkyil
55b3(rgyud): 'khor chen po 'dzin byed cing //pad+ma'i rigs kyi mtshan ma'ang yin//byang du rung bri skyes bu ni//rlung gi shugs kyis gos 'chang zhing //de bzhin las kyi rigs 'dzin
55b4(rgyud): mA//g.yo zhing rtsal ldan bri bar bya//brgya dang brgyad cu rtsa dgu ru//dbus kyi dkyil 'khor yang dag smra'o//chos kyi tshul gyi grwa chen po//thar pa'i rang bzhin
55b5(rgyud): grong khyer che//dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po las 'khor lo chen po'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so////thun mong mchog tu gsang
55b6(rgyud): ba yi//rdo rje rigs pa 'dzin pa mchog/rang rigs 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khror ni//phyogs gcig tu ni bshad par bya//dkyil 'khor kun gyi dbus su ni//thub
55b7(rgyud): ba'i dbang phyug rnam snang mdzad//seng ge pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs//da ni byang chub mchog 'dzin pa//mi bskyod pa ni glang tshan bcibs//rin chen dbang ni rtal
56a1(rgyud): bcibs//bcom ldan tshe dpag med pa ni//rma bya'i khri la yang dag bzhugs//don yod grub pa bla na med//mkha' lding dbang po yang dag
56a2(rgyud): bzhugs//'di rnams kyi ni bzhon par bshad//rigs mchog kun gyi dbye ba'o//mi bskyod pa yi sa gnon te//de bzhin rin chen dbang mchag sbyin//tshe
56a3(rgyud): dpag med kyi ting 'dzin sbyin//don yod grub pa'i mi 'jigs sbyin//sngon po ser po de bzhin dmar//kha dog ljang ku las 'dzin pa//de bzhin gshegs pa'i
56a4(rgyud): rigs yid 'ong //sku mdog dkar po rab tu bsgrags//de bzhin rdo rje rin chen la//rdo rje phreng bas rdo rje mtshan//rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor sbyor byung ba//rdo rje'i ri//
56a5(rgyud): mo yang dag bri//pad+ma'i rigs chen bzang po la//pad+ma'i phreng bas pad+ma mtshan//pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor sbyor byung ba//pad+ma'i sras bus thig gong ba bya//rin chen
56a6(rgyud): rigs can bzang po la//rin chen phreng bas rin chen mtshan//rin chen dkyil 'khor sbyor byung ba//rin chen ri mo rnam par mdzes//las kyi rigs la sna
56a7(rgyud): tshogs bshad//de bzhin sangs rgyas rigs mchog la//'on kyang rdo rje khyad par gyis//rdo rje dkyil 'khor sbyor byung ba'i//rdo rje shar gyi phyogs cha ru/
56b1(rgyud): lho ru rin chen dkyil 'khor te//nub tu pad+ma yang dag bshad//byang du las ni yang dag sbyor//rdo rje can kun khro gnyer can//rin chen tshogs ni rab bshad pa//
56b2(rgyud): pad+ma chen po dul zhing zhi//drag po zhi pa las 'dzin pa//dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'khor lo ru//'khor lo chen po yang dag bri//de nas phyi rol 'khor lo sogs//
56b3(rgyud): cho ga 'di kun de dang 'dra//dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po gsang ba chen po mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gsang ba zhes bya ba rkang pa bdun pa rdzog so//
56b4(rgyud): las kyi rnal 'byor las byung ba rdzogs so////nang gi dkyil 'khor rdzogs nas ni//tshon rtsi lnga ni dgang bar bya'o//thig dang ri motha~Mng ni//tshon rtsi kun gyis r-i gu gang //dang po nas ni tha ma ru/phyiro/
56b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor kun tu bri//mnyam zhing kun tu cha mnyam pas//gru bzhi ru ni rab tu brtan//zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa//rta babs bzhis ni mdzes byas pa//ka ba brgyad
56b6(rgyud): dang yang dag ldan//yid du 'ong zhing lcogs par phye//theg bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan//dar dang phreng bas rnam par brgyan//rdo rje rin chen srad bu yis//phyi rol
56b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor thog gdab bya//kha khyer gyis ni yongs su bskor//rdo rje kha khyir mdzes byas la//zla ba phyed pa'i lcug mas khyab//rdo rje phreng ba'i tshogs dang ldan//
57a1(rgyud): dra bas dra ba phyed pas spras//zla ba byed pas nye bar mdzes//g.yer ka'i dra ba yang dag ldan//kha dod/sna tshogs rnam par rgyan//de dang dbus kyis bar thog
57a2(rgyud): la//byang chub sen rnams yang dag bri//bskal pa bzang po stong dag ni//zlas pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams//shar du thams cad rdo rje mtshan//lho ru rin chen phyag
57a3(rgyud): mtshan bsnams//nub tu pad+ma rdo rje sogs//byang du las kyi rdo rje nga snams//rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha gang dag/phye rol thig la yang dag bri//drag po la sogs lha chen//
57a4(rgyud): rnams//snam bu las ni lus phyeng phyung //dbang phyug chen po tshangs pa che//khyab 'jug g.yung drung gzhon nu ni//rigs bcas dpung dang bcas rgyal po//shar gyi//
57a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor yang dag bri//'khyil pa'i 'od can gtum po dang //ser skya rdo rje ser skya rnams//rigs bcas 'khor lo yang dag ldan//lho yi phyogs su yang
57a6(rgyud): dag bri//myos pa phreng ldan rgyal nyid pa//rnam par rgyal dang skyel byed rnams//rigs bcas dpung dang yang dag ldan//nub kyi tshe ru yang dag bri//ko shi/
57a7(rgyud): gos can me dang rlung //rdo rje 'jigs byed la sogs rnams//nub kyi cha las 'og tu ni//byang gi cha ru yang dag bri//de bzhin dpung dang bdag por bcas//
57b1(rgyud): ma mo 'jig rten rab grags dang //gtso bo 'khor lo rnam rol pa//lha min la sogs rdzu 'phrul che//phyi rol 'khor lo'i rigs su bshad
57b2(rgyud): rgyud chen gsang ba zhes bya las//stong phrag bcu ru bshad pa rnams//ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa bri//phyi yi dkyil 'khor gnas zur du//dkyil 'khor bzhin dri bar
57b3(rgyud): bya/me tog spos la sogs ldan pa//mchod pa'i lha mo yang dag bri//ji ltar nus shing bri ba dang //ji ltar mdzes shing rjes su 'thun//ji ltar rang gi rigs bshad
57b4(rgyud): pa//ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa bri//dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po gsang zhing mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor mchog
57b5(rgyud): tu mdzes pa zhes bya ba rkang pa brgyad pa rdzogs so///de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po ma lus pa rdzogs so////de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
57b6(rgyud): cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di la sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ma lus pa dgug pa 'di 'byung ngo //'di lta ste/byang chub kyi sems dang /pha rol tu phyin pa drug dgug pa nyid
57b7(rgyud): dang /phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la thabs mkhas pa chen po 'jug par byed pa nyid dang /don thams cad la mngon du phyogs pa dang /mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa dang
58a1(rgyud): /byang chung can par chags bsags pa//mas can po nganal mo skyo ba dang //thob pa chen po 'di ma zlog pa gzhan la 'dod pa sa spyod cing 'gyur ba skrod par
58a2(rgyud): 'ching ba nyid dang /thabs dang shes rab dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs dang /spyod pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa sdud par byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye she
58a3(rgyud): chen po nyid la yang dag par byed pa nyid do//da la shar gyi sgor rdo rje lcags kyu chen po zhes bya ba rdo rje 'dzin dgod par bya'o//lho ru ni rdo rje zhogs pa zhes bya ba dang /
58a4(rgyud): nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog ces bya ba dang /byang du rdo rje dril bu zhes bya ba'i rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dgod par bya'o//dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal pori dkyil 'khor chen po
58a5(rgyud): gsang ba zhes bya ba las byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshul ched du brjod pa las rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po rdzogs so////de bzhin
58a6(rgyud): gshegs pa'i 'khor lo yin no//byang chub sems dpa'i tshul thob bya//dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs nas ni//dam tshig mchog chen sems dpa' yis//
58a7(rgyud): skor ba dag ni lan gsum bya//ma lu so gsang ba blta bya zhing //kun tu tshogs nas dga' bar bya//gsang ba chad na dag bya zhing //lhag pa rnam par sbyang bar
58b1(rgyud): bya//de nas rdo rje sems da m+b+ha//myur du phyug rgya ma ston+da b+ha//mtshan rgyu rtswa brgyud dam pa ni//lan cig tu ni brjod par b+ha//'khor lo zung ni yang drug gnas/
58b2(rgyud): rdo rje lha mo spyan drang bya//phyi rol dkyil 'khor lo gnas bre//sangs rgyas mchod rten spyan drang bya//sgo yi dbus ni gang gnas pa//sgo srung rnams ni spyan drang bya/
58b3(rgyud): phyi rol dkyi mi 'khor la gnas pa'i//sems dpa' chen po spyan drang bya//de nas sgo rnams thams cad du//lcags kyu la sogs las byas te//phyag rgya bzhi ni yang
58b4(rgyud): dog bcing //brgya dang rtsa brgyad dag bya ba//rdo rje lcags kyu kun tu dgug/rdo rje zhugs pas gzhug par bya//rdo rje lcags sgrog kun tu bcing //rdo rje dril bus
58b5(rgyud): dbab par bya//skra'i bya ba'o//de nas dbus su 'dug byas nas//rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches//rdo rje dbye ba'i phyag rgya yis//sgo rnams thams cad dbye/
58b6(rgyud): bar bya//sgo srung bar du dmigs nas ni//sgo rnams dbye bar bya ba yin//rdo rje sdigs mdzub phyag rgya yis//gdug pa thams cad bsngags par bya//gang
58b7(rgyud): tshe mchod pa yang dag rnam//ji srid dus kyi rdzogs 'gyur ba//grwa ni thams cad dag tu ni//gdug spos rnams ni btul bar bya//sngon du sgo yi los byas te//
59a1(rgyud): /de nas mchod pa yang dag bya//dang por me tog shing la sogs//spos dang mar me phyag rgyar bcas//mtshams kyi dus las sngon du ni//bum
59a2(rgyud): pa rdo rje spyan drang bya//rdo rje bum pa'i phyag rgya yis//ci nus par ni spyan dang bya//bum pa shin tu bzang po gcig/rin chen sna bdun las byas mdzes//yang na
59a3(rgyud): rin chen dang bsros pa'i//rdo rje dri yi chu ldan bya//rdo rje chu yi sngagasna dong ni//rdo rje phyag rgya chu gtsang mo//stong dang rtsa brgyad bzlas byas na//rdo rje bdud rtsa'i chu ru 'gyur/
59a4(rgyud): bum pa'i sngags ni oM badz+ra u da ka hUM//mai tog gi sngags ni oM badz+ra puSh+pe hUM//mar me'i sngags ni oM badz+ra A la ke hUM//dri'i sngags ni oM badz+ra gAn d+hi hUM/
59a5(rgyud): bdug spos kyi sngags ni oM badz+ra d+hU pe hUM//spos dang me tog la sogs pa//thams cad phyag rgya ldan par bya//rdo rje phyag rgya gzung byas nas//rdo rje'i sngags kyis/
59a6(rgyud): rab tu sbyar//dgongs ka'i duse nas brtsams na sA ni//khrus kyi cho ga yang dag bya//lus la dri yis byugs pa dang //rgyun rnams kun gyi legs par brgyan//
59a7(rgyud): rdo rjerje shugs kyi sngags dang ni//rdo rje shugs kyi phyag rgya yis//'byung ba dang ni 'jug pa yis//rdo rje'i rnal 'byor zhes mi 'gyur//sprin ma rdo rje mam
59b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas phyag rgya la sogs tshogs//sems dpa' thams cad 'gam byas kyang //rdo rje rnal 'byor nyes mi 'gyur//der ni 'gyod pa med par 'gyur//rdo rje dril dru
59b2(rgyud): dkrol ba yis//cho ga chad dam lhag kyang rung //'grub 'gyur nyes par mi 'gyur ro//gal te 'di ni cho gar ldan//kun tu 'jig par mi bya'o//grub pa'i
59b3(rgyud): rnal 'byor go cha yis//sangs rgyas skyon du 'dzin mi mdzad//rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya ches//dkyil 'khor mchod phyir 'jug par bya'o//zhugs nas
59b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbus su ni//rdo rje dag ni dgug par bya//rdo rje lcags kyu kun bcings nas//sor mo yis ni dgug par bya//de nyid rdo rje lcogs kyu yAs//rgyud
59b5(rgyud): las dgug pa nyid du gsungs//de bzhin rdo rje rigs chen la//rdo rje lcogs kyu yang dag bcing //rin chen lcags kyi'o sbyor ba yis//rin po che ni dgug par
59b6(rgyud): bya//pad+ma lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ni//pad+ma'i rigs chen dag la bshad//las kyi lcags kyu'i phyag rgyu yis//las kyi rigs chen dgug par bya//rdo rje chen po'i
59b7(rgyud): lcogs kyi bcing //sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bya//dkyil 'khor lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis//dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang bya//phyi rol rdo rje lcags
60a1(rgyud): /b+hu bats+tshed // rol rdo rje rigs d+hunA dang //bkra shrIs rdo rje'i lcags kyu yis//byang chub sems dpa' spyan drang bya//byang phyogs lhags m+bu'i gyur
60a2(rgyud): ba yis//dkyil 'khor pa rnams spyan drang bya//rin chen lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis//rdo rje 'dzin pa spyan drang bya//snying po'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis//
60a3(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje spyan drang bya//rdo rje ljags kyu'i sbyor ba yis//ku lo nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas//bsnyems tshul stsogs kyi phyag rgya yis//rnam snang yang dag spyan
60a4(rgyud): drang bya//saung sa rgyus lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis//de bzhin kha nAr sangs rgyas rnams//dam tshig lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis//dam tshig sems dpa' sbyin dri
60a5(rgyud): bye//dgug pa'i sbyor ba byas nas ni//mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad gdon par bya//mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad rdzogs nas ni//mchod pa'i sprin rnams yang dag sgru'o//
60a6(rgyud): bdag nyid dbul ba la sogs pa'i//ji skad bshad pa'i brtul zhugs spyad//bshags dang gsol gdab mchod pa dang //bdag nyid dbul ba la sogs rnams//
60a7(rgyud): bdag gi bya ba rdzogs nas ni//phyag rgya btsang ba yang dag brtsam//brgya'am yang na stong dag gam//brgya phrag brgya ni bsdus pa yis//phyag rgya'i tshogs ni
60b1(rgyud): byas nas//dkyil 'khor dag ni 'grub par 'gyur//do nas dkyil 'kho smra byas te//ji srid sgyu rangs shar gyur pa'o//de srid phyug rgya yang dag cing //nges par/
60b2(rgyud): dngos grub ster bar byed//de nas 'angs te phyag rgyu bcas//dkyil 'khor phyi rol byung nahA ni//gaudug pa la sogs kun bsdigs to//dkyil 'khor mchod phyir 'ju/
60b3(rgyud): par bya//rang gi khrus byas lus dris byug so//ji ltar 'tsham pa'i rgyan gros ldan//shin tu mdzes pa'i gos gyon zhing //phreng ldan kha ni dri zhim pas//rdo rje gur gyi/
60b4(rgyud): sbyor ba yis//ma tog spyi bor bzhag byas te//ril pa'i rdo rje dga' ba yis//zhunas nas mgon la rab btud cing //de nyid 'dod chags rjes chags dang //de nyid
60b5(rgyud): bskul ba'i phyag rgya yis//dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba//sangs rgyas kun ni bskul bar bya//skyon dang bral zhing brtag pa ste//'dod chags kun la rjes chags
60b6(rgyud): pa//mchod ltos chen po rgyal po che//bcom ldan de nyid bdag grub mdzod//de nas dam tshig ma chog gi ni//phyuphyag rgyu cho ga bzhin bcings nas//rdo rje slob dpon
60b7(rgyud): zhugs nas ni//lcags sgrogs phyag rgya yang dag bcing //de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis//de nyid rdo rje lcags kyu bcing //steng dus gol brdabs pa yis//sangs rgyas
61a1(rgyud): thams cad bsdu bar bya//sangs rgyas bsdu ba'i sngags ni dza dza dzaM//shar gyi sgo ru yi ge dza//de bzhin lho ru yi ge hUM//nub tu lcags sgrogs
61a2(rgyud): chen po de//byung du kun tu dbab pa a//rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la//las 'di dag ni yang dag bshad//las ni kun tu rdzogs byas nas//de bzhin du
61a3(rgyud): mtshar mthong 'gyur ba//cho 'phrul chen po rmad 'byung che//sna tshogs brgya dang rtsa bcu ste//cho 'phrul rmad 'byung chen po rnams//rdo rje slob dpon gyis mthong 'gyur//
61a4(rgyud): dngos grub bdag nyid chen po kun//dkyil 'khor kun tu 'ong bar 'gyur//rdo rje can dang byang chub sems//de bzhin rigs ni rnam lnga dang //rdo rje dbyings ni bdag
61a5(rgyud): nyid che//bcom ldan mchog kyang gshegs par 'gyur//rdo rje sems sogs sangs rgya so sras//ngo mtshar slob dpon gyis mthong 'gyur//mchod pa dang ni gtor
61a6(rgyud): ma nyed//ji bzhin tshe gra bcas par 'gyur//de bzhini rdzu 'phrul dngos grub dag/mthong nas dkyil 'khor bya ba yin//ji ltar bkod pa 'khor lo dang //ji ltar
61a7(rgyud): yo byad zad pa dang //ji ltar brtul zhugs spyod pa bzhin//de bzhin dngos grub thob par 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' mthu tshan dang //sangs rgyas yang dag
61b1(rgyud): mthong bar 'gyur//ji ltar 'khor lo chen po byin//'di ni ngo ma mche ba yin no//ji ltar de rnams bzhugs pa bzhin//de bzhin 'khor lo yongs su gzung //ye shes//
61b2(rgyud): bzang po khyab pa yi//rmad 'byung dam pa thob par 'gyur//dkyil 'khor rmad 'byung thams cad ni//sa dag brtol nas mthong bar 'gyur//yang na dkyil 'khor bar
61b3(rgyud): snang gi/nam mkha' la gnas mthong bar 'gyur//yang na sangs rgyas kun gang ba'i//sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong bar 'gyur//yang na phyogs rnams thams cad du///
61b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas sku ni rab mthong 'gyur//rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs bzhin du//rdo rje can gyis bdag nyid mthong //yang na gsang ba lnga zhes pa'o//yang na sangs rgyas
61b5(rgyud): mkhas pa'i mchog/yang na dkyil 'khor gnas de ni//stong phrag gsum ni yongs su bzung //yang na rdo rje sems gcig po//dkyil 'khor bdag po zhes bshang
61b6(rgyud): ngo //de yi mtshan mo nyan mo mthong //nyi ma'i 'od kyis kun khyab pa'i//yang na nyi ma 'char ba ste//yang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro//dag pa'i zhing ni mthong nas su/
61b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas rol pa mthong bar 'gyur//'dus pa shin tu dog pa yi//dbang bskur ba ni mthong bar 'gyur//rmad 'byung sna tshogs zhes bya ba//rnam 'phrul ngo mtshar
62a1(rgyud): 'di mthong 'gyur//rdo rje slob dpon skal chen gyis//dkyil 'khor mchod pa sna tshogs 'gyur//yo byad tshogs par gyur kyang ni//gang zhig bsgribs
62a2(rgyud): par gyur pa yis//de bzhin ngo mtshar nyid mi mthong //rnal 'byor gzhan ni yang dag rtsom//phyag rgya thams cad bcings nas ni//sdig pa dral ba yang dag bya//rmad
62a3(rgyud): byung sna tshogs 'di lta ste//la lar zhugs pa tsam gyis ni//'grub pa nyid du gdon mi za//dang po thun la 'grub par 'gyur//de bzhin la lar mtshan byed no//gsum
62a4(rgyud): pa'ang skya reng 'char na 'grub//de bzhin la lar nyi shar na//de ma thag tu mngon 'dod pa'i//sangs rgyas byang chub mchog 'grub 'gyur//skal ldan thar par 'dod
62a5(rgyud): 'gyur na//sa ni dang por 'dod pa ste//rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob nas//gang gis gnas med 'gro ba'o//yang ni rig pa 'dzin nyid dam//de bzhin rdo rje nyid du 'gyur/
62a6(rgyud): ji ltar mngon par 'dod par 'grub//sangs rgyas byang chub yongs su 'dzin//mtsham med lnga po byed pa dang //de bzhin sdig pa kun byed pas//gang tshe lan bdun byas nas
62a7(rgyud): ni//sgrub pas rnal 'byor 'grub par 'gyur//'byung ba bzhi las gzugs can min//nam mkho'i gzugs su rtag tu 'gyur//chos kyi dbyings su 'gyur ba nyid//
62b1(rgyud): rdo rje bka' na gzhan du man /gang gi lan bdun sgrubs nas ni//sdig pa dge ba nyid 'gyur zhing //nyes par byas pa bsod nams tshogs//gzhan du 'grub par mi
62b2(rgyud): 'gyur te//dad pa med par gnas pa dang //gang tshe rje tshom za 'gyur ba//de ni rnal 'byor nyams par 'gyur//byang chub sems ni yongs ma bzung //ston du bsnyen pa nyams
62b3(rgyud): 'gyur to//rtag tu rtul zhugs nyams par 'gyur//de 'dra la sogs bgegs mang ngong //nga rgyal 'di dag rnam por spangs//sdom pa yongs su ma bzung zhing //rnal 'byor de
62b4(rgyud): nyid tshul shes min//rdo rje slob dpon mi brtan 'gyur//'grub pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro//de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyi//gal te rdo rje slob dpon 'gyur//mkhas shing sdom pa blangs
62b5(rgyud): pa dang //byang chub sems ni yongs su gzung //gang tshe 'tsho ba don yod cing //gal te skye ba 'bras bcas 'dod//'bad pas thams cad nyid kyis no//rnal 'byor chen po yang dag
62b6(rgyud): brtsam+b+ha//byang chub sems dang ldan gyur nas//rig pa'i sdom pa 'dzin pa yi//de nas rnal 'byor yang dag brtsam//sangs rgyas byang chub rab 'grub 'gyur//yang zhus pa/rig par
62b7(rgyud): rgyud ni rab 'grub phyir//sdom pa ji ltar blang bar bgyi//ji ltar dam tshig srung bar bgyi//dam tshig nyams pa ji lta bu//sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir//byeng sems yang
63a1(rgyud): dag bskyed nas ni//theg pa gzhan la 'dod mi bya//de nas rnal 'byor yang dag rtsam//dkyil 'khor gang na gnas kyang rung //slob dpon gyi ni mdun song ste//zhabs
63a2(rgyud): dag la ni btung nas pa rjod//dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas//slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gas pa//byang chub sems dpe'i tshul snyan pa//mgon po chen po bdaga' tshul lo//
63a3(rgyud): dam tshig de nyid sbrul tu gsal//sdom pa rnams kyang bdag la stsol//gtso bo bdag la sdom pa gsal//slob dpon gyis ni nye bar brtag/rnam pa kun tu dri bar bya//dam tshig
63a4(rgyud): brjod bya gang zhig ni//snod du rung ba de gzhug bya//bu dang slob ma ma yin min//snod dang ldan la sbyin par bya//gal te snod dang ldan par shes//srog dang bdog pa kun sbyin bya
63a5(rgyud): sngon tu dkyil 'khar rab 'jug cing //cho ga bzhin du bcu nas ni//de nas me tog bcas thal mo//lus btud dga' ba che rnams kyi//bshags pa dang ni gsal ba gdag/
63a6(rgyud): rjes su yi rang kun tu bya//rgyud dbang gsang ba las gsung bzhin//mchod pa dang bcas yongs su bsngo//phyogs rnams dun tu phyag bya zhing //sdom pa chen po blang bar bya
63a7(rgyud): slob dpon la ni rab tu brjod//gtso bo bdag la sdom pa gsol//thub pa'i nyi ma ma lus pa'i//sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol//bdag mong 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di//slong
63b1(rgyud): dpon dbang du gnas pa la//sangs rgyas rol mo las byung ba//me ldog 'khor lo'i 'byor par ldan//thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog/gsang ba chen por 'jug par bgyi//gsang ba'o
63b2(rgyud): rigs mtho thams cad du//slob dpon chen po bdag 'jug mdzad//me ldog pa yi dbang skur ba//skal pa chen po bdug la stsol//mtshan rnams kun gyis rgyas btab tsang //da
63b3(rgyud): byad rnams dang yang dag ldan//sangs rgyas sku ni yid 'ong ba//slob dpon chen po bdag la gsol//dbang skur pa ni rmad byung che//sems can kun gyi don bgyid phyir//bdag ni
63b4(rgyud): rtag tu slob dpon 'gyur//slob dpon chen po bdag la gsol//gsang ba'i rigs las byung ba yi//rdo rje'i rigs bcas 'khor lo ste//rta babs bcas par yang dag ldan/slob
63b5(rgyud): dpon gyur par shes par bya//bdag nyid nye bar zhi ba nyid//byang chub sems ni yongs su bzung //gsang ba yaM ni 'khor lo ru//sdom pa dang bcas 'jug par bgyi//de nas slo
63b6(rgyud): dpon gyi 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste//gsang ba chen po rigs dag pa//gsang ba yongs su 'dzin par ni//bdag nyid chen po khyod 'dod dam//des kyang 'tshal zhes brjod par bya//
63b7(rgyud): yang slob dpon gyi 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste//sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun ste//dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song //'di na sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i//dam tshig
64a1(rgyud): /brtan par gyur pa'o//rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang //blo tshon gyis ni zung bar bgyi//byang chub sems gang ngo rdo rje//shes rab dril bu zhes bshad do//slob dpon dag kyang
64a2(rgyud): bzung bar bya//bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam//'di ni rdo rje rigs dag pa'i//sdom pa dam tshig yin par gsungs//rin chen rigs mchog chen po la//nyin dang mtshan mo
64a3(rgyud): lan gsum du//zang zing mi 'jig chos dang byams//sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin//phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum//dam chos khyod kyi gzung bar bya//'di ni pad+ma'i rig
64a4(rgyud): dag pa'i//dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsung //las kyi rig ma chag chen po la//sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni//yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi//mchod pa'i las kyang ci/
64a5(rgyud): nus bya//de las gzhan pa bcu bzhi ni//phas pham par ni rab tu bshad//spang zhing dor bar mi bya ste//rtsa ba'i ltung ba zhes bshad do//nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du//nyin
64a6(rgyud): re zhing ni bzla bar byed//gang tshe nyams gyur rnal 'byor pa//kha na ma tho sbom por 'gyur//khyod kyi srog chags bsad mi bya//ma byin par yang mi blang ngo //'dod la log par mi
64a7(rgyud): spyad cing //brdzun du smra bar mi bya'o//phung khrol kun gyi rtsa ba ni//chang na rnam par spang bar bya//sems can gdul phyir mi gtogs pa//bya ba ma yin thams cad spang /
64b1(rgyud): dum pa nye bar bsten bya zhing //rnal 'byor pa rnams bsnyen bkur bya//lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang //ngag gi rnam pa bzhi rnams dang //yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ni//ci nus par
64b2(rgyud): rjes su sbyangs//theg pa dman la 'dod mi bya//sems can don la rgyab phyogs min//'khor ba dag kyang spang mi bya//rtag tu mya ngan 'das mi chags//lha dang lha min gsang/
64b3(rgyud): ba pa//khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya zhing //phyag rgya gzhon pa mtshon cha dang //mtshan ma 'gom par mi bya'o//'di dag dam tshig yin par bshad//khyod kyi rtag tu bsrung bar
64b4(rgyud): bya//rjes 'thun sdom pa rgya cher ni//gsang po'i rgyud las rab tu bshad//de nyid kyis kyang brjod par bya//'dir ni slob dpon bdag la gson//gtso bo ji ltar bka' stsal
64b5(rgyud): pa//de bzhin du ni bgyid par 'tshal//ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams//byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i//byang chub sems ni bla na med//dam pa bdag gi skyed par bgyi///
64b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la//tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang //dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang //sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum//bdag gi brton par gzung/
64b7(rgyud): bar bgyi//sangs rgyas ches dang dge 'dun te//bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum//deng nas brtsam te gzung bar bgyi//rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la//rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya/
65a1(rgyud): yang //yang dag nyid du bzung bar bgyi//slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi//rin chen rigs mchog chen po yis//dam tshig yid du 'ong ba lnga//nyin
65a2(rgyud): zhing ni dus drug tu//sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab tu sbyin//byang chub chen po las byung ba//pad+ma'i rigs rten dag pa la//phyi dang gsang ba dag pa gsum//dam dri tshas ni
65a3(rgyud): gzung bar bgyi//las kyi rigs mchog chen po la//sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni//yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi//mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi//byang
65a4(rgyud): chub sems ni bla med pa//dam pa bdag gi skyed bgyis nas//sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir//bdag gi sdom pa ma lus bzung //ma grol ba ni dgrol bar bgyi//
