65a5(rgyud): me brgal ba ni bskal bar bgyi//dbugs mi phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing //sems can mya ngan 'das la dgad//de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis//cho ga ji bzhin dbang
65a6(rgyud): bskur bya//rdo rje slob dpon dbang skur ba//gsang ba'i rgyud las rab tu bshad//de lta bu yi tshwa ga yis//rtag pa nyid du spyod pa na//slob dpon rdo rje 'chang chen du//'di
65a7(rgyud): ni 'gyur ba the tshom med//rdo rje slob dpon gyi las rdzogs so////de nas slob ma gzhug pa'i las//yang dag nyid du bshad par bya//slob ma rdo rje slob dpon gyis//
65b1(rgyud): ji bzhin gsang ba chen por gzhug/snod dang snod min rtag pa nyid//bdag nyid chen pos mi bya'o//'di ni mthong ba tsam gyi kyang //sangs rgyas nyid ni 'grub par 'dod//gal te///
65b2(rgyud): de ni snod min na//de la gzhug pa sbyin par bya//yang na gang zhig don gnyer 'gyur//de la ji ltar bde ba nyid//ci ste gang zhig 'dug par 'gyur//mkhas pas gzhug
65b3(rgyud): pa sbyin par bya//gang phyir mthong ba tsam gyi ni//thams cad 'grub par gdon mi za//'on kyang gang zhig 'dug par 'gyur//de la las ni bya ba min//gzhug pa tsam zhag/
65b4(rgyud): sbyin bya'o//rnam pa thams cad nyid mi bya//dga' zhing dad dang ldan 'gyur na//smod du rung ba brtag par bya//gsum la skyabs 'gro sngon song ba'o//de la gzhug pa sbyin par
65b5(rgyud): /byo//rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che//rdo rje slob ma la sbyin bya//rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' ches//sbyor bzhin su yin brjod par bya//dkar po dmar po dang ldan pa'i///
65b6(rgyud): gos kyi mig ni bkab gyur dang //rdo rje 'jug byed phyag rgya yisi//rdo rje slob ma gzhug par bya//de nas sgo ya~M lis bya ste//sngon la rdo rje lcogs kyu yis//rdo rje lcags kyu dgug/
65b7(rgyud): bya zhing //yi ge dza na brjod par bya//badz+ra oM ku sha dzaH/rdo rje lcags kyus dkug nas ni//rdo rje zhags pas gzhug par bya//lho yi sgor ni sbyor bya zhing //yi ge hUM ni brjid
66a1(rgyud): //par bya//hUM badz+ra pA sha hUM//rdo rje zhags pas bcug nas ni//lcags sgrog ldan pas bcing bar bya//nub kyi sgo ru bcing nas ni//yi ge baM ni brjod par bya//
66a2(rgyud): badz+ra s+pho Ta baM//rdo rje lcags kyus yang dag dgug/rdo rje zhags pas gzhug bya zhing //rdo rje lcags sgrog gis bcing bya//rdo rje dril bus yang dag dbab//badz+ra gar+b+he oM
66a3(rgyud): rdo rje gzhug pa'i phyag rgya yis//dkyil 'khor mchod phyir gzhug par bya//dam tshig phyag rgya chen po yis//rdo rje'i ye shes yang dag dbub//sa ma ya s+t+waM//dam tshig
66a4(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po yi//rdo rje sngags ni rab skul bya//dam tshig bdag nyid chen po yis//sangs rgyas ye shes dbab par bya//sa ma ya hUM//de nas mchod pa phyag rgyar
66a5(rgyud): bcas//spos dang mye tog la sogs tshogs//phyag rgya dag ni thams cad bya//rdo rje'i sngags ni rab skul bya//de nas cho gau ji bzhin du//rdo rje slob ma mna' brgag bya/
66a6(rgyud): badz+ra ud da ka/rdo rje ming gis dbang skur bas//ji ltar 'dod pas dbang skur bya//badz+ra a b+hi She ka/rdo rje ye shes bla na med//de nas de la dbab pa sbyin//badz+ra a be sha a au/
66a7(rgyud): 'acu/nyi shu/sum cu/bzhi bcu/lnga bcu/drug cu/bdun tsu/brgyad cu/dgu bcu/brgya/rdo rje yi ni sngags 'di yis//thams cad du ni yang dag
66b1(rgyud): byab//de nas gdong g.yogs dgrol bar bya//rdo rje'i mig ni bla med pa//bAdz+ra at+ma/rdo rje'i rligasna ni skal ldan gyi//dkyil 'khor ltas shig skyes brjod bya//badz+ra pU sh+tsa/
66b2(rgyud): te//de nas de la bum pa bzung //rdo rje sgrib dpon gyis dbang skyer//gang ming bzung ba tsam gyis ni//sdig pa kun las rnam grol 'gyur//oM badz+ra a d+hi(ny+tsa/
66b3(rgyud): yang dag brtag bya zhing //de yi ye shes yongs su spyad//gal te snod du rung shes na//rnam par dbye bar dga' bar bya//he badz+ra nA ma/lnga/cho ga bcu/gzugs nyi
66b4(rgyud): shu/chu sum nu/rdo rje bzhi bcu/rin chen lnga bcu/pheg rdob drug cu/khaM sbyar bdun cu/bzhad pa brgyad cu/dag po dgu bcu/sems pa brgya//sangs rgyas stong /
66b5(rgyud): las nyis stong /gzugs sum stong /rnal 'byor bzhi stong //'dzin pa lnga stong //gzungs drug stong /kha dog bdun stong /dbyabs brgyad stong /mtshan ma dgu stong //tshig 'bru
66b6(rgyud): a 'bum phyug cig ni yongs rdzogs nas//'khor mo'i mtshan nyid yang dag ldan//gas ba yo ni spyod yul gzhan//de nas las ni rab be shad bya//slob mo'i tshig ming
66b7(rgyud): dam tshig rdzogs so///ye shes dag pa bdag nyid che//de nas gseng ba rab bshad bya//gang gi tshig thams cad kyis//'khor la chen po brtan 'gyur ba/
67a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas sems dpa' sems dpa' nyid//sa yi mtshan nyid yang dag ldan//gsang ba'i dum bcas yi rang bzhin//de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs
67a2(rgyud): dag pa//rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang gzugs//ye shes dag pa rdzu 'phrul che//rdo rje'i thugs 'dzin 'gyur nas ni//mtshan nyid dag ni yang dag brtag/rnal 'byor dang
67a3(rgyud): byad don ldan bya//mtshan nyid rjes su brtag par bya//rdo rje thugs kyi rjes sbyor bas//ye shes dag pa yang dag gzung //mchog tu gsang ba dam pa mchog/
67a4(rgyud): shes bzhugs pa kun tu bshad//de nas ye shes dam pa yos//'jig rten 'das pa rab gzhug bya//mtshan nyid chen po dang ldan pa'i//rtog pa'i sa la yang dag
67a5(rgyud): rten//rnal 'byor pa ya spyod yul mchog/rdo rje chos ni yi 'ong ba'o//thim dang chos sku zhes bya dang //bsdigs dang 'od zer lnga pa dang //klog dang chu zla zhes bya bas//
67a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas ye shes yang dge 'thob//chu yi zla ba bzang po yis//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor spang por bya//nyi ma lnga dang yang dag ldan//rigs ches skar ma zhes bya ba//nyon
67a7(rgyud): mongs gnod pa 'joms byed pa//any+tso gsang ba chen por bshad//gsang ba zhes bya rdor 'od 'byung //gzhan yang zla ba phyed par 'dod//pho nya'i dkyil 'khor kha
67b1(rgyud): bcing brtse gsum sbyor las byung //lcags kyu shin tu 'bar ba dang //gtum pa rdo rje can gyi tshogs//rtag pa'i gnas ni yongs 'gyur ba//thob byed rdo rje chen por 'drad//
67b2(rgyud): kun gyi gong ma'i 'og ma yis//nyi tshe ba de spang bar bya//mchog tu gsang ba rdzogs so///de nas mchog tu bsang ba rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
67b3(rgyud): yul can/zab pa/tshul rgya che ba/mkhas pa/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul las kyis tshogs ston pa/dga' ba chen po'i bkod pas kun khyab pa/de bzhi ni gshegs
67b4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba la sogs pa rnams kyi chos kyi mdzod 'byung ba rol pa'i 'khor lo chen po 'di las phyag rgya chen po'i rgyud mchog
67b5(rgyud): ces bya ba 'byung ste/gsang ba mchog tu rgya che ba//bsum gyis mi khyab las rnams ston//rol pa'i 'khor lo chen po ru//chos kyi mdzod ni 'dzin par bya//re shig/
67b6(rgyud): dang por lus kyis tshogs bstan par bya ste/'di lta ste hUM/'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bzung ba yi//sbyor thabs yi ge hUM brjod de//'di yis kyang ni rgyal po dang //
67b7(rgyud): phyag rgya'i rgyal mo brgya ru 'gyur//gnyis pa ni byang chub chen po'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i chos kyi 'khoralo'i tshul la 'jug pa yin no//'di lta ste/
68a1(rgyud): hUM/'dis ni phyagargya zhes bya yis//yi na d+hu ni brtan par 'gyur//phyag rgya chen po'i sbyor ba yis/phyag rgya'i rgyal po rnam pa ste bla/
68a2(rgyud): gsum pa phyag rgyastong phrag no//brgya yos tshogs su 'gyur ba yin//sangs rgyas 'khar lor 'jug pa yi//yi ge hUM gis brtan par 'gyur//hUM rnal 'byor bzhi pa'i
68a3(rgyud): dbye ba ni//brgya brag khri ru 'dir 'gyur ro//rig pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba//phyag rgya'i rgyal mo kun hUM bcas//'khor lo'i phyag rgya ji snyed yod//mdog gzhug pa ni//
68a4(rgyud): bye bar 'gyur//rtse gsum la sogs mtshan cha ni//rtag tu phyag rgya'i rgyal po yin/hUM/de nas sngags kyi tshogs 'byung ste//Tak+ki bcu/maT nyi shu/phaT sum cu/raT
68a5(rgyud): bzhi bcu/baT lnga bcu/riT drug cu/kha Ta bdun cu/waT brgyad cu/taT dgu bcu/tarba ber+g+ga/ka ta nI lan stong yin/ta dang wa zhes bya ba dang //Da ni rnam pa bcu
68a6(rgyud): ru 'gyur//yi ge DA nI ldan gci gi sbyar//yi ge U yA nga? rnam pa bzhi//yi ge bai ni rnam pa lnga//yi ge aM ni lan drug sbyar//ka ni ldan bdun yang dag sbyar//yi ge d+hA
68a7(rgyud): ni lan brgyad sbyar//yi ge sha ni byed du 'gyur//khi Ta ni stong phrag brgya ru 'gyur//stong phrag brgya las rnal 'byor gyis//phyag rgya'i rgyud ni btu bar bya//rtog pa thams/
68b1(rgyud): dbasdus pa gsang yonas byung ldan pa jug pa gsang tshan du rgyan du dbaskyon pa shogs pa rnams cad kyi gsang ba tog rnam pa can pa shin tu ga snang brnal 'gyur
68b2(rgyud): rtse mo las/byang chub pa'i tshul rgya chen pos 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i le'u gnyis pa rdzogs so////rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba yang rdzogs so///
68b3(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpe'i tshul rgya chen po'i ri las dekyil 'khor chen po'i dang ba phyag rgyu dadung nye ba'i phyag rgya 'byung ba'i ye shes 'byu ste/gang tshe rdo rje so
68b4(rgyud): dpon dang //rdo rje slob mar gyur pa na//phyag rgya nye ba'i phyag rgya bcing //gang phyir rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gon so//gang tshe rdo rje sems dpa' 'ching //rdo rje khu tshur dam du'i'aching //
68b5(rgyud): gang che rdo rje rgyal po'iching //rdo rje gnod sbyinA rab tu 'ching //gang tshe rdo rje chabyas pa'i cheng //rdo rje srin po rab tu 'ching //gang tshe rdo rje legs pa 'ching //rdo rje las ni rab tu
68b6(rgyud): 'ching //gang tshe rdo rje rin chen 'ching //rdo rje smra ba rab tu 'ching //gang tshe rdo rje gzi brjid 'ching //rdo rje rgyu ni rab tu 'ching //gang che rdo rje rgyal mtshan 'ching //rdo rje rnon po
68b7(rgyud): rab tu 'ching //gang tshe rdo rje bzhad pa 'ching //rdo rje chos ni rab tu bcing //de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis//phyag rgya'i le ni ni yang dag sbyar//phyag rgya nye ba'i phyag rgya yis//rdo rje'i phyi
69a1(rgyud): rgyu brtan par 'gyur//mchod pa'i phyag rgya ji ltar lag sa//rdo rje'i lpags kyus bkug nas su//rdo rje'i mangs ni dgang bar bya//rdo rje'i mangs ni 'phyangs
69a2(rgyud): nas su//rdo rje khu tshur gyis bsgrub bya//phyag rgya ji bzhin bkrol nas ni//de ni bci nga ri rab tu bya//mchod pa'i cho ga 'di yis ni//rdo rje dkyil 'khor mchod
69a3(rgyud): bIr 'gyur//de bzhini g.yon pos gar bya zhing //g.yas pas khu tshur dricings nas ni//dpral bar yongs su bskor nas su//khwa yi mdun du dgod par bya//rdo
69a4(rgyud): nyi ma bzhad pas brgad//mnyam zhing cung zad gdangs te gnas//ral bri dri ma med snang bas//rdo rje glu ni glang bar bya//rdo rje khro bo'i 'dzub mo ni//yang dge sgreng pa
69a5(rgyud): legs par sgrub//de nas spyi gtsug kha dag tu//las byas dkyil 'khor mchod pa na//rigs kyi lha yi sbyor ba yis//legs par sgrub pas gnam bsgrub bya//dang
69a6(rgyud): por bdag nyid rdo rje sems//de bzhin lha nyid brtag par bya//brtul zhugs sbyor ba 'di yis ni//rigs kyi lha nyid bsgrub par bya//'khor lo rnam pa du ru brjod//ji
69a7(rgyud): ltar rigs de bzhin 'khor lo//ji ltar dgod pa de bzhin 'gyur//ji skad gsungs pa dgongs pa bzhin//mdor bsdu ni ni rnam pa lnga//rdo rje rin chen de bzhin chos//
69b1(rgyud): bad+ma sna tshogs shin tu bstan//de bzhin sangs rgyas rnal 'byor gsang //'khor ro rnam pa lnga rubashad//gsang ba rnam pa du ru 'gyur//gsang ba rnam pa lnga ru badzod //rgyas pa
69b2(rgyud): nas rnam pa mang //sangs rgyas rdo rje rin chen dang //chos dang las ni grags chen no//cho ga rnam pa du ru brjod//mdor na rnam pa gsum du 'dong //zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang /
69b3(rgyud): mngon spyod kyi ni rtog pa la//rdo rje sbyor ba las byung du//rdo rje'i sbyor bu bla med pa//tshad med bgrang du med pa yis//ji ltar gdul bya rnams kyi khams//de bzhin rdo rje sbyor 'byung
69b4(rgyud): rnams//rtsa ba'i rgyud du ji ltar brjod//gsang ba lnga ldan gang yin pa'i//de ni rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya//dbang bskur phyag rgya chen po dang //rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rnal
69b5(rgyud): 'byor 'byung //ji ltar gsung ba'i rigs la byung //gleng zhig sngon du chos nyid snang //yid la byed pa dang ldan pa//rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi thabs chen po//de bzhin gsung
69b6(rgyud): ba rab tu brtag/'di yi rtag tu de nyid rig/rdo rje ye shes ji ltar 'gyur//ji ltar bsgoms pas rdo rje can//mngon par sbyor ba de nyid rig/de tshe ye shes rang bzhin sems
69b7(rgyud): de nyid ye shes brtan par 'gyur//mchog tu gsang ba ci 'drar brjod//phyag rgya rnam pa lnga ldan pa//de ni mchog tu gsang po bsgrags//phyag rgya nye ba'i phyag rgya bsdu//
70a1(rgyud): nye bar bzhad pa'i mchod pa'o//de nyid kyang ni ji lta bu//rig pa'i sgom pa bstan pa dang //ting 'dzin sgo dang yang dag ldan//rig pa'i lha mo'i 'khor gyi
70a2(rgyud): mchog/de nyid du ni rtag tu 'gyur//rdo rje phra mo ji ltar brjod//shes rab can gyis bdag bsam bya//nga ni su zhog bdag mi dmigs//'byung ba bzhi yang rang ba
70a3(rgyud): lus//'byung ba rnams las ji ltar 'byung //de nas lus 'di thams cad ni//rnal 'byor spyi bo nas brtsams te//rkang pa yi ni mthil bar du//mi gtsang rdzas
70a4(rgyud): ni 'byung bar 'gyur//zla ba'i rdo rje dbus gnas par//yang na bdag nyid bsam par bya//yod na snying ka'i dbus su ni//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya//
70a5(rgyud): yang na zla gnyis yang dag ldan//dbus su rdo rje rnam par sgom//yang na rdo rje'i dbus gaunas pa//lus kun brtan par spro bar bya//yang na rdo rje bdag nyid sku//rdo rje'i/
70a6(rgyud): dngos po rnam spangs pa'i//yang na mkha' mtshungs chos shes pa'i//rdo rje'i rnal 'byor yang dag bzung //lce ni rkan la sbyar byas te//sna yi rtse mor blta bya zhing //
70a7(rgyud): rdo rje phra me bde reg pas//sems ni mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur//rdo rje phra mo'i bdo reg la//rtag tu mtshan ma'ang 'byung bar 'gyur//mtshan ma de ni spyi byas te/
70b1(rgyud): rgyu bdun dum na du rgyu na na na ba da/gsams na rgyu smangan/mam na sa/rnams na nga
70b2(rgyud): bsdu bar bya//saM ha rA ni rbadz+dza/de nas brtsams te mnyam gzhag pas//gang zhig cung zad tse rlom pa'i//chos dang gang zug bdag med cing//gzung dang 'dzin pa
70b3(rgyud): spyang ba'o//badz+ra badz+ra tiSh+Tha badz+dzi/sems can gang la byams pa ni//rtag tu brtan par dmigs nas su//sems ni spro ba'i spyod pa yis//phyogs rnams kun tu
70b4(rgyud): yongs su spro//ma hA badz+rA ma tai s+phA ra Na//sdug bsngal kun la yang dag gnas//sems can 'di rnams rab tu dka'//snying rje chen po'i sbyor ba yis//phyogs
70b5(rgyud): rnams kun tu yongs su spro//ma hA ka ru NI s+pha ra Ne//mya ngan 'das la btang snyoms bzhag/sems can don ni yang dag brtsam//kye mo sems can 'di
70b6(rgyud): /gdul dka'//phyogs rnams kun tu yongs su spro//ma hA u pau k+ShaM s+pha ra Ne//thams cad rang bzhin 'od gsal bas//bzod nas dag pa'i bdag nyid 'gyur//kun nas
70b7(rgyud): nyon mongs mi dmigs 'gyur//mya ngan 'das pa grol ba'ang med//sarba bud d+ha pra mo da s+pha ra Na//mkha' 'am gzhan gyi phyogs dag tu//rdo rje phra me'i sbyor ba yis//snying
71a1(rgyud): kaR+Sha rdo rje byang chub sems//shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas sbom//rdo rje phra mo'i sbyor ba yis//gor mo ji lta ba bzhin du//phyag na rdo rje'i gzhu
71a2(rgyud): chen po//dam pa'i chos nyid bsgom par bya//rnam pa mchog rnams kun ldan pa//sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam par sgom//rdo rje phra mo'i sbyor ba yis//sangs
71a3(rgyud): rgyas rjes su dran par bya//bud d+ha a nu smr-i t+ye bi shra/zla ba'i dkyil 'khore dbus su ni//rang bdag nyid ni bsgom par bya//rang gi snying kha'i dkyil 'khor du//
71a4(rgyud): zla sgom rmad 'byung rnal 'byor che//sa man+ta b+h+ye dra a bi sha/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni//rang bdag nyid ni rdo rje'i gzugs//rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun
71a5(rgyud): ldan pa'i//rdo rje sems dpa' cho ga bzhin//badz+ra satwa/rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i//rdo rje sems dpa' rang bdag nyid//snying ka zla ba'i dbus
71a6(rgyud): /su ni//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya//badz+ra satwa sa mA d+ha dz+nyA na bi sha/rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa'i//sangs rgyas gzugs su rung bdag nyid/
71a7(rgyud): rno dang rnying kar zla ba'i dkyil//dbus su sems dpa' rnam par sgom//ta thA ga to haM/rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rnam sgom pa//rnam po brgya dang rtsa bcu ni//rgyas pa na
71b1(rgyud): tsA rigs par//gsang ba'i rgyud las rab tu bshad//rdo rje phra mo rdzogs so///'jig rten pa ni ji ltar 'dod//rdo rje'i gzugs ni gtor gnas pa/
71b2(rgyud): snying kar yongs su sgom par bya//sa yi gnas kyang sgoms na ni//gter dag rab tu mthong bar 'gyur//badz+ra nI d+hiHrin chen chen po'i rdo rje gzugs//nam
71b3(rgyud): mkha' la ni yongs su sgom//gang du lhung bar mthong ba ni//de na gter yod shes par bya//rat+ne ni d+hiHlce la pad+ma'i gzugs dag ni//shin tu mnyam par
71b4(rgyud): gzhag pas sgom//de na yod ces btsas nas ni//rdo rje lce nyid rang nyid sba//d+harma Ni d+hIHlusaM kun rnal 'byor chen po yis//rdo rje'i gzugs su rnam par sgom
71b5(rgyud): kun tu babs na sa gar lhung ba//de na gter yod snyan pa yin//karmaNI/d+hiHgter shes pa rdzogs so////rdo rje dbab pa 'byung ba yin//chu ni rdo rje
71b6(rgyud): gzugs rang bzhin//sgom zhing rdo rje'i shugs kyi ni//chu yi steng du 'gro bar bya//badz+ra dz+wa la/ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs su ni//rdo rje sems sogs 'dod pa
71b7(rgyud): rnams//rang bdag nyid ni sgom bya ste//'dod pa'i gzugs nyid thob par 'gyur//badz+ra ru pa/chos kun mkha' dang mtshungs pa ste//bdag ni nam mkha' zhes
72a1(rgyud): rlung nyid//de nyid drun brnam d+ha/na padang ba nyid 'byor//da ma tA na ka mas la 'jug nas na//'jog pa ni bsgom byas na///
72a2(rgyud): sring du ni 'dzag pa'i gnas//de sri na ma mkhor 'gro ba gyur//badz+ra ma he/mi snang ba dang /mkha' la 'gro ba dang /rgyu'i steng du 'gro bar bye ba dang //'ad
72a3(rgyud): bye gzugs nyid shes pa rdzogs so//zla ba'i gzugs la 'dug nas su//rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par sgom//lab na rdo rje bsgoms na ni/
72a4(rgyud): rdorje rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur//badz+ra d+hA rA/zla ba'i gzugs la 'jug nas ni//rdo rje rin chen de dag nga nyid//rab tu rin chen sgom nas ni//rin sbyin rig
72a5(rgyud): pa 'dzin par 'gyur//said+d+he pa/zla ba'i gzugs la 'dug nas skye//rdo rje 'dzin pa rang nga dag nyid//dag byung dru dag tu ma// rig bla 'dzin pa
72a6(rgyud): 'gyur//bAng+ku d+hA rA/za ba'i gzugs lnga gnas su//rdo rje'i las su yang dag brtan//drug tu la 'i nom d+hus ni//las kyi dag pa 'dzin par 'gyu
72a7(rgyud): mdzang /dge po dzi pa nga gru kyi tshig rlo mye 'a rgyas su kun pasams /
72b1(rgyud): rdo rje bdag nyid ji srid 'dod//de srid skad cig gis 'bar 'gyur//badz+ra/dngos grub kyi ni tIng 'dzin ni//nam mkha'i dbyings su kun du sems nam//mngon par
72b2(rgyud): shes pa lnga thob cing //myur du ye shes rang grub 'gyur//shud d+ha shud d+he/rin chen rdo rje'i rang bzhin kun//nam mkho'i dbyings su kun bsams nas//rjes
72b3(rgyud): su dran pa sten pa yin//myur du rin chen 'dzin mtshungs 'gyur//badz+ri radz+ra/thams cad sangs rgyas gzugs rang bzhin//nam mkha'i dbyings su mos byas nas//
72b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi ting 'dzin ni//sangs rgyas nyid kyi ched du 'gyur//bud d+ha bud d+ha/mchog gi dngos grub rdzoblas so////rang nyid rdo rje khu tshur ni/
72b5(rgyud): chags pa'i dga' bas mig dngas pa//de yis gang la bltas pa ni//des kyang rdo rje can du mthong //oM badz+ra dr-iSh+Ti maT//gsal zhing rab tu 'bar ba'i mig/mig/
72b6(rgyud): 'bras kun tu 'dren byed pa//'bar ba'i lta ba zhes su brjod//'gro ba thams cad 'gub byed pa//dIp+ta dr-iny+tsi r-i kuM shi dzi//khro gnyar daster ba rang 'joms pa/
72b7(rgyud): khros pas mag ni rab tu g.yo//khro ba'i lta ba la rten nas//'jig rten gsum yang gi zhom par bya// dz+nye dr-iSh+NI ti//rinapa rib man+da ra//rten zhing mi 'dzum
73a1(rgyud): pa la mad//byams pa'o/dgis bshad de//gdon rlung rams dang dug 'angams pa'o//dra rti dr-i&ti/de bzhin gshegs parnam
73a2(rgyud): kye gsang ba dgug pa dang /dbang du bya ba dang /chad pas bcud pa dang /yongs su sbyangs pa'i las rdzogs so////bde ba gzhan ni yod nyid min//
73a3(rgyud): rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub chos//'on kyang dgug pa bde ba ste//de ni kun las khyad por 'phags//dus 'dir skal pa chen po ni//dkyil 'khor chen po byed
73a4(rgyud): pa las//dngos grub med kyang bde ba gang //bde ba kun las khyad par 'phags//lha dang mi yi 'jig rten pa'o//bde ba sdus par 'gyur ba yi ste//rdo rje sri
73a5(rgyud): dpon bde ba gang //bcu drug char yang mi phod do//yang na gang zhig dngos grub thob//sangs rgyas nyid du rab shes bya//rang gis rtog pa gang yin pa//gzhan
73a6(rgyud): dang gang gis shes par 'gyur//sar chung rgyal ba'i gnas dang ldan//gsang ba'i dngos grub ster mdzad pa//bong ba thob pa gang yin pa//de ni gsang ba//
73a7(rgyud): 'dzin ji bzhin//gsang ba yi ni tshogs chen po//'di la zhugs pa gang yin pa//sa thob par ni shes bya ste//mi ldog rgyal ba'i bdag nyid sras//
73b1(rgyud): rgyal ba'i gnas kyis bab kyang //yid ches par n+ti mi 'gyur te//de y-is sna brgyad kyi ba du//dag pa dman pa spyod mi 'gyur//glasang chen rtog pa ru ni//zhugs
73b2(rgyud): po bdag nyid rgyal ba'i sras//theg chen la ni gzho la ba rnams//yid chos par ni 'byer ba ste//gsung ba yi ni phan yon ni//sangs rgyas kyi ni rab tu mkhyen
73b3(rgyud): 'dir ni phan yon mdor bsdus pa//sangs rgyas bde ba thob par 'gyur//yon tan gyi dbang du byas pa'i rgyud rdzogs so///byed pa po dang skyed byed mod//
73b4(rgyud): las dang 'bras bu gang las ze shad//nga ces ji skad bshad pa la//da ni byed po skyeng byed dang //da ni skye dgu'i bdag po yin//da ni sna tshogs bdag bri ste//byed//
73b5(rgyud): po skyed byed mes po yin//yang gsum pa/dge ba de bzhin gshegs stong ngo //sems dpa'i snying po zhes bya ba shad//nga ni de bzhin gshegs snying po//sems
73b6(rgyud): can thams cad bdag dang mtshungs//mya ngan 'das bcas su 'og sbyong //sa thA 'jig rten nyid sems can//ma lus srid pa dag gri gnas//sems tsam+ba du ni
73b7(rgyud): rab tu 'jug/sems can kun gyi se mos gang yin//de ni byang ba'i byin byed brjod//nga ni rgyal po sems dbang phyugaci phyir ngani byed por bshad//jis
74a1(rgyud): gsang ba gzhan las gsungs//nga nyid rang las byung ba ste//mya ngan 'das bcas sa 'og steng //swa bla srid gsum 'jig rten gsum//gang zhig/
74a2(rgyud): gnas zhes bya ba'i sems//gnas med las byung gang yin pa//snying po de bzhin gshegs dag pa//de nyid rang byung nga nyid de//nga ni rdo rje can yang yin//sdug bsngal
74a3(rgyud): thams cad spangs pa dang //nyes pa thams cad zad pas na//nga ni byang chub sems rdo rje//nga nyid rang nyid byung ba'o//nga nyid yang ni khyab 'jug ste//gzung ba la sogs kun spangs pa'i///
74a4(rgyud): dag pa de bzhin nyid rnam shes//bdag dang nyon mongs med pa ste//de bas nga ni khyab 'jug bshad//nga ni de bzhin nyi ma ste//ci phyir de nyid zhes bshad pa//zab mo'i chos ni
74a5(rgyud): ngas rtogs pa//de phyir rang byung nga nyid ni//nyi ma zhes ni bya bar brjod//nga ni zla ba ru brjod de//nga ni chos rnams thams cad kyi//ni ba ru ni rtogs dang bshad//de bas zhi ba chen
74a6(rgyud): po yis//dA ni zla ba blo gros che//nga ni gshin rje ste/ji bzhin chos rnams thams cad kyi//ye shes chen po lhag par bshad//de nyid rtogs pa gang yin pa//gshin rje nga ste
74a7(rgyud): gshin rje 'dzin//dbang po ste/dbang po mig 'phrul zhes bya ba//'khor ba las rgal pha rol phyin//ye shes nor ni bsgrubs pa yis//nga ni dbang byed dbang po yin//skye
74b1(rgyud): dgu yi ni bdag po ste//chos rnams kun gyi rnam pa ni//skye brtsa nas 'don byed pa//sdug bsngal chen po yongs su shes//de phyir nga ni skye dgu'i bdag/nga bdag nyid ni mos
74b2(rgyud): ste//nga yis bdud rtsi'i chu 'thungs nas//thar pa'i grong khyer chen po ru//'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bas//nga nyid kho na mes pa yin//nga ni 'dod pa'i 'jig rten yin//
74b3(rgyud): ngo bo nyid dang ljongs spyod rdzogs//sprul pa'i sku ni rab 'jug byed//rol chen 'jig rten zhes bya ba//'jig rten lta ba ston byed yin//srid pa'i 'jigs pa las bsgral
74b4(rgyud): yin//nyon mongs chen po rnam par spang //srid par bshad de/sred pa'i zhags pa gtsang byed pa//nga ni srid pa'i rgyal po che//khams gsum pa ni/rgyud ni khams
74b5(rgyud): zhes rab tu brjod//byang chub sems zhes bya ba rA bshad//nga ni theg pa gsum 'dzin pasau//nga ni khamasde gsum pa ru bshad//sa 'og ni/yang dge de nyid rdo rje che//
74b6(rgyud): stong nyid de bzhin nyid ces bshad//ji ltar sau ni 'dzin pas mchog/de bzhin nga ni chos 'dzin pa//sa steng ni/sa steng nam mkha' zhes su brjod//nga ni rang bzhin gyis
74b7(rgyud): mkha' mtshungs//chos dang gang zag bdag med pa//nga ni sa stang de nyid bshad//me ni/nga ni bzod nas ma skyes 'byung ba med//bdag min bdag med nga ni skye dgu'i
75a1(rgyud): bdag/srid pa'i 'khri shung gis bcings sems can gdungs//nga ni grol byed khri shing dag byed pa//rlung mi mtshan ma rnam par bsgoms nas no//man+dan//
75a2(rgyud): ma med pa 'dus ma byas//byang sems 'khri ning zhags pa dag/'ther byed de bzhin rlung yin no//nga ni dbang phyug chen po ste//rdo rje tshogs kyi bdag po chen po byed//nga ni/
75a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas dbang phyug gzhon ci smos//bdud rtsi chen po mthar pa'i grong khyer che/nga ni dbang bsgyur dbang phyug che//nga ni brtul zhugs zhes bshad//nga ni nyon mongs
75a4(rgyud): 'joms par bshad//da ni rga dang 'chi ba las//nges par grol bas tshangs par bshad//'jig rten gsum gyi lus su ni//zhags pa zhe gang giti mug ni//khams
75a5(rgyud): gsum 'jig rten gsum yin no//nga ni srung ma bran du 'gyur//de rnams 'byung bas khams gsum nga //gdong drug ni/sangs rgyas rdo rje rin chen dang //chos dang
75a6(rgyud): las dang gsang 'dzin bcas//rnam pa drug ni 'khor lo che//nga ni gdong drug mchog chen po//gzhan yang /gza' dang tshogs sogs gang yin pa//nga bdag
75a7(rgyud): nyid ces ji ltar rung bar 'gyur//gang zhig gdon la sogs pa kun//sems las kun tu byung ba'i rlabs//nga ni thugs 'dzin rgyal po ste//des na nga ni srid pa'i gnas//
75b1(rgyud): nga ni 'dod pa ste/thar pa'i rang bzhin grong khyer che//dgongs pa mthar bug nga yis bshang //ra ni sems can kun la 'dod//de bsrang ni 'dod par bshad//bar bya ba ste/nga nyid
75b2(rgyud): thar cing sems can kun//so sor yang ni grol bar byed//des na rang 'byung ba nyid ni//thar par 'dzin pa'i rgyal po yin//nga ni dmyal ba ste/nga ni bdag dang chos rnams
75b3(rgyud): min//nga ni chags lnga kun tu bral//nga yis 'tsho med lam bstan pas//nga ni dmyal ba'i dmyal ba pa//nga ni yi dgas te/mngon par 'dod pa nga yis 'thob//
75b4(rgyud): sems can sgom pa smin par byed//nga yis dka' ba'i gnas thob pas//da ni yo dgas yi dwags skyes//dud 'gro dra ste/'khor ba'i chu bo rgal dka' las//sems
75b5(rgyud): can dag ni thams cad gnas//ji ltar mi shes rmongs gyur pa//de bzhin nga yis dgrol bar byed//gzhan yang ni chags pa ste//sems can grol ba rjes chags//
75b6(rgyud): phyir//sred pa gcod phyir zhe sdang dang //gsung mdzod 'dzin pas ser sna can//sems can 'dod pas 'dod pa dang //sems can smin byed sems can nga //gsang//
75b7(rgyud): bo 'dzin pa'i rgyal po gang //de ni nga yis 'jigs byed sras//des ni gsang ba chen po yin//nga ni chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa//sangs rgyas byang chub gsang 'dzin po///
76a1(rgyud): de bas nga ni gsang ba'i bdag/yang nu byin gyis rlob pa dang //bskyems bcas sgeg pa'i zhal mnga' bya//tha nA da yi steng sbyar nas//gang du gsang ba
76a2(rgyud): brjod pa'o//dA ra d+ha mdar gsang //da ni lnga lnga 'dzin pa yin//rma bya chen mo mdzod ldan pa'i//du ni gsang ba'i bdag por bshad//rtse dang lpags par nu mar
76a3(rgyud): ldan//mdzad sogs gsus pa 'phye ba dang //zla ba'i steng na gar byed pa//de rnams gseng ba'i rgyal po yin//sa la bsnyems pa'i gar byed pa//rdo rje gar byed smra
76a4(rgyud): dkar 'joms//dra ba sbubs len gsus pa can//mdzod ldan dang ni gos 'dzin ma//yi ge ta 'don zla ba dang //mchog dang 'jig byed bzhin ldan ma//sgra can dziH/
76a5(rgyud): rjes 'thun sgra//mche ba 'byin pa mos pas khyab//de bzhin spyod pa yang dag ldan//phreng ldan gti mug 'joms byed ma//spyan 'dren 'dus byas thams cad ma//
76a6(rgyud): yun ring gar gyi tshogs ldan ma//rigs kyo gar ni spyod mang ngo //'jigs byed rnam par 'jigs byed dang //gaur gyi gnas byeng zhes bya ngo //gar byed rje rje
76a7(rgyud): gar byed ma//phul byung thams cad mthong byed ma//lde phung skyabs dang 'dzin byed pa//rkang gdub kyis ni bdud kyi tshogs 'joms byed//'brug gis bdag pa
76b1(rgyud): /rkang /dub kyis 'dir byed//rkang gdub kyis ni yang yang bdag chen sgrol//skyod pa'i 'dar 'dar brten pa skyel byed pa//lag pa rgod pa ji bzhon bskyod pa'o//gar gyi ma
76b2(rgyud): bas kun tu sdud byed ma//rdo rje gnyis ma sa yi gar//de bzhin ni de ki si ri//zas chen gar mi'i gsang ba ste//de bas nga ni gsang ba'i bdag/hA hA hA thA ta pa kA sa
76b3(rgyud): rA mA ra hUM/rnal 'byor chen po spyan 'dren ma//gus ldan ma dang sprul byed gzhan//'phrog ma 'joms byed gzhu ma dang //snying po bdud ma sgra sgrogs ma//pheg rdob
76b4(rgyud): 'dzin dang drag po dang //gzhan yang rdo rje ldan par bshad//rta ga'i tshogs ni drug ldan ma//'od tshogs kyis na mitshan mo 'joms byed ma//seng ge yin nga ro sgra
76b5(rgyud): sgrog pa//rta yi sgra sgrogs sgra gcan ma dang ni//gzhan yang gsang ba lcag pos khrus byed ma//sna tshogs ha ha sgra yis 'phrog bdag mo//spyan bzang yangs ma gsang ba
76b6(rgyud): ston byed ma//gzhan yang 'dab pas dga' ba nyid byed ma//gzhan yang spyan yangs ud pal gyis rgyan ma//sprin 'joms byed bcingaso sa rnams kun 'joms ma//
76b7(rgyud): seng ge'i bzhin rol gong nas go rims ldan//de 'dra'i 'khor ni dam pa dang ldan pa//gzhon yang gsang ba'i yid las gtam sgrogs pa//de bzhin rims gyis dge
77a1(rgyud): legs nyid byed ma//n+yA hUM n+yA hUM d+ha ri d+ha ri/ma hA shi rI sha ya na shra yi ra kaM mA ta sa twa sa ta sa tra kaM/de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba rdzogs so//
77a2(rgyud): dri yi dkyil 'khor zhugs nas ni//'dod pa'i yon tan lnga mchog gis/rnal 'byor pa ni rol byed na//des ni dngos grub thob par 'gyur//gsang ba'i mdo//
77a3(rgyud): yi dbang bshad pa'i//sems can spyod pa ji lta bu//yang gsungs pa/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga bshad pa//gsang ba yi ni rab bsgrub pa//dang por de bzhin gshegs/
77a4(rgyud): pa'i rigs//sgrub pa yi ni rol par bya//b+ha ga tso yin brjod par bya//'joms pa b+hu ga zhes su brjod//gang du nyon mongs 'joms byed pa//shes rab lus
77a5(rgyud): 'joms nyon mongs pa//de bas shes rab b+ha gar brjod//de bas rtags ni ci yin brjod//rtags ni mtshan ma zhes byar bshad//blo ldan shes rab rtags las
77a6(rgyud): byung //byang chub sems ni thabs chen po//de ni rtags su rab tu bsgrags//b+ha gar ling gi bcug nas su//'khor lo'i dngos grub bsgrub par bya//ting
77a7(rgyud): nge 'dzin dang gzungs gang yin//mkhas par sgo gnyis bzung bar bya//de ni bcug pa zhes bshad do//rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por 'gyur//de nas dgongs pa
77b1(rgyud): bshad pa yin//b+ha ga ru ni rdzas sgrub pa//gsang rgyud dbang po las gsungs bzhin//bsgrub pa dag ni ji ltar bya//b+ha gar bur gum phyung nas ni//mtshan ma yang /
77b2(rgyud): ni gzhug par bya//rdzas rnams bzang po thob par 'gyur//rnam pa bzhi yang 'grub par 'gyur//b+ha ga pad+ma zhes byar badz+red//mtshan ma rdo rje zhes bshad
77b3(rgyud): do//rdzas ni prad+ma'i steng bzhag nas//rdo rje srub mas bsgrub par bya//shin tu chags pas 'dod chags can//des ni gsang ba rab sgrub 'gyur//'dod
77b4(rgyud): chags chags pa'i sbyor ba yis//dngos grub chen por ji ltar 'gyur//'dir ni chags can rab sgrub 'gyur//bden pa nyid du yang dag zi shang //'dod
77b5(rgyud): chags bral ba gsang ba med//des ni gsang ba 'grub mi 'gyur//dang pa'i dad pa chen po yis//gsang ba'i sbyor ba las byung chags//sgrub pa la ni 'jug
77b6(rgyud): 'gyur ba//de yis sgrub pa gdon mi za//chags dang bral ba'i sdig pa ni//gang zhig gsang bu chags bral 'gyur//sangs rgyas byang chub spong byed pa//
77b7(rgyud): sdig chen kha na ma po che//sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu smad//chos la kho na ma tho med//de yis gsang ba rab 'grub 'gyur//rnam pa thams cad nyon
78a1(rgyud): mongs kun//'joms pa 'dod chabs mchog yin no//'dod chags zhe sdang sogs nyon mongs//rtogs dang mtshungs pa'i chos med do//skye
78a2(rgyud): dgu kun bsrad bsod nams ji lta bu//ji srid 'khor bar bcing bar du//srid pa zad parare mi 'gyur ro//'khor ba'i brtson ra 'di ru ni//sems can kun
78a3(rgyud): gyis gzhom par bya//gang zhig gzhan gyi nor 'brog pa//des ni gsang ba rab 'grub 'gyur//nor ni 'khor ba zhes bshad de//sems can de rnams
78a4(rgyud): nyon mongs 'gyur//gang zhig gzhan gyi nor 'breg pa//byang chub sems ni rab 'grub 'gyur//bud med rnams dang lhan cig rtse//des ni gsang ba 'grub
78a5(rgyud): par 'gyur//rang gi rigs kyi lha mo gang //rlig pa'i lha mo bla med dang //lhan cig rnal 'byor rol pa yis//rol pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur//
78a6(rgyud): glagral te rigs ni 'grub 'dod na//brdzun pa'i tshig kyang spro bar bya//chos kun dngos pa med po ste//brjod min tshig gi spyod yul min//med pa ga
78a7(rgyud): yin brdzun tshig ldan//rigs pa'i zla ba bden pa yin//gal te dngos grub mchog ni sgrub 'did na//sems can bsang bya de bzhin bza' bar bya//sems
78b1(rgyud): can chags pa zhes bshad de//ming dang gzugs la kun tu chags//'jug nas zos par gyur na no//bsod nams chen po thob par 'gyur//'khor ba spangs kyang chos
78b2(rgyud): min 'gyur ba ni//'khor ba spong ba gang yin pa//sems can don la rgyab phyogs 'gyur//blo ldan theg pa dman dga' ba//de ni rtag tu nyes ldan yin//mya ngan
78b3(rgyud): 'das la mngon dga' na//sems can don la phyir phyogs 'gyur//blo ljon theg pa dman dga' ba//de ni rtag tu nyes ldan yin//ser sna can ni rigs sgrubo 'gyur//
78b4(rgyud): tshul khrims rnam par dge 'gyur zhing //srog gi phyir yang gtong mi byed//rig pa'i brtul zhugs ldan 'gyur ba//des na gsang ba rab sgrub 'gyur//drag dang
78b5(rgyud): ldan pa'i sems ldan pa//des ni 'grub par 'gyur bar 'dod//sdug bsngal thams cad gcod pa'i phyir//rtag tu drug po nyid du 'gyur//sdig pa sdang ba rnams
78b6(rgyud): sbeng na//des ni gsang ba rab 'grub 'gyur//chos min spyod pa rnal 'byor mchog grub yin//gzung dang 'dzin pa chos shes pa//gang tshe spong bar gyur pa ni//rtag tu
78b7(rgyud): chos mchog spyod pa ste//des ni gsang ba rab 'grub 'gyur//srid gsum mngon par chags pas rnal 'byor sgrub//srid gsum la ni chags par 'gyur//sems
79a1(rgyud): //rnamadun rtags pa'i phyir//don rnal 'byor sgrub pa yin//rtag tu 'dangad pa'i 'dod chags rgyal 'gyur dang //gsung ba chen por brtan par gyu /
79a2(rgyud): ba yin//'dod par bya ba 'dod pa ste//'dod pa'i 'dod tshogs zhes bshad do//rab tu dga' la chags pa ste/blo ldan blo gros de la chags//gan ba khyo
79a3(rgyud): gang 'thungs nas//bshang ba cung zad bza' bar bya//thams cad dag pa'i brtul zhugs kyi//myur du dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur//gci ba rdo rje zhes
79a4(rgyud): bshad do//bshang ba pad+ma yang dag ldan//dga' ba'i chos la reg pas ni//de nas thar pa'i grong khyer 'gro/rnal 'byor chen po b+ha ga 'thung //rnal 'byor rab
79a5(rgyud): tu sgrub par 'gyur//srungs rgyas kun gyi ye shes gang //b+ha ga yi ni sgra ru spags//gang zhig bdu rtsi btung ba btung //rdo rje 'chang dang 'dra bar 'gyuraro//
79a6(rgyud): bud med sdug dang lhan cig tu//dkyil 'khor chen po rtag par bya//rigs kyi lha mo rnal 'byor byung //reg pa sdug pa nyid yin te//dkyil 'khor gsang ba
79a7(rgyud): brtag byas na//skad cig de la rang 'grub 'gyur//khro zhing gtum la drag po ste//rdo rje yi ni rigs su 'gyur//gang zhig sdug bsngal rnams la khro//
79b1(rgyud): 'khor ba'i sgor 'byung las sdung ba//rdo rje rnal 'byor phun tshogs 'gyur//rigs ni nyams pa 'gyur ba yin//dge ba thams cad spangs nas ni//chos min pa ni
79b2(rgyud): yang dag spyod //bya min byed pa'i rnal 'byor pas//las kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub par 'gyur//rnam par rtog pa kun spangs nas//dge ba la ni rab tu 'jug
79b3(rgyud): chos la lta bar gyur pa nyid//chos min kun tu spyod mi bya//bya mini gang zhig dngos med de//de nyid brtag par byed par 'gyur//rnal 'byor chen po de lta bus//
79b4(rgyud): rtog pa chen pos rab 'grub 'gyur//rtog pa thams cad bsdusau pa'i drug pa gsang ba'i tshogs chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po shin tu
79b5(rgyud): gsang ba'i rnal 'byor rdo rje rtse mo las rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po 'i dgongs pa rnam par 'grel pa zhes bya ba rnam par bshad pa gsum pa rdzogs so////rtog
79b6(rgyud): pa thams cad bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos mchog gsang ba'i chos kyi mchog tu gsang ba yang
79b7(rgyud): rdzogs so////sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//dus gsum gshegs pa sras bcas la//yang dang yang du phyab
80a1(rgyud): 'tshal nas//mchog tu rmad byung rig pa'i rgyud//mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya//hUM a dza kra ra/d+hA ra ho d+ha ra sa/oM a dra nA ha ha he wa ra/
80a2(rgyud): d+hI d+had+hA/d+hI d+hA ra NaM/ma he to raM/kakl-iN/ka bats+yai Ta/de la gsang ba mchog tu gas //ye shes dam de'i rang bzhin te//rgyal po gsang ba'i mdadabang
80a3(rgyud): po//theg pa chen po kun tu bsdus//rigs 'byung blo ldan chen po dang //sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung ba dang //rdo rje kun dbang cho ga ni//shin tu rmad 'byung rab
80a4(rgyud): bshad bya//ngo bo nyid kyi sku ru ni//sangs rgyas rdo rje cen kun 'byung //rmad 'byung chos kyi rgyud chen po//thar pa mchog tu ston pa ste//thub pa'i dbang phyug rnam snang
80a5(rgyud): mdzad//thugs ka nas ni rgyud 'di 'byung //kun tu bzang po'i rdo rje'i bdag/phyag na rdo rje 'od po che//rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che//don yod dbang phyug dam pa ste/
80a6(rgyud): theg pa chen po byang chub sems//bden pa dam tshig ces bya ba//thub pa chen po chos phung po//stong phrag dag ni grangs med gsungs//rdo rje sems dpa' mchog chen gyi///
80a7(rgyud): chos kyi mngon par rtogs pa bshad //so sor rtogs pa'i mngon rtogs dang //de bzhin mngon par byang chub dang //dpe byad mchog ni mngon du byung //de bzhin ye shes
80b1(rgyud): thob pa nyid//ye shes chen po'i chos 'don//sangs rgyas kyi ni mngon rtog bshad//theg pa chen po mngon rtogs yin//shin tu gsang ba'i tshul chen po//rang sems sa su
80b2(rgyud): rtogs pa ni//byang chub sems dpa'i tshul chen po//pha rim byin drug spyod pa mchog/theg pa chen po mngon par bsdus//mthar thugs ste sa chen po//sangs rgyas
80b3(rgyud): ni bla na med//theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs//ye shes thob por rtogs byed pa//spyod pa bcu yi byang chub che//pha rol phyin pa dam pa bcu//sa bcu kun tu rtags pa
80b4(rgyud): ste//theg pa chen po mngon par bsdus//byang chub chen po rgya che ba//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i mchog/kun ma byon ye shes rdzogs byang chub//theg pa chen po
80b5(rgyud): mngon par bsdus//mngon par byang chub rnam po lta//sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med//theg po chen po chos kyi mchog/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang //chos
80b6(rgyud): kyi gnas ni yongs su 'gyur//sangs rgyas chos dang cho ga gyo chog/tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu dang/mkha' mnyam dang ni mtshungs pa yin//gnas ngan len
80b7(rgyud): ni kun las grol//rnam par rton pa kun las grol//nyon mongs dri ma kun dag pa//dang por bri ba bzhin du mthong //thugs rje'i brtse ba yang dag byung //sems
81a1(rgyud): can yongs su 'dzin par byed//byang chub sems ni dag pa che//sangs rgyas ning ni gos pa med//dge ba'i chos kyis kun tu gang //nyon mong
81a2(rgyud): thams cad nges par 'joms//zla chen gang ba'i dbus su ni//byang chub zla ba gnyis pa ste//bskal pa grangs med gsum byang chub//yang dag blangs las
81a3(rgyud): byung ba nyid//dam pa'i chos mchog grangs med pa//sbyin pa'i spyod pa mchog dang ldan//sa dang sa ru rtogs byed pa//ye shes dag pa zag pa med//zla ba'i
81a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbus su ni//de ni rdo rje shin tu brten//sangs rgyas kun gyi skye gleng yin//snang ba med cing gnas med pa//ma skyes ma byas dag pa ste/
81a5(rgyud): skye dang 'jig pa rnam par spangs//mi tshig mi chod mi phyed pa//lhag ma med pa'i chos kyi sku//rdo rje'i bdag nyid yang dag byung //rdo rje'i sku ni bla na med//sku dang
81a6(rgyud): gosad pa de bzhin spyod//spyod yul kun tu rtogs pa dang //lnga po de dag kun thun mong //sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid can//mngon par byang chub rnam pa
81a7(rgyud): lnga//chos kyi ye shes bla na med //lnga po de dag gsang zhes bya//snying por yang ni de dag gsungs//gang phyir don kun grub pa'i phyir//sngon ni don kun grub
81b1(rgyud): ra byed//bcom ldan kun tu bzang po dang //rdo rje'i las ni bla na med//rdo rje'i dbyings ni brtan pa'i budag/rnam par snang mdzad bla na med//de dag gsang ba'i mtshan yin
81b2(rgyud): te//rnal 'byor gyi ni gnas skabs thob//de nas snying po ni/oM tsat+ti pra ti bo dz+ha kA ro mi/oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ut+pA dA yA mi/oM teSh+Tha badz+raM/oM badz+ra At+ma ko&haM/oM ya thA
81b3(rgyud): sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sta~M thA a&haM//de nas sangs rgyas thams cad nyid//thub pa yi ni thugs kar bzhugs//de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsung //rdo rje'i rig pa 'di
81b4(rgyud): brjod do//oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a b+hi saM bo d+hi Di D+ha badz+ra tiSh+Tha//sangs rgyas grugs chen thams cad kyis//rig pa 'di ni brjod pas na//rnam par snang mdzad thub chen
81b5(rgyud): po//de nyid ye shes mngon sangs rgyas//de nas sangs rgyas thams cad ni//nyid kyi thugs las byung bar gyur//chos bzhi'i rnal 'byor chen po ni//byin nas lha/
81b6(rgyud): mo dbang bskur 'gyur//sems can kun don yang dag ldan//bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs byed//mkha' mtshungs brjod los yang dag byung //rin
81b7(rgyud): chen chen pos dbang bskur 'gyur//sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes dang //shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul//rnam kun mkhyen nyid ye shes che//'jig rten
82a1(rgyud): /dbang phyug chen pa byin//bya ba kun la don yod pa//dgar ldan pa sogs rnam par 'phrul//gdul bar bya ba thabs kyi las//sangs rgyas kun
82a2(rgyud): gyi byin gyis brlabs//sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba gang //byang chub sems ni tshul chen po//nyon mongs kun las rnam par grol//sangs rgyaso gci bo
82a3(rgyud): chen pos byin//dbang bskur tsam gyis mod la ni//gsang ba'i ming ni yang dag byung //sangs rgyas kun bdag rgyal po ste//kun mchog dbang bskur dam
82a4(rgyud): pa'o//de nas snying po ni oM sar+b+ba ta thA gra ta e shA dz+yaM a b+hi Shi ka hUM/de nas sangs rgyas rgyal po ci//chos ni mngon sum gyur mdzad pa//stug po'i gnas nas
82a5(rgyud): gshegs nas ni//sangs rgyas lhan cig sna tshogs che//rnal 'byor dang bcas bdag nyid che//rdo rje'i dbang po'i gnas su gshegs//de nas ngo bo nyid sku
82a6(rgyud): las//slar yang byung ba spros par 'gyur//sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las chen po//ci bzhin sngon gyi rjes 'brangs nas//rdo rje'i dbus su bzhugs par 'gyur
82a7(rgyud): sngon gyi sangs rgyas mdzad pa bzhin//sangs rgyas kyi ni mdzad pa bstan//gsang ba rol pa'i 'khor lo ru//sku ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i mchog/sangs rgyas
82b1(rgyud): thams cad bdag nyid che//sna tshogs rnal 'byor bdag nyid che//'khor lo thams cad bzhugs par 'gyur//phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad du//ci bzhin/
82b2(rgyud): sngon gyi rjes 'brangs nas//sangs rgyas rol pa yang drag ldan//sangs rgyas ston pa bzhug par 'gyur//dus gsum ye shes rjes 'thun ni//sangs rgyas kyi ni
82b3(rgyud): rnal 'byor brjod//hUM badz+ra satwa/oM badz+ra rat+na thA hrI badz+ra d+harma/a badz+ra kAr+m+ma/bskal pa grangs med gsum sngon du//bcom ldan byang chub mdzad pa gang //rnal
82b4(rgyud): 'byor sems dpa' bzhir bcas pa'i//rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor snang bar bgyi//byang chub chen po chos kyi mchog/byang chub sems ni tshul chen po//rdo rje sems
82b5(rgyud): dpe'i rang bzhin gyi//zla ba yi ni dkyil 'khor snang //pha rol phyin pa spyad pa ni//sngon du bcom ldan spyad pa gang //rdo rje rin chen sbyor ba yis//zla ba yi ni
82b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor snang //theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs//chos kyi mchog ni rab rtogs pa//rdo rje chos kyi sbyor ba yis//zla ba yi ni dkyil 'khor snang //sems
82b7(rgyud): can smin cing grol bar byed//sangs rgyas mdzad pa rab tu 'jug/brtson 'grus dang ldan las chen po//zla ba yi ni dkyil 'khor snang //byang chub sems ni
83a1(rgyud): gsung chen po//bsod nams tshogs dang shes rab dang //byang chub spyod pa rab sbyor ba//rgyal po bzhi ni rab tu 'byung //go cha'i sbyor ba gang yin
83a2(rgyud): dang //spyod pa de bzhin mngon rtogs te//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub tshe//rgyal po bzhi ni rnam par byung //byang chub snying po mngon rtog dang //sangs
83a3(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur dang //chos kyi 'khor los btul ba dang //rgyal po bzhin rnam par byung //chos mchog mngon par rtogs pa dang //ting nge 'dzin sgra
83a4(rgyud): gzungs dang ni//sangs rgyas thams cad thabs chen po//rgyal po bzhi ni rnam par byung //rgyal chen rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang //de bzhin chos ni mngon rdzogs
83a5(rgyud): dang //chos mchog byang chub chen po dang //rnam pa bzhi ni yongs su byung //mgon po thugs ka nas spros nas//rgyal po bzhi ni rnam par byung //phyogs
83a6(rgyud): rnams thams cad kun nus ni//sa ni thams cad g.yos byas nas//phyogs rnams thams cad kun nas ni//'od kyi snang bas gsal bar byas//mgon chen
83a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis//ched du brjod pa ched brjod do//e ma'o gsang ba'i chos chen po//e ma'o ye shes bla na med//e ma'o rol pa'i 'khor lo'o/
83b1(rgyud): oM na ro sangs rgyas rmad byung che//e ma'o sangs rgyas thabs chen po//e ma'ongo mtshur ldan pa nyid//mi snang rang bzhin chos rnams ni//'di ni snang ba bcas par dmigs//
83b2(rgyud): rgyal po rnal 'byor che de rnams//phyogs rnams kun tu gsal byed cing //chos kyi sku yi ting 'dzin brnyes//nam mkha' dang mtshungs rmad byung ba//gang zhig shar
83b3(rgyud): phyogs che ru//sangs rgyas grogs pa chen po kun//rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che//chos kyi dbyings su yang drag spros//chos kyi sku ru spros nas ni//chos
83b4(rgyud): dbyings ni stug por 'gyur//gang phyir shir du yang dge byung //mi spyod pa ni bdag nyid byas//b+hai ru rdo rje rin chen to//nub tu rdo rje chos yin no//byung du
83b5(rgyud): rdo rje las nyid do//chos kyi sku ru ldan par 'gyur//mU lus mchog tu brton pa yi//sangs rgyas thams cad phyogs bzhi ru//mi bskyod rdo rje rin chen dbang //
83b6(rgyud): deni yod grub pa bla na med//rgyal po bzhi ni phyogs bzhi ru//rdo rje'i steng du zhugs par 'gyur//phyogs dang phyogs mtshams bzhi dag tu//mnyam par dmi
83b7(rgyud): nas zhugs par 'gyur//rdo rje rnal 'byor rgyal po che//sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag bsdus//chos dbyings postan pa'i ngo bo nyid//gsang ba kun du khyab par
84a1(rgyud): bsdus//dbus su mgon po rnam snang mdzad//sangs rgyas thams cad dbang bskur ba//phyogs dang mtshams kyi sangs rgyas kun//rten par
84a2(rgyud): mdzad nas rab tu bzhugs//gdug pa kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal//thub pa'i skyes mchog mi ba skyo ba//sangs rgyas thams cad brtan mdzad nas//shar
84a3(rgyud): phyogs su yang dag bzhugs//dbang bskur ba ni rgyalnga po che//nam mkha' thob pa'i skyes mchog ni//sangs rgyas thams cad brtan mdzad nas//lho yi
84a4(rgyud): phyogs su bzhugs par gyur//dag pa'i chos 'dzin rgyal po che//chos 'dzin pa tso bo chen po ni//sangs rgyas thams cad brtan mdzad nas//
84a5(rgyud): nub kyi phyogs su bzhugs par gyur//sangs rgyas mdzad po 'dzin rgyal po//don snod grub pa bla na med//sangs rgyas thams cad brtan mdzad nas//byang
84a6(rgyud): gi phyogs su bzhugs par gyur//mI spyod rdo rje sems dpa' ste//mkha' snying rin chen 'byung ldan yan//'jig rten dbang phyug 'od dpag med//
84a7(rgyud): rdo rje las ni don yid grub//gsang zhing shin tu gsang ba mchog/chos dbyings brtan pa gang yin pa//de nyid mgon po rnam snang mdzad//sangs rgyas
84b1(rgyud): kun gyi bdag por bshad//sangs rgyas thams cad phyogs bzhi ru//sbyin pa bzhi ni rab tu bshad//phyogs mtshoms drug ni brtan mdzad nas//rnam par snang
84b2(rgyud): mdzod yang dag ldan//shAr gyi sangs rgyas dbang phyug rgyal//rdo rje sems dpa' 'jig mi mnga'//thub pa mi bskyod snang ba des//snying po bzhin gsungs par
84b3(rgyud): 'gyur//hUM badz+re satwa/dza badz+ra rA dzA/ho badz+ra d+h+r-i ga/sa badz+ra swen+d+he/dam tshig sems dpa' zhes bya ba//de bzhini rdo rje sems dpa' sogs//'jigs pa
84b4(rgyud): mi mda' sems dpa' bzhi//mgon po yini thugs las byung //phyag ni rdo rje bzang po mchog/rdo rje lcags kyu chen po bsnam ste//rdo rje chags pa bdud
84b5(rgyud): chen po//rdo rje legs pa rdzu 'phrul //rdo rje rgyal po bzhi thub pa//thub pa'i thug ka nas byung ba//grang bzhi dang ni sbyin pa dag/'khor lo'i rim gyi bzhugs par/
84b6(rgyud): sbyar//rdo rje n+te rmen+d+ra m+b+hal ba//rin chen 'byud ldan ra grags pa//lU ya~M b+h+r-i dag blo sangs rgyas kyiso//snying po bzhinI gsungs par 'gyur//oM badz+ra rA/
84b7(rgyud): mi badz+ra ti dzo//tre badz+ri ki tu/ha badz+ra hA sa/rdo rje rini chen stobs pa che//grangs pa ni dang ni yang dag ldan//rin chen rgyal po las byung ba//thub pa'i thugs kan mo//
85a1(rgyud): byung ba//rdo rje rin chen rin po che//rdo rje gzi brjid rdzu 'phrul che//rdo rje rgyal mtshan shin tu mthong //rdo rje bzhad pa rdzu 'phrul rje//de dag ra
85a2(rgyud): re las kyang ni//rgyal po grangs med rab tu byung //g.yas dang g.yon drang rgyab dag dang //dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun du bzhugs//dag pa'i chos ni ye
85a3(rgyud): shes che//de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med//shes rab pha rol phyin dag pas//snying po bzhi ni gsungs par gyur//hrIHbadz+ra d+harma/d+h+waMHbadz+ra
85a4(rgyud): tISh+Tha/maM badz+ra he tu/raM badz+ra b+hU Sha/chos kyi rgyal po bzhi yang ni//mgon po'i thugs ka nas byung bya//sems can kun la phan don du//'khor lo rim+bi
85a5(rgyud): bzhin bzhugs par gyur//chos rnams kun lta don yod pa//spyod pa ya si ni sleb dpon ma cho ga/don yod grub pa rgyal po ches//snying po bzhi ni gsungs
85a6(rgyud): par 'gyur//kaM badz+ra kar+m+ma/hUM badz+ra rak+Sha/hUM badz+rA yak+Sha/baM badz+ra muSh+NI k+Sha/kun kyang 'khyer lo yang dag ldan//ye shes dam pa mchog gi rnams//
85a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul 'khor lo ni//chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i mchog/sngon gyi byang chub sems gang ni//rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par byung //
85b1(rgyud): sdu ba'i dngos po bzhi pa ni//rdo rje rin chen nyid du 'gyur//shes rab pha rol phyin dag pa//de ni rdo rje chos mchog ldan//thabs la mkhas pas 'khor lo na/
85b2(rgyud): rdo rje las su rnam par 'phrul//de nas chos ni rdzogs sangs rgyas//chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i rten//byung gyur byung dang 'byung bar 'gyur/sangs rgyas mdzad pa
85b3(rgyud): bla na med//byang chub sems ni mchog tu 'dzin//dag pa'i chos kyi 'dul mdzad pa//chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po che//dbu ma'i chos las rnam par byung //
85b4(rgyud): gzhan yang rjes su brtse dang de bzhin sbyin//shes rab thabs dang yang dag ldan//chos kyi rgyal po bzhi po de//rnam par snang mdzad thugs las byung //'du
85b5(rgyud): shes 'du shes med pa min//btags pa ma yin gnas pa med//bdag dang chos nyid lta ba min//rnam rtog las ni byung ba min//ngo bo nyid kyi sku//
85b6(rgyud): ru ni//so sor snang ba yang dag byung //longs spyod rdzoms pa'i sku yis ni//chos kyi longs spyod 'di lta bu//thams cad brjod pa dang bral zhing //zhi dang phra
85b7(rgyud): blta bar dka'//sangs rgyas rnams ni dgongs mdzad cing //sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul mthong por 'gyur//de nyid theg pa tshe rang bzhin//mdzod chen po yi rang
86a1(rgyud): bzhin mchog/shes rab chen po thabs chen po//rdeg pa chen po'i mngon par bsdus//sangs rgyas ye shes mngon par rtogs//sngon du bcom
86a2(rgyud): ldan mdzad gang yin//sems dpa' bzhi po de rnams te//theg chen mngon par rtogs par 'dod//byang chub kyi ni sems de las//thub pa mi bskyod rnam par
86a3(rgyud): byed//sems de yang ni rnam pa bzhi//rnam pa bzhi ni yang dag byung //byang chub sems gang de rdo rje//rdo rje phyag na rdo rje yin//sgrol dang grel dang dbugs
86a4(rgyud): 'byin pa//lcags kyu 'dzin pa rab tu gnas//sems dpa' bstan pa don yod pa//ye shes de nyid shin tu chags//slar yang bstan par bya ba'i phyir/
86a5(rgyud): logs pa las ni yang dag byung //gang zhig mgon po thub 'byin pa//sems can rjes su 'dzin mdzad pa//rin chen 'byung ldan zhes bya ba//de ni slar yang
86a6(rgyud): rnam pa bzhi//chos kyi sbyin pa rin po che//mi 'jigs gzi brjid yang dag gnas//byams pa rgyal mtshan yang dag brjod//zang zing bzhed par yang dag ldan//shes
86a7(rgyud): rab pha rol phyin rgyal po//tshe dpag med ni rnam pa bzhi//so sor reg pa mngon par rdzogs//ting nge 'dzin sgo pad+ma can//sdug bsngal gcod pa shin tu no//chos kyi
86b1(rgyud): 'khor lo tshe dang ldan//sangs rgyas kyi ni rnam 'phrul gzhan//brjod du med pa'i chos kyi mchog/don yod grub pa mdzad pa ste//thabs de yang ni rnam pa ba zhi//sems can la sogs
86b2(rgyud): 'dul ba las//rdo rje las ni mchod pa che//theg pa gzhan du mi 'jug pa//rdo rje srung byar rab tu brjod//gdug pa gdul zhing nges byed pa//phyir mi ldog pa khu tshur yin//de nas
86b3(rgyud): 'di rnams kyi gsang de'i mtshan ni rdo rje sems dpa'/rdo rje rgyal po//rdorje chagas+yA//rdo d+ha legs pa/rdo rje rin chen/rdo rje gzi brjid/rdo rje na lo mtshan//rdo rje band pa/rdo rje chos
86b4(rgyud): rdorje rnon po/rdo rje rgyu/rdo rje sgrub/rdo rje legs/rdo rje srung ba/rdo rje gnod sbyin/rdo rje khu tshur/de lnga dang po ni rdo rje sems dpa'/rdo rje chesgra/rdo rje rin chen/rdo rje las/de nas rnam
86b5(rgyud): grangs mi bskyod pa/rin chen 'byung ldan/'ad dpag tu med pa/de na yod par grub pa/de nas 'di rnams gseng ba'i snying po ni/hUM oM A he/rgyal po'i snying po ni hUM hrI ho/bcu
86b6(rgyud): drug gi snying po ni hU~M dza ho sa/oM A tAM ha/oM d+h+waM maM r-i/kaM haM hUM baM/shin tu gsang ba'i rgyud chen po 'di'i pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa rnam pa bcu drug su yang dag par byung bya gang
86b7(rgyud): yin pa de ni rdo rje pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa'o//byang chub spyod pa'i mthu yis ni//sangs rgyas nyid kyis pha rol phyin//de nas pha rol phyin ldan pa//rdo rje sems mar brjod par bya//
87a1(rgyud): bsgrub yin dngas byon//smo sar rtag pa mngon par rdzogs//chos bani gcig tu gyur pa ni//rdo rje rin chen ma brjod//gsang ba'i chos kyi ye shes //
87a2(rgyud): de nyid pha rol phyin pa mchog/pha rol phyin pa che las byung //rdo rje chos mar brjod par bya//sbyor ba yang dag shes pa gang //rdo rje las mAr brjod par bya//rgyal po phra
87a3(rgyud): rol phyin bzhi no//rdo rje pha rol phyin pa mchog/gang phyir rnam par rol pa mchog/sgeg mo sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin//rgyan pa'i lus can yid 'phrog pa//phreng ba tshul khrims
87a4(rgyud): pha rol phyin//ched du brjod pa tshod du brjod//glu ma bzod pa'i pha rol phyin//myur du sangs rgyas ster byed po//gar ma brtson 'grus pha rol phyin//'dod pa'i 'dam gyis//
87a5(rgyud): ma gos pa//me tog bsam gtan pha rol phyin//kun tu mtshungs par 'gro ba yi//gdug pa shes rab pha rol phyin//dri nga mi dge las phyir phyogs//thabs ni dri
87a6(rgyud): dang yang dag ldan//phyogs rnams kun tu snong byed pa//smon lam snang ba chen mo yin//thob pa'i pha rol phyin zhes pa//stobs kyi pha rol phyin pa mchog/mi shes/
87a7(rgyud): mun pa 'joms byed po//lha mo ye shes pha rol phyin//bdud rnams thams cad pham byed pa//lha mo mi thu bo pha rol phyin//byang chub rdzogs pa'i byang chub che//
87b1(rgyud): rdo rje'i pha rol phyin pa'i tshul//chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad ma//bdag med chos kyi rang bzhin mchog/rdo rje'i lha mo yang dag byung //rdo rje pha rol phyin pa mchog/de nas
87b2(rgyud): 'di rnams kyi gsang ba'i ming ni/rdo rje sems ma/rdo rje rin chen ma/rdo rje chos mA/rdo rje las ma/rdo rje sgeg mo/rdo rje phreng ba me/rdo rje glu me/rdo rje gar ma/rdo rje me tog me/
87b3(rgyud): rdo rje gdug pa ma/rdo rje dri ma/rdo rje mar me ma/rdo rje tho ba ma/rdo rje ye shes me/rdo rje mi thub ma/rdo rje yas ma/sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs chen po//rnam pa bzhi no rab tu 'jug
87b4(rgyud): sems can da dug pa'i thebs chen po//rdo rje lcags kyu zhes byar bshad//byang chub spyod pa la spyod la//rdo rje zhug par rab tu bsgrags//theg pa gzhan la 'dod med pa/
87b5(rgyud): de ni rdo rje lcags sgrog bshad//chos rnams thams cad skye ba med//rab tu 'a gsal bzod nas zhi//rdo rje theg pa thog chen po//rdo rje dril bu zhes byang brjod//de nas
87b6(rgyud): 'di rnams kyi gsang ba'i ming dag ni/rdo rje lcags kyu/rdo rje zhags pa/rdo rje lcags sgrog/rdo rje dril bu/de nas pha ro tu phyin pa'i thabs kyi 'khor lo de dog thams cad
87b7(rgyud): snying po ni hU~M traM hrI ho//rdo rje pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi'o//dzaHhUM baM ho/'khor lo'i rol pa la gnas pa//sangs rgyas rnal 'byor 'di yis ni//chos kyi longs spyod
88a1(rgyud): /rdo rje can//chos sgyu bla na med par 'gyur//dbus kyi sangs rgyas sangs rgyas bya ni//'khor lo lnga dang yang dag ldan//rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug/
88a2(rgyud): kun+da//rnal 'byor ting 'dzin 'thob mdzad pa//re re zhing yang rdo rje ni//grangs med pas kyang yongs su bskor//chos dang longs spyod rdzogs lhas byung //dgra
88a3(rgyud): pa'i tshwasa? kyi tshul chen po//de nas de rnams kyi snying po ni/oM satwa bAdz+dzi/oM rat+na bidz+nyA/oM d+harma bidz+dzi/au karma bidz+dza/oM byAdz+nyo lA s+ya/A~M badz+rI mA le/aM
88a4(rgyud): badz+ra gI ti/oM badz+ra nr-i ti/oM badz+ra pum+ma/oM badz+ra d+hU paM/oM badz+ra gan+d+he/oM badz+ra A lau ke/oM badz+ra a~M ku sha/oM badz+ra pA sha/oM badz+ra s+pho TA/oM badz+ra g+har+b+he
88a5(rgyud): de nas 'di dag thams cad kyi thun mong gi snying po ni hU~M/mgon po rnam par snang mdzad che//'khor los bsgyur ba chen po bzhi//sems dpa' chen po bcu drug dang ///
88a6(rgyud): gsang chen lha mo bcu gnyis dang //sgo srung ba ni bzhi dag ste//sum cu rtsa bdun las mi nyung //gsang ngo ba'i lha mo bzhi po ni//phyis kyi pha rol phyin pa mchog/
88a7(rgyud): gsung ba'i lha mo kun las ni//rjes thogs nyid du yang dag byung //byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid ches//sum cu rtsa bdun bgrong mi bya//rnam par snang mdzad
88b1(rgyud): bug ka nus//chos kyi rigs mchog yang dag byung //byang chub sems las kun tu byung //mi bskyod la sogs tshogs chen po//nga yi rdo rje rigs su brjod//phyag na rdo rje/
88b2(rgyud): bdag nyid che//sbyin pa'i spyod pa kun tu byung //rin tshon 'byung ldan la sogs pa//nga yi rin chen rigs su bshad//rin chen rdo rje bdag nyid che//sbyin po spyod pa
88b3(rgyud): kun tu byung //dge pa'i chos la kun tu byung //tshe dpag med pa la sogs pa//de ni pad+ma'i rigs su bshad//rdo rje tsha snga ni bdag nyid che//grub pa'i lus lus kun tu
88b4(rgyud): byung //don yod grub pa la sogs lnga sa//de ni las kyi rigs su bshad//nam mkha'i mdzod ni las chen po//rdo rje ji bzhin lha mo yang //lha mo ji bzhin bstan te
88b5(rgyud): 'dra//ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin zhi//ji ltar zhi ba de bzhin byung //rdo rje sems dpa' mi bskyod mtshungs//shar gyi phyogs su yang dag bzhugs//rdo rje rin che ni rAn
88b6(rgyud): chen mchog/lho yi phyogs su yang dag bzhugs//rgyapo 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon//nub kyi phyogs su yang dag bzhugs//bya ba kun la don yod pa//bying
88b7(rgyud): phyogs su ni bzhugs par 'gyur//dbus su mgon po rnam snang mdzad//kun mkhyen ye shes rnal 'byor che//zla ba gang ba bzhin du zhi//rdo rje 'khor lo bla na med//gang
89a1(rgyud): phyir kun tu sngon 'gro ba//rdo rje byang chub sems don ldan//de la sra spyod pa de las chos//de las spyod pa spyad dka' ba//sems dpa' chen po bla
89a2(rgyud): med pa//rdo rje rnal 'byor bzhugs par 'gyur//sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung gcig gis//mgon po la ni gsol ba btab//thub pa'i dbang phyug rdo rje sems
89a3(rgyud): mgon po la ni gsol ba 'debs//rdzogs pa'i byang chub khyod rag lus//khyod la brten nas de bzhin gshegs//sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun//khyod la
89a4(rgyud): brten nas byung bar gyur//drang po'i thugs ni rnal 'byor che//byang sems shin tu rnyed dka' ba//kye ma sems canu 'di sdug bsngal//sangs rgyas chos kyi snod
89a5(rgyud): min pa//sems can kun gyi don ched du//'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dam pa gsungs//de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin//kun mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug
89a6(rgyud): gis//mgon po'i gsung ni gsan nas su//'khor lo'i sbyor ba gsungs par 'gyur//de nas yang dag bshad par bya//'khor lo chen po grong khyer che//
89a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs las byung //snying po'i chos mchog rnal 'byor ldan//sangs rgyas rdo rje'i bstan pa yi//sems can 'di dag gdul bya min//de rnam
89b1(rgyud): da ba'i dran tshad du//rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bshad par bya//rdo rje slob dru don cho ga'i tshul//bdag nyid ji bzhin rnal 'byor byas//sangs rgyas byang chub thab 'gyur ba//
89b2(rgyud): dri la dang por rab bshad bya//de ru sems can thams cad kun//shin tu brtan par rab 'jug na//sangs rgyas byang chub rdo rje nyid//tho bo 'gyur de la the tshom med//
89b3(rgyud): theg pa chen po mngon par bsdus//sangs rgyas byang chub shin tu gsang //thar pa mchog tu bstan pa nyid//sngon du gzhung mchog mnyan par bya//bskal pa brgya
89b4(rgyud): phyag dag tu ni//ji ste mngon par brtson byas kyang //gang zag bzhi ni 'jig rten du//sbubs kyang 'grub pa nyid mi 'gyur//byang chub sems ni mA skyes dang //the
89b5(rgyud): com ldan pa nyid dang ni//bka' bzhin du ni mi byed pa//dad pa med nyid 'grub mi 'gyur//ji ltar dus gsum gshegs de bzhi ni//byang chub tu ni sems skyed nas//
89b6(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la dang byas te//the tsam med par byed pa'i mchog/khyim pa dang ni rab tu byung //phyogs ni gnyis po 'dis sgrub bya//ji ltar 'os shing mtsham
89b7(rgyud): pa ru//go rim bzhin du rab bshad bya//byang chub sems ni lhur blangs nas//lha gzhan 'dod pa brtson mi bya//dkon mchog go sum la dang bya ste//de gzhon pa
90a1(rgyud): la brtson par bya//srog gcod sku dang 'khrig pa dang //rdzun dang myos byed rnam par spang //khyim pa'i sdom pa la gnas nas//de tshe rig pa'i rgyal po/
90a2(rgyud): sgrub//gal te de ni rab byung gyur//sdom pa gsum la yang dag gnas//so sor bar dang byang chub sems//rig 'dzin sdom pa mchog yin no//zla ba'am
90a3(rgyud): yang na lo ra'o//de bzhin yang na lo gcig tu//gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na//sngun du rig pa'i brtul zhugs bye//nyin re zhing ni ci nus par/
90a4(rgyud): bran gsum du ni cho ga sgrub//rtog pa 'di ni thun bzhi ru//ji ltar 'os shing 'tsham par ni//sdig pa thams cad bshags par bya//bsod nams kun la
90a5(rgyud): rjes yi rang //sangs rgyas kun la gsal ba gdab//de yi bsod nams byang chub sngo//de bzhin phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi//spangs rgyas bla med bams
90a6(rgyud): cad la//gsol ba gdab cing rab btud nas//zhabs la mnyam gzhag phyag bya'o//ji skad gzhung rgya che las gsung //phyag rgya bzhi ni sbyor ba yAs//rgyud
90a7(rgyud): gzhan dag ni thams cad kyi//rdo rje'i sngags ni rab brjod bya//de la snying po ni 'od yin te/oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzo bis+tha nA ya At+ma ni nir+yA ta yA mi sarba d+hitrAM/
90b1(rgyud): ga tA badz+ra sAt+ma a d+hi tiSh+Tha swa mAM/oM sarba ta thA gA ta pU dza a bi Sho kA ya At+ma naM niR+YA tA yA mi sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA badz+ra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsA mau/oM sarba ta thAg+na ta pU dza pra h+yA nA ya At+ma/
90b2(rgyud): naini nir+yA ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+harma prA bar+t+ta yaM mr-i.oM sUrba ta thA gA ta pU dzA karmaM Na AMt+ma naM ner+yA taM yU mi sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra karma ku ru mAM/phyag rgya dang ba ces cho ga ra ny+dzan//
90b3(rgyud): yang dag nyid du rab bshad bya//sor mo thams cad sbyar ba ni//rdo rje thal mo rab tu brjod//sa phyogs gtsang mar 'dug nas ni//mkhas pas yan lag kun phyag/
90b4(rgyud): bya//rdo rje thal mo rkang nas ni//rgyal ba rnams la dbul bar bya//mgo bos de bzhin byas nas ni//mkhas pas bral bas phyag bya'o//mgo bo nas ni phab byas nas/
90b5(rgyud): de bzhin kha yis phyag bya'o//de bzhin snying kar bzhag byas nas//spyi bo nas ni phyag bya'o//cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni//rdo rje rnal 'byor pas phyag bya//
90b6(rgyud): slar yang tshag la gonas te//mchod pas tshi ga dang ldan pa//spos dang me tog mar me dang //dri dang phrang po byug pa ni//sangs rgyas rjes su dran byas nas//sems
90b7(rgyud): can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin//sbyin pa rnam bzhi'i sbyor ba yis//ci nus par ni mkhas pas dbul//gtsang zhing gtsang ma'i go so dang ldan//gtsang ma'i grogs
91a1(rgyud): dang lhan cig tu//rdo rje'i sdom pa bla myed pa//bslab pa'i gnas ni blang par bya//sbyin pa rnam da di'i sbyor ba yi//dad cing dri la rab gzhol bya//sa
91a2(rgyud): rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang //slob dpon yang ni phyi mo yin//nyin re zhing ni ci nus par//khrus bzhi dag ni rab tu bya//rnal 'byor ji ltar khrus bya bo//go rim
91a3(rgyud): bzhin du rab tu bshad//sdom pa sum la rab tu gnas//dang po khrus su brjod pa yin//gnyis pa rgyud las gsungs pa yi//bshags dang gsol
91a4(rgyud): ba 'debs la sogs//phyag rgya bcing ba gsum pa ste//bzhi pa chu ste tha ma yin//khrus kyi cha ga 'di yis ni//mkhas pas 'dir ni khrus bya'o//gos
91a5(rgyud): ni lan gsum brje ba yi//sgrub pa pos ni cho ga bya//sdom pa la na legs gnas pa//gos ni dang por brje ba dang //gnyis pa cho ga sgrub pa dang //gsum
91a6(rgyud): pa ngo tsha khral yang pa//gtsa nga ma'i gos ni gsum po dag/lan gsum du ni brje bar bya//gang la kha na ma tho med//thams cad bza' zhing sten par
91a7(rgyud): bya//sha dang 'chang dang sgog pa sogs//bza' ba min pa rnam par spang //dring ba dang migatsang nyod//bza' dang btung ba rnam par spang //gzhan la
91b1(rgyud): gnod pa dang ldan pa//lus kyi phyir yang bya ba min//'khrig pa bdun dang yang dag ldan//mi sdug sgom pas spang bar bya//yid gzhungs mkhas shing gsal ba dang //
91b2(rgyud): theg pa chen po'i don sems pa//byang chub sems dpa' tshul rgya che//shes rab pha rol phyin la sogs//klog pa drong ni bsam pa dang //yang dag yang du gsol
91b3(rgyud): ba gdab//dgra dang grogs dang bar me la//sems snyoms mi 'jigs rab tu byin//snyan cing bden par smra ba yis//zhe sdang 'joms byed byams pa sgom//
91b4(rgyud): chos dang gang zag bdag med cing //'dus byas dang ni 'khrul pa tsam//bla ljono brtag pas brtag par bya//'dus byas kun la rmongs mi bya//'tsho ba'i srog/
91b5(rgyud): gri phyir yang na//byang chub sems ni dor mi bya//rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya rnams//nam yang dor bar mi bya'o//byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/shes rab
91b6(rgyud): dril bu zhes bya gzhon//slob dpon la ni rnyas mo bya//bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam//sbyor ba lhod par mi bya zhing //cho ga ston pa lhur blang bya//pha rol/
91b7(rgyud): phyin drug spyod pa la//go rims bzhin du brlab par bya//sems can gyi ni don ldan pas//byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad//kha na mi tho chung ngu
92a1(rgyud): yang //srog ni btang snyoms dor mi bya//khyim pa 'am rab tu byung ba'ang rung //'dris pa thams cad rnam par spang //bu dang chung ma dag la yang //sred pa'i kha
92a2(rgyud): ba las grol bya//brkam zhing chags la sdang ba dang //rmongs zhing le lo ldan pa'ang min//ngag yod shin tu brtson pa yis//rnal 'byor cho ga sgrub par bya//lta ba kun las/
92a3(rgyud): rnam par grol//de nyid las ni legs par mthong //dge zhing dgongs pa bshad pa yis//don shes don ni rtogs par 'gyur//rigs dang mi rigs cho ga shes//
92a4(rgyud): de nyid rnal 'byor shin tu mkhas//brtse ldan byang chub spyod par ldan//spyod pa rnams la rab tu mkhas//de 'dra'i tshul ni sna tshogs dang //de lta bu yi sgrub pa
92a5(rgyud): yis//dngos grub dang ni thar pa mthob//dngos gru bo kun la the tshom mod//gnas dang gos dang bza' ba yi//lhag pa thams cad rnam par spang //lha rnam
92a6(rgyud): bgom par mi bya zhing //bya ba ma yin thams cad spang //le lo med par nyin re zhing //bsrung ba yi ni chog bya//bgegs med 'jigs par mi bya ste//rang
92a7(rgyud): sems 'di ni gdul bar dka'//pha dang ma ru 'dzin pa dang //bram ze dge slong de dag 'dra/dag cang du la la zhi ba dang //bsdams shing thar par shes pa dang //
92b1(rgyud): rgyurgyal srid mtho ris longs spyod min//'dod pa'i longs spyod 'phel phyir min//gzhan du sems can don gyi phyir//rdzogs pa'i byang chub nges byas pa//zas kyi tshod ni
92b2(rgyud): shes pa dang //mtshan mo gnyid kyang sad par bya//'dod chags skyon la sogs pa gzhan//sems kyis rnam par myi brtog go/sems ni rab tu dang byas
92b3(rgyud): nas//g.yo ba med cing des byas pa//legs par smra zhing rab tu 'byod//chos ni nges par don gnyer byed//mngon spyod kyi ni bya ba bzhin//sems can
92b4(rgyud): gnod dang 'tshe mi bya//nye sa ldan gdug pa'i sems can rnams//dkyil 'khor du ni gzhug myi bya//lha yi sku dang phyog mtshan dang //lha yi bzhon pa dag
92b5(rgyud): dang ni//dman mr-i lha yi grib me dang //lha yi mtshan ma thams cad dang //bza' ba dag ni sna tshogs pa//mtshan mo'i gzugs su byas pa dang //'gom
92b6(rgyud): par mi bya bza' mi bya//nemA yang brdzi bar mi bya'o//dkon mchog gsum dang 'brel pa'i zas//nam yang nye bar longs mi spyad//ba na phul dang dman
92b7(rgyud): ma yi//dri yang bsgom par mi bya'o//ri bo'am ni nags kyi nang //gtsang zhing yid 'ong dben pa 'am//chu bo'i 'gram 'am bskyed mes tshal//ni'u sing shin
93a1(rgyud): tu yid 'ong 'am//lha khyang gtsang ma nyams dka' 'am//khang pa gtsang ma dpon pa'am//gang du tshogs pa med pa ru//sangs rgyas la//
93a2(rgyud): dmigs sems kyis ni//gtsang nu'i grogasu dang lhan cig tu//de 'dra'i gnas su 'dug nas ni//thar pa mchog tu bstan pa nyid//rig pa'i brtul
93a3(rgyud): zhugs yang dag brtsam//thun bzhi drag tu sbyor bya yis//mgon po mchog la phyag bya zhing //sangs rgyas rjes dran sgom pa pos//bshags pa la
93a4(rgyud): sogs de bya'o//mchod pa nyid kyang ci nas bya'o//gzhan yang phyag rgya yang dag bcing //mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad ni//phyogs kun du ni yang
93a5(rgyud): ngag spro//sa bzhi dag ni me lus nyid//kun nas rin chen shing ldan dang //rnam pa sna tshogs mchog ldan dang //rgyal ba rnams la dbul bar bya//
93a6(rgyud): me tog shing dang bdug pa dang //dri yi tshogs ni yid 'ong dang //rin chen rang bzhin rgya mtsho ni//thub pa'i dbang phyug rnams la dbul//de nas
93a7(rgyud): phyogs rnams thams cad du//me tog bdug pa la sogs sprin//rol mo'i tshogs ni yid 'ong ba//mchod pa'i sprin ni rnam par bsam//mchod
93b1(rgyud): pa thams cad rab byed pa//rig pa'i rgyal chen 'di rnams dang //phyag rgya dag kyang yongs gsal ba'i//bsam pa yis ni bzung bar bya//oM sarba ta thA ga ta
93b2(rgyud): puSh+pa pU dza mau b+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/oM sarba tA thA gA tA byaMk+ShaM pU dzaM mai g+ha sa mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/oM sarba ta thA ga ta gan+d+ha pU dza me g+ha sa mu dwe sA rA Na/
93b3(rgyud): ya hUM/gang du rgyal chen me tog dang //bdug pa dang ni dri yi tshogs//de bzhin kun tu yang dag sbyar//tha na rgyan spel rnams kyang ngo //mchod pa'i
93b4(rgyud): phyag rgya tshul chen dang //phyag rgya chen po bslab par bya//theg pa chen po bsdus pa las//ji skad rgya tshan gsungs de bzhin//sems can thams
93b5(rgyud): cad bskyab pa dang //bde ba chen po'i rgyu dang ni//'gro ba gsum las grol ba'i phyir//de lta bu yi bsam pa bya//'dar ni lha rnams thams cad kyi//
93b6(rgyud): bag medo nye bar zhi ba dang //mi rnams sdug bsngal sna tshogs pa//rab tu mthar phyin de bzhin nyid//theg pa dman par 'dod byed pa//'khor ba rnam par
93b7(rgyud): gzhol ba'i phyir//rdo rje rnal 'byor bde gnyid ches//'di de bsam par bya ba yin//bdag gi bsod nams stobs dag gis//bde ba thams cad
94a1(rgyud): chags kyi mchog/sems can thams cad dang chen ldan//ma lus par ni grub gyur cig/sems can thams cad bde gyur cig
94a2(rgyud): 'byung po kun la byams par shog/dud 'gro thams cad 'jigs med shog/ngan song thams cad ni gyur cig/bde ba chen po 'di bsams nas//sdig
94a3(rgyud): pa dral ba bcang bar bya//sdig pa thams cad dral byas shing //de bzhin ngan song thams cad do//phyogs rnams thams cad sangs rgyas kun//yang dang yang
94a4(rgyud): du rjes dran nas//gsang ba'i mdo sde ma lus pa//yang dang yang du bklag par bya//mi ldog byang chub sems dpa' ru//gcig tu 'gyur 'dod sems
94a5(rgyud): kyis bya//rdo rje rnal 'byor bla na med//rnal 'byor chen po bsgrub par bya//zla ba 'am yang ni zla bo drug/lo gcig gam ni de las gzhan//rig pa'i
94a6(rgyud): brtul zhugs 'di 'drar bya//phyag rgya thums cad yang dag byi cing //sangs rgyas rnams la nyin re bzhin//nges par lha bshos dbul bar bya//lbu bshos
94a7(rgyud): snang ba ster byed pa//de bzhin rog po'i lha bshos la//rdo rje gnod sbyin khro bo che//thams cad du ni rjes dran bya//'ching ba'i sbyor ba'i cho ga ni//rdo rje/
94b1(rgyud): khu ra gyi brtan bya//rdo rje go cha'i sbyor ba yis//dkyil 'khor kun tu bsrung bar bya//de lta bu yi cho ga yis//rnal 'byor bya ba bsgrub par bya//srung ba byas shing
94b2(rgyud): btsunu 'grus brtsam//stobs tshon spro ba bskyed pa yis//nyin ro zhing ni brtags nas su//rtog pa'i dkyil 'khor bsam ster bya//sku mdog dkyil 'khor
94b3(rgyud): ji bzhin par//ji ltar 'os shing 'tsham pa ru//dgug pa la sogs las rnams ni//thams cad mnyam par gzhag par bya//ci nus par ni nyin re zhing //
94b4(rgyud): rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni//mtshams meng lnga po byed pa yang //lo gcig nA ni rab 'grub 'gyur//theg pa chen po tshogs nang na//mchog 'gyur rdo rje
94b5(rgyud): sems dpar 'gyur//rgyud gzhan gyi ni tshi ge dang //mdo sde dang bcas ca bzhin du//de nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs blang //sdom pa'ang dor bar mi bya
94b6(rgyud): zhing ///kha na ma tho rdul rtsam yang //'gyod pa ru ni bya ba yin//gnas ni yang dag brtag par bya//tsher ma la sogs dang bral ba//ri bo 'am ni dgon
94b7(rgyud): pa'am//lha khang bskyed mos tshal dang ni//chu yi 'gro ma dang 'brog dgon par//gang du phyogs ni phyogs gtsang mar//gseg ma gyo mo bong ba dang //
95a1(rgyud): rdo ba dag ni bsal bar bya//shin tu logs par dag bya ste//phung phyir lha rnams yongs su 'dzim//gal te de ni sbyor lhong gyur//rnam pa
95a2(rgyud): kun tu 'jigs mi bya//sangs rgyus thams cad rgyal po tshwa//chos kyi bdag po dgongs pa can//thugs rje snying por ldan gyur pa//sangs rgyas nyes par
95a3(rgyud): 'dzin mi 'gyur//gnas ni kun tu dag bya zhing //dkyil 'khor yang ni ci nus par//rgya ru dpag tshad tsam bya ste//khru drug las ni dma' ba min//
95a4(rgyud): sten la phur bu gadrab bya ste//rdo rje lta la sogs pas bcing //de nas yo byad thams cad ni//cho ga mchog gis blang bar bya//rdo rje slob dpon rang
95a5(rgyud): nyid 'dir//dkyilo 'khor dgra ni bsgrub par bya//bral ba la sogs du sau ji bzhin//mkhas pas dkyil 'khor brtag par bya//ji ltar nus
95a6(rgyud): shing spro ba dang //ji ltar rdzas ni 'byor pa dang //de bzhin rnal 'byor chen pos bya//yang na sems kyi rtag par bya//tswi ste sgrub pa rgyal po 'gyur//
95a7(rgyud): cho ga gzhan gyi blo ldan pas//gol te dngos grub mchog 'dod na//dkyil 'khor dag ni dag par bya//mtsho ni rtse lnga dang yong dag ldan//
95b1(rgyud): khru ni stong dang ldan pa mchog/yang na rgyang grags tshad tsam du//sa yi tshwa ni thig gdab bya//gal te 'byor pa ldan pa min//khru bzhi mdo ru sdus pas bya//
95b2(rgyud): yang na phyogaso rnams thams cad du//khru brgyad dang ni yang dge ldan//in dra nI la shin tu sngo//tshon rtsi sngon pa rab tu bya//pad+ma rA ga shin tu dmar/
95b3(rgyud): tshon rtsi dmar po zhes byar bshad//rdo rje chu dang chu chen po//ser po yang ni yang dag ldan//dag cing dang bri'i gser dang ni//kha dog ser po ldan par bya//
95b4(rgyud): shin tu dag pa shel dang bas//tshon rtsi dang yang dag ldan//gang phyir rgyal po nor chen ldan//tshon rtsi 'di dag yang dgra bA shad//phyug cing nor dang
95b5(rgyud): yang dag ldan//gal te de ni khyim bdag gyur//khru brgya yongs su tshang bar bya//bcu drug las ni nyung mi bya//tshon rtsi dri dang yang dag ldan//gur
95b6(rgyud): gum la sogs dang bsres pa//tshon rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan//mkhas pa yis ni dkyil 'khor bya//phyugo cing nor dang yid dag ldan//tshang dben
95b7(rgyud): yong ni ded dpon nam//khyim pa 'byor pa dang ldan pa//gzhan dag dga' zhing 'ongs gyur na//rin chen phye ma dang sres pa'i//chen rtsi chen po rab tu
96a1(rgyud): /bya//rams dang ba bla la sogs pA//tshon rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan//bdag nyid chung ba 'am cho ba'am rung //de yi 'byor pa rtag bya/
96a2(rgyud): ba//ji ltar rig par nges par sbyar//rgyal po la ni tshad bshad pa//khyim bdag la yang de bzhin no//tshong dpon dang ni ded dpon gyi//khru ni lnga/
96a3(rgyud): bcu nyid kyang ngo //gzhan dgo dga' zhing 'ong gyur na//khru ni nyi shur byas pa yin//gralpa te dngos grub sgrub 'dod na//khru drug las ni chung ma
96a4(rgyud): bya//mang po de bzhin nyung ba yang //dI dang kun tu yang dag ldan//rtag tu sna tshogs dri yis ni//sten dus gzhi dag par bya//phyi rol
96a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ngos dag gri/grA ni bzhi pa thams cad du//shes rab can gyis bdug spos sreg/gang phyir rdo rje can dag gshegs//de nas
96a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gnas de ni//sngags kyi gsang ba'i dri chu yi//rtag tu legs par chag chag gdab//gang phyir rdo rje rang bzhin 'gyur//nyin zhag drug
96a7(rgyud): gam bdun brgyad dang //mar deng 'o ma 'bras can nyid//slob dpon zas ni dkar gsum bza'//yang na thun mongs gyur pa'i zas//ci ste bzed ldan
96b1(rgyud): nyin mtshan du//mi bza' bar ni bsgrub par bya//gang phyir chos kyi rang bzhin zas//stobs ldan gyur par the tshom med//dkyil 'khor mchog ni rgyal
96b2(rgyud): chen po//gang yin bsam pas bya ba'o//bco lnga la ni brtsams nas su//gnyis pa'i nye la rdzogs par bya//yang na mar gyi ngo la ni//bcu
96b3(rgyud): bzhi la ni yang dag brtsam//bco lnga la ni thub par bya//legs pa ru ni/rdzogs par bya//yang na tshes brgyad nas brtsams te//tha ma nyal kun tu
96b4(rgyud): bri//yang na bcu bzhi la brtsams te//nyin zhag gnyis par yang dgu bri//yang na bco lnga de yi ni//snga dro de yi yang dag brtsam//tshul chen po deng
96b5(rgyud): metshung pa yis//dkyil 'khor shes rab can gyis bri//gang gi chos nas brtsams nas su//ji srid rdzogs par ma gyur par//galnga te kun nas mI/
96b6(rgyud): bza' bar//brtson 'grus chen pa brtsam par bya//dri dang bcas shing legs byas pa//yang na dkar gsum bza' bar bya//gang phyar rgyal ba'i rdo rje//
96b7(rgyud): 'dzin//byin gyis brlab par mdzad par 'gyur//bsod nams che zhing bkra shis pa'i//nyin zhag dag pa gang yin pa//de la rdo rje slob dpon ni//skal
97a1(rgyud): pa chen pos dkyil 'khor brtsam//sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas nas//dbus kyi cha ru 'dug par bya//sangs rgyas thams cad
97a2(rgyud): la dmigs nas//sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom//sems ni yongs su 'dzin byed pa/lus ni drang por byis nas su//bshags la sogs
97a3(rgyud): pa'i las rnams ni//thams cad sngon du bya ba yin//byang chub seMs brtson 'gyur cing //rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad pa yis//phyogs bcu ru ni
97a4(rgyud): phyag byas nas//bdag nyid kyang ni spro ba skye //deng ni bde ba 'bras bur bcas//bdag gi 'tsho ba'ang 'bras bu yod//sangs rgyas rnams dang /
97a5(rgyud): dongom tshig gis//deng ni srid par mnyam par 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' rtse gcig pa'i//sems kyis phyir mi ldog par 'gyur//de bzhin/
97a6(rgyud): gshegs pa'i rigs 'byung ba'i//bdaga' gyur bar ni the tshom med//deng byadag nyi ma dam pa ste//deng ni bdag mchod bla na med//
97a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas//dong bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yin no//de ltar dga' ba dang ldan pas//de nas dbus su 'dus
97b1(rgyud): gyur nas//spos kyi ring bu lag thogs pas//sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bya//sems ni dga' zhing mgu ba yis//tshig ni 'di skad brjod par bya/
97b2(rgyud): yan lag kun gyi rab btud de//sangs rgyas kun la gsol ba gdab//ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi//sang+yas bdag la dgongs su gsol//rdo rje bdag
97b3(rgyud): ming 'di zhes bya//bdag ni dkyil 'khor 'dri bar 'tshal//sangs rgyas la sogs kun gshegs te//dngos grub 'di ni bdag la gsol//tshig ni de skad brjod/
97b4(rgyud): nas su//sems dpa'i skyil krung bcu' bar bya//chos tshun po la snyoms zhugs nas//bdag nyid ting 'dzin dang ldan bya//gal te nus na skal pa ches/
97b5(rgyud): yang na sems kyi sgrub par bya//rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog/ting 'dzin zhes byi ci 'dra dang //rdo rje'i gzugs dang ldan pa la//rnal 'byor pa yis
97b6(rgyud): snyoms 'jug bya//ya na rnal 'byor gang rung la//nus na snyoms par 'jug par bya//sems ni mnyam par bzhag 'gyer bya//go rimaso bzhin du
97b7(rgyud): bshad par bya//bcom ldan sngon ni ci 'dra ba'i//byang chub sems dpa' nyid 'gyur ba'o//de 'dra bar ni bdag rang nyid//rnal 'byor don sems bsam pa
98a1(rgyud): bya//dka' thub sdom pa sna tshogs pa//bdag gi bya bar bsam par bya//sangs rgyas 'dus pa chen po ni//steng gsuM pa ni bas par bya/sangs rgyas/
98a2(rgyud): bskul ba bla na med//shes rab can gyi bskul ba bsam//sangs rgyas kun la phyog byas shing //ci 'dod pa ni bka' nod bya//nges par zla ba'i dkyil lokho/
98a3(rgyud): du//rang sems so so brtag par bya//byang sems yang dag skyed nus no//dbus su zla bo brtag par bya//de nas rang gi ye shes brtag/zla ba'i dbus su
98a4(rgyud): rdo rje bzhin//rang lus rdo rje gzugaso su ste//sangs rgyas gzugs ni rang bzhin nyid//de nas sangs rgyas mngon rtogs nas//rang bdag nyid ni dbang skur bya//
98a5(rgyud): rang bdag sangs rgyas thams cad du//rdo rje rnal 'byor blta bar bya//ri rab ri yi rtse mo ru//stug po'i gnas las babs nas su//rdo rje'i gdan la 'dug
98a6(rgyud): nas su//sang sngo rgyas kyi ni rnam 'phrul bya//sems dpa' bzhi ni byung nas su//phyogs rnams kun tu yongs su spro//chos kyi dbyings ni brtan byas
98a7(rgyud): nas//phyogs bzhi ru ni dgod par bya//mtshams su rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun//bdag nyid yang dag byin gyis brlabs//phyogs bzhi ru ni sangs
98b1(rgyud): b+h+yas+yA ci//'khor lo dkyil 'khor chen po byung //'khor gyi 'khor lo dang baHsa nyid//dkyil la bar thams cad blta bar bya//sam+b+has sh+tha gsang
98b2(rgyud): po'i lha mor ban+d+haste// srung rnams ni bsam par bya//'khor lo'i dkyil la byor dag pa ni//snying po chen po rtag par bya//rang gi 'khor lo yang /
98b3(rgyud): bzugs//'khor lo lnga dang yid dag ldan//thabs rten sangs rgyas thams n+tang kyi//mtshan ni rjes su dran pa sgom//ting nge 'dzin las langs nas kyang //
98b4(rgyud): rdo rje'i lta bas blta bar bya//rdo rje sems dpe'i ting 'dzin gyis//slar yang snyoms par 'jug par bya//rnam par snang mdzad thugs dbus su//byang chub
98b5(rgyud): sems ni bsgom par to//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par ni//mgon po'i skyong kha nas gzung bya//sems dpa' kun gyi spyan sde ru//bka ni rims
98b6(rgyud): bzhin nod phyur bya//sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur gyis//rang bdag nyid ni dbang bskur bya//gsol ba btab po gas na par bya//bdag ni rgyal po'i dkyi
98b7(rgyud): 'khor mchog/chos kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni//ting 'dzin shin tu bla na med//sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas kun//kun gyis rlab pa mdzad par 'a
99a1(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin las langs nas kyang //bka' ni nyo dar gnod bya ste//rdo rje snyoms dpa' rang byed pa nyid//nam+ba yang dor bar mi bya'o//skyil kru
