99a2(rgyud): mngon par rtogs//rdo rje'i tshig ni brjod par bya//bdag nyid rang nyid rdo rje can//rdo rje sems dpa' bdag rang nyid//bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che//
99a3(rgyud): bdag ni stobs chen rdo rje cani//bdag ni rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgya lnga//bdag na phyag na rdo rje mchog/oM badz+ra satwa hUM/rdo rje yi ni gsang sngags 'di/

99a5(rgyud): par yang dag gnas//bo snyams bcas rdo rje gsor nas ni//rdo rje bsnyems tshul ldan par bya//slar yang bdag nyid go ba go zhing //bdag nyid dbang ni
99a6(rgyud): bskur bar bya//rdo rje gnod sbyin phyag rgya yis//'gregs rnams thams cad bcad par bya//lag nyed pa yi phyag rgyu yis//bgegs rnams tha
99b1(rgyud): cad rab tu mnye//rdo rje gtun shing nyid kyis ni//bgegs rnams thams cad brdung bar bya//rdo rje ral gri rab rno bas//bgegs rnams thams cad gtub bar bya//
99b2(rgyud): rdo rje che ba drag po yis//bgegs rnams thams cad dbug par bya//rdo rje bzang po'i phyag rgya yis//bgegs rnams thams cad gzhom par bya//rdo rje ral
99b3(rgyud): gle'i phyag rgya yi sde//bgegs rnams thams cad gzhag par bya//rdo rje mche ba rab grags pos//bgegs rnams thams cad bza' bar bya//rdo rje lcags
99b4(rgyud): sgrogs phyag rgya yis//bgegs rnams thams cad bcing bar bya//rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis//bgegs rnams thams cad dgug par bya//rdo rje
99b5(rgyud): zhags pa'i phyag rgya yis//bgegs rnams thams cad drang bar bya//rdo rje mdung thung phyag rgya yis//bgegs rnams thams cad dbug par bya//rdo rje
99b6(rgyud): 'byebs pa'i phyag rgya yis//bgegs rnams thams cad skyel bar bya//rgyas pa yis ni tsi nus par//lus rnams tha~Md dgug par bya//bgegs ni 'ga'i yang

100a1(rgyud): cung gsal//rnam rtog las ni bgegs rnams 'byung //gdul bar dka' bA'i sems gzung zhing //'dod pal+la ni smad b+har b+ha//sngon du rjes dran
100a2(rgyud): nasna brtsams te//yang na rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur//bcom zhing nges par bcad nas ni//yi ge hUM gri skyug par bya//rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya yis//rdo rje ra
100a3(rgyud): bcing bar bya//d+haM mdzad rdo rje snumasna bye zhing //de ni rdo rjer byas skor//rdo rje sems dpa' phyug rgya //dkyil la bar ye dag b+hin+de rlobs nas/

100a7(rgyud): tshogs tshon gyis kun tu khyab//dri bcas tshon du spang bya zhing //chos kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdob bya//de nas de ni yang dag bshad//dkyile 'khor
100b1(rgyud): mchog ni chen po ste//sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba mo//sangs rgyas brtan pa'i rdo rje can//sems can 'di rnams gdul bya mon//bsod nams ya
100b2(rgyud): shes rgya mche che//tshogs ni kun tu mu bsags pas//bsod nams tshogs dang mi ldan zhing //sangs rgyas 'byung la chags dong bral//sems can de rnams//
100b3(rgyud): mos bya'i phyir//dkyil 'khor chen po bstan pa yin//sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang ldan pa//de nas dkyil 'khor 'dzin du 'jug/yang na bsod nams dag
100b4(rgyud): gi tshogs//de ni rang nyid kyi mthong 'gyur//gang phyir tshogs bcas longs spyod dang //chos kyi sku ni bla na med//rdo rje'i dam chos las byung ba'i//sangs
100b5(rgyud): rgyas 'byung ba 'dzin du gzhug/gal te de ni tshogs bsags gyur//sngon du sangs rgyas rjes su mthong //dkyil 'khor sbyor ba la gnas te//sangs

100b7(rgyud): 'odir 'dug smos ci dgos//gang phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//'di ni gsang ba mtshungs med pa//'di ni theg chen snying po ste//chos kyi 'khor
101a1(rgyud): lo bla na med//bskal pa grangs med pa ru byung //sa yi pha rol phyin pa mchog/glang phyir gsang ba mtho ba thob//rab tu dga' ba sgrub
101a2(rgyud): par 'gyur//gal te rnal 'byor pa de brtson//tshe 'di nyid la mya ngan 'das//rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob cing //rdo rje nyid ni the chem med//yang na mthong bcom
101a3(rgyud): gyi ni//skye ba bcu drug mya ngan 'das//rab tu dga' ba tho bo pa dang //yang na rdo rje nyid kyang ngo //sa la nyi zla ltung byed cing //de ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin

101a5(rgyud): gal te sangs rgyas nyid 'dod na//brtson 'grus chen pos brdad mi bya//tshad ni ji skad bshad pa ru//de bzhin gzhung gi rjes 'brangs nas//phyi yi dkyil

101b2(rgyud): nus phyi rol gnas dag tu//rdo rje kha khyer yang dag rten//kun tu kha khyer dang ldan pa'i//sgo ni khe khyer med pa'o//rtse mo rdo rje sngo rang bzhin//gzhan
101b3(rgyud): ni gsor gyi mdog chan dang //dmar po pad+ma lta bu dang //gzhan yang shelo lhur dkar ba dang //ren chen rang bzhin mchog kun gyis//dkyil 'khor mdzes

101b6(rgyud): mdzes pa ste//rdo rje rdo rjer yang dag ldan//rdo rje sgo srung skal chen po//bdag nyid rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin//gtumu po srung byang rnal 'byor pa//shar gyi sgo
101b7(rgyud): ru yang dag gnas//lho ru rdo rje zhags pa ste//nug tu rdo rje lcags sgrog go//rdo rje dril bu skal chen po//byang gi sgo ru yong dag gnas//'jug pa dang ni
102a1(rgyud): 'byu byung phyu//rdza g+sas ts+tsha da pa du//dmaud man m+b+ha sa b+h+yas na//dmachog de da sa slong ma 'gyur//oM badz+ri rtsAk+Shak+Sha mA
102a2(rgyud): gang gi dus su blag 'dibs /rdo rje'i dag ni pa /seM yi tshan mdzes pa//thams cad 'izhin 'gyur/ ngas
102a3(rgyud): mai ya sU tra mA ta~M kr-i ma hUM//sngon du rkyen rtsi'i bye ma la//'bar ba'i lta bas yang dag paste//badz+ra rA gA zhes brjod na//thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin
102a4(rgyud): gyur/oM d+d+hod+ha)/mnyams n+da ni thams cad dang //rgyun mnas na ma ste ste//rdo rje don chen rnams kyis smras//

102a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya//de yi nang gi rim bra ru//zhugs nis 'khor ldi de mtshungs pa//kun tu rgyu ni mnyam par bri//k+Sha ba brgyad kyis ni
102a7(rgyud): bar mdzes//rdo rje'i ka ba'i mdun gnas su/dkyila'i khor dag ni k+Sha yis r+b+ba ni//gnas sde dag ni thams cad du// gyur mo ni gong
102b1(rgyud): bya//'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni//kun tu bri zhing dgod par bya//rdo rje bsnyems tshul gyis bltas nas//rdo rje sems dpa' gzung bar bya//
102b2(rgyud): badz+ra satwa hUM/de la dkyil 'khor dbus su ni//sangs rgyas rgyal po dgod par bya//gang gA thugs las nges byung ba//gsang ba'i tshogs ni zlog cing brtan
102b3(rgyud): rnam par snang mjed rnal 'byor che//phyogs rnam kun tu rnam por gsal//gong gi thub pa don yod grub pa dgod//de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/
102b4(rgyud): las chen po khyod ga yang dag byi//kun nas phyogs ni bzhi dag tu//phyag na rang gi phyag mtshan mtshon//mdun du rdo rje las yin te//g.yas su rdo rje srung
102b5(rgyud): ba'o//g.yon du rdo rje gnod sbyin te//rdo rje khu tshur rgyab tu'o//de nas phyag mtshan bcu drug dang //dbus ma nyi shur rab bshad bya//bcu drug dbus ma'i
102b6(rgyud): shAnago rimyis bzhin du rA ba shad b+hu/ rI rigs shi rbAr+m+ma pyu/rdo rje rgyuR+sha ba dz+rA lA ba//rdo rje rin rgyunI rnon po/rdo rje pad+ma chen
102b7(rgyud): ba nga //rdorje rnan po dbus mi yin//phyag na rdo rje'i rdo rje tshe//de bzhin rdo rje'i lcags kyu 'dzin//rdo rje chags pa gizhu nyid do//rdo rje legs de
103a1(rgyud): hA/gnyis//rdo rje rin chen rin pon+ti//rdo rje gaN+Di ny+tsi m+bu ste//rdo rje rgyal mtshan rgyu la mtshon skung //rdo rje gnad pa chos rkyen gro/rdo rje chos kyi ba
103a2(rgyud): ches//rdo rje chos kyi ral gri bzang //rdo rje rgyu yi 'khor lo ma//rdo rje'i smra ba'i mi gre ste/rdo rje rnon po las chen po//rdo rje srung ba'i cho ga ste//rdo rje gnod sbyin
103a3(rgyud): mche ba che//rdo rje khu tshur sems pa ste//phyogs kyu zhugs pa lcags sgrog dang //dril bu dag ni sgo ba bzhi//rdo rje sems ma'i rdo rje//de bzhin
103a4(rgyud): chen nor//pad+ma rdo rje chos ma ste//rdo rje rnon po las mi yin//grwa bzhi dag tu gsang bre yi//phyag mtshan de rnams dgod par bya//'khor lo chen po'i phyi
103a5(rgyud): rol gyi//g+ha bzhi dag ni thams cad du//gsang ba'i mchod pa rnam pa bzhi//rdo rje lha mo yang dag bri//rdo rje sgeg ma rdor phreng ma//de bzhin rdo rje glu ma nyid
103a6(rgyud): bsnyems bcas phreng ba'i pI thang dang //glu gar gsang ba'i lha mo rnams//phyi rol dkyil 'khor mtshams rnams su//mchod pa'i lha ma yang dag bri//
103a7(rgyud): me tog spos dang de bzhin dri//mar me nub byang mtshams su 'ong //mar me la sogs spar nyid kyi//phyi yi dkyil 'khor thams cad du//bskul pa
103b1(rgyud): bzang po'i sepra dpa' che//stong ni nges par dkod par bya//mAtsha na mA ji bzhin ci rigs pas//byams pa la srogs ma lus pa//ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa yi//
103b2(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po dgo par bya//cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni//kun tu bri zhing dgod par bya//rang gi snying pos kun dang phyir//rang rang gi ni snying po
103b3(rgyud): de la snying po ni 'di rnams yin no//oM badz+ra pA NI hUM/badz+ra aM ku sha dzeHbadz+ra rA g+ha ho//bodz+r-i sA d+hu sa/dam tshig mchog gau snying po'o//oM badz+ra ma Ni/a
103b4(rgyud): badz+ra te ngo a/badz+ra ke tu hUM/badz+ra hA sa ha/badz+ra tIk+Sh+Na d+haM/badz+rA he tu ma/badz+ra b+hA ga raM/dbang gi sems dpa' dang /ye shes kyi sems dpa' chen po'i
103b5(rgyud): snying po'o//badz+ra karma kau/badz+ra rak+Sha hi/badz+ra yak+Sha hUM/badz+ra muSh+mA ba~M/las kyi sems dpa' chen po'i snying po'o//de rnams ni rab tu gnas pa'i snying po yin/
103b6(rgyud): no//de nas sangs rgyas kyi skye pa ni/dz+dzahU~Mrat+naNId+harma h+ni/karma A//l+h+wa mo rnams kyi sngar baM shang zin to//sgo skyed rnams kyi yang de bzhin no//
103b7(rgyud): che ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni//dkyil 'khor thams cad dgod par bya//de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyi las bshad par bya ste//kun nas rdo rje rnal 'byor gyis//chos kyi
104a1(rgyud): blo can gyis bri byar//dpal mchog dang po las gsungs pa'i//sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya//theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs//lan
104a2(rgyud): bdun du ni brjod par bya//phyi rol dkyil 'khor 'khor lo la//lan bdun du ni bskor bar bya//'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs par ni//mkhas pa thams
104a3(rgyud): cad blta bar bya//gaulA te tshod dam lhag kyang rung //rdo rje shugs kyis dag par bya//'khor lo chen po dag par byas//sangs rgyas rnal 'byor yang dag gzung //
104a4(rgyud): rgyal ba rnams la bdag nyid ni//dbul ba'i las ni kun tu bya//de nas yo byad thams cad kyis//dkyil 'kho ro la ni mchod par bya//ci 'byor byas ni bya ba ste//
104a5(rgyud): doman par gyur kyang nyes pa med//'byor pa ci snyed yod pa kun//go rims bzhin du rab tu dbul//bum pa gang ba 'bum phrag gam//stong ngam yang na ba
104a6(rgyud): yang rung //mar me 'bum phrag stong ngam ni//yang na stong dum brgya yang rung //dri dang spos kyi snod 'bum mam//yang na stong ngam brgya yang rung //ga pur//
104a7(rgyud): a ga ru nyid dang //du ru ka dang tsan ngan sogs//mang sbyar dri zhimo dang ldan pa//spos rnams 'di dag bsreg par bya//gser ra ma dngul gyi snod dag dang //
104b1(rgyud): las byas kyang nyes pa med//yo byad ji snyed yod pa kun//dkyil 'khor du ni bzhug par bya//de la skong bu stong phrag gam//mAr me stong bu shin tu 'bar//
104b2(rgyud): tha na mar me snod gcig ste//ma tshang gyur kyang nyes pa med//dUr ni phyar bar bye ba bre//rnga yob phreng bas rnam pA rgyun//dra ba dra ba byed paste skyes//zla ba byed pas
104b3(rgyud): nye bar mdzes//sna tshogs bzhon pa brgya 'am ni//stong phyag gcig kyang nyes po med//thams cad ma tshang gcig nyid kyang //bde bas rol mo mchog rnams bya//
104b4(rgyud): phan pa'i zas ni stong phrag dang //bye ba phrag ni rgya mtsho tshogs//bca' ba sna tshogs pa yang ste//gal te ma tshang nyes pa med//dri dang gos bzung thams cad
104b5(rgyud): dang //dri zhim pA yI byug pa dang //bya ba mchog ni/snyoms pur mdzes//bla re rnam pa sna tshogs dang //sna tshogs dri yi chus bkang ba//bum pa shin tu yid 'ong /
104b6(rgyud): dang //me tig shing ni brgya nyid dang //bzhi yang nyes par mi 'gyur ro//dri dang me tog thams cad dang //bdug pa yid du 'ong ba kun//gal te sbyor ba ldan gyur na//
104b7(rgyud): mchod pa rnam pa thams cad bya//mchod pa dang ni gtor ma nyid//ji bzhin sgrub pa pos de phul//de bzhin dngos grub rdzu 'phrul ni//mthong ba'i chos la thob/
105a1(rgyud): ///kunan nang bkrugs pa byazhin//khams snang nog bzhin du du da/sa rgya sman par dus bya'ong//mchod pa rnyeng / ra
105a2(rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yi//dbus kyi 'khor lo phyag byas nus//dbus mo btsugs te 'dug nas ni//yang dag par ni dgug par bya//sems
105a3(rgyud): dpa' rdo rje lcags kyu bcing //rdo rje lcags kyu brjod par bya//nyi shu rtsa gcig zlas bu yi//de bzhin gshegs rnams kun tu gshegs//de nas sgo srung
105a4(rgyud): ba cing s+the ni s+t+rai ni//yi ge dzi ni yongs su brjod//rdo rje rnon ni thams cad dgug/the tshom med par gshegs par gyur//rdo rje zhugs pa bcings nas ni//
105a5(rgyud): cho ga ji bzhin nges pararwa gzhug/rdo rje lcags sgrog bcings nas ni//dbang du yang ni rtag tu bya//rdo rje dral bu'i phyag rgyu yis//de dag nyid kyang dang bu par bya/
105a6(rgyud): rdo rje gnas 'i phyag rgya yi//gnas rnams kun ni dgod par bya//ci nus par ni rab tu sgragaso//de nas mchod pa rab tu bya//spos dang me tog la sogs po'i
105a7(rgyud): phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor kun la sbyar//bdag nyid dbul dang mchod pa dang //gshegs dang gsol ba btab la sogs//byang chub sems ni bskyed nas kyang
105b1(rgyud): sdom pa yang dag spyad par bya//rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya ches//bdag nyid la ni dbang bskur bya//se gol dag ni brdab bya zhing //sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu b.ru /
105b2(rgyud): srungs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun//bkug cing rab tu bcug nas ni//rdo rje lcags sgrog yod dag dbab//rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgyu las//dril ni song
105b3(rgyud): ni yang dog dbab//rdo rje ye shes bla na myed//ye shes dag pa skye bar 'gyur//sems dpa'i ye shes 'bab par 'gyur//rdo rje dbab pa yang dgra brjod//
105b4(rgyud): ste babs par ma gyur na//yi ge A yis dril bu dkrol//mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang //rdo rje slob dpon 'di lta bu//ye shes dam pa ste 'gyur
105b5(rgyud): zhing //rmad du byung ba'ang 'dis mthong 'gyur//brgya las rtsa bdun lhag pa nyid//mtshan ma'ang de las ldeg 'byung 'gyur//gzhan dag gang yang rung ba
105b6(rgyud): nyid//gal te bsod nams bskal pa che//des ni sangs rgyas thams cad mthong //yang na byang chub sems dpa' 'am//yang na rdo rje 'dzin gang nyid//
105b7(rgyud): yang na 'od zer 'phros pa mthong //hUM sgrogs 'brug gi sgra dang ni//spos dang me tog dag gi bor//ba spu langs pa la sogs byung //de nas rdo rje slob
106a1(rgyud): dpon ni//dkyil 'khor phyi rol byung nas ni//sems ma'i phyag rgya ldan gyur pas//sor mo gnyis kyi phreng bas zung //gar gyi tshul gyis
106a2(rgyud): zhugs nus ni//rdo rje gar gyi rab bskor byas//dbus kyi 'khor lo rab zhugs na sde//phreng ba nyid ni dar bar bya//phreng ba de ni gar babs pa//de dang de//
106a3(rgyud): ni skad cig grub//sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas nas//phyag rgya thams cad bcing byas na//dngos grub thams cad nges pa ru//'grub 'gyur 'di
106a4(rgyud): la the tshom med//gzhan yang de la rdo rje 'chang //byin gyi rlob pa mdzad par 'gyur//langs nas derar+ya ni bcom ldan 'das//yang na rdo rje 'dzin pa'ang rung //
106a5(rgyud): 'dar ba dang ni g.yo ba'ang rung //de bzhin yan lag 'khum pa dang //yang na tshig ni byung ba dang //ci ste hUM ni brjed pa'ang rung //nges par legs so zhes/
106a6(rgyud): bya ba//cho 'phrul bde ba chen po ni//rmad 'byung bsam gyi mi khyab ste//rdo rje slob dpon skal pa ches//mthong 'gyur 'di la the tshom med//mtshan brgya
106a7(rgyud): rtsertsi brgyad dam pa ni//de nas langs te brjod par//mgon po thub pa la btud nas//ci 'dod pa ni bka' nod bya//rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che//
106b1(rgyud): bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis//sems can kun la phan bya'i phyir//slob ma rab tu gzhug par bgyi//rgyu dang mi rgyu khams gsum gyi//sems can kun gyi bde
106b2(rgyud): gang yin//des ni rdo rje slob dpon de'i//bcu drug chur yod mi phod do//rdo rje slob dpon gyi las rdzogs///de nas slob ma gzhug par bya ste/de bzhin
106b3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po der ni me lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad 'jug tu rung ngo //
106b4(rgyud): snod dang snod ma yin pa yongs su brtag par mi bya ste/gzhug pa la mngon par zhen pa yongs su gzung bar bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sems can thams cad kyis
106b5(rgyud): mthong ba tsam gyi mod la phyir myi ldog pa nyid du 'gyur ro//drad pa med pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags pa dang /rgyud yongs su mA smin pa dang /mos pa med/
106b6(rgyud): pa mang du zin kyang 'on kyang mthong ba tsamu gyis//gang gi phyir gsang ba chen po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gsang bas
106b7(rgyud): 'dul po'i khebs dang /'khor lo'i tshul dang /pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phrul pa ston pa yin te/de'i phyir
107a1(rgyud): mthong ba tsam gyi ma la dran stong thams cad rgyun chud par 'gyur ro//rgyal po'i sras ni 'jog pa med//dran song sman bcad pa dang /
107a2(rgyud): cung thar pa la gzhol dang //phyir mi ldog pa nyid du 'gyur//dkon mchog gsum la stobs song ste//byang chub snrums ni skyed du gtsug/sems can kun
107a3(rgyud): gyi don bsams nas//sdom pa yang ni sbyin par bye//srog gcod pa dang ma byon par yin pa dang /'dod pas log par gsuM ma bI dang /brdzun du smra ba dang /
107a4(rgyud): 'bru'i chang dang /gtses pa'i tshang dang /myos par gyur pa dag/de nas brtsams te spang bar bya'o//ston la sdom pa 'di dag ni//ji ltar 'dod ci mos pa
107a5(rgyud): //mkhas pa yis ni sbyin byaste//rang dbang med par sbyin ma bya//gal te danA dang gyur no//de la sdom pa sbyin par b+he//sum pa gsum la bkod nas
107a6(rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor brtan par bya//gal te dngos grub mo cho ga 'dod na//dkon mchog gsum la skye bas song ste//slob pa lnga la rnam par gnas/
107a7(rgyud): byang chub sems la mchog brtson bya//sems can shin tu gdul dka' gang //sdom pa 'dzin par mi byed cing //dad dang ldan pa med pa'ang //'jug
107b1(rgyud): ni dgag spyi b+ha//ji ltar sangs rgyas thugs rje can//de dag gi ni sgyu ru 'gyur//mthong ba tsam gyi mdol no//sdom pa dag par 'grub par 'gyur/
107b2(rgyud): bdag nyid ngan pa'i sems can gang //khro zhing shin tu gshi ba dang //gzhang gling byed cing 'phyar yang rung //de nyid rgyu 'gyur ba yin//gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas
107b3(rgyud): r+ya//de nas yang dag bshad par bya//ji ltar 'as shing 'jam pa ru//rdo rjes ma ga zlog par bya//sbyar byin yis phyag bya //rdo rje sngags kyu
107b4(rgyud): sgom par bya//sngar bshad cho ga ji bzhin du//phyag bluzhi dag kyang bya ba yin//stong goyog gso ni da mor po dang //dmar pos mag kyang dge ba par bya/
107b5(rgyud): sna ni dmor basbyin byas te/gang phyir sangs rgyas sgro 'dzin pa//rdodza sems dpa'i phyug rgyu che//shin tu gsal ba 'ching du gzhug/snying po lan cig blodzang
107b6(rgyud): byazhid //sa ma ya~M s+t+waM zhes bya brjod//dga' zhing mgu la rat+nas pa yi//sor mo gnyis kyi phreng ba blangs//snying po 'di dag nyid sbyi ni//slob dpon chen po
107b7(rgyud): gzhug par bya//sa ma ma /sher gyi sgo yi nang du ni//ma~M ga ra ni yang dag brjod//lho ru zhags pa'i yi ge hUM/nub tu lcags sgrog pa ldan cig/byang du
108a1(rgyud): dril bu byang chub byar//yi pre a ni brjod par bya//dus phyis rol pa dang bcas pa//bkug ste phyag kyang btsal bar bya//bshags dang gso ga ga
108a2(rgyud): mchod pa dang //yongs su sngo drang rjes yi rang //bdag nyid dbul ba nyid kyang ni//go rims bzhin du byed du gzhug/deng bdag ye shes rdo rje ni//the tshom
108a3(rgyud): med par skyed par bya//khyod kyis brnyas par myi bya ste//khyod ni phung bar gyur ta re//brjod nas phreng po dor du gzhug/rdo rje phreng ba sbyin par bya//phreng ba
108a4(rgyud): de ni grang du babasra//'grub par 'gyur bar the tshom med//oM badz+ra mA lai/rdo rje tshig ni rab brjod cing //deng nas gdong g.yog dgrol bor bya//nges
108a5(rgyud): par yid ches sbyin bya zhing //dkyil 'khor ltos zhes brjod par bya//oM dra ni rdo rje sems rang nyid//sangs rgyas snying po las byung ba//rdo rje mig ni dbye
108a6(rgyud): byar bya//kyai rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ltos//dam tshig nyid ni sbyin bya zhing //sems ma'i phyag rgya steng du bcing //'di ni khyod kyi dram tshig 'joms//
108a7(rgyud): rdo rje tshig ni brjod par bya//oM ud ka tha/rdo rje gsang sngogaso 'di yis ni//phyag na rdo rjes srung bar byed//dam tshig nyid ni nyams 'gyur na//'bras/
108b1(rgyud): bu 'di ni thob myi 'gyur//'dri ni khyod kyi dramyalnga ba'i chu//dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed//dam tshig bsrung bas 'grub par 'gyur//'thungs shig rdo rje bdud
108b2(rgyud): rtsi 'thung //rdo rje sems dpa'i mna' yi ni//snying po 'dis ni gnas bsgrag dro//rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid ni//de ri'i khyod kyi snying la zhugs//gral te
108b3(rgyud): tshul ni smras na na//skad cig de la dral nas gshegs//gang zhig sdom pa mi len cing //shin tu gdul dka' dad med lo//gzhug pa tsam ni sbyin par
108b4(rgyud): bya//de la las ni mi bya'o//dkon mchog gsum la dang dang ldan//sdig la 'jigs shing rab tu bsdam//dad dang dang pa phun sum tshogs//de la dam tshig
108b5(rgyud): sbyin par bya//de lnga dam tshig gang zhe na//sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang //gtso bo de dag lhur blang bya//'tsho ba'i srog gi phyir yang ni//byang sems/
108b6(rgyud): nges par dor mi bya//lha rnams la ni smad mi bya//sngags dang phyag rgyu nam yang min//rdo rje slob drapon brnyas mi bya//blo ma spangs rgyas kun dang
108b7(rgyud): mtshungs//bzhon pa mtshon tshe phyag mtshan dang //dman ma lus kyi grib ma rnams//gya nom du ni rdzi mi bya//nam yang bza' bar mi bya'o//bdag gi/
109a1(rgyud): sngon ni ji ltar mthong //sems can gzhan la brjod mi bya//sngags dang phyag rgya sgrub pa ni//nam yang dor bar mi bya'o//sems can byasad
109a2(rgyud): par mi bya zhing //theg pa gzhan la dga' mi bya//sems can don dang 'khor ba las//na mo yang skyo bar mi bya'o//pha rol phyin drug spyod pa ni//nam yang dor bar
109a3(rgyud): mi bya'o//bya ba ma yin rtag tu spang //khyod kyi dam tshig sdom pa yin//gal te snod ldan mchog yin na//'di 'dra'i dam tshig brjod par bya//ci ste myin na btang //
109a4(rgyud): snyoms gzhug/ci ste 'dod pa bde bar bya//sbyor ba 'di deg thams cad kyis//dkyil 'khor thams cad sdus pa ru//rgyud rnams kun gyi dam tshig mchog/
109a5(rgyud): thams cad du ni sbyar bar bya//cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni//rdo rje slob ma gzhug par bya//rdo rje chos ni sgrub pa yis//dngos grub mchog kyang sbyin pa bya//gal
109a6(rgyud): te rdo rje can rang grub/mkhaso pas gzhan lo'adra slab par bya//rang nyid ye shes yang dag skyes//de bzhin gzhan la skyed par bya//dkyil 'khor mthong zhing tshe//
109a7(rgyud): ga shis//dam tshig dngos grub dang ldan pa'i//dad dang ldan pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur//'dir ni slob dpon 'gyur pa yin//de yis mchod pa byas nas
109b1(rgyud): ni//the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur//mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang //lan bdun gyis ni 'grub par 'gyur//rdo rje slob ma la brjod bya//'di las 'jig rten gzhan
109b2(rgyud): du min//sdug bsngal kun las rnam par grol//khyod 'diro rdo rje can du 'gyur//sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod sprul zhing //de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skye//
109b3(rgyud): 'khor ba'i gnas kyi brtson ra ru//slar yang sdug bsngal 'gyur ba med//deng khyod skye ba 'bras bur bcas//sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs pa ru//de ring khyod ni gyur///
109b4(rgyud): pa yin//nga la spyi bos gus pas gtugs//lus ni theg gsum pha rol phyin//mi khoms par ni skye mi 'gyur//byang chub spyod pas nyes pa med//rab tu dga'
109b5(rgyud): pa'i sa thob 'gyur//rdo rje can khyod brtson par gyis//gzhan tshe bcu drug gi thob pa//tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur//rgyal ba'i sras kyis sa thob kyang //dkyil
109b6(rgyud): 'khor gsang ba mthong ma gyur//ji ltar khyod ni deng byung ba//de bzhin theg pa yid ches min//skye dang skye ba thams cad du//rdo rje can ni mngon brtson 'gyur//
109b7(rgyud): skye ba bcu drug mthar thug pas//zhi bar sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur//rgyal ba'i gnas kyi sa thob cing //bskal grangs med gnyis dka' ba spyod//gsang ba'i
110a1(rgyud): thog pa ru ma zhugs par//bcu drug gis ni 'gyur ba yin//'byung po kun gyis mthong mi 'gyur//khams bsum rgyu dang mi rgyu ba//lha tshogs
110a2(rgyud): gdug pa thams cad kyis//rdo rje can ni dzAl+la mi non//rims gdon dug dang phyag rgya dang //mkha' 'gro la sogs 'jigs pa'i go dong //nga rgyal dang
110a3(rgyud): bcas gzhan dag gis//slar yang khyod ni zil non min//de ni bskal pa brgya ru yang //rdo rje'i yon tan nyid brjod 'gyur//gsang ba'i snying po mchog mthong 'gyur//
110a4(rgyud): nam yang 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro//sems dpa'i rang bzhin phyag rgya bcing //brtson 'grus chen pos brtan par bya//ji skad du ni brjod par bya//dbab pa blon
110a5(rgyud): med pa ste//'di ni dam tshig rdo rje ni//rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar bshad//rdo rje ye shes bla med pa//de nyid kyis ni dbab par bya//badz+ra A be sha a/de nas
110a6(rgyud): dbab par gyur pa nyid//mngon par shes pa drug thob cing //ye shes dam pa thang cig gis//sngon byung min pa'i dga' bde dang //dga' ba mgu ba mchog
110a7(rgyud): ngag dang //rig pa thams cad mngon du 'gyur//rdzu 'phrul dag ni rdzogs par 'gyur//snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni//rdo rje phyag rgya snying kar dkrol/
110b1(rgyud): sems dr-iSh+T+rIts+tshir+b+ha b+hU bau n+da//rtag tu snyid khur zhugs par 'gyur//oM tits+tshaHd+ha drar+d+ham+b+har+d+ha sha shA ta mo thA ga du mo ud+b+hi tiSh+Tha/sar+b+ba sid+d+hi m+me p+sA yan+ta hUM ha ha ha ha hoH/
110b2(rgyud): nas snying drin rnams ni//blang ba nyid ni dor byer b+hU//bAt+ti b+h+rUM to//gnas gang dri ni phreng ba badz+rIs//du yi n+ti rigs de drinagorims bzhin du de 'khar
110b3(rgyud): glus hU~M bla chen po brtan par bya//dkyil 'khor mong ba tsam gyis kyang //sbyangs rgyu smra sa ni the tshom meng //dri dang ldan zhing yid 'ong ba//bum pa'i rgyu ni blangs nas nA/
110b4(rgyud): snying po 'di yis dbang skur b+h+yo//sdug bsngal rab tu 'khrud pa'i mchog/oM badz+ra A~M b+hi Shiny+tsA/de nas phyag rgya gang rung bas//phreng ba byin nas dbang bskur bya//rdo rje
110b5(rgyud): myo ni dbang bskur la//ming gau sgra ni rab sgyur b+ha//oM badz+ra satwa a b+hi Shiny+tsa mI/badz+ra nA ma A d+hiSh+Ti kr-i ta~M he badz+ra nA ma/slob mya gtsug pa'i tshi ga rgyus pa'o//
110b6(rgyud): rdorje ye shes bla na med//dri la ye shes bsgrubi pA ra bya//bzhi las gang yang rung ba ni//rnal ba ji bzhin de bar du//gal te nor gyi dngos grub s+ho//dri ni rnam pa
110b7(rgyud): bshad par bya//nor gyi ye shes chen po bzhi//dngos grub rnams ni bslab par bya//gang na gter ni yo ba//der ni skyil mo krung bcas te//snying kar
111a1(rgyud): /bsgom pa na na//ra b+h+yo ga nas ni rab mamad 'gyur//ban+dan d+ha/mas byubyung rdo sa // 'du la na yong /
111a2(rgyud): m+bi ni ya dag pastos/nga du sa dir bskrun te/swA t+ti di skye/rnam pa bzhin pa
111a3(rgyud): bAzhin+da mthong //shin tu mnyam gau zhag dga' ba 'gyur//mun rgyug po'i rang bzhin med//sku snyed du bcug par 'gyur//badz+ra le/ba
111a4(rgyud): nyid ting 'dzin dang ldan pas//yang dang yid du dga' bar /dag nyid dga' ba'i g+ha zugs sbyin//bsgoms na da dang 'dra ba ra/
111a5(rgyud): rU bye/bdag nyid ni ma mkha'i rang bzhin mtshungs//rang bzhin med pa nyid de rnams shing // dab ba skyed b+h+yas+yA nas//steng du ma sna
111a6(rgyud): 'gyur//badz+ra Ak+Sha sha/rdo rje'i /sa ni nam mkha' la//bskum zhing steng du 'jog byas na/ji srid du ni 'jog pa'i gnas//de srid mkha'
111b1(rgyud): 'gro bar 'gyur//badz+ra ma hA/rig pa 'dzin pa 'dod smra ba//ye shes rnam bzhi sbyin par bya//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas shing //namra
111b2(rgyud): mkha' la ni bdag nyid gnas//lag na rdo rje dang ldan par//bdag nyid yongs su ba sgom par bya//rdo rje rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur//gal te
111b3(rgyud): chos kyi phyag rgya 'dod//gnas sam yang na gzhan yang rung //bdag nyid gnas par bsgoms na ni//dri ltar gnas shing lag pa ru//rdo rje pad+ma ra
111b4(rgyud): sgom zhing //bdag nyid rdo rje chos su te//pad+ma rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur//badz+ra d+ha ra/pad+ma d+ha ra/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug ste//bdag nyid lis
111b5(rgyud): dang yang dag ldan//namA mkha' la gnas bdag nyid ni//las kyi rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur//bdag nyid rdo rje rin chen dang //de bzhin du ni bdag
111b6(rgyud): nyid gnas//lag tu rIn chen rnams bsgoms na//rin chen rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur//kar+m+ma d+ha ra/rat+na d+ha ra/gal te sangs rgyas dngos grub
111b7(rgyud): smra//ye shes rnam bzhi brjod par bya//rtag tu nam mkhar bsgoms nas ni//lus ni yang ba nyid 'gyur zhing //rdzu 'phrul gyi ni gnas thob 'gyur//
112a1(rgyud): rdo rje'i bdag nyid myur du 'phar//badz+ra rad+hi/stong ga ma g+hi ni 'jig rten 'dra//thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin bstan//rdo rje'i bdag nyid nga/
112a2(rgyud): srid 'dod//de srid skad cig gis 'phar 'gyur//badz+ri badz+rI/chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dag/yan lag pad+ma dang ldan zhing //bdag
112a3(rgyud): nyid dag par rab bsgoms nas//mngon par shes pa lnga thob 'gyur//shud+d+ha shud+d+ha/nyinu mtshan brtson 'grus dang bcas pa//rdo rje sems//
112a4(rgyud): dpa' nam mkha' yi//dbyings su bzhugs par bsams na ni//rang nyid rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur//khyams gsum 'di dag thams
112a5(rgyud): cad ni//sangs rgya sA gzugs su mos byas nas//brtan par rjes su dran grub na//sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba yin//satwa satwa/bud d+ha bud
112a6(rgyud): d+ha/gang tshe gsang ba'i lha mor 'gyur//de yi rigs kyi lha ru 'gyur//ye shes dag pa brjod bya zhing //de la mAna' yang bsgrag par bya//
112a7(rgyud): ji skad gsang mdo dbang gsungs pa/de bzhini b+ha gar gzhug par bya//yid kyis thams cad btsug nas ni//de yi lus ni mnyam du spro//mi/
112b1(rgyud): bskyod thugs ka nas byung ste//rnam par snang mdzod thugs ka nas//dro yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni//sangs rgyas kun ni mnyam du spro//ting 'dzin sbyor ba la
112b2(rgyud): gnos te//mnyam par gzhag pas pheg rdob bya//rdo rje thal mo'i thig brdabs pas//dngos grub thams cad dbang du 'gyur//badz+nyA pA sha/ri na dbang
112b3(rgyud): thugs kha nas byung te//rnam par snang mdzad thugs ka nas//sangs rgyas kun ni bcug nas kyang //bdag nyid rdo rje'i lha mo ru//rdo rje thal mo byas nas
112b4(rgyud): ni//rdo rje bsdams pa'i 'thil brdab bya//rdo rje rnal 'byor bsgrub bya zhing //rdo rje ye shes yang dag brngub//rdo rje dbab pa byas nas ni//de bzhin du ni b+ha
112b5(rgyud): gar zhugs//rdo rje thal mo byas nas ni//sar mo'i rtse mos mau nyamau du brdab//'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang //rtag tu nyon mongs dang 'brel bya//nyon
112b6(rgyud): mongs zhes bya'i sgrib pa dag/skad cig gis ni rigs brgya 'joms//badz+ra ha na/de bzhin b+ha ga re gnas nas ni//sangs rgyas sku ni mnyam du spro//rdo rje lha mor
112b7(rgyud): rang bdag nyid//rnam par snang mdzad thugs kar gnas//rdo rje lha mo bcings nas ni//badz+rI brtul ni gnyis brjod//rdo rje bsdams pa nges bkral ni//TI
113a1(rgyud): bsngal thams cad 'joms pa'i mchog/badz+ro ha ra/de nas rnam par snang mdzad sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya nI//sngar gyi ting 'dzin dz+yA
113a2(rgyud): bzhin du//rdo rje dbyings ni rab tu bya//rnal 'byor lnga la'ang rab tu gnas//sangs rgyas nyid kyang rnyeng dka' min//auts+tshit+tA pra ti bo d+haM ka ro mi//au/
113a3(rgyud): bo d+hi tsit+ta ut+pA da yA mau/oM tiSh+Tha badz+ri/oM badz+ra aut+ma ko&haM/oM ya thA sarba ta thA ga ta ta thAM a haM/rnal 'byor lnga po 'di yis ni//phyag rgya lnga ni yang
113a4(rgyud): dag sgrub//rnam par snang mdzad rang bdag nyid//dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzogs pa'i byang
113a5(rgyud): chub kyi phyag rgya rnams so//sems pa'i skyil mo krung 'dug ste//rdo rje gsor la bzung bar bya//sku drang gsung thug phyag rgya dag/rdo rje sems dpa'i
113a6(rgyud): rang nyid 'gyur//badz+ra satwa haM/sgrub pa dog gi mtshig chen po//de nas yang dag bshad par bya//rang nyid rdo rje gsung gi bshad//rdo rje rnal 'byor
113a7(rgyud): sgrub par bya//snyem bcas rdo rje gsor nas ni//rdo rje skem tshul yang dag gzung //rdo rje dbab par rang gyur nas//bdag nyid rdo rje zhes bya
113b1(rgyud): sbyim//badz+ra satwa ho/rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan zhing //dkyil 'khor ma lus ston mdzad pa//phreng ba'i rnam pa 'od dang ldan//rgyun dang gos dang /
113b2(rgyud): kha dog ldan//De ba ta ni brjod bya zhing //sems dpa' chen po rjes dran bya//ye shes sems dpa' gos pa med//dga' dgra ji skyid mthong bar du//
113b3(rgyud): badz+ra satwa dr-i sh+ya/sems dpa' mngon du ltas nas ni//bdag nyid la ni yang dag dbab//oM badz+ra satwa a/sdug cing cha ba'i sku de ni//rdo rje lcags kyus yang
113b4(rgyud): dag dgug/dzaHhUM baM ho//rdo rje mi ni sngags 'di yi//bdag nyid chen pos lta bar bya//rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs ka ru//slar yang de yi snying kar
113b5(rgyud): gzhug/sa ma ya A~M/zhes brjod nas ni rnal 'byor pa//zla ba dang ldan steng du gnas//ci 'did pa yi bya ba byed//sangs rgyas nyid kyang bsgrub par bya//
113b6(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' 'di ji bzhin//de nas sbyor ba 'ad yis ni//rlung gi phyag rgya yongs 'dzin pa'i//rdo rje can kun sgom par bya//gang dag gang la mos gyur
113b7(rgyud): pa//de bzhin snying po bzla bar bya//rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di yis//rdo rje can dang mtshungs par 'gyur//sangs rgyas rjes dran rab grub nas//chas
114a1(rgyud): mkhor mo dang gad bya//rang gri phyag rgyu yongs 'dzin durmadzArdza somyas dnga'o thugs grub pas//'khor lo sgyur ba nyid thog gyu /
114a2(rgyud): rgyurgya lnga po bya ba sngon 'gro bas//mnyes pa dang ni dbang bskur bya//thun nA yongs su rdzogs pa drang //chos kyi bzhad dang dga' bar gyur//ting
114a3(rgyud): 'dzin gzungs kyi 'khor lo dang //gsang ba'i mdzod ni bla ni med//smin pA dang ni grol ba nyid//sangs rgyas byang chub ston pa'i mchog/rtog
114a4(rgyud): pa gsang tshu nu 'di las ni//phyag rgya grangs med yang dag byung //rigs kyi dbye ba yang dag ldan//rgya cher rab tu bsgrags pa yin//go n+ya ma
114a5(rgyud): bgos snod mi 'gyur//le l-i khro dong g.yeng bcas pas//nges par 'dzin por mi nus te//de bsr-i nyung bar rab tu bsgrags//mdo sde'i
114a6(rgyud): dbang po gsung rgyal po//de nas phyag rgya rab tu bshad//theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs//rin tshon stong du lte bar bya//ye shes kyi
114a7(rgyud): mngon par rtogs pa rdzogs so////rdo rje 'chang rnams kyi snying po//gang la 'khor lo yang dag byung //rna la'i byor thams cad
114b1(rgyud): kun 'byung ba//mchog tu gsang ba bshad par bya//dbus kyi 'khor lor yang dag bshad//rnam 'phrul zhes ni rab tu bsgra gas//byang chub sems dada'i rnam
114b2(rgyud): 'phrul te//'khor lo thabs ni rab ston pa//'khor lo lnga ru yang dag bshad//thabs ni rnam pa lnga yang yin//gsang rje yi ni dbye ba gnas//'khor lo yin
114b3(rgyud): rnam 'phrul ston//dbus ma gang yin byang chub sems//shar gyi sdu ba rnam pa bzhi//lho yi phyogs su bshad pa ste//bsod nams tshigs drang yang dag ldan//ting
114b4(rgyud): de 'dzin dang gzungs rnams dang //chos su 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa//nub tu yang dag brjod pa yin//byang ni sems can smin byas te//phyi rol grwa bzhi gang yin
114b5(rgyud): pa//tshad med pa ni bzhi dang bcas//byams pa snying rje btang snyoms dang //dga' bzhis ni bya bar bshad//gang zhig theg srung yang dog bshad//chos kyi
114b6(rgyud): rgyun gyi lam lus byung //lta ba thams cad rnam dag 'di//theg pa gzhan ni rnam par spangs//gang zhig kha khyer zhes bya ba//ting 'dzin chos nyid dag pa ste/
114b7(rgyud): rdo rje lha mor yang dag bshad//gzungs kyi sgo zhes bya bar bshad//sgo ru yang dag bshad pa gang //thar pa'i sgro ni bzhi po yin//rta babs dang ni dra ba
115a1(rgyud): nyid//chos mdzod rang bzhin grong khyer yin//dra ba dra phyed bla re ni//rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs rnam 'phrul pa//tshon rtsi yang dge bshad pa dang //
115a2(rgyud): de 'dra ba yi byang chub tshogs//gang zhig mar me yang dag bshad//de ni chos kyi snang ba mchog/dri ru yang dag bshad pa gang //grags pa'i dri ni bla na
115a3(rgyud): myed//rdzu 'phrul byug pa gang yin pa//tshul khrims dri yis byugs pa yin//bza' ba dag ni sna tshogs pa//chos kyi zas ni bla na med//rnam pa sna
115a4(rgyud): tshogs dga' bar bshad//rtog pa thams cad rnam par spangs//grong khyer du ni bshad pa gang //de ni thar pa'i grong khyer mchog/gang zhig dkyil 'khor
115a5(rgyud): yang dag bshad//chos kyi snying po rang bzhin grong //nad med ces ni bya bar brjod//de ni dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o//dbus su rnam snang mdzad ces pa//
115a6(rgyud): chos kun gcig tu bsdus pa yin//sangs rgyas rgyal po gtso bo che//phyogs rnams kun tu rnam par gsalo//rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bshad//
115a7(rgyud): byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin mchog/de bas rgyal po byang chub sems//byang chub sems las yang dag byung //rdo rje rgyal por yang dag byung //
115b1(rgyud): soms ni rnam pa bzhi zhes bya//sgrol dang grol dang dbugs dbyung dang //mya ngan 'dra' bar lcags kyu'o//rdo rje chags par yang dag bshad//byang chub spyod pa
115b2(rgyud): la sbyor ba//rdo rje legs por yang dag bshad //rab tu sbyor ba ston pa nyid//rdo rje rin chen yang dag bshad//sems can bsam pa yongs rdzogs shing //
115b3(rgyud): rdo rje gzi brjid yang dag bshad//chos kyi sbyor ba 'od byed pa//rdo rje rgyal mtshan yang dag bshad//sems can 'khor ba las grol byed//rdo rje bzhad
115b4(rgyud): par yang dge bshad//sems can the tshomo gcod par byed//rdo rje chos su yang dag bshad//chos kyi ye shes bla na med//rdo rje rnon po ro yang dag bshad//
115b5(rgyud): nyon mongs gcod cing 'joms byed pa//rdo rje rgyu ru yang dag bshad//'khor lo rnam 'phrul ston byed pa//rdo rje smra bar yang dge bshad//rdo rje chos ni ston
115b6(rgyud): byed pa'i//rdo rje las su yang dge bshad//sems can 'dul bar byed pa'i mchog/rdo rje srung por yang dag bshad//sems can grol bar byed pa
115b7(rgyud): mchog/rdo rje gnod sbyin yang dag bshad//'khor ba'i zhags pa za byed pa//rdo rje khu tshur yang dag bshad//byang chub mchog ni brten par byed//
116a1(rgyud): rdo rje sems ma dz+nyAHtshos//rin chen las dz+hi rdo rje ma//rdo rjerA nyan chos chen go//las kyi gsang ba las byung ba//rdo rje l+h+wa mau lhag
116a2(rgyud): pUr brgyad//pha rol phyin mchog lhag ma brgyud//chos me shes rab pha rol phyin//las ma thabs kyi mchog yin no//pha rol phyin bcu dag pa
116a3(rgyud): ni//sa bcu dag tu yod dag bshad//dam pa'i chos kyi grong khyer srung //byang chub sems dpa' zhes byar bshad//e ma'o yo shes e man
116a4(rgyud): d+hus//i ma'o thar pa'i grong khyer mchog/e ma'o rnam 'phrul 'khor lo no//thub pa'i dbang phyug dog gis bstan//chos kyi sbyor ba 'di
116a5(rgyud): yis ni//mgon pos thar par dgod par mdzad//gang du sangs rgyas rgya la gyur nas//sems can rnams kyang sgril bar mdzad//'di ni
116a6(rgyud): chos kyi rang bzhin grub//'di chos rang bzhin shing rta ste//chos kyi rang bzhin snying po ste//'di chos rang bzhin grong khyer yin//de kho na nyid
116a7(rgyud): mchog tu gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po gsang ba'i rnal 'byor chen po rdo rje rtse mo las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i med
116b1(rgyud): sde'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i rnam par bshad pa dang po rdzogs so////dngos grub thams cad bla na med//de nas gasdang ba bshad bar bya//rdo rje'i rigs pa 'dzin
116b2(rgyud): pa ni//bdag nyid kyis ni sbyar bar bya//cho ga ji lta bu bzhin du//phyag rgya bcing ba bshad par bya//ci rigs par ni bcing bya yi//gzhan du myur
116b3(rgyud): du 'grub mi 'gyur//thal mo mnyam pa bcing bya ste//sngon la thal mo mnyam par bya//de nis rdo rje thal mo bcings//rdo rje bsdams pa bcing bar
116b4(rgyud): bya//sor mo rdo rje bsdams bcing nA//snying po brjod cing dral bar bya//de nas phyog rgya dbang du 'gyur//'grub 'gyur 'dri la the tshom med//badz+ri/
116b5(rgyud): ban+d+ha tra tha/'di ni sngon du brjod bya zhing //de nas phyag rgya yang dge bcing //gang gi drung du bcings pa ni//bdag nyid yang dag byin gyis brlabs//
116b6(rgyud): sa ma ya sa tra haM/shes rab tson gyi dbab pa bsam//bdag la sems dpa' dbab par bya//dam tshig phyag rgya bcings nas ni//snying po yang ni brjod
116b7(rgyud): par bya//e phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyi ni//yan lag kun la yongs su gnas//snying po brjod par bya ba ste//snying po 'di dag nyid yin no//sa ma ya
117a1(rgyud): haM/de nas bdag nyid byin rlabs nas//rang lha yang dge rjes su dran//snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni//snying po brjod par bya ba yin//
117a2(rgyud): sa mya s+ya satwA oM d+hI tiSh+Tha sta mi/phyag rgya sgrub pa lhur len pa//de nas shis dbye can gyis smrig//dam tshig sems dpa' chen po dag/rnam pa
117a3(rgyud): bzhi ni bsgrub pa bya//de la 'di rnams kyi gsang ba'i snying po ni//ar+tha sid+d+hi/badz+ra sid+d+hi/badz+ra bir+ya//bud+d+ha sid+d+hi//de nas phyag rgya brtan
117a4(rgyud): pa ra byed pa ni//oM badz+ra satwa sa ma ya/ma nu pA la ya badz+ra sr-it+sa twe no pa tiSh+Tha/D+hau D+ho me b+ha wa/su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/a nu
117a5(rgyud): rAk+to mau b+ha ba/sarba sid+d+hi m+me pra yaits+tsha/sarba karma su tsa me/tsit+taM shri yaHku ru hUM/ha ha ha ha ho//b+ha ga wA/sarba ta thA gau ta badz+ra mA me muts+tsha
117a6(rgyud): bidz+rI b+ha l+la ma hA sa ma ya sitwa aH//mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang //rdo rje sems dpa' dang 'dra bar 'gyur//phyag rgya thams cad 'grub
117a7(rgyud): 'gyur zhing //thams cad 'grub par the tshom med//do nas thams cad dgol ba ni thun mong yin no//phyag rgya thams cad bcings nas ni//tha mar
117b1(rgyud): dag nyid dbang bskur bya//sbyor mo'i rtse mos phreng ba che//rnam bzhi yang na rnam pa gsum//oM badz+ra rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa//shes rab can gyis blo chu bcing //
117b2(rgyud): tsI nus parI ni dbang bsku /snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni//phyag rgya thams cad brten par bya//badz+rAM ka ba tsi na gi/gang nas byung ba der grol te//snying po 'di dag/
117b3(rgyud): nyid kyis ni//gan sau de ru ni dgrol bar bya//gzhan du bya ba mi byed do//oM badz+dzi muHmgron po thal mo mnyes bya zhing //rdo rje thal mo bcing bar bya//
117b4(rgyud): snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni//rdo rje nA nau kun munyes par bya//badz+ra tu Sh+ya ho//cho ga 'di yis dgrol bya ste//phyog rgya dgrol pa mchog yin no//phyog/
117b5(rgyud): rgyurgya thams cad brtan gyur nas//rdo rje can ni mnyes par 'gyur//sngo dro'i dus su nyin re zhing //shin tu bsdams shing gsang bar 'gyur//rdo
117b6(rgyud): rje sems dpa' ci 'dod bzlas//bzlas pa tsam gyis la grub par 'gyur//badz+ri satwa/gsung ba'i yi ge hUM bzlas paste//rnam pa lnga ni mthong bar
117b7(rgyud): 'gyur//gsang ba'i sbyor ba'i cho ga yis//rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub par 'gyur//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni//zla ba gnyis pa yongs su
118a1(rgyud): skyom//blu /nyid sbya sa rgyus dang ldan pa//rdo rje'i dbus su bsgom pad+ma //mdo na rdo rje'i dbus su ni//yi gau hU~M ni sgyu ba/
118a2(rgyud): //rdo rje'i sbyor bya 'di yis ni//yi gr-ihU~M nI bsgrub par/smr-i de ltar rnam pa bcu drug no//phyag mtshan thams cad rab tu sgom/bo
118a3(rgyud): dbus su rab sbyor ba ste//bdag nyid thams cad skad cig 'grub//yang na yi ge sbyor bas ni//dbus su sbyor byas bsgrub par bya//zla ba
118a4(rgyud): ni sbyor bla yis//yi ge dza sog su 'grub ma 'gyur//yi g+ni ho dang sa dang ni//yi/ sgrogasu rnapasbyor bas//zla ba la ni oM
118a5(rgyud): /yi ge hU~M nI rab tu sdug/hrI dang d+ho dang mi ba raM//kr-i ha~Mdz+nyo bi bsgrub par bya//dza'itshig ni 'di dag gis//rdo rje 'azlas pas 'grub
118a6(rgyud): par d+ha//bdag nyid rdo rje som sa dpa' ma//bcu drug bdag nyid ri ba sbyor bas//rnal 'byor rgyud du bsgrub bya zhing //zla ba'i dbus su bsgom
118a7(rgyud): par bya//de kho na bzhin du dkyil 'khor rgyu chen nyis shar ba nas po rnams te//ba de ma thi la sogs so//sa sa rgyas kun
118b1(rgyud): mchod par b+h+yo//rdo rje can rnams bzod par gsol//phyag rgya thams cad bcing bya zhing //rdo rje thal mos mnyes par bya//mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad
118b2(rgyud): dam pa ni//thams cad byas nas gdon par bya//la nau gsum dang ni lan bdun du//bskor ba dag kyang rab tu bya//rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che//
118b3(rgyud): mkhas pa yis ni dral bar bya//rdo rje sems dr-ipa'i phyag rgya che//'khor lo'i dbus su steng du bcing //gang gisau sems ni drug gyur pa//phyag rgya
118b4(rgyud): thams cad yang dag bcing //oM badz+ra muHsnying po 'odi ni brjod nas su//phyag rgya thams cad steng du bcang //sgo dang phyi rol mchod pa lo//rdo
118b5(rgyud): rje'i mu ni brjod par bya//gsang ba 'di ni gsung ba che//rdo rje'i rig pa 'a dzin po ni//shes rab can gyis kun mi bstan//sdom dang ldan pa mchog
118b6(rgyud): lel sbyin//shin tu snod ldan pha rol la//de ni rig pa'i brtul zhugs te//lagru pa g.yas su rdo rje ste//g.yon du dril bu sbyin par bya//rdo rje'i
118b7(rgyud): brtul zhugs gsang chen po//snying po 'di ni sbyin par bya//de byin snying kar 'dzin du gzhug/thams cad sgrub po'i ma chog yon no//'di de
119a1(rgyud): spangs rgyas thams cad kyi//rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na granas//khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs byartan//
119a2(rgyud): bAr bya//badz+ra su~Mtwa muH/rdo rje sleb dpon gyi bya ba rdzogs so///ji ltar cho gar rab ldan nyid//rdo rje gsung ba'i dkyil 'khor te//rdo
119a3(rgyud): 'dzin pa rgyal po che//de bzhin kun tu bsgrub par bya//rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal po che//kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa yis//rnal 'byor gyi ni rgyud
119a4(rgyud): bsdus pa//mchog tu gsang ba gsungs par gyuraro//e ma'o sangs rgyas mgon po che//spyod pa spyad phyir byung ba ste//chos kyi mgon po rnal 'byor/
119a5(rgyud): che//rgyud rnams thams cad yang dag byung //sangs rgyas myed cing sems dpa' med//rnal 'byor rnal 'byor sgrub pa med//sa dang gsang ba mchog
119a6(rgyud): med de//de bzhin gdul ba'i don du byung //sangs rgyas mchog dang dam tshig mchog/sems dpa' mchog gi sgrub pa dang //gsang mchog
119b1(rgyud): sems dpa'i spyod pa mchog/rdo rje rnal 'byor yang dag byung //yon tan mchog dran du mchog rnams kyi mchog/yon tan mchog dran dbu rgyun dam pa
119b2(rgyud): ste//grags chen dang ldan spyod pa mchog 'dzin pa//yon tan mchog ldan rnams kyi spyod pa mchog/rdo rje chen po rab bsdams cani//rnal 'byor chen
119b3(rgyud): pa spyod pa chen po spyod//gsong ba chen po'i yon tan 'dzin mdzad pa//bde ba chen po yong dag 'byung ba gsol//yon tan mchog dran dang ldan btsud
119b4(rgyud): pan mochog/da mo tshig tshogs mchog 'byung bas brgyan gyur pa//mi g.yo rab mchog mchog ster dri ma myed//spyod mchog spyod pa'i mchog sti dri ma med//tshogs kyi
119b5(rgyud): bskor ba shin tu gzhad mdzad pa//gnod byed 'jos pa tra Ta tra Ta sgrog//g.yo byed skyed pa'i bzhad cing bzhad par mdzad//yon tani mchog drag tsa la tse la pa//ha dra he dA pa ya gnod
119b6(rgyud): mdzes 'joms//ha ra ha ra ha r-I hu re le sa mchog 'dzums//gnas chen po ni stobs kyi grub mdzad pa//rig mchog stobs kyi grol zhing sgrol mdzad
119b7(rgyud): pa//ha ha hA ha ha hA ha ha hA/hi hi hI hi hi hI hi hi hI hi hiM h+ni/hu hu hu hu hu hu hu hu hu hu/rab mchog bdag nyid mkhas pas 'dren gyur pa//Ta Ta nI Ta
120a1(rgyud): Sh+T+rI Ta T+ra TI To Ta nIT Ta nI D+ha TA nI TA TA n+do/n+yA Tu n+yAn+ma/n+yA nA n+yA n+yA n+yA rnA n+yAn+taun+yAn+yA//rgyun gyi spyod pa 'dar zhing 'dar bar mdzad//spyod pa
120a2(rgyud): spyod pa rnams kyi mechog tu gyur//spyod pa skyed byed rab mchog bdag nyid can//dem tshig rgyun tI reg drug mchod gyur pa//bdag de rje rna
120a3(rgyud): 'phrog byed 'joms par mdzad//phrag byed sgrub pa rnams ni grub mdzad pa//mchog gsol mtshig gi bdag nyid yang drag byung //ta te ta te bstan
120a4(rgyud): pa'i spyan mnga' ba//yi ge dza las rab byung mchog ni ster ba hUM ni dang po las sbyor ba//ho ho 'dod chags mchog ljin bud med bstan byed

120a6(rgyud): ha nI bzhad pa yang dgra sbyor//hri ni chos can byed cing rI ba rna ng+ge myed hrI nI rgyu'i 'khor ljo n+te//haM dang ri mkha' dgyes smra ba'i sbyor ba 'ching byed au nI
120a7(rgyud): sna tshogs byed//hi ni srung ba tI te 'gas bye do ta Ta tar+thi sa ni dz+nyAn za zhi de'i cha'//bai ni dga' byed dga' ste tsha ta tshi ti TaM ni rab dga' byed//ha ni
120b1(rgyud): rje bsnun bya dang bcas byed bstan 'dod chags bcas pa dga' byed do//na mnan pa ba mchog gi rgyur gyur hU~M ni dka byu 'dug nyid can/
120b2(rgyud): sbrid pa ma god byed du la spyod ma tshigaste rjes gsum mgon pas bam+b+hi gyur pa//zhes na gsang pa yon tan kun mchog dri med hi na byang chub
120b3(rgyud): po mchog/michog gyi mchog ste maM tshig gyisal go 'phang ma/rdorje yi ge hU~M ni gsol du mjug/nyon mongs dri ma thams cad 'joms sh+lo
120b4(rgyud): 'bri d+h+r-i g+h+raM mche ba'i mtshan chad ldan//sna tshogs dga' ba mchog gis rnam par rgyun mdzes yi ge oM dang yang dag snrel//he ho he ni mad
120b5(rgyud): 'odi hU~M gas sna tshogs 'joms//gnod mdzes des 'joms bdag nyid cen//bde mchog glu dang rol mo dang bcas pa//gzugs bzung dang
120b6(rgyud): ldan lha mo rnams kyis mchod//zla bA ltar dkar 'phro ba 'i zhal mang ga//rdo rje gseng d+mayon tan brgyags pas mtshon//rin rjen

121a1(rgyud): pad+ma'i gnas ni 'jigs myong ba//s+yanams kun b+h+rUM rnam sbyang dri med pa//byang chub spyod pa yongs rtog/smra bdag nyid can//chos mdzad
121a2(rgyud): sa su rtogs pa'i rdzas dang ldan//bsod nams de yis bskyod po'i da' bo che//tshungs pa'i rnal 'byor gru bzhi yang dag gnas//chos mya
121a3(rgyud): go rims bzhin du thig btab pas//'khor lo mu khyud rab tu mdzes byas pa//rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor lo ni gtso bo bzhugs//ting 'dzin mchog
121a4(rgyud): rnams kha khyer gyis mdzes pa//gzungs kyi lha lI tshogs kyis mchod pa'i tshogs//thar pa'i theg pas byams pa'i sgo yis brgyan//rdo rje
121a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la ni 'dren pa bzhugs//pha rol phyin sa btsun mo gar byed pa//sems can smin byed rnam por 'phrul laM dga'//bsam
121a6(rgyud): gtan zas ldan mngon shes ma chog gis brgyan//rdo rje'i dkyil 'a khor la ni 'dren pa bzhugs//dkyil 'khor de ni gtso de'i chos nyid can//
121a7(rgyud): chos nyid bstan pa'i snying po kun zhugs pa//sangs rgyas kun gyi tshogs 'dus mdzes pa yis//bde bar gshegs pa'i gsang ba zhes byar bshad//
121b1(rgyud): sems dpa' dbang phyug dam pa che//glo spyong ba kun 'byung tong 'dzin yang dag gnas//de ni rnam snang thub pa'i chos nyid gzigs//gzus dang dam
121b2(rgyud): tshig yang dge 'byung ba mchog/dga' ba'i chos bzhin rdo rje yang dag gnas//de ni rnam snang thub pa'i dbang phyug gtso//rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen
121b3(rgyud): po nges par phyung //hUM shin tu dag pa'i chos nyid lta bur byung //sangs rgyas dbang phyug dram pa'i kun gyi mchog/rtse gcig dang bcas e ma'o dga'o///

121b6(rgyud): mai r+d+har+m+ma bed+d+hedz+haiMts+tsha/a~M karma badz+rI /mchog gi dang blo rmeng byung gi song byASh+Ta//sang+yam+b+ha rgyu hUM sa byas bud med gzugs can /

122a1(rgyud): rnal 'byor gyis ni shar du bzhugs//de ni rigs kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor brjod//re rI zhing yang rnal 'byor mchog dang ldan//rnal
122a2(rgyud): 'byor 'khor lor yongs su bshad pa mchog/de yi mi spyod mchog tu byung ba yi//mchog tu gasdang ba yi ni dkyil 'khor gsung //oM badz+ra sa twa gu
122a3(rgyud): h+ya sa ma ye hUM/oM gu h+ya badz+ra saM aM ku sha hUM/oM badz+ra gu h+ya rA ge rA gA ya hUM/oM badz+ra gu h+ya sa d+hI shwa ri hUM/rdo rje rIn chen dkyil 'khor bstan

122a5(rgyud): gu h+ma hA sa hUM/rdo rje chos ni dbang phyug dam+b+ha pa che//de yi slar yang snying po bzhi gsungs so//oM badz+ra d+harma gu h+yA sa ma mahU~M/oM badz+ra d+ha
122a6(rgyud): Sha gu h+ye hU~M/oM badz+ra gu h+ye maN+Da le hUM/oM badz+ra gu h+ya dza ba sa ma ya hUM/oM rdo rje las ni yongs su dag pas mchod//'khoralo thams cad la
122a7(rgyud): ni yongs gnas mdzes//chos mchog dbang phyug dam pa mchog gyur pa//de yis snying po bzhi ni gsungs par gyur//oM badz+ra gu h+ya karmas
122b1(rgyud): /oM (d+d+ho g+har+dz+dza kad+ha rbAn+tu/oM badz+re gud+ha dot+par+tha rmAHk+Sha/oM badz+ra brAd+d+ha sa r+m+mAn+tu/snar ba na 'khor lo'i grong khyer rangs gnas pa//dz+nyAn
122b2(rgyud): gzug sa su yongs gnas mdzes gyur pa//nyid sangs rgyas sras te rdo rjer bcas//'on kyang de ltar bung modo gzugs su sprul//de dag sring ba
122b3(rgyud): ngag byed rab tu 'bar//thar pa'i grong du 'dod chags dag byed pa//rtog dang rnam par rtog pa zlog pas dag/chos la dga' zhing sku mchog 'byung
122b4(rgyud): 'gyur ba//bden dang mi bden rnam dag nyi shu dang //chos dang chos mi ni dga' zhing dga' ba'i snod //byed dang byang min rdo rje tha dang gcig/rdo rje

123a1(rgyud): tshul gyi mchog/gdul bya ji bzhin 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bzhin//gtso bo'i mchod pa ji bzhin lhan cig spyod//sems can gdung
123a2(rgyud): bya ma yin snod mchogrA mIn mthu chen rnams ni dngos grub rtsol mi mdzad//der ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin dag/yon tan mang po ya dag byung //sems can/
123a3(rgyud): rnams ni gdul bya'i phyir//rdo rje'i btsun mo dag las byung //de nyid sangs rgyas sras bcas pa//de nyid 'khor lo'i grong khyer che//mchod pa sgo srung
123a4(rgyud): rludrung bcas pa//gsong ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag byung //mgon po rdo rje gsong dbang phyug/rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad//rdo rje chos kyi sbyor ba
123a5(rgyud): yi//rdo rje pha rol phyin pa mchog/sngon ni ji ltar de bzhin phyis//de bzhin dbus su rab tu gnas//sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs yin te//gsang ba'i
123a6(rgyud): sbyor ba yang dag byung //rdo rje dbyings ni ji skad brjod//de nyid gsang ba zhes byar brjod//thug pa chen po mngon bsdus pa//rgyas par phyag rgya dang bcas

123b1(rgyud): swAng+tha d+ma'i rgyud dang byug r+b+ha dang //dmapa 'a.a mats+tsha ba dag/de bzhon ga shegs pa'i rigs ston//dro dag/rnam pa lnga rUb shud//rdo rjod phyongs so byung rab myu

123b5(rgyud): rnam par 'phrul pas cazhi ni rmongs bya//sgos pa'i sbyor ba yis ni//rdo can mau nyes par bya//sems de ces nas ni/
124a1(rgyud): sbyar bar bya//phyag rgya 'di ni bcings nas su//bdag nyid yang dag byin gyis brlab//sgom pa'i phyag rgya 'di yis ni//sku yi phyag rgya rnam par bcing //
124a2(rgyud): lag ngar lcagaso kyur bskum bya zhing //bdag nyid yongs su bsgrub par bya//de bzhin sgom pa'i sbyor ba yis//rdo rje'i mda' ni kun tu gang //lag pas legs

124a6(rgyud): tu mig bskyod cing //bud med rgyu mtshan yang dag sgrub//smin ma bskyod cing khror gnyer gtsigs//khro ba'i lta bas mig gdangs pa//khro bo'ilta ba
124a7(rgyud): 'dod chags cha//'dzum bcas mig ni btsum pa ra bya//mig godangs pa yi sbyor ba yis//rdo rje'i lta bas bgrad par bya//slar yang tshig ni rnam pa bzhi/
124b1(rgyud): na gagan sa/rten gyi spyod u daH/nA zlog ma r+g+ha dag+sa //mAT+Ta sa sa r+b+ba s+'uhA//danams pas ba nga rgyas //2/da dang rlung /

124b3(rgyud): bdag nyid bsgom par bya//cho ga thams cad rgyas pa ru//rdo rje gsang brjes su srung //ji ltar rnal 'byor yang dag gnas//de bzhin gsang mchog 'dzin pa

124b5(rgyud): tshul dag pa//spyod po chen pa'i tshul chen po//bdug nyid chos chen rab bsgoms ni//rdo rje'i dngos gleb thob por 'gyur//'du byed sdug bsngal chen po
124b6(rgyud): las/dga' ba spyod pas spro bar bya//snying rje chen pos dmigs nas ni//sems can bting snyoms dor mo bya// ni dkan lo sbyor byin de//sna la
125a1(rgyud): maur bsgom par bya//rang nyid rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po//sna yi rtse mor de bzhin gnas//sid ka'i spyi bo tsa nus par//sku ni thams cad yongs su
125a2(rgyud): spro//rdo rje phra mo'i bde rig paso//sems ni mnyam par gzhug par 'gyur//rdo rje'i mdun du rdo rje ste//rdo rje'i dbus su bsgom par bya//rdo rje bsgoms
125a3(rgyud): pa'i sbyor ba yis//rdo rje phra mo yongs su spro//rang gi lus kyi mdun du ni//rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom par bya//rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs dbus su//rnga
125a4(rgyud): rje kun gyi dkyil 'khor ro//rdo rje dkyila'akhor dbus su ni//lte bar sad+d+has de bzhin gshegs//rdo rje phra mo bsgom par bya//rdo rje rnam bsgoms

125b1(rgyud): dang //rkang dang blud pas kun tu khyab//sna tshogs rdzas kyis kun tu khyab//bad kan+da mkhris pa la sogs chags//sna tshogs skyon+da po'i rigs kyis khyub/
125b2(rgyud): dradun mi gtsang 'byung ba ru//rang gi lus la so sor brtag/stug bsngal gsum ni kun 'byung bar//nyin dang mtshan myo rtag tu ni//lus ni rjes su dran pa
125b3(rgyud): sgrosgom//rang se mas so sor brtag bya ste//gang zhig de ru yang dag byung //'gro ba med cing sod pa med//de la 'pho ba yod ma yin//de la 'byung ba yod/

126a1(rgyud): /NA b+hAr+tha/rnyog pas sbyo ba b+hag+h+nAn//sdug snong rmo par pr-I b+h+yAM//gnas gsum du yad ba b+hU d+h+yam+b+ha//blo yos so sbyor brtag par bla/
126a2(rgyud): saM ha ra Na badz+ra/chos la dmigs pa'i sems nyid ni//rmongs shing gzhom par mi bya'o//rdo rje de ni brtan bya zhing //rdo rje phra mo reg par bya//badz+rAM D+ha tiSh+Tha/rdo rje sem

126b1(rgyud): dag gnas//blo ldan mi yis bsam par bya//sangs rgyas thams cad gzhug bya sbyong //rang gi lus ni brtan par bya//hU~M kha 'dod chags gnas su na//'dad
126b2(rgyud): chags rnam par dge pa bsam//sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes bya ste/chos kyi dbyings ni brtan pa/'gyur//legs so zhes pa ga bla ste//skye bar yang
126b3(rgyud): drug gnas pa'i mchog/sangs rgyus thams cad mnyes bya zhing //rjes kyi dbyings ni yongs su s+t+wa~M//hr-id badz+rA a ku shaM/tin+d+ra badz+rA rA gA hr-id mo//oM daM badz+rI duSh+Te/
