126b5(rgyud): mor rnam par bsam//rlon rkyen char dag d+ya //snod kyi sprin ni yang dge slo//bzhad pas bde ba ba sems nis ni//shin tu sdug bsngal nges par sbyar//chos kyi cha
126b6(rgyud): yang spro bye zhing //snang ba'i sprin yang spro bar bya//hr-i da ya badz+re s+phAR+YA//tiSh+Tha badz+ra d+hI d+h+r-i g+ha/hr-id ya badz+ra hA sa//spyi bor rjes dran no sa ba mes nus//ral grwa gtso bo bas
126b7(rgyud): par bya//'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bcad byonang //sems dpa'i thamasaspro bar bye//snying khe'i 'khor lo gnas su ni//chos kyi rgyu mthun sgom par bya//
127a1(rgyud): /nAm+b+ha m+b+haShu kun tu spyo nga //chos kyi daSh+T+rI s+thA ni yod smras//de y-i rnyog sa las byung pob+h+yo//shrIs+yA rab can gyis kyi nor bsam//rna
127a2(rgyud): kyi tshig ni spro bya zhing //phyogs rnams kun tu yongs su s+ho//hr-id badz+ra g+ho Sha/tiSh+Thi badz+ra hr-i da yaM/pra be sha badz+ra ny+tsa gra/spyi bor rjes dran nas brtsams te//mchod
127a3(rgyud): pa'i las ni rnam par bsgom//mchod pa'i phyir ni rdo rje spro//phyogs rnams kun tu spro bar bya//snying khar rdo rje go cha ni//shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas bsam//
127a4(rgyud): sdug bsngal kun las grol byed pa//go cha'i rnam pa spro bar bya//spyi bo nas btsems rkang 'thil du//rdo rje bsdams pa bsam par bya//rdo rje'i snying po gzhug bya
127a5(rgyud): /zhing //rdo rje'i rang bzhin thams cad spro//yak+Sha pU dza hri da badz+ra ka ba tsa/badz+ra muSh+Ti hr-i dA yaM/grogs dang grogs min ma lus pa//'byung po kun la byams po ni//ma
127a6(rgyud): lus lus pa med pA ru//mnyam du khyab par spro bar bya//kye ma sems can 'di sdug bsngal//'gro ba lnga ru kun tu 'khyam//nyin dang mtshon du rab sbyor
127a7(rgyud): bas//snying rje nyid ni smra bar bya/nyin mtshan dge dang zhe sdang med//sems can dge ba don gnyer gang //rjes su yi rang bde chen po//sems can kun la
127b1(rgyud): yongs su spro//rgyal bar dka' ba'i lam zhugs shing //sangs rgyas byang chub la gnas pa//sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir//blo chen ldan pas btang snyoms
127b2(rgyud): gzhag/ma hA mai tri s+pha ra Na/mo hA ka ru Ni ka ya s+pha ra Na/sar+b+ba bud d+hau/pra mo s+pha ra Na/ma ho pek+Sha s+pha ra Na/nam mkhra' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du//rdo rje'i gzugs ni rnam par
127b3(rgyud): bsam//sems can mnyam par dmigs pa yis//nam mkha' kun tu yongs su spro//badz+ra muSh+Ti b+ha ba/rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che//snying kha rdo rje chos nyid brtan//
127b4(rgyud): dron rnams thams cad bsgom par bya//chos kyi dbyings ni yongs su spro//sangs rgyas rjes dran nas brtsams te//rnam pa kun tu sna tshogs nyid//de ni rang gi bdag
127b5(rgyud): nyid sgom//chos kyi dbyings ni yongs su spro//rdo rje phra mo gzhan dang ldan//chos rnams thams cad rnam sgom pa//myur du phyogs kun yongs su spro//snying khar rdo rje bsgom
127b6(rgyud): bya zhing //ma hA po d+hi sa twa bi shA/bud+d+ha a nu smr-i taM ba shA/badz+ra pA NI dA ra sha ya swa ru paM/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni//byang chub sems ni bsgom par bya//sa man+tha
127b7(rgyud): b+ho dra be shA/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa//bdag nyid rdo rje rnam par bsgoms//badz+ra satwa/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa//rdo rje'i bsnyems pa
128a1(rgyud): /rol bcus pa//badz+ra satwa su ma ya sa mA d+hi dz+nyA na dri shwa/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//sangs rgya sku gzugs su rang bdag nyid//ta thA ga ta swa mo ho//
128a2(rgyud): dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pa//rdo rje slob dpon dag gi bya//gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na//shes rab can gyis nges par bya//mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems///
128a3(rgyud): kyi ni//sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsam//ji bzhin mtshan gyi rgyan pa ru//rtag tu bdag nyid rnam par sgom//ji ltar sangs rgyas de bzhin bdag/badrag nyid sangs
128a4(rgyud): rgyas rtag tu sgom//sangs rgyas gang yin de bdag nyid//sangs rgyas mang por yang dag gnas//bdag ni de bzhin gshegs dang mtshungs//rdo rje'i tshig ni yang
128a5(rgyud): dag brjod//dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pa//sangs rgyas kun kyang mnyes par bya//oM s+yArba ta thA ga t+yA sa mo haM//rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che//ji ltar sku
128a6(rgyud): /mdog che ga bzhin//dbang po gnyis ni yang dag gnas//de bzhin bdag ni rtag tu bsgom//oM badz+ra satwa sa mo hA/bdag ni rdo rje sems dpa' mtshungs//rdo rje'i tshig ni
128a7(rgyud): yang dag brjod//dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas//nges par 'jig rten pham par bya//khams kyi snying po gang yin dag/de ni rdul bral dri med dag/bdag ni/
128b1(rgyud): rdorje chos nyid du//rtag tu bsgom par bya ba yin//badz+ra d+harmA sa ma hA//bdag nyid rdo rje chos dang mtshungs//rdo rje'i tshig ni yang dag brjod//dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug/
128b2(rgyud): pras//rdo rje'i chos ni thob par 'gyur//rdo rje'i las ni bdag nyid de//tha dad med ci rtags gcig gi ste//sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod de//rtag tu bdag
128b3(rgyud): nyid bsgom par bya//oM badz+ra kArmA sA mo haM//bdag ni rdo rje las dang mtshungs//rdo rje'i tshig ni yang yang brjod//dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas//rdo rje las
128b4(rgyud): dang mtshungs par 'gyur//de ni rdo rje rin chen nyid//sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang sgyur nga //rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya//rdo rje rin chen mtshungs par 'gyur//
128b5(rgyud): badz+rA rat+nA sa mo haM//ba dag ni rdo rje rin chen mtshungs//rdo rje rje tshig ni yang yang brjod//rdo rje rin chen sbyor ba gyis//sang+yas rgyus dbang bskur po'i par 'gyur//zu
128b6(rgyud): gnyis 'brel ba ni dbang po gnyis zhes bya'o//bdag gros lus gang yin pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi blo grang yin pa gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa ni dbang po gnyis
128b7(rgyud): snyoms par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'o//stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di//rdo rje gcig tu mos byas shing //sangs rgyas gzugs dang mtshungs pa ru//
129a1(rgyud): dbus su bdag nyid sgom par bya//nam mkha' la nI rdo rje sgrom//rdo rje gcig la yongs pa sal ba//rdo rje sems
129a2(rgyud): dpa'i ting 'dzin gyi//dbus su bdag nyid sgom par bya//steng gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di//rdo rje gcig ni yongs bas lu bsdu//rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyi//
129a3(rgyud): dbus su bdag nyid sgom par bya//ci nus par ni byin gyis brlab//rdo rje gcig ni rnam par sgom//rdo rje chos kyi ting 'dzin gyis//rtag tu bdag ni bsgom
129a4(rgyud): par bya//sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgom bya zhing //rin chen bdag nyid dbus su sgom//kun tu rdo rje'i dbus su ni//rtag tu bdag nyid las su sgom//
129a5(rgyud): gtso bo gang dang gtso dag gis//sku mchog tshe byad ji bzhin du//rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya//sems can dam pa de nyid thob//bdag gtso rdo rje'i tshig brjod//
129a6(rgyud): cing //rdo rje'i thugs su bsam par bya//dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas//rdo rje 'dzin pa thob par 'gyur//yang na sgom pa'i sbyor ba ni//rang dbang du
129a7(rgyud): ni rab bshad bya//ji ltar yid las byung ba bzhin//rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rnam par sgom//sna yi rtse mo la brten nas//sems kyi rgyu ni yang dag gnas//bskye
129b1(rgyud): las rtsa bdun lhag par ni//rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya//gal te sgom pas dngos grub 'dod//rdo rje sgom pa bsgrub par bya//sangs rgyas rjes dran sbyor ba yis//
129b2(rgyud): sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor yang dag gnaso//sems dpa' rjes dran sbyor ba yis//gdon mi za bar nges par bya//gang dang gong la 'dod pa nyid//bdag nyid rdo rjer
129b3(rgyud): bsgom par bya//sku mdog rnal 'byor ji bzhin du//ci rigs par ni sna tshogs bdag/yang na rdo rje sgom gtso bo//grub pa yang ni bsgom par bya//e ma'ong
129b4(rgyud): 'tshur rnam 'phrul 'khor lo byung //e ma 'tsho tshar spyod mchog dam pa sgrug kye ma'o ngo mtsha gsing mchog gnas thob pa//bdag ni rdo rje'i rnal 'byor sgom pa'i mchog/rnal 'byor mkhas
129b5(rgyud): pa'i sgrub pa ste//rnal 'byor rig pa sgrub byed pa//mchod pa sgrub pa'i phyag rgya yis//de nas mchod pa rab bshad bya//thun bzhi dang ni kha dog bzhi//dus
129b6(rgyud): bzhi yi ni rab sbyor bso//sangs rgyas rnal 'byor brjod byed ci nga //sangs rgyas la ni mchod par bya//phyogs rnams kun tu yongs spros shing //mchod pa rnams/
129b7(rgyud): ni yongs spro zhing //sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pas//rtag tu yang dag rnal 'byor sgom//mched lo spro bo yang dag sbyor//zhes bya chos ni yongs su spro//ting
130a1(rgyud): 'dzin sbyor ba la gnas te//chos kyi mchod pa rab tu bya//oM ta thA pra ta badz+ra satwa/anut+tA ra pU dze s+pha ra NA sa ma ye hU~M/rdo rje yi ni grwa sang sngags/
130a2(rgyud): 'di//yang dang yang du rab tu bzlas//rdo rje dbyings ni sbyor ba yis//phyag rgya lnga ni rab tu bya//so sor rtags dang mngon rtogs dang /rdo rje de bzhin rdo rje bdag
130a3(rgyud): rgyusmra pan+d+ha ni sngar bshad pa//rdo rje dab+h+ring ste ni rab tu spyod//s+yAngs rgyu sbyin ma 'brel ma lus pa//rang gi bdag nyid ba ma smra nas su//rje rje dbyungs kyi sbyor
130a4(rgyud): yis//thub pa dbang phyug dag la dbu'o//rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyi//thub la mchod pa phul na sta nAM//bdag ni mgon po rnam snang mdzad//bdag
130a5(rgyud): khams ni rnam par spros//byang chub sems ni spos nas su//thub pa'i dbang phyug dag la dbul//rdo rje gsang sngags 'di yis ni//mchod pa thams cad
130a6(rgyud): rlab tu sgrub//oM sar+b+ba tA thA ga ta badz+ra swAtA/a nut+tA ra b+hu dze stA ra NA sa ma ye hU~M/sangs rgyas thams cad dbang bsgyur ba//rdo rje rin chen spros nas ni//bang
130a7(rgyud): rnam na pa rnaMs snang mdzad//bdug gi khams ni rje ma par skyes//rdo rje sdigs kyi drub par 'gyur//nub po'i dbang phyug dgal dngul//yin rje /
130b1(rgyud): mchod pa rabu spro zhing //dA sdams pa'i sbyor ba rab tu sgrub//oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA badz+ra rat+na a nut+ta ra pU dza s+pha rA Na sa ma yo hUM/snga ma ji lta ba bzhin du/rnam par snang
130b2(rgyud): mdzad ting 'dzin gyis//ji ltar sems dpa' phyung ba bzhin//de bzhin bdag ni bsgom par bya//rang bdag nyid ni bsgom nas su//rmang 'byung chen po yongs spro zhing //
130b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya//rdo rje'i sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur//de lta bu la snyoms zhugs te//rdo rje chos ni rab tu byung //phyogs rnams kun tu spro bya zhing //
130b4(rgyud): sbyangs rgyas rnams la dbul bar bya//oM sarba ta thA ga ti bad+d+hAd+hAr+m+ma oMn+nad+harI d+h+waM dza~M s+phA rA NA sa mo yair+m+ma/twAnga'adzin sbyar bil gnas te//rdo rje la ste rnam
130b5(rgyud): zhing //sangs rgyas kun lA dbul bya zhing //thams cad du nau spro bar bya//oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra kaMrma a nut+ta ra pU dza s+pho ra Na sa ma ye hUM/mchod pa'i rgyal po
130b6(rgyud): 'di yIs ni//thun bzhi ru ni sgom par-i bya//mchod pa'i tshe gas 'grub 'gyur te//sdig pa can yang 'grub par 'gyur//mchod pa'i la sa ni bla na med//ci rigs
130b7(rgyud): pa ra ni rab bshad bya//chos kyi phyag rgya'i rgyal por ldan//'grub 'gyur 'di la thi tsham med//oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba at+ma niR+YA ta na pU dza s+pha ra Na karma badz+ra
131a1(rgyud): a//rdo rje sems dpa' rang bdag nyid//mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom par bya//bdag nyid yang dang yang du ni//sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya//
131a2(rgyud): oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba At+ma nir+yA ta na pU dzA s+pha ra Na karma gri dza/rdo rje lcags kyu rang bdag nyid//phyogs kun du ni spro bar bya//sangs rgyasu thams cad dgu go bya/
131a3(rgyud): zhing //thub pa dag la dbul ba ra bya//oM sarba ta thA ga te sarba At+ma nir+yA ta nr-i a nu rA ga pU dzA s+pho ra Na karmaM ba ni hUM b+h+yo//rdo rje rigs ni rjes chags pa//rtag/
131a4(rgyud): tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya//chos rnams dag la menyes byas shing //'di brjod nas ni spro bar bya//oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba At+ma niR+YA ta na sA d+hu ka ra pU dza/
131a5(rgyud): s+phu ra Na karma duSh+Ta maM/rdo rje rin chen rnal 'byor che//bdag nyid yongs su sgom par bya//rin chen mchod pa bla na med//phyogs rnams kun tu spro bar bya//
131a6(rgyud): a.oM sarba ta thA ga te kA ya a bi She ka rat+ne b+h+yo badz+ra ma ni au//sangs rgyas thams tsod rgyal po che//byang chub snying por dbang bskur ba//sems kyang de ltar
131a7(rgyud): bas ma nas ni//rdo rje rin chen nyid thob 'gyuraro//bdag nyid rdo rje gzing ni ni//phyogs rnams kun tu snang byed pa//sangs rgyas thams cad skul bya zhing //mchod
131b1(rgyud): pa gzi brjid yongs su spro//oM sarba ta thA ga ta sUr+ye b+h+yo//badz+ra te dzo ni dzA l+yA hrIH/rdo rje rgyal mtshan kun tu mthong //shes rab can gyis rgyal mtshan sgreng //sangs rgyas
131b2(rgyud): thams cad mchod bya zhing //rdo rje'i sngags kyis bskul bar bya//oM sarba ta thA ga ta a shA pa rA su ni tsan t+ya mi Na d+h+wa dza a gre traM//grags chen sangs rgyas thams
131b3(rgyud): cad kyi//dkyil 'khor shes rab can gyi lta//rtag tu bdag nyid dga' bya zhing //rdo rje sngags ni rab bskul bya//oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pri ti pra mod
131b4(rgyud): ka re b+h+yo badz+rA hA se hA sa/sems can thams cad chos chen po//bdag nyid chos chen dag pa ste//sangs rgyas thams cad rab bskul bya//sangs rgyas thams
131b5(rgyud): cad po dag nyid kun//dkyil 'khor grong khyer thams cad bdag/shes rab can gyi bdag nyid bsam//rdo rje'i sngags kyi rab skul bya//oM na maHsarba ta thA
131b6(rgyud): gra ta badz+ra d+harma tra sra to b+h+yo tu no mi myA hA d+harma a gri h+niHbdag ni shres rabA ral gri rno//shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul//'khor lo Shi yau gai rab tu bskor//mdo
131b7(rgyud): sde thams cad 'dzin pa yin//oM sarba ta thA ga ta pradz+nyA pA ra mi tI b+hI ni ra hA ri tu mi ma hA gu Sha nu go d+hi/sems can dag ni kun gyi tshig/bdag ni sems
132a1(rgyud): dpa' smra ba brtan//rdo rje smra ba gsang ba'i bdug/spangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod bya//oM s+yAr+b+ba ta thA ga ta s+yA b+hA ba shud d+hA so g+h+ri ti d+hirgi ya stu na mo/
132a2(rgyud): badz+ra wa n+yerbe/bdag ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor//'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor sbyin byed pa//rdo rje'i 'khor lo yongs su bsngo//mchod pa thams cad yongs
132a3(rgyud): bya//oM sarba tra thA gA ta tsakra pa ri brte d+ha na sarba mu drA ni stu nom+bi sarba maN+Da le maM/bdag ni rdo rje las rgyal po//phyogs rnams kun tu rab mchod byed//me tog bdun/
132a4(rgyud): pipa la sogs dri//rdo rje'i sngags kyis bskul bar bya//oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+hU pu me g+ha s+pha ra Na pU dza karma ka ra/cho ga bgos pa dang ldan pa//me tog mchod
132a5(rgyud): pa 'bul byed pa//bdag nyid rang nyid rgyal po ste//rdo rje'i sngags ni rab skul bya//oM sarba ta thA ga puSh+paM pra sA ra s+pha ra Na pU dza karme ba ro//bdag ni rdo rje gnod sbyin te/
132a6(rgyud): nyon mongs za byed chosA sgron 'bar//phyogs rnams kun tu spro bya zhing //snang ba 'bar ba yang dge spro//oM sarba ta thA gra ta A lo ka dzA la s+pha ra Na pU dza karma b+ho ra b+ha ra/
132a7(rgyud): /rdo rje khu tshur yong dag nyid//dri yi snod dang yang dge ldan//phyogs rnams kun tu spro bya zhing //char rnams kun gyi rab mchod byed//oM sarba ta thA ga ta gan+d+ha sa mu
132b1(rgyud): dra s+pha Na pU dzaMk+ShArma ku ru ku ru/sems can kun don yang dag ldan//byang chub sems ni bskyed nas kyang //sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya//mchod pa mchog ni rab
132b2(rgyud): sgrub pa//aM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra a mai nin+te ta na pU dza me g+ha saM mu dr-i s+phaR+Sha Na sa ma ma b+h+rU~M/shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bri//yan lag kun gyis rab btud bya//
132b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya zhing //phyogs rnams kun tu spro bar bya//oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya niR+YA ta na pU dza me g+ha swa mu dra s+pha ra NA sa ma ya hU~M/rdo rje sems dpa'
132b4(rgyud): bsdus pa ni//rdo rje rin chen bla na medo//rdo rje chos ni glur blangs pos//rdo rje las rnams byed par 'gyur//rdo rje yi ni glu 'di yis//rang bdag nyid ni dga' bar
132b5(rgyud): bya//sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya zhing //rdo rje'i sngags kyang rab brjod bya//oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta thA ga nid+hU tA na pU dzaM me g+ha sa~M mu dra s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/phyogs rnams kun
132b6(rgyud): tu mchod pa kun//mkhas pa yis ni bsam pAr bya//sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya zhing //rdo rje'i sngags ni reb bskul bya//oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta nid+h+r-i ta na pU dza me g+ha samra/
132b7(rgyud): dr-i s+pha ra Na sa ye hU~M/phul nas shes rab can gyis ni//rdo rje tsun mo'i ting 'dzin bsam//rdzas mchog ldan pas spyi bya zhing //sangs rgyas kun la yongs su dbul//
133a1(rgyud): ma ts+tsha/k+ShAd+hAr+m+mAn+na t+sAr+m+ma/s+yA An+da rmA k+Sha d+ha mr-i thA p+tang+gaHrA/sarbA nA r+m+mA/ ku byu 'du sas//sa
133a2(rgyud): sa sun lnga ma/rje de dka' du rgyas/ me pa sa pa 'gyu/ khrur ma seMn bsdus pa/sa
133a3(rgyud): rten gyi dkyil 'khor bsam//mchod pa'i tshogs ni bu med pas//sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya//rdo rje'i sbyor ba 'di yi ste ni//tshe dang mngag dang nang
133a4(rgyud): med nyid//dran tshogs bde bas thams cad 'thob//sdig pa thams cad rab 'joms pa//rdo rje'i rnal 'byung gang zhig gis//nyin re bzhin du mchod byas
133a5(rgyud): sa/rgyumo med par dngas sgrub sam+b+ha//rdo rje rnal 'byor bas rlob 'gyur//dzA sngags kyi sa bsgrub po dang //phyug rgyu thams cadu bsam par bya/
133a6(rgyud): na pa mngon pa sa las//phyag rgyu shin tu rgyas par shad//rdo rje las kyi gi rimismra bzhon//shes rlung can gyis dkyil 'khor bsgrags
133a7(rgyud): dang rab mtshungs pa//slar yang rnal 'byor pa lo bshad//'jig rten mgon po rdzu 'phrul che//rtag tu de bzhin mchod byag/gsang mchog rnal 'byur pa dge ma//
133b1(rgyud): d+hAm+b+ha/ rdzun du sams / sa sa na nga rgyun smon spyod nas/dzad da ba byas pa por b+h+ya/8
133b2(rgyud): na gyis m+b+ha d+hA/rdo rje dga' ba bsem par bya//'di chug ste pa'i ba'i na seM//dag de'i de rab tu mchid //gnyid sangs
133b3(rgyud): //sa snyan sa mad pa rlu t+nan+tu// rkye pa de'i m+bu 'i 'grol ba ste/ Ad+hA/byang rgyun sa ma sman
133b4(rgyud): rab bstod nas//bdag nyid sangs rgyas zhes thos ma zla//stobs dang mi 'jigasa'i gas rnam kyis//rang bdag nyid ni dbang bsgyur b+he/d+d+ho u~M b+hUSh+Ta /
133b5(rgyud): byubyang chub sems ni rab bskyed nas//bdag ni sangs rgyas zhes bsam bya//rdo rje yi ni glu blang zhing //bdag nyid mngon par mchod par bya//br-id+d+hi sid+d+hi ka ro mi//
133b6(rgyud): blo chub sems ni brnyan spyad nas//bdag nyid sangs rgyu sa zhes pa sa hU~M//rdo rje gar gyis ga byi gang //khas pas bdag nyidang ma pa bya/
133b7(rgyud): dri skye dang gsung thugs rdo rje mchog/sbyor bas de bzhin phyag byas shing //sangs rgyas thams cad mtshang byas nas//nges par phyag ni byas pa
134a1(rgyud): /pra NA mA mI/rdo rje sku gsung thugs las byung //sangs rgyas bsod nams chen po kun//rjes su yi rang mchog bdag gis//myur du sangs rgyas
134a2(rgyud): nyid thor 'gyur//a nu mo de//bdag nyid dbul ba la sogs pa//sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi//mchod pa kun gyi sangs rgyas nyid//mu tshad pa'i bdog
134a3(rgyud): tid can gyis mchod//bud+d+ha pU dza/rdo rje sku gsung thugs las byung //dgro ba'i tshigs ni thams cad kun//yongs su bsngo ba'i mchod pa yis//sangs rgyas kun
134a4(rgyud): dang mtshungs par 'gyur//pa r-i NI maHchos kyi dbyings ni snying po che//'dod pa'i 'dam gyis ma gos pa//bzod nas dag pas skye ba med//'khor ba'i
134a5(rgyud): rgya mtsho pad+ma mtshungs//sarba shud+d+haHchos rnams thams cad ma skyes pa//bzod nas zhi zhing gos pa med//glo bur dri mas gos pa med//yi ge A yis rnam
134a6(rgyud): por sbyangs//sA man+ta b+hA dra/i ma~M 'o 'khor lo bAde rang bzhin//chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med//chos rnams thams cad nyid kyi ni//'dir ni de bzhin gshegs
134a7(rgyud): pargyu//d+harma tsakra/sgra brnyan dang ni mtshungs pa'i sgra//med de gzhan yang yod ma yin//chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin du//bdag ces bya ba 'ga' yang
134b1(rgyud): med//nas pra pany+tsa/sngon du zla dang ldan pa sa bsam//mnyam par gzhag pas sgom bya zhing //de 'og rdo rje sna tshogs brjod//de nas dngos grub thob par 'gyur//sku
134b2(rgyud): dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'o//rang gi lus ni phra rab dag/rdo rje'i gzugs su bsgom bya zhing //rdo rje'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya//badz+ra kA ya/sku dang gsung dang
134b3(rgyud): thugs rdo rje'i//yan ldeg rnam pa ji snyed pa'i//sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgom byi zhing //thams cad yongs su spro bar bya//d+har+m+ma kA ya/rlung gi lus la gnas
134b4(rgyud): pA yi//phra rab rdul ni ji snyed pa//rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom par bya//don yod ma chod pas rab mchod bya//satwa kA ya/de bzhin lus ni thams cad kyi//rang
134b5(rgyud): gi phra rab rdul rnams ni//kun tu bgod pa'i bsgom byas te//de ni sangs rgyas mchod par bshad//bud+d+ha kA yi/sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su mnyes//
134b6(rgyud): chub sems dpa' slob gang yin//shes rab can gyis mchog gsang bslab//srungs rgyas sa ni thob par 'gyur//rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che//lus rnams
134b7(rgyud): thams cad yongs su bsdams//yan lag kun la chags pa dang //ting nge 'dzin dang bcas pa yis//lus kun la ni yongs su chags//bde ba'i mchod pa
135a1(rgyud): /rang byung bya//e ma'o rjes su chags mchod bdag/rdo rje'i tshig nI brjod par bya//oM ma'i yid 'od e ma'o sdug/e ma'o dga' ba rab tu mdzes/
135a2(rgyud): chos kyi chags pa 'dod chags che//gang la rab dga' chags 'gyur bya//chos dang gang zag bdag med pa//stong pa' dad chags brjod par bya//'khor bar
135a3(rgyud): sdug bsngal spang bya zhing //sems can yang ni dor mi bya//sred pa dang ni chags dang spyod//rtog pa thams cad rnam par spang //ming dang gzugs ni shes bya/
135a4(rgyud): shing //mtshan nyid gsum ni rtogs par bya//the ga chen bde ba zhe bya ba//'dod cha gos chags par rab brjod par//lta ba thams cad mi gzung zhing //srid
135a5(rgyud): pa'i sdug bsngalnga rnam par spang //rtog dang rnam par rtog pa med//sdug bsngal thams nad nges par gcod//phung po drang ni skye mched khams//rtog pa rdul
135a6(rgyud): tsam yod me yin//de la 'dus byas yod ma yin//'dus byas min po nyid kyang med//skyes pa bud med dag nyid med//bdag dang sems can rnam rtog
135a7(rgyud): med//'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug med//nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs spangs//de lta bu yi chags pa yis//gang du rdo rje can chags 'gyur//de lta bu
135b1(rgyud): yi sbyor ba yis//rdo rje sems dpa' rjes chags bya//kha yi 'o ni cho ga dag pa//gsang ba'i sbyor bas rab bsgrub bya//oM ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa//rjes su chags pa'i
135b2(rgyud): cho ga bstan//dpung po dam por bsdams bya zhing //'dod chags chags par bsten pa yis//rdo rje sems dpa' rab 'grub 'gyur//chags pa lnga las rnam grol/
135b3(rgyud): bas//'dod la chags par mi bya zhing //blo ldan chos chags dga' ba yis//dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//rdo rje sems dpa'i cho ga yis//gsang ba
135b4(rgyud): thams cad rab bstan bya//zhi ba thams cad mnyes bya zhing //rdo rje sems sogs mnyes par bya//sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' 'am//rdo rje can dang dga'
135b5(rgyud): chen po//'dod chags tshon po 'di lta bus//'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom meng //oM sarba rA ga rA ti su kha yA mi hUM/mchog tu gsang ba dam pa mchog/gang
135b6(rgyud): zhig byas nas ga sang ba kun//brtags nas 'grub par 'gyur ba yin//lhag par shes rab can gyis bslab//mtshan ma brtan por rab 'grub nas//pad+ma'i lte
135b7(rgyud): bar 'dug bya zhing //mtshan ma mchod rten byin brlabs nas//rang bdag rdo rje mtshungs pa nyid//mdo sde gsang dbang rgyal po las//de yis shin tu gsang
136a1(rgyud): tshig gsungs//de ni dgongs pas gsungs pa ste//de ni dgongs par shes par bya//mtshan ma phyag mtshan zhes byar brjod//brtan pa lhag pa
136a2(rgyud): nyid yin te//byang chub sems dpa'i phyag mtshan gang //mkhas pas lhag par bcang bar bya//pha rol phyin pa drug spyod pa//de yi mtshan mar rab tu bsgrags//
136a3(rgyud): gang phyir lhag par brtan par bya//blo ldan rnams kyi rigs 'byung 'dod//mtshan ma brtan par rang gyur pa//de dag kho nur rab tu bsgrags//pha rol phyin//
136a4(rgyud): drug spyod pa ni//rdo rje rigs su brjod par bya//byang chub sems gang de rdo rje//rdo rje mtshan mar 'di brjod bya//byang chub sems kyi rab sbyor bas//mtshan ma
136a5(rgyud): brtan por brjod par bya//pad+ma shes rab pha rol phyin//pad+ma'i lte bar 'dug bya ba//shes rab pha rol phyin pa yaM//rnal 'byor yang yang snyoms 'jug bya//
136a6(rgyud): b+ha ga ling ga'i sbyor ba ni//yang dang yang du bsten byas nas//g.yo dang nyes pa rnams spangs par//godon mi za bar yang dag byung //shes rab dang ni byang
136a7(rgyud): chub sems//yang dang yang du bsten byas nas//shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul//byang chub gdon mi za bar 'gyur//bsgrub byar gyur pa'i chos 'di ni//
136b1(rgyud): u ts+tsha kun gyis chud par dAk+tany+tsa//byung chub sems dang sh+los+t+ra rab no//mchod rton mtshan mya'i rjes chags b+ha//rnal 'byor pas nI 'dri ma dang //'di lta bu
136b2(rgyud): sgrub pa dang //spyod paM gres ba 'di yis ni//rdo rje gsang ba nyid thob 'gyur//gsang ba dgongs pas+t+ra bsdus pA yi//ma la sku rgyu rje rA dzi skad gsungs//gsang ba
136b3(rgyud): ni lnga 'byor 'di yis ni//sems can thams cad rnam par sgom//rdo rdzo gsang dbang bsdus pa yi//sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor 'di yis ni//gsang ba chen po bsgrubs
136b4(rgyud): na ni//skad cig de la rab 'grub 'gyur//kha cig nyan zhag de nyid la//ying dang yang du 'grub par 'gyur//nyi ma gnyos gsum bzhi lnga 'am//drug dang bdun
136b5(rgyud): thu tshom med//mtshams med lnga po byed pa yang //n+ya rigs pa yi cho ga yis//lo gcig tu ni rab sbyor bas//'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med//rdo rje gsang
136b6(rgyud): ba'i cho ga rdzogs so///gsang ba yi ni dkyil 'khor mchog/rdo rje slop+na dpon cho ga nI// l+lIr rigs shing 'aN+Dam bA ru//de nas yang dag bshad par bya//
136b7(rgyud): mdor na rig pa'i brtul zhugs ni//gong du dekyil 'khor las bshad bzhin//ce lcer spro zhing ci nus par//sngon du ma
137a1(rgyud): bas bshad par bya//rdo rje sems dpa' skal pa che//rgyal po kun tu khyab pa'i 'od//the tshom med par stong phrag brgya//rtag tu rdo rje'i tshig brjod bya//
137a2(rgyud): sems dpa'i rdo rje goms bya ste//rdo rje rnal 'byor goms byas te//chos rnams dag pa goms par bya//goms pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur//nyon mongs rab spong
137a3(rgyud): nyon mongs bzlog par bya//rnal 'byor goms pa yis ni rnal 'byor sgrub//bzlas pa tsam gyis dga' chen 'grub 'gyur te//rnal 'byor tshogs sgrub pa sgrub par 'gyur//
137a4(rgyud): yang na bzlas pa tsam nyid ni//bzlas pa mchog gis bzlas par bya//rnal 'byor rig pa sgrub pa'i phyir//dngos grub tshogs bzlas par bya//do ni rnal 'byor cho ga
137a5(rgyud): yis//skad cig sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur//rnal 'byor cho gas med par ni//'grub mo ni 'di la the tshom med//rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyis//gsang ba
137a6(rgyud): bzhi ni yang dag bshad//gsang ba chen po tshad med pa//bzhi po thams cad bsdus pa yin//bzlas brjod sbyin sreg cho ga dang //phyag rgya bcing ba lhur len pa//rig
137a7(rgyud): pa'i mchog gi cho ga ni//gsang ba bsdus pa dang po yin//gsang dang skem bying phur pas btab//gdog pa dang ni mngon spyod dang //bgegs bskrad pa yi
137b1(rgyud): 'khrul 'khor 'di//gsang ba'i bsdus pa gnyis pa yin//go cha mi 'gyur bcing ba dang //spyod dang de bzhin rab bskyod drang //bdag nyid mngon par srung nyid dang //dgegs
137b2(rgyud): rnams bsal bar bya ba dang //rdzas 'brog pa dang gzhom pa dang //gdug pa thams cad ma don srung ba//rig po 'dzin pa thams cad kyi//gas ba bsdus pa gsum//
137b3(rgyud): pa yin//sngags dang phyag rgya mchod pa dang //de bzhin rig pa'i dngos grub nyid//dgegs rnams bsod nams nye bar bsdu//gsang ba bzhi par 'dod pa yin//gas/
137b4(rgyud): ba bzhi po thams cad no//rang gzhan rdzu 'phrul kun bsdus pa//gsang ba mchog gi rgyud chen po//rgyud de las ni rab tu bshad//bzlas brjod sbyin sreg cho gi na//de
137b5(rgyud): ni rgyud mchog las bshad bya//gang phyir reg pa 'dzin kun gyis/zlas brjod sbyin sreg bsgrub par bya//bzlas brjod sbyor ba med par ni//rig po'i dngos 'grub 'byung
137b6(rgyud): mi 'gyur//spyan sreg cem ni med pa ru//rig pa'i bya bo byed mi 'gyur//grong gis rnal 'byor brtson 'grus pa//bzlas
137b7(rgyud): pa'i rim pa bshad bya ba//rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi//snying po 'di ni gsang mchog yon//gsang ba'i rigs 'dir bzlas pa ni//rnal 'byor nyi shu
138a1(rgyud): yang drug byung //bzlas pa rnam pa nyi shu ni//bsang ba'i rgyud du nyi shu gcig/gnas ngan len gyi brag chags rtogs//rtog pa bag chags zhes
138a2(rgyud): ste//bzlas pa tsam gyis thim 'gyur te//bzlas pa tsam gyis brjod par bya//nyes pa byas pa spong ba dang //de bzhin srid pa sbyor byed cing //rmad 'byung sna
138a3(rgyud): tshogs mthong 'gyur te//de bas bzlas pa brjod par bya//byang chub spyod pa 'byung 'gyur zhing //tshul mchog mthong bar 'gyur ba ste//de bas bzlas
138a4(rgyud): pa'i cho ga ni//rnal 'byor pas ni nges par bya//gseng po chen po'i rgyud 'di ru//hUM ni dang po rab tu bsgrags//gsang ba thams cad yang dag
138a5(rgyud): 'byung //hUM gis bzlas po brjod par bya//sangs rgyas kun gyis gtsu ni//de bzhin yi ge hU~M rab ma cho ga/gsang ba thams cad 'khor lor bcas
138a6(rgyud): rigs lnga drug dang bcas pa 'byung //'dir ni yi ge d+hI 'byung bar//sngon la shes rab can gyis brtag/lce sogs thams cad khong stong du//lus
138a7(rgyud): kun la ni brtag par bya//sbyor ba bcu las 'byung mi 'gyur//so las rnam pa kun tu min//skye dang rtse ba las kyang min//dkon las rnam pa kun tu
138b1(rgyud): min//gnas gang las ni sbyor ba 'byung //rnying ka nyid las 'byung mi 'gyur//khong stong dngos po thams cad la//skyed pa nyid ni snang mi 'gyur//yi ge hUM gi sbyar ba yis/
138b2(rgyud): rang gi dbyangs la yang dgo sbyar//de nyid nyon mongs can mi 'gyur//kun gzhi sa bon thams cad pa//dkanau drang lkog ma'i 'badu pa dang //lce yi cha gos las
138b3(rgyud): yang dag 'byung //yi ge hUM gi sgra byung ba/de ni mi rtog yang dag byung //de ltar 'byung ba'i sbyor ba las//gnas kyi nyon mongs cani mi 'gyur//tshig dang bcas
138b4(rgyud): pa'i ji bzhin sgra//'dus byas thams cad dor bar bya//ji bzhin hUM ga sbyor ba las//chos rnams thams cad skye ba med //rnam par rtog las yang dag byung //de
138b5(rgyud): ni mi rtog yang dag 'byung //'khor ba dag gi thog ma ni//ji ltar yang ni shes mi 'gyur//'dir ni skye ba mi snang zhing //'dus byas dag ni 'jig pa min//de bas
138b6(rgyud): yiye ge hU~M tsam gyis//'dus byas so sor brtag par bya//dag cing mthar thug gnas nyid ni//hU~M gis kyang ni sbyar bar bya//rang bzhin med pa'i sgra 'di ni//yA
138b7(rgyud): ge hUM las yang dag 'byung //'di la dngos po yod mo yin//rang bzhin med cing bdag med pa//de bzhin chos rnams thams cad kyi//rang bzhin nyid ni yod
139a1(rgyud): ma yin//bdag gam sems can gso ba med//gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs//zug pa med cing 'dus byas min//gnas ni rtam pa brtan
139a2(rgyud): par bya//dngos grub sbyor ba'i ye shes kyis//sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur//de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis//yi gre hU~M nr-i yang dag 'byung //ye shes dag
139a3(rgyud): pa yang dag 'byung //chos kyi dbyings kyis brtan par bya//sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul chen po yang //'dir ni nye bar mi dmigs te//gang phyir dus gsum
139a4(rgyud): gshegs snying po//sangs rgyas snying po tshogs su bshad//sangs rgyas sras bcas thams cad dang //rdo rje can ni rgyal srasu bcas//hU~M tsa ma gyi ni sbyor ba
139a5(rgyud): yis//kun tu yang dag dgug par bya//yi ge sbyor ba gcig gis ni//sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po bstan//gang phyir rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po//'di ni rang gi
139a6(rgyud): sbyor bas gnas//chos kyi rgyu 'thun bog chags ni//byang chub sems ni ma rtogs par//thog ma med ldan 'khor ba las//'byung ba cung zad yod ma
139a7(rgyud): yin//nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal dang //byang chub sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul ni//byang chub kyi ni sems med par//'gas kyang mya ngan 'da' mi nus//gal
139b1(rgyud): No sangs rgyas 'byung med na//nyan thos dag ni ga las 'byung //sangs rgyas 'byung ba yod min na//rang rgyal de ni 'byung mi 'gyur//gal te byang chub sems dpa' med/
139b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams ni gleng las byung //gal te byang chub sems med no//de bas 'khor lo 'di kun ni//byang chub sems lngas yang dag byung //byung sam smra gas
139b3(rgyud): ba chen po ni//yi ge hUM las yang dag byung //sangs rgyas thams cad rab 'byung ba//yi ge hUM gau snang bar 'gyur//gang phyir mtshan ldan gzugs can ni//rtag
139b4(rgyud): tu sangs rgyas rab 'byung ba//hUM yig gi ni sbyor ba hU~M/de nyid rdo rje yang dag byung //chos da byings rab sbyor rdo rje ni//de las yang dag 'byung bar 'gyur//
139b5(rgyud): dr-i las rdo rje rnal 'byor che//rnalnga 'byor dbang phyug bla na med//the tshom med par rnal 'byor kun//yi ge cho gi sbyor bas 'grub//de lta bu yi bzlas pa yis//
139b6(rgyud): ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis ni//sngon ni bsngo ba mdzad pa ltar//rnal 'byor las byos dge ba bAd+d+ho//byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yis ni//rang gi sems
139b7(rgyud): kyang bsngo bar bya//rdo rje chen po mthar phyin byed//byang chub sems kyis bsgral bar bya//chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po che//sems can thams cad gos pa
140a1(rgyud): /med//thams cad de dazhin gshegs snying go/nyon mongs 'dam gyis gos pa med//wA nA bla dkon du dag/zla du gang de'i 'od gsalag
140a2(rgyud): rtag tu yang dag rdzogs par gnas//rab tu dang ba 'grub par 'gyur//'di ni dang po chos ye shes//de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yin//rtag tu dag/
140a3(rgyud): par gnas pa ste//rang gi nyon mongs dag gis bsgribs//de bas rlung sems rnam pa ni//zla ba gang bar shes par bya//bdag ni dga' yang yang ma yin//
140a4(rgyud): chos nyid 'di ni rgyal bas shes//ye shes zla ba grang ba min//gang phyir bdag ni yod ma yin//zla ba grang ba dang mtshungs rigs//gang phyir dag cing gos pa
140a5(rgyud): med//sangs rgyas ye shes skyon med pa//zla ba'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya//mthong nas shes rab can gyis bsam//'di yang gang gisau rtogs par 'gyur///
140a6(rgyud): yun ring dus su sdug bsngal ba'i//de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das//nyon mongs pa yi bag chags kun//de bzhin sbyong bar byed par bsam//
140a7(rgyud): byang chub sems ni sems chen po//nyon mongs thams cad 'joms byed pa//chos kyi rgyu 'thun bag chags kyi//gnyen po ru na byung ba yin//de bas
140b1(rgyud): di yI mthu yis ni//sangs rgyu sa ye shes rnam par sbyong //gnas dran ldan+da ni dag chags baHsa//'dod pa'i 'dun gyis gos pa myong //nyim+b+ha lta bu'i sems
140b2(rgyud): glo//nyan mongs rtse ni rab sre ga byung zla ba lta bu'i sems chen po//dge ba'i spun+da ni rnam 'phel byed//ses kwa'i tsho po'i zla ba bzhin//nyi m+bu'i hUM byu rab sru
140b3(rgyud): byed//shar bar gyur pas zhi bor byud//nyon mongs gdung bas ma gdungs shing //mi shes pa'i nyi ma nyid//byang chub sems ni zla ba che//nyon mongs gdung //
140b4(rgyud): bzhi byed par//kun nas nyon mongs bag chags bcas//gnas dran len ni 'joms pa'i mchog/khapA la ni gyis ni lcags bzhin du//nyon mongs bag
140b5(rgyud): chags 'dren byed pa//rdo rje'i rlung bzhin rnal 'byor pas//byang chub sems de bsgom par bya//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor glan s+yai de ru//slar yang zla ba rnam par sgom
140b6(rgyud): byabyu chub sems kyi mdza yis ni//dag tshigs thos cang sreg byed pa//ye shes de ru 'byung 'o gyur te//gzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa sbyangs//rnam par mu~M rtog
140b7(rgyud): mtshungs med pa//bdag med de bzhin stong pa nyid//mi shes ro'i 'joms par byed//rdo rje dang mtshungs khong stong med//rdo rje'i rang bzhin snying po che//
141a1(rgyud): 'jig tshogs ri bo brtan pa ni//rdo rje des ni 'joms par byed//de phyir rdo rje'i rang bzhin brtan//de bas rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pas//zla ba/
141a2(rgyud): dbus su zla ba mtshungs//zla ba gnyis dbus rdo rje yis//rdo rje'i ye shes brten par bya//steng nyid de bzhin nyid de nyid//yang dag mtha'o dang 'dus ma
141a3(rgyud): byas//skye ba med cing 'gag pa med//yi ge hUM ni sgom par bshad//chos kyi dbyings ni brtan par mchog/nam mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs pa ni//
141a4(rgyud): zla ba'i dbus su bsgom par bya//hUM gi sbyor ba de yis ni//rdo rje'i mchog ni bsgom par bya//lus kun la ni spo bya zhing //stong pa nyid dang mtshungs par spros//
141a5(rgyud): gzugs 'di nyid ni ming tsamo ste//dngoso po 'ga' yang yod ma yin//cha shas kyi ni rnamo dpyad na//gzug zhi bya ba yod ma yin//'dzag rten kun rdzob
141a6(rgyud): zhes bya ste//dam pa'i don du yid ma yin//de lta bu yi rang bzhin du//gzugs zhes bya ba yod ma yayin//de dag phra rab rnam brtags kyang //phra rab zhes
141a7(rgyud): bya yod ma yin//'jig rten kun rdzob zhes bya ste//dam pa'i don du yod ma yin//de lta bu yi rang bzhin du//gzugs zhes bya ba yod ma yin//gzugs/
141b1(rgyud): de yod pa ma yin na//ji ltar yod ces bya ba yin//gal te gzugs de yod min na//ming yang de la yong ma yin//ming ni gang las yang dag byung //ming zhes bya/
141b2(rgyud): bA ci 'dra bar//dngos zhes bya ba dro drang mtshungs//ming des so sor brtags byas na//gnas gang zhig na rab tu gnas//dngos po gcig ni rnam phye na//ming//
141b3(rgyud): ni mang po yang dag byung //r-i rA yi ni dbye ba yis//sngar gyi ming ni nyams par 'gyur//de la ming ni yod min pa//mang ni yang dag 'byung ba med//gang la
141b4(rgyud): med ni yod min na/ji ltar ming du brjod par bya//gang gis ming ni reb gnas pa//rnam pa kun tu dmigs mi 'gyur//gzugs ni nye bar mi dmigs
141b5(rgyud): la//de la gzugs ni ji ltar yod//'di ni yong dag min rtog pa//brag chags ngag gi kun nas dkris//grang du byis pa rab rmongs shing //mya ngan
141b6(rgyud): 'das pa thob mo 'gyur//ji ltar gzugs ni rnam bsgom pa//de bzhin tshor dang 'du shes dang //so so ru ni rnam phyed na//de la snying po dmigaso mi 'gyur//
141b7(rgyud): gang la snying po yod min pa//de la dngos po ji ltar yod//gang la dngos po mi dmigs pa//dam pa'i don ni ji ltar yod//gang zhin bstan par mi//
142a1(rgyud): dmigs pa//de ni yod min dngos por med//chos rnams thams cad med pas na//skyo ba med par brjod par bya//gang zhig ma smos de stod
142a2(rgyud): min//gang zhig yod min ji ltar yod//mkhas pas chos rnams thams cad ni//'gag pa med ces bya bar brjod//skye ba med cing 'gag pa med//de ni
142a3(rgyud): bzod nas zhi bar 'dod//de phyir rang bzhin mya ngan 'das//'di ni stong pa nyid du brjod//'di ni yang dog de nyid che//yang dag mtha' ru brjod par bya//
142a4(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings ni snying po che//theg pa chen por brjod par bya//de ni snying po khong stong med//rdo rje'i brtan pa bla na med//lus kun la ni spro bya ste//bdag
142a5(rgyud): gis lus ni 'di lta bu//rdo rje'i bdag nyid ces bya gang //yoM ge hUM ni yongs su spro//sgom pa'i sbyor bA yis ni//sangs rgyas nyid ni 'grub par 'gyur//'di
142a6(rgyud): 'dra'i chos ni skye ba med//'dir yang 'byung ba snang ba med//hUM zhes bya ba'i sbyor ba yis//skye bar yang ni snang mi 'gyur//chos nyid dag pa badren pa gang //yang
142a7(rgyud): dag mtha' ni zag pa med//chos dbyings bstan pa dam pa ni//yi ge hUM du 'dir rob bsgrags//rdo rje yi ge hUM de nyid//chos dbyangs stug po bstan/
142b1(rgyud): //byang chub sems ga na //rdo gang yin daHd+hArmA/sa ti dag pa 'do d+hA/ sa d+hAd byA//sangs rgyas kun gyi stong bste//rdo rjebang//
142b2(rgyud): ge leg nA~M gan ste//de bus rdo rje nr-i kun b+he//gsang po'i rnal 'byor thams cad dang //sa sa b+h+yo na yis//skyes me nal 'byor ba sgom par /
142b3(rgyud): bla bla'i dkyil 'khor da m+b+ha pA ni//snying kwa'i dbus su bsgom par bya//zla ba de la zla ba gnyis//dbus su za ba rab bsgrim bya//zla ba'i dbus su rdo rje ni//mkha
142b4(rgyud): ba yis ni bak+tom+b+ha par bya//rdo rje'i dbus su oM g+hed+d+he//ngas rgyas byang chub rab m+bu bya//dem+b+ha du la spyi mas//lus n+ti rab hUM bskum par b+h+rUM/
142b5(rgyud): mdad bzlas pa yis//rdo rje'i bdag nyid myur+ya du thag/ rje hU~M mdzad sgom pa rdzogasahUM/sbyong ji bzhin du//TI ga thams cad rnam por bskum/
142b6(rgyud): snyoms de chen po'i sbyor ba yis/ grI b+hin+d+ra drug dge ba yin//sangs rgyas kun gyi yi ga rgyu//gang phyir sangs rgyas rigs byung ba//rdo rje can dag kun gyi
142b7(rgyud): hUM//drage po btsod kuni rab tu sgom//oM na ron chen yang dag ldan//d+hI ni pad+ma raM yang dag ldan//maM gaM oM ni sna tshogs brjod//de lta bur ying bsgom par bya/
143a1(rgyud): hUM nI sangs rgyas rdo r+N+Ne dag/d+hA n+da dzA rje skying po s+thA//yi gr-id+d+hiHn+ma rdo r+N+Na bstan//sna tshogs rdo rje yi ge a//hUM ni rdo rje sems dpa' ste//ho nr-i r+t+r-i
143a2(rgyud): chags pa ste//rdo rdo ldegs pa yi gr-i sa//maM ni rdo rje rin chen te//rdo rje grizi brjid yI gre A//tA ni rdo rje rgyu la mtshan te//rdo rje gzhed pa yi ge ha//yi gri d+hIHni
143a3(rgyud): spyan//rdo rje rnon po yi ge d+hI//maM ni rdo rje 'khor lo ste//rdo rje smra ba yi ge sa//yi ge shaM nr-i rdo rje las//rdo rje srung ba yi ge hUM//hUM ni rdo rje gnod sbyin s+ho//rdo
143a4(rgyud): khro tshur yi ge ba//gang dang gang la 'dod pa nyid//snying kar de bzhin bsgom par bya//yi ge hUM ni rnal 'byor pa//de ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur//nyi shu rtsa
143a5(rgyud): gcig bzlas pa yis//gzugs gcig rnam par spro bar bya//yi ge hU~M bzlas tsam gyis ni//sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur//zla ba'i dkyil
143a6(rgyud): 'khor dbus gnas par//rang bdag nyid ni bsgom par bya//bdag nyid rdo rje'i gzugs su ste//rdo rje gcig ni rnam par bsgom//rdo rje'i dbus kyi
143a7(rgyud): bar ni//de ru yi ge hUM bsgom bya//theg pa chen po mngon por bsdus//ji bzhin mdo yi rjes 'brangs nas//ji bzhin rgyal po skyes bur bcas//yi
143b1(rgyud): ts+tshi nI dang por ba shad//de bzhin yid kun rnal 'byor pas//sgying ka ru ni bsgom par bya//bdag nyid rdo rje'i gzugs su ste//dbus su yi ge hUM bsgom bya//dra
143b2(rgyud): bzhin yi ge thas cad kyang //rnal 'byor pas ni snying kar bsgom//zla ba'i gzugs las yang dag gnas//bdag nyid yongs su bsgom bya zhing //rigs kyi lha
143b3(rgyud): yi sbyor ba yis//rang bdag nyid ni bsgom par bya//rdo rje sems dpa' gang 'ga' zhig/gang dang gang zhig mngon 'dod pa//rig pa de ni snying kar sgom//yi gri//
143b4(rgyud): ni dang por sbyar//gang phyirare de las rtogs pa 'byung //de bzhin yid kun rnal 'byor pas//snying kar bsgoms pas bsgom par bya//yang nu na mkha'i
143b5(rgyud): sbyor ba yis//yi ge hUM ni dang por sbyar//nam mkha'i rang bzhin bsgom bya zhing //yi gi ngag ni thams cad sbyar//yang ni nam mkha'i zla dbus
143b6(rgyud): su//gnas pa'i yi ge hUMbasgom bya//bdag nyid rigs kyi lha mor bsam//skad cig de la rab 'grub 'gyur//hU ni ji skad bstan pa bzhin//sngags/
143b7(rgyud): kun rab tu bsgom par bya//rig pa kun gyi gsang ba ni//rgyud kun yang dag bsdus pa ste//bzlas pa'i gsang ba des sbas pa//gsing ba 'di ni rnam pa drug
144a1(rgyud): rig 'dzin rnams k+Sh+mI spyod buM dang //rnal 'byo rgyud ni bsdus pa dang //don spyong shin tu rmad 'byung ba//gas ba las kyang mchog gas/
144a2(rgyud): bshud//bzlas brjod cem gyi sbyor ba yis//lta ba'i ri bo'i ngoms par 'gyur//rang gi snying ka'i dbus su ni//zla ba'i dkyil 'dor bsgom par bya//
144a3(rgyud): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de dbus su//zla ba gnyis pa bsgom par bya//dbugs 'byung rngub pa gang yin pa//rdo rje yi ge hUM du sgrom//me bsrubs pa yaM
144a4(rgyud): sbyor ba yis//steng dang 'og tu rgyu bar bya//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag gnas//dbus su yi ge hISh+Ta bsgom bya//ste 'og 'gro ba ba sgom par
144a5(rgyud): bya//yi ge hUM ni de sbyar nas/ji ltar shing skam gtsub brtan pa//gtsub shing yang dag sbyor ba yis//rtsol ba byas pa tsam gyis ni//skad cig
144a6(rgyud): gas ni mi 'byung bzhin//yi ge aM ni drachub bstan te//yi ge hUM gi cub shing yin//rgyu ba'i rnal 'byor pa yis ni/skad cig gis ni ye shes skye
144a7(rgyud): shes rab pha rol phyin ye shes//yi ge hIHru 'dir brjod bya//byang chub sems ni yi ge hUM//me yau sbyor bas bsrub par bya//bsrubs pa'o/
144b1(rgyud): sbyor ba 'di yis ni//ye shes dam pa skye bar 'gyur//rdo rje de ni bsreg bya ste//rdo rje ye shes bla na med//b+ha ga sangs rgyas kun shes rab//ling ga rdo rjer brjod par//
144b2(rgyud): byo//byang chub sems gang de rdo rje//b+ha ga ling gar rab tu sgrub//b+ho gr-ir ling ge bcug nus ni//mdo sde gsang dpong las gsungs so//b+ha ga'i sbyor ba 'di
144b3(rgyud): yis ni//mkhas pas ling ga gzhug par bya//gsang ba gze brjid chen po 'di//mi bsrubs pa yi sbyor ba yis//'ga' zhig gas ni 'di bsgrubs
144b4(rgyud): na//skad cag gis ni ye shes skye//bzlas pa gsang ba rnam pa bdun rdzogs so///sbas pa gsang ba rgyud chen po//'di nyid rnal 'byor kun tu/
144b5(rgyud): bsdus//de nyid chen po bsdus pa ni//de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya//zla ba gang ba yang dag gnas//bdag nyid rdo rjer bsgom par bya//de yi dbus su//
144b6(rgyud): rje ste//rdo rje rigs kyi bzlas pa bya//zla ba gang ba la gnas par//bdag nyid pad+mar bsgom par bya//de yi dbus su pad+ma de//pad+mo'i rigs kun bzlas
144b7(rgyud): par bya//zla ba geng ba la gnas par//bdag nyid nor bur bsgom par bya//de yi dbus su rin chen dang //rin chen rigs kyi bzlas par bya//ba ni
145a1(rgyud): nyid rdo rje gcig pu ni//rdo rje rnon po rab tu sgom//de yi sna kyi rigs mchog la//lus kyi rigs kun bzlas par bya//sangs rgyus nos
145a2(rgyud): dran nas brtsams te//sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam par sgom//de yi thugs khur zhugs nas ni//sangs rgyas rigs kun bzlas par bya//rdo rje
145a3(rgyud): sems dpa'i gzugs chen po//sems dpa' gcig ni rnam par bsgom//de yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni//rdo rje rigs kun bzlas par bya//pad+ma'i
145a4(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po'i gzugs//'jig rten dbang phyug rnam par bsgom//de yi thugs khar zhugs na sA ni//pad+ma'i rigs kun bzlas par bya//nor
145a5(rgyud): bu rin chen skal ba che//rdo rje rin chen rnam par sgomo//da yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni//rIn tshan rigs kun bzlas par bya//sems dpa' chen
145a6(rgyud): blo rdo rje lus//sems dpa'i gzugs ni rnam par bsgom//de yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni//las kyi rigs kun bzlas par bya//bden pa dam
145a7(rgyud): tshig mchog gyur pa//sangs rgyas thams cad rab grol byed//thos pa tsam gyis thabs chen po//yang na snying kar rdo rang bzhin//sna tshogs
145b1(rgyud): bdag po bzlas brjod mtshungs//shes rab can gyis gang bsam pa//phun sum tshogs kun bde bar bang //gsang ba yang dag bshad par bya//sangs rgyas
145b2(rgyud): gzugs ni rnam bsgom bya//da yi thugs kar 'jug bya zhing //yid kyis thams cad bcug nas na//de yi sku ni mtshungs par spro//dri yi thugs ka'i dbus
145b3(rgyud): su ni//rdo rje'i rigs ni rab tu bshad//ji bzhin sngon gyi rjes 'brang nas//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spro//de lta bu yI sbyor ba yis//de
145b4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bzlas na//the tshom med par sangs rgyas kun//skad cig de nyid kyis 'grub 'gyur//rdo rje'i mda' ni zhu ba 'ang//'di
145b5(rgyud): lta bu yi gzugs bsgom bya//de yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni//rdo rje 'i gar dang mtshungs par sgom//de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis//rdo rje'i rigs can /
145b6(rgyud): thams cad ni//za tshom med par dngos grub kun//ye shes bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur//pad+ma'i sems dpa' ba sgom bya zhing //thugs kar/
145b7(rgyud): bzhin 'jug par bya//sna tshogs thabs ni reb bsgoms na//pad+ma'i rigs can 'gru ba par 'gyur//rdo rje rin chen bsgomo bya zhing //thugs kar je
146a1(rgyud): /ji bzhin 'jug par b+ha//rin chen mdzod ni bcug nas su//yang dang yang dra skyo bar bya//de bru yo sbyong ba yis//rdo rje rin chen dag
146a2(rgyud): chen po//the tshom med par dngos grub kun//bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur//stong gi sumagyi ni 'jig rten 'dir//rdo rje las su rnam par
146a3(rgyud): bsam//de yi thugs kar zhugs nas ni//sna tshogs rnam 'phrul spro bar bya//de lta bu yi sbyor ba yi//sna tshogs mdzad ni rab spros nas//the tshom
146a4(rgyud): med par dang smra kun//bzlas pa tsam gyi 'grub par 'gyur/shin tu go sang bu 'di lnga ni//bzlas bya gi sang ba bla na med//de lta bu yi sbyor ba yi swA/
146a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur//bzlas pa'i cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di//rgyud kyi snying po kun bsdus shing //nyon mongs thams cad rab 'jems shing /
146a6(rgyud): rig pa 'dzin pas bzlas par bya//bzlas pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni//rdeg pa'i brtul zhugs nges par blang //gal te 'di ni dngos grub 'dod//
146a7(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa yis brtul zhugs bya//bzlas brjod sbyin sreg cho ga ni//rnal 'byor mchog tu brtson par bya//theg pa chen po ma den bsdus
146b1(rgyud): //bye ba gsum ni yongs su bzla//bye ba gsum ni bzlas byas nas//sgrub pa drug ni brtsam par bya//byang chub sems ni dga' chen po//shes rab
146b2(rgyud): can gyi dkyil 'khor bri//rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che//sems can cig gis yang dag bri//gang phyir rgyal po mchog gsang dbang //rdo rje
146b3(rgyud): mchog ni rab ster byed//rdo rje drabyings kyi sbyor ba yis//de ni sngon du yang dag brtsam//shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bri//khru ni bcu par yang
146b4(rgyud): dag bri//gru bzhi po la sgo bzhi pa//rta bibs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan//ka ba brgyad dang yang dag ldan//dar gyis chun pos rnam par brgyan//
146b5(rgyud): thig bzhi drang ni yang dag ldan//kha khyer dag gis shin tu spras//rIn chen dra bas yongs su bri//gser sku'i dril bu g.yer khas brgyan//sgo/
146b6(rgyud): khyud dang ni mtshams rnams su//rdo rje'i ching bas rab tu ba cing //rdo rje rin chen rab tu bkod//rdo rje thig gis thig btab pa//dri yI sbyor ba/
146b7(rgyud): cho ga dang //phur bus bgegs ni bsal bya zhing //tshon rtsi lnga yi srang bu ni//rdo rje gsang bas bsrung bar bya//rdo rje dbyings rmyi sbyor
147a1(rgyud): sa//phyi rol dkyil 'khor rdib gdab bya//rdo skad sbyar bshad nyid ni/rdo rje ga snang ba yongs bkod nas//phyi rolnga dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya//
147a2(rgyud): 'khor lo rab mdzes la//'khor lo'i dbus su rab tu dgod//rdo rje tshigs pa yongs su dgod//tshon rtsi lnga ni rab tu dbye//ji skad gsang rgyud las gsungs
147a3(rgyud): bzhin//dkar po sna tshogs 'od 'bar ba//sngon po ser po shin tu 'bar//bcod sogs dang ni rab tu ldan//'od zer dmar po sna tshogs ldan//sna tshogs
147a4(rgyud): tshon rtsis bre bar ba//'od zer dmar po sna tshogs 'bar//rdo rje 'bor lo yongs bked nas//zla ba gang ba rab dgod do//'bar lo thams cad yongs su
147a5(rgyud): bzung //kha do go ji bzhin rigs pa bzhin//ji ltar mdzes shing shin tu dkar//ji bzhin zla ba nye ba mtshungs//zla ba gang ba yang dag bri//zla ba gang ba'i
147a6(rgyud): dbus su ni//rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bri//gang gis mtshan ni bzung ba yis//skad cig gis ni sdig pa 'grol//mdzum pa dang bcas zla ba'i
147a7(rgyud): mdog/shin tu chags pa dga' chen pa//myur du rdo rje'i tshogs brjod do//rdo rje nyid kyi snying po yin//oM ma hA su khe badz+ra satwa hUM dzaHhUM baM ho rdo rje'i glu
147b1(rgyud): ni rmang bya zhing //byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa che//sangs rgyas byang chub rab ster byed//'dod pa'i chags pa yang dag dran//thams cad rjes chags bde ba
147b2(rgyud): zugs mchog mnga'//rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu dga' ba mchog/kye khyed bde chen bstan pas 'phel mdzad pa//rab tu myur du sgrub pa 'grub par mdzod//
147b3(rgyud): /rdo rje'i glu ni de lta bu//blang zhing 'khor lo spyan drang bya//rdo rje sems dpa'i rgyal po che//rjes su chags shing rab 'grub 'gyur//sems dpa' skyil krung
147b4(rgyud): yang dge gnas//rdo rje bsnyems tshul 'tshong ba'i mchog/rol pa dang bcos spyan g.yo ba//snyems tshul chen po dga' ba che//g.yas pa'i phyog gis rdo//
147b5(rgyud): rje ni//thugs ka ru ni 'dzin pa'i ma chog/g.yon pa dril bu yang dag ldan//slar yang bsnyems tshul dang bcas pa//byang chub sems dpa'i rdo rje che//
147b6(rgyud): rgyal po chen po thub pa che//spyod pa chen po theg pa che//rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod//rin chen chen po rdo rje che//rgyal mtshan chen po dran pa
147b7(rgyud): cha//sangs rgyas dran pa rdo rje che//rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod//'dod chags chen po bde ba che//bde ba chen po bla na med//sa dang
148a1(rgyud): rol phyin bde ba//rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod//shes rab chen po rdo rje che//rdo rje hU~M mdzad las byung ba//byang chub sems ni rdo rje
148a2(rgyud): che//rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod//rdo rje chen po chags pa che//rgyal po chen po thub pa che//don yod rgyal po rdo rje mchog/rdo rje sems
148a3(rgyud): dpa' bdag grub mdzod//chos kyi srid pa 'khor lo che//smra ba'i las ni bla na med//srung zhing bsrung ba drag po che//rdo rje khu tshur bdag grub mdzod//
148a4(rgyud): rdo rje yi ni glu 'di yis//de nyid mchog tu bskul naswa ni//rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che//'grub 'a gyur 'di la the tshom med//'dod chags chen pa
148a5(rgyud): dga' ba che//rdo rje sems dpa' sgom bya zhing //rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che//mkhas pas dkyil 'khor dgod par bya//dkyil 'khor snga ma
148a6(rgyud): dang mtshungs par//dkyil 'khor du ni yong dag bri//de nas rdo rje lus nas ni//mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad gdon par bya//chos kyi reg pa 'dzin pa
148a7(rgyud): ni//dbab dang gzhug pa la sogs pa//rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis//las rnams thams cad yong dag bya//bum pa la sogs yo byad dang //
148b1(rgyud): spos dang me tog la sog+sas mchog/rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis//las rnams thams cad yang dag bya//rdo rje sems dpa'i rig pa yis//bum pa brgya
148b2(rgyud): brgyad bzlas na//de ni zhabs kyi drung bzhag na//rdo rje dadung rtsi'i chu ru 'gyur//rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yiso//cho ge ji bzhin 'jug bya zhing //rdo rje snyim snad pa'i
148b3(rgyud): phyag rgya che ste//bdag nyid la ni dbang bskur bya//hU~M gis yang dag zhugs nas ni//rdo rje mchod pas yang dag mched//rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin
148b4(rgyud): gyis//ci rigs par ni bsgrub par bya//zla ba'i da kyil 'khor gang bar gnas//phyag rgya chen po yongs su gzung //rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin
148b5(rgyud): gyis//rang bdag nyid ni bsgrub par bya//de nas gsang ba phyag rgya che//skad rig re re bsgrub par bya//rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che//brtan par 'gyur/
148b6(rgyud): bar the tshom med//gsung ba'i rdol 'byor bsgrubs nas na//shin tu brten pa bla med pa//rjes chags sems dpa' chen po ni//skad cig gis ni
148b7(rgyud): bsgrub par bya//de 'dra'i mchog tu gsang ba mthar phyin pa//sems dpa' rgyal chen yongs su dag pa mchog/dag pa'i tshul 'di cung zad mtshungs pa
149a1(rgyud): /med//rjes chags 'dod chags yongs su dag pa mchog/rdo rje rgyal mchog rab dag dri ma mod//gsa' ba la byung 'khor lo dam pa 'dzin//
149a2(rgyud): rig pa'i gsang sngags tshul 'di byang chub byed//snying rje dang ldan spyod pa spyod byed pa//de bzhin rab 'jigs sdug bsngal chen po'i pha rol phyin gyur pa/
149a3(rgyud): mchog tu mkhas shing phra ba rgyud dang rgyud dag las byung ba//de ru srid po dag gi dra ba chen po gcod mdzad pa//gseng sngags 'khor lo la si byung ba
149a4(rgyud): yi 'khor lo ste//de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis dgongs pa gcig/sras kyi gtso bo dbang sgyur rgyal po ste//de yis mthar pa'i grong khyer
149a5(rgyud): rab tu bshad//gsang ba rnal 'byor chen po de kho na nyid dam pa mchog tu gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po rdo rje rtse mo las de bzhin gshegs pa thams
149a6(rgyud): cad kyi mdo sde gsang ba'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs zhes bya ba'i le'u gnyis pa rdzogs so///de nas rnal 'byor gsang ba che/
149a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kun bsdus pa//chos kyi dbyings ni brtan pa'i ma chog/nam mkha' sna tshogs dngos ldan pa//ri dbang rgyal po chen po ste/
149b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas rgya ni sprul pa skul//rdo rje dbang po chen po'i gnas//sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag bzlas//rdo rje rgyal po rtsa mo ste//gsang ba'i rnal 'byor yang
149b2(rgyud): dag byung //rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal po che//rje ste dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i mtshungs//rdo rje dun gyi rab mdzes pa//mchog tu gyur pa'i gnas do ru/
149b3(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal po ni//rnal 'byor pa ni mi gsungs bzhugs//sem sa pa'i skyil klung yang dag bzhugs//gabos chos kun dbang du
149b4(rgyud): gyur//rol bcas rdo rje bsnyems tshul ldan//rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che//sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas gcig ste//chos pa chen po yin lnga'i byor
149b5(rgyud): mchog/sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus nas ni//thub pa'i dbang phyug la gsol btab//rdo rje rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che//byang chub sems dpa'i dgo
149b6(rgyud): chen po//sems dpa' byung sems las byung ba//rang gi ro gas 'byung ba shud du gus la//rdo rje 'chang ba rgyal po ste//rgyud kyi snying po gsang
149b7(rgyud): che//gsang ba chen po rigs kyi dbang //me do sde gsang dbang rgyal po ste//theg po chen po mngon bsdus pa//zhi bas byang chub 'grub 'gyur te//
150a1(rgyud): thams cad yang dag bsdus pa min//gtum po thams cad rab 'joms pa//rang rigs rtag tu bshad du gsol//rdo rje 'chang ba rgyal
150a2(rgyud): po ste//kun tu mi gsungs bzhugs par gyur//mi gsungs gsang ba ma gsungs te//zhi ba'i bde ba la bzhugs gyur//gsang po de bzhin
150a3(rgyud): gshegs pa mchog/sems dpa' chen po snyoms par bzhugs//rtogs shing gzigs par mi mdzad de//gsang ba'i rnal 'byor bzhugs par
150a4(rgyud): gyur//sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus nas ni//chos kyi dbyings ni brtan par mdzad//sangs rgyas gcigra bzhin yang dag 'gyur ro//de na yod
150a5(rgyud): grub pa bla na med//sangs rgyas thams cad rnal 'byor cha//gsang ba 'dun las yang dag byung //rdo rje'i sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin gyis//rdo rje can
150a6(rgyud): la bskul bar gsungs//oM badz+ra satwa u tiSh+Tha//rdo rje bskul ba gsungs pa na//chos dbyings sangs rgya sku gcig pu nyid//gsang ba'i rnal
150a7(rgyud): 'byor ting 'dzin gyis//rdo rje sems dpa' bzhengs par gyuraro//thub pas mgon rnams la btud nas//tshig ni 'di skad gsungs par gyur//
150b1(rgyud): rnam pa kun tu ci zhig bgyi//bla dag la sangs rgyas kun gyi gsungs//phyag na rdo rje brtan pa la//de nas sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs//gsang ba
150b2(rgyud): rdo rje rigs zhes pa//rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol//sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung thos nas//rdo rje dbang po'i gnas snang byed//rab tu/
150b3(rgyud): btud nas tshig gsungs pa//mgon po rnal 'byor gzigs su gsol//bdag gi snod dang ldan pa'i mchog/'di na sems tson 'ga' yang/
150b4(rgyud): med//gang phyir mu stegs la chags shing //skye dgu lta ba'i dri mas khyab//sems can 'dri dag 'dul bya min//sangs rgyas chos kyi
150b5(rgyud): snod ma yin//log pa'i lam du yang dag zhugs//mun pa stug po lnga gzhol ba//la la lha yi lta ba chagasaso//kha cig brtul zhugs lta bu'i
150b6(rgyud): gi nas//kha cig dka' thub gdungs pas 'khrulnga//nyon mongs byas ni 'khrugs pa'i sems//'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la chags//skye bar
150b7(rgyud): yang ni mi 'gyur te//rdo rje rigs kyi gsang 'dol//nam yang sbyor ba mi 'gyur ro//de dga' dedang chags che la chags//'dod pa'i tshogs pa/
151a1(rgyud): dag las rgyal//sangs rgyus byang chub tshugs bral ba//gsang ba 'di la sbyor ma 'gyur//lta ba'i chags pas rgyal bur 'gyur//
151a2(rgyud): 'dod pa'i chagasra bas lta bats+tshin//srid pa'i zhogs pas shin tu chags//sangs rgyas bston pa la rmugs bral//nga rgyal lhag pa'i nga rgyal
151a3(rgyud): cing //gdug cing drag la shin tu khro//snying rje med cing brtsi med 'gyur//de la gsang ba rung ma yin//rmongs pa kun mkhyen yin snyam
151a4(rgyud): pa//ye shes chen po la mkhas pa//gsang ba 'di ni rung ma yin/'dren pa ji ltar bshad par bgyi//gnod sbyin dang ni srin po nyid//
151a5(rgyud): sha za 'byung po gsang ba pa//lha la sogs pa gdug chen po//bsten pA lA ni 'jug mi 'gyur//dra ni sangs rgyus rab tu zhi//byang chub
151a6(rgyud): sems ni dga' chen po//sems can 'di dag shin+da tu gdug/bdag gi tshigle ni 'grub mi 'gyu//nga ni rgyal chen thog chen la//na mo mkha'
151a7(rgyud): dbyings bzhin rab tu yang //kye ma sems can 'di dag da man//bdag gi tshig ni 'grub mi 'gyur//nga ni theg chen dag pa ste//nyen
151b1(rgyud): mongs 'dam gyis gos pa med//kye ma'o sems can 'di nyon mongs//bdag gi tshig 'di 'gru ba mi 'gyur//dra ni shes rab ye shes che//theg pa che la
151b2(rgyud): shin tu brtan//kye ma sems can shes rab ngan//bdag gi tshig 'di 'grub mi 'gyur//bsod nams chen po ye shes che//nga ni mchod pa chen
151b3(rgyud): po'i tshogs//kye ma sems can bsod nams chung //bdag gi tshig 'di 'grub mi 'gyur//sems can 'di dag nye bar 'tshe//'jigs pa sna tshogs kun
151b4(rgyud): tu khyab//rnam rtog gis bskyod shes rab dran//sangs rgyas chos kyi snod ma yin//stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di//bdag po chen po dbang phyug/
151b5(rgyud): kyang //rmongs pa kun sel nyid gyur pa//stobs chen rdzu 'phrul chen po ste//de la rgyal po grog byed yod//sgyu ma'i sngags ni yongs su 'dzin//
151b6(rgyud): de ni mi rgyud ces bya ste//sems can rmongs byed lhur len pa//de ni rgyal po lha chen po//ga tso bo rgyal po chen po mtshungs//de ni dbang phyug che//
151b7(rgyud): zhes bya//gdug pa'i sems can 'jomaso byed pa//de yi gzugaso can rgyal po che//bskyed byed byed pa pa bdag po//tshangs pa chen po rgyal po
152a1(rgyud): \u0f7f//sta ba sna chags rab sbyar ba//'dod pa'i khams kyi rtul po//dbyung ba nas bya shASh+Ti'i 'ad/tsun 'grus dbang phyug rten pa/
152a2(rgyud): bu//gdong drug rdzu 'phrul chen po can//dpung tshan zhes byang+ge'i ming che ste//gzhon nu mig ldan 'od can
152a3(rgyud): pa//rgyal pa chen po 'di lnga na//khams gsum gyi ni bdag por bshad//rgyal po lnga ni gozi brjid che//lus gsum gyi ni ngo mtshar che//
152a4(rgyud): sku byed dbang phyug chen po ni//tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che//de yi lus can rgyal po che//dbang phyug chen po zhes grags pa//sems can gdug pa
152a5(rgyud): shin tu drag/sngags bcas 'khor dang bcas pa yi//rgyal po lnga po de dag ni//sems can dag ni rnam rmongs byed//lta bu chen po 'dzin byed cing //
152a6(rgyud): bdud kyi dbang du gyur pa ste//nyon mongs chen pos rab nyon mongs//gzhan yang kun nas nyon mongs byed//sems can dag/ni 'joms byed cing //bdag
152a7(rgyud): gi tshig 'di 'grub mi 'gyur//dbang phyug chen po bdag nyid che//bdag nyid dam pa'i yid chen po//de lta bu yi rnam rtog gis//sems can rnam par rmongs
152b1(rgyud): par byed//tshangs pa 'byin byed skye dgu'i bdag/byed pa rang bdag byed pa po//lta ba chen po de lta bus//sems can dag ni rnam rmongs byed//khyab 'jug kun song
152b2(rgyud): khyabo byed pa//khyab 'jog ring pozhini grong khyer kun//de ltar yang dag mi 'dzin pa//lta ba'i 'chang ba rab ster byed//rgya cher rgyal po 'di rnams ni//lte bar smra/
152b3(rgyud): lo nges par ston//rmongs pa mkhas pa yin sems shing //sems can 'ching bar byed pa yin//sems can de rnams gzhan gyis bskul//lta ba smra bar
152b4(rgyud): nges par sten//khyab 'jug tshangs pa la sogs pa//dbang phyug chen po phyag byed//sangs rgyas ye shes rnam kun du//bdag gi tshig 'di 'grub mi byed//
152b5(rgyud): sems can 'di rnams rmongs par 'gyur//de la gsang ba rung ma yin//de lta bu yi rnam pa yis//rdo rje sems dpa' dga' chen po//snang sro rgyas
152b6(rgyud): kun gyis mkhyen nas ni//rnal 'byor pa ni mi gsung bzhugs//mgon po chen po sangs rgyas kun//thub pa nyi ma ma lus pas//gsung gcig gis ni gos
152b7(rgyud): ba che//rdo rje yi ni tshig gsungs pa//kye ma'o sems can 'di gdul dka'//gdug cing drag la shin tu gtum//sangs rgyas kun gyis mi 'dul ba//de
153a1(rgyud): /phyir bdag cag gsal ba 'debs//mgon khyod shes rab chen po ste//de ni thabs chen brjod par bya//byang chub sems ni thabs rkyen gro//
153a2(rgyud): nyon mongs thams cad nges par 'joms//gdug pa thams cad rab gdul ba//mgon po khyod la gsol ba 'de bos//gdug pa 'dul byed rnam
153a3(rgyud): 'phrul ba//thabs chen po ni rab tu gsungs//sangs rgyas kun gyis sems can 'di//'dul bar mi 'gyur snod min la//thabs tshe na khro bo
153a4(rgyud): chen po ni//thub pa chen pos bstan du gsol//sangs rgyas kun gyi tshig gsan nas//phyag na rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che//tshig dag gis ni zhugs gyur
153a5(rgyud): pa//sangs rgyas kun la 'di skad gsungs//e ma'o gsang ba 'khor lo che//thabs chen bdag nyid chen po ste//chos kyi dbyangs ni bstan pa'i
153a6(rgyud): dngos//thabs kyi 'khor lo rab ston pa//ji skad du ni bka' stsal pa//de bzhin du ni bdag gis bgyi//sems can kun la phan byi'i phyir//drag
153a7(rgyud): po nyid ni bstan par bya//de skad gsungs nas sem dpa' che//byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che//mi gsung bzhugs nas rnal 'byor gyis//
153b1(rgyud): drug po nyid la snyoms par zhugs//drag po'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje mchog/zhes bya'i ting 'dzin de lta bu//drag po chen po snyoms par zhugs//de bzhin
153b2(rgyud): thugs ka nas byung ba//drag po 'jig rung yi ge hUM//khro bo chen po brjod por 'gyur//rdo rje hUM mdzad khro rgyal po//mgon po thugs ka nas phyung
153b3(rgyud): gyur//sa gzhi ma lus g.yos gyur cing //sa 'di dge ni sgra sgrogs gyur//stod gsum me lus 'du dag ni//hUM hUM zhes bya brjod par gyur//tshad
153b4(rgyud): med gzhal du med pa yi//khro bo'i rgyal po byung gyur pas//phyogs rnams kun tu gdug chen dag/skad cig de la gtum par gyuraro//slar yang gcig/
153b5(rgyud): nyid gyur nas ni//gong bur byas nas rab bsdams te//khro bo 'i rgyal po sku chen po//'jigs su rung ba gcig tu gyur//de ni khro ba'i rgyal po che//
153b6(rgyud): sang+yas rgyas kun gyi grags tshon blo//khro rgyal mdun du 'dug nas ni//sla re yang snying po rab tu brjod//hUM t+yA hUM t+yA/'jigs su rung ba'i spu langs byed//
153b7(rgyud): gnod sbyin kun bdag gnod sbyin te//rdo rje gon sbyin rdzu 'phrul che//khro bo chen po brjod pa yin//stong gsum gyi ni 'jog rten 'di//'ang
154a1(rgyud): ba'i phred pa'i khyod kyis khyab//rdo rje me ni drag po che//pA lus gsal zhing mo 'bar gyur//phyi rol gyi ni gdug pa can//ma lus
154a2(rgyud): dAkyilnga 'khor las byung ba//rdo rje mye ni rlob 'bar bas//g.yo ba myed cing shi byer gyur//lha chen la stsogs gdug pa rnams//gang+gA dag rigs//
154a3(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor rnams//rdo rje ga nod sbyin gyis gdungs nas//g.yo ba med cing 'byor bar gyur//de ni rdo rje granod sbyin che//drag po'i gzugs
154a4(rgyud): can rab 'dzags byed//khro gnyer bskor ba'i gdong can te//de bzhin gnag dang sngo bar gyur//mche bya gtsigs po'i zhul mnga' bya//dbu skra
154a5(rgyud): gyen brdzes shin tu sgeg/spyan dam r-I spyan dang ldan pa ste//de bzhin rdo rje bstan pa'i zhal//drag po rdo rje drag tshogs 'dzin//gcig pu'abar/
154a6(rgyud): pa rab ldan pa//zhigs pa lcags kyu rdo rje bdag//sangs rgyas thams cad 'jigs byed pa//sa rnams me lus g.yo bar byed//sa 'di yang ni g.yo bar byed
154a7(rgyud): gnod sbyin chen po 'byung po sogs//ga yo ba med cing 'og tu 'gyel//don drag po gnod sbyin che//sangs rgyas thams cad 'jigs par byed//de yi
154b1(rgyud): spyan sngar 'dug nas no//ched du brjod pa yang dag brjod//e ma'o byang chub kyi ni sems//kun tu bzang po kun dge bya//semasra tsa nu 'dul ba'i thabs su ni /
154b2(rgyud): na nyid \u0f89\u0fa4 /swA rA ni d+he mas paSh+Ta//nide'i gzugs su rnam gnas rjegarnyeng sprin ljin b+hair nas/
154b3(rgyud): po zhes byar grag ste//de ni drag po rdo rje 'dzin//'jigs rung ba spu langs par byed//yi ge hUM bzhi'i phyag rgya yi//snying po'i gtum po nyid kyang
154b4(rgyud): gsungaso//oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha r+b+be//gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/gr-ih+NA pa yaM gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/A na ya ho b+ha gaM bAna? badz+ra hUM phaT/shin tu gtu mi zhing cher grags
154b5(rgyud): pa//de bzhin thugs ka naM saM byung ste//zhel bzhi rdo' ni phyi reg brgya pa//bskal pa yi ni me ltar drag/rdo rje dus kyi me ltar byung //hon
154b6(rgyud): mongs phyogs ni rab sreg byed//smin ma bskyod pas gtsigs pa'i zhol//de bzhin rnam par 'jigs pa'i go dang //'jig rten gsum sreg dam tshig
154b7(rgyud): skye//rdo rje can kun sreg par byed//'bor phreng kun tu 'khregs pa'i sgra//rdo rje bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar//rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag rgya ni//phyag gnyis
155a1(rgyud): kyai ni yongs su bzung //rdo rje bsdams pa 'dzin rgyal po//lcags kyu dang ni zhugs pas brgyan//rdo rje yi ni lu gu rgyud //phyag

155a3(rgyud): myur ba ru ni breka' stsol cig/min ni sangs rgyas khyed rnams kun//the tshom med par bza' bar bya//de nas sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung //zlo
155a4(rgyud): hUM dza hUM shin tu drag/rigs dang bcas par lha tshon po//stobs chen po yis dgug par gyis//de nas rig pa'i mchog rgyal po//snyems
155a5(rgyud): pi'i tshul gyi bshad byed cing //khro bo drag pu rnga sgra sgrogs//rdo rje zhags pa bskul bar bya//rdo rje zhags pa drag po che//dpung bcus grogs

155b1(rgyud): ga yas+ya brdzogs par gyur//dbang ldan rgyal blo la smras pa//khyod la ston pa spyan 'dron mdzod//skrag spyong khros nas lta rgyun thos//'jigs pa
155b2(rgyud): mni tshig brjod pa//dan+ti 'jig rten gsun rgyal po//ngal ston po gzhan yod de///rdo rje 'grus pa khro bo ches//tshig ni len gsum brjod pa
155b3(rgyud): gyur//rdo rje khro rgyal bai ni//khyud la shin tu spyan 'dren mdzad//m+b+ha ni de dbang phyug rten po yis//skyer yang lan gsum smras pa dang //de ni
155b4(rgyud): na rgyal po ring //nga la spyan 'dron gang zhayod//de nas zhags pas bklu bzhin byed//khro ba drag por rab 'jigs byas//yan lag

155b7(rgyud): pa bcad nas bros par gyur//rang gi gnas su so gyur nas//'jig rten gsum gyi lha rnams pas//lha dang lha min dri zar bcas//skad cig gos na/
156a1(rgyud): 'dus gyur na//'khar rnams dag nI du ba gyur//jiwA r+ya b+h+yon gyis byas pa'o//de bran+ti yang dag mthong //soms d+han dran
156a2(rgyud): drug 'di sa Sh+Tik+Sha/d+hod+hA zhugs byas 'dun sa ni/ rje reg pa tshig la nus//dbang phyug rkyen pas bdag bcad de//dag po tshangs
156a3(rgyud): pa rab tubros//rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal ba//khro bo gtum po shin tu dragade lta tshig gsan nas//thams cad du ni 'bar bya
156a4(rgyud): gyur//khro bo rdo rje lu gu rgyud//drag po yis ni bka' bsgo ba//myur du song la lho chen go//rigs chen po dang bcas pa khugakhro bo'i
156a5(rgyud): rgyal po lu gu rgyud//gi sbyin nas dbang phyug che gnas song //yan log thams cad bcings nas su//lha mo dang bcas kun tu bkug/ska
156a6(rgyud): d+h+r-ig 'jig sa du byed cing //lha rna mus thams cad shin tu 'jigs//'jig pa sdug bsngal smre sngags 'dren//de reng 'dra ni lha
156a7(rgyud): min//stobs dang shugs ni thams cad kyis//rdo rje kun dang 'thab par 'gyur//mthu dang skyibs de shugs kyis ni//bcu gre nasaM thams
156b1(rgyud): nadu bros par gyur//lha chen la sogs thams cad ni//phyogs rnams kun tu bros par gyur//mun pa yis ni kun tu 'khrug/phyogs rnams kun tu

156b3(rgyud): bros par gyur//khro bo rdo rje rig pa mchog/slar yang shin tu/khros par gyur//'bor ba'i phreng bas rab 'bar zhing //rdo rje drag po nyid

156b6(rgyud): sub+h+rUM hrI/gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya b+h+yAM/a na ya ho b+ha ga bAn badz+ra hUM/phaT/khro bo'i rgyal po btsas nas ni//yi ge dza ni
156b7(rgyud): khongs su rje m+b+higs rgya ra rab tu bsngags//stobs dang sbyin pa khug la shig/oM badz+ra dz+wA la ag+ni sa tISha aM ku sha dzarma
157a1(rgyud): rdo rje 'bar ba lcagaswA k+ta ni//sod nas phyogs kun bdag nyid //du cig gis ni stobs chen rnams//lha rnams thams cad bkug pa
157a2(rgyud): gyur//rgyal po dbang phyug lnga dang ni//lha rnams tha mo sra cad grangs myed par//rigs bcas dpung dang bcas pa nyid//gcig nyid du ni bsdus
157a3(rgyud): par gyur//rdo rje lcag sa sgrig rab tu mngags//chings shig stobs chen dang ldan pa//tshogs dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kun//bcing ba lnga
157a4(rgyud): yis bcing bar gyur//nang gi 'khor dang bcas pa'i tshogs//lha tshogs gnod spya ni srin bu dang //lha min rlung dang 'byung po'i tshogs/
157a5(rgyud): gzhan yang gdug pa'i tshogs rnams ni//thams cad bcing bar gyur nas ni//rdo rje zhags pa rab tu mngagasra//rdo rje lcags kyu dang bcas
157a6(rgyud): par//song la dkyil 'khor dag khug shig/rdo rje zhags pas mngon par chags//yan lag kun las yongasu spro//rdo rje'i rang bzhin zhugs pa ste//brtan par gyur par the tshom
157a7(rgyud): rmed//bye ba dag ni grang med bcu//rdo rje lcags kyu rab tu byung //lha la sogs pa'i re re zhing //spyi bo nas 'gugs yang dag sbyor//lha chen dbang phyug chen po yi///spyi bo'i
157b1(rgyud): tsug tu btab nas mA~M/ rdo lcags kyu rgyal ba yos/shAd phyug rnon po 'du khar pyod//lha stsogs la dor da ducas pa ba//dz+nyAn rnon dun du bar byed//shugs sgyu ga tu phyung na spyan
157b2(rgyud): ni rgyun du ni smra ba d+d+he / ma'i ga bsngal kyim nags kyi gang khyer ba /rdo rje ba rten bye deng/na cig dri'i ba dregs gyur no/ yi hU~M/ la
157b3(rgyud): pabams cad D+ga//go nas de dun thams nad dag yongasu bsnod nas kun tu gan sa//rdo d+hi kha khyer byi ro la ng+ge/lha rnams de dag thams ca gnas//rnga rjer pa'i phyi l+r-i du/
157b4(rgyud): la sogs pa thams cad bkrug/phyi rol rdo rjer bya ni//lcags bsregs ring bzhin rdo rje mi chungaso//rdo dz+haiMtsanr-i g+hi rdo 'dir mas//nang nas shin tu gudung+ge ber 'gyur// sa
157b5(rgyud): sems can de dag kyang //'dzAMg suM rung bri'i drod 'bod//stong gsum 'di dag thams cad kyang /d+hI hUM sprin yong su brjod// dang bos nas skye bor byed//ngan srong dag ni ci zhig
157b6(rgyud): byed//sngon ma mthong ba 'di ci zhig/'dor ni rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur//rdo rje 'dzin par rgyal po de//slar yi'i thugs rje kun tu skyes//thams cad bcings pa las bkrol te//rdo rje me yi
157b7(rgyud): nye bar mdzes//rdo rje gnod sbyin drag po che//rang gi dkyil 'khor nas byung ste//lha la sogs pa kun pas te// tshig 'di rab tu nyon//de nas lha rgyal la sogs pa/
158a1(rgyud): khyod ni su yin smra bar byed//drod kyis khyod ni sngar ma mthong //gnas mchog 'di yang sngar ma mthong //rdo ba nod sbyin drag po tshwa//ha hA zhes dgod bzhad pa yis//
158a2(rgyud): smra zla rdo rje gnod sbyin tu//thams cad za byed bzod doka' ba//de nas lha chen gyis smras pa//rdo rje gnod sbyin ngas mi shes//dri yis khyod ni sngar ma mthong //bdag nyid kho na
158a3(rgyud): rang byung ba//rdo rje drag pos rab smras pa//nga yi bka' las myur gnas kyis//min na rdo rje 'bar ba 'dis//rang gi rigs ni sreg par byed//lha chen po yis tshig smras pa//
158a4(rgyud): bstan pa la ni nga mi gnas//'jig rten gsum gyi dbang phyug nga //su yi bstan pa la gnas pa//'khor dang bcas pa'i stobs gang yi no//de ring da yis bstan par bya//khyod/
158a5(rgyud): la stobs ni ci yod pa//stobs chen ldan par bstan par gyis//dbang phyug chen po rgyal po che//'byung po'i tshogs bcas lhan cig tu//tshig dag smras par gyur po ni//
158a6(rgyud): drag po nyid ni bstan par bya//stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di//'od zer 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab//ha ha zhes bya shin tu drag/dbang phyug chen pos bstan par bya//oM shU la a
158a7(rgyud): tr-i shU la ma hA sa ha sraM shU l-i A yuM d+he rtse gsum mngag gzhug rgyal po ni//stong phrag gcig ni 'byung bar gyur//rtsi bcas kun tu 'bar ba yis//rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'thab//nI rAH
158b1(rgyud): nas smras pa//oM mahA sa ha sra tsakra A y+ya d+he khyab 'jug gis ni de dag smras//'khor lo gcig tu rnam par stong //thams cad 'od zer 'bar bas khyab/rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'thab//brgya byin gyis smas/
158b2(rgyud): pa/oM ma hA sa ha sra badz+ra A mu d+he/rdo rje stong ni byung bar gyur//rdo rje 'brar ba chu byas khyab/brgya byin gyis ni smras pA yin//rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'aH//gzhon nus smras pa/oM ma hA sa ha sr-i shAkya A yuH/
158b3(rgyud): gzhon nus de skad smras nas ni//mdung na rtse gsum stong byung gyur//sgra ni drag po sgrogaso byed cing //rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'thab//tshangs pas smras pa/oM ma hA sa ha sra dar+N+Na A yu d+he/tshangs pas de skad smras nas/
158b4(rgyud): ni//dbyug to stong ni byung gyur nas//mtshon cha drag po 'jig byed pas//rdo rje can dang lhani cig 'thab//gzhan yang lhag ma ma lus pa//rnams kyi sa yang ni mtshon cha dang //re re stong phrag gcig
158b5(rgyud): gyur nas//rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'thab//tha na sprul pa gang yi ni dgi/phyi rol gyi ni dam ldan pa//de rnams nges par stong gyur nas//rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'a//ma yang kun tu 'bar gyur
158b6(rgyud): cing //'jigs par byed pa'i rlung yang byung //'brug gi sgra dang blog chen pos//khyab par srid gsum gnas par gyur//ha lu ha lA'i sgra chen po//nam mkha'i bar snang la
158b7(rgyud): ni dag/rdo rje drag po tshogs chen po//lha rnams thams cad 'thab par byed//de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin//gtum po drag po 'jig byed pas//lha yi len
159a1(rgyud): /b+h+yoglA n+yAn//dza d+hA na spyod bogasas//oMm hA sa ha Sh+Ta \u0f7f\u0f7f/oMm+bab+hA badz+ra shwA lo/oM d+he dz+ha la an/oM 'dzug/
159a2(rgyud): ma hA badz+ra ne d+hi/de lta bu yi rnam pa ru/steng ba dag ni stong phrag gcig/srid gsum zhi bar bya ba'i phyir//rdo rje 'chang ni chen pos phyung //gtum po 'od zer
159a3(rgyud): 'bar bas khyig/rdo rje me dang yang dag ldan//drag po'i snying po las byung gyur//rdo rje 'chang ni dbus na bzhugs//lha tshogs phyag rgya de dag na/
159a4(rgyud): rnam par bshog cing dum bur byas//bcom zhing bsdams te bsreg nas ni//phyogs rnams kun tu thim par gyur//rdo rje me yi rab bsdoms pas//lha yi
159a5(rgyud): rgyal po 'bar bar gyur//'og nus sa ni rab tu 'drar//steng nas me ni shin tu gdungs//rdo rje khro bo rgyal po ches//dbang phyug chen po la gsungs pa/
159a6(rgyud): lus srul po ni drag po che//nga yi bka' ni rab tu nyon//dur khrod gnas la rab tu dga'//lus la thal ba dag gis byugs//mo ye sha ni za bar byed//nga yi
159a7(rgyud): bka' ni rab tu nyon//khrag rlon gyi ni rab tu bskus//lpags pa rlon pa gos su gyon//lha rnams thams cad khyod kyi 'khor//nga yi bka' ni rab tu nyan//gdug
159b1(rgyud): pa drug chen mtshan mo rgyu ba slongs mo ba//khrag la spangs pa'i lpags can lus la thal bas byugs//nga yi bka' nyon drag po'i sems ldan lus srul po//mon na bskal pa'i//
159b2(rgyud): me yis rtsa bzhin khyod bsreg bya//ro bsregs thal ba'i phung po bzhin du thal bar 'gyur//bskal pa'i me chen dang mtshungs pas ni rab 'jigs 'gyur//rigs bcas
159b3(rgyud): dpung ldan dkyil 'khor dang btsas gnod sbyin drag/rdo rje drag pa yis ni rab gzhom gzhog par bya//dbang phyug chen pos smras pa//nga ni ma lus dbang phyug chen po'i khor
159b4(rgyud): las bsgyur//'jig rten gsum gyi lce tshogs ma lus pa yi 'khor//shin tu drag cing rnamo gtsigs 'jig rten khyod yin yang //khyod kyi nga yi dka' ni gnyen par
159b5(rgyud): gyis//gdug dang sangs rgyas mang po'i 'khor ni sangs rgyas chos kyi 'byung gnas nga yis sprul/zhi zhing de la rnam 'dul gsang ba dri med nyon mongs med pa'i pha rol phyir
159b6(rgyud): de 'dra'i mgon po dga' ba dus gsum bzhugs pa thams cad ngas dbang bskur//slar ying nga yis 'byung po'i tshig nyon zhes pa'i tshig ni 'di lta bu//de nas rgyal po
159b7(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin//'dul ba'i don la shin tu mkhas//khro bo gdug pa gtum chen po//rab 'bar khro bo'i rgyal po ni//rdo rje'i byin rlabs phyag rgya las//bya ba de 'dra'i ting
160a1(rgyud): 'dzin la//snyoms par thubs nas sems dpa'achos/rang ga da stu byu ga/gdug pa rnams ni 'dul ba'i khyor//
160a2(rgyud): chos ni tshul bzung nas//rkang pa nas brtsams skye ba'i bad+ma//lum kun lal ni rnam par byu //oM ba~Mdz+ra ka d+ha uts+tshihrI//rjerje'i gtsug to rbA d+haN+Da/
160a3(rgyud): 'byu po'i skye ba nas b+ha n+yas//sku rnams thams cad kam+pA Sh+Ta rnying //khu ba'i rgyal bams cad 'dams/oM hrI hU~M g+hA ba~M \u0f7fhU~M/
160a4(rgyud): bo khro gnyed nan//mdzod spya nas na~M rab tu d+hu //'jigs byed drag pa yang dag ldan//lus rnams thams cad 'bar 'gyur gi/oM nI s+yam+b+ha par+b+ha
160a5(rgyud): hUM//rdo rje rigs pa mchog rgyal ba//khe ltas rab tu byung bar gyur//b+hi bo nas brtsams rkang mthil byung //rdo rje 'byung ba yang dag ldan//na nI n+d+hedza/
160a6(rgyud): thugs kyi khro bo rgyal po che//thugs ka nas ni rab tu byung //'bar ba'i phre nga bas khyab pa'i sku//'jigs su rung ba spu langs byed//maM bedz+ra aM k+Shu sha~M A
160a7(rgyud): kaR+Sha ya hUM//rdo rje lcags kyu khri ba che//phrag pa g.yas nas rab tu byung //rdo rje lcags kyu gsor byed cing //rdo rje'i bar ba yong dag ldan//oM badz+ra pA sha
160b1(rgyud): b+h+ya d+hom+b+ha// thAgs par+b+bad+han+ta//thug pa gsan nas rab tu byung //rdo rje 'bang ba yang dag+sa wAn//du zhugs pas d+mo bar drud//
160b2(rgyud): kro d+hA dz+nyA//khro ba'i rgyal po lpags kyu rdzogs//lte ba'i dbus nas rab tu hUM //kun nas 'bar ba yang dag ldan//blo mchog rdo rje gnod sbyin mtshungs//oM badz+rA ma
160b3(rgyud): laM kro d+ha hUM//khro bo chen po ske rags ni//rkang pa'i rdo rje rab tu phyung //kun nas 'bar bar yang dag ldan//phyag rgya dang ni lhan cig ldan//oM badz+ra kro d+ha ba la hUM/

160b5(rgyud): khro bo'i rgyal po gradu bu ni//dpung pa g.yon las yang dag byung //gsang zhing rdo rje 'bar bas phyag/rdo rje khro bo rab tu khengs//oM saM mA ya/badz+rA kro d+ha hUM hUM phaT//dam tshig/

160b7(rgyud): drag po che//khu tshur g.yon las rab tu byung //rdo rje 'bar ba dag gis gsal/rdo rje me yis rab tu brgyan//oM badz+ra ban d+ha kro d+ha hU~M sa ma ye b+h+rUM ba~M/oM badz+ra any+dza l-i bran
161a1(rgyud): d+ha kro d+ha hU~M sam+b+ha ya hUM//rdo rje 'ching ba rgyal po che//de bzhin rdo rje sor mo nyid//khro bo lag pa g.yas g.yon gyi//sor mo dag las yang dag
161a2(rgyud): byung //oM badz+ra na kha hUM//oM badz+rI kro d+h+yA a ku li ma hA kro d+ha hUM//rdo rje sder mo khyi bo che//de bzhin rdo rje sder mo'i gdong //phyag ni g.yon dang g.yas pa yi//sor ma
161a3(rgyud): ngag las rab tu byung //oM badz+ra ko mA ra kr-i d+ha ka hi rA ga hUM/oM badz+rI ku mA ra kro d+ha mu d+ha d+ha ka hUM phaT/khro bo'i rgyal po rkang pa dang //de bzhin khro bo spyi btsugs dag
161a4(rgyud): rgyal po bla ni g.yon pa dang //g.yas pa dag las rab tu byung //oM shr-i kha le ma hA kr-i d+hi pa na d+hi hUM phaT/oM badz+ra kro d+ha a sha ban d+ha hUM//gnam lcogs rdo rje lu

161a6(rgyud): d+hA aM ku sha hUM phaT/rdo rje dbyig pa khro bo che//rdo rje yin yan lag drangs//'byar ba dang bcas gnod sbyin gnyis//rje da dag las rab tu phyung //oM b+h+ya d+ha ba kro d+b+har+m+ma
161a7(rgyud): oM d+ha badz+ra kro d+ha ma g+ha be ge a na ya hUM phaT/de nas dka' thub khro bo che//de bzhin rdo rje don yod nyid//rgyal po shugs chen gnyis po ni//gdong gi mchu las rab tu byung //oM
161b1(rgyud): badz+ra dan d+hA ha la k+Sho d+hAs+t+wa~M phuH/oM da dz+ra pa tA la mA ra ya k+Sho d+ha dz+nyo phan//rkang pa khro ba shugs chen po//de zhin man+ta sgra khro ba nyid//'bang ba 'phro ba myur lon
161b2(rgyud): gnyis po zhabs kyi mtho lI las byung //de dag la sngogs rgya lnga po ni//dpag tu me par rab tu byung //gang ga'i bye snyed grangs med par//phra rab rdum gyi khams
161b3(rgyud): dag ni//baspu'i gseb ni thams cad dang //lus kyi gsebo ni rnams cad nas//rdo rje khro bo rgyal po che//rang gi snying po las byung gyur//rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyi/

161b5(rgyud): dag brjod//oM ma'o sangs rgyas thabs chen po//e ma'o ye shes shin tu bzang //sangs rgyas kun gyi ting 'dzin ni//theg pa chen po zhes byang ba shad//e ma'o/

161b7(rgyud): de nyid sangs rgyas rigs chen po//de nas de yi gsang ba'i mtshon//thams cad rdo rje'i rigs su bshad//khro bo che las yang dag byung //rdo rje khro bo'i dbang phyug
