162a3(rgyud): bsdams//rdo rje ser mo shin tu dag/rdo rje sen mo rdo rje gdong //de bzhin rkad pa khe rgyal po/khro bo skye gtsug rgyal po dang //rdzu 'phrul chen po lug+sa rgyud//
162a4(rgyud): rdo rje gan ma lcags rdo rje dbyi//rdo rje khro bo yan lag drug/rdo rje dka' thub rdor don yod//rdo rje zhabs dang de bzhin mthil//dam tshig rdo rje rgyal po 'di/

162a6(rgyud): klang med pa//khros pas rang gi sha za zhing //'bar ba'i phreng bas khyad par gnas//bskal pa yi ni me ltung 'bar//rdo rje khro bros dkyil 'khor ni//
162a7(rgyud): rdo rje rigs ni bskyed nas kyang //rab tu drag 'dzin bka' bsgom pas//gajug pa rnams ni 'dul bar gyis//nga yi bka' yang mnyan par gyis//rdo rje can na//

162b2(rgyud): tor la sogs kun gsungs pa//lha chen la sogs gdug pa rnams//'og tu kha ltas 'gyel bar gyur//rdo rje khro bo stobs po che//lha rnams rgyal bar gyur nas ni//rdo rje 'ab
162b3(rgyud): ba 'bar zhes pas//snying po dag ni yang dag brjod//oM badz+ra a na lA da ha pa tsa ma tha b+hat+tA ra Na hUM phaT/khro bo chen po rdo rje'i me//skad cig de las byung nas ni//lha rnams de

163a1(rgyud): /pra dIb+ta mahA badz+ra aM ku sha A kar+N+Na ya hUM/rdo rje lcags kyu rgyal song nas//skad gcig gis ni yang dag 'gug/lha rnams thams cad bkug na sun/

163a3(rgyud): ho zhes ni sgrogs byed cing //'jigs pa'i skad cig sdug bsngal gyur//rdo rje can la gsol ba 'debs//stobs chen gzhom par ma mdzad cig/de bzhin lha la sogs/

164a7(rgyud): bsreg/khyab 'jug la sogs lha rnams kyis//tshig gcig tu ni 'di skad zhus//gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa//rgyal po chen po de bzhin bgyi//de nas lha
164b1(rgyud): chen gyis smras pa//rdo rje dod sbyin ngas mi shes//nga ni rang nyid rgyal ba ste//nga yis bka' ni mnyan par gyis//lha chen po yi chog gsan nas//rdo rje khro bo rab 'brar
164b2(rgyud): bas//rdo rje gnide sbyin 'joms zhes pa//khro bo'i rgyal po yang dag brjod//oM badz+ra sim+b+ha hUM/shin tu gtum pa stobs chen po//khro bo 'di ni brjod pa yis//

164b6(rgyud): rigs pa 'di gsungs so//oM badz+ra U yur rig pa 'di ni brjod pa yis//dbang phyug chen blos yang dag langs//rdo rje tshe yis gson byas nas//bde blo chen po zab pa
164b7(rgyud): gyur//rnam par snang mdzad thub chen la//zhabs dgal ni btud nas gsaso//dkan po bcom ldan skyabs su gsil//rdo rje 'dzin pa de gdug min//kun mkhyen
165a1(rgyud): bcom ldan bka' stsal pa//nga yis brtse bar bya mi nus//'di ni gdug pa shin tu drag/de nyid la ni skyabs su song //rdo rje khro bos lha chen po/
165a2(rgyud): kun tu bos nas 'di skad smras//nga yis bstan pa'i bkara' dag ni//gdug pa chen po mnyen par gyis//rdo rje gnod sbyin bdag chen la//lha chen po yis skra
165a3(rgyud): smras pa//'chi ba chen po bzong nus kyi//khyod kyi bka' la gnas mi byed//rdo rje khro bo drag po che//khros pas gdug pa 'phel gyur nas//hU~M ni shin tu 'jigs

165a5(rgyud): pa yang dag brjod//oM pA ta A kaR+Sha Na badz+ra hUM//de nis rdo rje dbang po 'di//rjo da pas rdo rje khro bo byung //tshig ni 'di skad brjod par 'gyur//bka'
165a6(rgyud): stsol brjod cig 'od chen po//rdo rje khro bos bka' stsal pa//oM pa ta A kaR+Sha ya sarba badz+ra d+hA ra ka tsa ra phaT badz+ra trUM dzaM//khro bo chen pos 'di gsungs nas/
165a7(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po u mar bcas//rkang pas 'gug pa'i rdo rje yis//rdo rje rkang pa dag gis bkug/rdo rje khro ba de dag 'gug/steng du rkang pa 'og tu mag
165b1(rgyud): 'jig rten thams cad dgod gyur cing //rdo rje gdung ngas gdungs par gyur//de nas rgyas po rdo rje 'dzin//dbang phyug chen po u mar bcas//zhabs kyis mnan
165b2(rgyud): nas rdo rje yis//dbang phyug chen po rdeg par byed//des ni rkang pa g.yon pa yis//dbang phyug chen po mnan byas nas//g.yas pas lha mo u ma yi//nu ma
165b3(rgyud): dag gi bar du btsir//rdo rje gsang sngags 'di yis ni//dbang phyug chen po rab tu mnan//aM badz+ra a kra ma ho//slar yang dbab pa'i rig pa ni//rdo rje khro bos
165b4(rgyud): yang drag brjod//oM badz+ra a be sha he na ha na tAT//dbang phyug chen po babs gyur pas//rang gi lag pas lan stong du//rang gdong 'jig su rung la brdeg/steng
165b5(rgyud): phrag cig tu yang dag gyur//'jig rten gsum gnas thams cad ni//'o dod chen po 'bod par gyur//bdag cag gis ni rgyal po 'di//'di lta bu yi bdag
165b6(rgyud): nyid gyur//de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin//brtse dang snying rje skyes par gyur//snying rje steng du gzhug bya ste//sangs rgyas byams pa yang dag brjod//oM bud d+ha ma/
165b7(rgyud): tri rak+Sha//dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin gtso bos//de nas bsngags 'di gsungs pa yis//dbang phyug chen po'i sdug bsngal de//skad cig de la nye bar zhi//phyag na na//
166a1(rgyud): rje'i zhabs dag gis//reb pas dbang phyug chen pos ni//sa chen po ni yang dag 'thob//ting 'dzin dang gzungs de bzhin//tha mal pa yi lus dor
166a2(rgyud): nas//rdo rje 'dzin la phul bar gyur//lha chen 'di na sa shi 'phos nas//shi bzhin lus ni bor nas su//dang gA sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi//bye snyed sangs
166a3(rgyud): rgyas zhing dang mnyam//thal bas g.yogs pa'i gnas zhes pa//sangs rgyas zhing ni yid 'ong ba//de ru song nas lha chen po//sangs rgyas 'byung
166a4(rgyud): nga'ang bstan par gyur//thal ba'i dbang phyug sgra dbyangs can//de bzhin gshegs pa der gnas gyur//de nas shi ba'i lus de yis//ched du brjod pa
166a5(rgyud): yang dag brjod//sangs rgyas kun gyi mthu yis ni//tshogs bcud gcig ni mngon par brjod//e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//sangs rgyas ye shes
166a6(rgyud): bla na med//bsad nas skad cig dag gis ni//mya ngan 'dras pa'i gnas dgod mdzad//rdo rje khro bo rgyal po ches//dbang phyug chen po yang dag phyung //
166a7(rgyud): khyab 'jug la sogs lha rnams la//kun tu bos nas 'di gsungs pa//rab mchog dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni//gtso bo rab tu gzhugs par gyis//gal//
166b1(rgyud): te de bzhin mi byed na//dbang phyug chen po bzhin du bya//de nas lha kun 'jogs gyur to//rmubla nas thams cad kyis zhus pa//de bzhin du ni bgyod par
166b2(rgyud): 'tshal//bdag cag khyed kyi bran du gyur//rgya la po khyed kyi dam che bo ni//ji ltar sgrub par mi bgyid lags//bdag cag rnams ni khyod kyi 'khor//skam
166b3(rgyud): chen po bka' stsol cig/rdo rje khro bos bka' stsal pa//sangs rgyas chos dang de ge 'dun la//skyabs su rab tu 'gro bar gyis//byang sems yang
166b4(rgyud): dag bskyed nas ni//sems can kun la yang dag sbyor//srog gcod pa ni spang bar gyis//rku dang brdzun du smra ba dang //gzhan gyi chung ma de bzhin du//de ni
166b5(rgyud): dang por spang bar gyis//sems can gnod dang ljon pa ni//ci nas kyang ni mi bya'o//byang chub spyod par bo sbyor ba//de la lhod min brtson par bya//nga yi bstan/
166b6(rgyud): pa'i bka' yi ni//'di dag dam tshig yang dag brjod//du yi tshig ni mnyan par gyis//min na khyod ni kun tu bsregs//de nas 'jig rten gsum 'khor los/
166b7(rgyud): de nas tshig ni blangs nas kyang //byang sems yang dag bskyed nas ni//dkon mchog gsums skyongs su song //rdo rje khro bo rgyal ba chas//kun tu phyag rgya
167a1(rgyud): byin nas kyang /phyag rgya snying po 'di ris ni//rdo rje ti rinA ti ra yoM//dkyil 'khor du ni bcug gyur pas//oM badz+ra sa ma ya ma nu smA ra sa ma ye/badz+ra satwA
167a2(rgyud): saM ma ya mAM nu sma ra//sarba ta thA ga ta saM ma ya traM/dr-i D+ho mai b+hu bA/A pra ti ha ro me b+ha ba sarba karma su tsa me tsit+ta shr-i ya//ku ru hA ha ha ha hUM//de nas brjod pa/
167a3(rgyud): tsam gyis ni//phyag rgya kun tu bebs par gyur//rdo rje ti rin+da ti rI yi//phyag rgya kun tu bstan par gyur//de dag rim bzhin bcug nas ni//rdo rje rin chen
167a4(rgyud): dbang bskur gyur//rdo rje mtshan ma lag byin nas//rdo rje ming ni dbang bskur gyur//de laM lha rnams thams cad ni//rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur 'gyur//
167a5(rgyud): sngon la 'jig rten gsum bdag po//go rims bzhin du dbang bskur 'gyur//khyab 'jug zhes byer gnas par ni//sgyu ma'i rdo rje zhes byar grags//gzhon//
167a6(rgyud): nu rdo rje dril bu ste//tshangs pa rdo rje thub pa nyid//dbang po rdo mtshon tsha nyid//de dag rig pa'i bdag por bshad/rgyal po bzhi po gzi brjid che//rdzu
167a7(rgyud): 'phrul chen po stobs chen pos//ber snang la ni rgyu ba nyid//rdo rje'i ming gis dbang bskur gyur//nyi ma rdo rje 'khyil pa ste//de bzhin zla ba rdo rje 'od//dbyig chen rdo rje
167b1(rgyud): dbyig to ste/ser skya rdo rje ser sna yin//de la sogs pa khri rgyal po//rdo rje kho bor dbang bskur gyurar+ya//de nas mkha' spyod lha rnams ni//rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur gyur//
167b2(rgyud): myos chen rdo rje myos pa ste//rdo rje phreng ba sbrang rtsi byed//rnam par rgyu la dang rgyal byed dang /rdo rje shis dang rgyal bar ldan//tshogs kyi rgya la po badreg po dag/zhe
167b3(rgyud): bya la sogs dbang bskur gyur//de nas sa la gnas pa rnams//rdo rje'i ming gis dbang bskur gyur//gtun shing mdzod ni srung ba ste//mi ni de bzhin rdo rje me//rdo
167b4(rgyud): rje rlung ni rlung chen po//rdo rje 'jigs byed dran rdo rje//de 'dra la sdigs po nya rnams//rdo rje mchog gi dbang bskur gyur//de nas su 'og gnas pa ni/rdo
167b5(rgyud): lcags kyu rting za ba//de bzhin gshin rje rdo rje gnag/sa ye gtsug bshegs rdo rje//chu lha mgon po rdo rje 'dzin//du nIs lha mo ji bzhin du//ga rims bzhin
167b6(rgyud): du dbang bskur gyur//rdo rje mang gi dbang bskur gyis//yum gyi mchog rnams dbang bskur gyur//khyeb 'jug ma ni rdo rje gser//drug ldan rdo rje gzhon nu ma/
167b7(rgyud): tshangs pa rdo rje brgyad num//dbang po rdo rje khu tshur ma//gsang pyod rdo rje gsod byed ma//sngar mo rdo rje 'od ldanam//de las dbyibs parjor mchog ma//'phrog ma rdo rje ska /
168a1(rgyud): //gsod d+ho \u0f7f'dzig ma //gnam dang duldan sbyangs so//nam d+hAd+haHsa kun ma//gsaHna rje gos canam//rdzun
168a2(rgyud): nya zhi ba ma//rlung lha rdo rje shugs can mo//lus ngan ma ni rdo rje gdengs//me lha de bzhin rdo rje 'bar//phage mo rdo rje gdong can ma//rdo rje nag me dzA muN+Di//chu lce rdo rje
168a3(rgyud): chu srin me//sna tshad ma ni sbrul mo ste//de 'dra la sogs grangs med pa//lha mo rnams ni dbang bskur gyur//rang rang rigs ni rtogs nas su//jo bzhin lha yi bdag
168a4(rgyud): pi bshad//de nas phyag rgya bcing ba byin//de bzhin dam tshig snying po'o//lha rnams kun gyi bdag po kun//bkug nas de bzhin dbang du 'gyur//rdo rje phyag rgya
168a5(rgyud): gnyis bcings nas//sdig mdzub dang ni lcags kyu bcings//'ching ba dang ni grol byed par//dngos po bya ba'i de na sems dpa'//de yi mdun du khyed rnams
168a6(rgyud): ni//bya ba sgrub phyir gnas par gyis//khyod kyi srog ni nyams gyur pa'i//de bzhin dam tshig sbyin mi bya//rgya cher phyag rgya chen por ni//theg pa chen po
168a7(rgyud): mngon bsdus pa//rdo rje rnal 'byor sbyor byed pa//de nyid zhes bya bstan pa yis//dkyil 'khor mchog rnams de dag dang //de bzhin lha la sogs pa kur//
168b1(rgyud): bkug cing rab tu bcug par gyur//rdo rje can gyis dbang byas nas//rdo rje thams cad dbang bskur gyur//rdo rje ming gis mtshan par byas//lha chen po ni btsog pu nyid/
168b2(rgyud): zhabs kyi 'og tu brtabs nas bzhag/'jig rten 'dug pa cher gyur pa//gdug pa'i snying po zhes byar grags//gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyal po yi//sems//
168b3(rgyud): can 'ongs par the tshom med//thang cig chos grangs rI ri me//gang du zla gcig dkyil 'khor du//sems can stong phrag brgya dgra ni//skad cig de la sdug bsngal
168b4(rgyud): byed//yid ni nye bar mjal bar byed//mdangs ni nye bar 'phrog pa'i nad//mi yi skye bo gsod pa dang //tha na dug tshen nyid dang ni//grong khyer dang ni grong rdal dang //
168b5(rgyud): grong dag 'joms par byed pa dag/sems can rnams ni gcod byed dang //skye bo stong po sbyor byed dang //de ltar drag cing 'jigs su rung //brtse ba med cing sdig
168b6(rgyud): byed dang //gsod pa dang ni 'joms par byed//shes rab 'phrog par byed po dang //drag po sna tshogs gzugs 'dzin pa//dud 'gro'i 'gro ba'i bar dang ni///
168b7(rgyud): sems can rnams la gnod byed dang //myur du mdangs ni 'phrog pa dang //lo nyes thog dang char dang ni//char ni mi 'bab byed pa dang //grang dang dre ba'i gdung
169a1(rgyud): dag/skad cig de la skyed pa dang //gdon ni 'bab par byed pa dang //de bzhin gdud mchog bskyed pa dang //sems ni rnam par g.yod//
169a2(rgyud): byed dang //dri 'dri gnod sbyin mtha' yas dang //de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin//dkon mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug ste//skye dgu sna tshogs nad kyis btab/
169a3(rgyud): ye shes kyi ni spyan gyis gzigs//dam tshig sdang ba'i sems can dang //yams dang de bzhin nye bar 'tshe//rims dang gdon dang dugu drag po//skye dgu 'di
169a4(rgyud): rnams 'joms par byed//sna tshogs sdug bsngal kun tu 'khrugs//'jigs pa sna tshogs dag gis khyab//thams cad nyams shing zil gyis nan//sdug
169a5(rgyud): bsngal drag pos sdug bsngal gyur//slar yang bde bar bya ba'i phyir//nag po'i sdigs ni yongs su bzung //mkha'agro ma mo rnal 'byor mas//'gro ba'i
169a6(rgyud): don ni kun tu khyab//rims dang gdon dang 'byung po dang //mkha' 'gro ma mo 'byung po dang //gdug pa rnams kyis kun tu khyab//'jig rten sdug bsngal
169a7(rgyud): snod 'di ni//gzigs nas rnga rje 'dzin rgyal pos//thugs rje dag ni bskyed par gyur//kye ma'o sems can 'di sdug bsngal//de la rje su brtse byed med//nga
169b1(rgyud): kho na rang drung ste//de bzhin sdug bsngal thams cad 'brog//nga la log par rtog pa ste//skyo dbu do la brtse ba med//dbang phyug chen po dang yin dang //gdug pa/
169b2(rgyud): thams cad rib 'dul byed//ya~M de dag byang chub rang byed gyur//skye dbu mdzus bskyab par bya//thams cad dag ni dgug bya zhing //de bzhin dam tshig bskye
169b3(rgyud): bA bya//gnod dung phan pa byas nas ni//skye dgu 'di dag rnam par grol//de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin//dkyil 'khor skye ba dang phan 'dogs pa//zhes bya de 'dra'i/
169b4(rgyud): ting 'dzin lnga//sems dpa' chen po snyoms par zhugs//mgon po chen po sangs rgyas kun//'di ltar bka' ni nod par byed//de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//
169b5(rgyud): de bzhin snying po phyung bar gyur//oM badz+ra sum+b+ha ni sum b+ha hU~M phaT//de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin//sangs rgyas bka' ni bzung nas kyang //phyi rol dkyil 'khor
169b6(rgyud): dgug pa'i phyir//lcags kyu'i snying po rab tu phyung //oM badz+ra sa mA ya A kAD+D+h+ya yA sarba maN+Da la badz+ra d+hA ra satwa mA ti kra ma hUM phaT//rig po 'dzin pas brjod
169b7(rgyud): par gyur pa yis//rdo rje lcags kyu shin tu brtan//lcags kyu bdag nyid che mchog ni//brgya phrag grangs med byung bar gyur//stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten
170a1(rgyud): 'di/rims bzhin rab tu thim par gyur//gang zhig phyogs rnams bcu po ru//gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor mthong bar gyur//gdug/
170a2(rgyud): pa de rnams bkug nas kyang //de bzhin gong bu gcig tu bya//rdo rje mi yis kun tu gdungs//ri rab rtse mo pha mya nas ni//tshad med bgrang du med pa rnams//
170a3(rgyud): phyi rol gyi ni dkyil 'khor 'ongs//rdo rje dbang po'i gnas kun du//'khor nyid du ni yang dag gnas//de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos//gdug pa'i dkyil 'jog
170a4(rgyud): bos nas ni//kye gdug skye dgu rnams la ni//rnam par 'tsho ba spang bar gyis//khyed rnams kyis ni dam tshig lcong //srog chags thams cad gsod pa spongs
170a5(rgyud): min na khyod rnams g.yas 'brar bas//de bzhin nga yi thal bar bya//gdug pa'i dam tshig dkyil 'khor gyis//tshig cig tu ni zhus gyur pa//mgon po bdeg/
170a6(rgyud): nAg shi za ste//ji ltar bgyi ba bka' stsol cig/de nas rdo rje 'dzin drag pos//ma bsdams pa yi tshig gsan nas//rdo rje khro bo rab brjid bka'/
170a7(rgyud): snying po drag po gsungs par gyur//me badz+ra krod+ha ha dad ha pa tse bai n+d+he//sa ya bi kro ta sarbe duSh+TAn/sa ma ya mu drA maN+Dal/b+hun+d+he b+hUny+dza/mdza ma/khA bad+d+ha/
170b1(rgyud): dad+hA pa ra mar+d+ha/badz+ra sa mya ya hU~M phyaT/khro bo chen pos 'dri brjod pas//rab drag gdug pa d+mo dag ni//chog cing rab tu 'gyul gyur cing //dam chog phyug
170b2(rgyud): rgyu nyams par gyur//'dod 'bod cing ngu bar gyur//gcig le gci bya ni sdu bar byed//ji skad smra bya bzhin byas te//'on kyang bden pa ste mi bya//rdo rje
170b3(rgyud): snyonas dpa' drug po che//rang bzhi sa ni sangs rgyas bdag/ sa chen gsang ba'i yis//bcom ldan thams cad ma sbyin pos
170b4(rgyud): s+yai nI sum+b+ha ha na da ha pats+tsha grih+NA ban hU~M phaT//de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin//sangs rgyas bka' la rab gan su pas//rdo rje khro bo rab za byed//snying po drag
170b5(rgyud): bo brjod par gyur//oM mA hU~M badz+rA kr-i d+hi pA daM sarba duSh+Ta maN+Da la b+hiSha sha ya/sar+b+ba duSh+Ta sa ma ya yan pri ki ra bi d+h+waM sa yA thai na y+ya/b+hU dz+nyA yo d+hA dzA yaM/sa
170b6(rgyud): duSh+Ta sam+b+ha yA mu drA b+hUn+ta/gr-ih+Na h+Na na dA tAM be tsa sarbaM dr-iSh+Ta ma yi satwA sa ma ya hUM //de nas 'di ni brjod cim gyis//rdo rje khro bo bdag nyid che//ma
170b7(rgyud): pa drag po shin tu 'jigs//rdo rje khro bo rab tu byung //rigs bcas dpung dang bcos ldan pa//dam tshig sdang ba bzung nas ni//shin tu 'jigs pas skrag/
171a1(rgyud): gyur cing //rgya mtsho yang ni rab tu sprul//phyag rgya rab 'jigs de dag gis//rnam par bcos cing ril gyis mnan//rdo ma yis
171a2(rgyud): bsregs nAs ni//thams cad du ni thal bar bya//byeng sems ltos byung rdo rje can//ji ltar sems can sreg par byed//'di ni gzhugs pa'i tshig yin te/
171a3(rgyud): 'phen pa'i rigs can rgyal ba dag skyes//'dod chagos skyon la sogs lta ba//nyon mongs dri ma gang shes nas//rdo rje can gyis dri ma 'di//bzung nas
171a4(rgyud): shes me yis bsregs//sems can shin tu 'jigs te skrag/byang chub spyod pas byang chub gnas//mi bskyod pa yi gnas skyes shing //rdo rje can ni mchog tu
171a5(rgyud): gyur//phyag na rdo rje sems dpa' che//rdo rje chen po phyag rgya 'gugs//zhes bya de 'dra'i ting 'dzin la//'jigs pa med par snyoms par zhugs//
171a6(rgyud): mid 'gro ma ni rjes sbyang phyir//rgyal ba la ni bka' nod gyur//phyug na rdo rje stobs chen la//de nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs /oM ha na hrI na
171a7(rgyud): phaT/de nas rdo rje 'dzin drag pos//sangs rgyas kun gyi gsungs thos nas//'jigs pa 'gugs pa'i rdo rje ni//rang nyid kyi ni sngags 'di brjod/
171b1(rgyud): oM badz+ra A kraR+Sha yak+ShAM gr-I/sarba dulA ga na badz+ra d+hu sa t+yen hUM dza/de nas brjod pa tsam gyi ni//mkha' 'gro ma ni mdangs 'phrog pa//rnal 'byor sngags dang phyag rgyar
171b2(rgyud): bcas//ri rab tu ni kun tu 'dus//rdo rje lcogs kyus bkug nas ni//'bar ba dang bcas 'bar bar gyur//spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas tshig/smras pa rdo
171b3(rgyud): rje 'dzin pas skyobs//skal che ni rdo rje can gyis gsungs//kye gdug pa'i tshogs chen myur ba ru//gsod po spongs la bka' nyan gyis//de dag re re
171b4(rgyud): zhing smras pa//bdag cag 'di rnams sha za ste//gang zhig rtag tu gson gyur pa//bdag cag la ni thabs bstan gsol//de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'chang //de
171b5(rgyud): yi thabs ni 'di gsungs so//zla gcig lon nas shi ba gang //de ni bza' ba blang bar gyis//byang chub sems la chags bral nas//gsang ba smod pa
171b6(rgyud): lhur len pa//khyod dang lhan cig yang dag sbyor//de bza' ba n+ya gnang bar gyis//phyag rgya yi ni snying po 'di//rtag tu bcung bar bya ba ste//phyi rol thams
171b7(rgyud): cid spangs nas ni//sangs rgyas bstan po srung bar gyis//oM badz+ra pra ti gr-ih+Na hI da yau A kaR+Sha ya tsar+ya ya me sa d+hA d+he na me ni ya te ho sa ri d+ha yaM noSh+ka ma du sa ma/
172a1(rgyud): ya hU~M dza/de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin//rang gi sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan//khro bo spyi bcug rgyal po ni//rnal 'byor pa ni de la snga smros//
172a2(rgyud): gral te dam tshig las 'das na//khro bo bdag nyid chen po yis//rtag tu mgo bo 'ogs byed cing //rigs dang bcas pa nges paro sreg/bdud rtsi sman
172a3(rgyud): gyi rgyul po zhes/khya ba de 'dra'i ting 'dzin la//sems dpa' chen po snyoms zhugs naso//nad kyi don du tshol bar gyur//bcom ldan 'das kyis bik+Sha/
172a4(rgyud): stsal pa/oM badz+ra hUM phaT+Ta/de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin//sems can thams cad 'jigs byed pas//nad rnams thams cad bkug nas ni//'gugs
172a5(rgyud): pa yi ni snying pa brjod//i badz+ra sa ma ya a na ya sarba duSh+ma dzA ra ni di nA shA ya hUM phaT//de nas brjod pa tsam gyis kyang //nad dang gdon gyi tshigs
172a6(rgyud): kun dang //rlams sogs kyis ni de thos nas//steng du rkang pa'i 'og tu mgo/'bar ba'i me dang yang dag ldan//hA hra zhes sgrogs 'jigs par byed//
172a7(rgyud): bdag cag rims ni ma gzhom par//khro bo chen po bka' stsol cig/rdo rje rnal 'byor chen pos gsungs//nga yis bka' ni rab tu nyon//sems
172b1(rgyud): can nye bar 'joms pa spongs//mdangs kyang 'phrog par ma byed cig/de rnams nas smras pa/kye rgyal po rdo rje bdag cag gi/srog gi srung ba mdzad du gso
172b2(rgyud): bdag cag kun ni gaN+DI brjid za//thabs ni cung zad bska la du gsol//rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che//de nas stongs chen gyis smras pa//nga yi stegs
172b3(rgyud): dang phyag rgya dag/gang zhig bsrungs la gnod mi byed//oM batra~M karma bi sho d+ha ya sirba A pa ra Na ni bud d+ha sad+ham sa ye hUM//de nas phyag rgya chen po kun//theg pa chen po
172b4(rgyud): mngon bsdus pa//mdo sde gsang ba rgyal po la//yongs su bshad pa thams cad kun//sngag su dang phyag rgya gnas pa nA~M//rtag par rab tu spyod byed pas//gnas de rba yang
172b5(rgyud): rtag pa ru//khyed rnams shin tu gnod ma byed//de skad gsungs pas gdon kun ni//hi hi zhes ni sgrogs par gyur//spyi bo'i rnal 'byor pa la ni//gnod pa byed pa thams cad
172b6(rgyud): g+hAtad//de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin//kun mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug ni sa//sdig pa dral ba'i phyag d+hA che//ni thos chen bu snyoms por zhugs//ngan med brjod par bya
172b7(rgyud): phyir//mgon pa dag la bka' nod byed//mgon chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyis//kun nas snying po brjod par gyur//mi shig pa ya badz+ra swAhA//rdo rje sems dopa'i
173a1(rgyud): thangs chen po//rdo rje las ni yang dag byung //sems can rnams la dartse ba'i phyir//sdig pa thams cad dkug par gyur//oM sarba pA paM a pA ya
173a2(rgyud): sho d+ha na badz+ra sa ma ya hUM phaT//de skad brjod nas rnal 'byor ches//gcig gis ni ngan song bkug/ri yi rgyal po nye ba ru//ngu 'bod la sogs snang bar gyur//rdo rje sems
173a3(rgyud): dpa' rnal 'byor ches//ngan song sems can la smras po//dkon mchog gsum dang nga bstan la//myur du bstan pa skyabs su song //de dag thams cad kyis smras pa//
173a4(rgyud): stobs chen bdag cag bsgrub tu gsol//btso bos ji skad bka' stsal pa//de bzhin du ni bgyi bar 'tshal//de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin//sdig pa dral ba nges 'ching ba/
173a5(rgyud): sdig pa thams cad rab 'joms pa//mchog tu gsang ba gsungs par gyur//oM badz+ra pI Ni ba s+pho Ta ya/sarba A pA ya ban+da ni pra mo k+Sha ya sarba pri ya ga te b+h+yaHsarba sa tAM sarba
173a6(rgyud): ta thA ga ta badz+ra sa ma ya tra thA//sems can ngan song rgyu can rnams//reg pa 'di yis dbang bskur bas//ngan song 'khor lo dral bar gyur//rgya mtsho ru ni rab
173a7(rgyud): tu lteng //de bzhin ngan song shi 'phos nas//de kun rab tu grol bar gyur//sdug bsngal kun las rab tu grol//rdo rje dbang po'i gnas thob gyur//de bzhin/
173b1(rgyud): rnamA swA //zhabs drung du ni skyes par gyur//rdo rje sems dpa'i mthu yis ni//de bzhin mi khom zad par gyur//rdo rje sems dpa'i mthu yis nI//de nas skar
173b2(rgyud): /des zhi b+h+yo//rmad 'byung ste tshogs gsang tshon+da po//cho 'phrul dag ni skyes par 'gyur//stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di//rdo rje rin chen rang bzhin gnas/na
173b3(rgyud): chen bdun gyis rab tu spros//rdo rje rin chen gyis rab mdzes//de yi rigs kyi ngan srong kun//sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par sbyangs//sems can bde ba skyes/
173b4(rgyud): par gyur//rdo rje bde ba yang dag ldan//mchog chen po yi zhing 'di ni//dag pa'i zheng du rab tu grags//sems can dag pa kun tu khyab//de bzhin rnal 'byu/
173b5(rgyud): rdor rang bzhin//blang yang shing gi nags la sogs//rmad 'byung chen po snang ba med//rin chen sna bdun rang bzhin kun//nags dang rtsal skyes par gyur//
173b6(rgyud): mthon dman ngag dang rnam par bral//lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par snang //ka tsa li ltar reg na bang //stong gsum rab tu gnas par gyur//dmyal ba la
173b7(rgyud): sogs sdug bsngal kun//dang por ngan song nye ba shi/bkras dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal dag/kun tu 'gags par rnam par gnas//rgya mtsho kun tu thim par
174a1(rgyud): /nAd//ri bo g+hA rmugam+b+hak+Sha A.AN+Da lkug//gzhan 'phrul snron ldarnams dang //mchung d+hAd+ha nA mnams rgyu//slad khyud la /
174a2(rgyud): de rab man+ta dar dag med//lha yi 'jig rten gnas kyang med//rgya mtsho med cing lha min med/klu yi gnas bzhi dge kyang med//mi yi khyim dang khang /
174a3(rgyud): med//grong khyer sngangs dang yul 'khor dang //phug dang bcas par rnam par bral//mau yi gnas kyang med pa nyid//chu bo phug dang lung ba med//me dag gi ni lus
174a4(rgyud): nga med//sems can 'ga' yang 'dir sbyin// nA snang 'khod sngo dag kyang med//mi khyim byed cid sdug ba la ba //dung med skyes pa la sogs med/
174a5(rgyud): so glang po lug kyang med//dpag bsam shing dang myos kyi shing //rin chen sna bdun rang bzhin mdzes//spos kyi chu yi rgya mtsho dang //rin chen sna tshogs rnams
174a6(rgyud): kyi mdzes//shing ni yid 'ang thams cad la//rol mo'i sgroni mngon par gyur//ril mos chos kyi sgra dag kya//stong gsum du ni yongs su byung //ji ltar rdo
174a7(rgyud): dbang po'i gnas//ri rab ri yi brtse mo ltar //de bzhin stong gsum gyi ni gnas//rnam pa sna tshogs 'od 'bar gyur//stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di//gru ba ni//
174b1(rgyud): rArab tu gnas par gyur//kun nus phyi rol gnas rnams ni//kha khyer du yang snang bar gyur//slar yang hi ma zla ba med//skar mu med cing lha yang med//rlung glo khang /
174b2(rgyud): pa'i nang du yang //lha rnams nyid kyang mthong mi 'gyur//sangs rgyas 'od kyis yongs su gsalnga//'od zer sna tshogs yid 'phrog pa//gang gis zhing ni yang //
174b3(rgyud): dag sbyangs//rdo rje rin chen yid 'ong ldan//rdo rje dbang po'i gnas nyid kyang //slar yang snang bar mi 'gyur ro//gzhan du gzhi ni gcig pa'i gnas//gang du
174b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams 'phrul ba//stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di//lha yi pad+ma yongs su gsal//rin chen sna bdun rab tu mdzes//dri yi tshogs ni yid 'ong
174b5(rgyud): ldan//bskal pa chen po re zhing gi dbus//dkyil 'khor shin tu sdug steng du//dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad cu yi//rdo rje seng ge'i khri byung gyur//kun nas phyogs
174b6(rgyud): /nams thams cad du//dpag tshad stong phrag drug cu ldan//rdo rje ri ni chen rang bzhin mdzes//seng ge'i khri ni bzhi byung gyur//rdo rje bla re rnam par bres//dar gyi chun pos/
174b7(rgyud): rnam par 'phyang //dril bu'i dra ba rnam par 'phye//zhing ni kun tu rab tu smras//me tog sna tshogs kun tu bkra mi//sna tshogs sbyin gyis rab tu g.yogs//sna tshos
175a1(rgyud): dri yis kun tu khyab//dpag brasam+ba shing gis nye bar smras//dang pra bsam shing ni yid 'ong ldan//rdo rje'i rol mo mdzes pa dag
175a2(rgyud): sgra ni mngon par 'byin par byed//'di nyid dang ni lhan cig zhing //sgrib pa med pa'i rang bzhin du//phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar gyur//slar yang 'jigs/
175a3(rgyud): par 'gyur ba med//stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di//gang ga'i bye snyed grangs med pa//shin tu phra ba'i rdul snyed kyis//sangs rgyas thams cad yongs/
175a4(rgyud): su gsal//til gyi gang bu gang ba bzhin//sangs rgyas thams cad yongs su gsal//phyogs rnams kun nas ma lus par//sangs rgyas thams cad
175a5(rgyud): 'dir gshegs 'gyur//dbus kyi seng ge'i gdan dag la//chos dbyings 'jigs pa med pa la//rnam par smang mdzad stobs chen po//ston pa bcom ldan
175a6(rgyud): bzhugs par gyur//shar du yang ni mi bskyod pa//lho ru rin chen 'byung ldan te//nub tu 'od dpag med pa yin//byang du don yod grub pa ste//mgon po
175a7(rgyud): chen po phyogs bzhi ru//rdo rje yi ni steng du bzhugs//phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag tu ni//mnyam du dmigs ni sa rnam par gnas//chos kyi
175b1(rgyud): dbyings ni brtan par gyur//sangs rgyas thams cad brtan par bzhugs//mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga//chos kyi dbyings ni brtan par mdzad//sangs rgyas grangs
175b2(rgyud): mdo rnams cad ni//rdo rje can ni lnga la bzhugs//phyogs ni re rer khyab gyur pa//sangs rgyas gcig gis yang dge bzhugs//mtshams dang steng dang 'og
175b3(rgyud): dag gi/rnam snang mdzad kyis brtan par mdzad//chos kyi dbyings ni brtan gyur pa//dbus kyi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bzhugs//de nas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul pa/
175b4(rgyud): chos dang longs spyod rdzogs snying po//byang chub sems dpo'i rnam 'phrul pa//sangs rgyas thams cad rang nyid kyi//seng ge'i khri ni lnga la bzhugs//grangs
175b5(rgyud): med tshad ni med pa yi//sangs rgyas chos nyid ma lus pa//ri mo gsal ba dang mtshungs par//stong gsum dag ni ma lus gyur//byang chub sems dpa'i
175b6(rgyud): dga' ba che//pad ma'i steng du bzhugs par gyur//dbus kyi 'khor lor yang dag ldan//bye ba dag ni grangs med lnga//sangs rgyas rol pa dang ldan par//
175b7(rgyud): rdo rje can ni thams cad bzhugs//shar gyi cha la yang dag bzhugs//bye ba dag ni grangs med lnga//rdo rje rnam 'phrul ston byed pa//'khor lo dang ldan bzhugs
176a1(rgyud): par gyur//lho yi phyogs na thams cad gnas//bye ba dag ni grangs med lnga//rin chen rnam 'phrul yang dag ldan//'khor lo dang ldan bzhugs/
176a2(rgyud): par gyur//bye ba dag ni grangs med lnga//nub kyi phyogs na yang dag gnas//pad ma'i rnam 'phrul ston byed po//'khor lo dang ldan bzhugs par gyur/
176a3(rgyud): bye ba dag ni grangs med ldan//byang gi phyogs nA rnam par gnas//lus kyi rnam 'phrul ston byed pa//'khor lo dang ldan bzhugs par gyur//gsang
176a4(rgyud): dang mchod pa gang yin dang //lha mo rdo rje lha mo ni//grangs med tshad ni med pa dag/bcu gnyis kyi ni dkyil 'khor gang //sgo bsrungs dag ni grangs med pa//
176a5(rgyud): rnal 'byor mchog dang ldan pa bzhi//rgyal po shar dang lho dag tu//nub dang byang dang yang dag gnas//chos kyi sku las yang dag byung //longs spyod
176a6(rgyud): rdzogaso ba'i skung gyur pa//sems dpa' chen po de dag kun//chos dang long spyod rdzogs la byung //gang zhig phyogs bcu drug gi yang //byang chub sems
176a7(rgyud): depe'i bdag nyid che//rnal 'byor chen po'i sa thob pa//de dag kun kyang 'a der 'ongs pa//sangs rgyas zhing ni gang gA yi//bye ma dang mo nyamo ji snyed pa//
176b1(rgyud): yongs su bang bar gyur pa'i tshogs//de dag thams cad yang dag gshegs//sangs rgyas kun+da gyi mad+h+ya yis ni//zhing dag rgyu ni chen por gyung //yul
176b2(rgyud): rnams thams cad byi ba yang //gnod pa med cing 'tshe ba'ang med//stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten po'o//dzaM ltar ston+da ni bar med pa'o//sangs rgyas byang chub sem
176b3(rgyud): dpeng yis//byer med pa ni de bzhin gnas//gang nas sangs rgyas mo snang ba//phyogs de rdul tsam yod ma yin//byang chub sems dpa'i rnal 'gyur /
176b4(rgyud): byebya dag sa ni bzhi bcu dang //yang na chos las byung ba nyid//sangs rgyas smras ni grags pa che//rigs lnga byung ba la sogs pa//sangs rgyas rnam 'gyu
176b5(rgyud): ston pa dang //'dir gnas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs/mchog rnams phyogs dang phyogs mtshams mthong //sangs rgyas dag ni grangs med kun//
176b6(rgyud): rnams yang dag gnas 'di ngu//sangs rgyas lnga ni mthong bar gyur//sangs rgyas dgra bcom ma gtogs par//zhing 'dir 'ga' yang mthong ma gyur/
176b7(rgyud): rdo rje rigs kyi 'khor lo min//dkyil 'khor gyi ni tshogs kyang min//dbus dang phyogs ni yang dag bzhugs//sangs rgyas lnga ni mthong bar gyur//dbang phyug
177a1(rgyud): po gnod byed pa'o/rdorje khro bo mthong bar gyur//sangs rgyas lnga dang da dun du//khro bo drug bdunarnamya par gnas//tshangs sogs
177a2(rgyud): lha rnams de dag kyang //ngom tsher dag ni skyes par gyur//'jigs shing skrag nas lha de da// shig ni skye ba b+h+r-id//gits+tsha bo ji bzhin mthong 'gyur zhing //
177a3(rgyud): shin tu ngo mtshar ci zhig snang //slar yang lha yi 'jig rten dag/srid pa nang du mthong ma gyur//'gro bI lU yi sems can min//ri rab dang ni rgya mtsho min//
177a4(rgyud): zla ba nyi ma ma mthong zhing //ri dang khang pa drag kyang min//ci bdag cag ni rmongs gyur tam//yang na mig ni long bar gyur//yang na bdag cag sems
177a5(rgyud): g.yengs pa//sgyu ma'i rnam 'phrul 'di ci zhig/bdag cag gis ni sngang 'jigs mthong //drag cing bkug nas thal bar byas//ri rab ri yi rtse mo ru/
177a6(rgyud): sdug bsngal chen bos gzir bar gyur//slar yang ri rab yod ma yin//khro bo rdzu 'phrul chen po med//gzhan dang khro bo chen po gcig/dbang
177a7(rgyud): phyug chen po gnod par byed//gnas ni chung ngur gyur pa yang //rgya chen po ru 'di ru snang //stong gsum 'di yang mi snang ste//bdag cag 'jig rten
177b1(rgyud): gzhan du byin//de ltar brjod pa sna tshogs pa//gci bra la gcig ni smra bar byed//ni sma drar no gnas gyur nasra//rdo rje can la lba bar dang //gnad
177b2(rgyud): 'byung ba shi za sogs//gdug pa kun dang gdon sogs kyis//mun par khyab pa bzhin du ni//stong gsum 'di ni mthod par gyur//gzhon ni cung zad mo
177b3(rgyud): mthong ste//gzhan du phyogs dag mun pas khyab/rdo rje khro bo 'khrul gyur cing //kun tu rmongs pa nyid gyur cing //gcig la gcig ni rmongs par gyur//ha hA
177b4(rgyud): zhes bya'i sgra sgrogs shong //bdag cag 'dir ni gang du phyin//tshig ni rab tu brjed byed cing //gcig la gcig ni smra bar byed//'di ni su zhig bdag cag gang /
177b5(rgyud): 'don su yi gam du phyin//bdab cag rang gi gnas na ltung //bdag cag 'jig rten gzhan du phyin//rdo rje khro bos bsad par gyur//'o na 'di ni ci zhig yin/
177b6(rgyud): yi gnas kyang ma mthong bzhin//rdo rje can yang mthong ma gyur//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor 'khor min//bdag cag rnams ni mun par gyur//rang gi gnas kyang ma mthong zhing //
177b7(rgyud): ri rab nyid kyang mthang ma gyur//mtsho dang rgya mtsho dag kyang min//skar ma zla ba nyi ma min//bdag cag thams cad gang nas 'ongs//yul gang zhig tu 'gro bar bya//'gro ba
178a1(rgyud): lnga yang yod ma yin//'jig rten med cing ma mo med//mi dang mi ma yin pa dag/rnam pa kun tu mthong ma byur //sngon na ji ltar de ban
178a2(rgyud): phyis//rmad du byung ba nyid ma gyur//gzhan du sa ni g.yos par gyur//rlung dag gis ni rnam par bskyod//'drug gi sgra dang phrag chen po//sdug bsngal thams cad
178a3(rgyud): yang dag ldan//bkres skom la sogs sdug bsngal dang //bral min kun du sdug bsngal gyur//der ni lha chen rdzu 'phrul dag/cung zad kyang ni mthong ma gyur//
178a4(rgyud): dmyal ba yi dgas dud 'gro dag/rnam par nyams shing bshig par gyur//sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgya yis//ngan song gsum ni nye bar zhi//lha gang 'du she/
178a5(rgyud): med pa dang //gzugs med pa na spyod par gnas//phung po lnga ru rang bdag nyid//ngo mtshar de bzhin mthong gyur nas//rang bdag nyid la'ang rtog par byed//gcig/
178a6(rgyud): la gcig kyang lta bar byed//de bzhin thams cad skrag cing 'dzegs//ngo mtshar gyur pa 'di ci zhig/tshad med bskal pa chen po ru//bdag cag dag par gnas
178a7(rgyud): par gyur//bdag mochog las ni bdag cag grol//slar yang bdag tu 'dzin par gyur//sngon gyi bag chags mngon 'dod la//srid gsum gnas ni mthong
178b1(rgyud): bar gyur//srid pa gsum yang mthong ma yin//de bzhin 'gro ba lnga yang med//gzhan du shin tu dag par gcig/chos dang longs spyod rdzogs par sprul//sangs rgyas
178b2(rgyud): lnga nyid mthong bar gyur//srid gsum gnas ni gzhan dgra nan//tshogs la thams cad mnyes par gyur//gcig la gcig ni smra bar byed/'di ni su zhig bdag
178b3(rgyud): cig dang //bdag cig 'jig rten gzhan du phyin//sngon ni bdag gis 'jig rten 'di//'gro ba lnga bcas de bzhin du//ri rab dang ni rgya mtshor bcas//lha rnams drug
178b4(rgyud): ni 'khor bcas mthong //srid pa gsum b+h+yo lha rnams ni//gang zhig 'di ni mthong ma gyur//gzhal yas khang dang sems can ni//gtso bo ji bzhin mthong bar gyur/
178b5(rgyud): de 'dra'i ngo mtshar sna tshogs pa//gnas chen 'di ru mthong bar gyur//byang chub sems kyi rnam 'phrul 'di//sangs rgyas kun gyis rol pa yin//gang zhig stong gsum
178b6(rgyud): 'di yi ni//rang rgyal bdag nyid mchog gyur pa//de yang kun tu rmongs gyur nas//rnam par 'phrul pa'ang mthong ma gyur//sangs rgyas nyid kyang mthong ma yin//rgyal
178b7(rgyud): dang rgyal ba'i sras kyang min//chos kyi dbyings ni brten zhi ba//gnas ni de ru mthong ma gyur//gzhan du stong ni gsum po 'di//rnam pa kun tu ma mthong nyid//so
179a1(rgyud): me dang chu khams min//gser gyi dkyil 'khor dag kyang min//'gro ba lnga yi sems can min//zla ba nyi ma dgra kyang min//skar ma gza'//
179a2(rgyud): dang rgyud skar min//sems can dag kyang khams gsum min//'di dag thams cad stong par gyur/gzhan du na mkha'i dkyil 'khor min//de drag thams cad
179a3(rgyud): 'jig skrag nas//mya ngan 'das pa nye bar thob//gang yang phyogs rnams bcu po yi//nyan thos 'jigs pa med pa rnams//byang sems can ni chen po yis//
179a4(rgyud): de dag kun ni skrag par gyur//rang rang gi ni zhing dag tu//sangs rgyas nyid kyang mthong ma gyur//'dus pa chen po dag dang ni//chos rnams ston pa dag
179a5(rgyud): kyang yin//zhing de yi ni sems can min//lha dang mi rnams dag kyang min//khang pa med cing zhing yang med//sa dang me dang rlung yang med//rang gi zhing
179a6(rgyud): yang ma mthong zhing //rdo rje sems dpa' 'jigs par gyur//skad cig gi ni mi dgar gyur//thar cig du ni rmongs par gyur//de lta bu yi rnam 'phrul
179a7(rgyud): du byang chub sems ni rab tu snang //snod kyi bskal pa chen po la//'khor lo rnam par 'khrul pa bstan//bcom ldan rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pas//de
179b1(rgyud): lta bu no byin gyis brlabs//sems can gang dag 'di na gnas//nyin dang mtshan mo mi shes gyur//de nas de nyid gsang ba che//chos kyi dbyings ni brtan
179b2(rgyud): pa'i tshe gos//chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sangs rgyas//de lta bu yi rnam 'phrul byung //stong gsum yongs su bsdus pa yi//lha yi gnas ni bkod par
179b3(rgyud): gyur//sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas gcig pu//chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa//la lar sngon po rab tu mdzes//sa yi phyogs ni rab tu spros//rdo rje sngon
179b4(rgyud): pos rab tu rgyan//la lar gser gyi mdog tu snang //kha dog ser pos rnam par rgyan//sa yi cha yang rab tu spras//rdo rje sor pos rab tu rgyun//la lar kha
179b5(rgyud): dog dmar po no//byi ru lta bus rab tu mdzes//si yi cha yang rab tu spras//rdo rje dmar pos rab tu rgyan//lA lar btsug gi mdog can gyi//baiDUR+Ya mtshungs rab
179b6(rgyud): tu mdzes//sa yi cha yang rnam parA spras//rdo rje gcod kyis rnam par mdzes//la lar shel gyi mdog can gyi//shin tu snang bas rab tu mdzes//sa yi char
179b7(rgyud): yang rnam par spras//rdo rje shel gyis rnam par rgyan//shar du sngon po chen po ste//lhor ni ser po yang dag ldan//nub kyi cha ni dmar po ste//byang ni bcod dang /
180a1(rgyud): yang dag ldan//dbus kyis yi cha dag ni//shes gyi mdog can bla na med//rdo rje rgyun thos shin+da t+yA dag/chen rtse lnga yi rang bzhin bshad//
180a2(rgyud): gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa//rta babs bzhi yis rab tu mdzes//cha mnyam legs par bgos pa ste//go rimis dang ni yang dgra ldan//kun nas phyi rol gnas
180a3(rgyud): dgu na//rdo rje kha khyer yang dag ldan//kun nas kha khyer dang ldan zhing //sgo yi kha khyer dag gis spras//ri mo rdo rje sngo rang bzhini//gzhan yang gser gyi
180a4(rgyud): mdog can dang //kha dog dmar ba mchog drang ni//gzhan yang shel ni bzang po dag/rimatshon kun gyi rang bzhin mchog/dkyil 'khor sna tshogs mdzes
180a5(rgyud): gyur pa//sna tshogs gzugs ni 'dzin pa'i mchog/rdo rje lha mo tshogs kyis mchod//dra ba dra ba phyed pas spras//zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes//g.yer/
180a6(rgyud): kwa'i dra bas kun tu khebs//dril bu'i mchog ni kun tu 'phyang //sna tshogs shing ni yid 'ong ldan//dpag bsam shing nI yid 'ong ldan//spos dang ma
180a7(rgyud): tog de bzhin dri//snang ba'i shing mchog yang dag ldan//sna tshogs bkod pa nye bar ldan//sna tshogs rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu//mchi mchog chu yis gang //
180b1(rgyud): bar gyur//rdo rje rgya mtsho rgyu chen ldan//me tog sna tshogs kun du bkram//sna tshogs gdug pa dag gis bdugs//sna tshogs dri yi chu yis gtor//sna tshogs
180b2(rgyud): dri yi/sa kun tu khyab//drag po chen po sras bcu dag/de nas nyams dga' ba dag byung //shing dang pad sogs thams cad las//chos rnams 'byung ba thos par
180b3(rgyud): gyur//phyogs rnams kun tu rnam phyung nas//dag pa'i zhing du stong nyid bcas//rnam par sgra ni gang zhig grag/chos kyi bde ba 'byung bar gyur//yaM/laM/shaM/baM//
180b4(rgyud): oM badz+ro satwa kro d+ha ya hUM phaT/oM badz+ra kro d+ha A kaR+Sha ya hUM phaT/oM badz+ra kro d+ha drA gA ya hU~M phaT/oM badz+ra duSh+Ti kro d+ha ya sA d+hu sA d+hu hUM phaT//khro bo rdo rje rin chen mchog/
180b5(rgyud): 'bar ba'i phreng ba bkod bka' byas//khro bo rdo rje bla nA mI //mchog tu gsang ba gsungs par gyur//oM badz+rI b+hi ku TI kro d+ha hA na hU~M phaT/oM badz+ra sUr+yA ma hA dz+wa lA kro d+ha
180b6(rgyud): ma la dz+wa la ya sarba hUM phaT/oM badz+ra kr-i tu ma hA kro d+ha d+he ni hUM phaT/oM an+d+ra hA sa badz+ra man+da hA sa kro d+ha ha hA ha ha hUM phaT//khro bo chen po rdo rje rgyos//'bar ba'i phreng
180b7(rgyud): bas khyad gyur pas//khro bo'i rgyal po rab bzod dka'//mchog tu 'jigs su rung ba smras//oM badz+ra d+harma be sho d+ha ya hUM phaT/oM tID+D+h+ya kri b+hin d+ha hUM phaT/
181a1(rgyud): oM badz+ra ha tu kro d+ha pra be sha ya maN+Da l-i s+yarba hUM phaT/oM badz+ra kr-i d+hA b+hA Sha t+yA pA ta hU~M phaT+Ta//rdo rje las+yA ni rgyal po che//gsang ba thams cad
181a2(rgyud): kun bsdus pas//'bar ba gsal bskye khyab pa byung //khro bo rgyal pos brjod par bru~M do//oM badz+ra kar+m+ma kr-ikro d+hA hUM phaT/oM badz+ra ka pra tsA kro d+hA rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM phaT/
181a3(rgyud): oM badz+ra yak+Sha kro d+hA khA da khA da hUM phaT/oM badz+ra kro d+ha muSh+Ti sa d+ha ya sa ma ya hUM phaT/sems dpa' 'di rnams gsang ba che//zhi ba'i gzugs las rnam par
181a4(rgyud): gyur//rdo rje khro bo drag po che//'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs gyur//de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin//khro bo chen po stobs po che//gsung ba 'di rnams
181a5(rgyud): yongs su brjod//mchod pa'i lha mos gsungs par gyur//oM badz+ra lA s+yai rA gA ya hUM phaT/oM badz+ra mA le a b+hi Shiny+tsa ya hUM phaT/oM badz+ra gI te ka ta ya
181a6(rgyud): hUM phaT/oM badz+ra nr-i te ba shi ku ru hUM phaT/oM badz+ra puSh+pa pU dze s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM phaT/oM badz+ra gan+d+ha pU dza s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM phaT/oM badz+ra d+hU pa pU dza s+pha ra Na/
181a7(rgyud): sa ma ye hUM phaT/oM badz+ra a lo ka pU dza s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM phaT//de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/khro bo drag po shin tu gdug/rdo rje khro tho rab gtum pa/
181b1(rgyud): sgo srung dag ni kun tu byung //oM oM ku sha ma hA kr-i d+ha A kAR+Sha ya sarba sa ma ya hU~M phaT/oM badz+ra pA shwa mya hA kro d+ha prA bo sha yA s+ya ma d+ho hU~M/oM badz+ra s+pho Ta ma hA kro d+hA ban+d+ha ya
181b2(rgyud): s+yArba sa mA ya hU~M bau/oM badz+ra a be sha ma hA kro d+ha a be sha ya sarba sa ma yai hUM haM//'kho lo yongs su zlum por ni/rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por gyur//khro bo chen ngo'i
181b3(rgyud): tshogs kyis khyab//dkyil 'khor chen po yang dag ldan//gnas chen po dang yang dag ldan//dkyil 'khor chen po kun bsdus pas//shin tu gsang ba chos chen /
181b4(rgyud): po//chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa//de nyid snying po gsang ba che//thar pa chen po grong khyer mchog/dkyil 'khor rgyal po chen po ste//sems can don
181b5(rgyud): kun yang dag ldan//chos nyid rdzogs par byang chub pa//'di 'dra chos dang longs spyod rdzogs//rigs lnga'i gsang ba gang yin pa//gdon mi za bar byed
181b6(rgyud): pa yin//de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs zhi bo//grang phyir dag pa'i tshogs chen po//de bzhin rdo rje'i rigs dag pa//gang phyir lha chen rab 'dul byed///
181b7(rgyud): lha chen la sogs sprul byed pa//de bzhin pad ma'i rigs mchog ste//gang phyir gdul bya'i sems can rnams//sprul pa sna tshogs yang dag byung //sprul po'i
182a1(rgyud): 'khor lo zhi pa ste//drag po'i mchod pa rab bskor ba//sna tshogs rigs can 'khor lo ste//rigs bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan//de bzhin/
182a2(rgyud): gshegs pa'i rigs mchog ni//shar gyi 'khor lo yang dag byung //de nas rdo rje'i rigs drag po//sems can don du yang dag 'jigs//rdo rje'i
182a3(rgyud): rigs mchog chen po 'di//dkyil 'khor tshugs ni kun bsdus pa//gsang ba'i dbang phyug rgyal po che//gang phyir gsang ba'i bdag por bshad//
182a4(rgyud): rdo rje thams cad kun bsdus pa//rang gi rigs mchog bshed nas ni//rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal po ches//dkyil 'khor chen po kun du sprul//lha la so
182a5(rgyud): po gdug pa kun//skad cig de la yang dgra bkug/slar ni bcug par byas nas kyang //skad cig gis ni dam tshig phog/rdo mtshan ma'i
182a6(rgyud): dbang bskur ba//dam tshig ldan pa byin nas nI//dkug ste rab tu bya drug nas kyang //de bzhin bcings te dbang du byas//dam tshig la ni brtson
182a7(rgyud): byas te//dam tshig sdom pa de bzhin no//mi rnams la ni phan pa'i phyir//dkyil 'khor mchog ni gsungs par gyur//'khor po chen po grong skye
182b1(rgyud): che/rdo rje rigs mchog chen po ste//khams gsum rnam rgyal zhes bya ba//de nas yang dag bshad par bya//'jig rten gsum tshogs pham byas nas//lha/
182b2(rgyud): la sogs pa rab bcug 'gyur//de nas khams gsum rnam rgyal gnas//'khor lo chen po grong khyer che//gang ming bzung ba tsam nyid kyi//sems can
182b3(rgyud): rab tu bcom nas ni//gdon la sogs pa 'bros par byed//rims dang gdon dang dug dag drang //drag bro gdug pa dam tshig drang //mtshun bzung ba yi mod
182b4(rgyud): nyid la//skrag pa dang ni g.yo bar gyur//sku ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i mchog/mi gang dag ni gdul bya min//de pas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal ni//dkyil 'khor
182b5(rgyud): chen po sprul par gyur//rdo rje slob dpon skal ba che//shin tu byang zhing rab tu mkhas//dgongs pa yau ni tshi ga shes//gzhung rnams thos shing dron la mkhas
182b6(rgyud): rab tu drang zhing blo ldan brten//rigs dang snyigs min rab tu shes//byang chub sems la brtson par gyur//lha gzhan dag la 'dod ldan min//gas
182b7(rgyud): ba'i snying po mchog mthong ba//snying rje bdag nyid brtser ldan pa//dag cing ngos la rnam par dul//rang gi ngang gis rnam par gnas//zhen cing chags
183a1(rgyud): la gdug pa min//rmongs pa med cing le lo med//brtse ldan phran pa'i bsam pa can//rtag tu rnam par dgod la dga'//gzugs
183a2(rgyud): sogs 'dod pa'i yon tan la//chags shing lhag par rgyal gyur nas//srid la sems ni sgrub par byed//srid la mngon par chags pa med//theg pa chen po'i
183a3(rgyud): tshul la brtson//theg pa gzhan la 'dod ldan min//sems can rnams kyi don la brtson//dkon mchog gsum gyi mchog byung ba//nyon mongs kun tu chags pa
183a4(rgyud): spangs//gnyen po dag ni rab tu sgom//'dod chags la sogs nyon mongs che//mi sdug pa la sogs pa sgom//rigs dang rigs min cho ga shes//sngags dang
183a5(rgyud): phyag rgya shin tu mkhas//dkug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang //dbang du bya dang gshegs gsol dang //ji skad rdo rje dbyings bshad bzhin//sngon du rig pa'i brtul
183a6(rgyud): bzhugs bya//khA na ma tho rdul tsam la//kun tu 'dzem par bya ba yin//tshod dang tshon rtsi srad bu dang //yod byad cho ga yang dag ldan//bcing dang phur bus gdab pa nyid//
183a7(rgyud): sngar bshad rdo rje dbyings bzhin du//bza' ba dang ni mi bza' ba//rdo rje snyems tshul ting 'dzin gyis//rdo rje dbyings sogs dkyil 'khor du//sngar ni ji ltar de bzhin
183b1(rgyud): bya//de nas yang dag rab bshad bya//dkyil 'khor chen po mchod gyur pa//rdo rje dbyings dang rab tu mtshungs//dngos grub thams cad byed pa'i mchog/gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi
183b2(rgyud): po//rta thabs bzhis ni rnam par rgyan//thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan//der gyis chun pos rnam par rgyan//rgya cher ji ltar rigs pa ru//ji bzhin rdo rje grong khyer che//
183b3(rgyud): rdo rje dbyings dang rab tu mtshungs//rdo rje 'dzin pa'i grong khyer bri//'khor lo lnga dang yang dag ldan//ka ba brgyad dang yang dag ldan//de dbus rang bzhin 'khor lo yi//
183b4(rgyud): dbus su sangs rgyas dgod par bya//rnam par snang mdzad ston pa che//rdo rje sems dpa' 'od po che//byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po che//sangs rgyas longs spyod
183b5(rgyud): rdzogs dkyil 'khor//sangs rgyas spyan sngar rdo rje ni//'bar ba'i dbus su dgod par bya//rdo rje mi ltar 'bar nyid ni//phyag rgya 'jig rten gsum 'joms po/
183b6(rgyud): ba yas su rin chen phyag rgya ni//'byur ba'i dbus su dgod par bya//g.yon du pad+ma ma'i phyag rgya bri//rgyab tu rdo rje rnon po ni//'bar ba'i dbus su dgod par bya/
183b7(rgyud): phyag rgya yi ni rgyal po bzhi//'bar ba'i me dang rab tu ldan//rnam par snang mdzad dkyil 'khor tshe//chos dbyings grong khyer chen po la//'khor los sgyur ba bzhi po
184a1(rgyud): yi//phyag rgya dag kyang dgod par byed//gang dang gang gi thig gyur pa//dkyil 'khor shes rab can thig gdab//rdo rje yi ni sngags 'di yis//
184a2(rgyud): rdo rje'i thig ni yongs su bzung //oM badz+rA sa ma ya smr-i traM mU ti kra ma hUM//dkyil 'khor chen po bsdus pa yi//rdo rje shugs kyi song nas kyang //rdo rje'i phyag rgya
184a3(rgyud): yongs bsdus pa//rgyal po bri zhing dgod par bya//oM badz+ra bye gA kr-i ma hUM//tshon rtsi thams cad yang dag ldan//'bar ba'i lta bas thams cad blta/
184a4(rgyud): rdo rje tshon rtsi bi g+he bya zhing //rdo rje sngags ni rab tu bskul//oM badz+ra tsita tri sa mA ya hUM//phyag rgya gang zhig dgod par du//snying po thams cad dgrod
184a5(rgyud): par bya//sngar ni dgod pa gang yin pa//rdo rje gzugs ni bskor byed pa//rdo rje hUM mdzad dkyil 'khor du//rdo rje shugs kyi song nas kyang //rdo rje rig pa
184a6(rgyud): mchog rgyal po//mi bskyod shin tu mnyam bzhag pa//zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa//'che ba dag ni bcung zad gtsigs//khro bo'i rgyal po 'bar bas khyab//
184a7(rgyud): phyag na phyag rgya dang bcas mtshan//rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag rgya na//steng du phyog gnyis yang dag ldan//de bzhin kho nar phyag gnyis dag/lcags kyu 'phyang ba
184b1(rgyud): yang dag ldan//phyag gcig gis ni zhags pa bsnams//gcig gis rdo rje yang dag bsnams//mnga' 'gengs pa yi phyag rgya dang //phyag gnyis dag ni shin tu ldan//
184b2(rgyud): rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag rgya ste//dbang phyug chen po kun tu mnan//g.yas pas lha mo u mi yi//nu ma'i bar du gnon par byed//de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/
184b3(rgyud): rdo rje khro bo dgod par bya//'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab cing 'bar//khro bo 'jigs par byed pa mchog/mdun du rdo rje sems dpa' ste//g.yas su rdo rje rgyal po'o//
184b4(rgyud): g.yon du rdo rje chags pra ste//rgyab tu rdo rje logs pa'o//rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang //lho ru khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ni//khro bo'i rgyal po khri gnyer can//waM
184b5(rgyud): bos yongasu bskor ba bri//thams cad 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab//gdong ni khro bcas bzhad ldan pa//rdo rje dbang phyug phyag rgyar ldan//khro gnyer can ni yongs su
184b6(rgyud): brjod//de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du//rdo rje khro bo bdag nyid che//sngags dang phyag rgya yongs su beste//rang go gnas su yang dag bri//mdun du
184b7(rgyud): rin chen te//g.yas su khro bo gzi brjid do//g.yon du rgyal mtshan drag po ste//rgyab tu khro bo bzhed pa'o//rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang //nub kyi
185a1(rgyud): phyogs su dkyil 'khor ni//khro bo chen po rdo rje ste//khro bdag chen po rnams kyis bskos//rdo rje chos ni mdun du ste//rdo rje rnon pa
185a2(rgyud): g.yas su'o//de bzhin g.yon du rdo rje rgyu//rgyud du rdo rje smra ba'o//rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang //kyil 'khor dag ni mchog den ga/rdo rje dbyu
185a3(rgyud): pa las chen po//khro bo chen pos yongs su bsgyur/rdo rje las ni mdun du ste//g.yas su rdo rje srung ba'o//g.yon du rdo rje gnod sbyin te//rgyub tu rdorje
185a4(rgyud): khu tshur ro//dbus kyi 'khor lo'i mtshams bzhi ru//lha mo bzhi ni yang dge bI//mtshams su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lo//rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs
185a5(rgyud): bri//phyi rol dkyil 'khor mtshams rnams//rdo rje me tog la sogs bri//rdo rje dbyings sogs dkyil 'khor du//ji skad sngar bshad cho ga bzhin//
185a6(rgyud): smyo bzhi dag ni thams cad du//sgo srung rnams ni dgod par bya//lcags kyu zhags po lcags skyob dang //dril bu dbab pa bla na med//rlung gi phyag
185a7(rgyud): rgyu snying kar bzhag/rang ring gi ni snying po yis//rdo rje dril bu yid 'ong ldan//rnam par snang mdzad rnam par dgod//bdag nyid rdo rje khro bo no//
185b1(rgyud): gtso bo rdo rje reg pa mchog/rdo rje rgyal po mchog byin drug/rang nyid rdo rje kyilnga 'khyod mchod//de yis dkyil 'khod de bris nAs//rdo rje d+ha rIn+na tir 'jug
185b2(rgyud): yang dag par ni brtag byas la//lan bdun du ni bskor ba bya//chad pa gang yin yongs su dag/mkhas pas lhag par dbri bar bya//rdo rje dril bu rtogs par
185b3(rgyud): bya//grub dar 'gyur te nyes pa med//rdo rje stu sa kyu la sogs kun//mnyam par gzhag pas las rnams bya//'khor lo'i dbus su zhugs nas ni//mkhas
185b4(rgyud): sa sgo ni dbye byar bya//yid kyis rdo rje ri mon//bteg cing kun tu phye nas kyang //rdo rje skyo ni bzhi po dag/yid kyisku dbye byad bya bru yi ni//de la snying po ni
185b5(rgyud): 'di yin te/oM badz+rA d+ha ra ud g+ha Te ye pra be sha ya sa ma yaM hUM//dkyil 'khor phyi rol gnas rnams su//phyi yi rdo rje rigs dag bri//khyab 'jug
185b6(rgyud): la sogs lha rnams ni//kha khyer gyi ni phyed la gnas//'khor lho dang bcas rigs bcas te//sems can gdug pa gdon la sogs//ri mos nga
185b7(rgyud): 'byung po sha za dang //mkha' 'gro 'byung po ma mo dang //lha mo mtshon cha dang ldan kun//ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa bri//phyi rol kha khyed gnas su ni//
186a1(rgyud): rdo rdo la khyod pongs pa rnams//donas ston la slob dpon ches//dkyil 'bar de sa su 'dug nas ni//rdo rje sbrul makrung bcas tu/
186a2(rgyud): tIng 'dzin la snyoms 'dablo bya//ji ltar rdo rje rigs byung bri//de drazhin bdag nyid rnam par byasam//rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po//bdag nyid yang da
186a3(rgyud): byin gyis brlag/rdo rje khro bo rgyal po mchog/zhes bya de 'dra'i ting nge 'dzin//rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyi//skal ba chen po snyoms zhugs nas//
186a4(rgyud): skad gong du grags pa bzhin//shes rab can gyis thams cad bsam//ji ltar rdo rje rigs 'byung //ji ltar dkyil 'khor rdzogs par ni//rgya chen
186a5(rgyud): gsang ba chen po dang //rdo rje sleb dpon cho ga mchog/rgyud chen gsang ba zhes bya ba//rtog pa 'di las rab tu bshad//de nas dbus su 'dug byas
186a6(rgyud): nas//rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches//khro bo'i phyag rgya bcings nas ni//phyag rgya thams cad yongs su bcings//khro bo rdo rje lcags kyu bcings//songs
186a7(rgyud): rgyas thams cad spyan drang bya//mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad ngom pa ni//lan gcig tu ni brjod par bya//rdo rje me tog sogs mchod pa//'dren pa thams cad mchod/
186b1(rgyud): par bya//gsang ba'i mchod pa gang bya ba//phyag rgya thams cad yongs su bcing //phyag rgya nye ba'i phyag rgya ldan//de bzhin du ni mchod pa nyid//phyag rgya'i lan la
186b2(rgyud): sogs pa kun//cho ga rab tu ldan po dbul//rdo rje dril bu dkrol bya zhing //gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor bsdigs par bya//gdug pa'i senas ni gdul bya zhing //
186b3(rgyud): nyon mongs mchog tu bsad par bya//dbab cing brjod pa nyid du bya//rdo rje mchod pas mchod par bya//glu dang mchod pa yang dag ldan//rdo rje glu ni blang bar bya//
186b4(rgyud): rdo rje yi ni glu 'di dag/blang zhing mchog rnams mnyes par bya//btud cing dbul bar bya ba nyid//rdo rje glu ni blang bar bya//sha ta sha tra ma ta sa ta ti rau/Ta/
186b5(rgyud): ta Ta ta pri tI br-i ta ha ta/ma ta sha pra ta ka ta/ku Ta bi Ta bi Ta Ta Ta Ta ba Ta/i tI tau Ta TaT/ka ra Ta ra Ta ra ra Ta//rdo rje ti rin ti ri yi//phyag rgyas
186b6(rgyud): bdag nyid dbang bskur bya//ji ltar 'dod pa bka'i mnos nas//rdo rje'i sngags ni rab tu bskul//sngon po gros kyis stod g.yogs bya//sngon po yis ni
186b7(rgyud): mig dgab bya//rdo rje ting rin ti re yi//phyag rgya rdo rje slob ma bcing //oM gr-ih+Na badz+ra sa ma ye hUM baM/ci rigs par ni gzhug bya zhing //rdo rje'i sngags
187a1(rgyud): ni bsgral bar bya//rdo dz+nyA yI nI snrugs 'di yis//rdo rje slob ma gang+gAg par b+ha//A~M b+hUdz+nyA sa mA ya b+hA be sh+yA yA mi//dz+ha rje dbyings sogs
187a2(rgyud): gyol 'khor du//rgyas par ji ltar snga ma bzhin//ye shes dbab pa'i las drag ni//mkhas pa dag gyis bya nyid do//mchod pa dang ni gtor ma nyid//rdo rje
187a3(rgyud): can gyis sngar gsungs nyid//shes rab can gyis kun bslab cing //bdag nyid dang byas rab tu bya//rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag rgya yi//shes rab can gyis hU~M
187a4(rgyud): bsgrub bya//lha la sogs pa gdug pa kun//bkug cing de ru gzhug par bya//rdo rje'i rnal 'byong bsgrub bya zhing //bdag nyid dam ni gzhan yang
187a5(rgyud): rdo rje phreng bas dbang bskur bya//rdo rje mna' yi phyag rgya yis//ston la mna' ni bo skyugs purar+ya bya//rdo rje ye shrIs ye shes che//rdo rje ya
187a6(rgyud): shes rab bsgrub bya//lag pas rdo rje mtshan ma gzung //rdo rje sbugs ni rab bsgrub bya//rdo rje yi ni sdig ste 'di yis//rdo rje mtshan sna rlab tu
187a7(rgyud): sbyin//oM dr-i \u0f7f dzA pA Ni karma ka rod b+ha be//de nas ming gi dbang bskur zhing //rdo rje sngag ces ni rab tu bskul//rdo rje yi ni sngags 'di yis//rdo rje ming gi dang
187b1(rgyud): bskung \u0f7f//oM badz+rA kro d+hAt+ta aSh+NI'iny+tsa mo/oM badz+nyAnA pa A d+hi Shokatata thA na ma//yo shob 'byung ba phun du mchog pa//ma ngas pa mos ni bsgom par bya//shes rab mchog
187b2(rgyud): gis bslab bya zhing //rdo rje rnal 'byor rab tu sgrub//snying kar rdo rje dris nas ni//sna tshogs las rnams yang dbu ldan//'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab cir 'bar//snying kar rdo rje bsgom
187b3(rgyud): par bya//rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po//bdag nyid yongs su bsgom par bya//rgyal ba las rnams thams cad 'dzin//bdag nyid yongs su bsgom par bya//yang na khro bo'i nang nas
187b4(rgyud): gcig/bdag nyid yongasu bsgom par bya//rdo rje khro bo snyoms 'jug pas//'gro ba thams cad dbab par bya//hUM satwa badz+ra kro d+ha A be sha A/khro bo rin chen ting 'dzin gyis//rdo rje rin chen/
187b5(rgyud): yang dag bris//bdag nyid rdo rje rin tshon te//sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du bya//rdo rje pad+ma 'grin bcings nas//lkog ma'i phyogasu yang dag bri//bdag nyid rdo rje chos bsgoms nas//de nas
187b6(rgyud): nyon mongs thams cad 'joms//spyi bor rdo rje bI bya zhing //rdo rje 'bar ba 'dzin pa dgod//bdag nyid rdo rje lngas bsgoms nas//gdug pa thams cad bsal bar bya//ha badz+ra rat+na kra d+ha ba
187b7(rgyud): mA nA ya tra/hrIHbadz+ra d+harma kro d+ha nA sha~M ya phaTe/hU~M karma badz+ra kro d+ha rak+Sha//lha tshogs sangs rgyas thams cad ni//phyag rgya dang bcas dgug par bya//ye shes rlab cing de nas bzung //de
188a1(rgyud): bzhin kho nar yang dab rlab//lag par rdo rje lcags kyu blo//bsdigs mdzub yi ge hU~M ldan pa//khro bo yis nr-i ser mo bskyod//lha rnams 'gugs par byed pa
188a2(rgyud): rmya ga/mA~M badz+ra kA d+hA A kar+N+Na ye hU~M phaT//de bzhin rig tu rkang 'i dz+wal la//rdo rje lcags kyu yid dag bri//de yis wA na gang zhig min no//de ni dgug pa'i mchog yin no//
188a3(rgyud): oM byAng+gak+Sho d+ha Ak+Sha e ge shi A kr-id+hA ye hU~M phaT//dpung po brkyang dang yang dge ljin//rdo rje lcag sna steng yed dang bru~M//wA ni gang dang dang la minan//de dang de ni dgug
188a4(rgyud): chog/oM badz+ra kro d+hA nA A kar+d+ha me hU~M ben/rgyun pa rdo rje lcags ku ni//yang dag bris papa de minan zhing //lha ni gang /kun tu mnan//de dang de ni 'dzugs pa'i mchog
188a5(rgyud): dzA kro d+ha A sa na A~M gar+b+ha ya A kats+tsho ye mi ti h+Na badz+ra sa ma~M ya ma nr-i s+thir d+hI phaH/phyag rgya dbabri par yang dag dpag/sa ngas dus yu~M shes bslab par bya/rdo rje sbyang ba thams cad ni/
188a6(rgyud): rtsusgrub pa dag kyang yang dag biHma//g.yon brkyang ba yis gnas rnams//bdag nyid khro bor bsgom par bya//myur du sangs rgyas yis ni//ring bar mi thogs yang dag dbang //oM bad+hU
188a7(rgyud): kA ya A be sha hU~M oM rdo rje hU~M mdzad yang dar sbyor//khro bo bdag nyid rnam par bye/sangs rgyas byang chub yong dgang bug/rdo sngags ni rab tu 'phrul//a badz+ra 'i d+yad ta ma me hA kro d+ha yAn ya toH/
188b1(rgyud): pa dA na badz+ra hU~M phaT/bdag nyid khro bo bsgom bya zhing //khro bo'i lta bas blta bar bya//'khor ba'i brtson ra 'jigs rung bar//sems can tha masna cad bsad par bya//oM dr-iSh+Ta ma hA kro d+ha mA ra ya sarba satwa hUM//rtag tu
188b2(rgyud): rang nyid po da bros par//yid kyis bdag nyid bsgom bya zhing //gzhan dag kyang ni bsgom byas nas//'gro ba 'di kun srung bar 'gyur//oM badz+ra rak+Sha rak+Sha saurbaM satwa hUM phaT//gsang ba'i phyag rgya rnal 'byor cha//
188b3(rgyud): rnam pa bzhi ni bslab par bya//rdo rje ye shes de nyid che//sangs rgyas byang chub ye shes bsam//rdo rje khro bo snyoms 'jug pas//sems can gang phyir kun tu chags//yid kyis gzugs ni bsgom bya zhing //yi
188b4(rgyud): ge hUM ni rab tu brjod//rdo rje sbyor ba 'di dag ni//rdo rje mkha' gro'i phyag rgya yis//sems can gang la yongasu chags//de yi nyon mongs rnam par nyams/Tak+ki a sa la pe/a la pe ats+tshu Tak+ki hUM phaT/'di ni lan
188b5(rgyud): gcig brjod pas kyang //kun nas nyon mongs zhu zhing go yo//Tak+ki dza/sems can grang gi rgyud la ni//rdo rje yi ni lta bas bltas//rdo rje rnal 'byor spyan chen pos//de yi sdug bsngal
188b6(rgyud): nyams par gyur//Tak+ki hU~M/yi ge hUM ni gyur pa las//nye ba'i sems can gang yin pa//de yi snying kur rdo rje yang //shes rab can gyis yid kyis bsam//de nas 'jigs pa thams
188b7(rgyud): cad las//phyir me ldog pa'i phyag rgya yang //rdo rje rnal 'byor mkha'agro dang //rdo rje phyag rgyas gdab par bya//Tak+ki ho//rdo rje rnal 'byor rmad 'byung che//rdo rje rnal 'byor rdo gang //rnal 'byor mkha 'bro dkyil 'jo
189a1(rgyud): ni//shes rab can gyis mchog gsang rlab//dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas//yan lag kun la yongasu 'khyud //yi ge hUM ni sbyar byed pa//sdug bsngal rnam par nyam
189a2(rgyud): par gyur//rdo rje khro bo rab drag 'dzin//rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom par bya//de yi khro bo'i sku gang yin//gcig tu mchog tu gsang ba bdag/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'ang
189a3(rgyud): rung //bdag nyid dang ni mtshungs pa ru//lus ni yang dag sbyor ba ni//dbang po snyoms 'dug brjod par bya'o//sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' 'am//rdo rje khro bo 'am/sems
189a4(rgyud): dpa' gzhan de'i lus gang yin pa dang bdag gi lus gang yin pa mtshungs par shes pa nyid 'di ni dbang po gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa zhes bya'o//yang na
189a5(rgyud): rnam par sgom pa yis//ji skad bshang bzhin yan lag 'a byung //rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che//dpud pa dam por bsdam par bya//yan lag kun la yongs 'khyud pas//
189a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub rab grub 'gyur//dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pa//'dod pa'i 'dod chags partog mi bya//'di yis mtshungs par bsgoms pa yis//mtshungs pa
189a7(rgyud): de ni dbang po yin//hi tre dug sbyor ba'i so dag gi/mchu bzung nas ni 'obya zhing //sems can gang zhig rnam sgom pa//des ni bde ba don yang thob//hUM dza sems can thaMd/
189b1(rgyud): bdo byed pa//yi ge hU~M do rab sbyor zhing //bdag nyid khro bor rnams sbyangs nas//de nas bde ba thob par 'gyur//hUM/gang gis hU~M na rab sbyor zhing //sems can dag na gang dag gis/
189b2(rgyud): yan lag thams cad bsdus byas na//de yi nyon mongs bsrabs par 'gyur//hUM phaT/ye shes chen pos thabs ldan pa//rdo rje'i rigs ni thams cad nyid//de bzhin 'khor lo'i 'khor
189b3(rgyud): bcas pas//mkhas pa yis ni bslabs par bya//sangs rgyas sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin gyis//rtag tu bdag ni bsgom par bya//rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa//sangs rgyas kun ni rnam
189b4(rgyud): par sgom//sgom pa'i sbyor ba de yis ni//skad rtsig sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur//ad rdo rje'i rigs pa mchog rgyal po//bdag nyid yongasu bsgom par bya//hUMn/ rdo rje khro bo khro gnyer can
189b5(rgyud): mkhas pa yis ni bsgom por bya//traMd rdo rje sde ru rang bdag nyid//sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya//hraMHrdo rje dbab pa khro bo che//mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya//a/bdag nyid
189b6(rgyud): rdo rje sems la ni//rdo rje sems dpar rnam par sgom//hUM badz+ra satwa/rdo rje rgyal po bdag bsgom bya//dza badz+ra rA dza/rdo rje chags par bsam par bya//ra badz+ra rA ga/khro bo legs par bsgom
189b7(rgyud): par bya//sa sA d+hu/de nas rdo rje rin che no//oM badz+ra rat+na/rdo rje gzi brjid de bzhin no//dz+wa la ya/bdag nyid rdo rje rgyal mtshan sgom//de ti/rdo rje bzhed pa rnam par sbom/ha sa badz+ra hA sa/rdo rje
190a1(rgyud): chos ni bsgom par bya//sho d+hA ya/rlon do rnam par rlom//d+hIn dA/rdo rgyu ni 'bar bya che//prA ba sha ya/rdo rje smad rnam par sgom+ba//b+ha ShA/rdo rje las ni bsgom par
190a2(rgyud): byA karma/rdo rje go cha rnam par sgom/rak+Sha/rdo rje gnod sbyin bsgom par bya//khA d-i/rdo rje khu tshur rnam par sgom//ba~M gang dang gang la 'dod pa nyid//rigs kyi lha ni ci 'dra bar//rang ba
190a3(rgyud): nyid ni bsgom par bya//de ni 'ang yis skad cig 'grub//hUM rdo rje phyag rgyas lan cig bcing //mkhas pas rdo rje bzlas pas brjod//ji skad bzlas pa'i rgyud du bshad//gzhan du
190a4(rgyud): khro bo bzung bar bya//yid kyis kyang ni brjod pa zhing //lus kyi phyag rgyas bskul bar bya//dkyil 'khor gsum ni mnyam sbyor bas//skad cig de la mkhas pas sgrub//de nas nyams
190a5(rgyud): dge' rdo rje'i rigs//phyag rgya chen po grangs med pa/lus kyi phyag rgya yang dag ldan//gang phyir sems can snod min pa//de yi phyir na nyung bar gsungs//phyag rgya chen po yongs bsdu
190a6(rgyud): ba/theg pa chen po mngon bsdus las//rgyud chen gsad pa zhes bya 'o//rgyud de rab tu bshod pa yin//gsang ba'i cho ga 'di yis ni//rnal 'byor bya ba bsgrub par bya//rdo rje rnam
190a7(rgyud): byor sbyor ba yis//skad cig gis ni sangs rgyas 'grub//'dir ni phan yon mang po dag/rang gi las la nges par sbyar//gang zhig brtul zhing mngon pa re sbyor//skad cig
190b1(rgyud): sanos sa rgyas 'jug/rnams ma nga byung ba yang//zhugs sa mngon byar rdzu 'gyung byud//rnam da pyod//'du 'dra wAn par dz+nyA ma med// 'a na
190b2(rgyud): sa//ra / 'ang mas thod 'gyur//nga shes dus// 'i der mi 'gyur/ grangs med ga'i ni//skyed pa'i dag cing med par dudu/
190b3(rgyud): la shAr 'd-ir man par ga /na s+yA m+b+ha//sas hU~Ms rgya kyi rdul bstan pa//s+ye sar+b+bas byang ts+tsha/ nga hU~M//de ltas sa na
190b4(rgyud): / min//gdun n+yang na gnas nas ni/ni na rgya rjod//khrag skyengs yang khros//las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya//de bzhin gshegs pa ma
190b5(rgyud): gyi ma 'i dang po gsang pa'i dril byu gsang ma 'on nyid dum pa mchog tu gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyas po rdo rje ma las me dan gsum rnam par rgyal po zhes bya ba rnam par bshad kyi
190b6(rgyud): sbyang rdeg go///de sa pas /de nas gas shA kun bas mag+sa/sa dka bkun sbyor yang dag byung //b+ha ba byas kyi
190b7(rgyud): mchog tu rnam pa mangs//rdo nga nga phyug thams cad rnam 'phru'i tshags//de nas sangs rgyas byin rig sa chen mi chog/rdo rje snying po'i thugs byung bang ldan pa//shin tu gos ngo ba'i dro
191a1(rgyud): mchog bsdus pa//rdo rje rgyal po bud med gzugs can gyur//oM ma'o bud med dga' ba che sprod pa//gsung ba kun tu bsdus pa las byung ba//rdo rje sems dpa' mchogs
191a2(rgyud): tu 'jigs mi mnga'//de yis gsungs nas cad mi gsung bzhugaso//gzungs kyi dam tshig yang dge byung ba mchog/ting 'dzin gnas nas chos nyid gsang po'i ni//spyi bo rkang mthil
191a3(rgyud): kun bsdus bstan pa las//de yi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chags dag phyung //hrIHde nas dga' ba'i ming can dag kyang phyung //rdo rje bud med thugs las byung ba mchog/gzugs khams/
191a4(rgyud): mchog gi lha las shin tu 'das//rdo rje'i mtshams rnams lha mo'i tshig dag grag/dpa' bcas 'dzum pa dang ldan spyan mnga' ba//bzhad cing sgeg dang bcas pa'i zhal ldan pa//tshang/
191a5(rgyud): sogs rigs kyi lha yi lha mo ste//yid 'ong dga' ba chen pos rgyal 'gyur ba//lha mo rdo rje rnal 'byor ma de yang //'khor lo'i dbus su gnas nas rtog byed pa//de yi rigs bsdus
191a6(rgyud): mdzes shing yid du 'ong //rdo rje chen po rdo rje rmongs byed ma//oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA rA ga mo ha na ya ha//snying po sangs rgyas rmongs par byed pas gsungs//de bzhin gshegs pa
191a7(rgyud): mchog kyang rmongs par 'gyur//sangs rgyas kun gyi dga' ba rmongs byed dga'//sangs rgyas gzugs dag yongasu bsgyur ba mchog/rnam snang thub pa'i dbang phyug mchog de ni
191b1(rgyud): bud med gzugs kyi sprul pa nyid du gyur//dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul chen po mchog de ni//'khor gyi sring mo gang yin bzhi por gyur//oM pa kro d+ha sa ma ya sni de nas gsang ba'i brtan pa'i tshogs
191b2(rgyud): zhi ba/chas dang longs spyod rdzogs skus kun khyab pa//rdo rje gsang ba'i dbang phyug rmongs byed bdag/sangs rgyas btsun mo chos nyid la gzhugs pa'i//sa ni rnam pa drug tu g.yes par gyur//
191b3(rgyud): 'od zer sna tshogs phyogs bcu dang gsal//lha mo lha dang bcas pa'i lha mo rnams//zil gyis mnan cing shin tu rgyas par 'gyur//rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dang tshungs lha mo'i tshogs//de/
191b4(rgyud): dag rang gi gzhal yas khang na gnas//de nas sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ba yi//gsang ba'i dbang phyug 'dren pa ste//rdo rje dga' ba chen po rnam par dgrod//gdug pa kun gyi dbang phyug yi
191b5(rgyud): ge s+thi//snying po las byung chos nyid dag pa ste//rdo rje btsun ma bzhi dang dbus ma lnga//dkyil 'khor tshogs kyi shar phyogs cha la gnas//mi skyod pa yi dbang phyug dam pa'i ma chag/de nas
191b6(rgyud): rdo rje rigs can las byung ba'i//shar gyi dkyil 'khor khro bcas dkyil 'khor bcos//mi bsod dam pa'i bdag nyid can//de yis snying po bloskul ba gsungs par gyur//snying po rab mcho
191b7(rgyud): 'byung ba gsungs par gyur//oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ye dzi/oM badz+ra ro Sha a~M ku sha A na ya sarba dzi//oM badz+ra ro Sha karma badz+ra na shi ma A na ya di dzi//oM badz+ra duSh+Ta kro d+ha tiSh+Tha ya sarba dzi//rin
192a1(rgyud): chen 'byung ldan da ni bud med gzugs//rin chen mchog tu yid du 'ong ba des//'khor gyi snying po dgu ni bzhi po gsungasu//oM badz+ra b+h+ri ku ni kro d+hat+tA ra ha ra sArba bAd+d+ha ji
192a2(rgyud): tu brtan par gnas/snying po shin tu mchog tu gyur pa gsungs//rin chen dbang phyug dam pa de yis ni//snying po bskul bar byed pa'i mchog dag gsungs//snying po mchog de gsum/
192a3(rgyud): par gyur//'od dpag med de bud med gzugs gyur pa//rdo rje btsun mo dam pa 'byung ba'i mchog/snying po bzhi po dgra ni gsungs par gyur//oM badz+ra shud d+hi ha na duSh+Ti d+hi/oM tI
192a4(rgyud): d+hi tshin+dan sarba d+hi ri/badz+ra he tu ma hA kro d+ha pra baM sha ya sar+b+ba d+hiHoM badz+ra dzi hA ma hA kro d+ha b+he Sha pa tsa uta ga rA ya d+hiHsnying po rigs mchog brtan pa gsungs par gyur//pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor/
192a5(rgyud): dbang dang ldan pa mchog/'od dpag med pa'i gsang mchog bstan pa ste//snying po bskul ba'i mchog na gsungs par gyur//Ni/dga' ba chen pos mtshan ma dag kyang byung //
192a6(rgyud): don yod grub pa bud med gzugs gyur pas//las la shin tu bskul ba dang ldan to//'khor gyi snying ma dag ni bzhi po gsungs//oM sarba mu khaM karma badz+ri ti ma hA kro d+ha ku ru sa
192b1(rgyud): ra/zlu ma na/A dzuHd+d+ham sa//thA dz+rang shAkA la bral dbyas r+b+ba/oM nga? praSh+Ta rdza rten//donas las kying kyil 'khor sna chags da//mnag tA gsang ba bsdus padag
192b2(rgyud): chen pa//dbus kyig di kyil la ra basbrel skyed pa//las kyi brgyan mo'i skyong po mtshan 'di gsu /hUM/dbus kyi gsang nga sna chags 'byung 'gyur ba//gtso ba 'di dag rnam par snru
192b3(rgyud): mdzad gsungs//oM badz+ra shA nI nA~M/oM hU~M Ad+hI/oM pad mA shA rIn+d+he/oM kar+sa thA ri hU~M/de rtul ba dang bcas bskul ba las byung bang yin pa//rdo rje btsun mo rnam 'byur bzhi sa
192b4(rgyud): dbus kyi dbang phyug nyid du gnas//rdo rje rin chen chos ldan btsun mo yan log mdzes pa dang ldan pa//'di ni gsang ba'i chags las gzhan du rnal 'byor mchog ni dga' yang med//rdo rje sems
192b5(rgyud): dpa' mchog tu 'jigs ma mnga'//nga ni rang gi 'khor tshogs dbus na bzhugs//des ni bairtse dang phan pa'i sems kyis ni//rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog gsungs gyur//de nas
192b6(rgyud): 'khor lo 'grong khyer bstan byas nas//khams gsum rnam par rgyal po'i bdag nyid de//rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug btsun mo yi//dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i rnal 'byor yang dag bri//klong /
192b7(rgyud): khyer rnam pa gnyis yang dag bri//'khor lo rnam pa gnyi su sbyar bar bya//de bzhin grong khyer 'di ru yang dag 'ong ba dang //yang ni ji ltar 'dod bzhin yang dag bri//de yang phyag rgya dag gi ni
193a1(rgyud): dang bcas//sgom par thos pa rdo rje yang dag bri//yang na gsang ba'i chos kyis mchod gyur pa//nga ni gzugs dang ldan pa yang dag bri//dbus kyi rim par rdo rje sems
193a2(rgyud): dpa' bzhugs//zhugs pa dang ldan 'khor gyi phyag rgya bcas//rdo rje 'bar ba nor bu pad+ma las//'bar ba dang bcas me dang ldan par gzhag/shar gyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo lnga yi bdag
193a3(rgyud): nyid che//rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gang du mi bskyod gi n+do//rdo rje'i phyag rgya che dang rol par gyur//dbang phyug chen po rtse gsum ldan non mchog/de nas phyogs bzhi'i gnas dag dang //rje
193a4(rgyud): rje lcags kyu mda' dang dga' ba dag/'bor ba'i me yi 'od zer yang dag ldan//'brar ba'i dbus na gnas pa'i phyag rgya lnga//de nas rin chen rigs ni yid 'ong ba//rdo rje'i dbus
193a5(rgyud): na rdo rje rin chen bzhugs//de nas phyogs bzhi'i gnas dag tu//rin chen gzi brjid rgyal mtshan gzhang phyag rgya//de bzhin pad+ma'i rigs ni yid 'ongs la//rdo rje pad+ma'i phyag
193a6(rgyud): rgya ste//de nas phyogs bzhi'i mtshams dag tu//pad+ma ral gri 'khor lo de bzhin smra//de bzhin las kyis byas pa'i rigs de las//rdo rje rnon po me chen dang ldan pa//de yi bye/
193a7(rgyud): bzhi'i mtshams ni brtan pa ru//las dang gnod sbyin srung ba'i khu tshur rnams//de las rgya cher gzugs kyi tshogs dag la//rdo rje btsun mo'i mchog dag mkha 'gro ma//2
193b1(rgyud): ba'i mche ba chen po 'jig rung ma//dbus na rdo rje nyi ma 'bar bar ldan//sa dag srung ba'i cho gar bcas//rgya char gzhung mchog rtag tu blta bar bya//sbyang dang dbab pa'i las rnams thams cad ni//
193b2(rgyud): yan lag mchog ldan dam pa nas gzung bya//de nas phyag rgya phyag rgya'i yan lag brlab//mchod pa'i phyag rgyas mchod pa'i phyag rgyar brjod//de nas sgo dang mtshams bcas dkyil 'khor du//
193b3(rgyud): btsun mo dag pas gnam lcags gnod sbyin mchog/de nas sgor 'jug pa'i tshogs la ni//badz+ra dza dza/dgug pa'i pheg rdob sbyin na rgya che ba//badz+ra hUM hUM/de bzhin 'ching ba' chas ni ster byed pa//
193b4(rgyud): badz+ra baM baM/de nas ye shes chos nyid sna tshogs pa//badz+ra a a/de nas gsang ba'i sgeg pa dang bcas mchod//badz+ra hUM khaM/de nas yan lag phreng ba sna tshogs ldan//badz+ra hUM g+h+raM/de nas
193b5(rgyud): glu blang ba dang rol mo dag/badz+ra hUM taM/de bzhin gzhan ngag dkyil 'khor dbang phyug mchog/badz+ra hUM ste/de nas phyi rol me tog rgya chen po//badz+ra ti taM/de bzhin rol cha stong phrag dag brdung
193b6(rgyud): pi/badz+ra Ta ta/spos dang dri ldan rim pa dag bri ba//badz+ra d+hAta/de nas 'od zer snang ba rab tu spro//badz+ri kr-i d+ha/de nas rdo rje lcags kyu'i tshogs kyis dgug par bya//dga' bas mnyes bya rdo rje
193b7(rgyud): yang dag ldan//oM sr-id d+he ye badz+ra/A na ya badz+ra/de nas chags pa'i sa dang 'dod chags pa//rA ga ya badz+ra/a hi badz+ra/de bzhin nyi ma la lta badz+ra la ya badz+ra/rgyal mtshan gyi
194a1(rgyud): ni da hi badz+ra//gzhad pa'i ni hah+na badz+ra//de bzhin rjesu chags pa ni ka ma ya badz+ra//ral gri bzung bar bya ba ni ts+tshed ya badz+ra//gzhan yang bsgyur ba yi ni//b+ha ma ya
194a2(rgyud): de nas tshig gi tshigs dbyung ba bru hi badz+ra//las kyi mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor bsnun pa'i tshogs ni t+yai badz+rA//de nas de tshwa'i ni ra~Mk+Sha badz+ra/de bzhin du bza' ba'i ni khA hi badz+ra/yid 'ong
194a3(rgyud): lus ni brtan par bcing bar bya//ban d+ha ya badz+ra/de nas ye shes kyi ni de bzhin brkyang //de nas khros pa'i yid kyis bskul bar bya//so dag gis ni ma mchu bsdam par bya//de/
194a4(rgyud): bzhin mig dag kyang ni btsum par bya//de nas khro bo'i ting 'dzin sgom//gsad pa'i phyag rgya dag gis bdud bzhi bcom//de nas rdo rje'i tshi gau gis snying po brjod//phyag rgya'i tshogs ni
194a5(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs rlab//lus kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs dag ni//theg pa chen po mngon bsdus las//rdo rje sems dpa'i bka' bzhin du//rgyas pa ru ni yongasu brjod//gsang ba mchob rnga
194a6(rgyud): so////de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin//kun mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug ni//rdo rje phya mA lA bzhugs nas//rdo rje phra mo brjod par gyur//oM sarba ta thA ga ta sAk+Sh+ma badz+ra ko d+hakra ma hA
194a7(rgyud): phaT/bdag nyid sangs rgyas gzugasu ni//phan pa'i don du rnams bas ma hA//rdo rje phra mo 'di yis ni//sems ni zhi ba nyid du gyur//oM suk+Sh+ma badz+ra kro d+hakra ma hUM/rdo rje rib pa mchog
194b1(rgyud): rgyal po//bdag nyid yongasu bsgom par bya//rdo rje phra mo 'di yis ni//rang sems skad cig gis 'dul 'gyur//oM suk+Sh+ma badz+ra rat+na kro d+ha ka mA hU~M phaT//rdo rje rin chen rang bdag nyid//mkhas pa yis
194b2(rgyud): ni bsgom par bya//sangs rgyas chos ni myur thob cing //rin chen kun mchog gtso bor 'gyur//oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra d+harmo kro d+ha kra ma hUM phaT//bdag nyid dag ni rdo rje chos//bzod nas dag pa rnam par sgom
194b3(rgyud): gsung gi phyag rgya 'di yis ni//rdo rje ches dang mtshungs par 'gyur//oM sud+d+ha badz+ra karma kro d+ha kra ma hUM phaT//bdag nyid rdo rje la su ni//yang dang yang du bsgom bya zhing //rdo rje sngags kyis bskul nas ni/
194b4(rgyud): rdo rje las dong mtshungs par 'gyur//dbang bskur ba yi sems dpa' che//'khor los sgyur ba bzhi po ru//rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom byas na//dbang bskur ba yang thob par 'gyur//hU~M oM sud+g+ha nA~M/
194b5(rgyud): na kro d+ha hUM phaT//rdo rje rgyal po rang bdag nyid//rnam par bsgoms na rangs par 'gyur//snyi nga po 'dri bdag nyid kyis ni//sangs rgyas thams cad kun du dgug/oM suk+Sh+ma badz+ra oM ku sha A kaR+Sha yaM/
194b6(rgyud): mahA kro d+ha hUM phaT//mnga' 'gengs pa yi sbyor ba yis//rdo rje chags par sgom par bya//snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni//sangs rgyas thams cad rjes chags pa//oM suMk+Sh+ma badz+ra kro d+ha a nu rA gA ya
194b7(rgyud): hUM phaT//sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byas zhing //bdag nyid kyang ni rnam pa sgom//rdo rje dga' ba bdag nyid de//rdo rje dngos grub thob par 'gyur//oM suk+Sh+ma badz+ra duSh+Ti kro d+ha hUM phaT//rdo rje rin
195a1(rgyud): chen rgyal po //dbang bskur ba ni brtan pa'i mchog/rdo rje sngags kyis bskul byas nang //rdo rje na chen mtshungs par 'gyur//oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra d+h+r-i kun+ti kro d+ha ha ra ha ra hUM phaT//
195a2(rgyud): /rdo rje gzi brjid ting 'dzin gyis//rtag tu bdag nyid 'bar bar bya//phyogs rnams kun tu yangs spros nas//rdo rje sngags ni rab tu bskul//oM sUk+ShAM dz+wa la meN+Da le kro d+ha sUr+ya dz+wa le hUM phaT
195a3(rgyud): sbyin pa rin chen rgyal mtshan du//rtag tu bdag nyid rnam par bsam//sems can thams cad dag bya zhing //rdo rje sngags ni rab bskul zhing //oM smr-ik+Sh+ma badz+ra d+h+wa dza kro d+ha sarba aHhUM mi pra
195a4(rgyud): yots+tsha hUM phaT//chos chen po yi bzhad pa bzhad//rdo rje bzhad pa bdag brtan pa'i//rdo rje sngags kyis bskul bya zhing //bdag nyid kho na chos kyi gsung //oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra hA saM kro d+ha ha ha hUM phaT ha
195a5(rgyud): /ha//bzod nas zhi ba skye ba med//chos rnams thams cad rnam dag pa//bdag nyid rdo rje chos rgyal po//rdo rje tshig gis lan gcig brjod//oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra kro d+ha ya she d+ha hUM phaT//shugs
195a6(rgyud): can ral gri dag gi tshegs//rdo rje rnon po shin tu brtan//oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+rA ts+tshad kro d+hats+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hUM phaT//chos kyi 'khor lo bskor byas nas//rdo rje 'khor lo dang mtshungs 'gyur//oM badz+ra sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra kA/
195a7(rgyud): /rakro d+ha tsakra ts+tshin+da pA ta a shwa ra/pra pe she hri da yaM ts+tshin+da hUM phaT/nga ni brjod byed brjod bya min//bdag ni rdo rje smra ba brtan//chos 'dod pa nyid brtan byas nas//rdo rje smra ba thob par gyur//
195b1(rgyud): oM sUt+maradz+ra hU~Mt+ta ra kr-i d+hA ha ra pa tsa ya wa mu dwe Na hUM phaT//sangs rgyas thams cad mchod bya zhing //rdo rje las ni brtan par brtag/rdo rje tshig gis chos bshad na//rdo rje las ni thod par gyur//oM sUSh+Ta
195b2(rgyud): badz+ra/rmA kro d+ha sarba kar+ya tri da ya hUM phaT//bdag ni rgyal po byams pa che//rdo rje srung ba brtan pa'i bdag/rtag tu bdag nyid sgom byas nas//ngan 'gro thams cad nyams par 'gyur//oM sUk+Sha
195b3(rgyud): ka pa tsakro d+ha rak+Sha hUM phaT//sdig pa thams cad bza' bya zhing //rdo rje srung ba bsgom par bya//rdo rje sngags ni bskul byas na//rdo rje nyon mongs thams cad 'joms//oM sUk+Sh+ma badz+ra yak+Sha ha re b+hik+Sha saH/
195b4(rgyud): duSh+Ta badz+ra yak+Sha hUM phaT//rdo rje khu tshur rgyal po bdag/byang chub sems ni rje su dran//bgeg rnams thams cad bcing byas na//rdo rje khu tshur dang mtshungs 'gyur//oM sUk+ShA badz+ra muSh+Ti ban d+ha ban d+ha hUM/
195b5(rgyud): phaT/ sna yi rtse mo'i sems de ni//brtan par byas nas yang dag brtsams//yi ge hUM nyid sbyor byas na//nyon mongs thams cad rnams nyams 'gyur//hUM/dang po snying gi sna rtse ru//brtan par
195b6(rgyud): byas nas de rang bzhin//mtshan ma de ni spro byas na//nad sogs dag ni 'jigs par 'gyur//nA sha ya badz+ri hUM//sems de brtan par byas nas kyang //rnal 'byor 'dzin pas spro bya zhing //
195b7(rgyud): shes rab can gyis khro bdag brtsams//gnas ngan dag ni nges par 'jig/bI nA sha ya sarba badz+ra hUM//rnal 'byor rig pas ji srid 'dod//mtshan ma de ni bsdu byas na//ma lus sdig pa
196a1(rgyud): /thams cad ni//nyams shing 'byung bar mi 'gyur//oM su rbA ba nga? praH shArmAn+tu//gsal bur phyogs rnams ma smras par//sems can kun la byams pa b+ha/
196a2(rgyud): ji srid rdo rje sgo byas pa//de srid sems can bde bar 'gyur//bai ra~M ba badz+ra kAr+d+he hUM phaT//kyi mi'i 'gon med sems can 'di//'jig pa la ni skyob pa dag/snying rje'i sems de sgra
196a3(rgyud): byar bya//rdo rje ye shes thob par 'gyur//ka ru tA badz+ra kr-i d+ha hUM phaT//de bzhin gshegs pa kun snying po//sems can thams cad bzod nas dge/e ma'o bdi ba e mra'o chos//
196a4(rgyud): phyogs rnams kun tu yongasu spro//hU~M kA ra bi shud d+ha hUM phaT//'khor ba'i sems can la dmigs nas//bde ba dang bcas btang snyoms bya//btang snyoms sbyor ba 'di yis ni//
196a5(rgyud): rnams la yongasu spro//oM bi sho d+ha badz+ra kro d+ha hUM phaT//rdo rje'i gzugs ni yang dag bris//gang gi steng du des bzhag pa//de nyid kyis ni dri ma'i tshogs//thams cad rnal 'byor pa yI/
