196a6(rgyud): 'joms//hUM badz+ra pra brta/gang la byang chub sems nyid ni//rnga su dran pas rab phab nas//sems can de yis sangs rgyas kyi//byang chub nyid ni thob par 'gyur//hUM bo d+hi sa twa pro brta/
196a7(rgyud): phyag na rdo rdo rjes dran nas//dag pa'i chos nyid phab byas nas//sems can de yis bde ba ni//dam pa thob 'gyur the tshom med//hU~M badz+ra d+ha ra pra bta/rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun
196b1(rgyud): ldan pa//sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam par sgom//sangs rgyas chos rnams phab byas na//'jigs pa nges par 'byung mi 'gyur//hUM bud d+ha pra brta/zla ba rdo dzA rang bzhin dngos//bskyed pa
196b2(rgyud): bzhin du sgom byas nas//blo bzang zla ba rdo rje mtshungs//myur du mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur//bud d+ha pra brta ya hUM/zla ba'i dbusu rang bdag nyid//sgom zhing gang la phab byas pa//sem
196b3(rgyud): can de rnams mi ldog par//'gyur ba ru ni the tshom med//satwa pra brta ya hUM/phyag na rdo rje rang bdag nyid//mkhas pa yis ni bsgom bya zhing //gang du phab pa'i gnas nga ni//dpal dang /
196b4(rgyud): bde ba 'phel bar 'gyur//myur ba nyid du the tshom med//badz+ra satwa pra brta ya hUM/sangs rgyas gzugasu rang bdag nyid//mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom bya zhing //rdo rje de ni gar phab pa//
196b5(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul rgya ni chen por 'gyur//bud d+ha pra brta hUM/rdo rje khro bo snyoms 'jug pas//rang gi lus ni rab bskor ba//gang gi ming gis byas pa de//the tshom med pa'i byang chub thob//oM badz+ra pa
196b6(rgyud): l-i ta kra d+ha mA ra ya hUM/dbugs ni 'byung dang rngub pa la//yi ge hUM ni rab sbyor zhing //rdo rje khro bo snyoms 'jug pas//'dod chags la sogs nyes pa gzhom//oM badz+ra shA pa pi ta la hUM phaT/
196b7(rgyud): /rdo rje lta bas lta bya zhing //rdo rje khro bo rab sbyor bas//sems can gang lo blta byas na//da ni 'khor ba las grol 'gyur//oM badz+ra diSh+Ti bi nA sha ya hUM phaT/lus ngag gi ni bdag nyid gnas
197a1(rgyud): rang sems 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang //byang chub sems ni rjes dran nas//des kyang sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur//hU~M hr-i da ya a kaR+Sha ya badz+ra kro d+d+ha hU~M phaT//rdo rje rig pa mchod/
197a2(rgyud): rgyal por//ma khas pa yis ni bdag nyid bsgom//'bar ba yis ni khyab pa'i sku//rdo rje sgom pa 'grub par 'gyur//hU~M gsang po'i bdag po kun gyi snying po'i sngags ni gsungs par
197a3(rgyud): 'gyur//de nas rdo rje 'chang ba'i rnal 'byor dbang po rtog par mdzad//gdul bya min la shin tu 'phrog cing 'dul bya la chag spro//sa 'dzin mchog gi dbang po bslab pa rnam par ral ba'i sa//
197a4(rgyud): sUhU~M rdzogs so///gsang bskur ma n+ti thA ste//rdorje dmachog brjod par bya//rnam rtog gis brtags mdzes gyur pa//de nas mchod pa'i tshig bshed//bdag nyid sa
197a5(rgyud): rgyas gzugs dang ni//sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul rab tu sgom//dang po sbyor byung ji skad bshad//sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya//oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra karme shA ri hUM/rang gi
197a6(rgyud): kar byang chub sems//sangs rgyas kun gyi chags bsams nas//mchod pa yi ni mchog 'di yis//'dren pa thams cad mched par bya//hUM dbang phyug chen po dang bcas pa//
197a7(rgyud): lha rnams thams cad dgug bya zhing //bdag nyid rdo rje khro bo yis//khro ba'i mchod pas rab tu mchod//oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza karma sa ma ya b+hi d+hi bsti ri dz+wa lo kya bi dza ye shwa ras
197b1(rgyud): duSh+TAn ma hA sa ma ya badz+ro hU~M/khro gnyer can kun dbadag nyid//khro bo rin cher gyi bsgom bya//sangs rgyas thams nad 'jig bya zhing //rin chen mchod pas rab tu ma chad//oM sarba ta thA ga ta ka pA
197b2(rgyud): shaM sa ma ba s+pha ra Na ma hA pU dza A kaR+Sha ya bi d+hi bsti ra sa ma ya hUM/chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par snang //rdo rje chos kyi brten pa bdag/chos kyi mchod par rang mched pas//sangs rgyas
197b3(rgyud): /thams cad mchod par bya//oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma d+ha tu s+pha ra Na ma hA pU dza b+hi bsti ra sa ma ya hUM/bdag nyid rdo rje las nyid ni//sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul bsgom par bya//sangs rgyas thaMd
197b4(rgyud): mchod bya zhing //las kyi mchod pas rab tu mchod//oM sarba ta thA ga tA lo ka d+ha tu dzI bi ta mya hA karma pU dza bi d+hi bsti ra sa ma ya hUM/phyag na rdo rje bdag rdo rje//de bzhin gshegs rnams
197b5(rgyud): dgug par bya//rdo rje sems dpa' rab mchod pas//mchod pa ru ni bsgom par bya//oM badz+ra satwa sid+d+hi dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM dzaHrdo rje lcags kyu brtan pa'i mchog/rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom
197b6(rgyud): par bya//sgom pa sgrub pa bya ba'i phyir//sangs rgyas thams cad dgug par bya//oM badz+ra A kaR+Sha dz+nyA naM sa ma ye hUM dziHrdo rje chags pa bdag nyid ste/bkug pa rnams ni mnyes par
197b7(rgyud): byad/rdo rje chags pas rab mchod pas//bsgrub par bya zhes yang dag sbyar//oM badz+ra ra ti rA ga sa ma ye hUM dzaHrdo rje legs pa rang bdag nyid//sgom zhing rgyal ba mnyes par bya//
198a1(rgyud): rdo rje legs pas rab mchod pas//sangs rgyas thams cad dbug par bya//oM badz+ra sA d+ha karmA dz+nyA na sa ma ya hUM dzaHrdo rje rin chen rgyal po che//rang bdag nyid ni bsgom
198a2(rgyud): pa//de bzhin gshegs rnams dbang bya zhing //rin chen char ni kun tu dbang //oM badz+ra b+h+ri ku nI Sh+Tha shA~M ku ru hUM//rdo rje nyi mar rang bdag nyid//'od zer phreng ba dang ldan sgom//sangs
198a3(rgyud): rgyas rnams ni dbang bya zhing //phyogs rnam su ni 'od zer spro//oM badz+ra sUr+ya maN+Da la ba shI ku ru hUM/de bzhin gshegs rnams dbang bya zhing //bdag ni pad+ma'i rgyal po nyid//sems
198a4(rgyud): can bsam kun rdzogs par bya//rin chen rgyal mtshan rab tu mchod//oM badz+ra d+hu dza gra ke yU raM ba shI ku ru hUM/ha ha zhes dgod bzhad bya zhing //rdo rje bzhed pa bdag nyid de//sangs
198a5(rgyud): rgyas thams cad dbang du bya//bzhad pa'i mchod pas rab tu mchod//oM badz+ra an+d+ra hA se na ba shI ku ru hU~M//bdag ni pad+ma'i rgyal po nyid//sems can bas ma kun rdzogs par bya//
198a6(rgyud): bdag gis sangs rgyas rjes chags bya//'dod la chags pas rab tu mchod//oM badz+ra pad+ma rA ga ya hUM/bdag ni rang nyid rnon po ste//shes rab pha rol phyin pa brtan//bdag gis
198a7(rgyud): nyon mongs bcad bya zhing //de bzhin gshegs rnams chags par bya//oM badz+ra tik+Sha rA ga ya hUM//lha mo rdo rje sgrol ma dag/chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba//bdag gis rdo
198b1(rgyud): can mnyes bya//'dod chags brtan pas rab tu mchod//oM badz+ra maN+Da la rA ge ra ga ya hUM//nu mkha'i lha mo chos smra ba//brjod du med pa'i bdag nyid bstan//dag pa'i chos la dga'
198b2(rgyud): bya zhing //de bzhin gshegs rnams mnyes par bya//oM bAka rA gai ra ga ya hUM//bde ga ni rang nyid las yin te//phyogs rnams kun tu rab tu grags//bdag ni na mkha'i mdzod
198b3(rgyud): kyang yin//mchod pa'i char gyis rab tu mchod//oM badz+ra karma sa ma ye pU dza hUM//bdag ni rang nyid srung ba ste//sangs rgyas byams pa brtan pa bdag/bdag gis sangs rgyas
198b4(rgyud): mchod pa bya//chos kyi mchod pas kun tu mchod//oM badz+ra ka ba tsa bAn d+ha rak+Sha hUM//bdag gis nyon mongs bza' bar bya//rdo rje gnod sbyin brtan pa bdag/bdag gis
198b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas mchod par bya//chos kyi mchod pas rab tu mchod//oM badz+ra yak+Shi mA ra ya badz+ra daMSh+Ta hUM phaT//nga ni sangs rgyas byang chub yin//rdo rje khro tshur rang bdag nyid//phyir mi ldog
198b6(rgyud): pa'i 'khor lo ste//las kyi mchod pas rab tu mchod//oM badz+ra karma muSh+Ta sid d+hI sid+d+ha hUM phaT//'di 'dra'i sna tshogs mchod pa kun//ye shes gsang sngags rab thob byed//ma
198b7(rgyud): lus lha mo sems dpa' kun//rgyal po ji bzhin rab snying hUM//sgeg mo phreng ba de bzhin glu//gar ma me tog sogs sbyor bas//sems dpa' la sogs lha mo dag/shin
199a1(rgyud): smang+ga ga mad pa sa mchod pa/donas las ni thu snunanag/glang gis myur du ma na 'byung//gang hU~M dga' /
199a2(rgyud): sbyin sreg las kyi tshi ga'o//ji ltar sbyin sreg dang sa grub kyis//las ni blun ming de ltar//de bzhin rigs pa'i las rnams kun//de lta ni byed pa min//sbyin srog/
199a3(rgyud): rnam pa mang ldan pa//mdo ru bsdun rnam pa lta//rgyas par rnal 'byor chen po yi//gsang ba'i mdo las rab tu bshad//rigs pa 'dzin pa'i rnam 'phrul pa//ji ltar sbyin
199a4(rgyud): sreg rnam pa yis//rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub 'gyur ba//mdor sdus rab tu bshad par bya//sbyin sgeg las ni rnam pa lnga//re re zhing yang rnam pa mang //zhi ba dang /
199a5(rgyud): ni rgyas pa nyid//mngon spyad kyi ni gsum pa ste//dgug pa yang ni bzhi pa yin//lnga ba dbang dang yang dag ldan//sbyin sreg lnga pa de rnams ni//dbang du byed pa mchog yin no//
199a6(rgyud): de nas thag khung rab ba shing bya//sbyor ba ji bzhin sbyor bar bya//thA la thag zung zlum po ste//kun nas yongs rgyam pa yin//rgyas pa la ni grub pa ni ste//mngon spyod la ni gru
199a7(rgyud): yin//thag khung rdo rje'i rnam pa can//kun tu dathug par byed pa'i mchog/de bzhin thal bung ring por bya/dbang du byed pa'i mchog yin no//de dag rnam pa lnga ru ba shad///
199b1(rgyud): da las ni zan myed//dzang ky-i dus su h+ni Sh+Ta//sA dri'i dus su rgyas pa'i las//nyim byed na mngon spyad kyi//dag pa'i las ni nges par bya//dgug padus rnams thams cad du//mtshan blang /
199b2(rgyud): du bye ba yin//sbyor ba lnga pa 'di yis ni//mnyam par gzhag pas las rnams bya//shingar du kha bo ltas ni ngan du//rgyas pa byang du yang dag gnas//lho ru kha bltas byur pa yis//
199b3(rgyud): spyod kyi ni las rnam so//sbyang du kha bltas de bzhin dgug/phyogs rnams kun tu bltas dbang bya//b+hoklas 'chimus thams cad mnyam sbyor bsam//yang na nub kyi phyog su bshad//ni
199b4(rgyud): sang sA r+b+bas phyug ban+d+ha s+t+wa~M//rgyas la nor bu'i mtshan mas//rdo rje khro ba mngon spyod so//dab la pad+mo'i rigs kyis//shin tu dkrug 'dang ldan pa//de lcags kyang klog pa la/
199b5(rgyud): lnga po 'di yis no//sbyin sr-i ga las ni rab tu sgrug//zhi baN+DI shrI ni mngar duste//rgyas pa de bzhin 'bras bur bcas//tshab mngon spyod las dag la//dgug pa leni cher maHnA~M/
199b6(rgyud): dbyeng la me tog bcas par bshad //de rnam sa yam shing ka rnams bzhin//sngon la yam shing rnam pa lnga//rnal 'byor pa yis yid dag sbyar//de la 'dam gyis byugs pa ni
199b7(rgyud): shing la zhi ba rab tu bsgrags//dang du sdig pa rnams 'jig shing //kun tu lakhrug par bsregs 'gyur ba//zung shid mngar bdag gi me//mnyam par gzhag pas rab sbar nas
200a1(rgyud): til mar gyis ni sbyin sreg byas//sdig pa thams cad sreg par 'gyur//oM sarba pA pa da ha na badz+rA ya swA hA//bud shing mngar ba dag gis ni//shin tu mnyam par
200a2(rgyud): gzhag pas sbar//'bras kyi sbyin sreg byas nas ni//bsod nams tshogs ni 'phel bar 'gyur//oM badz+ra puSh+Ta ye swA hA//bud shing mngar pa dag gis ni//mnyam par gzhag pas//
200a3(rgyud): me sbar nas//mar skyugs dor ba'i sbyin sreg gis//rdo rje tshe ni mngon 'phel 'gyur//oM badz+ra A yu She swA hA//yam shing de dag nyis kyis ni//dge ba 'byung bas me sbyar nas//
200a4(rgyud): ku shA'i myu gu'i til mar gyis//'jig rten gsum yang srung bar 'gyur//oM a pra ti ha ta badz+ra ya swA hA//sngon la zhi ba sbyar bar bya//dbus kyi gnyis la rgyas de bzhin//nI pa
200a5(rgyud): dang ni rgyas pa yi//sbyin sreg las ni dang bar 'gyur//shing ni tsha ba'i yam shing gis//mngon spyod kyi ni las dge la//mngon spyod dang ni bcas pa yi//dgug pa la yang de nyid
200a6(rgyud): kyi//rdo rje khro bo'i nying 'dzin gyi//sngo la tsha ba'i yam shing gis//khros pas me ni rab spur nas//mkhas pas tsher mas sbyin bsreg bya//tsher ma dang bcas shing dag kyang //
200a7(rgyud): tsher ma can byis nges par dgug/gang dang gang ni 'dod gyur pa//sangs rgyas rnams ni nges par 'gugs//oM badz+ra A kiR+Sha ya dzaH//bung shing me tog dmar sogs kyis//rab
200b1(rgyud): 'bar ba'i me sbar nas//me tog 'bras bu dmar po yang //sbyin sreg byas na dbang byed mchog/hUM badz+rA pA sha ya //tsha ba'i yam shing dag bya zhing //rab tu drag po'i me sbar nas//
200b2(rgyud): 'bras bu khabs bsregs byas na//mngon spyod kyi ni mchog yon no//hUM badz+ra mA ra yAM phaT//gsang ba'i sbyin sreg thams cad ni//de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya//sbyin sreg
200b3(rgyud): 'khor lo cho ga yi//de nyid du ni de bzhin sbyor//yam shing tsha bdag gis ni//shin tu drag pas me sbar nas//'jigs rung lcags kyus sbyin bsreg bya//gdog pa thams cad
200b4(rgyud): rab 'jigs 'gyur//oM badz+ra ba na d+ha ya phaT//me tog dang bcas shing me la//rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis//sngags sogs 'bras bu'i sbyin sreg pa ni//dbang du byed pa mchog
200b5(rgyud): yin no//oM badz+ra pa shaM ka rA ya swA hA//kha ba dang ni mngar ba nyid//yam shing mngar po sbyar bya zhing //'dod pa'i me tog 'bras bsregs ni//'dod pa'i gzugs can mchog tu
200b6(rgyud): 'gyur//oM badz+ra kA na rU pa Ne swA hA//de nas bud shing de dag nyid kyis ni//rab tu khros pos ma sbang nas//smyug ma'i 'bras bu pha mo bsregs//myur du mi snang nyid du 'gyur//
200b7(rgyud): badz+ra a tri sha ya//shes rab bud shing de nyid kyis//drag po'i me ni rab spar nas//na mkha' stobs kyi me ta dang //bsreg na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur//oM badz+ra khe tsa ri ni
201a1(rgyud): swAt+ma//de nas myungag bzhug pa dang g.yog/bka' bzhin byed pa rab tu bskul//ci nas kyang ni myur 'bub pa'o//bla rim bzhin du rab bla shang byA//shing ni kha ngas
201a2(rgyud): bud shing bya//thab khung rdo rje'i dbyibasu brko//khros pas rdo rje me tog sreg/yi ge dza ni yangasu brjod//sngags kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni//rdo rje'i sngags ni rab tu bskul//rdo rje me tog
201a3(rgyud): dag bsregs na//bka'i byeng mchog ni rnyed par 'gyur//oM badz+ra A drA kAr ya de//ye shing da dag nyid dang ni//thab khung de nyid brko bya zhing //byang chub sems dpe'i sman ma gang /
201a4(rgyud): bsreg na bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur//oM badz+ra mo rab shaM ka ra ya dze//bung shing de dag nyid kyis me//kun tu thab khung de kha ro//rdo rje sems dpa'i sman ma yin//bsregs
201a5(rgyud): na bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur//hUM badz+ra pA Ni bA shaM ka ra ya dza//yang na sangs rgyas dman ma 'am//yang na bdag dang mtshan ma dag/sgrub pa'i sbyor bas sbyin bsreg bya/
201a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur//oM bud d+hA shaM ka ra ya dzA/tshig gi sbyor ba 'di yis ni//sbyin bsreg bya zhing myur du grub//rdo rje'i sbyor dus dngas grub kun/
201a7(rgyud): med par 'grub par 'gyur//rdo rje rigs la sogs kun kyang //de nas gsang po phyag rgya che//rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rab sgrub phyir//rnal 'byor chen po bsgrub par bya//rig pa
201b1(rgyud): gang zhig yid 'ong ba//sring mo'i rigs ni thob bya'i phyir//rig pa'i lha mo dang ldan par//shin tu rnal 'byor bsgrub par bya//bud med sdug dang lhan cig du//mkhas pas gdug pa ston par bya//
201b2(rgyud): mdo sde gsang dbang rgyal po las//de nyid du ni ji skad bshad//kun tu gur gum phye ma dang //b+ha gar mgo sman bcug nas ni//de yi sems dpa' shes par bya//gang phyir dgongs pa rab tu
201b3(rgyud): bsgrags//sdug pa de yi rig pa ni//mngon par 'dod pa gang yin 'ong //rang gi rigs kyi lha mo dang //de ni bud med zhes byar grags//rig pa'i sbyor ba de yis ni//rang gi rig kyi lha dag sgrub//
201b4(rgyud): meg sman las gas gzhugs pa ni//pad+ma'i steng du yang dag dgod//b+ha ga pad+ma zhes bshad te//gzhug pa dgod par bshad par bya//b+ha ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni//mig sman dag ni bsgrub par
201b5(rgyud): bya//b+ha ga mig sman gzhugs pa ni//pad+ma'i steng du yang dag dgod//pad+ma dang ni lhan cig dgod//rnam pa bzhi ni 'grub par 'gyur//oM gu h+yar ti badz+ra shaM kA ri sid+d+hi hU~M//gro dang ngu ba 'ab ro dang rdul
201b6(rgyud): rnam pa bzhi ni 'grub par 'gyur//oM gu d+ha badz+ra sid+d+hi hUM//b+ha ga ra bi wang bzhag nas ni//gsang ba'i phyag rgya gzhag par 'gyur//mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi dag gis//dngos grub rnam pa bzhi
201b7(rgyud): ru bshad//aM gu h+ya badz+ra sid+d+hi hUM//rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya ye se//b+ha ga shu gum bcu nas ni//dgab cing de ni 'bar 'gyur na//rnam pa bzhi ni 'grub par 'gyur//oM badz+ra d+ha ra gu h+ya
202a1(rgyud): sad+d+hi hA//rdo rje bya ba'i sbyor ba dang //rdo rje phyag rgyad drus pa dang //rdo rje khro do snrums 'jug dang //rdo rje khu tshur sbyar ba dang //dam tshig mchog ni 'di dag dang //dz+nyAn sa/
202a2(rgyud): ma'i sbyor ba dang //chas kyi phyag rgyu de bzhin 'dir//oM la sogs pa'i yi ge dang //sbyin sreg tshig 'di yis ni//ye shes phyog d+hA rab sgrub bya//rgyas pa ru ni thams cad dag/gsang
202a3(rgyud): ba'i rgyud du rab tu bshad//cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni//rdo rje'i slob dpon dka' thub tshe//tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas ni//mchog nyid sgrub par 'gyur ba yin//rdo rje rigs tshan yid
202a4(rgyud): 'ong ba//rgyud chen kun las btus pa la//gang zhig mngon par brtson 'gyur ba//de na yod pa'i dngos grub 'gyur//tshogs ni bsagos pa med pa dang //sangs rgyas mthong ba med
202a5(rgyud): pab ru nagasang ba'i snying po chen po 'di//thos pa tsam du'ang mi 'gyur ro//gsang ba'i rnal 'byor gyi cho ga rdzogaso///de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya bzhi//dkyil
202a6(rgyud): 'khor mkhas pas bslab par bya//ye shes de nyid gsang ba meng //yangs sgrub pas rabo tu bskur//shin tu gsang ba chen po na//dngos po thams cad khyab la dgang //'di
202a7(rgyud): rdo rje drag po bzhi//rang nyid lnga pa dang bcas pa//gsang ba'i brjod du med pa mchog/ye shes mchog gi tshul thob byed//bde ba chen po rab grub don//dga' ba chen po shin tu
202b1(rgyud): !//e pan tathA ga ta badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/hU~M drA ma Ta/oM badz+ra p+pa tad+h+wi ku Ti badz+ra rat+na/oM pad ma badz+ra ta ta/oM badz+ra karma a trik+Shod+b+ha//shar dang lha yi phyogs na dang //nung dang byang phyogs
202b2(rgyud): dang //dbus dang phyogs bzhi dag tu ni//sbyor ba'i phyag rgya dgod par bya//phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni//thams cad bri zhing dgad par bya//rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che//mthang/
202b3(rgyud): 'gyur 'di la the tshom med//ji skad bshad pa'i rnal 'byor bzhin//rdo rje rnal 'byor rjes sbyor skyes//rnal 'byor dag ni lhag ma dag/de dag thams cad brtan par bya//shin tu gsang
202b4(rgyud): dedanyid tshe//mchog tu gsang ba de nyid mchog/gsang po chen po gsang ge 'dzin//rdo rje gsong po brtan pa che//rig pa mngon par 'dod 'gyur ba//rang gi lag gis yang dag bre//rgyal
202b5(rgyud): mo chen mo brjod byas na//dkyil 'khor du ni skad cig 'grub//oM sarba ta thA ga ta bi shud d+hA d+harma haH//rang gis dkyil 'khor chu bris nas//rig pa brjod pa la brtson bya//byams
202b6(rgyud): pas dgug pa'i sbyor ba yis//'khar ba snying rje spyad par bya//oM bi shud d+he d+heSh+Ta dzaHrang gis gsang sngags bris nas ni//bu mo'i 'chu la 'o byas te//'jig rten dbang
202b7(rgyud): phyug btsun mo che//shes rab pha rol phyin lha mo//oM swa b+hA ba bi shud d+ha mu~M khaM hU~M//pha rol phyin drug spyod pa yi//byang chub spyod pa rab rnyed dka'//sangs rgyas rnal 'byor brtan
203a1(rgyud): gyur na//'grub 'gyur 'di lnga the tshom med//dkyil 'khor 'di ni 'dud bya zhing //'dod pa'i yon tan mchog lnga yis//rol cing dga' ba nyid du bya//mad
203a2(rgyud): sngagasang dbang las bshad pa//gsang ba lnga ni rab sgrub pa//'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ru ba shad//de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs//'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ru brjod//
203a3(rgyud): 'dod pa'i sbyar ba 'di yis ni//skal pa can gyis dngos grub thob//gsang ba de nyid chen po ste//rigs lnga dag ni rab sgrub pa//'dod chags chen po rab sgrub phyir//rol
203a4(rgyud): cing rab tu dga' bar bya//bde ba chen po grub don du//spyod pa chen po tshul chen po//de nyid rnal 'byor kun bsdus pa//de nas yang dag bshad par bya//rdo rje hUM mdzad rna khyor
203a5(rgyud): gyis/rnal 'byor bya ba bsgrub par bya//ji ltar yi ge hUM las byung //gsang ba rgyal po chen po byed//rdo rje hUM mdzad sbyor ba yis//rnal 'byor bya ba bsgrub par bya//de ltar min na phyag
203a6(rgyud): rgya che//dam tshig zhes bya gtan mi 'grub//phyag rgya chen po mdor bsdus nas//rdo rje phyag rgya yongasu gzung //de nas grub pa'i phyag rgya che//grub pa tshe ga yang dag gis//myur du rab
203a7(rgyud): tu 'grub 'gyur ba//rmad byung chen po rab bshad bya//oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra sa ma ye hU~M//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang bar bzhugs//phyag rgya chen po yongasu gzung //rdo rje sngags
203b1(rgyud): kyis bskul bya zhing //sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu sgrub//hUM badz+ra mA ta/rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po//bdag nyid yongs bsgom bya zhing //sangs rgyas thams cad 'jig byas na//'grub
203b2(rgyud): 'gyur 'di lo the tsham med//oM b+h+r-i ku ts+tsha ba ra ta/rang bdag nyid ni dbang bskur ba//rin chen phyag rgya yongasu gzung //rin chen char ni rab phab nas//'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med//
203b3(rgyud): oM pad ma badz+ra hrIHtha/shes rab spyan du rang bdag nyid//rdo rje sngags kyis bskul bya zhing //pad+ma'i rigs chen bskul bar bya//hUM karma badz+ra kri ti ta/sna tshogs rdo rje rgyal po che//bya/
203b4(rgyud): ba sna tshogs bdag nyid che//sangs rgyas thams cad mchod byas na//dngos grub las ni thob par 'gyur//bud med sdug dang lhan cig tu//dkyil 'khor dag ni yang dag bya//mdo/
203b5(rgyud): sde gsang dbang rgyal po las//rnam pa bzhi ni rab tu byung //de nas mtshan nyid sna tshogs yongs bsdus pa//rab tu spyan yang dga' ba chen po mchog/de bzhin tshogs dang rdo rje spyan lnga
203b6(rgyud): pA/shes rab spyan gyis btsun mo mchog chen ldan/oM badz+ra karma ho/badz+ra hUM hUM/ka Ta ma Ta/ra Ta ba Ta/ka ra Na badz+rI gri/badz+ra pu ru/badz+ra phaT/ka ra ra gri/shud d+hi/
203b7(rgyud): g+hi/shud d+hi/shu d+hi gr-i/bud d+ha/satwa rA dzaM/rA de/duSh+Ti/rat+na/te dza/ke t+ya/ha sa/d+harma/tIk+Sh+Na/haMtra/g+ho Sha/karma/rak+Sha/yak+Sha/sin+d+hi sin+d+hu/yau ga/bu h+ya/bi sha ka/tsAr+ya/tsa raM/dza
204a1(rgyud): rAm+b+ha/s+yAk+Sh+mat+yA//d+hA /d+hAg+h+ra d+hI/m+b+ha/!/d+hA!/d+hUb+hU/s+ya /ts+tsha/!/////dU rgyu/d+hu rmA/
204a2(rgyud): oM sarbatwA thA ga ta A dz+haiMd+hi/oM sarba ti thig N+DiHkr-i sa/oM sa ts+tshi ti dz+nyA ga ti hrI/oM sa~Mt+su dz+nyA thA ga tIHd+hI/oM e+e nu ta~M pa na nau.au/oM aun+d+rar-I ti auM/oM A na masa.auts+tsha
204a3(rgyud): I/oM r-iSh+Ti A hrI /oMs 'i oM laM e rI/oM a ta laM/oM Any+dzar ra b+hI//oM a shA n+te ai/oM b+h+rU~M \u0f7f b+h+rU~M ai/oM s+yor+tha shA pa rip+tA nAM e//oM b+hu de e//oM s+phA ra NaM a~M/oM
204a4(rgyud): bi shA aHIn+d+ra ha~Mtsi pri kA/oM tiSh+ma kha/oM e mu khA ba/oM a b+hi She ga/AM dz+nyA neng/oM ts+tshe da tsa/oM bA r-I ti r+ya tsha/oM b+ha she dza/oM d+ha d+he d+haM/oM pra sha me&/oM kro d+hi Ta/
204a5(rgyud): ha ra N+De Sha/oM b+hi g+ha Tu/oM kA po D+ha/oM a t+yA NA/oM Tak+Shi le ta/au bi su le the/oM d+hA ra Ni da/au ba tA ke d+ha/oM ba lo ke na/oM tra te pa/oM sarba hA ra Ni pa/oM b+hu sha ni ba/
204a6(rgyud): oM b+hi ba sha ni b+hA/oM Ar+ya te me/oM a lo ni/ya/audra hA ra/oM ba sha la/oM bu d+haM wa/oM d+ha mi sha/oM ye b+he ShA/oM sarbe sa/oM d+ha li ni ha/hoH/d+h+waM dzaHhA sa/
204a7(rgyud): o a/dzahaM/a ro/ni gi da sha/trar d+hi/b+hug/sa ya/a hi/kro d+ha/d+ha ma sha/b+ha ra yaM/yuk+ti/der sha na/hA sa ya/he ma hA Ne//d+ha rata/oM sarba ta thAM ga ta se'i
204b1(rgyud): man+tam+b+haSh+Tarad+ha prad+d+ho nA dzAk+Sha ya ts+tshin hU~M hA///de bzhin gshegs pa'i gas dpa'adi//mdo sde bas dbang las gsungs pas//chos dbyings brtan pa'i rang bzhin te//rdzas//
204b2(rgyud): dang longs spyod rdegs las byung //de de legs sgom pa bya dang mtshungs pa med//e ma'o gsang ba chen po gsung ba kun bsdus pa//rnal 'byor rgya cher bsdus pa'ang mtshungs pa med//
204b3(rgyud): bde ba chen po 'di ni brtan pa'i dngos por gyur//dga' ba chen po'i slob dpon dga' chen nyi ma ste//mchod 'os gsang ba'i kun bsdus pa//kun mkhyen gsung las byung ba'i dkyil
204b4(rgyud): 'khor kun bsdus pa//tshogs rgyas rab tu 'phel bar gyur pa gsungs pa yin//rdo rje chen po skal pa ches//gsang ba thums cing rjesu bslab//de nyid chos ni rnal 'byor che//stub/
204b5(rgyud): po bsdus pa 'jug par bya//brgya dang sum cu rtsa drug lhag/tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor kun bsdus pa//bri dang rdor tshig yi ge yis//dkyil 'khor gsang ba bslab par bya//rgyud kyi/
204b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor kun bsdus pa//dkyil 'khor gsang ba 'di ru ni//de nyid yi ge rnam dag pa'i//rnal 'byor chen po 'jug par bya//gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa//rta babs bzhis ni
204b7(rgyud): rnam par brgyan//thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan//dar gyi chun pos rnam par brgyan//rdo rje dbyings sogs sbyor ba yis//sdug pa gsang ba shin tu brtan//de nyid gapangs
205a1(rgyud): bslab bya'i phyir//shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bslab//e ma'o kyil 'khor sbyar du yis//gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor kun bsdus pa//rdo rje dbyings sogs
205a2(rgyud): sbyor ba yis//mkhas pas yang dag bri zhing dgod//gru bzhi mnyam pa'i rim pa ni//de nyid kyi ni ni 'du bya//dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus kyi char//sangs rgyas gzugs ni dgod par bya//
205a3(rgyud): de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du//ci rigs par ni yang dag bri//ngos bzhi'i rang bzhin dkyil 'khor la//yig sum cu rtsa drug dgodra//sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun du//yig
205a4(rgyud): bcu drug yang dag bri//yi ge bcu drug rgyal po ni//phyag rgya'i tshogs dang 'od bcas pa//dkyil 'khor chen po'i legs bzhi //yi ge rnams ni yang dag zo//yi ge sum cu sum
205a5(rgyud): tsucuni/phyogs rnams kun tu dgod par bya//sangs rgyas thugs ka'i dbus ni//yi ga hUM ni sbyar bar bya//gang zhig sbyor ba'i ming can gyi//sangs rgyas dbusu dgod par bya//
205a6(rgyud): rdo rje yi 'i rab sbyor byed//shes rab can gyi yi ge rnams//rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin pa yis//dngos rdo rje rdo rje bzhi//shar du yi ge sum cu bri//yi ga sum cung bzhin ltar//sum cu
205a7(rgyud): byeng gi phyogs kyi //nub tu sum cu sbyar bar bya//yi ge bcu drug yang dag sbyor//dbus sangs rgyas bzhi ldan bya//rdo rje rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che//rdul 'byor dbang drug
205b1(rgyud): phyog che//dpal ldan 'jig rten rnal 'byor ldan//dbab pa brtan pa'i tshogs gyur pa//smra ba las byung rgyal ba che//sangs rgyas rnal 'byor 'jug par bya//A rat+na ko ta ma hUr+ya yo d+har+ya
205b2(rgyud): bor te d+ha ma ni//de nas sbyor ba 'di yis ni//rdo rje 'khor lo bzhugs par bya//ha ha he ha ga sang chen po'o//rtse gsum ral po gsum 'dzin pa//rgyal chen gzi brjid chen po'i don/
205b3(rgyud): rje thig gis yongasu bskor//slob dpon chen pos blta byas nas//yi go rab tu brjod par bya//rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yis//rdo rje'i 'khor lo kun tu spro//a A'i rna lhor
205b4(rgyud): yang dag gzung //i I dbang phyug chen po'i 'od//u U rnon po 'chang ba ste//e ai sgra dbyangs rab bskul ba//e au skyabs byed rtsibs chen po//aM AHshes rab ston/
205b5(rgyud): bzang ba//rdo rje lcags kyu 'di yis kyang //rdo rje 'chang ni bskul bar bya//ji ltar 'khor lo ji ltar rigs//ji 'os ji ltar rdo rje'i tshogs//de bzhin 'khor lo yongasu dgod//rdo rje sgo
205b6(rgyud): dpon dka' thub che//skal pa chen po gsang ba 'di//rdo rje 'khor lo yang dag sbyor//rnam 'phrul de ni rab tu bskor//'khor lo dpa pa dang gzhugs pa dang /cho ga ji bzhin 'jug pa
205b7(rgyud): bya//rdo rje dbyings sogs dkyil 'khor du//rgyas par ji ltar bstan pa bzhin//rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang //'khor lo dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa//'khor lo'i gnas
206a1(rgyud): ni dbang du 'gyur//chos kyi la ngar la yang dag ldan//rdo rje 'gugs dang rgal ldan dang //nges byed rin chen gzi brjid dang //rgyal mtshan gzhad pa yang dag ldan//
206a2(rgyud): dang rkun po gtso bo mchog/rgyu dang gtum pa drag po che//las dang srung ba gnod sbyin grub//sna tshogs sbyor ba yang dag ldan//'khor lo'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'byung //de lta bu yi sbyor//
206a3(rgyud): ba yis//rdo rje 'khor lo kun tu bri//rdo rje 'dzin kun slob dpon gyis//dkyil 'khar 'dir ni gzhugs par bya//bu drang slong ma min pa la//gsang ba'i tshogs tshan sbyin mi bya//gzhon
206a4(rgyud): du skal pa dang ldan pa//gzhung 'di khyed kyis ci bder byin//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po shin tu gsang ba'i rnal 'byor mchog tu gsang
206a5(rgyud): brtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdo rje rtse mo las rdo rje rigs kyi de kho na nyid shin tu gsang ba'i bshad pa ste le'u bzhi pa rdzogs so////de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par
206a6(rgyud): snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bcas pas slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rdo rje sems dpa' la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol
206a7(rgyud): ba btab par gyur to//rdo rje hUM mdzad rdo rje mchog/rdo rje mchog 'dzin rdo rje'i mda'//rdo rje khro gnyer rdo rje'i lus//rdo rje 'bar ba rgyal mtshan che//rdo rje gang rgyangs rdo rje'i bdag
206b1(rgyud): rdorje sde ste chos mchog 'dzin//rdo rje rgyal mtshan shin tu no//rdo rje 'khor lo bzlas pa che//las ky-i rdo rje rdo rje che//rdo rje gnod sbyin 'jigs chen po//rdo rje phyag rgya sgra chen po//rdo rje khu tshur brtan paH/
206b2(rgyud): /rdorje 'bar ba rdo rje che//las chen po ste mda' chen po//rdo rje legs pa dga' ba che//rdo rje rgyan ni 'phrog byed pa//rdo rje 'od de rgyal mtshan che//rdo rje tshams ni ribo dga' ba//rdo rje pad+ma shin tu gcod
206b3(rgyud): rdo rje dkyil 'khor rdo rje rig/rdo rje ljags te sna tshogs che//sna tshogs mtshon chen skye dgu mnga'//go cha chen po rdo rje sku//rdo rje mche ba 'jigs byed pa//rdo rje bsdams pa rdo rje che//rdo rje khro
206b4(rgyud): bo gzhu chen po//rdo rje lcags kyu mdzod chen po//zhags pa chen po dbang chen po//rdo rje lcags sgrogs 'bebs pa che//rdo rje dbab pa 'jigs byed pa//yi ge dza ste yi ge hUM//yi ge hUM/
206b5(rgyud): nIni dam du 'ching //yi gaM hoHste yi ge haHrdo rje phyag rgya dregs pa mchog/rdo rje sems dpa' khro bo che//lcags kyu bsdigs med rdo rje khro//rdo rje bdud sde bdud kyi mchog/bdud kyi bdud/
206b6(rgyud): ni rab 'joms pa//rdo rje dga' bzhi pa che//rdo rje dka' thub shis mdzad pa//rdo rje drag po shin tu 'dug/rdo rje rang dbang rdo rje mdzad//rdo rje 'dod pa khro bo che//rdo rje sgra skye sgra chen po//sar+b+ba
206b7(rgyud): rgyas hUM mdzad yi ge hUM//yi ge phaT sogs dang mnyam pa//yi ge phaT ni 'bar ba'i bka'//yi ge swA hA rang bdag med//gtso ba bsod dang slob mdzad pa//dri med skrag dang dbugra/
207a1(rgyud): sta du// sa nAm+b+ha// rlo tu na kun spyan y-i/ / l+h+wa //
207a2(rgyud): na/'dun par byung po //de sa na rgyu// la na mi meng/das na
207a3(rgyud): 'byo//spangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bstan pa//dngas grub mtshag ni zab par 'gyur//dpe' pa byad la gsol pa 'dibs//gdug pa rnams ni gdul ba dang //de bzhin sums
207a4(rgyud): da//'i che spyod pa mdzang dug sem//gas nga nal po'i rgyu mazhes byu jog s+ho/ mkhan pa
207a5(rgyud): no kadzin las nas dang /ma de'i slong ga nan tshul khrims m+bu da du sa de'o//bas de brgyug nyis pa'o////rgya bar smad du/
207a6(rgyud): h+ya s+yonA mya tan+ta /bde srid du/thams cad gsang ba zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyu ro //jicom ldan 'das ma shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo//d+mo lnga nyid kyis lnga
207a7(rgyud): yo bdag nyid cani//mi rnams lus la nges par mthong ba dag/rangs mos rab tu bsgom par gyur na ni//dngos der bsgom pas nges par sangs rgyas 'gyur//reng shes gas
207b1(rgyud): pabadam pa ni//sangs rgyas ye shes bla med de//gnyis med gnyis kyi tshul can te//sangs rgyas rtag par rab tu 'dud//yang dag bdag med las byung zhing //gnyis med ye shes
207b2(rgyud): las byung ba//sdug dang mi sdug rnam spangs pa//cis 'ang byeg ni mi 'tshal to//ma skyes pa ni yang dag spyod//skyes pa'i 'og tu rtag par ni//sangs rgyas srung ni sgom pa de//
207b3(rgyud): gi ye shes mchog phyag 'tshal//rnal 'byar pa dang sems can kun//ma skyes pa ni yang dag skye//skyes pa'i 'og tu rtag par ni//nyon mongs dag chags kyis sun 'byin//
207b4(rgyud): lus can rnams ni 'khor gyur pa//sdug dang mi sdug rnam 'byed yin//sems gang de nyid sdug bsngal to//sems can rnams kyi lus 'byung //sems de yi ni rgyun nyis kyis//
207b5(rgyud): 'gro ba sdug bsngal gnod par 'gyur//rnam par snang mdzad rgyal ba mgon//sangs rgyas thams cad bsdus gcig pu//sangs rgyas thams cad rtogs gyur pa//sangs rgyas
207b6(rgyud): 'khor ba sgrol ba bo//sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir//thugs rje'i nyams dang yang dag ldan//rgyu yi de nyid mnyam sbyor bas//'bras bu'i de nyid rnams kyang ston//'phyas
207b7(rgyud): bu'i de nyid yang dag zhugs//rgyu yi de nyid mi 'dod do//gang du 'dod pa skyes gyur pa//de nyid 'khor ba'i bag chags yin//mkhas pa yi ni cho ga yis//sgom pa ru ni rong
208a1(rgyud): sku btags//gang zhig skur yang gcig gyur pa//rnal 'byor pa yi rnal 'byor byung //sangs rgyas rjes dran la dmigs shing //chos ni rjesu dmigs par
208a2(rgyud): tshogs gnyis byin sbyor ba yis//rkang gnyis dam pa nyid du 'gyur//byi gar lo ga rab bzhag s+ho//sangs rgyas sgor ni rnam par bsgom//sangs rgyas rjes dran rnal 'byor pa//
208a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas sprin ni bsgom par bya//b+ha bar ling ga rab bzhag ste//rdo rje chos ni rnam par sgom//chos ni rjes dran rnal 'byor pa//chos kyi sprin las char rab 'bebs//ma
208a4(rgyud): ma ling ba zhes bshad//phyag rgyal mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi//'joms pas b+ha ge zhes bshad//nyon mongs 'joms pa'i dam pri nu//sems can kun gyi dngos kun gyi///
208a5(rgyud): rang sems chos ni bsdus pa yin//chos bdag med pa'i spyod yis/gsang na rang nyid 'chi bar 'gyur//rang gi sems nyid rdzogs sangs rgyas//rtogs par bya
208a6(rgyud): ba sems nyid yin//rang gi sems nyid bsad bya ba//sems nyid kho na bsad par bya//sbyor ba nyid dang yang dag 'bal//gang yang srid pa 'byung ma
208a7(rgyud): yin//gang che sangs rgyas da ni//sbyor lnga sangs rgyas bdag ces sgom//ting 'dzin ye shes las bya ngab//sangs rgyas nyid phyir mdor bsdus pa//sang pa rgyas rnal 'byo
208b1(rgyud): med par ni//rnal 'byor pa ni 'tshang ma N+ya//phra mo'i dngos po ji bzhin mthong //sdug pa'i dngos por de bzhin te//dngos dang dngos med khyad par ni//sgom pa kun tu brtags pa yin/
208b2(rgyud): dngos po sgom pa'i dngos ma yin//sgom par bya ba sgom ma yin//dngos po sgom par gyur pa yos//rang gi sems ni yongasu sbyong //sangs rgyas sangs rgyas yul ma yin//sem
208b3(rgyud): can yul du 'du mi 'gyur gyi//rang sems rtogs pas sangs rgyas te//sangs rgyas sangs rgyas rtogs pas min//gnyis mdo sbyor ba 'di la yang //ting 'dzin gyi yo shes
208b4(rgyud): brtag/rgyu yi de nyid ji ltar mthong //'bras bu'i de nyid de nyid yin//rgyu yi de nyid cung zad med//'bras bu'i de nyid de bzhin no//de nyid de ni de bzhin shes//de nyid rnal 'byor pa
208b5(rgyud): kun sbed//rgyu yis rgyu ni dngos por min//'bras bu'i dngos por 'bras bus min//rgyu de 'bras bu'i dngos por rung //rang gi sems ni so sor snang //ye shes de ni rgyu dngos te///
208b6(rgyud): gas nga 'bras bu'i dngos po yin//gsang ba gnyis med spyod pa yis//de yis dngos pas mchog yin no//de nyid de nyid rtogs gyur pa//gsang de gi sang ba'i rnal 'byor po//gus /
208b7(rgyud): bde rig shes pa ste//mchog ni mchog gi rnal 'byor pa//sdug pa'i ngo bor gang ba shad pa//mi sdug pa yang de yi dngos//sdug dang mi sdug gzugs gang yin//mi mthong de ni de bzhi/
209a1(rgyud): gshogs//rnam shes tsam ni med pa ru//rnal 'byor rnal 'byor 'byung mi 'gyur//dza ltar ye shes mchog dag pa//de ltar dag pa de bzhin gshegs//rna pA shrI pa
209a2(rgyud): pa ni/phyag rgya ni yi tshig yis//gsang ba gnyis med sbyo yis//sku gsung thugs ni yang dag byung //thugs ni phyag rgya chen po ste//dam tshig phyag rgya kun tu 'gro//chos kyi phyag rgya
209a3(rgyud): gsung gi ste//las kyi phyag rgya sku yi yin//rgya yis rgyas btab dngos po ni//gsang bdag gsang ba'i rnal 'byor po'o//rang rig pa yi ngo bo yis//ting 'dzin ye shes brtags pa yin//
209a4(rgyud): lus ngag semasu rnam brtags pa'i//bya ba rgyud du rnam brtags pa//gsang ba rnam pa gsum du bshad//rdo rje las can sna tshogs bzhin//sangs rgyas lnga yi bdag nyid ni//gas/
209a5(rgyud): ba'i ye shes bla med yin//phyag rgya bzhi po gsang ba do//rnal 'byer pa yis las grub byed//'byung ba chen po bzhi po yang //phyag rgya bzhi zhes bshod pa yin//phyag rgya bzhi
209a6(rgyud): yis mnyam sbar ba//lha mo bzhi dang yang dag sbyor//sa ni spyan zhes bshad pa yin//chu ni mA ma ke zhes bshad//me dang rlung zhes grags pa ni//gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma
209a7(rgyud): yin ta dbang tshan sa ye khams yin te//chu yaM khams ni chu dkyil 'khor//men+ti me yi khams yin te//rlung ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor//dbang chen kha dog ser po ste//gru
209b1(rgyud): bzhi pa ste rgyas pa yin//chu la dkyil 'khor rnam pa skye//dkar po'i mdog can zhinga'i yin//me yi dkyil 'khor khwa dog dmar//gru gsum dbang gis las rnams lang//rlung
209b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gzhu yi dbyings//nag po'i gdug pa'i las rnams la//'byung ba che'i bdag las grub pa//las kyi dngos grub yon tan bzhi//lus kyi dngos grub dngos grub mchogs/
209b3(rgyud): langar los bsgyur ba rnam pa bzhi//zhi ba la ni spyan gyi chul//rgyas pa pad+ma'i rdo rje can//dbang la rnam par snang mdzad gnas//rdo rje khro ba mngon spyod la'o//zhi ba dgengs kyi bya ba yin/
209b4(rgyud): de bzhin rgyas po lnga dra la//gdug pa'i las rnams nyi ma'i gung //dbang gi las ni mtshan phyed bya//zhi la dkar po sbyar bar bya//ser por snang ba rgyas pa la//dbang gi las la
209b5(rgyud): dmar po ste//gdug pa nag po rab tu sbyar//ting 'dzin ye shes las byung ba//las kyi sgrub pa dam+b+ha pa yin//bcomo ldan dag pa bsgom bya ste//sangs rgyas kun las mi g.yo gyur
209b6(rgyud): b+ha ga'i dbusu gsang ba'i bdag/rdo rje'i dbyings ni de bzhin gshegs//lha yi bdag gyur bdag nyi ni//bsgoms na g.yo ba med par 'gyur//snying la gnas pa'i lha mo che//rna
209b7(rgyud): pa yi rnal 'byar bskyed//sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed mdzad yum//rdo rje dpyid kyi dbang pos bshad//'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ste//'di dag 'jig rten dug gsum yin//
210a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan dug mi mnga'//rdo rje dbyings ni de bzhin gshegs//chags dang sdang dang rmongs pa rnams//bsgoms nas khams gsum pa yi bdag
210a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gyur te//sangs rgyas bden pa'i dug bco mo//rang sems so sor rtogs pa yis//gti mug sems ni de bzhin gshegs//rmongs pa nyid ni 'jig/
210a3(rgyud): rten gyur//sems can kun la blta bar bya//zhe sdang sems ni de bzhin gshegs//phra mo'i ye shes yang dag bskyed//sdang gyur rdo rje nyid du gyur//sems can thams/
210a4(rgyud): cang gzhig par bya//'dod chags sems ni de bzhin gshegs//byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed//chags gyur bzang po nyid gyur pa//sangs rgyas thams cad chags par
210a5(rgyud): bya//byams pa'i sems ni de bzhin gshegs//nga rgyal yang dag bskyed nas ni//mdza' bor gyur cing kun nyid gyur//sangs rgyas kun la 'khyud par bya//chags pa'i lta bu//
210a6(rgyud): byams pa ste//thugs rje'i chos ni smra ba dang //kun la mi 'jigs sbyin pa dang //sangs rgyas thams cad mi nyes bya'o//rnal 'byor sbyin las rab dga' ste//tshul khrim/
210a7(rgyud): ldan las dri med 'gyur//bzod pa las ni 'od byed pa//brtson la so 'ang 'phro can dang ldan//bsam gtan las ni sbyangs dka' bo//shes rab kyis ni mngon gyur mthong //
210b1(rgyud): thangs tshan las ni ring du song //stobs dang ldan las mi g.yo 'gyur//smon lam gyis ni legs blo ldan//ye shes ldan las chos kyi sprin//rgyal ba de bzhin gshegs pa ni//rang ri
210b2(rgyud): bdag nyid bcu gcig 'gyur//pha rol phyin pa bcu rnams dang //stobs dang dbang ni rdzogs gyur cing //sa bcu las ni 'das gyur pa//mtshan ma brtan gyur de las ni//rdo rje chu ni
210b3(rgyud): rdzogs sangs rgyas//chos kyi bdud rtsi bcud len yin//sangs rgyas kun gyi mtha' yas pa//gzung dang 'dzin pa spangs pa yin//chos kyi bdud rtsi bcud kyis len//rdo rje'i chu
210b4(rgyud): ni dag 'thungs pas//rdo rje slob dpon rnal 'byor pa//'dod nas dag par de tshe 'gyur//'dod nas dag par gnas gyur pa//de nas byang chub semasu 'gyur//byang chub sems kyi
210b5(rgyud): bdag can 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//rnam par grol ba'i ras kyis g.yogs//byang chub sems ni blo na med//yang dag bskyed gyur rnal 'byor pa//
210b6(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' snying la 'dug/sems can khams ni mtha' yas pa'i//mar gyur dam tshig 'dzin byed pa//rdo rje dam tshig gis spang na//rtag tu dam tshig gnas par gyur//kham
210b7(rgyud): gsum lam ni nyams dga' bar//bud med ces bshad ji snyed pa//cho ga bzhin du kun spyod cing //thugs kyi rdo rje smad mi bya//rdo rje gsum gyi sku la gnas//dam tshig phyag rgya ji
211a1(rgyud): snyed pa//rdo rje dmachog gsum gyis bya//gsung gi rdo rje sman mi bya//rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i//phyag rgya kun ni bud med bzang //de rnams bstan pa'i rna
211a2(rgyud): 'byor pa//phyag rgya thams cad dbang du 'gyur//'jig rten khams ni thams cad no//bud med ces bya ji snyed pa//phyag rgya chen po'i sbyor ba yis//de dag kun la nye bar spyod//gsang/
211a3(rgyud): ba mchog gi rnal 'byor pa//ting 'dzin ye shes dam pa yin//gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na//nga rgyal ma yin hUM ma yin//rig po ma yin sngags rig min//lago pa'i phyag
211a4(rgyud): rgya'ang ma bca'o//mchod rten gyi ni las mi bya//glegs bam dag kyang bklag mi bya//dkyil 'khor dag ni mi bya zhing //rdo rje mchog gsum phyag mi 'tshal//slob dpo no sla
211a5(rgyud): par mi bya ste//b+h+ra ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam//khyod kyi srog chags bsad par bya//brdzun gyi tshig kyang spro bar bya//khyed kyi snga ma byin blang byo zhing //gzhan gyi bud med
211a6(rgyud): bstan por bya//sbyin sreg yang na bsam gtan min//lus ngag yid ni mi byed pa//gzhan min sems kyis bya ba ste//'di ni bsod pa'o mchog yin no//sngags rnams
211a7(rgyud): thams cad rab tu 'grub//rnal 'byor kun kyang rnam kun tu//de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyang //sangs rgyas chos nyid sgom par bya//ma 'dres chos ni bco brgyad pa//sa
211b1(rgyud): rgyas chos zhes bshad pa yin//de rnams rtag tu sgom pa ni//sangs rgyas ches ni sgrub byed yin//bsam gtan bzhi du gzugs med bzhi//rtag tu thob par byas pa dang //'gog pa'o snyoms
211b2(rgyud): 'jug de yis na//sangs rgyas byang chub sa sgrub//byang chub phyogs ni sum cu 'dren//cho su yang dag bshad pa gang //de rnams sgom pas dag pa dang //byang chub sems dpa' 'gro phan/
211b3(rgyud): yin//'gro ba rnams la spro ba'i sems//brtan zhing snying po rab bsgoms pa//stong pa de nyid las byung ba//rdo rje ye shes zhes bya bshad//chos bdag me lus yang dag byung //
211b4(rgyud): gnyis med ye shes dam pa ste//chos nyid mchog gi ye shes ni//chos kyi dbyings zhes yang dag bshad//'di ni chos dbyings ye shes te//rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin skyes//rdo rje ye
211b5(rgyud): shes rang bzhin sems//rdo rje dbyings zhes bya bar bshad//sems kyi spro ba'i spror ba yis//phra mo'i ye shes sogs sbyor ba//de bzhin gshogs kun ye shes no//rnam par snang mdzad
211b6(rgyud): ces byar bshad//byams pa spro ba'i sbyor ba yis//sbyor ba spyod par byed pa'i mchog/zag meng brtan par gyur pa yi//thugs ni mi skyod pa zhes bshad//thugs rje spro ba'i tshul
211b7(rgyud): gyis no//sems can phan 'dogs mdzad pa po//thugs ni 'gro don yang ngag ldan//rin chen 'byung ldan zhes bshad do//dga' bso spro ba'i sbyor ba yis//theg chen mchog ni
212a1(rgyud): dri ma med//thugs ni 'od gsal dag pa ni//'od dpag med ces de bshad do//gtang snyoms spro bar mdzad pa'i shugs//sems can thams cad rtogs man
212a2(rgyud): pa//don yod bla med bya ba ni//don yod grub par de bshad do//byang chub rang bzhin ye shes mchog/de 'dir rdo rje zhes bshad do//rdo rje ye shes las byung ba//rdo rje sems dpar de
212a3(rgyud): shad de//sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pa//rdo rje lcags kyu zhes bshad de//rdo rje'i rigs rnams kun gyi rgyal//rdo rje rgyal por de bshad//sangs rgyas thams cad chags
212a4(rgyud): byed pas//mnyes par byed pa zhes bshad do//bdud kyi sbyor ba chags pa che//rdo rje chags par de bshad//srungs rgyas thams cad mnyes byed cing //log so zhes par
212a5(rgyud): sogs pa//byang chub sems dpa' dga' byed pas//rdo rje legs par de bshad do//byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa gang //mkha' mnyam rdo rje las byung ba//don yod rin
212a6(rgyud): chen chen po de//rdo rje rin chen de bshad//ma rig bral ba'i ye shes ni//tshogs dag las ni nges par byung //thar pa'i snang ba gzi brjid che//rdo rje nyi mar de bshad//rnam pa
212a7(rgyud): kun gyi dngos ye shes//thar pa'i lam 'jug thob mdzad dang //chos kyi rgyal mtshan tog chen po//rdo rje dpal du de bshid do//rdo rje bzhad pa rnal 'byor che//sangs rgyas
212b1(rgyud): kun 'byung rmad byung ba//'di ni byang chub sems dpa' che//rdo rje bzhud par de bsha//sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che//sangs rgyas chos ni rtogs mdzad pa//de bzhin bshegs pa'i//
212b2(rgyud): chos dag pa//rdo rje cho su daM bshad do//shes rab rnon po theg pa che//nyon mongs thams cad ngos gcod mdzad//shes bya'i sgrib pa bcod pa po//rdo rje rnon por de bshad//sangs rgyas
212b3(rgyud): rol mo'i 'khor lo ni//chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor bas//sems dpa' chen po theg pa che//rdo rje rgyu zhes de bshad//shes rab ye shes rang bzhin dag/gsung gi sgra ni rnam
212b4(rgyud): par spang //'jam pa'i gsung gi bdag nyid gyur//rdo rje smra bar de bshad//pha rol phyin pa kun gyi zhabs//rno rnams thams cad rtogs mdzad pa//sems can kun don sprul pa po///
212b5(rgyud): rdo rje las zhes bya bar bshad//sangs rgyas rjes dran yang dag grub//theg pa dman pa rnam spangs shing //byang chub sems la rab zhugs pa//rdo rje srung bar de bshad//sdig pa
212b6(rgyud): thams cad zad byed cing //de bzhin nyon mongs rnams sreg la//nyon mongs zad pa nyer len pas//rdo rje'i gnod sbyin du bshad do//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams//bcing ba
212b7(rgyud): ru ni yang dag gyur//de nyid de nyid ye shes te//rdo rje khu tshur zhes bshad//dam tshig phyag rgya thams cad ni//rdo rje bsdams la sa yang dag byung //rdo rje khu tshur gnyis
213a1(rgyud): gyur pa//las kyi phyag rgya zhes bshad//nga rgyal med cing snang ba med//mtshan ma med cing zhen pa med//bdag med mnyam nyid ye shes ni//rdo rje sems
213a2(rgyud): dpar zhes byar bshad//gsang ba'i mnyam par 'byor pa 'dir//ye shes pha rol phyin dge ba//rnam pa bcu gnyis yang dag byung //rdo rje pha rol phyin pa'i 'od//byang chub sem
213a3(rgyud): ni rab bsgom pas//pha rol sangs rgyas nyid son pa'i//pha rol phyin thob ye shes ni//rdo rje sems mar bshad pa yin//bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi rnams ni//shes
213a4(rgyud): rab pha rol phyin rdo rje//chos bzhi gcig tu gyur pa ni//rdo rje rin chen mar bshad do//gsang ba'i ye shes ye shes che//de nyid pha rol phyin dge ba//pha rol phyin pa che
213a5(rgyud): las byung //rdo rje chos mar shes par bya//pha rol phyin pa'i dge ba ni//sbyor ba'i thangasu rab bstan pa//rdo rje las mar shes par bya//gang phyir de ni rol pa dge/sgeg mo sbyin
213a6(rgyud): pa'i pha rol phyin//tshul khrims pha rol phyin dge bas//rgyan pa'i yan log yid 'ong yin//glu ma bzod pa'i pha rol phyin//ched du brjod pa'i chos brjod pa'o//gar ma
213a7(rgyud): brtson 'grus pha rol phyin//myur du sangs rgyas nyid ster ba'o//gdug pa shes rab pha rol phyin//kun tu khyab par spros phyirare//me tog bsam gtan pha rol phyin//'dod
213b1(rgyud): pa'i 'dam gyis ma gos pa'o//mar me smon lam pha rol phyin//phyogs kun snang bar byed pa yin//dri ni thabs kyi pha rol phyin//dri ngan thur sel dge ba yin//sangs rgyas kun gyi
213b2(rgyud): thabs chen po//dbye ba rnam pa bzhi yis gnas//thams cad 'dod pa'i thabs chen po//rdo rje lcags kyu zhes bshad do//byang chub spyad pa spyod byed pa//rdo rje zhags pa zhes bshad
213b3(rgyud): do//theg pa 'di la brten gyur gang //rdo rje lcags sgrog ces bshad do//chos rnams thams cad ma skyes shing //gdod nas zhi ba mkha'o dang monyam//de lta'i tshig ni rab 'jug pas//
213b4(rgyud): rdo rje dril bu zhes bshad do//tshogs gnyis kyi ni sbyor ba yis//sems can kun gyi don ston pa'i//sems ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yin par
213b5(rgyud): bshad//yang dag rdo rje rtogs pa ste//'dzin pa'i sbyor nyid lcags kyu yin//phra rab 'bigs pa mda' zhes bya//dgyes pas lag so zhes bya ba//spras pas rin po che ru
213b6(rgyud): bshad//gzi brjid ces bya nyi ma yin//sgreng bas tog tu bshad pa ste//rnam par 'byed pas gzhed par bshad//'dod chags dag pa pad+ma yin//nyon mongs dgra bcom ral
213b7(rgyud): gri ste//dkyil 'khor sbyor bas 'khor lo yin//gang gi brjod pas smra bar bshad//kun nyid sna tshogs rdo rje yin//gzhig dka'i sbyor ba go cha yin//'jigs pa'i spyod pas mche//
214a1(rgyud): ba ste/phyag rgya'i sbyor nyid bcing ba yin//dkyil 'khor du ni gang bshad pa//yid kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa yin//gzhal yas khang ni ye shes te//sems
214a2(rgyud): kyi brtsegs pa sgreng ba yin//phyi yi gru bzhi pa gang yin//tshad kyis mnyam pa nyid gyur pa//byams pa la sogs sems gang yin//thig bzhi zhes ni bshad pa yin//chos kyi
214a3(rgyud): sbyor ba rjes dran nyid//gang de rdo rje thig du bshad//lta ba kun las rnam grol ba//ye shes thig tu bshad pa yin//tshul khrims tshogs kyi dam pa ni//gang zhig rgyan du bshad pa
214a4(rgyud): yin//dad dbang la sogs sems gang yin//ra ba lngar ni yang dag byung //rnam par thar pa bzhi po ni//sgo rnams ni yang dag bshad//yang dge spong ba bzhi po ni//rta babs
214a5(rgyud): rnams dang ka bar byung //dran pa nyer bzhag bzhi po ni//khyams rnams bzhi por shes par bya//rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi po ni//da ni sgo khyud rnam bzhi yin//byang chub yan lag
214a6(rgyud): bdun po ni//phreng ba me tog chun rgyan pa//'phags lam yan lag brgyad po ni//ka ba brgyad ces bya bar bshad//sgrib pa gnyis las rnam grol zhing //ting 'dzin ye shes kyis
214a7(rgyud): brtags pa//lam gyi ye shes khyad par rnams//rnga yab ces ni yang dag bshad//nyon mongs thams cad nges gcod cing //nyon mongs 'phrog pas dra ba ste//yang dag
214b1(rgyud): gcad cing spong ba nyid//sel ba'i spong ba la gnas pa//tshogs gnyis kyi ni sbyor ba nyid//snron mongs pa yi phyed 'phrob pa//drad phyed ces bya bar bshad//rang bzhin 'od gsal
214b2(rgyud): gang yin de//byang chub sems ni zla med yin//sems ni don kun bskyed byed pa//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yin par bshad//shes rab ye shes rang bzhin dag/rdo rje lta bu'i ting
214b3(rgyud): 'dzin skyes//thar pa'i snang ba gzi brjid che//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yin po bshang //tshen ni lngar ni yang dag zhes//lta ba lnga yi me tog yin//ye shes lnga yi nges sbyor
214b4(rgyud): nyid//sangs rgyas lnga zhes yang dag bshad//na mkha' bzhin du bdag med pa'i//rnam shes ye shes dam pa yin//ye shes de yi rgyan bshad pa//chags pa'i sems
214b5(rgyud): zhes bya bar bshad//chags bral las ni byang chub 'byung //chags pa'i sems las gzhan yin//de bas chags dang chags bral ba//byang chub sems zhes yang dag bshad//
214b6(rgyud): 'jig rten chags dang bral bas 'dul//phyag rgya'i dngos grub chags las byung //der ni thabs kyi sgom pa dag/dngos grub thams cad ster ba yin//ji ltar 'jig rten 'dul 'gyur/
214b7(rgyud): ba//de ltar rnal 'byor pa yis spyad//ji ltar 'dul bya dag gyur pa//zhen pa kun tu mchod par 'gyur//mtshan nyid gang zhig yang dag bshad//mtshan nyid des ni mtshan pa
215a1(rgyud): 'gyur//sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya yis//rgyas btab ye shes yin par bshad//phyag rgya bsgoms pas rnal 'byor pa//rtag tu phyag rgya'i bdag can 'gyur//
215a2(rgyud): rgyas btab dngos po shes nas ni//bsgoms na phyag rgyas btab par 'gyur//mtshan dang mtshan nyid 'bral ba ni//shes nas rnal 'byor yang dag sbyong //ji ltar mtshan nyid yang
215a3(rgyud): dag grub//de bzhin dag pa myur du grub//g.yas pa'i cha yi mtshan ma ni//shes rab can ni rab tu bstan//g.yon gyi mtshan ma ji ltar mthong //de yis thugs rje mtshan pa yin//
215a4(rgyud): phyag ni gnyis ka'i mnyam sngar las//ting 'dzin gnyisu bshad pa yin//zhabs gnyis kyi ni mtshan ma yis//tshogs gnyis dag ni bstan pa yin//sor mo lnga yi mnyam
215a5(rgyud): sbyor las//dkyil 'khor lnga yis rgyan pa yin//sangs rgyas lnga yis mngon byang chub//rim pa bzhin du bstan bya ste//gang zhig bud mo ston pa ni//na mkha' las ni byung ba
215a6(rgyud): motshan//gang zhig mdzub mo ston pa ni//des ni dbang chen dkyil 'khor yin//srin lag tu ni yang dag bshed//chu yi dkyil 'khor zhes bshod//gang zhig mthe bo ston pa
215a7(rgyud): ni/de yis me ni mtshon pa yin//gang zhig mtha'u chung ston pa ni//rlung gi dkyil 'khor nyid du 'gyur//gang zhig lte ba ston pa ni//rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug bshad//ga
215b1(rgyud): zhig snying ka ston pa ni//rdo rje sems mar rjesu dpag/gang zhig smin mtshams ston pa ni//rdo rje rin chen ma zhes bya//gang zhig lkog ma ston pa ni//rdo rje chos mar shes par bya//gang zhig spyi bo
215b2(rgyud): sten pa ni//rdo rje las mar shes par bya//byang chub lnga mngon byang chub pa 'am//yang na ye shes lnga rnams sam//sangs rgyas lnga dang yang dag ldan//dkyil 'khor byang chub yin par
215b3(rgyud): bstan//sngon gyi sgrar ni ji skad bshad//mdun du de ni rab tu bstan//rgyab kyi sgrar ni ji ltar bshad//phyi mar de ni yang dag bstan//gang du thog ma'i sgrar gyur pa//de ni rgyu yi sgra ru bstan//
215b4(rgyud): gang zhig tha ma'i sgrar gyur pa//'di ni 'bras bur yang dag bstan//sangs rgyas bcom ldan gnyis mi mnga'//rgyu dang 'bras bur ldan 'gyur min//gang phyir thog ma tha ma mod//de phyir//
215b5(rgyud): rtag pa zhes bshad do//rang sems rtogs pas sangs rgyas te//rtogs par bya ba'ang sems nyid yin//sangs rgyas zhing zhes bshad pa dang //byang chub semasu shes par bya//
215b6(rgyud): rang bzhin dag pa'i sems can ni//kun tu reg par yang dag bshad//sems can rang bzhin dag pa ni//byang chub semasu shes par bya//dang por gyur pa snying kar rdebs//brtan pa
215b7(rgyud): nyid du'ang rang nyid 'gyur//sgra 'dzin pa ni ral pa'i dbus//'od dpag med du mnyam bzhag yin//tsum pa nar ni rjes bshad pa//de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje gsung //dbang po gnyis
216a1(rgyud): ni mnyam sbyor ba rnam par snang mdzad ces bsha //bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis par//skyes mchog thub pas gang gsungs pa//pha rol phyin pa bcu gnyis//gsu
216a2(rgyud): kyi gzhan du mi gta'o//bu mo lo grangs bcu drug par//de bzhin gshegs pas brang gsungs pa//rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' yi//sgom pa'i don gyi sgra yin no//lha mo la
216a3(rgyud): grangs nyi shu bar//'khor los bsgyur bas ji skad gsungs//mchod pa nyi shu'i bdag nyid can//nyi shu po dang rims bzhin no//rang gi chung ma rang rig las//byung ba'i rang rig
216a4(rgyud): yin par bshad//gzhan gyi chung mar gang bstan pa//gzhan sdug gzhan gyi rig pa yin//gci dang rdo rje zhes bshad pa//rdo rje ye shes bla med yin//bshang dang pad+ma zhes bshad pa//
216a5(rgyud): chos kyi ye shes snyoms med yin//yongasu gsal ba rnam shes pa//dkyil 'khor thugs kyi dam pa yini//sku gsung thugs kyi spyod pa yis//'bad pa yis ni mchong byed pa//rang gi
216a6(rgyud): rdo rje pad+mar ldan//dbang po gnyis las byung ba yi//rang gi khu ba thig le yis//rdo rje sems dpa' mchod par bya//tshogs gnyis kyi ni sbyor ba yis//sangs rgyas thams cad gcig
216a7(rgyud): bsdus pa//gnyis med gnyis nyid la bstan pa//thugs rje nyams dang yang dag ldan//dbang po gnyis kyis mnyam sbyor bas//rang gi khu ba mkhas pa yis//rnal 'byor chen po/
216b1(rgyud): byung nas ni//dkyil 'khor yang dag byin gyis brlab//dgod dam rab tu smra ba 'am//sangs rgyas rol mo'i gar byed pa//lha mo bzhi yis mnyam sbyor bas//rgyu dang mi rgyu rnams kyis rol//blas
216b2(rgyud): zhing legs par bsgril ba dang //tshod dang ldan zhing mdzes pa yis//shes rab can gyi thig gdab pa//sku gsung thugs ni bsgom paso//zur bzhi pa la sgro bzhi pa//rta babs bzhis
216b3(rgyud): nI mdzes byas la//thig bzhi dang ni yang dge ldan//dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan//pra yi mtshams ni thams cad dang //sgo khyud kyis ni nang rnams//rdo rje rin chen spras pas ni/
216b4(rgyud): yi dkyil 'khor thig dang ga/rdo rje'i thig gis yongs bskor cing //ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes//ka ba brgyad kyi nang gnas pa'o//dkyil 'khor brgyad par brtan pa dang //grwa yi
216b5(rgyud): 'khor dor bar ni//rdo rje lha mo'i tshogs kyis mchod//'khor lo lnga dang yang dag ldan//dkyil 'khor lnga yis rnam par rgyun//dra badra phyed kyis rgyun cing //rnga yab kyis ni nyer spras pa/
216b6(rgyud): khru ni bcu gnyis bya ba 'am//khru bcu drug tu rab tu brtag/yang ne khru ni nyi shu tsa me//nyi shu lnga dang ldan pa yis//khru na nyi shu lnga pa yis//dkyil 'khor yang dag byin gyis brlab//
216b7(rgyud): rga rnams kyi ni dbus ma'i cha//cha dgu ru ni rnam dbye ba//dkyil 'khor sgo ru bsams nas ni//sgo khyud der ni bya ba yin//sgo khyud dkyil 'khor rnam pa ni//snying po'i dkyil la
217a1(rgyud): dang mnyam par//dgu cha ru ni rnam bgos te//gra yi dkyil 'khor dor bar bya//tha mar khyams dang ldan pa yi//dkyil 'khor lngas ni rgyan pa dang //kha dag
217a2(rgyud): lnga dang yang dag ldan//gru bzhi par ni brtag par bya//lta ba lnga po bgod dka' che//kha dog lnga yi de bzhin gshegs//sangs rgyas lnga dang mnyam sbyor bas//sa ni tshun gyis
217a3(rgyud): rab tu bsgyur//dkyil 'khor lnga yi dbu mu ni//sangs rgyas lnga ni dgod par bya//kha dog lnga deng ting 'dzin gyis//'dod pa'i yon tan lde yis khyad//shel dang zla ba'i 'od 'dra zhing//
217a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa//de bzhin gshegs pa rnam snang mdzad//dpa' bo'i lta ba de bzhin gshegs//in dra nI la'i 'od 'dra zhing //rdo rje thams cad
217a5(rgyud): gcig bsdus pa//mi bskyod ye shes las byung ba//rdo rje'i lta ba de bzhin gshegs//'dzam bu'i gser gyi 'od 'dra zhing //sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa//
217a6(rgyud): can kun gyi ngan dubyung //'bar ba'i lta ba de bzhin gshegs//dpa' bo chen po pad+ma 'dra//pad+ma rA ga'i nor bu'i 'od //chos kyi ye shes las byung ba//chags pa'i lta ba de//
217a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs//margad kyi ni 'od 'dra zhing //sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa//sangs rgyas kun gcig las byung ba//byams pa'i blta ba de bzhin gshegs//
217b1(rgyud): dbus ma'i sa yig zhi dag pa/nor bu chu shel mdog 'dra ba//shar phyogs nyid sngon po che//lho ru ser po yang dag ldan//nub phyogs dor ni dmar po ste//byang du ljongs dang yang
217b2(rgyud): dag ldan//kun tu khyams dang ldan pa la//sgor ni khyams dang bral ba'o//gang zhig dbus mas yang dag bshad//sangs rgyas ye shes bla med yan//gzhan dag don kun yang dag
217b3(rgyud): ldan//ting 'dzin ye shes dam pa yin//nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam//sangs rgyas kus ni rnam bsgoms la//spyan ni dbu su bsam
217b4(rgyud): par bya//bzhin bzang spyan ni yangs pa dang //nor bu tshu shel mdog 'dra la//mtshan rnams thams cad yongasu rdzogs//bud med sgyu ma'i mchog 'dzin pa//phyag tu 'khor la
217b5(rgyud): bsgom bya ste//khamaso gsum pa ni dbang byed pa//dngos kun grub byed ye shes ni//'khor lo yid bzhin nor bu'i mdog/na mkha'i rdo rje dbus chud par//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
217b6(rgyud): dam pa bsam//sangs rgyas sku ni rnam bsgoms la//nam mkha'i rdo rje mchog sgom//zhal mdzes spyan ni yangs pa dang //ud dpal sngon po'i 'dab ma'i mdog/mtshan rnams
217b7(rgyud): thams cad yang dag rdzogs//naM mkha'i sgyu ma'i mchog bsam//phyag tu ud pa la sngon dmar ste//khams gsum pas ni phyag byas pa//sangs rgyas byang chub byed pa'i
218a1(rgyud): mchog/gsang ba'i dngos grub rdo rje can//na mkha'i rdo rje'i dbus chud par//zla ba'i dkyil 'a bar dam pa bsam//sangs rgyas sku ni rnams bsgoms la//
218a2(rgyud): rdo rje tshes mar rnam par bsam//mdzes pa'i zhal la spyan yangs ma//pad+ma rA ga lta bu'i mdog/sku mdog dmar ba yang dag byung //chags pa'i pad+ma 'dzin sdug pa/
218a3(rgyud): mtshan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs//rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan//phyag tu ud pal dmar po ni//sangs rgyas thams cad rab bsgoms pa'o//chas
218a4(rgyud): kyi ye shes byed pa mchog/gsang ba dam tshig rdo rje can//mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus chud par//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam//sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam
218a5(rgyud): bsgoms la//sgral ma mchog ni bsam par bya//zhal mdzes spyan ni yongs pa dang //sna tshogs rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan//kha dog ser pa nyid bsam zhing //bud med sgyu ma'i dregs bang
218a6(rgyud): ba/phyag tu ud pal dam pa ni//ser po snang ba skam par bya//rdo rje nyid 'dzin las byung ba//sems can kun gyis phyag byas pa'o//oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+ha lo tsa ne sarba at+ma sA d+ha/
218a7(rgyud): ni swA hA//oM shaM ka re shAn+ti ka re g+hun+na g+huT+Ti ni g+hA ta ya g+huT+Ti na swA hA//oM ka Te bi ka Te ni ki Te ka TaM ka Te swA hA//oM tA re tut+tA re d+ha re swA hA//rig pa'i lha mo bzhi'o//sku ni lus kyi nga ba yis/
218b1(rgyud): rmugs na sems kyi rnam pa nyid//gsung no ngag po rnam pa yis//mtshad na mdzad pa'i bdag nyid 'gyur//sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ban//mkhas pa yas na bsrung bya ste//bslangs na mtshan
218b2(rgyud): d+hU gsang ba ni//rtag par kun tu 'byung bar 'gyur//dngas pa yong su dag pa ni//med pas kun tu brtag ma 'byung //rnal 'byor pa yis rnal 'byor thob//tshogs mdo yang dag mi mthong ngo //
218b3(rgyud): debs gsang ba'i ye shes 'byung //rnal 'byor kun byung bar 'gyur//shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i thabs//ting 'dzin ye shes brtags pa yin//chos rnams thams cad rnam dag pa//ngag/
218b4(rgyud): pa nyid du gyur pa ni//ji ltar lha yi na bu no//rang gi 'od kyis rtag tu snang //srid pa yongasu dag pa yang //rnal 'byor rnal 'byor thob byang yin//rdo rje dbyings ni gsang chen du//gang zhig
218b5(rgyud): dbang bskur mkhas pa la//thugs kyi gsang ba'i rnal 'byor mchog/mkhas pas de la bshad par bya//thams cad gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzog so///rgya
218b6(rgyud): gar gyi mi khan pa pad+ma kA rA bar+N+Na dang /nu chen gyi la n+ti ba dge slong rin chen bzang bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o////rgyu gar snyed du/ ma khya ba dza ya mya
218b7(rgyud): kAwa rA dzA/bod skad du/'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po//dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na//
219a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ri rab ri'i rtse mo na/rdo rje dang nor bu rin po che'i rtse mo'i ngang pa brtsegs pa na/byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag du ma dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin
219a2(rgyud): dang /dri za dang /mi 'am ci dang /'byung po dang /sha za dang /brjed byed dang /mi rnams dang /bltar rung ba dang /bltar mi rung ba du ma sangs rgyas kyi bstan la mngon par dad pa rnams da//
219a3(rgyud): thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i dkyil nas babs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la sgra
219a4(rgyud): bos phyag 'tshal nas/bcom ldan 'das la len gsum bskor ba byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to//yang bcom ldan 'das bdag gis lha chen po lnga sogs pa sems can ma
219a5(rgyud): rung ba de dag la dam tshig 'dzin du stsal bar 'tshal na/bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshig
219a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pas gsan nas phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsung so//gnod sbyin khyod shin tu khengs pa/shin tu khro ba/shin tu
219a7(rgyud): 'thur ba/de ji ltar khyod kyis sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir 'di lta bu'i sngags kyi tshig smra/de nas bcom ldan 'ad sa la phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
219b1(rgyud): na ngos 'di skad ces gsal te//de sbyin sam ldan 'das bdag sems can ma lus pa 'dul bar bcu dang //ka shA tso na dag gis 'dad pa'i bdab can rnams dbang du
219b2(rgyud): pas btul nas blan med pa'i bde ba la dgod par 'tshal/sems can ma rungs pa rnams gsad paM la sogs pas sbyangs te/zhi ba la dgod par 'tshal//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag
219b3(rgyud): na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' la legs zhes bya ba byin te/phyag na rdo rje legs legs//'jig rten thams cad kyi don gyi phyir dang /phan pa'i phyir dang /bde ba'i phyir snying pa 'di smros shig/
219b4(rgyud): de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' lha thams cad nas/mi rnams thams cad kyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa de rnams la bka' stsal po/grags pa dag sangs//
219b5(rgyud): rgyas lo sgrub su dang shig/nga'i bka' yang dz+nyAs stongs shig/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag na rdo rjes phyag 'tshal nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i
219b6(rgyud): po 'di gsungs/oM sa~M bA ni suM b+hA hUM/gr-ih+Na gr-ih+NahUM/br-ih+NA pa ya grih+NA pa ya hUM/a na la ho thA ga bAn badz+ra hU~M phaT/de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gsum
219b7(rgyud): thams cad g.yos/kun tu rab tu gi las so//'bul rab tu 'gril/kun tu rab tu dbum//'phar rab tu 'phar/kun tu rab tu 'pheraro/de nas lha thams cad la sogs pa/
220a1(rgyud): sems can thams cad 'dar yid yod nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te//khar khor yug dang kho ra khor yug chen po'i ri la sogs pa tshun chad kyi glud
220a2(rgyud): bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad kyis gang //ngo nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor
220a3(rgyud): chen po la gzigs nas 'di skad gsungs//grogs po rnams sangs rgyas la sogs pa la skyabasu 'gro bar khas lang zhing //nga'i bka' yang rjesu skyongs shig/de nas 'dus pa'o//
220a4(rgyud): 'khor chen po thams cad bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje skrag ste 'angar yed yeng nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabasu dongo //de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha chen po'i
220a5(rgyud): lha dang /mthu bo che dang /tshangs pa rnams kyi 'di skad ce se gsal to//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i sems can 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/'di ltar byin che zhing bdag cag 'chas
220a6(rgyud): pa 'di su lags//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di bstan pa'i phyir tshigasu bcad pa 'di glengs te gsungaso//sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir//sangs rgyas kun
220a7(rgyud): gyis byin gyis brlabs//kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag/sangs rgyas thams cad nyid skyes 'di//phyag na rdo rje gnod sprin che//ma rungs 'tshal la dbang ba ste//gang ming brjod/
220b1(rgyud): pa des yis ni//sangs rgyas pa yang thob par 'gyur//de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen pos yang gsungs pa/kye kye lha dag sangs rgyas la skyabs dang la nga'i bka' bzhin du
220b2(rgyud): yad gyis shig/rdo rje 'bar ba gcig tu 'bar bar gyur pa 'dis khyod thams cad gtan bsregs par gyur ta re/de nas lha chen po la sogs pa rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras//khyod ni gnong
220b3(rgyud): sbyin ded ni lta bas na nged kyis gnod sbyin gyi bka' rjesu sbyong bar mi nus//de nas phyag na rdo rjes 'di thos nas khros te/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//ngatsam ldan 'das
220b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul bar dbang bskur te bskos so//de bas na gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bka' stsal na lha chen po 'di 'dul bar
220b5(rgyud): 'tshal//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi lha chen po la 'di skad ces gsungs//sems can chen po khas long shig/'dis khyod gsang da re/de nas bcom ldan 'das lha chen po la sog
220b6(rgyud): pa 'jig rten gsum thams cad kyi dbang po rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsal to//bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin ma rungs pa 'di'i bka' bzhin byed pa bdag cag ma leg so//de nas/
220b7(rgyud): chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras//kye gnod sbyin nga ni thams cad kyi dbang batshan pa/byed pa 'o//
221a1(rgyud): 'jom pa po/skye dgu'i bdag po tshangs pa'o//gtogs 'dod do//dbang phyug chen po'o//de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen po khros nas 'di
221a2(rgyud): gsungaso//khyod ni lus bsrul po mi sha za ba//ma rungs pa/drag shul gyi las byed pas na gtum po ste/sha za'i lus srel ba na ji ltar tshangs pa dang /gtogs 'dod dang /
221a3(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po yin/tshangs pa zhes bya ba ni mi 'gyur ba'o//gtogs 'dod ces bya ba ni thar pa'o//dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang po ste/sems
221a4(rgyud): can thams cad kyi dbang ba dang yin pas 'dul nuso//de nas dbang phyug chen pa lha chen po khros na bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/'jig su rung ba chen
221a5(rgyud): po'i gzugs khros pa chen po'i gad mos bgang nas 'jigs pa chen por byed pa/'bar ba chen po gtong ba/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mtha' med par gzugs sna
221a6(rgyud): tshigasu byas/'bar ba chen po'i grub pa/mi mtshungs pa/rdo rje dang /mdung rtse gsum pa dang /'khor lo dang /sha ka ti dang /be con dang /mi mtshungs pa'i mtshan cha 'bibs/
221a7(rgyud): shing gtong ba rnams kyi tshogs dang /'byung po'i tshogs dang bcas par kun btan to//bdud dang /bgegs byed pa dang /mtha' dang mu med pa'i gzugs sna tshog su mA la/khre/
221b1(rgyud): rab tu mi dpyad pa ma rungs pa'i tshogs chen po dang lhan cig tu rab tu 'thab cing ts+tsha ba byed pa/gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan mo'i mun nAg tA byas/'brar ba chen po'i phung
221b2(rgyud): pos blangs ci snang bar byas//de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje 'chang ba chen po cung bang du mche ba'i thog ma gtsigs pa/smin ma'i mtshams kyi khro gnyer gyi rlabs bskyod pa/mig
221b3(rgyud): g.yan pa cher bgrad do/rdo rje'i lta ba'i khro bo dang bcas pas zab mo'i tshig gis shigs pa/snying po mchog 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyan pa'i dpal zhes bya ba 'di gsungs/
221b4(rgyud): hUM de nas hUM zhes bya ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun sgra des gang nas/g.yos rab tu g.yos/kun tu rab tu g.yos so//'khrol rab tu 'khrol/kun tu
221b5(rgyud): rab tu 'grel//de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha'i tshogs thams cad bcom ldan 'das la bskyab tu gsol/bde bar gshegs pa bsgrub tu gsol zhes nas bcom
221b6(rgyud): ldan 'das la skyabs dong //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad gsungs so//gang 'di lta bu'i sngags kyi tshig smra ba ni khyed rab tu mi 'grongaso//de nas phyag na rdo rje
221b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas/yang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba 'di gsungs//oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM/gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hU~M/gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hU~M/
222a1(rgyud): A na ya ho b+ha gA bAn badz+ra hUM phaT/de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis lha chen po la sogs pa lha'i bdag po thams cad 'khor dang bcas par bcom ldan 'das phyag na/
222a2(rgyud): rdo rje gang na ba der mgo rkang bzlog ste/ri rab ri'i rtse mo'i dkyil 'khor chen por bcung nas brlams par byas te/bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs g.yon pas mnan te/de na
222a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa la leg so leg so zhes bya ba byin te/phyag na rdo rje khyod kyis 'di 'dra bar sems can 'dul bar byed//
222a4(rgyud): pa legs so legaso//de bas ni thul la dbugs phyung shig/de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de dag gi don gyi phyir rdo rjes bcings pa 'di gsungs
222a5(rgyud): oM badz+ra dri D+ho me b+ha ba rak+Sha sar+b+ba na swA hA/de nas phyag na rdo rjes 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis lha tshan po la sogs pa de dag dran pa rnyed do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad
222a6(rgyud): gsungs so//grogs po dag sems can tshon po 'di'i bka' bzhin byed par khas long shig/de nas bcom ldan 'das la de dag thams cad mgrin gcig tu bdag cag mchid//
222a7(rgyud): kyis 'tshalo zhes gsol to//de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yang rang gi snying po 'di gsung so//hUM Tak+ki ho//de nas 'di brjod pa tsam gyis lha la
222b1(rgyud): sogs pa thams cad dbang du byas te/bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas mchi ma blags ta nga ro bton nas skyabasu dong ste/bcom ldan 'das la sgrub tu gsal/de bdag
222b2(rgyud): cag khyod kyi bka' nyan na ji ltar bgyi ba skul du gsil zhes//de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de rnams la gsungs pa/grogs pa dag byang chub kyi sems
222b3(rgyud): dang /sdom pa gsung bar khas long shig/de dag gi gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyid cing byang chub tu sems
222b4(rgyud): bskyed par 'tshalo//de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yang de rnams ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor du gtsung nas sdom pa bzung du bcug ste byang chub kyi
222b5(rgyud): sems brtan par byas pa//sams can thams cad bde ba stsol//phyag na rdo rje bdag che dang //'dod pa smad par mi bya'o//'di ni gsang ba yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi de
222b6(rgyud): dgra sdom pa 'dzin du bcug nas dam tshig byin pa ni/oM badz+ra sa ma ya oM b+hi Shiny+tsa bi rA ba ya sar+b+ba kA mAn hUM phaT/de nas de dag gis smras pa/'di ni bdud kyis smras pas na/bdag cag
222b7(rgyud): mnyan to//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas de dag la khyed cag gis 'di la me birnyes shig ces gsungs pa dang /de dag gis gsol pa/ji ltar 'dod chags dang /
223a1(rgyud): bral ba ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub zo zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kye grogs po dgang ni nga lta
223a2(rgyud): bzhin byed pa ste/de nyid kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sun 'byin te/ji ltar bde la mi chags pa dang /sdug bsngal 'dod chags pa ji lta bus 'jig rten 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i tshes/
223a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'chad par mdzad de/de dag sbyang ba'i phyir 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun tu bzang po byang chub sems dpas ci nas kyang 'dod
223a4(rgyud): chags dang bral bar me byed cig ces bka' stsal to//de nas phyag ni rdo rjes yang gsungs pa/oM badz+ra sa ma ya a b+hi Shiny+tsa ma bi rA ga ya sar+b+ba kA maM hUM phaT/de nas de dag gis
223a5(rgyud): ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa bzhin no zhes gsol to//de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes lag tu rdo rje byin te/rdo rje dbang bskur ba 'di byin no//oM badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa sar+b+ba
223a6(rgyud): ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+ha rang tre badz+ra pA Ni hri ha ha ha ha/de nas rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba byin pa ni 'dri lta ste/dbang phyug chen po ni rdo rje rig sngags mchog go/mthu bo che ni rdo rje sgyu ma'o//
223a7(rgyud): tshangs pa ni rdo rje mi sme ba'o//sgra gzhon nu ni rdo rje dril bu'o//dbang po ni rdo rje 'thab cha ste/de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi dbang po thams cad rag pa'i blon po chen
223b1(rgyud): par dang bcu ro//de nas bar snang la rgyu ba rnams rdo rje ming gis dbang skur ba byin pa ni 'di lta ste/bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ni/rdo rje 'khyil pa'o//zla ba ni rdo rje 'od //btson rtse mo ni rdo rje bcon no//
223b2(rgyud): gleng ni rdo rje skye gleng ste/de rnams ni rdo rje khro bor dbang bskuraro//de nas na mkha' la rgyu ba'i lha rnams rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba byin pa ni 'di lta ste/chang gis myos pa ni rdo rje srin po'o//chang byed
223b3(rgyud): ni rdo rje phreng ba'o//rgyal ba ni rdo rje dbang ngo //rgyal bskyed pa ni rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba ste/de dag la sogs pa ni tshogs kyi bdag por dbang bskur ro//de nas sa pa rnams rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur
223b4(rgyud): ba byin pa ni 'di lta ste/mdzod skyong ni rdo rje gru shing /rlung ni rdo rje rlung //me ni rdo rje me'o//ku ba ra ni rdo rje 'jigs pa ste/de dag la sogs pa ni rdo rje pho nyar dbang bskuraro//de nas sa 'og na gnas pa'i
223b5(rgyud): dbang po thams cad rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba byin pa ni 'di lta ste/phab ni rdo rje kyo ba'o//gshin rje ni rdo rje nag po'o//sa'i spyi bo ni rdo rje rnam 'dre no//bA ru NA ni rdo rje glu ste/de dag la sogs pa/
223b6(rgyud): ni rdo rje bran du dbang bskuraro//de nas 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po rnams kyis lha mo thams cad kyi lag tu rdo rje byin te/rdo rjes dbang bskur nas/rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba byin pa ni 'di
223b7(rgyud): lta ste/nyon mongs pa ni rdo rje khro ba ma'o//nor can ni rdo rje bser ma'o//tshangs ma ni rdo rje zhi ba'o//dug mo ni rdo rje gzhon nu ma'o//dbang po ni rdo rje khu tshur te/de dag la sogs pa ni rim
224a1(rgyud): kyi blon mo chen mor dbang bskuraro//de nas bar snang la rgyu ba'i ma rnams dbang bskur ba byin pa ni 'di lta ste/bdud rtsi ma ni rdo rje bdud rtsi ma'o//khrung ma ni rdo rje sdug
224a2(rgyud): gu ma'o//be con 'chang ma ni rdo rje be tson rtse mo'o//skye 'phrog ma ni rdo rje bskyed 'tshangs ma ste/de dag la sogs pa ni rdo rje khro mor dbang bskur ro//de nas na mkha' la rgyu ba'i ma rnams
224a3(rgyud): dbang bskur ba byin pa ni 'di lta ste/gsod ma ni rdo rje gsod ma ma'o//bro ba mo ni rdo rje zab ma'o//gos na rdo rje bgo ba ma'o//dga' mo ni rdo rje dbang mo ste/de dag la sogs pa
224a4(rgyud): ni rdo rje tshi gas ma mor dbang bskuraro//de nas sa la rgyu ba'i ma dbang bskur ba byin pa ni 'di lta ste/zhi ma ni rdo rje pho nya mo'o//rlung ma ni rdo rje mgyogs ma'o//ma ni rdo rje 'bar ba'o//ku
224a5(rgyud): bebai ra ma ni rdo rje thag gu ma ste/de dag la sogs pa ni rdo rje pho nya mer dpe bskur ro//de nA sa 'og na gnas pa'i ma rnams dbang bskur ba byin pa ni 'di lta ste/phag mo ni rdo rje gdong
224a6(rgyud): ngo//mgo lpags me ni rdo rje nag mo'o//sna tshad ma ni rdo rje phyags ma'o//kle me ni rdo rje chu srin ma ste/de dag la sogs pa ni bran+te mor dbang bskur ro//de nas phyag na rdo rje byang
224a7(rgyud): chub sems dpa' chen pos btsud pa de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bskyed nas rdo rje'i dam tshig byin pa'o//oM ba li tod ba li tod badz+ra A kaR+Sha ya hUM dza/lha rnam/
224b1(rgyud): dgug pa'o//oM badz+ra a gra pi nA ya sa ma ya hUM/bar snang la rgyu ba rnams kyi'o//oM badz+ra mA lA gra laM/phreng ba 'chang ba rnams kyi'o//oM badz+ra ban d+ha ha/sa la rgyu ba rnams kyi'o//oM
224b2(rgyud): badz+ri pA ta la bany+dza b+hany+dza hUM pheMT/'og na gnas pa rnams kyi'o//oM haM du ka badz+ra sa ma ya sar+b+ba duSh+TAM sa ma ya mu pra b+han d+ha tsakra hUM phaT/ma rnams thams cad kyi'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das/
224b3(rgyud): kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag na rdo rjes phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can thams cad 'dul ba lags na/bcom ldan 'das ma rungs pa'i sems
224b4(rgyud): can gyis dkyil 'khor de dag la ji ltar bgyi ba bka' stsol cig/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/gang gis sems can de rnams sems can thams cad la phan pa byas nas
224b5(rgyud): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i dam tshig 'di nyid la tshud cig/de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/bcom
224b6(rgyud): ldan 'das mkha 'gro ma la sogs pa'i 'di dag la nan tan ji ltar bgyi/rims la sogs pa ji ltar bgyi/dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan song gi rnams ji ltar bgyi/bcom ldan
224b7(rgyud): 'das kyis gsungs pa/dam tshig de nyid la nan tan byed du chud cig/de nas phyag na rdo rjes yang gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mi 'di rnams ji ltar nan tan bgyi/bcom
225a1(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen por bcud nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du chud cig/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du/
225a2(rgyud): btsud nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor du tshud cig/dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor du btsud nas las kyi dkyil 'khor du btsud cig/de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen
225a3(rgyud): po//bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te/tshig su bcad pa 'di smraso//sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir//sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs te//grub
225a4(rgyud): pa thams cad byed pa'i mchag/dkyil 'khor chen por bshad par bya'o//de nas yang dag rab bshad pa//dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste//chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul
225a5(rgyud): 'dra bar//dkyil 'khor thams cad thig gdab po//de la srang bu zo ba'i cho ga ni 'di lta ste//gsar zhing legs par byas pa dang //tshad ma bzang po'i srad pu yis//shre
225a6(rgyud): rab can gyis srad bre ba//'jig rten gsum rgyal dran zhing ngo //de yi dbusu gdab pa ni//seng ljang phur ba brtan par re//de las srang bu bre gsungs pa//srad du
225a7(rgyud): lngab kyis bya ste//bcu drug cha ru bge bar bya//thams cad du ni rim gsum mchog/kho ra khor yug rig dag kyang //phur bu yis ni de bzhin no//de yi nang du bya ba ni/
225b1(rgyud): srang bu ramo bdun ldan par te//tshon ser dri nam ldan pa yis//thig rnams kyang ni gdab par bya//de yi dbu su bzhag pa ni//shin tu bgrangs pa'i nas phul bzhi'o//de yi sbyong du margan
225b2(rgyud): po ste//sangs rgyas gzugs bstan gzhag par bya//sangs rgyas tha~Md 'khor thams cad du//byang chub brgyad ni rim bzhin par//bri 'am yang dag gzhag par bya//tshan sna lnga mtsha
225b3(rgyud): rnams kyiso//sangs rgyas spyan lnga de ru ni//phyag na rdo rje de bzhin no//bri'am bzhag par bya ba ni//rdo rje hUM zhes par 'dus pa'o//de yi zhabs ni g.yon pa yis//dbang phyug chen po
225b4(rgyud): gnan par bya'o//g.yas po'i zhabs kyis btsir ba ni//nyon mongs ma yin lha mo'o//'dod grub spyod pa'i lha rnams kyang //srad bu rim bdun par dag tu//bri 'am yang ni bzhag pa
225b5(rgyud): bya//rdo rje shugs kyis dgongs nasu//phyi rol byung nas de ru yang //gling rnams bzhi yang bri bar bya//dbyibs dang cho ga ji bzhin du//prA yi ri mo legs par dgod//gling rnams kyi
225b6(rgyud): dbus thams cad du//'jig rten ji bzhin sogs par bya//tshangs pa la sogs de bzhin rnams//de ru 'jig rten dbang po dgod//khor khor yug pa'i ri dang //gling rnams kyi ya
225b7(rgyud): bar dag du//phyi yi rdo rje rigs rnams kyi//dkyil 'khor yang dag bri bar bya//sgro gasbyang bri bar bya ba yang //rdo rje sgo bzhi de dag tu//rdo rje kyo bzhags pa dang //sgo dang dril bu de ba'i/
226a1(rgyud): kho ra khor yug ri yi ni//phyi rol dmyal ba brgyad rnam so//gnam dal dad+ya ni nad dag dang //mkha 'gro me dang bdon drag rnams//bzhag gA ma yang na bri bar bya//
226a2(rgyud): chos min can ni gzhig phyiraro//de yi phyi rol du dgod pa//gtor ma sna tshogs mchog rnamaso//de nas dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga 'byung ste/de la thog ma nyid du slob dpon gyis//
226a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas 'jug pa ni gtsang mas byos gtsang ma bgos la/se ral thag gu dmar po thogs nas rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings la/
226a4(rgyud): de'i steng du dri zhim po'i me tog bzhag nas snying po 'di brjod la zhugs shig/oM badz+ra pra tIts+tsha maM ha ha ha ha hi/de nas dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas du ru ka'i bdug
226a5(rgyud): pa 'am/ci bdog pas gsol to//rdo rje 'dzin ma mdzub mo gnyis kyo btang du byas la snying po 'di brjod do//oM u ru dA/bi ri Ni bi ri Ni badz+ra ma ya hi b+hi da ye swA hA//nyi shu rtsa
226a6(rgyud): gcig bzlas na de las mtshan ma 'byung ba ni ba spu g.yo ba la sogs pa dang /so g.yo ba 'am/dri zhim po 'am/'od zer mthong ba'o//de nas phyag na rdo rje'i spyi bai ri me tog gtor
226a7(rgyud): cig/de nas slob ma gzhug ste/de thig ma nyid du bkug nas slob ma gos gtsang ma bskon te/gsum la skyabasu btang ba dang /bslab pa'i sdom pa la so sor gnas par
