226b1(rgyud): byas nas/de nas byang chub kyi sems bskyed cig/de nas gdong ras kyi g.yog nas mgo btsug tor du byas te/rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings la chug shing //bcug nas me tog gtor te//
226b2(rgyud): de nas gang la 'babo pa de ni de'i lha'o//de nas gdong bcings pa dkrol nas rang gi rig pa'i lha ston la/de la mchod cing slob dpon la yang ci 'dod pa'i yon phul nas de rang gi rig pa 'am/
226b3(rgyud): sngags bzlas te phyag rgya yang bcing ngo //'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'o//de na
226b4(rgyud): rdo rje dkyil 'khor 'byung ste//rdo rje phreng ba mnyam ldan pas//rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor brtag par bya//'dug par bya ba de bzhin te//las kyang de dang 'dra bar bya'o//dkyil 'khor de ru zhwa
226b5(rgyud): nas ni//de bzhin rdo rje gsor bar bya//'jig rten gsum rgyal rab bslabs nas//rdo rje mchog ni bsgrub par bya//de la rdo rje sgrub pa'i cho ga ni lag pa gnyis rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'dzin
226b6(rgyud): pas rdo rje bzung nas ji srid du 'gul pa de srid bzlaso//de phyin cad rdo rje des las thams cad byed do//rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor//de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste//dkyil
226b7(rgyud): 'khor chen po kun bris nas//mtshan ma thams cad bstan par bya//'jug pa rdo rje dril bu dang //rdo rje 'dzin mchog phyag rgyas//de la rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin//rdo rje 'dzin ma
227a1(rgyud): kun byas nas//rdo rje kun tu brtag bya ba//g.yas par gzhag nas g.yon pa yis//dril bu dasil nas 'jug par bya//btsud nas ni dril du de//mnyam par gzhan
227a2(rgyud): pas bsil bar bya//slob dpon gyur nag dam tshig kyang //rtag tu bsrungs shes brjed par bya//ji ltar dril bu'i sgra 'di ni//de yi mi rtag pa ru gsungs//de ltar khyod la byin nA ni//
227a3(rgyud): rdorje chen po zhes bya 'dis//nges par sreg par 'gyur ba ni//de ste rdo rje 'dzin dad dang //skyabs gsum brtul zhugs de bzhin te//ji ltar byang chub sems 'dod rnams//khyod kyis
227a4(rgyud): tshe spangs gyur na'o//de la 'di ni dam tshig gi sngags//oM ha na saM ma ya hUM phaT//de nas de bzhin du 'dug la de nas rdo rje'i chu 'di blud do//de nas gdong bcings pa bkrol nas cho ga
227a5(rgyud): bzhin du bya'o//dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro//de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/de bzhin dkyil 'khor bris na su//cha lug mang po bzhag par bya//btsud nas las rnams
227a6(rgyud): thams cad kyang //slob dpon gyis ni de bzhin bslab//de nas las kyi rab tu sbyar ba 'di'o//bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thab gru bzhir byas la mngar po'i yam shing la me
227a7(rgyud): bus la mngar po'i me tog dang 'bras bu rnams sbrang ci dang mar la sbags te//pra gos g.yasu gzar la ku sha'i bam po la 'dug ste/rdo rje'i tshig tu bzlas shing /zhi ba dang /rgyas
227b1(rgyud): pa dang /dbang du bya ba la sogs pa zhi ba'i las rnams la lhag pa g.yon pas bdag gis phyag rgya bcings la/g.yas pas bsregs na de dag 'grub par 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das kyi
227b2(rgyud): rgyab tu thab zur gsum du kha ba'i tsher ma rnon po'i yam shing dang /mdab ma dang /me tog dang /yal gra rtse mo dang /sdong bu dang /'bras bu yang de dang 'dra der rang gi khrag gi sku ba na stan
227b3(rgyud): mkhrang ba la 'dug ste/bla gos g.yon du gzar la/khros pa'i tshig gis bzlas shing g.yon pas bsregs na dgug pa dang /gzhug pa dang /bcing ba dang /rgyas gdab pa dang //na
227b4(rgyud): pa dang /btsir ba dang /bsnyal ba dang /myos par bya ba dang /stan 'pho ba la sogs pa las drag po rnams rab tu 'grub par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
227b5(rgyud): pa thams cad dgug pa dang /dam tshig gi bcing ba dang /dbang du bya ba la sogs pa grub pa thams cad kyi las ni bcom ldan 'das kyi g.ya su rtsa 'jam po bting ba la 'dug nas/
227b6(rgyud): stod g.yogs sbyar ma ltar bgos te/ting 'dzin gyis bzlas shing 'khor lo lta bu'i thab tu du ba med pa'i 'dag ma la til dang 'bras la sogs pa nas 'bras g.yas g.yon gyis
227b7(rgyud): sreg/bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon du rdo rje lta bu'i thab byas la stod g.yogs kyis yan lag thams cad bcings la rlod stan 'jam po la 'dug nas//yam shing thams cad 'bar
228a1(rgyud): ba'i phreng ba 'dzings pa'i me la lab pa g.yas pa rdo rje dang bcas pa rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya bcings nas lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur 'dzin pas gzar bu
228a2(rgyud): gzung nas 'dzum zhing dga' bar byas te/rdo rje tshig gis zlos shing ro thams cad bsregs na/rdo rje 'dzin pa dgug pa dang /gzhug pa dang /bcing ba dang /dbang du byas pa

228a6(rgyud): rje de nyid//de la chags par ma gyur na//phyag na rdo rje mi 'gru'o//drabs yang dag ma mthong bas//dkyil 'khor du ni grub ma gsungs//yang dag ma mthong grub pa ni//the tshom

228b1(rgyud): du chug la nad dang gdon la sogs pa ston cig/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gsor gyi kha do/nga sa la bri bar bya ste/de'i zad 'khor kun tu byang chub sems dpa' brgyad
228b2(rgyud): doni 'di lta ste/g.yas phyogasu ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po dang /'jam dpal dang /sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o//g.yon phyogasu ni da
228b3(rgyud): khu tshur dang /byams pa dang /na mkha'i mdzod do//steng du na mkha'i snying po'o//bcom ldan 'das kyi 'og tu ni phyag na rdo rje ste/rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i phyag na rdo rje dang bcas pa

234a2(rgyud): dang /dug zhi bar bya ba dang /dug sme ba dang /dug gzhig par bya ba dang /dug gau shi ba las gos par bya ste/rdo rje hUM zhes pa gcig giso/gter 'byung ba ni zangs kyi rol ba

234a4(rgyud): gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i hUM zhes pa bzlas te blo //snang ba dgug pa ni dong ka'i ljon pa'i yam shing gis ma bus te/zho dang /sbrang rtsi dang /mar gyis ra dza ko sha ti

234a7(rgyud): 'amad/mu tog gam/gsar ram/dbyig gam/gzhan ci yang rung ba 'am/skyes pa'am/bud mad mo/sangs rgyas kyi sdug drag la logacig bar du dus gsuM
234b1(rgyud): /du nga rgya nga rgyar bzlas nas/de nas lo gcig lon na brgya 'gyur du 'gyur ro//de snyed du brgyar bzlas na de nyid kyi brgyar 'gyur//de nas stong du bzlas nA yang stong du 'gyur//longs

234b3(rgyud): go tAn 'pho ba nA rdo rje hUM zhes pa'i phyag rgya bcings te stong phrag brgyar bzlos ni/sems can thams cad yid kyis dmigs pa bzhin gtan 'pho'o//chu mnan pa ni rdo rje phyag rgya
234b4(rgyud): bcings la chu'i steng du 'grar rung ba'i bar du bzlas//me mnan pa ni thang cig bzlas paso//lo tog srung ba ni rdo rje blta ba ste/de la srog chags rnams gang gis kyang gnod par
234b5(rgyud): mi 'gyur zhing /byi ba la sogs pa yang 'da' bar mi byed do//rdeg pa spong ba ni khro bo'i lta bas te gang du bltas pa der 'pho'o//bza' ba dang btung ba thams cang spong ba ni 'dra
234b6(rgyud): ba'i lte bas rang gi snod du 'ba'o//sdig pa dang sbrul thams cad med par bya ba ni thang cig brjod paso//gcar srin thams cad la thang cig bzlas pas med par 'gyur//rkun bri
234b7(rgyud): thams cad pham pa ni rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pas//dmag las sgrol ba ni rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas//gzhu dang /mda' dang /mdung dang /rgyal mtshan mnan nas 'gul gyis
234'a1(rgyud): du bzlas to//de thogs na dam pA thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyu ro//zhal che la ni zing gcig brjod pa snan+tod pa'i ldan thebs par 'gyuraro//zhi ba thams cad na
234'a2(rgyud): til gyi sbyin sreg gis//rgyas pa thams cad ni yungs kar gyi sbyin sgeg gis//gtan 'pho ba thams cad ni tsher ma'i sbyin sreg giso//'tshe ba dang /gan ma ngal dang /
234'a3(rgyud): lam ngan pa thams cad gzhol ba ni til dang /'bras kyi sprin srog giso//gzhom pa thams cad ni hUM zhes paso//dgong du gzhug pa dang /myos par bya ba thams cad
234'a4(rgyud): la phaT ces bya bso//thams cad gnyid log tu gzhug po ni bskum la mig btsums te/brgya bzlas pas thams cad gnyid logs par byas pa yin no//sems can/
234'a5(rgyud): thams cad rgyas gdab pa ni rdo rje khro bo'i lta bas bltas na rgyas btab par 'gyur te/nyin bdun las lhag par mi gson no//ngag dbrog pa ni rang gi lce sos bzung nas hUM/
234'a6(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i bar du sbyor ba'o//snying drang ba ni rdo rje ser mo'i phyag rgyas dpung pa bsnol te/rang gi mchan khung du glong zhing snying po bzlas na nub bdun tshun cad 'pho bar 'gyur/
234'a7(rgyud): snying bcad pa ni rdo rje blings te bcad par bya'o//snying dbye ba ni rdo rje lcogs phur gyis btab ste/ming nas smos shing gzugaso//snying spo ba ni lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje blangs te
234'b1(rgyud): mtshan bdun du rab tu sbyor ba byas pas 'pho bar 'gyuraro//de nas phyag rgya 'di rnams las thar par bya ba bshad//des rgyas 'dengs pa la mi bya tshur dam paso//ngag dbrog pa la ni rdo rje dag
234'b2(rgyud): gis bzlas paso//snying 'dren pa la ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya snying kor dbrel//bcad pa la ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa bzlas nas 'oms khrus shig/phye bra la phur bu phyung nas rdo rje dris sus
234'b3(rgyud): shig/snying spos pa laM ni rdo rje snying pos thar bar 'gyuraro//de bzhin du byed ma'i phyag rgya yang spro bar 'gyuraro//snying sgrub par 'dod na bud med kyi snying kar bzlas na de'i snying ka nas
234'b4(rgyud): sgra thos par 'gyuraro//skyes pa'i snying kar yang de bzhin du bya ste/snying ka thams cad du yang de lta ro//de nas pha ro la gyi sems shes pa sgrub par 'dod pas ni rdo rje hUM zhes
234'b5(rgyud): pa brgyar bzlas na pha rol gyi sems sheso//sngon gyi gnas shes par bya ba ni rdo rje hUM zhes bzlas paso//rmi lam mthong bar 'dod pas ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
234'b6(rgyud): bzlas shing gdug pas ka bi tsis bdugs te/gnyid log na de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar gyi shes pa ston to//tshig sgrub par
234'b7(rgyud): 'dod pas rdo rje tshig gi stong phrag brgya bzlas na rdo rje tshig gis rang gi lces smras pa thams cad bden par 'gyur te ci bslangs pa de stsol to//cho 'phrul ston pa ni rdo rje bzlas pa
235a1(rgyud): tshig gis brgyad brgya bzlas na rang gi lus la cho 'phrul du gyur pa ni//sangs rgyas thams cad dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /rdo rje 'dzin dang /lha dang
235a2(rgyud): klu dang /gnod sbyin la sogs pa sems can thams cad gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du ston to//rang gi gzugs ci dge byu sgyur bar 'dod pas rdo rje tshig gis rdo rjes bzlas pra
235a3(rgyud): stong phrag brgya bzlas na gzugs gang dang glang 'dod pa de dang bdag sangs rgyas kyi gzugasu yang byed par 'gyuraro//mi snang bar 'dod pas rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje bzung la rdza
235a4(rgyud): bzung bas/mi snang bar 'gyur ba de srid kyi bar du bzlaso//btang bas ni 'gro lo//khri'u la 'dug nas rdo rje lag tu blangs te/nam 'phar gyi bar du bzlas so//gdon gyis
235a5(rgyud): 'dzin du 'jug na rdo rje hUM zhes paso//gdon gar byed du 'jug pa ni hi zhes paso//gdon bskyod pa ni hag ces pas//gdon gzhom pa ni phaT ces paso//gtsar bar bya ba ni
235a6(rgyud): mi'i sgra'i skud pas rang gi dpung pa btsungs na gcer bar 'gyur te gos brje bar 'gyur//spong bar bya ba ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgral bso//skrad pa ni rdo rje khu
235a7(rgyud): tshur gyis 'phang //dgos bskyed pa ni mtshan thog thag sha tshan rang ga khrag gis bskus te sreg/gzhan gyi bud med dgug pa ni rdo rje bzung nas snying po bzlas shing dgug gam
235b1(rgyud): yang na thams cad khyab pa hUM zhes pa thams cad bya'o//bud med thams cad dga' bar spyod pa ni rang gi rtags rdo rje bcings pas gzung la nyin bdun dus gsum du langs kyi bar du brla'o//
235b2(rgyud): denas mjug tu nam phyed bar du bslabs na rtag tu ljang la mi snyoms shing bcud mang la rtags shugs drag por 'gyuraro//bu mo spyad pa ni rdo rje bzung nas thams cad du khyab pa hUM zhes bya ba
235b3(rgyud): byas nas spyad//bud med thams cad dbang du bya ba ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa'i phyag rgya btsang la stong phrag brgya bzlas na/bud med thams cad mgu bar 'gyur//phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngor spyon
235b4(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la stong phrag rgya bzlas na bud med thams cad mgu bar 'gyur//sems can thams cad dbang du bya bar 'dod na rdo rje khro tshur gyi bcings
235b5(rgyud): pas rdo rje bzung la nam 'gul gyi bar du bzlaso//snang ba la dbang du bya bar 'dod na rdo rje blangs te rang gi spyi bor bzhag la spyi bor rdo rje brtan par gyur gyi bar du bzlaso//de nas snang ba'i
235b6(rgyud): mdun du 'dug na des snang bar rang gi dbang bskur ba yang stsol to//nor dgug pa ni rin po che'i gtso bo'i phye mos sbyin sreg byo ba so//char dbab pa ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa stong bzlaso//char
235b7(rgyud): bcad pa ni hU~M zhes pa'o//ser ba bcad pa ni rdo rje gsor ba'i phyag rgyas//gdon dgag pa yang phyag rgya de nyid kyis//sprin dgag pa ni rdo rje hUM zhes pa brgyar bzlas paso//rdo rje
236a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag nas me tog dang /bdug pas mchod de/rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyus mnanA la rdo rje langs kyi bar du bzlas//de thogs nas bska
236a2(rgyud): naci 'dod pa bzhin du rgyu'i las rnams ston te/rdo rjes bskor bas dus ma yin par shing la 'bras bu dang /me tog mthong ngo //nam mkha' la me tog gi phreng ba chags par bya ba ni
236a3(rgyud): dbugs bsdams la rdo rje khu tshur bcings te gtor na 'chag so//cha lugs bzhud par bya ba ni rdo rje'i phyag rgyaso//gar byed par bya ba ni rdo rje 'dzin maso//smra bar bya ba na hUM zhes
236a4(rgyud): pas so//rgyug par bya ni rdo rje dgug pa'i phyag rgya so//smin ma 'gul bar bya ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'dzin pas rdo rje thogs la rang gi smin mtshamasu bskul bas//sa g.yo bar bya na dang
236a5(rgyud): pa g.yon pa brdabs paso//khyim bskul ba ni rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgyaso//khang pa dgug pa ni rdo rje khros pa'i kyo ba tang gi phyag rgya bcings pas//sprin med par char dbab pa ni dza
236a6(rgyud): rje hUM zhes bzlas paso//skad cig tu sbyin 'dra zhing ston pa ni rdo rje sa bskor bso//zla ba dang /nyi ma dbab cing bstan pa ni 'drob paso//nyi ma dang /zla ba mang por bstan na/rdo
236a7(rgyud): bzhin na mkha' la gtor bso//dmag rnams bzhi bstan ni rdo rje bskor bso//mtshan mo nyin par du bya na rdo rje 'bar ba bskor bso//nyin par mtshan mor bya na mig brtsams
236b1(rgyud): sa//rnams ca na sa na sa nga dzu sa//mas nganas byu chu snyom sa dang bstan na stong banas gyugs//ga dang thams/
236b2(rgyud): da li na snang sa te bzhi sa//thams kyang nas snang sa rgyas bskan sa tshul ga/ tan gdu ma khas rnam par bag pab las
236b3(rgyud): zhes bya //na brdzogs//denas ldan 'das de zhin gshegs pa yang drug par rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis phyagan da
236b4(rgyud): su ma// ngamam can rnams dang spyodan kyi byung bang 'dzig te gsu pa las rnam pa rgyal ga da pa skyel ba 'dre rna sa gyu zhin ke shesas
236b5(rgyud): 'iltung ba 'ang smran//de nas phyag na du sa/ma ldan 'das kyi na pas la phyug 'tshal dem na cin par 'gru spyir nab pa/I bang+ga bdes tu//de nas 'dagasus
236b6(rgyud): ma pa'i sems de rkyen thos mas ldas rnaMs kyi rnams la migasas la yod la gang / khyen na
237a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor thams cad brtags te/de'i dbus nas phul bzhi la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs te/de'i spyan sngar phyag na rdo rje yid kyis kyang co gtsog par
237a2(rgyud): bzhago//de nas de bzhin du bzhu bo/zhugs nas 'di skad du khyod deng nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid do//de ste dang na de bshad do zhes bsgos shig/des smras pa/gsungs
237a3(rgyud): shig ces pa dang /de nas khyed dang ngan cad de bzhin gshegs par gyur to zhes smos shing //nges smras pa/ci'i phyir/dkyil 'khor mthong ba'i phyir zhes des smos shig/gang dkyil
237a4(rgyud): 'khor 'dir bzhug pa de de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du blta ste/des sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang tshe 'di nyid dam/pha rol la thob par 'gyuraro//zhes smras nas/phyag rgya slobs shig
237a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor//de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bshad//dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris nas bcug
237a6(rgyud): la/rdo rje'i sgrub pa sgrub bo//lag pa gnyis kyi rdo rje gzung la rang gi phyag rgya sgo mo//rdo rje zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/snying po sgom pa ste/rdo rje tshig gis bzlas na des de bzhin ga
237a7(rgyud): pa yang tshe 'di 'am gzhan la thob par 'gyuraro//rdo rje dkyil 'khor ro//thams cad dam tshig chen po'i tshul du byas la 'di smros shig/dad brtan phyag na rdo rje la//de bzhin
237b1(rgyud): gshogs rigs de bzhin//sems can thams cad mgu ba ru//khyod kyi de ltar brtag par bya//deng nas khyod kyi de ltar ma byas na//sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur//nga mchod/
237b2(rgyud): gi dkyil 'khor//yang dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris la bcub nas las rnam bzhi yang bslab bo//lus thams cad kyis btugs te/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas
237b3(rgyud): de nas langs te yan lag lngas phyag byas te sdig pa thams cad bshag so//de nas langs nas thal mo sbyar te/dbus mo gnyis sa la ratugs nas/bsod nams thams cad
237b4(rgyud): rjes yi ngo //de nas langs te blos mo ba yas pa'i lhangs la gtsugs la/rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya tsongs nas phyag 'tshal te/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i tshig
237b5(rgyud): badz+ra bde brjod cig/des ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /phyag na rdo rje la phyag bya ba dang /bkur sti dang /mchod par 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa
237b6(rgyud): yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur//mchod pa'i cho ga'o//de nas phyag na rdo rje'i rig pa sgrub pa 'byung ste/dkyil 'khor mthong nas ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bris la de'i
237b7(rgyud): g.ya suM sman ras gzigs kyi dbang po//g.yon du rdo rje khu tshur rgyan thams cad kyi brgyan pa bya'o//de nas gso sbyin can du dus gsum du khrus byed pa/dus gsum du
238a1(rgyud): bkrus pa'i gas gyon la/stong phrag brgyar bzlas//de'i 'jug du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur bcings nas mtshan thal byung bzlas na nang pa
238a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gshegs te zhal ston to//mchog ci 'dod pa stsal te/sangs rgyas pa'i bar du yang stsol to//de nas yang cho ga bzhin te/ras la de bzhin
238a3(rgyud): gshegs pa pad+ma'i steng du bzhugs par byas la//de'i spyan sngar phyag na rdo rje thal mo sbyar te/gcig tsog por 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das la blta drar bya/bcom ldan
238a4(rgyud): 'das kyi g.yas phyogasu rdo rje phyag na rdo rje yo gcig gi rdo rje gser gre yon pa na pad+ma'o//bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogasu rdo rje khu tshur ti khu tshur gnyis kyi rdo rje bsnams par
238a5(rgyud): byas la/de nas chos gcig nas brtsams te zla ba gcig de bzhin du bzlas la zla ba tshang nas mtshan thal byung bzlas na/de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa byon nas/mchog ci
238a6(rgyud): 'dod pa stsol to//yang cho ga gawAn ni ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bris la de'i spyan sngar zla ba drug de bzhin du zlas te/'jug la nyin mtshan gsum du sang te
238a7(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje byin nas phyag na rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid byin gyi bar du bzlas so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du stong phrag brgya bzlas na 'jug tu de bzhin gshegs pa mtho ngo //
238b1(rgyud): nam mkha' la ltas te stong phrag brgya bzlas na na mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ngo //des de la phun sum tshogs pa thams cad nyin cig bzhin stsol to//sangs rgyas kyi
238b2(rgyud): spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas na mchog 'thob bo//phyag na rdo rje spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas na phyag na rdo rjes 'dod pa thams cad stsol tA//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i/
238b3(rgyud): spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas na spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos lag nas bzung ste/bde ba can gyi 'jig rten du khrid cing slar yang khrid de 'ong ngo //'jig rten gsum las rnam par
238b4(rgyud): rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtog pa rdzogaso////de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpas yang 'di skad
238b5(rgyud): ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir snying po gang brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa
238b6(rgyud): thams cad rdo rje'i ri ltar migaya ba yang bskyod cing 'dren na sems can gzhan lta ci smos/gang dran pa tsam gyis kyang 'jig pa thams cad rnam par grol bar 'gyuraro//gang brjod
238b7(rgyud): pa tsam gyis kyang mtshams med pa thams cad lhag ma ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur ba dang /thams cad la srung bar 'gyur ba dang /phyag na rdo rjes kyang 'dod pa thams cad stsol
239a1(rgyud): ts+tsha can stsol pa dang /don sna sgyu nga /dadangs pa gams pad na byu par blo bzhin tho gyur ba dang /gang shAs ma /
239a2(rgyud): mgyis sgrub pa thams cad mngon par 'dU bar sprum bar bgyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phywa ba na rje byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen pa lnga 'di
239a3(rgyud): migs 'i smras nga// sa hU~M kun mas nas paskye dag sa/nga ga

239a5(rgyud): baM thams cadugayas/ tu gams/'gyu rab tu 'gyur/byang chubs mas dpa' rnams rab tu bskyed par gyur //nyan thos dang dang sangs rgyas thams cad bangs
239a6(rgyud): b+h+ya te/b+h+ya nabs sa sna pa ma gyur te// na da gshegs pa thams cad kyis na pa ra/de ba'i ni gshegs bya thams cad kyar rnasems
239a7(rgyud): 'i thub pa yang sra bar gyur te//'du mi 'thungs pa'i phyogs thams cad kyang brlag par byas//gad ni thams cad bcas pas da ba tsam ste/'dra ba dpadun/
239b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das skyabasu dong nas/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag skyobs/bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag skyobs shig pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la bka' stsal//
239b2(rgyud): pa/phyag na rdo rje 'od nyid la skyabasu deng shig/'di nyid khyed la skyeb par byed do//phyag na rdo rje'i snying ka nas kun tu 'bar bas bskor bas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
239b3(rgyud): kyi phreng ba la sogs pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa 'dzum zhing khro ba/phyag gnyis kyis me tog gi gzhu 'gengs pa/phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje hUM zhes pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje

239b5(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/nga ji lta ba bzhin du khyod kyis kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyis shig ces//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad gsungaso//lag
239b6(rgyud): na rdo rje de bas na khyod snying po gang gis sems can 'di dag thams cad brgyal ba dang /btsos pa dang /bcom pa kun 'tsho bar 'gyur ba dang /gzhan dag kyang rdo rje'i lus
239b7(rgyud): thob par 'gyur ba de smras shig/oM TuM rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgya 'dis/bdag nyid go bgos na rdo rje'i lus dang /rdo rje'i tshe thob cing srung bAr 'gyur te/nam 'tsho'i bar du thams
240a1(rgyud): cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur//de nas phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpas rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs//de nas gzhan yang
240a2(rgyud): rab bshad pa//rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor che//gru gzhi pa de sgo bzhi pa'o//rta babs bzhi dang bcas pa ste//bcu drug cha dang ldan paro//rdo rje 'i ra bas mdzes pa ste//
240a3(rgyud): gra dang sgo yi zur dag dang //de bzhin rta babs mtshams rnams//rdo rje rin chen ldan par bya//ba dan phreng ba dril gyis brgyan//dang po'i phyi'i dkyil 'khor 'di//snying po/
240a4(rgyud): bzlas shing bri bar bya//de yi nang gi 'khyer lo yang //rdo rje srad bu mnyam ldan pa 'i/rdo rje'i ka ba brgyad ldan zhing //rdo rje'i ka ba mdun gnas//dkyil 'khor brgyad kyi tshul du
240a5(rgyud): ste/'od kyi dkyil 'khor bzhag pa'o//de yi dbus sems dpa' che//phyag na rdo rje bzhugs par bya//sangs rgyas rin chen thams cad dag/dbu rgyan du ni brgyan thogs /
240a6(rgyud): pa/cung zad tsam du bzhad pa'i zhal//rdo rje sems par mdzad pa ste//me tog mda' gzhu 'chang ba'o//de las gzhan pa phyag bzhi pa//rdo rje sems dpe'i thugs nyid//
240a7(rgyud): khro gnyer bzhad pa'i zhal ngo can//gnyis kyis me tog gzhu 'gongs shing //gnyis kyis rdo rje hUM mdzad pa'o//rdo rje can gyis g.yas phyogasu//rdo rje dga' ba bri bar bya//
240b1(rgyud): snying khar rdo rje brtan 'dzin cing //'khyud pa lta bu'i sbyor ba so//phyag na rdo rje'i rgyab tu ni//chu srin rgyal mtshan 'chang ba ste//sems dpa' rdo rje dpal can to//rin chen char pa rab tu
240b2(rgyud): 'bebs//rdo rje can gyi g.yon bris pa//rdo rje sems dpa' dmar po ste//gnyis kyis rdo rje sems dpa' 'dzin//sgeg pas mchod cing 'dud pa'o//dkyil 'khor grwa yi gnas
240b3(rgyud): rnamasu mchod pa'i lha mo bri bar bya//dpyid kyi rdo rje rdo rje'i sprin//ston ka'i rdo rje khab mo//phyi yi dkyil 'khor grwa dag tu//'dod pa'i gzugs la sogs pa bri//sgo yi dpung rnams thad/
240b4(rgyud): du//rdo rje 'dod pa'i kyo ba sogs//de nas dkyil 'khor chen po der//rdo rje slob dpon nyid rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya bcings la zhugs la 'di skad du smros shig/sems can kun gyi yid
240b5(rgyud): khyab cing //sems can kun la bde ba stsol//sems can kun gyi phar gyur pa'i//rdo rje sems dpa' bdag deng 'grub//Tak+ki hUM dza/de nas da skad smras pa dang 'bab par 'gyur te/de
240b6(rgyud): lhor babs pa tsam gyi phyag na rdo rje'i gzugs mthong ngo //bcom ldan 'das mthong bar bstan pas grub pa thams cad kyang stsal te/la la ni rdo rje 'dzin/la la ni 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
240b7(rgyud): de nas slob ma gzhug ste/snying po'i phyag rgya bcings la/des phreng ba bzung nas gos dmar pos yan lag bcings la//ras dmar pos mig gnyis bkab ste bcug nas 'di
241a1(rgyud): skad ces smros shig/khyod kyis dkyi 'jom mthong ba'i mi mkhas pa su la yang gsang ba 'di dag mi bsnyad par byas shig/'byung po'i gdon dang /
241a2(rgyud): men ma la sogs pa'i gdon gyis bsad par gyur ta re/shi nas kyang dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyungo zhes sgo nas gdong khrol cig/de nas 'di skad ces smos shig/gang dpung na pa
241a3(rgyud): 'di ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje ste/'di ni dang po'i sems dpa' 'dod pa'i dbang po kun tu bzang po rdo rje sems pa'o//gang mdun na pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das 'di'i
241a4(rgyud): thugs yin te 'dod pa'i khro bo'o//gang g.yas na pa 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi reg pa'i bde ba ste/rdo rje dga' ba zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'o//gang rgyab nu ba
241a5(rgyud): 'di ni bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid che ba'i rgyal mtshan te/sems dpa' thams cad kyi byams pa slong ba dang nor sbyin pa'o//gang g.yon phyogs na ba 'di ni bdag nyid che ba'i
241a6(rgyud): bdud de/sems can thams cad chags par byed pa'o//glang gA'i bzhi po 'di rnams ni dus kyi mchod pa/me tog dang /bdug pa dang /mar me dang /dri'i lha'o//gang /
241a7(rgyud): phyi'i grwa'i gnas na ba de dag ni gzugs la sogs pa 'dod pa'i yon tano//gang sgo bsrung de dag ni mig dang 'dod chags pa dang /'dza' ba ste/kyo ba tang dang /zhags
241b1(rgyud): pa dang /sgrog dang /'bebs pa dag ni rgol bar mi 'gyur ro//khyod kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa thams cad kyi bdag po la smod par ma byed cig/gang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la/
241b2(rgyud): sems can thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba 'chad de/de ci'i phyir zhe na/mu stegs can gyi rnams 'dod chags bral ba'i chos des thar pa'o//
241b3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams chags pa rnams ni sems can thams cad la chags pas na thar pa ni 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdag gi chung mas kyang sems
241b4(rgyud): can sdud par byed de/'dod chags ni byang chub tu bstan pa'o zheso//de nas snying po byin cig/Tak+ki hUM dza/'di bsgrubs na bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i mchog 'grub par
241b5(rgyud): 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das grub pas na 'dod pa'i khro bo grub par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/snying po 'di bdag nyid che ba ste/Tak+ki zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'o//hUM zhes pa ni///
241b6(rgyud): khro bo'o//de nyid dgug pa'i phyir dza zhes bya ba ni/'di khyod kyis bsgrub par bya'o//de nas phyag rgya chen po shes par slobs shig/de nas drom tshig gi phyag rgya bcom ldan
241b7(rgyud): 'das kyi rdo rje'i thugs bslabs nas lag pa gnyisu rdo rje sbyin pa'i snying po ni 'di'o//oM badz+ra d+ha ra badz+ra pra tad d+ha ra ya sid+d+hi Tik+ka hUM dza/de nas phreng ba phyag na rdo rje la phul bas
242a1(rgyud): de'i mgo la bskon no//de nas rdo rje ming gis dbang sbyinr-i pa snying po 'dis//oM badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa sar+b+ba karmaM shwa ra twa i daM badz+ra nA ma na ma A d+hiSh+Thi ta dau D+ho s+ya b+ha ba/
242a2(rgyud): oM Tak+ki hUM dza/de nas der 'dug ste/phyag rgya chen po bcings nas rdo rje tshig gis brgyad stong bzlas na de nas sa g.yo ste/grub pa thams cad lan gcig bzlas pas 'grub
242a3(rgyud): de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya btsangs la brgya bzlas na de'i thugs dbang du 'gyur ro//de phyin cad sems can thams cad kyi snying shes pa dang /sems can thams cad kyi snying/

242a6(rgyud): can thams cad kyis mi bsod pa dang /mi tshugs pa dang /mi gcod pa dang /mi phyed pa'i rdo rje'i lusu 'gyu ro zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungaso//de nas

242b3(rgyud): pa'i lha rnams kyis gar gyi mchod pas snyim pa ma stong par byas te/rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rdo rje'i glu'i rdo rje'i bzlas pas 'bum bzlas/

242b5(rgyud): gyi khams thams cad kyi bdag po lha'i gzugs dang /mdog dang /rgyun dang /spyan gsum pa la phyag bzhi pa rdo rje 'dod pa'i mdangs dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/rdo rje 'dzin gyi tsher 'gyur
242b6(rgyud): rdo rje dkyil 'khor gyi tshig rgyas pa'o//de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor te/dkrol 'khor chen po'i srad pus thig btab te/de nas lha mo rnams bris la de'i dbus bcom ldan 'a/

243a3(rgyud): rje lag tu theg du med kyang brgyan te/lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bcangs la/dpung pa gnyis kyis 'khyud de zhugs la 'di skad brjod do//sa ma ya s+t+waM a haM/su ra ta ho Tak+ki hUM/
243a4(rgyud): dza/de nas so drA pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das ston par mdzad de/phyag rgya thams cad 'grub pa dang /dam tshig thams cad 'grub pa yang stsol to//de nas de bzhin du snying
243a5(rgyud): po'i rdo rje de nyid kyi bcud nas 'di zhes smros shig/khyod kyi dam tshig 'di las ma 'da' shig/mi bde ba ma spangs par myur du shrI zhing ngu 'bod chen por skyes par gyur tu

243b1(rgyud): sa dru //gang gis 'di las 'das na/zlab phyed kyis spyong 'gras zhes ma ldan 'das phyag nA rdo rje dam tshig chen pos gsungs//dri nas phyag rgya bcings pa bslab bo//donas
243b2(rgyud): bzhin du 'byung ngo //shin tu dga' ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba gsang ba'i dkyil 'kho //dri nas las kyi dkyi khre 'khor de bzhin du zas nas nyid kyi skye 'amo mtshon ma bzhu po//der btsud nas las
243b3(rgyud): rnam bzhi bslab par bya'o//de la dang po nyid du 'dod pa thams cad stsol bar gyur te/phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya chen po btsongs nas rdo rje 'dzin phyag bzhi pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams
243b4(rgyud): cad kyi phreng ba la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan po'i skur bdag nyid mthing ba de srid kyi bar du bzla so//de byin chad 'dod pa thams cad nus par 'gyur//de nas khro bo'i las bslab ste/

244a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las byed pas 'dod pas phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar byang chub tu sems bskyed la sbyin pa sbyin/tshul khrims srud /bzod pa sgom
244a2(rgyud): brtson 'grus brtsam/bsam gtan la snyoms par bzhog/shes rab yongasu rdzogs par bya ste/ci 'dod ci nus kyi bya zhing rtag tu bzlas pa ni phyag na rdo rje'i sku 'am/de bzhin

244a4(rgyud): cho ga'o////de nas sgrub pa 'byung ste//dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs par//dam tshig shes pa ma yin dang //slob ma ma yin gzhan rnams la//mi
244a5(rgyud): zad snying po 'di mi sbyin//dkyil 'khor mthong bas sgrub pa ni phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgya bzlas na sngar bsnyen pa byas par 'gyuraro//de nas ras la bris te/
244a6(rgyud): ras kyi dbusu ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bri/de'i g.yasu phyag na rdo rje phyag bzhi pa'i thugs 'byung ba de bzhin du bri/g.yon du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang
244a7(rgyud): po phyag bzhi pa ste/gnyis na ni pad+mo'i ting 'dzin 'chang //gnyis kyis ni mai tog gi gzhu dgengs pa/kha dog dmar po bri/spyan sngar de bzhin du rdo rje 'dod pa'i khro
244b1(rgyud): bobri'o//steng du na mkha'i snying pa bri/grwar mchod pa'i lha rang gi mchod pas bkram pa dang mgo bor ro//de nas ras la bris pa'i spyan sngar zla ba bzhin dus bzhir stong bzlas shing bsgrubs
244b2(rgyud): na de na zla ba tshang ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'ang rtsol bar 'gyuraro//ras la bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bris la/sems dpa' chen po dang /lha mo yang de bzhin du//
244b3(rgyud): bya'o//de'i spyan sngar zla ba gcig tu grangs med par bzlas shing 'dod pa thams cad zos la bsgrubs te/de nas zla ba gcig lon pa dang /phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la/
244b4(rgyud): mtshan thal byung bzlas na nang par rdo rje 'dzin 'tho'o//ras la bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin du gris la/de'i spyan sngar zla ba phyed kyi bar du rtag par bzlas pa mnyal mi mnal
244b5(rgyud): bzlas te/de nas zla ba phyed lon pa dang /mtshan mo yang thal byung du bzlas ni nang par phyag na rdo rje dang mtshungs pa dang /'dod pa'i longs spyod chen po dang /bde ba dang /yid bde ba
244b6(rgyud): thams cad kyang 'thob cing thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur//ras la bcom ldan 'das khro bo de bzhin du bris la/de'i spyan sngar rdo rje shugs kyi phyag rgya bcings te/stong phrag
244b7(rgyud): brgya bzlas na des 'grub par 'gyur te/bsgo ba bzhin du las thams cad byed do//sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du'ang khyer zhing slar yang khyer te 'ang ngo //sangs rgyas kyin
245a1(rgyud): thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i bde ba thams cad khyer te 'ongs nas de la sbyin no//des kyang longs spyod par nus na lha'i bu mo thams cad lta ci smos/brgya byin yang
245a2(rgyud): stsol to//phyag na rdo rje 'dzin pa nas sangs rgyas kyi bar du bsgo bas stsol bar 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngor 'bum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bkug ste/
245a3(rgyud): dbang du byed do//phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar rdo rje thugs kyi phyag rgya bcings nas stong phrag brgya bzlas na/de nas phyag na rdo rje nyid kyi dpal gyi lha mo khrid de byon nas sgrub pa po'i mdun
245a4(rgyud): du 'dor ro//de nas sgrub pa pos bcom ldan 'das khyod nyid bdag nyid grub par 'tshal gyi/'di ci 'tshal zhes smos shig/de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes te/ci 'dod pa'i
245a5(rgyud): mchog stsol bar 'gyuraro//grub pa thams cad kyang 'gru'o//spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i spyan sngar 'bum zlas na spyan ras gzigs dbang pos mchog stsol par 'gyuraro//
245a6(rgyud): na mkha'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na dbang stso lta bar 'gyur te/bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par mdzad//rdo rje bzhag ste de'i mdun du 'bum bzlas na de nas
245a7(rgyud): las thams cad yi bzhin du grub par byed do//phyag rgya chen po bcings nas 'bum bzlas na phyag na rdo rje 'dzin gyis mchog stsol to//dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas
245b1(rgyud): 'bum blas na rdo rje 'dzin mngon du mthong zhing phyag rgya'i las kun grub pa yang stsol bar 'gyur//rdo rje lag tu thogs nas 'bum bzlas na rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje bzung ba tsam gyi ma snang bar
245b2(rgyud): 'gyuraro//'khor lo thogs te/'bum bzlas na 'khor lo'i rigs pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro//kyo ba tang thogs te 'bum bzlas na/kyo ba tang des thams cad 'gugs nus par 'gyur//

245b6(rgyud): paba'i phyag rgya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na/zla ba gcig tshun cad kyis der 'ongs te dbang du 'gyu ro//mthu bo che rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te 'bum bzlas na 'khor lo thob ste/

246a7(rgyud): ba la bltas te 'bum bzlas na 'thab mo dang rtsod pa'i g.yul thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro//rgyal ba thob pa mnan to 'bum bzlas na thams cad las rgyal
246b1(rgyud): 'gyur//mdzod rkang pa ga yin+da pas mnan te 'bum zlas na ba'a' ba dang btud bya ma da par 'gyur//'gro ba thams cad kyis kyang 'di la zad par mi nus//rlung mngon du byas /

246b4(rgyud): sbyin par 'gyu ro//phag mo mngon du byas te stong phrag brgya bzlas na sa la 'dug pa'i gting 'byin no//gshin rje mnan te 'bum bzlas na mi 'chi bar 'gyur ro//gan pa 'dren pa

247a1(rgyud): na sa'i 'og na 'khod pa kun la dbang du 'gyuraro//rin po che thogs te 'bum bzlas na stong brag brgyar 'phel bar 'gyur ro//gser gyi dong tshe la sogs pa yang de bzhino//

247a3(rgyud): du 'phel bar 'gyur ro//glang po che la zhon te 'bum bzlas na 'bum du 'phel bar 'gyur ro//ba lang la sogs pa phyugs kyi rwa gnyis bzung te 'bum bzlas na stong phrag brgyar 'phel
247a4(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro//gos dang rgyan gyi chas la stong phrag brgyar bzlas na stong phrag brgyar 'phel bar 'gyuraro//dpal ma la bltas te 'bum bzlas na dbang du 'gyuraro//mtsho dbyangs ma la
247a5(rgyud): bltas te 'bul bzlas na tshig rnam par dag par 'gyuraro//de nas spangs na ci bslangs pa de kun ster bar 'gyuraro//gtsug lag thams cad dang rnam par shes pa thams cad shes
247a6(rgyud): par 'gyuraro//grub byed ma bzung nas 'bum bzlas na 'das pa dang /dra ltar dang /ma 'ongs pa kun kyang ston cing ched du ma bslangs par nor sbyin par 'gyuraro//sA la b+han tsi ka mnan
247a7(rgyud): nas 'bum bzlas ni nyin re bzhin yang gsar gyi dong tshe brgyad brgyad ster bar 'gyuraro//gos kyi sgrog ma la mnan te 'bum bzlas na mi zod par 'gyu ro//gang dang gang gi snod
247b1(rgyud): mnan te 'bum bzlas na de dang do mi zad par 'gyur ro//gnod sbyin gyi cha lugs mnan to 'bum bzlas na gnod sbyin gyis ci dang ci 'dod pa kur sbyin par 'gyuraro//srin po mnan te 'bum
247b2(rgyud): bzlas na de de'i g.yog tu 'gyuraro//'byung po mnan te 'bum bzlas na 'byung po thums cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro//sha za'i cha lugs bris pa mnAn te 'bum bzlas na daM daM'i g.yog
247b3(rgyud): byed par 'gyuraro//de bzhin du gnod sbyin ma la sogs pa yang skye'o//re la 'dzegs te 'bum bzlas na ni ri thams cad dbang du 'gyuraro//phyugs kyi lha su 'dug te 'bum bzlas na phywa
247b4(rgyud): thams cad la dbang du 'gyur//shing ljon gyi drung du 'bum bzlas ni shing ljon pa'i lha rnams mchog sbyin par 'gyuraro//zhing la 'dug te 'bum bzlas na bza' 'dum dang ldan par 'gyur ro//
247b5(rgyud): tshong pa dang bcas pa'i grong du 'bum bzlas na nor thams cad ma bslabs par thob par 'gyuraro//gnas byin can du 'bum bzlas na thams cad la dbang du 'gyur ro//grong du 'bum
247b6(rgyud): bzlas na zla ba gcig chun chud kyis grong de thob bo//gtsug lag khang du 'bum bzlas na gtsug lag khang na gnas pas nor thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro//lha'i sten du 'bum bzlas
247b7(rgyud): na lhas nor thams cad sbyin par 'gyuraro//khang pa stong par 'bum bzlas na sha za thams cad de'i g.yog tu 'gyur te/dgos pa thams cad sbyor bar 'gyuraro//snang ba'i gnasu 'brun
248a1(rgyud): bzlas na snang ba dbang du 'gyuraro//bskyed mos tshal du 'bum bzlas nu bskyed mos tshal gyi me tog dang 'bras bu thams cad rtag tu 'byung bar 'gyuraro//mtshor//
248a2(rgyud): 'bum bzlas na mtsho de'i lha la dbang bar 'gyur//gter gyi gan su 'bum bzlas na gter rong 'byung bar 'gyur ro//dgod cing 'bum bzlas na rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur te/'gad
248a3(rgyud): pa tsam gyis las thams cad byed par 'gyur//khros pas 'bum bzlas na thams cad gtan 'pho bar nus par 'gyur//cang ma zer bar 'bum bzlas na sems can thams
248a4(rgyud): cad dbang du 'gyur ro//lkugs pa'i brtul zhugs kyi 'bum bzlas na tshig thams cad kyi dbang du 'gyur//bud med kyi 'joms par rtags btsugs te/'bum bzlas na
248a5(rgyud): 'dod pa thams cad kyi bdag po dang na mkha' la 'gro ba 'grub par 'gyu/'jam pa la mdzub mo btsugs te 'bum bzlas na de byas pas gnas pa dang /'gro ba dang thams cad
248a6(rgyud): 'dren cing 'gugs pa/gtong ba dang /'gyel pa dang slong bar 'gyuraro//'jom pa lta zhing 'bum bzlas na bud med thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro//'jom par lig pu
248a7(rgyud): mig bcug ste 'bum bzlas na mi snang bar 'gyu ro//'jom par gur gum bskus te 'bum bzlas na des bskus pas 'dod pa'i gzugasu 'gyuraro//'jom par ba//
248b1(rgyud): bcug ste 'bum bzlas na na mkha' la 'gro bar 'grub par 'gyuraro//'jom par rdzong ros bcug ste 'bum bzlas na rig 'dzin du 'gyuraro//ral gri thogs te 'bum bzlas na ral gri can gyi rig
248b2(rgyud): 'dzin du 'gyuraro//'khor lo thogs te 'bum bzlas na 'khor lo can gyi rig 'dzin du 'gyuraro//kyo ba tang thogs te 'bum bzlas na kya ba tang des thams cad 'bugs nus par 'gyuraro//rdo rje
248b3(rgyud): gsor nas stong phrag brgya bzlas na rdo rje rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro//phyag na rdo rje lag gi bzung nas 'bum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro//
248b4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa la lag gis bzung ste 'bum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byed pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi rig 'dzin du 'gyuraro//sangs rgyas rjesu dran
248b5(rgyud): zhing 'bum bzlas na sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bas 'grub par 'gyuraro//phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal zhing 'bum bzlas na phyag na rdo rjes kyang de mchod na gzhan gyi lta ci smos/
248b6(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ga zhabs las bzung ste 'bum bzlas na ti 'dzin thobo//rdo rje snying po bzung nas 'bum bzlas na nor thams cad sbyin par 'gyuraro//rdo rje khu tshur bcangs
248b7(rgyud): la rdo rje khu tshur gyi spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na khu tshur bsdams pa tsam gyi las kun byed nus par 'gyur ro//'jam dpal gzhon nu la blta zhing 'bum bzlas na na mkha' la yi ge snang
249a1(rgyud): sto/thams cad smra ba dang /spongs pa thogs pa med par thob par 'gyuraro//sems bskyod ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la
249a2(rgyud): bskor cing 'bum badz+ras na dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro//nam mkha'i mdzad la ltas te 'bum bzlas na na mkha' la rgyu ba thams cad dang /don thams cad dang //
249a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa thams cad kyi bar du ston to//byams pa'i zhabs la bzung ste 'bum bzlas na mtho ris kyi 'dod pa'i bde ba thams cad nyams
249a4(rgyud): myong bar 'gyuraro//dkyil 'khor bris nas 'bum bzlas na dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi bdag po slob dpon dang /yid kyis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//dkyil 'khor chen
249a5(rgyud): por brtags te zhugs nas 'bum bzlas na de bzhin bshags pa thams cad rdo rje 'dzin dang bcas par 'gyuraro//phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar phyag rgya chen po bcings la dkyil
249a6(rgyud): 'khor chen por 'dug ste/rdo rje'i bzlas pas stong phrag brgya rdo rje tshig gis bzlas na dngos grub thams cad dang phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang /shes nyan thams
249a7(rgyud): cad dang /las thams cad kyang nus par 'gyuraro//'dod pa'i bdag po dang /dbang phyug dang /byed pa po dang /'byin pa dang /mi bzad mi nyams pa dang /'dod pa tha~Md
249b1(rgyud): nyams myong zhing bde dang /yid dade ba thams cad snyed cing 'thob ste sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /bde ba 'brub pa'i sbyin par 'gyur ba dang /de rang gi gnyen dang bshos
249b2(rgyud): gnyen dang /grogs thams cad kyis kyang mthong ngo //bdag la yang 'grub par byed do//bsam pa tsam gyi sgyu ma thams cad ston te/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs/
249b3(rgyud): kyang ston to//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi cho 'phrul yang ston to//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yang ston to//skad cig gi gzugs sna tshe/
249b4(rgyud): su ston par 'gyur te/rdo rje 'dzin gyi tshe dang /stobs dang /gzugs dang /nA tshod dang shes pa ci tsam pa dang mtshungs par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so//
249b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen por 'dug ste dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas khro bo'i tshig gi bcom ldan 'das la blta zhing don gyis 'bum bzlas na des rdo rje khro bo lta bur bdag gi lus 'gyur//
249b6(rgyud): hUM zhes pas kyang de bzhin gi shegs pa thams cad kyang 'dzin pa dang khams gsum gyi dbang po dang /spyan gsum pa'i khro bo chen por gyur nas ma lus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thad
249b7(rgyud): mthong zhing mchod pa dang /sems can thams cad grub pa gsol te/de ltar mi zang ma nyams par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsung so////'jig
250a1(rgyud): rten dang ma las rnam par rgyal brtob pa chen po'i rgyum ba las phyuthun du rje'i rtobya pa'o///de na sa bcom ldan 'das la 'phags pa spyan d+has/
250a2(rgyud): gzigs kyi dbang po byang chub sems da 'a sems dpa' chen pos 'di// ces thos la te//bcom ldan 'das bdug gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal po rtag
250a3(rgyud): pachen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po 'di stsal to//bang brjod pa tsam b+h+yo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting 'dzin mdun du brub pa dang /'jig pa dang /gnam
250a4(rgyud): dal dang /'tshe ba dang /nad thams cad 'jig par 'gyuraro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' la leg so zhes
250a5(rgyud): byabyAbyabya d+hin te/legs lagaso//spyan ras gzibs kyi dang po khyod kyi spros shig/de nas 'phags pa spyan ras bzigs kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
250a6(rgyud): pos rang po snying po 'di bsrungs//a ro li ka/de nas 'di brjed pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ltar bcig tu 'dus te/ri rab ri'i rtse mor bcom ldan
250a7(rgyud): 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba der dong nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i dkyil 'khor du gyur te zhug so//de n+de
250b1(rgyud): 'phags pa d+h+yan ras gzigs kyi dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rang gi snying po'i dkyil 'ardo rje gsungaso//de nas yang dag par bshad pa//dkyil 'khor
250b2(rgyud): chen po dam pa ste//'jig rten gsum rgyal tshul bzhin du//phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya//de dbus slad bu mnyam pa ru//grwa bzhi par ni gdab pa ru//gnyis pa'i bla ni
250b3(rgyud): sgor bstan te//dkyil 'khor mchog ni bri bar bya//dkyil 'khor brgyad kyi tshul du ste//dbusu thig ni bzhi yang bri//tshon rtsi dmar po dag gi ni//pad+mo 'dab brgyad bri bar bya/
250b4(rgyud): de yi snying po dbusu ni//'jig rten mgon po bzhugs par bya//'dab ma kun gyi steng rnamasu//sangs rgyas cha lugs bri bar bya//pad+ma che mchog phyag rgya yis//der ni slob
250b5(rgyud): dpon zhugs nas kyang //dkyil 'khor gan su 'dug nas ni//rnal 'byor snyoms par 'jug par bya//ji ltar pad+mo chu rnams dang //nyes pa'i bag chags mang po yis/
250b6(rgyud): chags par mi 'gyur de bzhin 'dir//'gro ba chags par dag par gyur pa yin//'di lan cig brjod nas bsgom ste/de nas mdzub me gnyis kyi kyo ba tang gis kun drangs
250b7(rgyud): la pad+mo chen po de spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang rdo sbyin sngar grolo//de la pad+mo chen po'i kyo ba tang ni 'di'o//oM ma hA pad+ma hUM dza hriHde nas bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras
251a1(rgyud): gzigs dbang po nyid byon to/skyob dpon la zhal ston par mdzad nas yang na 'od zer yang 'gyed//de nas phyag rgya de nyid kyi slob ma gzhug/dkar pos g.yog
251a2(rgyud): la dos dkar po bgos la/thod dkar pos mgo la gtsug tor byas nas bcug ste/tshigasu bcad pa 'dis brjod nas don kyang bstan par bya'o//de nas lag pa g.yon
251a3(rgyud): par pad+ma byin/g.yas par sngags kyi nor bu bskur la 'di skud smros shig/sangs rgyas thams cad pad+mo che//dkyil la khyer chen po dam pa ste//rtag par ru ni rtag par bya//
251a4(rgyud): khyod ni dong nas spyan ras gzigs//de nas phyag rgya chen po bcings pa dang //tingange 'dzin la sogs pa bsla'o//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor tshon du
251a5(rgyud): pad+mo zhes bya'o//de nas pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris la/dbus kyi snying po la 'dug nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting
251a6(rgyud): 'dzin la pad+ma 'dab ma kha 'byed pa'i tshul gyi lta zhing stong phrag brgya bzlas na 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po tho bo//pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor ro//de nas daM//
251a7(rgyud): tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'byung te/dkyil 'khor de bzhin du byas la de'i dbusu pad+mo stong bzhag ste/de nas pad+mo re re zhing bzang po thang ris bcom ldan 'das la pad+mo stong /
251b1(rgyud): 'al lo//do nas slob ma bcug stong mchog brjod do//slob min tha min ma yin to//dmachog can la dmachog bstan//'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad ni//dag pa nyid ni pad+ma
251b2(rgyud): bzhin//dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro//de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor de bzhin bris la mchod pa rnam pa bzhis mchod do//sangs rgyas thams cad yid kyis te//phyag na rdo rje'i chog
251b3(rgyud): sa//lus kyis 'jig rten mgon po ste//nam pa'i snying po las kyis//las kyi la 'kho rir//de nas bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang bas sgrub pa'i tshi ge 'di gsu/
251b4(rgyud): so//ras su bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang por rab ra tsa man+ta/rang g+hi ti 'dzin du bzhugs shing de bzhin gsheg+h+ra~M sa~M pa brgyad mtha' kun tu 'i zhugs par dri/ /
251b5(rgyud): zla ba yar gyi ches zhab ge cig nas brtsams nas rtag tu thams cad dam pa'i ting 'dzin gyi rgyun tu baizlas te/nam spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i zhal nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i/
251b6(rgyud): byung nas sgrub pa po'i pad+ma'i dbus zhugs te/yid de las gzhan pa'i sgra byung nas sgrub pa de'i dbang bskur ba'i gan su brtan par 'gyur gyi bar du bzla so//de nas spyan ras gzo /
251b7(rgyud): kyi skur ni gyur te/snyid cig cig go bde ba can gyi 'jog rten gyi kham bu 'gro zhing ldog/sems can thams cad kyang mthong ste/tshe dpag tu med par 'gyuraro//de nas sbru
252a1(rgyud): 'byu ste/'bum bzlas na sgrub pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur//nyos 'bram bzlas na mtshams med pa lnga sogs pa ldog pa thams cad ma lus
252a2(rgyud): par byang bar 'gyur//sum 'bum bzlas na bsod nams thams cad mngon du 'gyur//de nas dngos grub thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dang /phun
252a3(rgyud): sum tshogs pa thams cad dang /shes nyen thams cad mngon du 'gyur//de nas phyag rgya chen po bcings te stong phyag brgya bzlas pa'i mjug tu mtshan thal byung bzlas na/
252a4(rgyud): de'i nad par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byon nas de'i snying khar zhugs te/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thob bo//yang na khar zhugs ni spyan ras gzigs dbang
252a5(rgyud): thob bo//de nas ma bsgrubs kyang lasu 'gyur ba ni dang po brjod pas bdag srung ngo //gnyis brjed pas ni gzhan dang /grong dang grong khyor srung ngo //gsum pa brjod pas ni
252a6(rgyud): las thams cad byed//dbab pa ni tsan dan gyi bdug paso//gdon thams cad zhi bar bya ba ni hrI zhes bya bas//sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba ni rdo rje me tegra bzla
252a7(rgyud): te byin no//sems can thams cad mnan pa ni saM ser ba so//bud med dbang du bya ba ni su ma nI me tog la bsngags paso//tshem nu ma mnan po ni yung dkar gyi sbyin sreg
252b1(rgyud): gIs so//ri dwags dang bya mnan pa ni yungs kar gtor bso//sgyu ma mnan pa ni rma bya'i chad buso//rmi lam mthong bar bya ba ni dus gsum du bzlas paso//rmi lam ngan pa gzhol ba ni/
252b2(rgyud): til gyi sbyin sreg giso//sems can thams cad dbang du byi ba ni khyim bya'i sgro'i sbyin sreg giso//bu mo thor bu dbang du bya ba ni bu mo'i sgra'i sbyin sreg giso//yugs sa mo dbang
252b3(rgyud): du bya ba ni bud med kyi me tog gi sbyin sreg giso//bud med thams cad dbang du bya ba ni bud med kyi dbang po'i sbyin sreg gi so//'dod pa thams cad dbang du bya ba ni bcom ldan/
252b4(rgyud): 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang po la mchod pa byas nas/nub gsum rangs par bzlas na de nas 'dod pa thams cad rtag tu thob par 'gyur ro//spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i sbyin/
252b5(rgyud): sngar nyin re zhing dus gsum du lan gsum bzlas na/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba gsum gyis re ba ci 'dod pa'i mchog stsol bar 'gyuraro//sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar zla
252b6(rgyud): ba gsum gyi bar du nyin mtshan gsum bzlas na de bzhin gshegs pas mchog stsol bar 'gyuraro//'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las spyan
252b7(rgyud): ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rtog pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'phags pa na mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ska
253a1(rgyud): ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal por rang gi lhung po 'bul gyis/brtsam//
253a2(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bzhi su gsol/'dris sems can thams cad dbang bskur ba thob pa la sogs pa bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro//de nas bcom
253a3(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa na mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' la skyes bu chen po smros shig ces bka' stsal te/de nas 'phags pa na mkha'i snying po byang chub sems
253a4(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rang gi snying po 'di gsungaso//traM b+ha bA Ta Ta ho ha/de nas 'di brjod pas na mkha' la dbang bskur ba thams cad la sogs pa rin po che'i rgya ni
253a5(rgyud): thams cad gos dang /gser dang /nor rin po che'i dbyig la sogs pa thams cad kyi char bab po//bcom ldan 'das kyi sku kun tu rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan te bzhug/
253a6(rgyud): so//de nas na mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpas dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungaso//rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin te//rdo rje rin chen mnyam ldan zhing //gra brgyad/
253a7(rgyud): shin tu mnyam par bya//rin chen kun dang ldan par bya//der slob dpon zhugs te rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya dbang bskur ba'i gan su bzhag la zhugs nas 'di zhes brjed///
253b1(rgyud): rong thams cad grub pa yi//nam du 'grub pa mchog yin to//grub shig grub shig sems chen po//bcom ldan thams cad grub par//de nas bcom ldan 'das na mkha'
253b2(rgyud): po byang chub sems dpa' byin gyi rlob par mdzad//de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbusu na mkha'i snying po'i tshe lugs bzhag la de'i thad 'khor kun tu phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa skyes
253b3(rgyud): bu dam pa brgyad bzhag par bya'o//de nas slob ma rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzhug/bcug nas 'di skad ces brjod do//sems can kun la phan phyir dang //bsdam pa thams
253b4(rgyud): cad rdzogs bya'i phyir//don shes bstan pa gang yon do//byang chub sems ni brtan pa yin//de nas sbyin pa rnam pa bzhi bsreg/de la dbang bskur ba sbyin pa dang //nang
253b5(rgyud): sbyin pa dang /zas sbyin pa dang /chos sbyin pa'o//de la dbang bskur ba sbyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la'o//nor sbyin pa ni sems can tham sa cad la'o//
253b6(rgyud): zos sbyin pa ni byol sad thams cad la'o//chos sbyin pa ni sems ca na mi snang ba thams cad la'o//de nas snying pa byin la/rin po che thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs
253b7(rgyud): pa'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur te 'di zhes brjod do//oM badz+ra rat+na b+hi She ka b+hi Shiny+tsi sarba d+hi pa t+ye hUM b+he bA Ta Ta ha te//de nas rdo rje nor bu'i khu tshur gyis phyag rgya slob ste/sngun
254a1(rgyud): ni 'di'o//hU~M dA taha/de nas rdo rje rin po ches phyag rgya bcings te sngags ni 'di'o//oM bA bA ta mu baM/de nas mchod pa rnam pazhi bya ste 'byung ngo //dbang thams
254a2(rgyud): cad bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor ro//de nas rdo rje rin po che'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/rdo rje rin po che dbu su bris la lag tu nor bu thogs nas rdo rje rin po che langs kyi bar du bzlas//
254a3(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa byon te dbang bskur bar mdzad//dbang bsgyur ba des na thams cad kyi dbang por 'gyu ro//rin po che'i dkyil 'khor ro//de nas dam tshig go/
254a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor te/na mkha'i snying po'i cha lugs bris la/spyan sngar nor dang gser dang /mu tig dang /nor bu rin po che la sogs pa gang yang rung ba bzhag la de nas de
254a5(rgyud): tsud de thams cad bstan nas/dam tshig 'di sbyi no//sangs rgyas la sogs sems dpa' dag/gal te nyin re mchod stong na//khyod kyi nor dang don bsags pa//tshe//
254a6(rgyud): rabs kun tu 'jigs par 'gyur//de la 'di ni mi'i snying po'o//oM bA bA Ta Ta ya swA hA/de nas chus dbang bskuro//dam tshig gi dkyil 'khoraro//las kyi dkyil 'khor/
254a7(rgyud): bris la de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya ste/de'i dbu su bzhag nas der btsud de/de nas las rnam pa lnga slab pa ni 'di lta ste/dbang sbyin pas
254b1(rgyud): da bzhin ga shogs pa thad cad ldan tsha 'o//de nas nor sbyin da ni dge sbyong dang bla mo ze lu gas pA la tsa nub kyis stan no//de nas zas ston pa na byol song rnamal sbyin no//
254b2(rgyud): de nas mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa ni gyod khrid thams cad la sbyin no//de nas chos sbyin du ni mi snang ba'i sems can rnams la sbyin no//las kyi dkyil 'khor ro//de nas sgrub
254b3(rgyud): 'byung ste/ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pargyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang skur ba bris te/de'i g.yas phyogasu 'phags
254b4(rgyud): pa na mkha'i snying po bcom ldan 'das la dbang bskur ba'i phreng bas dbang bskur ba'o//g.yon phyogasu bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o//de nas ras
254b5(rgyud): la bris pa de'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas pa'i mjug tu nyi ma shar ba nas brtsams te/phyi de nyin gyi nyi ma shar gyi bar du bzlas na de nas bcom ldan 'das na mkha'i snying po ras la bris
254b6(rgyud): pa d+ye las byung nos sgrub pa po de la rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskuro//dbang bskur ba de nas de bzhin gshegs par 'gyuraro//dri nas ma bsgrubs par yang la su 'gyur
254b7(rgyud): ba ni 'bum bzlas na don thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyuraro//phyag ni rdo rje'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na gter chen po rnye//spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar 'bum
255a1(rgyud): bzlas na spyan ras gzigs dbang pos phun sum tshogs bya thams cad stsol bar 'gyuraro//na mkha'i snying po'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na rgyal srid thob//rdo rje la
255a2(rgyud): tshur gyi spyan sngar 'bum bzlas na na mkha' la khu tshur bcings pas gser gyi dong tshe 'byung //'jam dpal gzhon nu la bltas te 'bum bzlas na chos kyi nor dang gzungs thob//
255a3(rgyud): des nor yang skye bar byed//rdo rje 'khor lo srin lag gi sor mos mnan te 'bum bzlas na 'kho lo bskor bar 'gyuraro//na mkha'i mdzod kun nas 'khyud de 'bum bzlas pas
255a4(rgyud): na mkha' las nor thams cad dang zas thams cad kyi yo byad zad mi shes par 'gyuraro//byams pa la bltas te 'bum bzlas na bcom ldan 'das byams pa byang chub
255a5(rgyud): sems dpa' dga' ldan rnams kyi dbang mchog byin nas slar yang 'ong ngo //de phyin chad 'dod pa thams cad kyi nor gyi bdag por 'gyuraro//'jig rten gsum las rnam
255a6(rgyud): par rgyal ba rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las na mkha'i snying po'i rtog pa'o////de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'dus pa'i 'khor
255a7(rgyud): thams cad bskyong nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang
255b1(rgyud): gi snying po dbul bar bgyi ste/bdag gis bskal pa stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gcig pa la rdo rje'i ri rab de bzhin gshegs pa las blangs te/des 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi
255b2(rgyud): rdul phra mo snyed kyi sems can rnams 'grub pa thams cad grub par byas te/de'i bskyed pa nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdzogs kyi bar du'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje
255b3(rgyud): khri tshur byang chub sems dpa' chen po la leg so zhes bya ba byin te leg so leg so//rdo rje khu tshur khyod kyis smros shig/de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
255b4(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu g.yos par byas nas rang gi snying po 'di gsungs//oM ruM Tu ru Tu hU~M ma tha/de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa
255b5(rgyud): thams cad dang /rdo rje 'dzin dang /'khor thams cad dang bcas na ri rab ri'i rtse myor bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te lag pa gnyis kyis rang gi khu tshur gyi phyag rgya
255b6(rgyud): bcings na/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub la dmigs shing bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor chen por gyur nas bkod do//de nas rdo rje khu tshur/
255b7(rgyud): gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyag rgyas btab nas dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungaso//de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa//dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/
256a1(rgyud): rje pal 'khor 'dru ba ni//rdorjekhu tshur zhes gsungs//de yi dusu sems chen po//rdo rje khu tshur bzhag par bya//rdo rje'i khu tshur rdo rjer bcus+ya//
256a2(rgyud): lag pa gnyis ni btsi bar bya//de yi ngos ni thams cad du//sangs rgyas gzugs rnams bzhag par bya//de dag gi ni thA kun du//byang chub sems dpa' kun bri'o//
256a3(rgyud): de nas rdo rje khur tshur gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir rdo rje slob dpon gyi rdo rje dang bcas pa'i khu tshur gyi/tshig gis phyag rgya bcings te//zhugs la 'di brjod cig/hUM dak+Shi Ni sma ra
256a4(rgyud): phaT/de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur slob dpon la grub par 'gyur te/de la phyag rgya yang brtan par 'gyur zhing sus kyang dbye bar mi nus//de nas snying po 'dis
256a5(rgyud): bdag gi snying khar dgrol//oM badz+ra muSh+Ti hUM/de nas slob ma gzhug pa ste/rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya rdo rje dang bcas pa/phreng ba dang bcas par bya ste/
256a6(rgyud): bzhin du ras dmar pos mig gnyis bkar+ya ste/de nas 'di zhes brjod//deng khyed de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgyas btab pa ni chos kyi phyag rgya dang /rdo rje/
256a7(rgyud): 'dzin gyi rdo rje'i phyag rgyas kyang bta'o//khyod chos dang rdo rje las gang 'dod /des smras pa/gnyis ka'o zhe na/de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyi rdo rje dang /de bzhin gshegs bri
256b1(rgyud): cha lugs blangs nas phreng ba de'i mgo la bzhag ste/dgrol ba'i snying po de nyid kyis phyag rgya snying kar dgro lo//de nas lag tu sbyin pa ni lag pa g.yon par rdo rje'o//g.yas
256b2(rgyud): par de bzhin gshegs pa'o//de sde de bzhin gshegs pa'o//zhes zer na de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid sbyin no//de ste rdo rje'i zhes zer na de'i lag pa g.yon par
256b3(rgyud): rdo rje byin la 'di skad bsgo shig/'di gnyis ni khyod kyi grub par dmigs la rtag tu mchod par gyis shig/de na so gdong g.yogs pa dkrol la dkyil 'khor ston la 'dra smos
256b4(rgyud): shig/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi//lus dang ngag sems rdo rje rnams//bsdus pa khu tshur zhes bya ste//bcings na rdo rje khu tshur bshad//de nas snying po byin
256b5(rgyud): la phyag rgya bcing ba slobs shig/dam tshig gi khu tshur zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro//de nas phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul bzhin du//dkyil
256b6(rgyud): 'khor thams cad yang dag bri//de yi dbusu ci rigs par//sangs rgyas sku lus bzhag par bya//thams cad rgyan gyi brgyan pa yi//rdo rje khu tshur kun 'dzin pa'o//de yi ngos
256b7(rgyud): ni thams cad du//mchod pa rnam bzhi bri bar bya//de nas dkyil 'khor dbus rnams//rdo rje rin chen yang de bzhin//de bzhin rdo rje pad+mo'i dbus//rdo rje rgya gram bri bar bya//grwa
257a1(rgyud): /yi phyogs rnams thams cad du//mchod pa rnam pazhi dri bar bya//de nas btsud nas byu tu klan//bcid pa yang ni bsgrub par b+ha//sgrub pa gsang ba dag dang /
257a2(rgyud): ni/bsgyur ba gsang ba bslab par bya//'di rnams thams cad kun byis nas//bsgrubs shig cisa~M ni brjod par bya//phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor//de nas dam tshig gi/
257a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'byung ste//de bzhin du mtshan ma bzhag nas 'di zhes brjod do//ci ste dkyil 'khor ma mthong na//phyag rgya shes pa brtan na ni//rdo rje rin chen rgyal ba dang //
257a4(rgyud): sna tshogs pas khyod bsod par 'gyur//dam tshig gi dkyim 'khor ro//de nas las kyid dkyil 'khor 'byung ste//dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris la bcom ldan 'das
257a5(rgyud): khri tshur gyi spyan sngar phyag rgya'i las bslab//de la phyag rgya bcings pa ni 'di'o//rdo rje bcing bkun byas la//ser mo thams cad dgug byi ste//rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyug
257a6(rgyud): rgyurgya dang //rdo rje khA tshur phyag rgyab cing //de nas lag po'i phyag rgya bcing //de lta bur mi ldan nA 'di pa thams cad kyi mchog sgrub pas ni dam tshig chen po yang dag pa'i ma
257a7(rgyud): shes kyi snying po thang tsog bzlas pas phyag rgya thams cad bcing bar bya ste/thams cad kyi ni ma yin no//las kyi dkyil 'kho ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur
257b1(rgyud): sgrub pa 'byung ste//'o ma mthung zhing rdo rje khu tshur gyi dmachog bri pyAn+ya bcings nas 'bum bzlas na sngar smyon pa byas par 'gyuraro//de nas ras la bri bar bya ste/ras la bcom ldan
257b2(rgyud): 'ad sa 'phags pa rdo rje khu tshur rgyan thams cad kyi brgyan pa bris lo phyag gnyis kyi rdo rje dang bcas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i dar gyi bcings la/de'i thang
257b3(rgyud): 'khor thams cad du/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang phyag gnyis ka de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khu
257b4(rgyud): tshur du bcings par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ting 'dzin du snyoms par zhugs par bya'o//de nas de'i spyan sngar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khru
257b5(rgyud): tshur bcings la stong phrag brgya bzlas pa'i mjug tu zhag bdun spungs nas bdag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur sgoms la/mtshan thal byung du bzla so//de nas nam
257b6(rgyud): phyed nas bdud kyi las sna tshogs snang bar 'gyuraro//de nas 'di brjod cig/oM badz+ra maSh+Ti ha nA ha na sarba mA ra Na phaT/de nas nang par gyi dus na bcom ldan 'das thams cad byon
257b7(rgyud): tau lus kun tu 'jug/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasu 'gyuraro//yang ras kyi cho ga 'byung ste/ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
258a1(rgyud): gshegs brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dris te de'i g.yas phyogasu bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa/sku mdog sngo bslang
258a2(rgyud): ud pal sngon po lta bu rdo rje khu tshur gyis phyag g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje bsnams pa/g.yas pa mchog sbyin pa ste/de'i g.ya su bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje'i dam tshig
258a3(rgyud): gI khu tshur can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa gzhon nu ma dam tshig gi khu tshur gyi rdo rje dam du 'tshir ba mdog dmar po bya'o//de'i thad du rdo rje'i gsel pur ma rgyan thams cad
258a4(rgyud): kyis brgyan pa/spyan gsum pa/log pa gnyis kyis rdo rjegs la thogs pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogasu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po thor tshugs kyi dbu rgyan
258a5(rgyud): thams cad kyis brgyan pa/pad+mo dang mchod sbyin gyi phyag tu byas la/de'i g.yon du pad+mo chen po'i rdo rje byang chub sems dpo' rdo rje'i sde zhes bya'o//de'i g.yon du rdo rje'i dpal
258a6(rgyud): mo dang /jo bo nya mo// dpal mo ni sder gyi sku mdog/dpal gyi gzugs 'chang ba phyag na rdo rje 'dzin pa'o//rdo rje pho nya mo ni mdog sngon mo la rdo rje khar po 'chang ba'o//de nas zla ba yar
258a7(rgyud): gyi ngo tshas gcig nas brtsams te/rdo rje khu tshur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas stong phrag rgya bzlas na/gzugs kyi ras de las phaT ces bya ba thos nas/de nas ba
258b1(rgyud): ldan 'das bya//na rdo rje 'grub par 'gyur te/dri byin cad na mkha'i dkyil na spyod cing 'dod pa mi snang bar 'gyur/dpagra tshang stong du phar yang 'gro zhing gyen du yang 'bru'o//ci 'dod pa'i/
258b2(rgyud): gzugasu 'gyur//kun tu 'khyil bas 'khyil pa'i sgra can lo bcu drug len pa'i lus gyur nis 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la ci 'dod pa bzhin longs spyod par 'gyuraro//
258b3(rgyud): khu tshur bcings pas sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa dang /chad pas bcad pa la sogs pa thams cod nus par 'gyuraro//gzugs bzang po bskal par gnas
258b4(rgyud): shing /rgal ba dang shi bar yang mi 'gyuraro//yang cho ga gzhan te ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bris la/de'i g.yas phyogasu phyag na rdo rje rgyun thams cad
258b5(rgyud): kyi brgyan pa la sku mdog ud pa la sngon po'i kha dog phyag na rdo rje dang bcas pas rdo rje khu tshur bcings te sbyar la bcom ldan 'das la 'dud par bya/de'i g.yon phyogasu bac+doMs
258b6(rgyud): ma dam tshig gi khu tshur rgyan thams cad kyi brgyan pa yid tsam dud pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal ba/lag pa g.yas pa na em+bu'i 'bras bu 'bul ba/g.yon pa
258b7(rgyud): na rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje 'dzin to//de nas ras la bris pa'i spyan sngar zhag gsum bsnyungs la/gu gul gyi ril bu sran matsam du ru ka'i 'bru mar la skyugs la brgyad spyod/
259a1(rgyud): dub myed pa'i 'dag me la skrab/de nas gzugs de 'gul te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas 'od zer 'byung //de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyi
259a2(rgyud): mchog stsol ba ni rgyal po 'am/'khor lo bskor ba 'am/lha ma yin pa dbang ba 'am/sa brjod pa 'am/sa'i log pa'am/khams brjod pa 'am/'dod pa'i
259a3(rgyud): khams mi snang ba 'am/na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro//yang sgrub pa gzhan gyi cho ga ste/ras la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bris
259a4(rgyud): la/de bzhin du rdo rje dang bcas pa'i phyag gnyis kyi rdo rje khu tshur bcings pa ud pa la sngon po'i mdog tu byas la de'i spyan sngar dam tshig bri rdo rje khu tshur bcings te/
259a5(rgyud): stong phrag brgya bzlas pa'i mjug nyin mtshan gsum thal byung de zlas na nam byed nas bcom ldan 'das nyid byin te/mchog spel bar 'gyuraro//ras sam/shing leg
259a6(rgyud): 'am/rtseg ngos la bcom ldan 'das lnga rdo rje khu tshur de bzhin du rdo rje dang a mr-i'i 'bras bu thogs par byas /de'i spyan sngar stong phrag brgya ba zlas na phyag rgya thams cad bcing
259a7(rgyud): pa tsam gyis las thams cad gdon mi za bar byed par 'gyur//de nas ma sgrub pa'i las rnams 'byung ste/rdo rje dom tshig gi khu tshur bcings nas 'bum bzlas na/khu
259b1(rgyud): tshur bcings pas na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyuraro//log pa g.yon pas rdo rje dang bcas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur bcings na phyag na rdo rje la sogs gzugs 'byung bar 'gyur ba nA 'bum bzlas
