259b3(rgyud): la 'bum bzlas na khu tshur bcangs pas bcing ba dang /rengs par bya ba dang /gnyid log par bya ba thams cad nus par 'gyuraro//na mkha' la rdo rje khu tshur bcungs te/'dum
259b4(rgyud): bzlas na rdo rje khu tshur bya ba pa tsam gyis na mkha' la nor dang /gser dang /mu tig dang /rgyan dang /rin po che dang /gos dang /bza' ba dang /btung ba dang /me dang /chu dang
259b5(rgyud): me tog dang /'bras bu dang /myu bu dang /yi ge dang /'thab cha dang /ston skyobs dang /mtshon cha dang /glegs bam dang /rtog pa dang /mdo sde dang /sangs rgyas kyi sku la
259b6(rgyud): sogs pa dngos po gnas pa dang /'gro ba ci 'dod pa dgug par byed//g.yas pa rdo rje khu tshur bcangs la 'bum bzlas na rdo rje khu tshur bstan pas gnas pa dang /'gro ba
259b7(rgyud): thams cad dgug pa dang /'dren pa dang /'gyel bar nus par 'gyur//khu tshur bsgyur bas thams cad bstan 'pho nus par 'gyuraro//g.yas pas rdo rje khu tshur bcings
260a1(rgyud): la stong phrag brgya bzlas na rdo rje khu tshur byabs pas thams cad las nor dang /gser dang /rgyan dang /bos dang /mtshon cha dang /me tog dang /'bras bu lwa
260a2(rgyud): sogs pa dngos po thams cad dbugo/gzugs dang /skr-i dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg bya las dam pa thams cad kyang dgugo/bud med kyi nu ma dang /mngal phyogs dang /mig
260a3(rgyud): dang /sna dang /mchu dang /rna ba dang /mgo dang /brla dang /ske rags dang /gsang spu la sogs pa dngos po thams cad kyang 'gugo/bkrol na thar par 'gyuraro//nyin zhag
260a4(rgyud): gcig bsnyungs pa lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bcangs te/stong phrag brgya bzlas ni de phyin chad khu tshur bcangs pas las thams cad byed do//de la las rnams ni dgug pa
260a5(rgyud): dang /gzhug pa dang /bcing ba dang /dbang du bya ba dang /rengs par bya ba dang /rmugs par bya ba dang /rgyas gdab pa dang /gnyid log pa dang /bslang ba dang /drang ba dang /bskye
260a6(rgyud): ba dang /brdabs pa dang /skud pa dang /dbye ba dang /go bzlog pa dang /gtan 'pho ba dang /gso ba dang /sgyu ma thams cad bstan pa dang /dus tshigs bsgyur ba dang /sa las/
260a7(rgyud): pa g.yo ba dang /thams cad la dbab pa dang /dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang /gar byed pa dang /glu len pa dang /sngon ma byung ba'i sbyor ba dang /so sor lung ston pa dang /
260b1(rgyud): mas tsud gzhom pa nga /rgyurnam pa cad ts+tsha dang /dadon mas la shu pa dang /dug thams nad spyad pa dang /mnus par byu ba dang /thams na kyi phywa rgyu nam/
260b2(rgyud): bi dang /thams cad 'gengs pa dang /shes pa sbyar bad //snrel bskye pa dang /bzung ba dang /btad pa dang /se re ba dang /char dadab pa dang /klog dbyu ba dang /thams cod bzla
260b3(rgyud): bcad pa dang /sngan chad med pa'i gos dang /rgya ni dang /rin pa che dang /me tog dang /'bras bu dang /skyes pa dang /bud med dang /byang de dgas dgug pa dang /gtong ba dang /
260b4(rgyud): mang po ston pa dang /mi snang ba dang /na mkha' la 'gro ba sten pa la sogs pa 'ding ba bzhin las thams cad byed par 'gyur//'jig rten gsumi las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtag
260b5(rgyud): chen po'i rgyal po las rdo khu tshur gyi rtog pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpol gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub sems dpas 'di skad ces gas
260b6(rgyud): ma ldan 'das bdag giN+DI 'dzig snang po 'jig rten pa snyam las nam rgyal ba'i rten pa 'du stsal ba sadI rjod pan ma g+ni m+ba de gzhin ga sheg+sas pa ma
260b7(rgyud): kyi mdza dzid par 'gyur//de nas ba tsam sa ni 'di kyis la ma pa la shin du byung ba la rigs kyi bu khyo slos shig ci sa gsum so//de nas 'jam dpal na/
261a1(rgyud): //nur gyur pas smras pa/Arar+ya pAn+d+han/den su 'di dzodadu ma thab tu dranan gshegs pa tham sar+b+bang+ge/chos thams cad mAnyam bA ny-i las yo ga ma /
261a2(rgyud): pa nyid sems can thams cad kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i grub pa thob par 'gyur ba ze shid //de nas dkyil 'khor 'byung ba ste/'khor lo'i dkyi la 'khor yar
261a3(rgyud): tshes bcu bzhi 'am/bco lnga la bris te/de'i dbus kyi lte bar 'jam dpal bzhugs par bya'o//rdo rje ral gri dang glegs bam thogs par byas la/de'i thang 'khor thams
261a4(rgyud): cad du yi ge a ra pa tsan la sogs pa'i phreng ba bri bar bya'o//de nas slob dpon gyis rdo rje ral gri dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la zhugs te/niSh+Ta pany+dza gra zhes bye ba'i yi ge 'di
261a5(rgyud): brjod do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis slob dpon la thogs pa med pa'i slob pa yang stsol te/de phyin chad bcom ldan 'das kyis na mkha' la yi ger bris te thams
261a6(rgyud): cad gsung //de bzhin du slob ma bcug ste/'di zhes smros shig/deng khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos thob phyir 'gyur gyis/snying po 'di khyod kyis su la yang
261a7(rgyud): ma smra shig/de la gsang ba'i yi ge 'di rnamaso//a ra pa tsa na zhes bya ba ste/'dod pa thams cad thob bo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/a zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'o//ra zhes
261b1(rgyud): ba ni chags pa'o//pa zhes bya ba ni dron dam pa'o//tsa zhes bya ba ni spyod pa'o//na zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin med pa'o//de ltar 'dod pa dang /chags pa dang /don dam pa dang /spyod
261b2(rgyud): pa dang /rang bzhin med pa nyid kyi snying po 'di bsgoms te bsgrubs na 'dod pa thams cad thob par 'gyuraro//de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dod pa thams cad kyi snod yin te/de/
261b3(rgyud): na snying po 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dang /rdo rje 'dzin kyang myur du thob par 'gyur ro//de nas phyag rgya bcings pa bsla'o//spros pa med pa'i mchog ces bya'o//de nas ral gri'i/
261b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/de bzhin du rdo rje dkyil 'khor bris la de'i dbusu ral gri bzhag ste/mdun du snying po 'di bsgrubs na/des 'jamu dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bsgrubs/
261b5(rgyud): par 'gyur//rdo rje ral gri'i dkyil 'khoraro//dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ni dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul bzhin du bris la zhugs nas 'di zhes brjod do//e kA ro mu
261b6(rgyud): khaM sarba d+harma NAM/I d+ya nud pan na tAta/a zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste thog ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir zhes nad par langs nas nyin re la na re brjod na mtshams
261b7(rgyud): med pa thams cad kyis mi goso//dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro//de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor lo byung ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dkyil 'khor gyi dbu su bzhag
262a1(rgyud): nas mchod pa rnam pa bzhis mchod pa ni 'dri ba dang /klog pa dang /kha ton byed pa dang /sgom paso//lus kyi dkyil 'khor//de nas sgrub 'dod pas dkyil
262a2(rgyud): chen po'i tshul du ras lo kris nas/yi ge phreng ba thams cad brjod 'di skad du chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyi sgrub pa'o zhes kyang brjod nas yi ge 'a de 'bum bzlas na spob/
262a3(rgyud): pa mi zad par 'jam dpal dang mtshungs pa dang /na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyuraro//de nas ma bsgrubs kyang la su 'gyur ba ni lan gcig bzlas pas sdug bsngal thams cad
262a4(rgyud): las grolo//gnyis bzlas pas mtshams med pa thams cad lhag ma ma lus par zad par 'gyu ro//gsum bzlas pas ting 'dzin mngon du 'gyur ro//bzhi bzlas pas/
262a5(rgyud): dran pa dang ldan par 'gyuraro//lnga bzlas pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya'o//sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la yi ge phreng
262a6(rgyud): ba gAyas phyogs nas a zhes bya ba'i drung du na zhes bya ba phyin gyi bar du bri'o//de nas bskor zhing yi ge 'bum bzlas te/yi ge re re 'bum rdzogs na bcom ldan 'das nga
262a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa dang /'jam dpal dang /phyag na rdo rje cig char 'grub ste/nyin re zhing mthong bar bstan nas chos bshade slar gshegaso//tshe 'di nyid las
262b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas pa man chad kyang stsal to//'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i rtog pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la
262b2(rgyud): rdo rje 'khor lo byang chub sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gi kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir snying
262b3(rgyud): 'di stsal bar bgyi ste/gang brjod pa tsam gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje 'khor lo byang chub sems dpa' la bsku'o///
262b4(rgyud): de nas rdo rje 'khor lo byang chub sems dpas bcom ldan 'das la rang gi snying po phul ba/oM badz+ra tsakra hUM/de nas 'di brjod pa tsam gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad le sogs/
262b5(rgyud): pa dang /sems can thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor de nyid du zhugaso//de nas rdo rje 'khor lo byang chub sems dpas dkyil 'khor 'dri bshad do//rdo rje 'khor lo bzhin bris la//rdo
262b6(rgyud): 'khor lo bdag che ba//rang gi lagro na phyag rgya thogs//de yi dbusu bzhag par bya//de yi thad 'khor thams cad du//rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshogs rnams bri//de yang sam
262b7(rgyud): can chen po rnams//de dag nyid ni legs par bri//de nas blo ldan thog ma ru//rdo rje 'khor los 'jug par bya//zhugs nas snying po 'di bzla so//dzaHhUM baM ho//zhes
263a1(rgyud): na des bcom ldan 'das dgyes te grub pa thams cad du stsal to//de bzhin du slob ma bcud nas de nyid du bsgrub par bya'o//rdo rje'i 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcings nas
263a2(rgyud): 'bum bzlas na/de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/rdo rje 'dzin thob par 'gyur//rdo rje 'khor lo zhes bya ba'o//rdo rje 'khor lo'i dbu su rdo rje bri ste/de bzhin du bzlas na rdo rje 'dzin du
263a3(rgyud): ro//rdo rje dkyil 'khor ro//dkyil 'khor de bzhin du bris nas mtshan ma bzhag ste/'di zhes brjod do//rdo rje 'khor lo 'jug pa yis//mthong dang de bzhin sgrub na ni//rtog
263a4(rgyud): pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro//de bas rtag te bsgrub par bya//dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro//dkyil 'khor bris pa de nyid du//phyag rgya shes pa sgrub pa'i phyir//brtson
263a5(rgyud): 'grus btan pas thams cad kyi//bla med pas ni slob par bya//las kyi dkyil 'khor ro//dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa tsam gyis ma sgrub par las thams cad byed/ji ltar/
263a6(rgyud): dga' ba'i cho ga 'am rtog pa las bshad pa bsgrubs shig/'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las rdo rje 'khor lo'i rtog pa'o///
263a7(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das la na mkha'i mdzod byang chub sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog/
263b1(rgyud): po chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po stsal bar bgyi ste/snying po gang brjod pa tsam gyis mchod pa thams cad kyi gnasu 'gyur ba'o//bcom ldan 'das kyi smros shig/ces gsungs//
263b2(rgyud): de nas na mkha' mdzod kyis gsungs pa/oM ga ga nA saM b+hA ba badz+ra bA tsa ho//de nas de'i dus bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor thaMd lan ma Sh+Ta las mchod pa kun 'byung bar byas//
263b3(rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/rdo rje 'khor lo bzhin du bri//de yi dbu su nor chen te//na mkha' dang por bzhugs par bya//rgyal ba kun gyis bskor ba bya'o//dang por slob dpon
263b4(rgyud): 'jug pa ni//mchod pa kun mchog phyag rgyaso//dkyil 'khor de ru bzhugs nas ni//rdo rje thams cad brjod par bya//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'grub ste//de bzhin du slob ma
263b5(rgyud): yang bcug nas rdo rje thams cad kyi dam tshig gi snying po 'di brjod la phyag rgya yang slobs shig/mchod pa thams cad ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro//de nas na mkha'i dkyil 'khor
263b6(rgyud): te//yid kyi dkyil 'khor bris la der zhugs shing /zhugs nas 'dri skad brjod cig/'di dag thams cad ni nam mkha' nyid de bden pa gang gis nam gzugs med pa las gzu
263b7(rgyud): 'byung ba des na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang /yid la 'dod pa'i grub pa thams cad na mkha' las 'byung bar gyur cig/ces byas nas 'dug ste/rdo rje
264a1(rgyud): na rgyun su/ma sngon du ston pa las su ma pad+d+ha s+yA dang /dran rnams cad dang /spyan ma chags pa pams
264a2(rgyud): nga byung bar 'gyur//rdo rje kyil 'khor ro//dkyil 'khor bris nas btsud de 'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig pa zhes brjod cig/'byung ba kun las na mkha' ni//'byung
264a3(rgyud): bIlbu ba'o//namakha le ni 'dod pa 'thung //'dod pa'i mchod pa zla gyur gyi//ces smras na/'dis khyod kyis de du ni gshegs pa thams cad mchud tsakrA ni sri ba b+hU
264a4(rgyud): shig/dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro//skuT ma na nakha' la yid kyis dkyil 'khor 'drir bcug la/der slob ma yid kyis mchod pa yang skabs shig/yid kyis
264a5(rgyud): skad med ci//rnamakha'i mchod des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mo mchod de nas nyin re zhing byas ni 'grung ba/'jig rten gsum lngas rgyal ba'i rnan pa chen po'i
264a6(rgyud): rgyal ba las na mkha' mdzod kyi rtag pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'phags po byams pa byang chub sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom
264a7(rgyud): ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po sprul par bgyi ste/gang brjed pa tsam gyis sems
264b1(rgyud): can thams cad byams pa'i sems skyed par 'gyur ba'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu smros shig ces gsungs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das byams pa byang chub sems
264b2(rgyud): dpas rang gi snying po 'di gsungs//oM mai tr-i dr-i D+ha tsi ta tiSh+Tha hA//de nas 'di brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byams pa'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par
264b3(rgyud): zhugs te bzhugaso//de nas dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/'khor li'i dkyil 'khor bris pa der byams pa bzhag ste/de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi dang /byang chub sems dpa' bzhi bya ste/
264b4(rgyud): ge bstan pa'i phyag rgyas zhugs la 'di zhes brjod do//badz+ra dr-i D+ha tiSh+Tha/de nas byams pa'i ting 'dzin la snyems par zhugs nas slob ma de bzhin du dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad
264b5(rgyud): du 'jug pa'i tshul gyis btsud do//btsud nas byams pa chen po'i phyag rgya bslab ste/de nas go chas bskon no//bstan pa chen po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro//de nas byams pa'i
264b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/byams pas zhugs la byams pa'i ting 'dzin sgrubs shig/byams pa'i dkyil 'khor ro//dkyil 'khor du bcug la 'di zhes brjod do//rengs sam
264b7(rgyud): yang na khros kyang rung //mdza' dang sdang ba de bzhin te//'gro las gal te rgyal 'dod na//byams pa chen po sgom par gyis//dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro//de nas dkyil 'khor
265a1(rgyud): dubargyad la 'di sla'o//sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshalo//sems can thams cad dge bar gyung //'byung po thams ca la byams pa dang /byol
265a2(rgyud): song thams cad la ma 'jigs pa sbyin no//las kyi dkyil 'khor//byams pa bsgoms pas grub pa thams cad ci 'dod pa'i bo sgrub pa sgrung po las rnams kyang yid kyi
265a3(rgyud): 'dod pa'i tshig dang byams pas ba sgrubs shig/'jig rten gsum lngas rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las byams pa'i rtog pa'o//de nas bcom ldan

265a5(rgyud): oM dr-i/oM b+hin+d+ha badz+ra shu laM/oM ts+tshin+da hUM \u0f7fkra phaT/oM b+hur b+hu ba swa swA hA/oM ha ra b+hin+ta badz+ra hUM phaT/oM la la la la oM bi shi g+ha N+De Tan/de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor 'byung
265a6(rgyud): skye dkyil 'khor zlum pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gri'i sted du'i dbu su dbang phyug chen po b+h+r-i/der gzhan dag kyang rim gyis thams cad blo ga ma/bzhag pa 'am/mthar ni chen
265a7(rgyud): bye thig le yang bzhag/de nas thog mar slob dpon gyis gsal phur gsum pa'i rtags kyi phyag rgya bcings la 'dug/g.yon logs mas rdo rje'i slob ma yang bcug ste/
265b1(rgyud): de nas phyag rgya yang bslab po//de phyin rgod thams cad 'grub cing 'jig rten thams cad kyi rig 'dzin du 'gyur ro//'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po lus rig pa'i/
265b2(rgyud): blon po chen po'i rtog po'o//de nas rdo rje 'khyil pa la sogs pa rdo rje khro bos 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po phul ba/oM a mr-i ta
265b3(rgyud): kuN li kha kha kha kha kro d+ha dzA lA mA la hUM phaT/oM ma hA pra ba s+pho Ta ya hUM phaT/oM kA la daN+Da ha na ha na hUM phaT/oM kA la pA shA gra A kaR+Sha hUM phaT/de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/

265b5(rgyud): nas phyag rgya bcings pa bsla'o//de nas thams cad dgug pa dang /dbang du bya ba dang /gtan 'pho ba dang /srung ba 'grub bo//rdo rje khro bo'i rtog pa'o//de nas rdo rje srin po la sogs pa

265b7(rgyud): tAn swA hA/oM dza ya bi dza ya hUM phaT/de nas dkyil 'khor 'byung ste/gzhu lta bur dkyil 'khor bri sa~M le der rdo rje bzhag/g.ya su 'ang gnyis g.yon du'ang gnyis//de nas rdo
266a1(rgyud): rje srin bu'i phyag rgyas btsud de/de nas phyag rgya bslabs pa nas cho ga bslabs pa ni/gang dge ba dang drin gzo dang //lha yi 'khor mthong ma gtogs par//
266a2(rgyud): gzhan rnams de dag thams cad kun//mi dge ba rnams gtan 'phor bya//'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las tshogs kyi gtso'i rtog pa'o//

266a7(rgyud): ldan 'das bdag cag kyang 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bulo//oM dA ra hi sh+tso da ka Ta big to d+hi ra sarba na kha na kha na hU~M/
266b1(rgyud): phaT/oM sarba pA ra da Ta hU~M phaT/oM bi ka tau ka daMSh+Ta bin+da hU~M phaT/oM ma hA ma Ni ha ra ha ra hUM phaT/de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor 'di'o//gru gsum par bris lA/mngon gsum pa'i phyag
266b2(rgyud): rgyas zhugs nas gar gyi phyag rgya bcing ba bslab ste/gor gyi mchod pas ni dbus kyi rdo rje la mchod do//'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las bran

266b4(rgyud): smras pa/oM badz+ra kro d+ha ra li hUM phaT/oM badz+ra tsakra tshin+d+ra hUM phaT/oM shAn+ti hUM oM badz+ra muSh+Ti ha na shi ne d+ha ha na hUM phaT/oM ku mA ra ha bi sha g+ha Na ti ka ra Na ti na tsA lA ya sarba duSh+TAn hUM phaT/
266b5(rgyud): de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa de'i sgor 'khor la sogs pa bri'i//de'i dbus rdo rje khro mo'i me lag na rdo rje'i gsal pur tsan bzhag/dam tshig gi che ga ni de bzhin no/
266b6(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum lngas rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo rnams kyi rtog pa'o//de nas rdo rje khro mo rnams kyi rang gi snying po smras pa/oM a
266b7(rgyud): mr-i te hUM phaT/e sau mya kr-i d+he hUM phaT/oM daN+Da d+ha ri Na ha na hUM phaT/oM bi ga li hUM phaT/dkyil 'khor zur brgyad pa bris te/de'i dbusu rdo rje bzhag/cha bzhir bags pa rnams
267a1(rgyud): la bzhi po rim gyis ba 'gro/'jug pa la stsogs pa'i cho ga ni de nyid do//'di ni khro mo'i dkyil 'khor ro//'jig rten gsum lngas rnam par rgyal ba'i rton/
267a2(rgyud): pa chen po'i rgyal po las rdo rje khro mo'i rnams kyi rtog pa'o//de nas tshogs ma mo rnams kyi smras pa/oM kharga ma ri Ni hUM/oM oM sha si ba d+ye hi ra maho//oM pA sha
267a3(rgyud): ye hUM/oM sarba ra ma Ni ra ti pri ye ho//de nas de dag gi dkyil 'khor ni zlum po taM/bsgo bzhi pa dbusu se ral srad bu byas te/thig bzhi btab la rim pa bzhir bri
267a4(rgyud): gzhan yang phyi'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin du zlum por mthig bzhi rim du btab la/de'i dbusu gnod sbyin gyi gdong bri'o//ngos bzhir ni rim gyis te/shar phyogs nas bri
267a5(rgyud): ba'am bzhag par bya'o//sgo bzhir rdo rje'i mngag bzhug ma bri'am/bzhag par bya'o de'i snying po ni 'di'o//b+hi tsi ri Ti b+ho b+ho//de ltar rig pa'i blon mo chen mo l-i sogs pa
267a6(rgyud): thams cad du gyis shig/'di thang cig bzlas pas thams cad khugaso//de nas gdong g.yogs nas lag pa gnyis kyis rkang pa'i mthe bo bzung ste/phyag 'tshal nas
267a7(rgyud): skyil mo krung gi se gar byed cing zhugs la dbab bo//bcangs nas dam tshig byin cig/sarba mA ra khA da pi ba daM hi ba ra sa ma ya ho//de nas de bzhin du dam tshig sbyin no//
267b1(rgyud): gar dang /sil snyan dang /zas dang skom gyis thams cad tshim par byas la dril bus phab ste/de nas dngos grub thams cad dang /bde ba thams cad dang /phun sum tshogs pa
267b2(rgyud): thams cad sbed nas/rnal 'byor dang /nam mkha' la 'gro ba la stsogs pa yang tho bo zhes smos shig/'jig rten gsum lus rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po las rdo rje'i tshogs

267b6(rgyud): la d+ha ri Ni ka Ta ka Ta ma TA ma Ta bi mA ra ya sarba mA ra Ni hUM phaT/oM pu tA ni u tsusma ru drA khA da sarbA na sho Sha ya swA hA/oM mu ka ra mu khi ha ra he ra hUM/dkyil 'khor gru bzhi la sgo
267b7(rgyud): bzhir bris nas/de'i dbus rdo rje bris te/de bzhin gar gyis mchod do//'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las bran mo'i rtog pa'o//
268a1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'angs de bzhin gshegs pas phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsungs//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gla sang ba 'dzin pa khyod yo//
268a2(rgyud): de bsdu na rtog pa'i rgyal po 'dir don yod cing myur du grub par bya ba'i phyir gang gis sems can thams cad dngos grub dam pa de blag tu thob par 'gyur ba'i phyi ma'i rgyud shod cig/de
268a3(rgyud): ci'i phyir zhe na/sems can 'di rnams ni brtson 'grus kyis 'dul te/dad pa dang mi ldan pa/sdig pa byed pa/brdzun smra ba/le lo can/dka' ba spyad pa mi bzod pa
268a4(rgyud): 'dod chags dang bral bas 'dul ba/rtag tu chags pa de dag gi don gyi phyir gang gis sems can de dag bya ba thams cad byed bzhin pa dang /brtson 'grus med pa dang /dka'
268a5(rgyud): ba spyad pa yang med par bde blag tu tshe 'di nyid la myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba de de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyi brlabs kyis shod cig/'dzam bu'i gling gi mi 'di dag ni yul
268a6(rgyud): la mngon par dga' zhing bdag gi grogs po dang /pha dang /ma dang /bu dang /chung ma rnams mthong 'dod cing de yang sred pas 'khol ba ste/phyogs nas phyogasu yang 'gro mi
268a7(rgyud): nus na/sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang /reg 'dzin gyi gan su lta ci smos/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag na rdo rjes phyag 'tshal te/phyi ma'i rgyud bshad do//
268b1(rgyud): da bcom ldan 'das de non par sa pa la byung /pya na rtag lngas skyes//rdo rje yang no ga las byung //phyag rgya stong po'i rig pa dang //sngags rnams khyad par jo zhog yang
268b2(rgyud): gsang ba sgrub pa ji lta bu//phyag rgya bcing ba ji lta bu//de rnams kyi ni de nyid gang //byin gyis brlabs sogs ji lta bu//sgrub pa rnams kyang ji ltar mthong //dngos grub 'dod pa
268b3(rgyud): lta bu//ras la ri mo ji ltar bri//sku gzugs tshad ni ji tsam zhig/ji ltar bzlas pa bya ba gsungs//ji 'dra bar na mcho par bgyi//bsod nams med pas ji ltar 'grub//
268b4(rgyud): ji ltar grub pa myur bar 'gyur//slob dpon du yang ji ltar 'gyur//las rnams bsgrub pa ji lta bya//de dag ga ni de nyid gang //thams cad bdag la bshad pa'i rigs//de nas
268b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba bstan te//sems dpa' theg ma tha ma med//nam kha' skye bo'i mtshan nyid do//kun tu bzang po thams cad bdag/'dod pa 'gro ba bdag po yin/
268b6(rgyud): sems can kun sems gang yin pa//brtan pas sems dpa' zhes bya'o//mnyam par gzhag pas ti 'dzin//nges par rdo rje nyid du 'gyur//de la smras pa/sems
268b7(rgyud): gzugs med pa la ji ltar na sra ba'i rdo rjer 'gyur/smras pa/ji ltar rnam par shes pa la sems can skye ba ni sha dang /rus pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba bzhin te/sdug pa dang /
269a1(rgyud): chags pa dang /bde ba dang /rnam par shes pa gzugs med pa rnams 'dus pa la ba sems can skye ba dang /ji ltar klu rnams khros pas sems rgya
269a2(rgyud): ting 'dzin nges pas na mkha' la gnam lcags 'byung ba 'am/klog dang bcas pa 'byung ba de bzhin du nges pa chags pa dag las rdo rje nyid du 'gyur te/sems dpar byin
269a3(rgyud): rlabs sbyor ba yan/rdo rje sems dpar yang 'gyur//bcom ldan rdo rje de nyid ni//bsgoms pas sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur//de la sems par byin gyis rlob pa'i sbyor
269a4(rgyud): ba gang zhe na/sems dpa' kun gyi bdag che ba//bdag nyid la yang gan so zhes//byin gyis brlabs nas sems dpa' bdag/yin zhes nga rgyal bsgom par bya//de nyid
269a5(rgyud): bcom ldan srem dpa' ste//rdo rje sems dpa' 'am rgyal ba yin//rang sems so sor brtags pa ni//sangs rgyas byang chub de nyid yin//de nyid phyag na rdo rje ste/
269a6(rgyud): rje 'dzin pa'i tshul gyiso//'jig rten dbang po na mkha'i snying //de ltar gzhan yang de nyid do//sangs rgyas rigs kyang de nyid de//de ni rdo rje 'tshang ba'i rigaste//de nyid
269a7(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs kyi rigs//de nyid nor bu'i rigs yin te//khams gsum de nyid yin zhes gsungs//'jig rten gsum po'ang de nyid do//de nyid byed dang 'byin
269b1(rgyud): pa po//sems can kun gyi mos po ste//de nyid sems can gnas yin to//'byung ba tshe rnams de nyid do//de nyid 'gro ba'i mgon po ste//gnas pa dang ni 'gro ba yin//zhes
269b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tham med pa'i sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes gsungaso//de kho na chen po zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa dang po'o////de nas snying po dang /phyag
269b3(rgyud): rgyu dang /sngags dang /rig pa'i khyad par gyi bar du bya ba ste/snying po'i khyad par ni gsang ba dang /tinge 'dzin ces bya'o//de la sems can gyi don gyi phyir gsang ba brjod pa dang /smra ba
269b4(rgyud): ni snying po brjod pa ste/snying po brjod pas ni snying gas bsam pa'i grub pa thob ces bya ba ni snying po'i khyad pa ro//de nas phyag rgya'i khyad par ni//rdo rje'i sku gsung thugs rnams kyi/
269b5(rgyud): gzugs brnyan sbyor ba 'di dag ni//phyag rgya kun gyi khyad par te//'byung ba yang ni de yis bstan//ji ltar jo bo'i rgya mthong na//bran rnams 'gal bar mi byed pa//de bzhin
269b6(rgyud): rgyal ba nyid rnams kyang //phyag rgya 'da' bar yang mi mdzad//rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs//ji ltar gnas dang 'thun byas la//mtshan ma'i phyag rgyar ljon pa yi//sem
269b7(rgyud): dpa' chen por bdag nyid bsgyur//de ni phyag rgya chen po'o//lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi//sor bsngal brtan pa dam tshig ste//sems kyi shes rab ldan pa las//gnyis
270a1(rgyud): phyo las kyi phyag rgya yin//de dag dam tshig rtsa ba ste//rtsa byung bcing brgyu yi mchog/gang gis thams cad lus brten 'gyur//de phyir phyag rgya brjod pa yin//
270a2(rgyud): gang gis thams cad rgyas btab pa//chung ma za zhing rab sbas te//mnga' bdag gzugs brnyan 'chang bas na//sgrub pa po rnams myur du 'gru'o//gling dag mthong na sangs
270a3(rgyud): rgyas dang //sems dpa' la sogs mthong bar 'gyur//dam tshig nyams pas gzir bas na//'da' bar mi 'gyur grub par 'gyur//phyag rgya'i khyad par de yin te//
270a4(rgyud): don dam pa'i de kho na nyid kyang phyag rgya chen po zhes bya'o//de la sngags kyi khyad par ni yin te/ngag tsam spros pa med pa ste//sangs rgyas bka' yis grub pa nyid//chos kyi tshe
270a5(rgyud): gi bskul ba ste//de dag sngogs zhes bya ba yin//de la rig pa'i khyad par ni 'di lta ste/ma rig pa ni med par byed//rig pa de bzhin chud par byed//don rnams rtogs
270a6(rgyud): par gyur pas na//rig pa zhes ni de phyir bya//snying ba dang /phyag rgya dang /sngags dang /rig pa'i rab tu bya ba gnyis pa'o////de nas phyag rgya bcings pa'i rab tu
270a7(rgyud): bya ba ba shad do//zhes bcom ldan 'das bran med pa'i phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye shes rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs//de la phyag rgya chen po ni de nyid bskul ba'i snying pos
270b1(rgyud): ngo//dam tshig dang las kyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje bcing ba dang /brdab pa la sogs pa byas nas bcing //dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid bskul ba'i snying pos phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya/
270b2(rgyud): thams cad bcingango //de yang ma tshogs pa dang /slob ma ma yin pa dang /snod ma yin pa dang /dad pa med pa la mi sbyin no//yun du sbyangs na de dag kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro//de la de kho
270b3(rgyud): na nyid bskul ba'i snying po 'di'o//sa ma ya s+t+waM/de la dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid bskul ba'i snying po ni 'di yin//sa ma ya ho su rau ta s+t+waM/rdo rje khro bos phyag rgya thams cad rang gi
270b4(rgyud): bcing ngam+bu/gzhan cing du gzhug na ni hU~M zhes bya ba thang cig tsam gyi so//de nas rdo rje bcing ba la sogs pa bcing ba 'byung ste/badz+ra ban d+ha zhes brjod la/rdo rje bcing ba snying kar
270b5(rgyud): chings shig/de nas snying po 'dis sor mo thams cad brdab par bya'o//oM badz+ra ban d+he traT/'dis ni phyag rgya thams cad dgug cing dbang du bye //de nas rdo rje ye shes dab ni/
270b6(rgyud): dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing //badz+ra A be sha/zhes brjod la snying po 'dis rdo rje dadang pa bskyed par bya'o//aHthams cad dbab pa'i snying po'i do ni gdon mi za ba'o//de nas rdo rje
270b7(rgyud): chur gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba ne/badz+ra muSh+Ti zhes brjod la bcing //de ste de ltar ma byas na yang sa ma ya s+t+waM/zhes brjod la phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa rigs thams
271a1(rgyud): cad kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lus dang /ngag dang /sems kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyi snying po don yod pa 'da' bar
271a2(rgyud): bya ba ma yin pa ste/stong bzlas pas phyag rgya bcings pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyuraro//dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya lan cig bzlas na grub pa thams cad la ces par
271a3(rgyud): 'gyu ro//de nas phyag rgya bcing ba 'byung ste/thal mo sbyar la sor mo phan tshun bsnol ba ni rdo rje'i thal mo'o//de nyid sor mo'i re bar rnamasu shin tu bsnams pa ni rdo rje
271a4(rgyud): bcing ba'o//de nyid las mthe bo gnyis nang du bcug ste/mthe'u chung dang srin lag gi bar du rab tu tsugs la btsum pa 'di ni rdo rje dbab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya re/
271a5(rgyud): de nyid las mthe bo gnyis gzhibs la nang du bzhugs la de bzhin du mthe'u chung dang srin lag gi bar du tsugs te/mdzub mo shin tu bkug pa ni rdo rje khu tshur dmo tshig
271a6(rgyud): ge phyag rgya'o//de nyid las gnyisu byas pa ni las kyi phyag rgya gzhan du 'gyur te/dam tshig chen po de kho na nyid lan gcig brjod la snying ka 'am/nam mkha' la sa sa/
271a7(rgyud): bcing //ngag gi phyag rgya yang badz+ra dza hra zhes brjod la phyag rgya bcings ngo //lta ba'i phyag rgya ni snying po'i don gyis bcing ngo //so'i phyag rgya dang /mchu'i phyag rgya dang /mig
271b1(rgyud): bskul ba'i phyag rgya dang /snying dang /lus g.yo ba'i phyag rgya ni sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod na bcing ba grub par 'gyuraro//de nas rdo rje hUM zhes pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba 'byung ste/rdo rje khro bo'i
271b2(rgyud): mdzub mo ni rdo rje khu tshur du byasA la mdzub mo brkyang na rdo rje khro bo zhes bya ba yin no//rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub mo gnyis/lag der po snron te bcings nas kyang /'the'u chung lcags kyu/
271b3(rgyud): sbrel byas la/hUM zhes pa ni bsdigs par bya de nyid g.yas pa kyo ba tang du byas pa ni rdo rje'i kyo ba tango //de la 'di ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o//lag 'thal dag tu rdo rje bcing //mtha/
271b4(rgyud): bi bshig pas bo kab pa yis//khu tshur byas pa dam tshig gi/phyag rgya rdo rje khro bo ste//ti rin ti ri zhes bya'o//hUM ni ngag gi phyag rgya'o//ye shes kyi phyag rgya ni thams cad bsod
271b5(rgyud): pa'i khro bo'o//rdo rje'i sa bzhi bcing ba na rdo rje bcing ba sa la brkyang ste bzhag pa 'dis rdo rje'i sa bzhir 'gyur te/de la sus kyang blags mi rnyed//de la 'di ni rdo rje 'dod pa'i
271b6(rgyud): khro bo'i phyag rgya'o//rdo rje bcing ba bcings la mdzub mo rdo rje ltar byas pa ni thams cad la dbang byed pa'i phyag rgya'o//rdo rje'i dam tshig rdo rje bcings la mdzub mo gnyis mnyam
271b7(rgyud): par gshibs pas snying kar gtugs shig/gal te de las 'da' bar byas na snying gas te 'chi'o//rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings la/mdzub mo kyo btang du bcing //ngahU~M
272a1(rgyud): zhing phyir gri byas pa ni//lha rnams dgug pa'i mchog yin na//rdo rje dacings pa brtan byas la//mdzub mo bkug pa shin tu btsir//mthe bo gnyis ka/
272a2(rgyud): gshibs pa yis//dbusu btsir ba bar snang gi/rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la//mthe'u chung gnyis ka sbrel na su//mdzub mo yi ni rgyab sbyar te//bzlog pa na mkhar
272a3(rgyud): rgyu rnams kyi'o//rdo rje bcing ba brtan byas nas//khu tshur gyis na sa mnan pa//'di ni sa pa'i dam tshig te//thams cad byed par 'da' bar dka'o//rdo rje khu tshur gnyis /
272a4(rgyud): bcings te//g.yon pa'i mdzub mos 'dzub mo btsir//'the'u chung sor mo mnyam brdab pa//'di ni 'og ma rnams dgug pa'o//mdzub mo gnyis ka brtan pa ru//rdo rje bci
272a5(rgyud): pa sbrel bar bya//gung mo mthe bo rdo rjer bya//rgyan rnams thams cad 'joms pa'o//rdo rje dkri ba dang /rdo rje btsir ba dang /rdo rje phreng ba dang /rdo rjes dang /rdo rje sa'i 'gro dang /
272a6(rgyud): rdo rje he ru ka'o//de la rdo rje shugs kyi phyag rgya na 'di'o//dkyil 'khor dag ni byed pa na//srang bu 'am yang na ri mo la//'jug pa dang ni 'byung ba ni//sgrub pas yid kyis
272a7(rgyud): gtogs naso//de la ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i snying po ni 'di'o//oM badz+ra be gau hUM 'dis ni dam tshig ma nyams par 'gyuraro//gzhan du dam tshi ge nyams pa grub pa med pas
272b1(rgyud): 'gyur ro//de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cud lnga phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di'o//dpung pa gnyis rdo rje bcings te/rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyisu byas la dbus mo btsugs to/mgo nga
272b2(rgyud): sa la btsugs te phyag bya'o//phyag na rdo rje la ni de nyid kyi dang pa'i stobs kyis gnas par byas la/'dzum zhing skyod pa dang /smin ma 'byed pa dang bcas pa'i mig gis phyag bcwa pa
272b3(rgyud): gzhan rnams la ni dbus mo bcugs pa'o//de la rdo rje 'dzin ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing ba ni 'di yin te/lag po gnyis kyi rgyab sbyar nas mthe bong mthe'u chung sbrel bar bya'o//rdo
272b4(rgyud): 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya 'dri//sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du byed//pra tin+d+ra badz+ra/snying po 'dis me tog gtor ro//rdo rje kyo ba tang gi phyag rgya ni rdo rje 'dzin ma'i mdzub mo gnyis kyu ba tang gi
272b5(rgyud): tshul du bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa dang /sems can thams cad dkrug pa'i dam tshig 'da' bar mi bya ba ste/dam tshig lcags kyu yin no//de nas de
272b6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtog pa'i phyag rgya ba cing ba 'byung ste/rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis bcings nas g.yas pas bsdams par bya ba ni//rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub mo g.yon//sangs
272b7(rgyud): rgyas byang chub mchog bsam pa'o//de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni 'di'o//mthe bong ni gnyis ka'i skyil mo krung //mdzub ma gnyis ka
273a1(rgyud): dgug par bya//rdo rje thal mo 'od dkyil 'khor//gung mo gnyis ka khA 'byed pa//'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i phyag rgya ste//de bzhin ga
273a2(rgyud): pa thams cad dgug pa dang /gzhug pa dang /dbang du bya ba las 'da' bar mi 'gyur zhing /'di mthong bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku mthong bar 'gyuraro//de na//
273a3(rgyud): badz+ra bid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste//sems ni rnam dag shes bya ba//brtan pas sems dpa' zhes bya'o//mnyam par gzhag pas ting nge 'dzin//nges pas rdo rje nyid du 'gyu/
273a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas ngo bo'i bdag nyid de//sems nyid sangs rgyas nyid yin no//sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pa//nges par sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur//phyag rgya chen po bci
273a5(rgyud): nas de sgomo//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rang gi sems so sor brtags pa la sogs pas sangs rgya su yongasu sbyar ba byas nas ji ltar tshe 'di nyid la
273a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur te/de ltar byin gyis rlob pa mdzad do//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis khu tshur ni las kyi phyag rgya'o//de nas phyag na rdo rje'i phyag
273a7(rgyud): rgya chen po ni 'di yino//lus dang ngab sems rdo rje yis//phyag na rdo rjer bdag nyid 'gyur//rdo rje 'gying pa rab 'byed cing //'gying dang bcas pas rdo rje gsor//'di
273b1(rgyud): yis kun 'gro skad cig gis//'od dang gyen du 'gro bar 'gyur//'dod pa kun dbang thams cad pa//phyag na rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur//de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o//rdo rje bcing ba
273b2(rgyud): bcings nas kyang //gung mo nang bcug snying kar bzhag/mtha'o mthe'u chung kha phye mnyam//rdo rje chen po de ltar bcing //sems dpa' kun gyi ting 'dzin gyis//'di ni snying kar//
273b3(rgyud): bcings pa yis//phyag rgya kun gyi dngos grub pa//dam pa dag kyang thob par 'gyur//de la ye shes kyi phyag rgya ni 'di'o//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus ni//lus drang dag sems//
273b4(rgyud): rdo rje yis//phyag na rdo rje bdag gi lus//bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur//rdo rje khu tshur gnyis byas la//bgying bcas rdo rje gsor byas na//bgying zhing gyen du ston
273b5(rgyud): tshul gyis//snying kar bzung na 'grub par 'gyur//de la bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i phyag rgya bcing ba ni/'di yin no//rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la//g.yon pa gzhu 'dren//
273b6(rgyud): sbyar ba dang //mda' 'phen pa yi tshul gyi su//kun la bsnun na chags par byas//bcom ldan 'das dbang bkur ba'i phreng ba'i phyag rgya bcing ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
273b7(rgyud): sgo'i phyag rgya gtsug tor du bzhag/de nas phab ste gung mo rdo rjer byas te//de las bskor te gung mo nor bur byas la/g.yas phyogasu bzhago/lhag par gung mo'i rdo rje'i pad+ma/
274a1(rgyud): bzhag go//de las bskor te/gung mo dang mthe'u chung dgyes par byas la g.yon du bzhago//de nas mdzub mo gnyis mdud pa byas te/phreng ba bcing pa'i tshul
274a2(rgyud): du lhag par mdud pa byas la//sor mo thams cad mthe'u chung nas mthar gyis 'jig pa'i tshul gyis dgrol ba ni cod panA gyi tshul bzhin dgro lo//phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o//
274a3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i sems sgrub par 'dod pas lha mo'i dkyil 'khor byas te/de nas nyin gcig bcing bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas//
274a4(rgyud): ji lta bu'i dus ci nus pas ci 'dod pa bde bar byas la/phyag rgya chen po'i tshul gyi glu dbyangs kyi rdo rje'i tshig tu rdo rje sems dpa' bzlas te/snying po 'di ci 'dod pas bzlas
274a5(rgyud): oM ma hA su khaM badz+ra satwa dzaHhUM bI ho su ra ta s+t+wa~M//de ltar gcig bzlas te sku'o//zla ba gcig lon pa'i mjug tu tshes bco lnga la ngal na phyag rgya bkrol la/rdo rje'i thal
274a6(rgyud): mo brkyang nas lus thams cad kyi phyag bya'o//cung zad gnas nas ji ltar ngal bar mi 'gyur bar byas te/de ltar mtshan rengs par bzlas na de'i nang par bcom
274a7(rgyud): ldan 'das zla ba'i kha dog zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang mtshungs pa'i 'od can byon te/sgrub pa po 'khyud nas de'i lus kun tu zhugaso//de nas sgrub pa po yang zla ba'i
274b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'i 'od can dang /zla ba'i 'od can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phreng ba la sogs pa dang /lha'i rgyan thams cad kyi brgyan pa/rdo rje 'dzin gyi lus dang ngang/
274b2(rgyud): dang /sems rdo rje thams cad dang 'dra bar 'gyuraro//bdag gi rigs dang /gnyen dang /grogs po dang /gnyen bshes la sogs pa dang /sems can thams cad kyis gzugs bzang po
274b3(rgyud): mthong na yang 'chi bar mi 'gyuraro//lta bar byed do//mchod par byed do//ston par byed do//don thams cad byed//de yang rang gi khyim de nyid na gnas bzhin du lha'i cho 'phrul byed do///
274b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs par yang gyur nas rdzu 'phrul dang /cho 'phrul thams cad byed do//rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis kyang 'dul bar byed//sems can de dag gis kyang mtha
274b5(rgyud): ma btul ba rnams kyang 'dul//ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugasu 'gyur ba dang /thams cad du 'gro ba dang /phyir 'ong ba dang /gyen du 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
274b6(rgyud): du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byas nas phyir 'od ba'i bar du'o//don thams cad la longs spyod pa dang /'dod pa thams cad la dbang ba dang /'dod pa thams cad
274b7(rgyud): spyod pa tshe na mkha' dang mtshungs par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//de nas rdo rje 'dod pa khro bo'i phyag rgya bcings pa ni rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis ba
275a1(rgyud): pa las/mnga' 'phen pa'i tshul gyis me tog gi gzhu 'dran pa ni thams cad dga' bar byed pa yin//rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis kyis snying kar rdo rje hU~M zhes pa ste/g.yas
275a2(rgyud): pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis 'phen pas rdo rje 'phangs pas ni thams cad gtan 'pho'o//de nas 'di ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o//rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcangs te/de ltar kye ba mthe'u chung
275a3(rgyud): mdzub//mdud nas mthe bong gshibs pa yis//bsdums te snying khar bzhag par bya//'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa nges par dgug pa dang /gzhun
275a4(rgyud): pa dang /bcing ba dang /dbang du bya ba dang /'dren par byed pa'o//rdo rje khu tshur gyis 'khyud pa'i rdo dga'a'i byug rgyu'o//dam rji mi byab rgya byu ste/rde bcing ba bsdams byas nas/g.yon
275a5(rgyud): pa'i mdzub mtheb mo mtshan du//mthe bo'i rtogs ni btsud na su//de bskyang bar du bsdom par bya//'dis ni bud med thams cad dga' bar byed do//rdo rje khu tshur gnyis
275a6(rgyud): kyis rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'i tshul du bya'o//rdo rje rgyal mtshan//dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'byung ste/rdo rje bcings pa bsdam byas nas//mdzub mo gnyis ni dgug par bya//srin
275a7(rgyud): lag gshibs la mthe'u chung bskyed//de ltar mthe bo'i gnyis kyang bkyed//'di bstan pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang byams pa bstan par mdzod na gzhan
275b1(rgyud): ci smras/rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis snyems par byed pa ni rdo rje snyems pa'o//dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'byung ste/rdo rje bcing bkun byas nas//rtsib logs gnyisu bskor nas//'dzin pas bskyod pas
275b2(rgyud): 'dud pa ste//khro bo thams cad mgu bar byed//rdo rje sems dpa' mchog bcas dang //rdo rje gar gyi rab sbyor bas//mdor na me tog la sogs pa'i//gsang ba'i mchod pa myur du 'grub/
275b3(rgyud): rtog pa gzhan gyi gsang ba'i mchod pa dang yang sbyar//de nas rdo rje gar 'byung ste//rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas//'dzum pas mtha' nas brtsams te dgrol//glog bzhin bsgyur/
275b4(rgyud): te bskor zhing dgrol//'gram pa dang ni gtsug go tor bzhag/rdo rje gar zhes bya ba ste//bdag che'i mchod pa thams cad//mchod pa 'di ni gsol bas na//dngos med nyid kyang myur//
275b5(rgyud): du 'grub//de nas rdo rje gzugs la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba ni//rdo rje bcing ba brkyang la mthil du blta'o//rdo rje bcings pas bayon pa'i mdzub mo ni pi bang gi shing ngo //g.yas pa/
275b6(rgyud): bkug pas nI lan te/brkyang ba'i lhag mthil gyis rang gi rang gi snying kar byug/me tog gi thal mo'i tshul gyi rdo rje ro btung bar bya'o//rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis bcangs te/g.yon pa'i
275b7(rgyud): mthe'u chung ni g.yas pa'i kyo ba tang gis bzung //kyo btang nge g.yas pas sems dpa'i dam tshig thams cad dang /sems can thams cad kyang dgug/rdo rje bcings la mtho bo 'dud pa ni zhags
276a1(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya'o//rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mdzub mo spel ba ni thams cad bcing //rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgyas ni thams cad 'bebs par byed//de nas go cha'i phyag rgya
276a2(rgyud): 'byung ste/khu tshur bcing ba gnyis kar mdud pa'i tshul du bya'o//spos nas yang lhag par yang de bzhi no//spros nas snying kar yang de bzhi no//yang bar du yang mdud//yang
276a3(rgyud): spros nas snying kha dang /lhag par yang de bzhi no//mgo la yang de bzhin du dbang bskur ba'i gan su'o//phreng ba bcing ba'i 'dud pa'i tshul gyi mtha'u chung la sogs pa'i sor mo thaMd
276a4(rgyud): dgrol ba'i cod pan gyi tshul du bya'o//de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i phyag rgya bcing ba ni/pad+mo zum pa'i thal mo sbyar//pad+mo chen por grags pa ste//mthe'u chung mtheH/
276a5(rgyud): gnyis 'byed pa//sdig pa rnams ni srel ba'o//de nyid mdzub ma kyo btang du byas pa ni thod 'gug pa'o//de nas pad+mo 'byung ste/rdo rje bcings po'i mdzub mo gnyis bkug la mthe bong mnyam pa
276a6(rgyud): stasnang du gung mo gnyis bzhi'o//de gnyis byas nas g.yon pa la g.yas pos pad+mo 'byed par bya'o//de nas pad+mo gi gi phyog rgyu ni hU~M//ye shes kyi phyag rgya ni pad+mo 'byed pas 'dod chags las/
276a7(rgyud): pa'i dri ma sbyong bar gsungs pa nyid//de nas na mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya bcings po ni nor bu'i khu tshur gnyis kis dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba bcing //de nas rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya ni rdob cing bkun rtsa
276b1(rgyud): rgyas+ya//mdzub mo mnyam nas mtheb dang sgyu //de dag ngos spyad pa ste//bang bskur gAnas dbang sbyi//de nyid khwa yarang bstan la snying kar bzhag pa ni nor bu'i khu tshur zhes pa sha //don tha~Md 'phrog pa'o//de nyid las ma n+ta/
276b2(rgyud): bopo'i rdo rjes mdzub mo mnyam pa mnan to//rgyab bskum pa ni rdo rje'i nor bu'o// chos kyi phyag rgya'o//yis kyi phyag rgya zing na mkhar sgom pa'o//de nas rdo rjekhu tshur gyi phyag rgya bcing ba ni//de ltar sngar bshad pa nyid//ngaM ni//
276b3(rgyud): byab rgya'o//rnams pa'i bcing ni ci 'i nang na mchog ste/yis kyi byag rgya'o//bdud du ni rdo rje rje da'i byag rgya'o//gar su ni rdo rjerin po che'i phya ga rgya bstan pa nyid/khye ni rnaM cing ba snyi/ ga nas mthi sbya te/mdzu mo sa
276b4(rgyud): don+dan myo/ ma ba d+ha//rdo me ma da tshwa kyis snyi/ d+he ba di rdzo / wang bying pa cig gi phyag rgyaste/thu tha~M stsol phyag rgya'i kyim nga 'o/nas pa mau pal gyi bya
276b5(rgyud): bani dang la chur mdzub mo ci me krug pa 'di ni ral bri'o//gnyis pa ni glegs dam mo//dam tshig gi phyeb rgya'o//g.yon po'i glegs drim bcings pa'i mthe'i chung ni g.yas pa'i ril gri 'dzin pas btsug/
276b6(rgyud): A/chos kyi phyag rgya'o//chos thams cad la yi ge med ces bya ba ni ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o//de nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ba cing ba ni rdo rje'i khu chur gnyis bcangs te/mthe'u chung mdzub mo'i dra/
276b7(rgyud): rjerib cing //rdo rje 'khor lo zhes bshad/dkyil 'jo thams cad sgrub pa'o//di mthong sa kyil lang thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin du dus la 'azhag ste bzlas na dkyil 'khor zed du nung
277a1(rgyud): par 'gyur zhing de bzhin du sgrub par 'gyur ro//hUM/chos kyi phyag rgya'o//de nas nam mkha' mdzod kyi phyag rgya bcing ba ni rdo rje nor bu'i phyag rgyu las mthe'u chung dang srin
277a2(rgyud): lag mnyam pa'i rgyal mtshan sgreng ba'i tshul du bya'o//chos kyi phyag rgya ni/trAM/'phags pa byams pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i phyag rgya bcing po ni rdo rje go cha'i phyag rgya'o//ngag
277a3(rgyud): gi phyag rgya ni oM//de nas rtog pa thams cad spyi'i phyag rgya shes pa 'byung ste/de la lus kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni 'di lta ste/'greng yang rung /'dug kyang rung /rkang pa bsgoms te/brkyang
277a4(rgyud): pa dang /lag pa sgreng ba ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o//mchog bsgrub pa la rdo rje dang mtshungs par 'gyur ro//langs nas g.yon pas rdo rje khu tshur bcangs nas g.yas pa bkug pas drangs pa ni rdo rje lcags
277a5(rgyud): klu'i phyag rgya ste/thams cad 'dren pa'i phyag rgya yin no//langs la pus mo bkyed de bkug nas lag pa gnyis bsdams te gyen du brkyang ba ni thams cad gtan 'pho ba'i ral gri'o//dpung pa
277a6(rgyud): gnyis kyi rang gi snying kar 'khyud pa ni go cha ste mi byed pa'o//de nas rang gi phyag rgya bcing ba ni/a ho haM hUM/dbab pa dang /dbang du bya ba dang /srung ba dang /gtan 'pho ba'i phyag rgya'o//de nas
277a7(rgyud): lta ba'i phyag rgya 'byung ba ni//myur 'gyur rdo rje'i lta ba ste//bgrad de btsums pa 'dren pa yin//khro ba'i lta ba khro gnyer te//brtan par lta ba mi g.yo ba'o//de nas 'di dag gi las 'byung ba ni
277b1(rgyud): rdo rje'i ltabs skye 'gro thams cad mgu bar bya'o//bgrad pa'i lta bas ni thams cad dgug pa dang /rims dang /gdon dang /dug dang /byad ma la sogs pa dang /nang thams cad sel to//khro bo'i lha
277b2(rgyud): pas ni thams cad gtan 'pho'o//brtan por lta bas ni thams cad srung ngo //de la snying po ni 'di rnams yin no//badz+ra dr-iSh+Ti ma Ta/dIp+ta dr-iSh+Ti oMng ku sha dza/aM kro d+ho dr-iSh+Ti phaT/dr-i D+ho dr-iSh+Ti haM/so'i phyag rgya bu
277b3(rgyud): ste/so bca' bas ni gtan 'bo'o//mur bas ni dbang du byed do//snying po bzlas shing khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin bzlas te phyag rgya'i las byed do//g.yas nas bcu pa ni 'gug pa'o//g.yon pas
277b4(rgyud): bcu pa ni dbang du byed pa'o//ma mtshus sa mnan pas ni gton 'pho'o//mchu gnyis ka bsdams pas ni srung ngo //sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /rdo rje 'dzin pa rjes su dran pa dang /rdo rje khrob
277b5(rgyud): rje su dran pa dang /rdo rje rjes su dran pa ni thams cad sgrub pa ste/mchu'i phyag rgya'o//mig g.yas pa bskyod pas dbang du byed do//mig g.yon pa bskyod pas rjes su chags so//gnyis ka btsums
277b6(rgyud): pas ni gtun 'phro'o//gnyis ka bgrad pas ni srung ngo //thams cad kyi snying po bzlas te gyen du ltas na nam mkha' lo 'gro bar 'gyur ro//thur du bltas na sa'i dbang por 'gyur ro//g.yas nas
277b7(rgyud): bskor ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod de//g.yon nas bskor ba ni phyag na rdo rje 'i mched de/thams cad kyi snying po stong bzlas nas sgrub bo//de nas phyi rol gyi rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgyab cing
279a1(rgyud): bu 'byung ste/de la 'jig rten pa'i phyag rgya rnams ni 'jig rten du'i bu tshur las 'byung ste/rdo rje khu rgyur ni rdo rje bcings pa las/gadron pa'i mthe bo nang du bcug nas ma
279a2(rgyud): chung dang srin lag gi bar du btsir la bsdam par bya ste/de nyid la phyag rgya'i snying po 'di'i bum bzlas te sgrub bo//oM badz+ra mu drA hUM/rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis su byas te/g.yas pas mtshan ma
279a3(rgyud): ji ltar byas pa bzhin du bzung ngo //ma rnams thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcing ba ni 'di bzhin du rdo rje'i khu tshur las g.yen pa rdo rje'i khro bo'i mdzub mo sgreng ba ste/dur khrod dam/tshogs kyi gnas su
279a4(rgyud): rdo rje khro bo'i mdzub mes mi khrag thigs pa gsum khar blangs te myangs nas mi ro ma smras shing ma nyams pa rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te brgya bzlas na na mkha' la 'gro ba dang /mi snang bar 'gyur ba
279a5(rgyud): dang /byang ma thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro//tshogs de dag thams cad kyi dbang por 'gyur ro//theg 'jug pa dang phan 'dogs rus par 'gyur ro//mkha' 'gre mya'i bde ba'i mchog thams
279a6(rgyud): cad dang //rtog pa thams cad dang /las thams cad dang /phyag rgya thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro//de nas khro bo'i khu tshur sgrub pa'i snying po ni 'di yin no//oM badz+ra A ra li/phyag rgya bcing
279a7(rgyud): pa'i bar du'o//de nas de'i rjes la phyag rgya thams cad kyi gsang ba'i bsgrub pa'i skabs bshad par d+ya te/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya gsang ba sgrub pa ni dkyil 'khor dri ste/der
279b1(rgyud): 'di skad brjod do//bcom ldan phyag rgya btsun mo 'dre//rtag tu bdag la stsal bar stsol//sems can kun gyi don grub phyir//grub pa mchog ni sgrub par bgyi//phyag na rdo rje dkyil 'khor nas 'di zhes
279b2(rgyud): brjed do//su ra te sA ma ya s+t+waM ho//badz+ra sAt+ma Ad+ya sid+d+ha nan/de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnams kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya sgrub pa ni byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che/rtag tu bdag la grub
279b3(rgyud): pa stsol//de nas phyi rol gyi rdo rje rigs kyi gsang po sgrub pa ni phyag ni rdo rje khro bo ni thams cad byed pa yin no zhes de skad brjod l-I nga sgrub par bya'o//ma rnams kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya sgrub pa ni dkyil
279b4(rgyud): 'khor du zhugs nas b+h+yo b+h+yo zhes brjod cig/gsang bri bsgrub pa'i rab tu bya ba'o//de nas phyog rgya'i de kho na 'byung ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya'i de kho na ni sems las sangs rgyas kyi
279b5(rgyud): chos 'byung ngo //yang dag par na 'di dag ste/de bzhin poshegs pa'i btsun mo'i thugs la gnas pa yino//bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yin pas bdag gi chung ma yin pas/bdag gi
279b6(rgyud): chung ma yi ni no zhes sngang bsgoms la phyag rgya sgrub po//phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i de kho na ni/rab dga' bcing ba kun gyi mchog/de las phyag rgya rnams su byas//'dod pa rdo rje sems dpa' yis/
279b7(rgyud): grub brtan myur du stsol bar mdzad//de nas gzhan dag ni//bcom ldan rtog pa 'dod pa ste//de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'o//de las thams cad bdag nyid gzugs//bdag kyang phyag rgya grub
280a1(rgyud): par shog/de nas phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs kyi phyag rgyu yis//de kho na ni phyag na rdo rje lha thams cad dbang du byas nas rdo rjer byas te/de dag gi phyag rgya yang rdo rje'i phyag rgya nyid de//
280a2(rgyud): de nas ma rnams kyi phyag rgya'i de kho na nyid ni ma rung thams cad za bo'i phyir//lha rnams kun gyis byas pa ste//phyag rgya 'bebs pas de'i phyir//bsgoms nas kyang ni bsgrub par bya//de bzhin gshe
280a3(rgyud): pa'i de kho na rab tu sbyor bas thog mar bsgom nas sgrub bo//phyag rgya'i de kho na'i rab tu bya ba'o//de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'i las bshad do//zhes nas bcom ldan
280a4(rgyud): 'das phyag na rdo rje so gsungs pa/nyin re dang po dus bzhin du//rgya che che mchog phyag rgya yis//snying kha smin mtshams lkog mo bcug/bdag nyid byin gyis brlab par bya//de la byin gyis brlab
280a5(rgyud): pa'i snying po ni 'di yin no//badz+ra satwa/badz+ra rat+na badz+ra d+harmA/badz+ra kArma/de la 'di ni rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i snying po yin no//oM sarba ta thA ga ta a bi Shiny+tsa/snying po 'dis rdo rje rin po
280a6(rgyud): che'i phyag rgya smin mtshams su bzhag ste/mdzub mo gnyis kyis phreng ba'i tshul du bcings la/lhag par mdud pa'i tshul du byas nas bskor te/mthe'u chung nas brtsams te bkrol bas sor
280a7(rgyud): mo thams cad bkrol te dar sbyangs pa ltar bya'o//de nas ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes bskyod pa ni rdo rje bcings pa bkan te phang par bzhag nas sgom pa'i snying po 'dis rang gi snying kar rdo rje bsam mo//
280b1(rgyud): oM badz+ra At+ma ka/rdo rje'i bzlas pas ci 'dod pa bzlas so//de nas rdo rje mchod pa'i rab tu bya ba ni//rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis bcangs nas//rdo rje 'gying ba legs par bya//rdo rje phreng ba de bzhin gru//rdo rje
280b2(rgyud): gar kyang spyi bo nas//der bstod pa'i rdo rje'i glu blang zhing mchod par bya'o//rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa'o//rdo rje rin chen bla med de//rdo rje chos ni blar blangs pas//rdo rje lus ni mdzad par gsil//
280b3(rgyud): dga' ba dang //dbang bskur ba dang /glu dang mchod pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyang rnyed par mi dka' na grub pa gzhan lta ci smos/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ltar sems dpa'i bde ba 'di dang
280b4(rgyud): mtshungs pa med do//de nas phyag rgya rdo rje sa'i byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa 'byung ste/nyin re dang por dus bzhin du//rdo rje'i byin gyis brlab tshul gyis//bdag gis bdag nyid byin parlab
280b5(rgyud): nas//sems dpar byin rlabs rnal 'byor ldan//rdo rje dang bcas rdo rje bcing //rdo rje'i 'bebs la sogs tshul gyis//rdo rje khu tshur rdo rje btsos//gnyis byas phyag rgya'i mchog gis su//bdag nyid byin
280b6(rgyud): gyis brlab par bya//'dod pa bdag nyid zhes kyang sgom//de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi//gsang ba'i snying po bzlas par bya'o//de la gsang ba'i snying po 'di rdo rje'i glus ci 'drod pa bzlas so//Tak+ki dza ho//
280b7(rgyud): de nas sgrub pa gzhan yang rdo rje bcing bas rtags bzung ste 'bum bzlas na 'dod pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug dang /'dod pa'i gzugs dang /'dod pa'i tshe dang /'dod pa'i bdag po dang /kun du 'gro
281a1(rgyud): pa thams cad grub par 'gyur ro//de nas phyag na rdo rje'i dbang skur pa'i rab tu bya ba 'byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba ji lta ba bzhin du/
281a2(rgyud): snying po 'dis sbyin no//oM sarba ta thA ga ta rat+na a b+hi She ka a/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes bskyed pa ting nge 'dzin la dmigs pa ni ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sems
281a3(rgyud): tsacan thams cad nyid yin pa de bzhin du bdag kyang thams cad nyid do zhes nas snying po 'dis thams cad dgug pa dang /gzhog pa dang /bcing ba dang /dbang du byas te sgom mo//de la snying po
281a4(rgyud): ni 'di'o//oM satwa dzaHhUM baM ho/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gsang ba'i mchod pa bya ba ni byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa thams cad byed de/rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcangs la/
281a5(rgyud): rje gar dang sbyar nas su//me tog la sogs dbul ba ni//gsang ba'i mchod pa phyag rgyas dbul//gzhu 'dren pa yi tshul gyis su//rdo rje mda' ni 'phen par bya//kun nas 'khyud dang rgyal
281a6(rgyud): mtshan sgre //gnyis snyems 'dzin pas mdud pa'o//rdo rje'i bstod pa 'dis rdo rje'i glu blang zhing mchod do//gzugs la sogs pa 'dod pa dag gi bde ba dang /shin tu yid bde bcom
281a7(rgyud): ldan rab dga' khyod la 'dud//khyod kyis bdag la dang du dga' bde kun mchod la//mchog gi bdag nyid grub pa'ang myur du tshul bzhin stsol//stod pa'i snying po 'das thams cad gu
281b1(rgyud): par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la nyin ror ldan ror brjod na bcom ldan 'das las thams cad thob par 'gyur ro//slob dpon de rlung gi wA las kyang 'das pa dang /ma 'ong/
281b2(rgyud): pa dang /da ltar gyi thams cad dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' dang /rtog pa thams cad dang /tshig gi rgyud thams cad kyang smra bar 'gyur ro//lce'i glu sngon mabyung ba len to//rdo rje'i
281b3(rgyud): glus 'bum bzlas na rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur ro//de ltar lan cig byin gyis brlabs la de nas phyis bsgrubs shig/de nas nyin gcig bzhin byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa nyin
281b4(rgyud): rirare lan re byas na grub pa thams cad dang /phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang /dbang bskur ba la sogs pa dang /shes pa thams cad dang las thams cad 'grub po//de bzhin
281b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa dang /sems dpa' rnams der lhags nas phra mo la sogs pa ston te tshig smra'o//byams par byed/mchod do//de yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams
281b6(rgyud): cad la mchod pa dang /rim 'gro thams cad kyi mchod do//sems can thams cad la tshar bcad pa dang /phan 'dogs rus par 'gyur ro//'jig pa med pa dang /zad pa med pa dang /'god
281b7(rgyud): pa med pa dang /'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro//sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa thams cad dang /nad thams cad dang /sdug bsngal thams cad kyang sel to//cho 'phrul thams cad
282a1(rgyud): ston to//bdag nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa sems dpa'i gzugs man cad dang /bdag gi lus thams cad dang /nam mkha' dang /sa dang /
282a2(rgyud): shing dang /ri dang /chu rnams las kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa'i gzugs thams cad ston par byed do//'od zer ston pa la sogs pa'i cho 'phrul thams cad ston to//
282a3(rgyud): rang yang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs la sogs pa dang /thams cad kyi gzugs su 'gyur ro//mig gi 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar gyi shes pa thams cad yi ge rnams las
282a4(rgyud): mthong ngo //thams cad las thos shing rang gi lces smra'o//sngon ma byung ba'i rtog pa dang /mdo sde thams cad 'chad de//ston skyobs thams cad dang /sil snyan dang /'phong dang /mtshon 'dab
282a5(rgyud): pa dang /shes gnyen dang /bzo dang /sgyu rtsal thams cad lhun gyis grub par 'gyur ro//nyin cig bzhin du gzugs chen po dang /mdog dang /stobs dang /dpa' ba dang /tshe dang /nang /
282a6(rgyud): med pa dang /dngos grub thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ro//sems can thams cad kyi sems dang /spyod pa dang /sgra skad dang /tshig shes shing mthong ngo //nyin cig bzhin thams cad mngon//
282a7(rgyud): par shes par 'gyur ro//mdor na de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang /rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa dngos grub thams cad ma sgrub par tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur ro//byin gyi brlabs la sogs
282b1(rgyud): pa'i rab tu bya ba'o//de la bsgrub pa'i rab tu bya za 'byung ste/de bzhin gshegs pa sgrub pa ni mdun du bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyi sku rjes su dran pa sgom zhing snying po dang /phyag rgya dang /sngags dang /
282b2(rgyud): rig pa rnams sgrub po phyag ni rdo rje sgrub pa ni sems dpar byin gyis brlab pa'i rnal 'byor ram/'dod par sgom pa 'am/rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran pa 'am/bdag gi snying ker rdo rje sgom pa
282b3(rgyud): 'am/bdag gi mdun du sangs rgyas rjes su dran par byed bzhin du snying po dang /phyag rgya dang /sngags dang /rig pa rnams sgrub po/sems dpa' chen po thams cad ni bdag nyid kyis rang gi
282b4(rgyud): sems dpa' rjes su dran pa 'am/snying kar rdo rje chen po sgom zhing snying po/phyag rgya dang /sngags dang /rig pa rnams bsgrub par bya'o//phyi'i rdo rje rigs sgrub pa ni khro bo'i tshul gyi snying po
282b5(rgyud): phyag rgya dang /sngags dang /rig pa rnams sgrub po//rdo rje ma rnams sgrub pa ni sems can thams cad za ba'i rjes su dran pa 'am/bdag nyid rdo rje srin por gyur te/de'i phyir bdag nyid kyang sems
282b6(rgyud): can thams cad bza'o zhes khros te snying po dang /phyag rgya dang /sngags dang /rig pa rnams bsgrub par bya'o//bsgrub pa'i rab tu bya ba'o//de nas bsgrub pa'i thabs kyis rab tu bya ba 'byung ste/
282b7(rgyud): ji ltar 'jig rten 'dul 'gyur ba//de ltar sgrub par gsungs pa ste//grub pa thams cad byed pa'i mchog/bsgrub po'i thabs kyi rab tu bya ba'o//de nas ras kyi rab tu bya ba 'byung ste/de la de bzhin
283a1(rgyud): gshegs pa'i ras ni sgra med par byas la dkyil 'khor zlum por thig gdab po/phyag na rdo rje'i ras ni ngos thams cad par gru bzhi po dar ram ras la bri'o//sems dpa' chen

283a3(rgyud): ste/ri mo mkhan gso sbyin can gyis sbyin med pa'i tshe na rtsi snod gsar par bzhag pas bri/ras kyi rab tu bya ba'o//de la cha lugs kyi tshad rab tu bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ni de bzhin
283a4(rgyud): gshegs pa'i mtho gang tsam du bya ba'o//phyag na rdo rje'i ni mtha' med pa'i phyir ji ltar 'dod pa'i tshad du bya ba'o//de la rdo rje'i tshad ni ji tsam du 'gyur zhe na/rang gi mthe bo'i tshogs kyi sor
283a5(rgyud): mo bcu drug tu bya'o//de la rdo rje'i dbyings ci 'dra bar bya zhe na/zur bzhi lo rtse lnga pa/'od zer gyi phreng ba can sum cha char bya'o//sems dpa' chen po thams cad ni mthe bo'i tshigs kyi
283a6(rgyud): ser bcu drug gi tshad du bya ste/thams cad kyang pad mo la bzhugs par bya'o//de bzhin du sku gzugs kyi tshad las dkyil 'khor gyi chad kyang de dang 'dra bar bya'o//de la 'di ni bzlas
283a7(rgyud): pa'i rab tu bya ba ste/de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ni dgongs pa'i gsung ting nge 'dzin gyi tshig ste/rdo rje rnams kyi'ang de bzhin no//de la rtog pa thams cad kyi spyir ni rdo rje'i tshig
283b1(rgyud): /d+hA nam g+sa/phyug na d+hA nan chag/klu dang sgyur te bas pa// dz+nyAnas pa la so s+yA d+hA ldan rnam san du rje ShA d-i ga go blanasas dung rlog sa rnams na d+ha
283b2(rgyud): nahU~M d+hA'i tshon gisel bar byas te ba dang sa des panas so//rdo ma rnams ni rdo rje tshig zin se nas so//de la ting nge 'dzin mong shin ya m+b+hi zlas so//de 'dzi
283b3(rgyud): shan/lci thog rAng tu g+ha yo bar//som chu gnyis ka sgyur ba te//rtog pakun la rig pa ni//rdo rje dag ni sgra sbyangs pa'o//de la rdo rje'i klu'i tshig ni//shAT ba la sogs pa'i gru//grong dge
283b4(rgyud): brnams blangs pa yi//rdo rje'i tshig bzlas rtog b+ha ni//rdo rje'i grwa zhes grags pa'o//de la rdo rje khro bo'i tshig ni 'di'o//rgyu zhes pa yi 'brug ste 'dra//de bzhin dri zhing sgra dang ldan//khro bags
283b5(rgyud): brdo rje che'o//khro bo'i tshig ces grags pa'o//tshig gi rab tu bya ba'o//de la 'di ni bzlas pa'i chag rab tu bya ba yin te/rtog pa dag ni kun lha rang //sems dpa' gang dang gang dag gi/snying
283b6(rgyud): phyag N+DI sdugs sgrub pas//de yi bdag nyid spyan dang sgrub//gnas dang srog chags thams cad ni//rang gi tshul gyi chog thams cad sgrib po//rdo rje bzlas pa ni rtog pa thams cad sgrub pa'i/

284a2(rgyud): 'dod pa sgom zhing bzlas pa ste/'di ltar oM zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa ste bde ba chen po'o//'dod pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya'o//'dod pa ni thams cad dgug pa dang /gzhug pa dang /bcing ba

284a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang bslu bar mi nus so//thal mo khong stong du sbyar la mchod pa bya ste/de la me tog gi mchod pa ni me tog gi thal mo gyen du phye bso//bdug pa'i mchod
284a5(rgyud): pa ni thur du brkyang bso//mar me'i mchod pa ni mthe bong bsnyam pas g.yogs pa'o//dri'i mchod pa ni rab tu brkyang ste stong pa'am gang bso//phyag rgya 'di rnams kyi yang dag pa nyid du mchod
284a6(rgyud): par 'gyur ba ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang /dkyil 'khor thams cad dang /dam tshig sems dpa' thams cad dang /snying po dang /phyag rgya dang /sngags dang /rig pa dang /lha rnam
284a7(rgyud): thams cad la yang ngo //mchod pa'i rab tu bya ba'o//de la bsod nams med pa'i sems can gyi sgrub pa'i rab tu bya ba 'byung ste/dkyil 'khor gang yang rung ba cig nyin re zhing ji tsam 'dod

284b2(rgyud): la myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba'i rab tu bya ba ste/de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba ni/ting 'dzin chos sbyin la sogs dang //rgya chen tshul rnams klog pa dang //dad la

284b5(rgyud): gtan de bzhin blo//ci nus kyis kyang bya ba ni//nyon cig bzhin du ci 'dod par//phyi'i rdo rje'i rigs kyi grub par myur ba ni//sangs rgyas mchod cing de bzhin dang //phyag na rdo rje brtul zhugs
284b6(rgyud): brtan//rdo rje rtag tu lag na bzung //mi bgrungs thams cad tshar bcad mchog/de nas rdo rje ma rnams kyi grub pa myur du sgrub pa'i rab tu bya ba te/sems can dge la dang ba dang //mchod cing dam
284b7(rgyud): tshig srung ba ste//phyag rgya'i gar gyi mchod pa dang //sems can ma rung drag shul bya//grub pa myur ba'i rab tu bya ba'o//de la slob dpon gyi rab tu bya ba 'byung ste//de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
285a1(rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon du sgrub pa ste/dkyil 'khor du deng bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar badz+ra bde ces bya ba'i snying za stang rtswa brgyad bzlas nas slob dpon rang
285a2(rgyud): gis dam tshig gi phyag rgya stong dazlas te/slob ma dbang bskur ba'i snying po ni 'di'o//badz+ra satwa/badz+ra rat+na/badz+ra d+harma/badz+ra karma/oM a mu khA ma d+hi tiSh+Tha/sarba ta thA ga ta a d+yad ta swA hA/
285a3(rgyud): 'di brgya bzlas pa ni snying ka la sogs pa phyag rgya gzhag nas spyi bor thams cad bzlaso//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi slob dpon sbyin no//phyag na rdo rje'i cha lugs spyi bor
285a4(rgyud): bzung nas snying po 'di brgya 'am brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlos shigako brgya bzlas pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i slob dpon du 'gyur ro//brgya rtsa bzlas pas ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rdo rje slob dang

285a7(rgyud): ba ni pad+mo lag tu byin nas stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te pad+mo'i breng bas mgo bcing ngo //snying po 'di brjod do//oM bad ma mA la a b+hi Shany+tsa lo ka shwa ra te s+thA ma hriH/rdo rje rin po che'i slob
285b1(rgyud): dpon du rtsub pa ni rdo rje rin cha'i phyag rgya skyong ma dbang dusgyur pa'i gnas su dazhag nas snying po dri stod bzlad s+ho//oM badz+ra rat+na a b+h+yA Shin+d+ha rat+na d+hU pa tI te b+ha ba Ta TA/slob dpon gyis dkyil
285b2(rgyud): 'khor thams cad du bcud de dbang bskur ro//phyag na rdo rje slob dpon du byAste/yang bdag nyid kyis dkyil 'khor bris la bdag nyid la de gaM gis slob dpon du dbang bskur ro//de la
285b3(rgyud): slob dpon gyi brtul zhugs ni 'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i slob dpon ni zla ba cig bar du rab tu byung la bslab pa thams cad bzung ste/rang gi lhag pa'i lha dus gsum du sgrub bo//
285b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi slob dpon gyi brtul zhugs ni zla ba phyed kyi bar du nyin re ning bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas phyag na rdo rje'i sku'am/rang
285b5(rgyud): bi lha nyid la mchod nas kyo btung gas bkug ste/mi skye bar bzlas te/lam dang /lam ma yin pa'i skabs mo dbyi'o//dri nas phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs 'byung ste/nyin re zhing nang
285b6(rgyud): bar langs nas bdag nyid byin gyis brlab pa la sogaso pa byas te/bAkru sa la dri zhim po dang /gos 'tshor ba dang /rgyan gyis chas te/glu dang sil snyan dang /bkod pa dang /sgeg pa
285b7(rgyud): rnams dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das la me tog la sogs po gsang ba'i michod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod nas bcom ldan 'das dang /bdag nyid la 'dod pa'i dngos pos mchod
286a1(rgyud): pa bya ste/du mtshig chen po'i de kho na nyid ci 'dod pa bzlas te/phyed yol gyi bar du 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga spyad nas de bzhin du mchod pa byas te/ci 'dod pas bzlas so//
286a2(rgyud): dorjes yang mtshan rangs par 'dod pa lnga rnams la brten cing bzlas par bya ste/de ltar zhig bzhi'i bar du bya'o//de nas rdo rje rigs kyi brtul zhugs ni zlab phyed kyi bar du smyon par bsgyur nas /
286a3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal zhing phyag na rdo rje mchod de//mgo sa la gtugs nas sgren mor byung ngam/gos gyon yang rung ste/mgo bo rjod cing mo'i cog la ga she zhing
286a4(rgyud): rgyal phyag rgya rnams kyi gar byas te/yid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa bsams nas mtshams bcing ba la sogs pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das la ji lta ba bzhin du mchod pa byas te brgya

286a6(rgyud): thams cad 'grub bo//de nas zhag bdun du ting 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas stong brgyad bzlas so//de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi brtul zhugs ni nyin re zhing rang la dbang bsgyur nas
286a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dang /sems dpa' chen po rnams mchod de rgyal ba lta bur blom zhing rgyal po'i brang du song nas rgyal po'i mdun du brgya brgya zhig brgyad kyi bar du bzlas so//
286b1(rgyud): de ltar na slob dpon gyis grub pa thams cad dang /phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang /shes pa thams cad dang /kun gyis mchod pa la stsogs pa dang /las thams cad thob par 'gyur

286b4(rgyud): ni rdo rje tshig gis stong phrag brgyar bzlas na sngags thams cad thang cig bzlas pas las kun byed do//rig pa stong phrag brgyar bzlas na de nas rig pa thams cad thung cig bzlas pas las thams
286b5(rgyud): cad byed do//de nas snying po dang /phyag rgya dang /sngags dang /reg pa rnams 'byung ste/badz+re satwa ni snying po'o//satwa badz+ra ni phyag rgya'o//oM ni sngag so//khi ti ni rig pa'o//de nas snying po dang /
286b6(rgyud): phyag rgya dang /sngags dang /rig pa thams cad sgrub pa'i snying po 'byung ste/oM ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa dzaHhUM baM ho/su rata s+t+waM/'di bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rdo rje sems dpas glu dang
286b7(rgyud): rdo rje'i tshig gis stong rtsa brgyad bzlas na snying po dang /phyag rgya dang /sngags dang /rig pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro//zhes bcom ldan 'das rje
287a1(rgyud): rje sems dpas gsungaso//'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal ba las phyi ma'i rgyud bshad pa'o///de nas bcom ldan 'ad/
287a2(rgyud): la phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad lagasen/
287a3(rgyud): bas na bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams grub pa de sems can 'dul ba'i slad du yul gzhan du 'chi ba 'am/dbul por 'gyur ba 'am/'khrug pa 'am/phrag dag
287a4(rgyud): gam/rma dbab pa'am/sdug bsngal ba 'am/'dod ba chung ba 'am/'dod pa la chags pa 'am/rab tu byung ba sems dpa'/gnod pa mang ba 'am/nyes pa mang ba 'am/mya ngan nam/
287a5(rgyud): nad dam 'jigs pa mang po la sogs pa gzhan yang dad pa med par 'gyur ba de lta bur mi 'gyur bar lhag pa'i bsam pa'i chos skye ba dang /sgrib pa yongs su byang bar 'gyur ba de ltar byin
287a6(rgyud): gyis brlab par gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsungs so//dam tshig chen po de kho na nyid sku dang /gsung dang thugs rdo rje thams cad pa/mthul
287a7(rgyud): ba 'dul ba 'di khyod kyis de bzhin du bshang ba de dag gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs so//de nas sgrub pa pa de dag gis dang por re shig de brgyad stong ji
287b1(rgyud): smra bar bzlas nas de nyid dam gzhan dag pa yang rlung sgrub par bya'o//gang dag 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos kyi 'dul ba de lta bang 'byung bar 'gyur to//de dag lta yang zing po 'od
287b2(rgyud): oMb+h+yA sarba ti thA ga ta badz+ra satwa ho//sa ma ya s+t+waM/'di lang brgya stong du bzlas nas de nyid dam gzhan yang bsgrub par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag na rdo rjes phyag 'tshal te/
287b3(rgyud): tshigs su bcid pa 'di gsungs so//sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir//rtog pa'i dam pa rab bshad pa//'jig rten gsum rgyal zhes bya ba//grub pa thams cad rab rtsol mchog/gang
287b4(rgyud): gis brjod pa tsam gyi ni//sdig pa kun las rnam par grol//'jig rten kun na mchod pa ste//grub pa thams cad thob par 'gyur//gang dag 'dri zhing klog pa dang //'dzin cing dad pa de
