287b6(rgyud): la da yis thob//rtog pa kun kyang sbyar yang rung //rang gis byas pa'ang de bzhin te//rtog pa'i rgyal po nyid bsgrubs na//dod pa med kying myur du 'grub//bdag gi khyim du gnas pa gang /
287b7(rgyud): de la bdag kyang kun 'grub phyir//de la bdag ni srung bar gnas//dngos grub dang ni 'dod kun dang //'phel ba dang ni 'tshe med dang //shes pa rnams dang tshe dang stabs//gzugs mchog
288a1(rgyud): nges par stsol bar bgyi//de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan las bzhengs te/khams gsum mtha' dag lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje'i rdul phra mo rnams kyis khyab
288a2(rgyud): nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang legaso zhes bya ba byin te/legs so legs so//sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa la mngon
288a3(rgyud): par dgyes par gyur to//'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po kun rdzogs so///rgya gar skad du/saM k+saM pa pra tiSh+Tha bi ti tan+t+ra/bod skad du//
288a4(rgyud): rab tu gnas pa mdor bsdus pa'i cho ga'i rgyud/dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
288a5(rgyud): thams cad kyi dmachig/rdo rje byin gyis rlab pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/brdungs pa dang /bris pa dang /'bur du byas pa la sogs pa'i rab tu gnas pa'i
288a6(rgyud): cho ga gsungs pa/slob dpon de nyid bcu shes shing //mtshan nyid kun dang yang dag ldan//phyag rgya sngags dang tshig shes//las rnams kun la mkhas pas so//sku gzugs
288a7(rgyud): mtshan nyid ldan pa ste//zhi ba la sogs ro yis ldan//tshad kyis tshad la phab cing bzang //de 'dra rab tu gnas par 'gyur//yang thog mchod rten sogs gnas dang //khyim dang lha yi//
288b1(rgyud): gnas rnams su//sangs rgyas la sogs rab gnas ni/cho ga dag dang ldan pas bya//cho ga dman pas mi bya ste//rab gnas rtag par bkra mi shes//'jig rten 'dir yang sdug bsngal la//'jig/
288b2(rgyud): rten pha rol 'jigs pa che//de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis//dngos grub 'dod pas nan tan bya//cho ga bdag nyid nus pa yi//brtag pa las gsungs tshul legs pas//de byas bsod
288b3(rgyud): narnams che ba ni//mthong dang mi mthong rnams su bya//sku gzugs sngags kyis mtshan nyid kyis//de la byin rlab 'jug par 'gyur//gang du sku gzugs rdzogs pa la//byin ma rlabs par
288b4(rgyud): ring gnas na//de la bkra mi shis 'gyur zhing //de srid mchong par de mi 'os//dper na skyes bu la la zhig/rig pa'i mtshan nyid spangs pa ni//'jig rten kun gyis mchod mi byed//de de bzhin
288b5(rgyud): du gzugs mnyan te//rab gnas ma byas gzugs brnyan la//grang gis mchod cing phyog byed pa//dam tshig bral zhing sngags dman pas//sbyin sreg thal ba 'bras med mtshungs//de bzhin//
288b6(rgyud): du yang sngags gnas pas//chos ldan mchod pa byed pa gang //de yi las kyi rnam smin gyis//skye ba ru ni mchod par 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
288b7(rgyud): chos thams cad rab tu mi gnas pa lags na/ji ltar na rgyal ba rnams kyis rab tu gnas pa lags//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sangs rgyas kun ni rab tu bzhugs//rab
289a1(rgyud): tu gnas pa/gang na'ang med//kun tu ma nga' ltar gnas pa la//gcig shos kyi ni rab tu brtags//'jig rten kun rdzob la rten nas//rab tu gan
289a2(rgyud): pa rab tu brtags//dam pa'i don du dpyad pa na//gang zhig gang gis gang du brlab//bzod ma nas zhi skye med pa//ci 'dras ji ltar rab tu gnas//dang po'i las can sems can
289a3(rgyud): rnams//rtogs pa'i rgyu ru bshad par zad//dang por re shika yongs su brtag pa'i gnas yongs su sbyangs pa dang /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang //bla re dang /ba dan sgreng ba
289a4(rgyud): rnams su mchog tu gsol ba 'debs pas/gsol ba btab pa'i bla ma spos dang me tog la sogs po dang ldan pas/tshes dang rgyu skar shis pa la slob dpon legs par mnyam par
289a5(rgyud): gzhag pas rab tu gnas pa'i sar 'khod de/sangs rgyasnga dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa rigs lnga dang rab tu 'brel pa yin la/de bzhin du rab tu 'brel pa'i dkyil 'khor
289a6(rgyud): gyi tshogs sa yongs su bzung zhing rdul tshon gyi las dang /thig gdab pa dang /gsol ba gdab pa la sogs pa byas la/rtsa ba'i sngags sam/rgyud kyi dgongs pas sa'i gter du nor
289a7(rgyud): pu'am sor gdub bcug la/de nas lha'i khang par rang gi slob ma bcug ste/rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan po'i de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i skur bltas la/lha la mngon
289b1(rgyud): par phyogs te phyag 'tshal zhing //ji ltar 'byor pa'i me tog thul mo dang //dri chu gtsang mas cho ga bzhin brtags la//ting nge 'dzin la legs gnas pas//zhabs bsnyil me tog pos sogs
289b2(rgyud): ldan//rnam par mi rtog sems kyis ni//mchod yon rnams ni phul byas la//mnyam par gzhag pas sngags 'di yis//lan gsum bar du brjod par bya'o//oM sA ma ya ste sa mA ya ho sa
289b3(rgyud): me ya haM/ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad ni//dga' ldan du ni gnas pa yi//lha mo sgyu 'phrul lhums zhugs ltar//de bzhin gzugs brnyan 'dir bzhugs zhig/'di ru mgon po rtag bzhug/
289b4(rgyud): nas//byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang //'di zhes bya ba'i don slad du//bdag gi 'byor pa nyid kyis ni//ci 'byor pa yi mchod pa rnams//me tog la sogs 'di bzhes shig/bdag dang slob
289b5(rgyud): mar bcas pa la//rjes su brtse bas dgongs su gsol//kun gyis 'di la byin rlabs shing //de nyid du ni bzhugs par rigs//sku gzugs sta gon legs byas la//de nas brtag pa mnyan/
289b6(rgyud): par brtsam//slob ma bsrung bar gnas pa yi//de ltar thams cad dpyad byas la//sngags pas mchod pa'i cho ga sogs//bla ma yas ni gang bsgo ba//ma tshogs pa kun bsgrub par bya//
289b7(rgyud): mchod yon 'bras bu chen po 'gyur//de nas sngags pas snyan gsan dbab//gdan la bstim bya ba mchod yon dang //mchod pa spos dang me tog dang //de bzhin du ni mar mi dang //sngags
290a1(rgyud): dang ldan pas dbul bar bya//sku gzugs mdun du phyogs byas la//na bza' ser pos g.yog bya zhing //de nas sngags pas 'du bya ba//khyad par du ni bdug par bya//de nas
290a2(rgyud): grub phyir de la ni//de la lan gcig gtor bya ba/de nas de la sngags 'dis ni//me dang de nas chu la ni//oM sarba pA paM da ha na badz+ra ye swA hA//zhes bya bas so//de nas rnam pa kun gyi mchog
290a3(rgyud): ldan po'i//don bzhin du ni bsgom bya ste//de nas gsum gnas rnams su bstim//oM hUM AHyi ge gsum/oM yig spyi bor bstim bya zhing //snying khar hUM gi yi ger 'gyur//ngag gi phyog/
290a4(rgyud): s+ye AHyig go/sku gsung thugs ni bsgrub par bya//yang na gang gi sa bon gang yin pa//de yi thugs khar de dgod do//phyag rgya sngags kyis rab bskul zhing //ci rigs pa ni snyan gas na/
290a5(rgyud): dbab//gser ram dngul lam zangs ma 'am//rdo dang de bzhin shing dang ni//yang na shing lo'i mdab ma rnams//mchod yon du ni sbyar bar bya//de bzhin bum pa gser la sogs//zangs
290a6(rgyud): ma'i snod kyi mchod yon ni//mchod yon snod la rab tu shis//gal te nus pas ma rnyed na//ji ltar rnyed pas kun tu bya//de nas de yi tilo mar sogs//dur ba'i phon gyi pir gyis sbyang //
290a7(rgyud): bkra shis rnga la sogs pa'i sgras//na chung rnams kyis de bzhin brjod//til mar la sogs pa'i sngags ni//oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/bum pa lnga 'am yang na brgyad//
290b1(rgyud): tsan dran la sogs rnams kyis byug/sna tshogs dri chus dgang ba dang //'khor lo byas la mngon par bsngags//bu mos bkal ba'i srad bu'am//yang na bso ma'i skud pa'ang rung //tshon chen
290b2(rgyud): po yis bsgyur byas la//de la sngags kyis dkri bar bya//sman ste rin chen lnga dang ni//me tog 'bras bure ldan pa ste//sku gsum pa dang yungs kar ldan//bum pa mngon par bsngags par bya//
290b3(rgyud): gtsug ga tor rnam rgyal zhes bya ba//gzi brjid gzhon gyis mi rje dang //bkra shis zhi rnams sngags kyis ni//khrus kyi ched du mngon par bsngags//'jam pa'i til mar ngag dang ni//u duma~M
290b4(rgyud): ba ra'i lcug ma bzang //mkhar po'i snod kyi nang dag tu//bkod la rab tu dbul bar bya//dri lnga yis ni de nas byug/sa bon lnga ni gtor bar bya//slob ma tshogs dang bcas pa yi//sngags kyis
290b5(rgyud): gtsang sbras bkru bar bya//bkra shis zhes bya yid 'ong ba'i//blo dang ldan pas tshigs bcad brjod//rig ma spyan ma ji bzhin du//cho ga bzhin du mngon dbang bskur//sngags ni ji ltar bstam//
290b6(rgyud): patsam gyis ni//lha yi chu ni dag pa yis//de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ltar//de bzhin bdag gis khrus gsol lo//zhes bya ba la sogs pas so//oM sarba ta thA ga ta oM b+hiShe kaM/
290b7(rgyud): tas ma ya shI hUM/lugs pa la ni dngos su bkru//ri mo rnams ni mo 'ong la'o//dag byed lngas ni sngon du sgo//dUr ba yis ni med par bya//ras sam lag pa dag gis ni//blo dang ldan pas sku
291a1(rgyud): lus phyi//gur gum mar dang bcas pas bsku//gos bzang dag kyang sku la gsol//blo dang ldan pas sngags 'di yis//dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhugasu gastsol//
291a2(rgyud): oM d+hi badz+ra bA sa s+ye swA hA/oM badz+ra gan+d+he swAhA/oM badz+ra A ba ra Na bai su Sha Ne swA hA/blo ldan gyis rang dam tshig bskul//phyag rgya sngags kyis dbang bskur la//ji ltar 'os par ma
291a3(rgyud): dbang bskur//oM hUM aM badz+ra khaM/de ltar cod pan bcing ba byas la//bzhugs su gsol te brtag pa las gsungs pa'i tshul gyiso//mdun gyi phyogs ni ma nub cing //yo ba min zhing drang
291a4(rgyud): ba yis//de ltar sku gzugs mdzes par dgod//de ltar min na skyon 'byung 'gyur//me tog sogs dang de bzhin dri//mar men bza' sogs sbyor gang //de kun sngags dang ldan pa yis//
291a5(rgyud): lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya//oM puSh+pe AHhUM/zhes bya ba 'di dag la sogs pas so//mchog gi me tog 'di dag ni//chu dang thang las de bzhin skyes//mchog tu dad pas khyed la dbu
291a6(rgyud): ci bde bar ni so sor ba zhes//lhan cig skyes dang sbyar los byung //mchog gi bdug pa 'di dag ni//bdag gi dad pas 'bul lags kyis//ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsolo//lhan
291a7(rgyud): cig skyes dang sbyar las byung //mchog tu gyur pa'i dri 'di ni//mchog gi dad pas 'bul lags kyis/ci bde bar ni so sor bzhes//mun pa 'joms byed sbyang ba'i mchog/mar dang til
291b1(rgyud): gyi mar mo 'di//yang dag ye shes spyan dbye phyir//dad pas bdag gis dbul bar bgyi//bza' dang bca' ba phun sum tshogs//kha dog dI ro rnams dang ldan//thams cad ldan pa lha ma//
291b2(rgyud): bshos//bdag gis dbul gyis so sor ba zhes//de la sogs pa gang yang rung //cung zad ci 'byor sku gzugs la//de dag thams cad 'di nyid kyis//rim pa yis ni dbul bar bya//
291b3(rgyud): sngags kyi gtsang sbratsA ru bya//der ni gser gyi rang bzhin gyi//thur mas spyan ni dbye bar bya//zhal zas der dbul blo ldan pas//oM tsak+ShuHtsak+ShAHsA man+ta tsak+Shu ra bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/aM di bya
291b4(rgyud): e ni sa mA d+he d+h+yA na pra Na me swA hA/de ltar byas te de rnams yang //slob ma rab tu bcug byas la//khyod kyis nga la gang gsol ba'i//sku gzugs dag ni khyad par du//ji ltar gsungs par rab
291b5(rgyud): gnas par//de dag don ni nges byas te//de rnams don ni grub zin gyis//ci bde bar ni mchod par byos//de nas dam tshig dbang bskur bas//khyod la byas kyis bsregs blugs ni//stong
291b6(rgyud): ngam yang na de yi phyed//mdar gsum brtags la 'bru rnams kyis//'o ma can gyi bud shing la//sreg khung gru bzhir bsregs blugs bya//de nyid mar dang 'o ma yis//lhag pa'i tsA ru phul
291b7(rgyud): byas pas//bdag dang slob ma thams cad ni//zhi dang rgyas pa 'phel bar bya//oM badz+ra A yu She swA hA/A gan+d+he ha ri ping ga li dIp+tik+Sha de hi daM hi dA pA ya i dan tsa me kAr+yaM ku ru swA hA/oM badz+ra puSh+pa
292a1(rgyud): ye swA hA/de ltar byas la 'bad pa yis//khri yi steng du bzhugs par bya//sku gzugs kyi ni sum 'gyur cha'o//chung tsam du ni rab tu bsgrags//oM su pra tiSh+Tha badz+re swAhA/
292a2(rgyud): me tog spos sogs sngoni 'gro bas//phyogs skyong rnams kyang mchod par bya//oM in+d+ra ya swA hA/zhes bya ba dbang ldan la thug gi bar du//rol mo'i sgra la sogs pas yang dag par mcho
292a3(rgyud): de//gshegs su gsol bar bya ba ni//rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de yi sras//tshangs sogs lha yi tshogs rnams dang //gang dag cho ga ma tshangs pas//de dag bzod pa mdzad pa'i rigs//
292a4(rgyud): kun tu zhi dang rgyas pa ru//yon bdag tshe la rab mdzad nas//sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas ni//slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol//sa dang chu dang me rlung gi/lha rnams kun gyi sku gzugs
292a5(rgyud): la//bskal pa brgya ru srung gnas mdzod//dgyes shing yid bzang 'gyur ba yis//slob dpon bla mar bcas pa yi//bu dang tsha bo srung mdzad nas//rang gnas dge bar gshegs su gsol//
292a6(rgyud): dpyid zla ra ba 'am dpyid zla 'bring //dgun dang dpyid kyi tha chungs sam//dbyar zla de bzhin dbyar 'bring ngo //nyi ma byang du gnas pa yi//dkar po phyogs kyi gnyis pa 'am//rims bzhin de
292a7(rgyud): ltar gsum pa'am//gang tshe gza' dang rjes 'thun na//nag po'i phyogs la'ang brtsam par bya//gang tshe thams cad 'thun gyur na//mi rnams yun du 'phel bar byed//bco lnga de bzhin brgyad
292b1(rgyud): dang //bcu gsum pa yang de bzhin no//gnam stod dang ni de bzhin du//bcu bzhi pa la'ang bya ba min//thams cad du ni chu smad dang //skyur ma gro kun de bzhin te//lag pa sgrubs dang
292b2(rgyud): snron dang ni//rgya la dang rgyu smad de bzhin no//khrums sbed dag kyang de bzhin du//rgyu skar 'di rnams thams cad du//skye dgu 'brel zhing de ri ni//rab tu gnas pa mchog tu byed//yid la
292b3(rgyud): 'dod pa ci yang rung //dngos grub mo bzhis sbyor bar 'gyur//lung las shes pa'i mang nga//khrums sam yang nA gro bzhin gyis//lag gis skal bzang snar mas ni//gzhan dag las
292b4(rgyud): ni rgyal bar byed//mgo yis zhi ba nye bar ston//chu stod kyis ni bu dag gson//rtag par dngos grub khrums smad kyis//rgyal gyis rtag par tshe ring 'gyur//snron gyis mchog tu bde bar byed//
292b5(rgyud): lha mtshams kyis ni mchog ster 'gyur//phur du lag dang pa ba sangs//zla ba'i gza' sogs shes bya ste//'di rnams bzang ldan la byas na//rab tu gnas pa mchog tu dag/gsum
292b6(rgyud): papo drug pa bdun pa la//bcu dang bcu gcig la zla ba//gnyis pa bzhi pa de bzhin brgyad//bcu dang bcu gcig rnams la lag/gnyis dang bdun dang de bzhin dgu/de bzhin phur bu bcu
292b7(rgyud): gcig pa//dus sbyor bzhi pa la brtan nas//de la lhag par gnas par bya//drug bdun bcu pa dor ba yis//pi ba sangs nyid dag nga yin//de ltar bza' rnams thams cad kyi//stobs
293a1(rgyud): ldan me ldan drar shes bya//gang che zhi ba'i gzu' rnams dang //zhing rnams zhi ba dge ba yin//dang po lnga pa gsum de bzhin//nor rnams 'joms pa spang bar gyu/rdza//

293b1(rgyud): spyo gus pa dbul bar bya//gal te sgra nyid dgyes 'dod na//bla ma gus pas daHsma zhing //de ltar rnam pa thams cad du//bla ma yang dag mnyes par bya//de nas gang dag brtul zhugs ca//

296a2(rgyud): las chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa'i gnas sgrub pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di lan gcig thos na yang /de byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du shes bya'i sgrib
296a3(rgyud): pa thams cad dang /chod pa dang /nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /chos kyi sgrib pa dang /las kyi sgrib pa chen po bsags kyang sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan song rnams su
296a4(rgyud): nams kyang skye bar mi 'gyur ro//sdig pa yang byang ma theg tu sdug bsngal med par byang bar 'gyur ro//su zhig 'dzin pa 'am/nyin re zhing klog pa dang /kha ton byed pa dang /tshul bzhin
296a5(rgyud): yid la byed pa de tshe 'di nyid la chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid rdo rje'i ting 'dzin 'thob pas chos thams cad la dbang phyug du 'gyur ro//chos thams cad la dga' ba dang /mgu
296a6(rgyud): ba dang //mchog tu dga' ba myong bar 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshe bcu drug gis de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dam/rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid 'thob par
296a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad pa/rdo rje dbyings mtha'
296b1(rgyud): dag gi sems dpa'i mchog/khams gsum po mtha' dag na 'jig rten gsum po ma lus pa las rnam par rgyal ba/sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa 'dul bar spyod
296b2(rgyud): pa/don thams cad grub pa lag na rdo rje mtha' yas pa thams cad pa/dam tshig chen po pa/rdo rje gsang ba'i sems can chen po du mas g.yog byas pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
296b3(rgyud): tshul gyi don 'di ston te/bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje bsgyings te thog ma'i rdo rje chen po gsor nas rang gi snying khar stod pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin cing bde ba chen po rdo rje
296b4(rgyud): don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi de kho na nyid kyi snying po 'di smras so//hUM/de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bcas pa 'jig rten
296b5(rgyud): gyi khams thams cad kyi khams gsum thams cad nas rjesu mnyes par byas te bkug nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor chen por bcug ste dam tshig gis bcings
296b6(rgyud): nas dbang du byas te dngos grub thams cad grub bo//de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis bde ba chen po'i snyems pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
296b7(rgyud): cad kyi gsang po'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas bzhug so//de nas phyag na rdo rje gsang ba chen po'i dam tshig 'byung ba dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlongs pa'i ye shes rdo rje
297a1(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dam tshig chen po'i di na nyid do rje dbyings kyi byin gyis brlabs chen po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'ang
297a2(rgyud): gsungaso//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste//de nyid dang po dam tshig che//rdo rje byin rlabs zhes bya'o//gru bzhir bzhi zhing sgo bzhi dang //khyams rnams
297a3(rgyud): kyis ni yongs bskor ba//rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan//'od zer 'bar bar 'khrigs pa'i 'od//dkyil 'khor gyi ni grwa rnams dang //sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su//zla ba
297a4(rgyud): phyed la rab gnas pa'i//rin chen kun gyis nye bar mdzes//rtse mo sna tshogs pa dan ni//dril bu mchog btags rlung gis bskyod//me tog chun 'phyang me long spras//phyi yi dkyil 'khor
297a5(rgyud): bri bar bya//de yi nang du 'khor lo ni//dkyil 'khor brgyad dang mnyam pa ru//rdo rje thig gis thig gdab pa//rdo rje 'khor lo zhes byar bshad//de yi dbus su ci rigs par//sangs
297a6(rgyud): rgyas sku ni bzhag bya ste//'dzum bcas zla ba'i mdog can la//rdo rje bsnyems pa 'dzin pa'i mchog/rdo rje phreng sogs kyis spras shing //sna tshogs 'bar ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od//
297a7(rgyud): pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs par ni//lugs ma 'am mngon par 'dus byas pa'o//rang gi snying po kun bzlas te//de tshe dkyil 'khor brtag par bya//rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa
297b1(rgyud): rnams//snying po nyid kyis yang dag dgod//rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni//dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag bsdus//bzhag gam yang na bri bar bya//phyogs rnams kun tu ston pa'o//
297b2(rgyud): mdun du rdo rje sems dpa' ni//sangs rgyas kun gyi dbu rgyan can//rdo rje mtshon ni gsor bar brtson//dmar skye dag tu nges par dgod//sangs rgyas kyi ni g.yas logs su//rdo rje kI li
297b3(rgyud): kI la no//yan lag kun gyis yongs 'khyud pa//rdo rje can gzugs nyi ma'i 'od//rgyab tu rdo rje 'dod pa ni//chu srini gyi ni rgyal mtshan thogs//sngo skya'i mdog can ci rigs par//blo dang ldan
297b4(rgyud): pas bzhag par bya//g.yon du rdo rje bsnyems pa ni//bsnyems pa'i rdo rje gnyis kyis ni//rdo rje bsnyems pa gnyis 'dzin pa//btso ma'i gser dang 'dra ba dgod//sangs rgyas kyi ni mtshams
297b5(rgyud): rnams su//me tog la sogs kyis mtshan cing //thal mo spyi bor legs 'jog pa'i//mchod pa chen po bzhag par bya//phyi'i dkyil 'khor mtshams rnams su//lha mo'i tshogs rnams
297b6(rgyud): dgod par bya//sgo yi dbus ni thams cad du//gzugs mtshan la sogs bsdus pa dgod//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor can brgyad ni//rdo rje 'dzin sogs bri bar bya//rdo rje 'khor lo thams cad
297b7(rgyud): du//sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin gyis bskor//phyi yi dkyil 'khor gnas rnams su//'dod pa'i dbang phyug dri bya ste//mdun du 'jig rten gsum rgyal lo//'dod pa tshangs pa zhi byed mchog/
298a1(rgyud): nas dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par 'byung ste/de la dang po nyid du dza skad bshad pa'i cho ga des zhugs pa'i slob dpon
298a2(rgyud): ni rdo rje chen po'i slob dpon dang dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi slob dpon dang /dam tshig thams cad shes pa dang /chos thams cad rig pa dang /las thams cad sgrub pa dang /dngos grub
298a3(rgyud): thams cad grub pa dang /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas byin gyis brlabs pa dang /dbang bskur ba thams cad thob pa dang /thams cad shes pa dang ldan pa dang /mchod pa
298a4(rgyud): thams cad dang /'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad 'di'i dbang du 'gyur ba dang /'grub par 'gyur ba dang /'di'i phyag rgya thams cad kyang rang nyid
298a5(rgyud): kyis bcings pas 'grub par 'gyuraro//dam tshig thams cad kyi lam la nyes pa dang bcas kyang nyams par mi 'gyur zhing byin gyis brlabs par rtog par 'gyuraro//ma brlabs par yang thams
298a6(rgyud): cad shes par 'gyuraro//mchod pa la sogs pa'i bya ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro//mdor bsdus na tshe 'di nyid la dngos grub kyi mchog ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa de lta bur sangs rgyas nyid/
298a7(rgyud): dab/rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid 'thob par 'gyuraro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' 'di'i snying la bzhugs shing ngan yod pa'i phyir bkug cing dam tshig gas
298b1(rgyud): btsongs la dbang du byas te rje su mnyes pas bdag nyid slob dpon du gyur nas 'jug cing bsgru bstan 'grub par 'gyur//de nas rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la dang po'i rdo rje'i lnga bas bltas te/sbyong /
298b2(rgyud): bobolan gcag brjod nas/dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrub par bya'o//drin pa rdo rje rnam pAr sgrog pa'i phyag rgyas bzlas brjod lan cig byas la phyag byas nas gos dper dgyen la me tog gi zang
298b3(rgyud): ba thogs te gdong dris byug pa dang /rdo rje thal mos rdo rje'i gar byed cing bskor bas snying khar me tog thogs te bdag nyid 'jug par bya'o//zhugs nas kyang rnam par sgeg pa dang /bskor
298b4(rgyud): bas gdung cing snying po yang bzlas brjod bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje'i lta bas bltas te/de bzhin du 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das bsgrub pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das
298b5(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa bdag nyid dgyes pas mthong ba stsol bar 'gyur zhing smin ma bskyod la sku thams cad dam yan lag rnams bskyod cing kha dog dmar por 'gyur ro//'od zer gyi rang bzhin gyi
298b6(rgyud): zhal lam sku thams cad snyan par 'gyuraro//cho 'phrul dpag tu med pa yang ston par 'gyuraro//de nas bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid mthong ba stsol 'am dngos grub mchog kyang stsol bar
298b7(rgyud): 'gyur ro//de nas brtsams te nyin ri zhing dngos grub thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro//gang du zhugs pa tsam nyid kyis mi tshugs pa dang mi sod par 'gyuraro//dngos grub thams cad dang /
299a1(rgyud): phun sum chags pa thams cad dang /ye shes thams cad dang /bya ba thams cad bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes sgrub par mdzad do//de nas nga yang dag pa /
299a2(rgyud): mchod de rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur zhing dpa' bo'i rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la mnos la/snying po bzlas nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ba sprul nas rang nyid kyis stsol cig ces
299a3(rgyud): brjod la rang gis blang bar bya'o//de nas skad cig de nyid la dngos grub mchog yid la 'dod pa 'grub par 'gyuraro//yang na bdag nyid kyis zla ba drug gis yid la 'dod pa'i dngos
299a4(rgyud): grub mchog 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsung sa//de nas ming gi dbang bsgyur ba la sogs pa yang de bzhin no//de nas byin gyis brlab pa la sogs
299a5(rgyud): pa byas nas yang ji ltar 'dod pa'i cho gas bsgrubs la 'byung bar bya zhing dkyil 'khor chen po'i gsang ba sgrub pa lan cig bya'o//de nas slob ma gzhug par bya ste/de lnga dang por
299a6(rgyud): rdo rje slob dpon gyis dang po'i rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la 'jug par bya'o//zhugs nas de bzhin du phyag byas la snying pos ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i tshig dang
299a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das sgrub pas phyag rgya chen pos bsgrub par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das bsgrubs pas mtshan ma de nyid 'byung ste/shes nas phyag rgya chen po nyid 'grub par
299b1(rgyud): gyur ro//dngos grub thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur t+na/zhugs pa 'dis na du rgyurlob dpon bdag nyirlud bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro//de nas nga bzhin d+ha rdo rlung ba la sogs pa byas nas
299b2(rgyud): jisgrib ma la chog rgyas pa 'di bzhin du byis te phyag rgya bcing ba yang bslab par bya'o//gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa'i ngomatshig le mas pa de rnams la yod rang gi
299b3(rgyud): lhag pa'i lha'i 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang /de bzhin du yid la 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyuraro//de nas lha gzhan dag la dad pa rnams la de bzhin du 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas
299b4(rgyud): pa byas nas de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro//de nas ji ltar zhugs pa rnams zas dang /robadrung dang /gnas pa la sogs pa thams cad kyis yang dag par tshim par byis la/ji ltar shes
299b5(rgyud): pa'i g+har dang /glu dang dgad pa dang /br-i dang /bu mo dang /mdze' ba shes dang /haM du dang /gnyen mtshams dang bcas pas kyang mchod par bya'o//de la 'dir ni snod dang snod ma yin pa brtag
299b6(rgyud): par mI bya ste/sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams bde bachen po rdo rje dam tshig 'di dang /'dod pa'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i rdo rje'i sbyor bas rje
299b7(rgyud): chos kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa yin pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor chen po'o//de nas chog 'byung ste/zla ba nyi nas brtsams nas phyag ni rdo rje'i skyon sngar rab tu dga' ba'i dzi /
300a1(rgyud): /phyag rgya bcings la/ji ltar skye bar ma gyur par dang por byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa byas la rdo rje chog gis brjod cing ji srid zla ba cig gi bar de snod du/
300a2(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas na sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro//de nas brtsams na phyag na rdo rje'i bka' ji lta ba bzhin du dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro//de nas ras bris 'dri
300a3(rgyud): ba 'am 'drir gzhug par 'dod na dang par rdo rje bri ba'i phyag rgyas bris la/de'i 'og tu ni ci bder bya'o//dkyil 'khor thams cad du yang de nyid kyis dang bor brtsam par bya ste/dbusu
300a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du bri zhing dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis sems dpa' chen po brgyad bri bar bya'o//de nas zla ba nya nas brtsams te phyag rgya chen po bcings la//
300a5(rgyud): de bzhin du sngon du bsnyen pa'i tshul ltar bzlas na zla ba nye ba'i mtshan mo thog thag ji lta ba bzhin du skyo bar ma gyur pas phyag rgya ma bkrol bar bzlas brjod bya'o//de nas nang par bcom
300a6(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis zhal 'dzum zhing zla ba dang mnyam pa'i mdangs can mthong ba stsol cing sangs rgyas nyid dang /rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub mchog rnams stsol bar
300a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro//cho ga gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba dang /phyogs thams cad du de bzhin gshegs
300b1(rgyud): pa rnams dang rdo rje 'chang ba thams cad bri bar bya'o//de na de bzhin du bsgrubs pas sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa dngos grub thams cad 'grub po/ras la bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje snyems pa
300b2(rgyud): dang bcas par bris la/de'i spyan sngar dang po'i phyag rgya chen pos gnas nas bzlas brjod 'dum byas te/'bum rdzogs na phyag na rdo rje nyid thob par 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo gcig
300b3(rgyud): pa bris nas yang mthar 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro//de nas bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub pa'i las rnams dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ba ni 'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs pa
300b4(rgyud): thams cad rjes su mnyes par bya ba la ni 'dod chags la sogs pa bde ba thams cad phul bas so//rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po mnyes par bya ba la ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang 'khyud cing 'o byed pas so//
300b5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rje su mnyes par bya ba la ni dpag tu med pa'i bzlas pas so//rdo rjes thams cad rjes su mnyes par bya ba la ni rang gi snying po bzlas paso//gzhan srung ba/lha la
300b6(rgyud): sogs pa sems can thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba la ni thams cad du 'bum bzlas paso//bdag srung ba la ni yungs kar la lan gcig dazlas paso//gzhan srung ba la ni rdo rje bskor bas so/
300b7(rgyud): thams cad srung ba la ni yid kyis lan gcig/mtsha mos dang /phyogs dang /dkyil 'khor thams cad bcing ba la ni lta ba 'am yungs kar la sogs paso//sems can thams cad rengs par
301a1(rgyud): bya ba la ni dbugs mi 'byin par bzlas pas//sems can thams cad rmugs par bya ba lan rje 'tshor bas so//sems can thams cad rmongs par bya ba la ni mig
301a2(rgyud): btsum nas bzlas pas so//thams cad bsod pa la ni rdo rje dral bas so//sems can thams cad rgyas gdab pa la ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i phyag rgyaso//snying thams cad 'dren cing
301a3(rgyud): 'byin pa la nI yid kyis bzlas paso//sems can thams cad za ba la ni ldang cing myur bas zlos pas so//thams cad bsreg par bya ba la ni rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi phyag rgya so//nar thams cad
301a4(rgyud): dgog pa la ni gser gyi bzlas pas so//nor dang 'bru thams cad dbug pa la ni rdo rje rnal 'byor mra'i phyag rgyas//thams cad rjesu chags par bya ba la ni pI wang rdung ba dang bcas pa'i
301a5(rgyud): kakA la'i glu len pas bzlas brjod bya'o//thams cad 'bigs pa dang rje su chags par bya ba la ni rdo rje mda'i phyag rgyaso//thams cad chags por bya ba la ni phyogs thams cad kyi de bzhi
301a6(rgyud): gshegs pa mnyes pas//sdug pa'i 'ching ba brtan par bya ba la ni snying brtan pos nges par 'chir bas so//ma rungs pa rab tu sgrub pa la ni rdo rje snyen pas so//rgyun thams cad dbrog
301a7(rgyud): pa la ni 'bar ba'i lta bas dbrog paso//thams cad yid tshim pa la ni rdo rje khu tshur snying khar bzhag paso//mun pa snang bar bya ba li ni rdo rje kha shir du bltas te bskor bas so//lus
301b1(rgyud): 'de bar bya ba lan rang gi mtshan gyi bzlas pas so//gzugs thams cad snang bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gzugs kyi mchog gi phyag rgyas//sgra thams cad thos par bya ba la ni rdo rje ping wang gis//dranam pa
301b2(rgyud): sna tshogs pa'i phyir ni sna'i dbugs 'byin pa'i klu yis//zas dang /skom thams cad dang /bcud thams cad spro ba la ni rdo rje spo bar bya'o//dbab pa thams cad la ni mnyam pa'i thal mo dang /
301b3(rgyud): saM gal dang /klu'i bzlas pas so//thams cad gar byed du gzhug pa la ni bdag nyid gar byed cing bzlas paso//thams cad glu len du gzhug pa la ni lce bskyod cing bzlas paso//thams cad
301b4(rgyud): slar gzhug pa li ni rdo rje mchu yis so//thams cad babs nas lan ston pa la ni rdo rje 'bebs paso//gdon thams cad las thar bar bya ba la ni rdo rje myug gu'i phyag rgyaso//gdon thams cad
301b5(rgyud): 'dzin du gzhug pa la ni tshogs kyi bdag po rab tu dga' ba'i khro bos bzlas//rims thams cad 'dzin du gzhug pa la ni rdo rje'i rims kyi gdon gyiso//rims thams cad bsal ba la ni rdo rje
301b6(rgyud): lta bas bas labs sa//dug thams cad sbyar ba la ni rdo rje lta ba'i dug gis//dug thams cad gzhig po la nan bya'i chun paso//dug thams cad bza' ba la ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'i drag rgyus//dang
301b7(rgyud): mi sogs pa ma rungs pa thams cad brlag pa la ni 'khrugs pas dpag tu mang par bzlas pas//mkha' 'gro ma'i gdan thams cad las grol bar bya ba la ni rdo rje chen po gsor ba'i phyag rgyas//
303a1(rgyud): phyag rgya thams cad gzhag pa la ni rdo rje 'phen pas sa//mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dgug pa dang /gzhug pa dang /gdul ba la ni rdo rje kha T+wAM ga'i phyag rgya 'dzin pas//
303a2(rgyud): ma ma thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang /dam tshig dang snying po dang /phyag rgya dang /gsang sngags dang /rig pa dang /gsang ba gzhig pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i yi ge phaT kyiso//ma mo dang
303a3(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma thams cad mngag gzhug par bya ba la ni ma mo'i gan su khros pas bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o//bdud thams cad kyi stobs gzhom pa la ni rdo rje drag po'i ha ha zhes bya ba'i
303a4(rgyud): gang rgyangs kyiso//gzhan gyi dpung thams cad gzhom pa la ni rdo rje la yongasu bzlas la 'phang //'thab pa thams cad las thar par bya ba la ni rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya so//thams
303a5(rgyud): cad bcing ba la ni gos la mdud pa'o//thams cad grol ba la ni yi ge mu yi so//ro langs dang 'khrul 'khor thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje 'jigs byed kyis//lcags sgrog thams
303a6(rgyud): cad dgrol ba la ni rdo rje khab ling giso//me yang dag par bskyed pa la ni rdo rje me shel gyiso//chu med par chu yang dag par bskyed pa la ni rdo rje chu shel gyis//na mkha' las zas dang /
303a7(rgyud): skom dang /gos dang /rgyan thams cad la sogs pa yo byad meng po 'byung ba la ni na mkha' la lta zhing bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o//nam mkha' la sangs rgyas kyi sku la sogs pa gzugs
303b1(rgyud): thams cad ston pa la ni sangs rgyas rjesu dran la na mkhar lta zhing bzlas paso//na mkha' la yi gos 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i lung bsgo ba bden par ston pa la ni yi ge
303b2(rgyud): a bris la bzlas brjod 'bum byas paso//pra se na thams cad las 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i lung bsgo ba bden par ston pa la ni rdo rje pra se na thams cad dbab pas so//
303b3(rgyud): de bzhin du mig gis bden pa thams cad mthong ba la ni rang gi mig la bzlas pa 'bum byas paso//rna bas thos par bya ba la ni rang gi rna ba la bzlas pa 'bum byaso//snas bsdam par bya ba la ni sna/
303b4(rgyud): la bzlas pas so//lces rang nyid smra ba la ni lce la bzlas pas/lus kyis reg par bya ba la ni lus la bzlas pas so//yid kyis shes par bya ba la ni yid la 'bum bzlas paso//rmad du byung ba
303b5(rgyud): thams cad bstan pa la ni sangs rgyas kyi sku bsgrubs paso//sgyu ma thams cad bstan pa la ni rma bya'i sgro'i chun po la 'bum bzlaso//thams cad g.yog par bya ba la ni zhi ba'i gnas su 'bum bzlas
303b6(rgyud): pas so//thams cad la lan ldon par bya ba la ni//rdo rje hUM mdzod kyi rdo rje so/rdzu 'phrul thams cad bsten pa la ni rdo rje rdzu 'phrul gyi phyag rgyas//cho 'phrul thams cad bstan pa la ni rdo rje ting 'dzin
303b7(rgyud): gyi phyag rgyas//rang gi lus la sogs pa dngos po thams cad las sangs rgyas dang rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po thams cad bstan pa la ni rdo rje rdzu 'phrul rnam par
304a1(rgyud): 'phrul pas so//lha thams cad dbab pa la ni rdo rje bskor bas so//klu thams cad rje su 'breng bar bya ba la ni klu'i rgyal po'i mtshor bzlas brjod bya'o//gnod sbyin
304a2(rgyud): thams cad mngag gzhug par bya ba la ni rdo rje bka' bsgo bas so//'byung po thams cad gdul ba la ni lha chen po mnan nas khros pas bzlas brjod bya'o//ser ba thams cad bzlog pa la na/
304a3(rgyud): rdo rje sring srung gi phyag rgyas//glog 'bab pa thams cad bzlog pa la ni rdo rje khro gnyer can gyi phyag rgyaso//char 'bab pa la ni klu'i mtshor bzlas brjod bya'o//char bcad pa la ni dri ma med pa'i
304a4(rgyud): chu'i sprin lugs bya'o//sprin bskyed pa la ni klu bris nas bdug pas bdug par bya'o//sprin bshig pa la ni rdo rje na mkha'i spyan gyi so//chu med pa'i phyogs su shin tu bsil ba'i chu'i tshogs
304a5(rgyud): rtag tu 'byung ba la ni rdo rje klu'i phyag rgya so//gter thams cad shes par bya ba la ni snod du chu blugs par bya'o//gter thams cad brko ba la ni rdo rje mdzor gyiso//gter thams cad rnyed pa la ni
304a6(rgyud): rdo rje nor gyiso//rgyal srid thams cad thob par bya ba ni rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyaso//sa'i bdag por bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya so//dkyil 'khor thams cad
304a7(rgyud): sgrub pa la ni rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas so//phyog rgya thams cad sgrub pa la ni bde ba chen po'i dam tshig gis phyag rgyas//dam tshig thams cad sgrub pa la ni rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i phyag
304b1(rgyud): rgyas so//dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa la ni rdo rje snyems pa'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas//ma grub pa thams cad grub par ston pa la ni rdo rje grub pa'i phyag rgyaso//rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad sgrub
304b2(rgyud): pa la ni rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyaso//rdo rje thams cad sgrub pa la ni rdo rje thams cad kyi mchog gis phyag rgyas//byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrub pa la ni thugs kyi rdo rje so//rdo rje
304b3(rgyud): 'dzin pa nyid sgrub pa la ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po so//sangs rgyas nyid sgrub pa la ni rdo rje ye shes kyi phyag rgyas//bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig thams cad kyi rtog pa'i
304b4(rgyud): rgyal po chen po las dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs///de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis yang de bzhin gshegs
304b5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis zhi ba'i chos nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gsungs te/rdo rje sra ba nyid kyi phyir rdo rje mnyam pa nyid kyi mngon
304b6(rgyud): par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o//don gcig pa nyid kyi phyir don gyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o//ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa nyid
304b7(rgyud): kyi phyir chos kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o//thams cad la rnam par mi rtog pa nyid kyi phyir thams cad mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang
305a1(rgyud): chub pa ni byang chub chen pa'o//lag na rdo rje gang la la chas mngon par sgrub pa bzhi po 'di dag nyan pa dang /'dzin pa dang /klog pa dang /sgom pa de sdig pa thams cad/
305a2(rgyud): la spyod kyang byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du ngan song thams cad las yang dag par 'das par 'gyuraro//de nas de skad ces bka' stsal nas/bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi khu tshur
305a3(rgyud): yongasu 'dzin pa'i don gyi gnas 'di nyid rgya cher ston cing bzhin 'dzum pa dang bcas te chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi snying po 'di gsungaso//aHde nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de/
305a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par 'dus par mdzad nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyogs thams cad du rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis zhugs pa dang /sems
305a5(rgyud): dpa' chen po brgyad phyi'i dkyil 'khor du phyogs brgyad du bzhad pa chen pos bzhad cing bzhugaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs
305a6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dam tshig chen
305a7(rgyud): po 'di gsungaso//rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du phyi'i dkyil 'khor bris la/de'i dbusu thig gsum gyi 'khor lo bris nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad kar sna tshogs
305b1(rgyud): pad+mar rab tu gnas pa'i de 'khor lo'i lte ba la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa chen po sa la sogs pa las byas pa bzhago/de'i phyogs thams cad du sa la sogs pa las byas pa'i
305b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad bzhug gam bri bar bya'o//de nas tshon gyi thig le rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rdo rje 'dzin pa dang btsos pa bri
305b3(rgyud): bar bya'o//phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhi dang /mtshams rnamasu byang chub sems dpa' brgyad ji lta ba bzhin bzhag nas bum pa gang ba bzhi sgo rnams dgod par bya'o//byang chub kyi
305b4(rgyud): mtshan ma rnams bzhag par bya ste/shar nas brtsams te ne'u sing sa dang bcas pa'i dum bu dang //ro drug gis yongasu gang zhing dbyig dang /gser dang /rin po che dang /gos la sogs
305b5(rgyud): pas yongasu bkang ba'i snod dang /'jam zhing shin tu bde ba'i stan dang /sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs dgod de//de nas de bzhin du gos gyon la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya
305b6(rgyud): bcing nas zhugs na/bdag nyid slob dpon med par yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ro//de nas brtsams te de bzhin gshegs pa thams
305b7(rgyud): cad kyi rtog pa dang /dngos grub thams cad la mi tshugs pa dang /mi sod pa dang /sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba 'thob par 'gyur ro//de nas slob ma yang de bzhin du gzhug/zhugs nas rdo
306a1(rgyud): rje rtse lnga pa byin la rdo rje ning gis dbang bskur ba yang sbyin par bya'o//de nas dam tshig 'di dag bya bar bsgo bar bya'o//sems can kun la phan phyir dang /bstan pa
306a2(rgyud): thams cad srung ba'i phyir/rnam par mi rtog sbyor ba yis//ci bder ba ni thams cad kyis zhes bya'o//de nas mtshan ma bzhi 'byor pa ji lta bas skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du smin par bya'o//
306a3(rgyud): dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor ro//de nas sgrub pa ni ras ris la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad 'bum pa dang bcas shing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur gyi phyag
306a4(rgyud): rgya yongasu 'dzin par bya'o//gzhan thams cad ni dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bya'o//de nas de bzhin du sems dpa' mchog sgrub pa dang /dngos grub mchog rnams
306a5(rgyud): kyang de bzhin no//gzhan yang ras la bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo gcig pu bris te/'di'i mdun du rdo rje'i tshig gis bzlas brjod 'bum byas nas ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs su
306a6(rgyud): 'dzin pas mtshan mo thog thag bzlas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'thob cing dngos grub thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'gyur la/de nas de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur//
306a7(rgyud): de nas ma bsgrubs kyang dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa tsam nyid kyis las rnams 'grub par 'gyur te/'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa la ni ji snyed pa'i de bzhin
306b1(rgyud): gshegs pa'i bde ba thams cad phul bas so//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mchod pa la ni bdag phul bas so//dkon mchog gsum mchod pa la ni me tog la sogs
306b2(rgyud): pa la bzlas paso//sems can thams cad mchod pa la ni thams cad la byams pa'i bzlas paso//chos thams cad bsdu ba la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshig bzhi po gdon paso//
306b3(rgyud): bdud thams cad 'dul ba la ni brtan zhing nges pa'i bzlas paso//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba thob pa la ni rgyan thams cad dbul zhing rang nyid bcings paso//chos
306b4(rgyud): nyid thams cad thob pa la ni rdo rje pad+ma la lta bas so//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid dngos grub thob pa la ni rdo rje las kyi mchog giso//sangs rgyas nyid rab tu thob pa
306b5(rgyud): la ni rdo rje ye shes kyi khu tshur gyi de kho na nyid kyi phyag rgya chen poso//bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid
306b6(rgyud): kyi rdo rje dam chag ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po rdzog so///de nas ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas kyang yang chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa
306b7(rgyud): nyid kyis rnam par rgyal ba bsdu ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa 'di gsungs te/'dod chags kyi spros pa med pa nyid kyis zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa nyid//zhe sdang gi spros
307a1(rgyud): /pa med pa nyid kyi gti mug gi smyos pa med pa nyid//gti mug gi spros pa med pa nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi spros pa med pa nyid//chos thams cad kyi spros pa med
307a2(rgyud): pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spros pa med pa nyid du rig par bya'o//lag na rdo rje gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang /'dzin pa dang /klog pa dang /
307a3(rgyud): sgom pa des 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir khams gsum du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad bsad kyang ngan song du skye bar mi 'gyur ro//myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
307a4(rgyud): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro//de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje chos nyid 'di'i don rgya tshor ston cing /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes
307a5(rgyud): bya ba'i ting 'dzin gyi phyag rgya bcings la/khro gnyer dang bcas shing smin ma bteg te 'bar bar blta ba la pad+ma'i gdong khro zhing dgod de/mche ba gcig nas rkang pa g.yas pa bskum
307a6(rgyud): pa'i tshul gnas pas gnas nas/rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsung so//hU~M de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i dbang phyug la sogs pa
307a7(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po rnams yang dag par bkug ste ltung bar mdzad nas dkyil 'khor du bcug nas rnam par rgyal bar mdzad bcings te dbang du byas nas btul zhing rje su btul te
307b1(rgyud): bsnyungs nas yang dan tshig kyis bcangs nas 'jog tan gsum gyi bdag po dbang phyug rnon po chung ma dang bcas pa zhabs sra pabanas mnan pa mdzad//don sa de rnams kyi sA lag rten gsum
307b2(rgyud): bo thams cad du sgra chen po bsgrugs te/kyai rdo rje 'chang chen po yongasu skyob par mdzad cig/bdag cag rnams ma gzir cig/'dir khyod la bdag skyeb su mchi'o//dam tshig dang bka' bsgo
307b3(rgyud): ba yang sgrub par bgyi'o//ma mo thams cad kyang btul zhing dam la rtags nas dkyil 'khor yang rnam par bshig ste/phyag rgya thams cad dang /dam tshig kyang dral zhing rnam par bshig pa dang /
307b4(rgyud): gdon thams cad kyang bzlog cing nad thams cad dang /rims thams cad dang /gnod pa dang /dug dang /ngan 'gro rnams dral cing rnam par bshig pas sgra chen po sgrogs shing 'jigs pa
307b5(rgyud): chen pos 'jigs par byed pa'i tshig rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das nyid la skyabasu song ngo ///bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang zhal rnam par bzhad pas de rnams dkyil 'khor du bcug/
307b6(rgyud): skye/dam tshig gis bcings nas rdo rje rin chen gyis dbang bskur nas rang gi mtshan ma rnams rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs te rdo rje ming gi/dbang bskur ba yang rje su stsal nas sems can ma lus pa'i
307b7(rgyud): don du phyi'i rdo rje'i rigasu rab tu bzhag go/de nas rdo rje khro bo'i rdo rje las phyag na rdo rje dang 'dra ba'i dngos po'i bdag nyid can kha dog dang /rgyan dang /mtshon cha rnams sna tshogs pa bsnams pa rnam
308a1(rgyud): par 'gyur ba'i rdo rje'i mche ba gtsigs pa/tshoms kyis sgros gnon pa/smin ma mi bzad cing khro gnyer bsnyer bA/spyan dang /dadu sgra dang /a com 'bar ba/
308a2(rgyud): zhal 'jigs pa/rdo rje lcags kyu dang /zhags pa dang /mtshon cha mda' dang /dbyig pa dang /ral gri dang //da T+wAM ga dang /gri rings dang /chu glu phyog ni bsnams pa/khro bo chem
308a3(rgyud): po hUM mdzad las phyung ste/bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis bzhug so//lha la sogs pa de rnams kyang rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi byin gyis brlabs nas
308a4(rgyud): phyi'i dkyil 'khor du bzhag/gdon la sogs pa de dag kyang dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol na gan so//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thugs rje chen po'i thabs/
308a5(rgyud): kyokyi khro bo'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas khams gsum po mtha' dag las rnam par rgyal ba rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di
308a6(rgyud): gsung so//de nas yang dag bshad bya ba//rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste//khams gsum rnam rgyal zhes bya ba/'dul ba chen po 'dul byed pa'o//dkyil 'khor dang po'i sbyor ba yis/
308a7(rgyud): phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya//de yi nang gis 'khor lo ni//dkyil 'khor brkyang pa dag dang mtshungs//de yi dbus su khro bo che//phyag na rdo rje bzhag par bya//sangs rgyas phreng la so/
308b1(rgyud): pas spras//ud pal sngon po'i mdag 'dra ba//zhal ni cung zad mtsho ba gtsigs//khros bcas bzhad pa'i zhal mnga' ba//dartson brkyang ba yis logs bzhugs la//rdo rje hU~M mdzad bsdus pa'o//
308b2(rgyud): g.yon gyi zhabs kyisA legs mnan pa//de yi bya ba dbang phyug che//g.yas ni dka' thub bzlog pa yi//nu mra'i steng du rab tu 'jog/'bar phreng 'khrigs pa'i 'od ldan pa//sna stsogs bcas
308b3(rgyud): pa'i khams rnams kyis//khro bo kun tu bzhag par bya//'bar phyed 'khrigs pa'i 'od ldan pa//'khor lo de'ang mkhas pa yis//'bar phreng 'khrigs pa'i 'od can bri//phyi yi dkyil 'khor
308b4(rgyud): gnas rnams su//phyi yi dkyil 'khor tshogs rnams so//khro bo'i mtshan ma bzhi po ni//gzhu dang mda' dang ral gri dang //'khor lo de bzhin rtse gsum sgreng //sgo rnams kun tu bri bar bya//phyi
308b5(rgyud): rol gnas pa'i gdon rnams kyi//sna tshogs gtor mas bkang ba dang //ba dan sngon po dril btags shing //rtse mo kha dog sna tshogs pa'o//de nas 'dir 'jug pa la ni yan lag thams
308b6(rgyud): cang ras sngon po zung gis g.yogs shing khros pas rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang bcas par 'dzin par gyur pas zhugs na bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje rigs kyi slob dpon du byin gyis
308b7(rgyud): rlob par mdzod//de nas brtsams te sdig pa las rnam par grol zhing mi sod pa dang /mi tshugs pa dang /mu stegs thams cad la cher gcod pa dang /phan 'dogs nus shing thams
309a1(rgyud): cad las rgyal ba dang /dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyu ro//de nas slob ma de bzhin du bcug la snying po byin te dkyil 'khor thams cad du'ang bya'o//de nas rdo
309a2(rgyud): rjernon po rtse bzhi pa 'bar ba byin la rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur nas/rdo rje brtul zhugs sbyin par bya//'di ni gdug pa 'dul byed pa'i//phyag na rdo rje rdo rje s+ho//ma rung ba
309a3(rgyud): thams cad 'dul ba la//khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //de nas de bzhin du bya'o//rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor//de nas sgrub pa ni ras lA bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i dbang phyug byas la//rdo rje'i
309a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs kyang sems dpa' chen po thams cad bya'o//phyogs thams cad du ni lha la sogs pa dang /ma mo rnams bri bar bya ste//de nas sgrub pa chen po la yang de bzhin
309a5(rgyud): te/de bzhin du dngos grub mchog rnams la ni ras la bcom ldan 'das ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas de'i mdun du lag pa gnyis kyis phyag rgya bcings te bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o//de
309a6(rgyud): nas yi ge hUM tsam gyis 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las thams cad byed par 'gyuraro//ma bsgrubs par yang las thams cad dang /de bzhin du thams cad rje suM chags
309a7(rgyud): par yang bya ba dang /dgug pa dang /bcing ba dang /dgrol ba dang /dbang du bya ba dang /lkugs par bya ba dang /rengs par bya ba dang /rmongs par bya ba dang /gnyid med
309b1(rgyud): par bya ba dang /rgyas gdab pa dang /ltung ba dang /bdeg pa dang /bsad pa dang /gso bar bya ba la sogs pa'ang lan cig bzlas pas byed par 'gyu ro//thams cad bsad pa la ni rdo rje gro
309b2(rgyud): bo mthar byed kyis//thams cad rgyas gdab pa la ni khro bo'i lta ba'i bzlas paso//thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje spros pas gzhig par bya'o//thams cad nges par gnon pa la ni rdo rje dang khros
309b3(rgyud): pas phyogs der brdeg par bya'o//gdon thams cad dbug pa la ni rdo rje phra mo 'bigs byed kyiso//thams cad kyi snying 'byin pa la ni khros pa'i yid kyis dbyung bar bya'o//gdug pa thams
309b4(rgyud): cad tshar bcad pa la ni khros pas rdo rje bskor bar bya'o//gdug cing khros pa dag pa la ni khros pas lcags phye'i sbyin srog giso//bdud thams cad brlag pa la ni rang gi sa bon gyi sbyin
309b5(rgyud): sreg geso//gnod sbyin thams cad bskrad pa la ni rta ta zhes dgod cing bzlas paso//klu thams cad gdon pa la ni rdo rje sa la rdebs shing bzlas paso//lha rnams ltung bar bya ba la ni/lha/
309b6(rgyud): mo rdo rje ltung byed kyis//lha'i bdag po thams cad dbang du bya ba dang /'dul ba dang /bsnan pa dang /gsod pa dang /dul bar bya ba la ni srid pa gsum po gdul bar byed paso//rnam
309b7(rgyud): thos sras rje su 'brang bar bya ba la ni rnam thos sras mnan nas khros pas bzlam brjod bya'o//lus ngan po mnan nas dpal dbrog pa la ni rdo rje skyes bus//'dod pa'i lha dbang du bya ba la ni/
310a1(rgyud): 'dod pa'i lha'i mdun du khros pas bzlas brjod bya'o//tshangs pa ltung bar bya ba la ni rdo rje rab tu dga' ba'i phyag rgyaso//khyab 'jug gzhig pa la ni rdo rje 'khor lo dral
310a2(rgyud): bas so//dbang phyug chen po 'dul ba la ni rdo rje tri shul bral bso//ma mo thams cad bsad pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i tshogs kyi srid moso//phyi'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang /dam tshig
310a3(rgyud): dang /chos dang /gsang ba'i dngos grub rnam par gtor zhing rnam par 'jig pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i gdug pa'i dam tshig 'jigs par byed paso//ri dang /shing dang /khyim dang /gtsug
310a4(rgyud): lag khang dang /grong khyer dang /mchod rten dang /lha'i khang pa dang /skyes pa dang /bud med dang /glang po dang bcas pa'i rta la sogs pa thams cad gzhom pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i lta bas
310a5(rgyud): mig la reg paso//ltung ba thams cad bslang ba la nI rdo rje khro bo bslang bas so//thams cad spo ba la ni rdo rje khros pa'i rnal 'byor mas//thams cad dbrog pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i khu tshur dang
310a6(rgyud): dbrog paso//'jigs pa thams cad bskyed pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i lta bas so//dpung thams cad bsad pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i gnod sbyin mo so//gzhan gyi dpung thams cad gzhom pa dang /
310a7(rgyud): gnon pa dang /rmongs par bya ba dang /long bar bya ba dang /rgyas gdab pa dang /bsad pa la ni rdo rje khro bo mi rungs pa'i srin mo so//rgyal po la sogs pa mi chen po thams cad bsad/
310b1(rgyud): pa la ni dong ka'i shing la rang gi khrag gi sbyin sreg byas paso//lha thams cad gzhig pa la ni lha thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan phur pus btab paso//lha'i bdag po thams cad sreg pa la ni lha
310b2(rgyud): thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyi yam shing gis//rang gi khrag gi rgyun 'bab pas sa thams cad nub par bya ba la ni rdo rje khro bo sa bag gi phyag rgyaso//khams gsum thams cad bsad pa la ni
310b3(rgyud): rdo rje 'jig pa'i phyag rgyas//'jig rten gsum po thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba la ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i mchog gi rdo rje'i khro boso//khams gsum thams cad dpa
310b4(rgyud): pa dang /dgug pa dang /gzhug pa dang /dbang du bya ba dang /nges par gnon pa la ni rdo rje sems dpa'i khro bo'i phyag rgya so//khams gsum po thams cad rje su chags par bya ba dang /
310b5(rgyud): dgug pa dang /gzhug pa dang /bcing pa dang /rgyas gdab pa dang /dbang du bya ba dang /gnon par bya ba dang /sgrub pa la ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dam tshig gi khro boso//bde ba chen po
310b6(rgyud): rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzog so///de nas bcom ldan 'das
310b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa ngo bo nyid dag pa'i chos nyid thob pas yang chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid spyan ros gzigs dbang phyug gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
311a1(rgyud): pa'i tshul 'di gsungs te/'dod chags thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid kyis kyang 'jig rten na zhe sdang thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro//dri ma thams cad rnam
311a2(rgyud): par drug pa nyid kyis 'jig rten na sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyuraro//chos thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig rten na sems can thams cad rnam par dag par
311a3(rgyud): 'gyuraro//shes pa thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig rten na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag par 'gyuraro//lag na rdo rje gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul
311a4(rgyud): 'di nyan pa dang /'dzin pa dang /klog pa dang /sgom pa de 'dod chags dang dri ma thams cad kyi nang na 'dug kyang pad+mo lta bur 'dod chags kyi nyes pa rnams dang /dri ma rnams dang //
311a5(rgyud): blo bur gyi nyon mongs pa rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur te/myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro//de nas byang chub
311a6(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don b+h+yo gnas 'di nyid yang rgya chen por ston cing bzhin rab tu 'dzum dmul le/pad+ma'i 'dab ma kha 'byed pas 'dod
311a7(rgyud): chags la sogs pa'i dri mas mi gos pa la lta zhing 'gro ba thams cad kyi phyir pad+ma'i gzugs sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungaso//hrIHde nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis pad+ma chen bri
311b1(rgyud): las de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan thams cad/bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra ba'i pad+mas mtshan ma'i gzugs can nges pas byung nas bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzag//
311b2(rgyud): dbang phyug gi rim pa dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bzhugs par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das spyan ris gzigs dbang phyug chos thams cad la gzegs pa'i ye shes kyi dbang phyug
311b3(rgyud): gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs nas 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungaso//phyi'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba'i nang du
311b4(rgyud): gnyis pa ni zur bzhi pa las de bzhin du sgo dang mtshamasu bcas pa bri'o//de nas dkyil 'khor brgyad pa'i tshul du thig bzhi thig btab pa la tshon dmar pos pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bri bar
311b5(rgyud): bya'o//de'i dbusu bcom ldan 'das dgod par bya'o//de'i mdun du bcom ldan 'das pad+ma chen po chags pa sku mdog dmar po pad+ma'i gzugs 'dzin pa/pad+ma chen po dang /mnga' dang /
311b6(rgyud): gzhu bsnams pa/g.yas su bcom ldan 'das pad+ma chen po'i gti dbang phyug dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o//rgyab tu pad+ma chen po khyab 'jug gi gzugs 'dzin pa
311b7(rgyud): sku mdog nag po gzhag par bya'o//g.yon du pad+ma chen po mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa sku mdog dkar po bzhag par bya'o//g.yas kyi mtsham su pad+ma chen po sa 'dzin
312a1(rgyud): pa gzhag par bya'o//mtshams gnyis par pad+ma chen po rgyan tsho chu lha'i gzugs 'dzin pa bzhag par bya'o//gsum par pad+ma chen po nyi ma'i gzugs can gzhag par//
312a2(rgyud): bya'o//bzhi par pad+ma chen po rlung gi gzugs 'dzin pa bzhag par bya'o//phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams rnams//shrI hU~M gI d+hI lha ma bzhi gzhag par bya ste/thams cad kyang g.yas
312a3(rgyud): na rang gi mtshan ma 'dzin pa/g.yon pa pad+ma 'dzin par bya ste/sgo rnamasu ni 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug dang /mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan ma rnams gzhug par
312a4(rgyud): bya ste/'di lta ste/bud med kyi gzugs dang /sbrul gyi gzugs dang /phag gi gzugs dang /pad+ma'i gzugs bya'o//de nas gos dkar po bgos te/gos dkar pos gdongs
312a5(rgyud): g.yogs la pad+ma chen po'i phyag rgya chen po me tog dang bcas par bcings te zhugs la me tog dor bar bya ste/gang du babs pa de des bsgrubs par bya'o//de nas pad+ma blangs la pad ma'i
312a6(rgyud): ming gi dbang bskur bar dang de bskur la 'di skad ces brjod par bya zhing pad+ma'i 'dab ma la blta bar bya ste/ji ltar pad+ma dmar po 'di/tshon gyis nyes pas mi gos te/'dam gyi nang na
312a7(rgyud): dag pa ltar//'dod chags zhe sdang sogs de bzhin//de ltar chos rnams bsgom na ni//blo ldan nyon mongs bcas gyur kyang //nyon mongs kun las rnam grol nas//myur du sangs rgyas nyid
312b1(rgyud): 'thob 'gyur//zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin 'di la gzugs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang phyug nyid thob par 'gyur te/de nas bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces/
312b2(rgyud): mtshan btag so//de nas brtsams te bdag nyid kyi dngos po thams cad shin tu yongasu dag pa dang /so shing dngos grub thams cad byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du rje su myong bar 'gyur zhing myur
312b3(rgyud): du sangs rgyas nyid 'thob par 'gyur te/slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yang de bzhino//ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor//sgrub pa la ni de bzhin du ras kyi ri mo gnyis kyis dngos grub thams cad
312b4(rgyud): 'thob par 'gyur ro//de nas ma bsgrubs kyang thams cad rje su chags par bya ba la ni pad+ma la lan stong bzlas te sbyin par bya'o thams cad bsad pa la ni pad+ma chen po'i khro bo'i phyag rgya so//thams
312b5(rgyud): cad rmongs par bya ba la ni pad+ma chen po phag giso//nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba la ni pad+mo chen po rnam par gzigs pa'i ting 'dzin gyi phyag rgyaso//sa thams cad kyi
312b6(rgyud): bdag por bya bya lo ni sa la skyil mo dkrungs bcas pas bzlas brjod 'bum byas nas mthar mtshan mo thog thig bzlas brjod bya'o//chu thams cad dngab pa la ni klu bris nas de'i steng du 'dug
312b7(rgyud): nas bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o//thams cad sdang bar bya ba ni mun par nyi ma chen po'i 'od kyis//rlung thams cad dgug pa dang /gzhug pa dang /bcing ba dang /dbang du bya ba la ni pad+ma chen po/
313a1(rgyud): rlung gi mchog gi go//bde ba chen pordo rje don yod pa'i dmachog gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba
313a2(rgyud): rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so///de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa khams gsum thams cad kyi dbang pos yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
313a3(rgyud): dbang bskur ba las byung ba ye shes kyi snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/dbang bskur ba sbyin pa la ni khams gsum thams cad kyi rgyal srid thob par
313a4(rgyud): 'gyur ro//nor sbyin pa ni re ba thams cad yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//chos sbyin pa ni chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro//zang zing sbyin pa ni lus dang /ngag dang /
313a5(rgyud): sems kyi bde bo thams cad thob par 'gyur ro//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po bzhin rab tu 'dzum pa dang po ces te rang gi mgo la rdo rje rin po
313a6(rgyud): ches dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba 'ching zhing don yod pa 'di nyid rgya cher ston te/dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi dam tshig rin po che zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smraso//tAM de nas 'di gsung
313a7(rgyud): pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi rin po che de la thams cad dbang bskur ba la sogs pa yo byad dang gter thams cad byung ste/bcom ldan 'das dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi
313b1(rgyud): tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs nyid kyis zhug so//de nas bcom ldan 'das na mkha'i snying po dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi rin po che rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par
313b2(rgyud): zhugs nas bsam pa thams cad yong su rdzogs par byed pa nor bu rin po che'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsung so//phyi'i dkyil 'khor ni dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du byas/
313b3(rgyud): pa'i nang du rin po che zur brgyad pa/rin po che'i ka ba brgyad la gnas pa/dkyil 'khor brgyad pa'i tshul las rin po che'i lcug mas yongasu bskor ba/rdo rje rin po che'i ra ba cog dang /me
313b4(rgyud): tog gi phreng /ba dan dang /gdugs dang /rnga yab kyis nye bar mdzes par bya'o//de'i dbusu bcom ldan 'das rta'i khri la bzhugs pa dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba rang nyid 'ching bar mdzad
313b5(rgyud): cing zhal rnam par bzhad cing ma rgad kyi mdog can gzhag par bya'o//de'i mdun du byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i rin po che zhes bya ba'i rdo rje
313b6(rgyud): rin po che'i cod pan 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o//g.ya su rin po che chen po'i nor sbyin pa dbyig gi gter 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o//rgyab tu chos chen po'i rin po'i glegs bam 'dzin
313b7(rgyud): pa gzhag par bya'o//g.yon du rin po che chen po ro myang ba zas dang skom thams cad 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o//mtshams rnamasu mchod pa'i lha mo rnams rin po che'i gdugs dang /rgyal
314a1(rgyud): mtshan dang /rnga dang /srog shing rnams 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o//phyi rol gyi mtsham su bum pa gang ba rnam so//sgo rnams dngar bskur ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma
314a2(rgyud): rnams gzhag par bya'o//phyi rol du ni gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /bla re rnams kyis kun tu khyab par bya'o//de nas de bzhin du rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya 'dzin byas/
314a3(rgyud): zhugs nas/de nas btsams te nor thams cad 'grub pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'thob par 'gyu ro//de nas zhugs nas kyang dbang bskur bya'i phyeng bu bcings te rin po che rgyangs
314a4(rgyud): nas rin po che'i ming gi dbang bskur bas ni bskur la sbyin pa thams cad dul nas slar dbyung bar bya'o//slob ma bzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yang de bzhino//rdo rje rin po che'i dkyil 'khor//
314a5(rgyud): sgrub pa dang dngos grub rnams kyang de bzhi no//de nas mo bsgrubs par dbang bskur ba thams cad 'thob pa la ni rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i phreng bas so//bsam pa thams cad yongasu
314a6(rgyud): rdzogs pa la ni nyin re zhing nyi ma 'char kar bzlas brjod dpag tu med pa bya'o//chos thams cad kyi don shes pa la ni dri ma med pa'i na mkha' la bsti zhing bzlas brjod bya'o//zas dang rnam
314a7(rgyud): thams cad sogs pa dang /ro thams cad thob par bya ba la ni namakha' las yid la 'dod pa bzhin du nyin re zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi bzlas brjod stong byas paso//shin tu mthon po thor ba
314b1(rgyud): byAbya ba la ni gdugs bzung nas bzlas brjod 'dum bya'o//rnam par rgyal ba chen po thob pa la ni rin chen rgyal mtshan mchog gis//grags pa dang sman pa chen po mchog dang ming thob par bya ba la/
314b2(rgyud): ninyin re zhing kha thams cad du bltas nas bzlas pa bya'o//dadag po chen po thob pa la ni rin po che'i phrog shing gi phyag rgyaso//bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po
314b3(rgyud): las dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi rin po che'i de ma tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzog so///de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
314b4(rgyud): phyag rgya thob pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi du tshur 'dzin pa/de bzhin gshegs pa rtags pas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i byin gyis brlabs
314b5(rgyud): pa rdo rje zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i phyag rgya yong du 'dzin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du 'gyuraro//de
314b6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung khri phyag rgya yong su 'dzin pa ni chos thams cad thob par 'gyuraro//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi phyag rgya yong su 'dzin pa ni ting
314b7(rgyud): 'dzin thams cad thob par 'gyuraro//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongasu 'dzin pa ni lus dang /ngag dang /sems can thams cad rdo rjer rdo rje'i dngos grub dam pa
315a1(rgyud): /thob par 'gyur//sul la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /lung 'bog pa dang /sgom pa des dngos grub thams/
315a2(rgyud): cad dang /phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang /shes pa thams cad dang /dgos pa thams cad dang /lus dang /ngag dang /sems thams cad rdo rje'i rdo rje'i dngos grub dam pa
315a3(rgyud): thob nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khu tshur dam
315a4(rgyud): tshig chen po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongasu 'dzin pas don gyi gnas 'di rgya cher ston te/bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing rdo rje sra zhing rdo rje sra ba'i phyag rgya thams cad dngos grub kyi dam tshig ces
