364a7(rgyud): la ni ma zhugs kyang //srid pa 'di la myur 'grub 'gyur//shin tu mthong ba la sogs kun//sems can thams cad rab stsol mdzad//kun nas dus kun thams cad la/
364b1(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad rab stsol 'gyur//rgyal po rdo rje 'chang chen po//sbrid pa'i dbang phyug kun gyiso//de phyir bsgrub bya 'di bshad bya//dngos grub shin tu rtag pa'o//gang gis
364b2(rgyud): srid pa 'di nyid du//shin tu rtag pa'i dngos grub thob//lugs mA 'am ni brdungs ma 'am//ri mo bris pa 'am 'dus byas pa'i//phyag na rdo rje'i sku gzugs ni//ci bzhin bshad par
364b3(rgyud): rab gzhug bya//bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi de kho na nyid sgrub pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag
364b4(rgyud): rgya'i ye shes kyis slar yang phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so//nyin re snga rol dus ci bzhin//dang po'i rdo rje bde ba che//'di ni rtag pa thams cad la//phyag rgya thams
364b5(rgyud): cad mdor bsdus pas//dam tshig yang dag bcings nas grub//phye nas ma bsgrubs kyang grub 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje chos kyi de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba'i sngags sgrub pa
364b6(rgyud): 'di gsungaso//langs pa'am ni 'dug pa 'am//gang dang dor ni gnas pa'am//thams cad rjes chags rnal 'byor gyis//dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur//de nas bcom
364b7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis las kyi gsang ba'i de kho na nyid kyi rgyud 'di gsungaso//gsang ba'i gar mchog mchod pa 'am//yang na mchod pa ci bde bar//byas te mgon po sgrub byas nas//mchog
365a1(rgyud): gi dang pa grub myur du 'thob//de nas rang gi phyag rgyas bdag nyid sgrub pa'i rgyud ni/phyag rgya chen ngo mnyam gzhug ste//rang gi snying pos lhan cig sgrub/
365a2(rgyud): brten zhing shin tu dgyes kun chags//shin tu dgyes myur bdag po sgrub//de nas yi ge hUM gis glu blangs pa'i grub pa'i rgyud ni//ri b+hi da sogs rgyan dang ldan//ci nus pa dang ci
365a3(rgyud): 'dod pa//dri za dang po blangs nas ni//yi ge hUM gis grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das chags pa chen po dang po'i rdo rje sems dpas gsungaso//de kho na nyid chen po'i gsang
365a4(rgyud): ba'i dngos grub sgrub pa'i rgyud//rtog pa thams cad kyi las kyi phyag rgya bshad par bya'o//zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das theg ma dang tha ma med pa'i phrin las kyi rdo rje sems dpas gsung so//shin
365a5(rgyud): tu ring ba'i tshe 'phel ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i choso//shin tu gzhon pa'i nachod 'phel ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i bcud kyis len gyiso//gzugs chen po dang gzi brjid chen po 'phel
365a6(rgyud): ba ni badre ba chen po'i rdo rje'i gzugs kyi gzi brjid kyis//'du byed chen po thams cad 'phel ba ni bde ba chen po rdo rje 'du byed chen po so//sems can thams cad kyi bdag nyid thams cad
365a7(rgyud): srung ba ni bde ba chen po rdo rje srung bso//phyogs thams cad dngo mtshams dang dkyil 'khor bcings pa ni bde ba chen po rdo rje bskor bas te/thams cad rdo rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid khro bo'i
365b1(rgyud): rgyal po chen po rdo rjes kyang 'jug par mi nus shing mi phyed par 'gyur ro//srid pa thams cad srung ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i byin gyis brlangs paso//bdag nyid kyi dngos grub thams cad dam
365b2(rgyud): gzhan dag rdo rje byed pa ni bde ba chen po'i go chaso//'thab mo thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje rgyal mtshan mchog gi dpung rgyan gyiso//'thab mo srung ba ni bde ba chen
365b3(rgyud): po'i gzhan gyis mi thub paso//gzhan gyi dpung thams cad bshig pa ni rdo rje bde ba chen po'i rdo rje 'dzin paso//gzhan gyi dpung nyams pa dang /ldang ba dang /ltung ba dang /gsod
365b4(rgyud): pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje glog bskor bso//rim thams cad la sogs pa'i nad thams cad drang nad chen po zhi ba ni bde ba chen po rdo rje phrogs pa so//dug thams cad gzhig pa dang dug
365b5(rgyud): med par bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje 'phrog paso//phyag rgya gdon thams cad las dgrol ba ni bde ba chen po'i 'byung po bskrad paso//ma mo mkha' 'gro dang /gdon thams cad dgrol
365b6(rgyud): ba chen po dang /gzham pa dang /snying gzhan dbyung ba dang shi ba gso ba dang /tshe 'phel ba de shin tu srung ba rnams ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i lan gyiso//thams
365b7(rgyud): cad dbab pa dang /g.yo ba dang /'ching ba dang /gar byad du gzhug pa dang /glu len du gzhug pa dang /snga ma 'byung ba so sor bsten pa dang /rmad du 'byung ba dang /
366a1(rgyud): tshe 'phrul bstan pa dang /bde chen thams cad pa thams cad sgur gzhug pa dang /dgrol ba dang /srung ba dang /so su bcug pa rnams ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dbang
366a2(rgyud): paso//rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po thams cad la yid kyis 'dod pa'i pra dbab pa thams cad grub pa ni bde ba chen po rdo rje pra dbab paso//rang gi lus dang /ngag dang /yid rdo rjes
366a3(rgyud): mthong ba dang /thos pa dang /smra ba dang /ston pa'i shes pa grub pa ni bde ba chen po rdo rje'i bdag nyid bsgoms pa'o//thams cad las 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da
366a4(rgyud): ltar byung ba thams cad kyi bka' mthong ba'i yi ge sna tshogs pa 'am/dngos po sna tshogs pa thams cad kyis rna ba'i shes pa rab tu 'jug pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje thams cad mkhyen
366a5(rgyud): paso//glog dang /cher dang /thog dbab pa thams cad bzlog pa dang /sbyin gzhig pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje khro bo'i lta bso//sa'i 'og thams cad las sngar ma byung ba'i
366a6(rgyud): 'bru la sogs pa'i 'bras bu 'byung ba dang /nye bar len pa dang /chu med pa'i gnas las chu'i dngos po 'byung ba dang /nye bar len pa dang /munA pa chen por snang ba chen
366a7(rgyud): po bskyed pa dang /nye bar len pa dang /rlung thams cad la bka' bsgo ba dang /nye bar len pa dang /na mkha' thams cad las yid kyis 'dod pa'i dngos po thams cad
366b1(rgyud): mthong ba dang /nye bar len pa ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma so//thams cad gzhom pa dang /rengs pa dang /dral ba dang /rmugs pa dang /gnyid log par bya ba
366b2(rgyud): dang /rgyas gdab pa dang /ltung ba dang /rmongs po dang /bsad pa dang /phyir ldog pa ni bde ba chen po'i gdug pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgyaso//thams cad rjesu chags pa dang /dgug
366b3(rgyud): pa dang /gzhug pa dang /dbab pa dang /bcing ba dang /bkrol ba dang /dral ba dang /ltung ba dang /ltung ba bslang ba dang /'dren pa dang /bran du byed pa dang /mngag gzhug
366b4(rgyud): bka' bsgo ba byed pa dang /thams cad tshur drang ba dang /par btang ba dang /bsad pa dang /slar gso bI la sogs pa'i las thams cad byed pa drang /dbang du byed pa'i sgrub
366b5(rgyud): pa ni bde ba chen po rdo rje'i thams cad sgrub pa ni bde ba chen po rdo rje'i thams cad sgrub paso//rigs thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa'i mchog gi dngos grub thams cad dang /
366b6(rgyud): mchog gi dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i thams cad dang /phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang /thams cad rjesu chags pa la sogs pa'i bde ba dang /yid bde ba thams cad rang
366b7(rgyud): tu gzhug pa dang /mchod pa chen po thams cad la sogs pa'i las thams cad myur du grub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i mchog gi dngos grub kyi so//de la bde ba chen po rje
367a1(rgyud): rje gasnang ba'i ngamachog gi dang po'i mchog gi dam tshig gi las kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud ni 'di yin te/bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i nardo rje sems dpa' tshe ster bya'o//'di'/
367a2(rgyud): las kyi phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba'o//dbus ma'i rdo rje btung bar byas//rtse mo'i 'od zer byas nas gdong ba yongasu sbyangs te gdong par dgrol bar bya'o//bdag kun tu bskor nas snying
367a3(rgyud): khar dgrol bar bya'o//gtsug tor dang phyogs thams cad dang dkyil 'khor bskor ba'o//snying khar dang /yid kyis rgyab dang /phrag pa dang /spyi bo dang /dpral bar bzhag la
367a4(rgyud): rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis phreng ba bcings lo ga cha byas te/mdud pa byas nas rdo rje'i gnas rnamasu slar yang phreng ba byas pas rgyab tu mdud pa bye ste/dar dbyangs bya'o//snying khar dang /
367a5(rgyud): dpral ba dang /mgrin pa dang /spyi bor bzhag par bya'o//dbus ma'i ngar mchog/byab pa'i gyen du kha bltas pa'i dbugs pa dang /'jigs pa'i gdong gis bltas paso//
367a6(rgyud): 'bar ba bzhi'i tshul gyis 'dor zhing khros pa'o//rang gi snying khur bcings te zhi ba'i lta bas rtse mo 'phrog par bya'o//lta bas 'phrogs par bya'o//dbab pas myur du dgrol bar bya'o//
367a7(rgyud): yong su bskor nas dpral bar bzhag ste dbus ma'i rdo rje sar mo'i rtse mo gnyis bskyod par byas na ci lta bzhin du los byed pa'i snying khar bzhag ste/dbus ma rdo rje'i las ni 'di lta ste/
367b1(rgyud): khar stod pa dang /bskyed pa dang /bcing ba dang /gar byed du bcug pa dang /mgrin pa gsol ba dang /rtse mo btsir ba dang /kha 'bus pa dang /mgrin pa gsal ba dang /bcings
367b2(rgyud): pa myur du dkrol ba dang /srung ba dang /byab pa'i laso//snying ka kha sbyor bskyed pa'o//nyin re bzhin snga rol tu lan gcig lus ngongasu sbyang ba dang /mgrin pa gsal ba'i ngag dang /
367b3(rgyud): snying khar bzhag pa dang /phyag rgya lta ba ste/nyin re lnga rol du lan gcig dbang po thams cad la kun tu bskor bya'o//dbus ma rdo rjes byed pa ni bro bo'i rdo rje'i lta bso//dbus mardo
367b4(rgyud): rjelas ni 'ganas 'byung ste/nye bar longs spyod pa dang /thams cad la dgug par byed pa dang /dbab po sbyin pa dang /'bar ba'i me stag byed pa dang /nye bar len pa dang /
367b5(rgyud): rlung gi tshul dang /na mkha' bsgoms pa las du ma'o//dbus ma'i rdo rje'i lus ni phyag rgyas gzhom pa dang /rtse mo gnyis snying khar btsir ba dang /sen mo brud pa dang /mig
367b6(rgyud): la reg pa dang /btsum pa dang /sen mo mnyam pos snying khar bteg pa dang /ltung ba dang /glod par byed pa dang /phan tshun rdeg pa dang /rang gi snying khar rang bzhin du bzhag pa'i
367b7(rgyud): laso//dbus ma'i rdo rje las ni mda' gtod pa dang /lcags sgrog gnyis kyi dgug pa dang /g.yon pa la g.yas pa bcug pa dang /rtse mo bskyod pa dang /gdu bur bcing ba dang /
368a1(rgyud): myur du dkrol ba dang /sar sa mnyam por myur du dral ba dang /ltung ba dang /'og nas btog pa dang /gdon po g.yas byas drang ba dang /las
368a2(rgyud): thams cad la sbyar bar bye ba dang /'og nas bskyod cing gyen du drang bI dang /tshur 'dren pa dang /phar gtad pa dang /g.yon dang g.yas kyis drag por 'dag pa dang /rang gi steng khar
368a3(rgyud): rtse mo 'dren pa dang /las thams cad la nges par spong bar byed pa'i las dang /rnying khar 'khor lo gzug pa dang /dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba dang /bar dbyangs 'ching ba byed
368a4(rgyud): pa dang /snying khar las drangs te bde ba tshur 'dren pa thams cad yong su sbyang ba dang /gar gyis blangs te spyi bor dgrol ba'i las//bde ba chen po rab grub dang //chags pa tshon
368a5(rgyud): pa rnam dag phyir//don yod thogs med sna tshogs pa'i//phyag rgya'i rgyud ni rab tu bshad//rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yis//sangs rgyas sras bcas bdag nyid kun//sems can
368a6(rgyud): thams cad myur grub dang //don yod da sa grub kun stsol ba'o//dkyil 'khar dag tu mazhugs pa//sdig pa'i lus ni kun dang ldan//de dag kyang ni sgrub 'gyur te//bcings pa
368a7(rgyud): tsam gyis sdig byed phyir//gang zhig mi lo nyid kyis sem//brtson 'grus ldan pa yang tshang ba//dkyil 'khor med pa'i sems can gang //slob dpon nyid byin ma rlab dang //de dag grung
368b1(rgyud): chog da \u0f7f//rdo rje chub dpan nyid du 'gyur//don yod mchog dang sna tshogs pa/sa pa tsam gyis myur grub byung //bsam pa thams cad yongs rtogs pa'o//mchog gli dngas rgyu
368b2(rgyud): kur la 'jug/dang po'i byung ba'i rdo rje mi tshig/bde ba chel yang dge 'byung //dag cing shin tu grub pa dang //dgral ba thams cad la yang //de nas phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i gseng ba'i
368b3(rgyud): rgyud ni/las 'did thog mar drug rgya ni//sgrub bci bzhin snying pos skyebo//rang gi bdag nyid nges sbyar bya//bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal ba las/bde ba chen po'i thams
368b4(rgyud): cad kyi dmatshig don yod pa'i dngos grub kyi mchog ces bya ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i tshig rgyas pa yongasu rdzogs pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yong su mthar
368b5(rgyud): drug pa med pa'i sgra dang /gsung dang thugs rdo rje thams cad kyi las kyis sbyar ba/rdo rje 'ching dang bcas pa rnams kyis bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gasnang ba'i dam tshig rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po
368b6(rgyud): 'di sems can gyi khams ma lus pa kun khyab cing spro ba dang dngos grub thams cad kyi tshig rgyas pa srid pa thams cad kyi rtse mo'i yong su mthar mthug pa'i gsung rang yong su mthar thug pa'i don du
368b7(rgyud): rdzog ma dang rnga ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la gatshal ba btab pa yin//rdo rje rna mkha' chen pa yi//chos kyi dbyings ni sprob mchog/rdo rje rna mkha' chen po yi//chos dbyings spya ba'i dis
369a1(rgyud): grub ste//rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad ni//rdo rje 'chang chen bcas pa dang //rdo rje 'chang gi theg pa ni//yongasu mthar thug nus pa min//e ma'o mngon
369a2(rgyud): zhen sems can dang //li lo can dang las kun dang //thugs rje dam pa'i rdo rje khyod//byang chub sems ni bla na med//bde ba chen po rab sgrub dang //chags pa chen po rnam dag
369a3(rgyud): phyir//rtog pa 'di ni mthar thug pa//rab tu sgrub phyir mthar thug brjod//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gsan
369a4(rgyud): nas//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ting 'dzi ni rdo rje sems dpa' byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di gsungaso//bde ba chen po rab sgrub
369a5(rgyud): dang //chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir//thams cad dngos grub don du ni//yongasu mthar thug byin rlabs pa'o//gang gis tshul mchog 'di ni nyan 'gyur dang //gang gis
369a6(rgyud): khyim na gsang ba thams cad gnas//bde chen mchog gi rdo rje mchog gsang ba'o//dngos grub tshe 'dir de dag rnams la brtan//brtan pa nyid phyir 'dul bar rang mi byed//
369a7(rgyud): sems can don du rgyal ba las dag phyir//rnam par spang bar mdzad pa 'di yin te//rtog pa 'di ni bgegs med bdud rnams med//dngos grub 'phel med min par byin
369b1(rgyud): gyis brlabapa//bdud dang brtan med nyid ni bdag mi byed//brtan pa nyid phyir 'dul bar ngo mi byed//rtog pa chen po'i mchog 'di gang grub pa//myur du dngos grub mchog phyir bdag brtan
369b2(rgyud): 'gyur//brtan zhing rab dgyes brtan pas rje su chags//bde ba chen po byed cing shin tu rgyaso//nga yi dang po snying po gang sgrub pa//de la da ni rtag tu dngos grub ster//de nas de bzhin
369b3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad 'dus nas legaso zhes bya ba byin te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod//bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po mchog
369b4(rgyud): tu grub pa yongasu rdzogasaso////de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje 'di nyid slar yang ston por mdzad cing zhal rab tu 'dzum
369b5(rgyud): pa dang mchog dang po'i rdo rje bde ba chen po rdo rje snyems pas gsor nas rang gi thugs khar stong pa'i tshul du 'dzin cing mchog tu gsang zhing mchog tu grub pa don yod cing thogs pa med pa bde ba
369b6(rgyud): chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig 'di rtog pa thams cad kyi sdig pa dang /sgrib pa dang /bdud thams cad 'dul bar byin gyis brlabs pa'i dbang gis ma grub pa rnams kyang mchog
369b7(rgyud): dam par grub par byed pa dang /mchog tu gsang ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i mtshon cha mchog dang po zhes bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po'i chen po rgyud phyi ma gsungs pa/de nas
370a1(rgyud): thog nA'i gnas nyams dga'//namakha' kun la rab tu gnas//rin chen 'od 'byar rab tu gsal//dri ma med pa'i mdangs kyis rgyun//zur bzhi pa
370a2(rgyud): la sgo bzhi pa//sgro khyud rnams kyis rab tu rgyun//kha khyer gyis ni yongasu bskor//rdo rje lha mo tshogs kyis mchod//zla ba phyed ni rab tu gnas//rdo rje rin chen 'bar byed pa//rlung
370a3(rgyud): gis bskyed pa'i rtse mo mchog/dar 'phen dril bu sgra sgrogs pa//dra ba ma long rtag me lo//me tog rkun po'i rgyun gyis bskor//bde ba chen po rdo rje che//rdo rje kun gyis legs
370a4(rgyud): sbyar ba//rdo rje sems dpa'i bzhugs gnas che//sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes brten pa//byang chub sems dpa'i gnas kyi mchog/rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi gnas//bde ba chen
370a5(rgyud): po rdo rje che//rdo rje rin chen mchog ces bya//rdo rje 'chang chen bzhugs nas ni//bde ba chen po rnam par bzhugs//thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni//rdo rje sems dpa'
370a6(rgyud): dga' bo che//kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid//rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag gi bdag/sems can kun gyi sems gang yin//brtan pa'i phyir ni dpa' zhes bya//brtan par
370a7(rgyud): bzhag pas ting 'dzin te//nges pa la ni rdo rjer gyur//sems dpa' byin rlabs sbyor ba yis//rdo rje sems dpa' nyi du 'gyur//de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa//byang chub spyod pa'i rjes
370b1(rgyud): 'thun pa//bdud dang bdud lus rgyal ba nyid//byang chub sems rgyas de nyid//rdo rje drag po mthar byed nyid//phyag na rdo rje nyid kyang de//de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs//de nyid du//
370b2(rgyud): rigs chen po//de nyid pad+ma'i rigs dag pa//de nyid nar bu'i rigs bzang bshad//de nyid 'dod chags bral ba nyid//'dod dang grol ba de nyid ni//dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum
370b3(rgyud): ste//'jig rten gsum mchog khams gsum pa//mig yo thams cad mchog de nyid//brtun pa sra ba nor chen po//rgyu sems kyi 'dus byas pa//thams cad byed pa thams cad nyid//dang
370b4(rgyud): po'i sems dpa' sems dpa' che//byang chub sems dpa' bde bar stsol//sems dpa'i skyil krungs bcas nas ni//pad+ma'i steng du bzhugs pa dang //btsun no'i tshogs bcas sna tshogs
370b5(rgyud): bya//rdo rje lha mas yong su bskor//bad po chen po zu don du//'dod chags chen po rnams dag phyir//mA lus gdul bya'i don du ni//dngos grub thams cad ra'agrub phyir//dam tshig mchog
370b6(rgyud): nI ma lus pa//rgyal bas kyang ni bsrung bar bya//snyems bcas rdo rje gsor ba dang //rdo rje bsgoms pa'i tshul 'chang zhing //phyag rgya kun myur grub mngon du//rdo rje sems dpa' mchog grub
370b7(rgyud): phyir//dngas blob kun gyi thabs chen po//bsod nams kun gyis cher mthong ba//ye shes phyag rgya yang dag ldan//snying po chen po de ma yin gyi//gang gis bsod nams mi ldan pa//de dzizhin/
371a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ma zhugs pa//don 'od thogs pa med mchog 'gyur//dngos grub thams cad rnyed dka' min//bde bachen po rdo rje che//gsang ba mchog 'i dam
371a2(rgyud): tshig brtan//dngos po thams cad sgrub pa ster//rtag pa thams cadu myur sgrub byed//thog mtha' myed phyir dang por 'byung //mchog dang po zhes bye bar bshad//tshig kun byin
371a3(rgyud): ci 'dod pa//chags pa kun gyi ci dga' bar//rje 'u chags par bgyi'o zhes//ci bzhin 'bab pa'i ye shes 'jug/nye bya'i snying po bcas snying po//bskal pa dang po raM btsam
371a4(rgyud): ldan gsungs//hUM de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis//sangs rgyas thams cad sras bcas pa//rdo rje 'dzin bcas sna tshogs pa//skad cig gis ni 'dus par 'dus//rje
371a5(rgyud): rje 'dzin gyis thog mar ni//yud kyi 'jig rten gsum po 'byung //ci ltar 'gro brwa rab grub ces//bde gshegs rnams kyis dngos grub dris//de rnams kyis ni bka' gsan//
371a6(rgyud): nas//rdo rje 'dzin rang grol ba ni//'byin dang stsol ba ston byi bo//byed pas tshig ni 'di skad gu stsol//chags bral gyis 'dul 'jig rten rnams//chags bral nyid kyis
371a7(rgyud): dag par 'gyur//'dod chags chen po bde ba che//'di ni ci ltar 'grub par 'gyur//de yi tshig de gsan nas ni//rgyal ba rang nyid kyis gsungs pa//byang chub sems de
371b1(rgyud): thob ma'i lha//khyod ni thabs chen nyid dri no//ci srid 'khor lo'i gnasu ni//mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa cha//de srid mtshungs med sems can don//mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus//
371b2(rgyud): ci srid sems can rnam rtog pa//de sgyid byang chub srid pa che//byang chub sems can la phan phyir//rdo rje can gyis ci bder gyis//de nas thog ma dang dkyil 'khor//dang po dkyil 'khor
371b3(rgyud): byin gyis brlab//rdo rje kun gyi dam tshig mchog/ci bzhin tshogs sgrub pa nyid//de nas bcom ldan 'das de ni//bde ba chen po grub phyir dang //'dod chags chen po rnam dag phyir//
371b4(rgyud): gtso ba mgon la gsol ba btab//bcom ldan khyod la gsol ba ni//'dod chags chen po bde ba che//snying po 'di ni rtog pa mchog/bde chen myur du grub pa'o//de rnams
371b5(rgyud): kyi ni bka' gsan nas//rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen po//bde ba chen po rdo rje che//dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal to//de nas rab tu bshad bya ba//dkyil 'khor chen po dam
371b6(rgyud): pa ste//bde ba chen po rdo rje mchog/gsang ba dam pa zhes bshad//thog mar dam tshig gsum thob pa'i//rdo rje slob dpon rang phyag rgyas//'khor lo kun gyi cho ga lnga//rtag
371b7(rgyud): tu rdo rje dril 'chang bya//rtog pa thams cad yang dag 'bebs//dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub byed yin//dam tshig che gsum zhes bya ba'o//rgya 'di thams cad sgrub byed yin//dngos
372a1(rgyud): grub cho ga thams cad la//rdo rje dril bu rab brtul ba//cho ga lhag dam ma tshang yang //'grub 'gyur blad par mi bya'o//zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas/
372a2(rgyud): gdungs//mchog gi dang po mtha' yas mchog/blan med cing nanyam med pa//na mkha' kun la rab tu gnas//mchog ste yi ge dam pa yin//dkyil 'khor panas ni snang byas la//
372a3(rgyud): de yi dbusu cho ga bzhin//dngos grub byin rlabs cho ga yis//dkyil 'khor de ni grub par bya//glu dang rol mo'i cho ga dang //me tog spos sogs mchod pa yi//ci rnyed pa dong ci
372a4(rgyud): 'dod par//mchog dang byar ni brtag par bya//mchog gi dang por mtha' yas mchog/bla na med cing dpe med pa//nam mkha' kun la rab tu gnas//grong khyer dag ni mi 'gyur
372a5(rgyud): mchog/thog ma mang mchog rtag pa'i phyir//sangs rgyas 'byung ba'ang rab tu bzhugs//kun mchog mnyam pa nyid rten pas//lhag dang ma tshang med kun gang //mtha' dang
372a6(rgyud): dbus med na mkha' ni//'di ni dbu mar rnam brtag pas//phyag rgya sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin gyis//de yi dbu mar rnam brtag nyid//de yi dbusu pad+ma'i gzugs//yu bar bcas
372a7(rgyud): ba rab tu bzhag/sna tshogs pad+mas yang dag khebs//thams cad dge ba'i gdan de yin//de nas bras bu nyis 'gyur du//byas pa'i thig ni gdab bya ste//na mkha' kun gyi
372b1(rgyud): tsha yin phyir//gdul bya'i blo ni mtha' yab pas//chad ni tshad med pa yin//mi mnyam med pas zur bzhi pa//dran dang dbang po'i sgo bzhi ste//bsam gtan rnams kyi rta babs pa ni/
372b2(rgyud): ting 'dzin khyam su bshad pa yin//khyams la rten pa'i rdo rje'i bdag/gzungs rnams lha myos mchad pa'o//rgyan rnams kun gyis bkra ba ni//bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa/
372b3(rgyud): gdul bas skyod pa sna tshogs mchog/dam chos mchog ste kun tu 'gro//rlung gi spyod pa sna tshogs pa'i//ba dan rtse btags dril sgra sgrogs//me long ye shes rtag me tog/byang chub
372b4(rgyud): yan lag mo tog phreng //dra ba me long me tog che//me tog phreng ba'i rgyan gyis bskor//kun grub mi 'gyur bde ba ni//bde ba chen po zhes bshad//bde ba chen po'i gzhal yas khang//
372b5(rgyud): dang po'i gnas de bri bar bya//thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog/kun mchog de ni legs bris nas//thog ma tha ma med pa'i dbyings//phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid du bas na//phyi yidakyi
372b6(rgyud): 'khor//de yi nang gi 'khor lo ni//dkyil 'khor brgyad pa lta bu yin//'di ni rnam thar brgyad po ste//dngos grub kun gyi bde ba ste//byang sems theg pa chen po yi//mdo sde'i
372b7(rgyud): 'khor lo rab bskor bas//rdo rje thig gis yongs bskor ba//rdo rje 'khor lo yang dag bri//de ni sna tshogs pad+ma cher//rdo rje sems dpa' dgod par bya//lugs ma'am yang na brnyes pa'o/
373a1(rgyud): byas pa 'am yang na bris pa ste//'dzum bcas zla ba'i mdog can la//dmar zhing sna tshogs 'od 'bar ba//sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang sogs dang //rgyan dang na bza'
373a2(rgyud): sna tshogs pa//sems dpa'i skyil krungs dag gis bzhugs//rdo rje bsnyems tshul 'chang ba'i mchog/su ra ta sti zhes brjod cing //rang snying pos kyang bzhag par bya//de yi phyogs
373a3(rgyud): ni thams cad du//mtshon nam de bzhin phye ma yis//go rims dag ni ci bzhin du//rdo rje lha mo yang dag bri//rdo rje mchod bstod la brtson bya//rdo rje chags ma mdun du bri//lha mo rdo rje
373a4(rgyud): rol pa ni//rdo rje can la rab tu 'khyud//rgyab tu rdo rje dran ma ni//chu sran rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'o//rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma//rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bsnyems bri//de nas 'di rnams
373a5(rgyud): dgod pa'i phyag rgya ni//dza badz+ra dr-iSh+Ti sa ma ke ma Ta hUM/oM badz+ra ki li ki li hUM/baM badz+ra NAM s+pha raT/ho badz+ra kA me shwa ri s+t+wa~M/mtsham su rdo rje sems ma sogs//dus kyi mchod pa yang
373a6(rgyud): dag bri//rdo rje brang rtsi mA dang sbyin//ston dang dgun ni rdo rje ma//me tog bdug pu mar me che//d+hid spyi bor thal sbyar ba//rdo rje rgyal po'i lha mo ste//de nas phyag rgya rab bshad bya//
373a7(rgyud): me d+hu badz+ra g+hu g+h+raM/oM badz+ra ma~M g+haM gu luM gu lu/oM sha rang badz+rI/oM aM a~M badz+ra sha Shi hU~M hUM/sgeg mo bzhang ma glu chen mo//gar mdzad pa yi lha mo'i tshogs//rdo rje ril mo
373b1(rgyud): /'di dag ni//phyi rol gyi ni mtsham su bya//he ra ti badz+ra me g+ha bi la se ni tra tra/he ra ti badz+ra nr-i t+ye be ba pe ba//sgo yi gnas ni thams cad du//gsol ka ba ni bzhi po ste//rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa
373b2(rgyud): dang //lcags sgrog de bzhin dril bu ma'o//badz+ra aM ku sha dzaHbadz+ra pA she hUM/badz+ra shr-i ga le baM/badz+ra g+haN+De ho//dam tshig mchog ni thams cad kyi//dgongs shing brtag pa nyid du 'gyur/
373b3(rgyud): rdo rje lha mo la sogs pa//dngos grub kun la 'byung bar 'gyur//gsol ka ba ni g.yog mo yi//gtso mo dang /pho nya dang /bran mo dang /de nas sku mchog la sogs pa//mngon bris yang
373b4(rgyud): dag bsgrub par bya//dam tshig mchog ni bcings na su//dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes brjod bya/sems dpa' skyil krungs bcas nas ni//rdo rje can gyi spyan sngar 'dug/bde ba chen po rdo rje mchog/
373b5(rgyud): bdag po lan gcig yang dag dgug/hUM ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa/ya hi shI bAM na mau pa hA su kha badz+ra ya mau g+hA ya/a nu ba la ya/pra bud+d+ha su ro ta traM a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/su to Sh+yo me b+ha wa/
373b6(rgyud): su to Sh+yo me b+ha wa/b+ha ga bAM na na dI na sa sa twaM/sarba sid+d+ham+me pra yats+tsha/a shaM ta ma tri Sha A be sha ya sa ma ye ra bad+d+ha/ba shI ka ro me/yi mer mu drA pA daMHdzaHhUM baM ho//'di yis/
373b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rtag par//dkyil 'khor du ni rang nyid gshegs//bkug cing bcug la shin tu brtan//dbang du gyur nas rab tu thub ces bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po gsung ngo //
374a1(rgyud): du rlob dpon dadu lta ni//'ad bar kun tu ston lta sogs//mtshan ma rnam pa nang pa ni//ngo mtshar gyur pa mdzod par 'gyur//de nas rje mchod don ni//rdo
374a2(rgyud): thal mo kha dbye dbul//bum pa yang dag ci snyed pa'i//ma teb sogs kyis yang dag mchod//ba dan rtse mor dril btagaswA pa//mtshams kyis char ni bzhag par bya//bum pa spos
374a3(rgyud): chus gang ba la//de nas rdo rje mchod yon ni//lcags ma la ni yongasu bzlas//de la bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi chur sgrub pa ni 'di yin te/hUM ma hA su kha badz+ra a mo
374a4(rgyud): prA sa ma yod sadang a b+hi Shany+tsa/sarba su kha sau man s+yAn+na da ku ru ku ru/\u0f7fhUM baM ho//'di lani nyi shu rtsa gcig yongasu bzlas la bdag nyid la rdo rje dbang bskur bya'o//gsang /
374a5(rgyud): gtor bya ba dang /'thungs pas kyang sdug bsngal thams cad bsal ba dang /bde ba thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur ro//zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung so//de nas
374a6(rgyud): 'khor lor ma zhugs kyang //rang nyid thog mar byung zhugs shing //rdo rje kun gyi slob dpon che//rdo rje can gyis rang byin rlob//de nas rdo rje 'dzin slob dpon//rang nyid khrus byas dris
374a7(rgyud): legs byugs//ci rnyed pa yi rgyan gyis brgyan//shin tu dmar ba'i gos sgos zhing //me tog phreng btags kha dris sgo//rnam sgeg dga' ba'i rdo rje dang //rdo rje gar gyi sbyar ba yis//spyi
374b1(rgyud): bor me tog thal sbyar nas//gnas de mgon la phyag bya'o//zhugs nas dkyil 'khor de la ni//bskor ba dag ni lan gsum bya//de nas mdun du 'dug nas ni//de kho na nyid lan gcig pad/
374b2(rgyud): 'dod chags chen po bde ba che//rdo rje chen po nor che //ye shes chen po las chen po//de dag rdo rje sems grub brjod//de nas me tog sil mno//mgon la gtor te tshig bzhin//dang po
374b3(rgyud): Sha Da ba la sogs//bstod pa'i glu ru lan cig blang //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstod pa'i rgyal po mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad po de kho na nyid chen po ni 'di yin te/dpal mchog dang po sems
374b4(rgyud): dpa' che//dga' ba chen po'i dge' ba che//kun tu bzang po'i kun bdag nyid//rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag/sems dang sems dpa'i ting 'dzin mchog/rdo rje rdo rje mchog chen
374b5(rgyud): po//kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mchog/bdud dang bdud ni rab 'joms pa//thams cad du ni byang chub che//sangs rgyas sangs rgyas skyes mchog skyes//rdo rje hUM mdzad yi ge hUM//'jig rten
374b6(rgyud): dbang phyug nor rab gsal//'dod chags chen po bde ba nyid//'dod dang thar pa nor che ba//dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum pa//'jig rten gsum mchog khams gsum pa//brtan
374b7(rgyud): par rang byung gsal ba ste//rab phra sbom dang legs bsags pa//rgyu ba rab mchog thob mdzad pa//srid pa 'khor bar sbyong mdzad pa//thog mtha' med cing thog mtha' can//mdangs
375a1(rgyud): thun dang po rnams cad gnas//snying po phyug tu sbyor ngam smyig/de nyid bden du ma zlog pa ste//de bzhin gshegs pa'i drungs grub na//nas dadu chu/
375a2(rgyud): khams chen po//dam pa'i chos ste las mchog bdag/byang chub sems ni rab spyong mdzad//rdo rje khro bo khro bo che//dus mtha' ltar 'bar 'dul ba bo//'dul mdzad chen po gdug
375a3(rgyud): pa'i mchog/drag po drug nyid zad mdzad pa//thams cad dag pa pad+ma che//shes rab thangs te tshul chen po//'dod chags dag pa ting 'dzin mchog/sna tshogs can
375a4(rgyud): pa dbang phyug //namakha' mtha' yas brtab pa'i don//'byung ba thams cad gnas chen po//'byong ba pani thams cad gnas//'byor du dngal dang gi tsa ba rgyal//
375a5(rgyud): pa thams cid rdzogs mdzad pa//phyag 'tshal khyod la phyag 'tsha'o//phyag 'tshal 'dud cing phyag 'tshalo//dad pas byed la bdag rten bgyid//rdo rje sems dang bdag chu bamadzad/
375a6(rgyud): gang zhigra bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di//nyin de nang bar brjod byed dam//chos kyi tshig gis lan gcig brjod//dngos grubo shin tu myur bar 'gyur//gral te 'dir grub mi 'di na//dang
375a7(rgyud): por nyin dus gsum du//bad+mod na sdig pa las nges grol//zhing dag pa ni grub par byed//rtag tu sdug bsngal thams cad sel//lan gcig rab tu brjod pa yis//dngos
375b1(rgyud): grub thams cad skal bzang byed//phun sum tshogs dpal 'grel bar byed//kun grub don yod yon tan can//mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa'o//de nas gsang ba'i mchod pas ni//
375b2(rgyud): rab tu dga' bas dgon lo mchod//rang gi phyag rgya len gcig ni//rang gi phyag rgyas bcings te grub//de nas lha yi chu dang ni//de bzhin sku mchog gis dbang bskur//rang gi
375b3(rgyud): snying po rdo rje phyag/snying po 'di ni brang bar bya//de la rdo rje sems dpar dbang bskur ba'i snying po 'di yin te/hUM ma hA su kha badz+ra satwA oM b+hi She kaM nadz+dziHa d+hi Shiny+tsA mi/sarba
375b4(rgyud): badz+ra a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba mi d+ha nA ma ma staM b+ha ga bA na/ma hA badz+ra d+ha rA su ra s+t+waM/ma hA badz+ra satwa/oM b+hu ts+tsha ba swa/de nas rdo rje dbang bskur baM//phyag na rdo rje mi 'dzin pa/
375b5(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin chen slob dpon du//'di nyid du ni rab grub 'gyur//de nas kyang ni tse 'dod par//cho ga'i dam pa bsgrubs nas ni//rdo rje gar gyis mchod pa yis//legs par
375b6(rgyud): mchod la phyir phyung bya//de nas brtsams te rdo rje'i bdag/rdo rje kun+da gyis gsang rab 'dzin//rdo rje thams cad 'dzin slob dpon//dngos grub thams cad grub par 'gyur//
375b7(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub cha//phyag rgya kun bdag dbang phyu//d+hiHthams cad mkhyen pa'i rdo rje che//las rnams thams cad nus la brtag/mi tshugs pa dang mi
376a1(rgyud): dag/ myed sa m+b+ha ldan s+yA b+h+ya // smya ga na na rnas ///rgyu ts+tshad pa dang ///das sma du n+d+ha
376a2(rgyud): kun mchog/kun rig pa dang kun mo byed //'dod pa thams cad la rab sbyor//phyin tshogs kun gyi dbang phyug che//b+ha la sogs pa'i sems can kun//skye ba thams cang
376a3(rgyud): byed//rdo rje sems dpa' rtag tu mthong //tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur//de nyid kyis ni 'dod par dzin//dga' zhing rang nyid de bdag por//de rjes pa dpon 'gyur badzi/
376a4(rgyud): bas ldan 'das das skye papa gsung sa//bde bachen bdu pan byin gyis rnab cing 'jug tshig rgyas pa'i rgyud// pasu 'jug pa 'i dag rgyas pa
376a5(rgyud): rgyud rtsu ba shed par bya'o//bcoMs dz+nyAn 'dis pa rgyas dngas gsungad yin snying bar 'gyur//ts+tsha smanas pa sa banapa hU~M nga
376a6(rgyud): khyis ste//dbyig ba rnams snang / byed TIs/dngu khor du ni blag sa lnga// la n+ta kA sum b+h+yas nasan//'dudu stan ra/
376a7(rgyud): ring //rims su rgya ma sa//ba ba chen po 'a nas nga// zhin dun 'gyur ba//rjeg ba'i slobs
376b1(rgyud): brgyan nas ni//rdo rje slob dben gyis rab gzhug/slob ma'i tshogs rnams bcug nas ni//ci 'dod pa po dngos grub thob//de nas slob ma bcug nas ni//dga' chen po 'di brdad
376b2(rgyud): par bya//rab dgyi po rab bde bstan pa yi//rdo rje sems bdag 'od grub mdzod//de nas me tog phreng ba ni//spyi bo nas ni myur du dor//gang du mye tog babs gyur te//lhag pa'i
376b3(rgyud): wA de rab grub 'gyur//de na paM lha yis chu yisan//rdo rje 'dzin pa rang dbang bskur//rdo rje chetsA bo rdo rje rje//byin la rdo rje bad+h+waM brjod//oM ma hA mu kha badz+rI/bad+d+ha oM b+h+ya/
376b4(rgyud): niSh+Tha/ya b+h+ya D+hom/ma hA badz+ra d+hA ra/ha badz+rA nA ma sa~Md+d+ha nA maHgang la rdo rje ming ging shig yin pa de la kyi zhes bya ba'i sgra dang myur bar bya'o//de nas skying de byin la/
376b5(rgyud): phyag rgya ba cing bya rlabs nas tsa m+b+hir mngon par 'dod pa grub par bya'o//rdo rje sems dpa'i tshig 'am//gang 'dud rang gis grub pa la//de nyid kyis ni dam tshig nyid//'dug
376b6(rgyud): la sogs pa'i cho ga bshad//'jig rten pa ni sna tshogs dang //de bzhin 'jig rten 'das pa yang //thams cad rang gi ngo bo ni//rgyas par bsgrubs nA rab tu grub//'di la rab
376b7(rgyud): 'jug ces kyis//mi tshugs pa dang ma ldog gi//nyid du rgyal ba'i sras 'gyur zhing //bde chen rab tu grub pa ster//de nas rdo rje 'dzin slob dpan//mina' ni mang du d+hA/
377a1(rgyud): /nas kyang //de nyid chos dang dam tshig ni//rang nyid dang ni gzhan gyis bslab//de la 'di ni mnu' grub pa'i//rdo rje chus dbang bskur nas brjod par bya'o//
377a2(rgyud): 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu//dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed//dam tshig bsrungs na 'grub par 'gyur//dngos grub rdo rje 'dud rtsi chu//de nyid chos dang dam tshig ni//gal te dkyil
377a3(rgyud): 'khor ma mthong smra//skye bo 'dug na gnas pa 'am//dad pa med pas bgad par 'gyur//de la 'di ni de kho na nyid dang dam tshig gi gsang ba'i tshe ga rab tu sbyin pa yin te/thog mtha'
377a4(rgyud): med pa'i sems dpa' ni//rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che//kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid//rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag/de kho na nyid mchog gi gsang ba'i lnga'i de kho na
377a5(rgyud): nyid chen por bshad par brjod par bya'o//bcom ldan de nyid chos kyi mchog bka' stsal par mdzad//srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag/ngo bo nyid kyi srid bral byas//rang bzhin dag
377a6(rgyud): pa'i sems dpa' mchog/sred pa mchog ni byed pa yin//de la srid pa rnams par dag pa'i thabs rtogs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchog dam tshig chen po bsten par bya ba ni
377a7(rgyud): 'di yin te/srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung //sdug bsngal chen po dag bya'i phyir//shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs//dam tshig rtag tu ston par bya//'dod pa'i longs spyod thams/
377b1(rgyud): cad no//ci 'dod par ni rton bzhin du//rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas//bdag dang bzhin la mchod par bya//de la rtog pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i mchog gi dam tshig chen pa'ang
377b2(rgyud): brjod par bya ste/ci srid 'khor ba'i gan su ni//mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe//de srid mtshungs med sems can don//mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus//gsang ba
377b3(rgyud): mchog gi dam tshig thabs//bsod nams byin rlabs sgrub byed pa//dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug mchog/rgyun tu sems can don byed pa'o//de ltar sems ni rab dang rdo rje nyid
377b4(rgyud): du phyis//rang gi dam tshig mi bzad bde skyed bstan par gyis//de ni 'gro la myur du bde ba sangs rgyas thams cad dang //rab tu mtshungs shing rtag pa nyid du rtogs par 'gyur//
377b5(rgyud): de nas khyed kyis bcud dang kha zas dang /gnas pa dang /glu dang rol mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams lpags par stobs pas bdag nyid gang la sred pas kyang rdo rje slob dpon
377b6(rgyud): chen po mched par bya'o//rdo rje slob dpon me tag sogs//ci 'dod par ni legs mchod cing //rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa yis//yang dag par ni mchod de byung //de nas rdo rje 'dzin
377b7(rgyud): slob dpon//gar gyis mchod pas mchod nas ni//rdo rje thal mo sbyor ba yis//slob ma kun gyis rab tu mchod//ro dang kha zas gnas pa dang //glu dang rol ma ci 'dod pas//rdo rje
378a1(rgyud): sems dpa' de bzhin bdag/yang dag mchod nas phyir byung bya//dpal mchog dang po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog tu gsang ba'o//de nas sgrub pa
378a2(rgyud): bshad bya ba//dngos grub shin tu rtag pa ste//gang gi srid pa 'di nyid la//dngos grub rtag pa thob byed pa'o//'di yis byang chub sems dpa' ni//srid par gnas shing smad par
378a3(rgyud): sangs//dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug grub//rtag tu sems can kun don byed//mi yis ci ltar mchog grub pa//de ltar byang chub spyod sogs pas//dge ba'i tshul gyis
378a4(rgyud): gzhan gyis kyang //sangs rgyas kun sogs thob mi 'gyur//gdul bya min pa bsod nams med//sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa ni//rnam pa kun tu mthong sogs kyis//sems can
378a5(rgyud): don byed mi nus//de bas rgyud chen las grub pa//sangs rgyas sam ni rdo rje 'dzin//mthong la sogs pas sems can dron//nam mkha' mnyam par byed pa yi//'dod chags
378a6(rgyud): chen po bde ba che//srid pa'i nges pa dri ma med//nam mkha' mtha' yas sems can don//mya ngan mi 'da' byed pa yin//dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs po//bsod nams med pa
378a7(rgyud): 'am le lo can//de yang kun mchog grub pa yi//tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa rdo rje sems dpas gsung so//de nas don yod pa thogs
378b1(rgyud): ba med pa myur du sgrub pa'i mchog rje su bshad par bya'o//zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung so//lugs ma 'am ni brkos pa 'am/byas pa 'am ni bris pa yi//dang
378b2(rgyud): ba'i sems dpo'i rtags nas ni//mdun du de ni bsgrub par bya//nyin re zhing ni dang po ru//de bzhin yul dang ldan gyur pas//dang po'i gsang mchog gis bkug ste//phyag rgya chen
378b3(rgyud): por rab byin rlab//rdo rje mig gis de bzhin bltas//rdo rje snyoms tshul bdag po rang //rdo rje hUM ni glur blangs pa ste//rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub par bya//der rjes cha lugs ci bzhin du/
378b4(rgyud): mchog gi dang por rab dgyes pas//gzugs brnyan la sogs drang por ni//ci 'dod par ni rab tu sgrub//'di yis 'dod pa kun dbang phyuH//'dod pa tsam gyi 'gro 'ong lding //dngos
378b5(rgyud): grub kun gyi dbang phyug grub//kun mchog dang po'i dbang phyug yin//phun tshogs kun bdug thams cad pa//'dod chags chen po bde ba che//thams cad kun mdzad sna tshogs pa//rtag/
378b6(rgyud): par kun tu 'dul ba ba//dngos grub kun gyi bde ba mchog/phyag rgya kun bdag dbang phyug yin//rdo rje kun gyi dngos grub che//thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'byung gnas che//mi tshugs pa
378b7(rgyud): dang mi sod pa//thams cad byed cing kun gyi gnas//khams gsum lnga rgyal sna tshogs pa//tshar gcod pa dang phan 'dogs pa//kun la rjes chags kun gyi mchog/kun rig dngos
379a1(rgyud): /grub thams cad ste//rang gi rnam 'phrul rab ston byed//kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste//dbang phyun chen dros dbang phyug che//gzugs drang tshe stobs rdo rje
379a2(rgyud): mchog/rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa bzhin//'gri bdu thos kyis mchod cing rjod//rang gi gnyen rnams kyi mi rten pa//rgyal po rdo rje 'ching tshon ltar//rka nga 'chi ba med par 'gyur//
379a3(rgyud): gal te rdo rje sems dpa' 'am//sangs rgyas byang chub sems nyid 'dod//dngos grub ji ltar 'dod pa nyid//tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur//phyi ma 'am ni 'jig rten pa 'am//
379a4(rgyud): rtog pa kun bshad cho ga'am//rang nyid kyis mdzad kyis rtag tu//dngos grub thams cad grub 'gyur zhes//bcom ldan rdo rje dngos grub kyis//dbang phyug bde ba chen po ni/
379a5(rgyud): rdo rje 'chang ba chen rgyal po//kun mchog sa yi dbang pos gsungs//de la ci ltar na rang gi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud yin zhe na//phyag rgya chen po mnyam gzhag la//rang gi snying
379a6(rgyud): blo lan gcig sgrub//dr-i D+ha su toSh+Tha san rak+ta/su po sid+d+hi tA la gu/de la ci ltar yi ge hU~M/glu blang ba'i rgyud yin zhe na//ri d+hau ta sogs kyis rgyan ldan//ci nub pa dang
379a7(rgyud): ci dga' dang //gaN+DI la sogs glu blangs pa'i//yi ge hUM gis 'grub par 'gyur//de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi//mchog de sgrub pa'i rgyud bshod//gal te phyag rgya sgrub
379b1(rgyud): 'don//de bzhin dul dang lngar gyur pas//rang nyid ni nIH bstings la//yang du ni b+h+yo'i dUr du b+hug//dal tsa ltar na dam tshig thams cad grub pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/dam ba d+hang
379b2(rgyud): rgyu bcung nas ni//sa ma ya ste zhes brjod la//rang gi snying khar rim bzhin du//phyag rgya'i mchog de bsgrub par bya//de nas las kyi phyag rgya yi//mchog sgrub pa 'di rgyud du ni//rdo rje
379b3(rgyud): gor gyis mchod pa yis//yongasu mi skyo bas bsgrubs ni//mchod pa kun sogs las rnams ni//tshe 'di nyid lo grub par 'gyur//rdo rje 'chang chen nyid dang ni//sangs rgyas byang chub
379b4(rgyud): sems nyid dang //gzhan yang dngos grub thams cad ni//dam par myur du 'grub par 'gyur//rtag pa thams cad sgrub pa chen po don yod par grub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud //donas
379b5(rgyud): rtog pa thams cad sgrub pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud ni nyin re zhing dang por lan cig phyag rgya sgrub pa don yod pa dngos grub thogs pa med pa bshad par bya'o//zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis
379b6(rgyud): gsung so//thams cad rje su mnyes par bya ba dang //dgug pa dang /bcing ba dang /dbang du bya ba sgrub pa la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje lta bas//badre ba dang /yid bde ba dang /phun
379b7(rgyud): sum tshogs pa dang /dngos grub thams cad mngon par 'phel bar bya ba la ni bde ba chen po rdo rjes//tshe dang /lang tsho dang /gzugs dang /gzi brjid chen po mngon par 'phel bar
380a1(rgyud): bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje bcud kyis len gyi po//dpal chen po dang /skal pa bzang po dang /grags pa dang snyan pa 'phel bar bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje grub paso//
380a2(rgyud): stobs chen po drang /ye shes dang chos dang las bsgrub par bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje snying stobs che ba so//rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul dang rmad du byung ba dang /rnam par 'phrul pa thams/
380a3(rgyud): cad ston pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje'i rnam par 'phrul pas so//thams cad du yi ge dang /gzugs kyis bden pa thams cad mthong po dang /thos pa dang /smra ba dang /'dri ba grub par
380a4(rgyud): bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje don yod par bden paso//dbang po thams cad kyis bden pa thams cad mthong ba dang /thos pa dang /smra ba dang /zil gyi se gnon par bya ba ni dang
380a5(rgyud): bopo'i rdo rje don yod pa'i bden pa so//sgyu ma thams cad dang /bde ba'i mchog dang /lung bsgo ba drang /lan thob pa grub pa la dang po'i rdo rje rmad du byung ba so//gtor thams
380a6(rgyud): cad dbyung ba dang /nor dbrog pa dang /rgyal sring thob pa dang /sa la nye bar longs spyod pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje dbang poskur bso//yul thams cad dang /skye bo dang /grong
380a7(rgyud): khyer dang /nags dang /chu bor nye bar longs spyod sprul pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje grub paso//thams cad las mngon ma byung ba'i lha yul dang /rin po che dang /kha zas dang /bcu
380b1(rgyud): ba dang /gtsug 'khor shin tu bzang po la sogs pa yul de nyo bar long spyod pa lan dang po'i rdo rje sprul pas//skad cig gis sa gzhi thams cad 'bru la sogs pa smin par spyad
380b2(rgyud): pa dang /chu'i phung ba chen po'i byung ba dang /snang ba chen pa bsgreng bu dang /rlung thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni dang ze'i rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug gis//rgyu dang mi r+g+haM ba'i da
380b3(rgyud): po thams cad bza' ba dang /btung ba dang /rang cer gzhug pa rang las thams cad la sbyar ba la~M ni/dang po'i rdo rje do na yod pa'i thams cad dbang du byed paso//dngos grub thams
380b4(rgyud): cad las de bzhin gshegs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i dang /rdo rje 'dzin pa dang /rdo rje la sogs mthong ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje snyems pas//rang gi bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'al
380b5(rgyud): sogs pa'i gzugs thams cad sprul cing stan pa mi snang ba dang /na mkhar 'gro ba grub pa dang /shin tu phra ba dang /sbom pa dang /du mar ston pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje gzugs sgra
380b6(rgyud): chags pas//'jig rten gsum gyi bdag por gyur pa thams cad dbab pa dang /dbang du bya ba dang /las thams cad la sbyar ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis//lha thams cad
380b7(rgyud): dbab pa dang /bcing ba dang /dbang du bya ba dang /las thams cad la nges par myur ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje lha'i bdag paso//klu thams cad dngon pa dang /'dul ba dang /dbang du bya
381a1(rgyud): pa dang /las thams cad la nges par sbyar ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje 'bar ba'i rjeso//gnod sbyin la sogs pa thams cad dbug pa dang /dbang du bya ba dang /las tham/
381a2(rgyud): cad la nges par sbyar bar bya ba dang /skrag par bya ba la ni dang po'i rdo rje gdon 'dul bso//dkyil 'kho thams cad brtag pa dang /'jug pa dang /mchod pa dang /sgrub pa dang /las
381a3(rgyud): thams cad la nges par sbyar bar bya bA la ni dang po'i rdo rje 'khor lo po//phyag rgya thams cad dgug pa dang /bcing ba dang /dbang du bya ba dang /brtan par bya ba sgrub pa la ni dang po'i
381a4(rgyud): rdo rje phyag rgyas grub pas so//dam tshig thams cad dgug pa dang /gzhug pa dang /bcing ba dang /sgrub pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje dam tshig gis//las thams cad rab tu sgrub
381a5(rgyud): ba lo rnam pa mi 'jigs par bya ba dang /bstan par bya ba dang /grags pa chen po rab tu bsgrags pa lo ni dang po'i rdo rje las kyiso//rdo rje thams cad dgug pa dang /ga zhug
381a6(rgyud): pa dang /bcing ba dang /dbang du bya ba sgrub pa lo ni dang po'i rdo rje so//sems dpa' chen po thams cad dgug pa dang /gzhug pa dang /bcing ba dang /dbang du
381a7(rgyud): bya ba sgrub pa la ni dang po'i rdo rje sems dpe so//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgug pa dang /gzhug pa dang /bcing ba dang /dbang du bya ba sgrub pa la ni dang
381b1(rgyud): po'i de bzhin gshegs paso//rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dgug pa dang /gzhug pa dang /bcings pa dang /dbang du bya ba la ni dang po'o rdo rje 'dzin pa so zhes kyang gsungaso//dkyil 'khor
381b2(rgyud): dag tu ma zhugs pa'am/sdig pa thams cad byas pa 'am/rang gi snying po ma bsgrubs pa'ang /dngos grub thams cad grub par 'gyur//ma bsgrubs pa thams cad 'grub pa/
381b3(rgyud): don yod par grub pa phyag rgya mchog tu grub pa'o//de nas dang po'i snying po ma bsgru bas pa'i thams cad don yod pa thogs pa med pa las thams cad kyi rgyu skad cig sgrub pa rjes su
381b4(rgyud): bshad par bya'o//zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i phrin las rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsung so//don yod pa thogs pa med pa/bdag kyang bde gshegs
381b5(rgyud): lhan cig tu//las kyi rab 'byams 'di dag ni//dngos grub skad cig gis sgrub byed//'di lta ste/thams cad shin tu srung ba dang /yongasu bskyang ba dang /zhi ba dang /bde
381b6(rgyud): lagasu bya ba dang /tshe 'phel bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi sems dpa'i tshul gtsug tor gyi phyag rgyaso//dkyil 'khor thams cad mtshams dang phyogs dang /dam tshig dang /dngos
381b7(rgyud): grub bcing zhing srung ba ni rdo rje gar gyi so sor 'brang ba chen poso//nyin gsum pa dang /nyin bzhi pa dang /slar bzlos pa dang /rtag pa can pa dang /khyab 'jug gi rigs thams
382a1(rgyud): cad gsal ba la ni rdo rje gar gyis nad med paso//gdung bya thams cad dang /gnod byed dang /nod dang /mya ngan dang /sdug bsngal thams cad gzhig
382a2(rgyud): ba la ni rdo rje gur gyis sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ba'o//dug dang sbyar ba'i duk+ka laM sogs nye bar thar pa dang /dbab pa dang /bcing ba dang /bza' ba dang /bdud rtsir byu la
382a3(rgyud): ni rdo rje gar gyi nye ba'i dug giso//gdon thams cad dngab pa dong /bcing ba dang /dam tshig 'dzin du gzhug pa dang /rab tu gdul ba dang /srung ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi gdon
382a4(rgyud): las thar pa'o//thams cad la bcing ba dang /thar pa dang /dral ba dang /ltung ba dang /ldang ba la ni rdo rje grwar gyi rdo rje chen po'i khro boso//mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi phyag
382a5(rgyud): /rgya gzhig pa dang /gdon las thar par bya ba dang /shi ba bslang ba dang /tshe mngon par 'phel ba dang /shin tu srung ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya'i lan gyiso//sgrib pa thams
382a6(rgyud): cad dang /sdig pa thams cad dang /rmi lam ngan pa dang /bltas ngan pa dang /byur gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi zho ba so//thams cad dang bri ba dang /bskyod pa dang /gar
382a7(rgyud): byed du gzhug pa dang /thams cad bden par slar gzhug pa dang /pra sen thams cad sgrub pa la ni rdo rje gar gyis thams cad 'bebs pa'i phyag rgyaso//thams cad rgyas
382b1(rgyud): dab pa dang /bsad pa dang /ltung bar bya ba dang /bsrang ba dang /slar gso ba la ni don yod grub pa'i rdo rje gar gyis mkha' 'gro mtshon moso//thams nad rengs par bya ba dang /
382b2(rgyud): rmongs par bya ba dang /gnyid log par bya ba dang /bsad pa dang /bza' bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gari gyi gdug pa'i srin poso//gzhan gyi dpung thams cad skrag par bya ba dang /gzhig/
382b3(rgyud): par bya ba dang /dbang du bya ba dang /ltung bar bya ba dang /bsad par bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi gshed byed kyiso//khro bo thams cad bsal ba dang /bzhin ras dang bar bya ba dang /bcod
382b4(rgyud): pa las rgyal ba dang /'jigs pa las thar pa dang /g.yul 'gyed pa la sogs pa'i rgyal ba sgrub pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi rgyal mtshan mchog gi dpung rgyan gyis//sprin thams cad
382b5(rgyud): yang dag par bzung zhing mi g.yo bar bya ba dang /char chen po dbab pa dang /rlung dang /char dang /klog dang /ser ba bzlog pa dang /dro ba dang /grang ba gsal ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi
382b6(rgyud): dbang po'i rdo rjeso//gzugs dang /sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg bya thams cad shin tu grub pa la ni rdo rje gAr gyi 'dod pa'i dbang phyug giso//rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba thams cad rje su chags
382b7(rgyud): pa dang /dgug pa dang /dbang du bya ba dang /rtse ba dang /las thams cad la nges par sbyar ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi dngos grub thams cad kyiso//lha thams cad dbab pa dang /klu thams cad
383a1(rgyud): /dbang du bya ba dang /gnod sbyin dang /'byung po dang /ma mo thams cad las la nges par sbyar ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi rdo rje glu'i mchog giso//rnam thos sras
383a2(rgyud): mnan nas dpal drang ba dang //lha'i bu mo thams cad rab tu dbrog pa dang /lha dang lha ma yin gyi bud med thams cad rtse ba dang /'jig rten gsum ma lus pa las rgyal ba dang /
383a3(rgyud): 'dod pa'i dbang phyug thams cad las rgyal ba dang /dbang phyug chen po thams cad dbrog pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi skyes bu byed pa chen po so//mchod pa thams cad sgrub po dang /
383a4(rgyud): thams cad rdo rjer bya ba dang /bdud la sogs pa thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang /phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba dang /dngos grub kyi mchog la sogs pa ma lus shing lus
383a5(rgyud): pa med pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi myur du grub par bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi don yod cing thogs pa med pa myur ba'i las sna tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi so//de nas phyag rgya tham
383a6(rgyud): cad sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud//nyin re dang po lan gcig ni//phyag rgyas thams cad rab sgrub byed//snying mchog len gcig bzlas nas ni//phyag rgya chen po rab
383a7(rgyud): sgrub bya//de yis rjes nye snying po//las rnams kun la dris sbyar bas//don yod grub pas las rnams ni//kun la shin tu grub par 'gyur//phyag rgya thams cad rab byin
383b1(rgyud): rlog/phyug na rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni//dkyil 'khor dag kyang mthong bra la//ma bshad pa la'ang rab grub 'gyur//rtog 'di 'jig pa yod min to//'khor lo med la brgya byin la//
383b2(rgyud): gang phyir bdag la byin rlob pas//rang sras rgyu ni 'gyur ba yin//sdig pa chen po byed pa la'ang //bsam pa shes nas sbyin par bya//'di dag bcings tsam nyid dag byed//dngos
383b3(rgyud): grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//dpal mtshig dang po'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po bde ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi cho ga rgyas pa'i rtog pa'o//de nas ston pa rdo rje
383b4(rgyud): 'dzin//'byin pa byed pa bde ba che//bde chen can du bstan phyir dang //sems can thams cad rnam dag phyir//khams kun dang mnyam zad pa med//kun gyi bdag nyid la zhugs te///
383b5(rgyud): mnyam pa'i dngos grub mchog spros nas//de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs byang //mtha' yas pa yi zhing thams cad//'jig rten kun gyi khams bcas pas//de tshe sangs rgyas
383b6(rgyud): thams cad kyis//til gyi gang bu bzhin myur gang //'jig rten khams ni thams cad du//sems can kun mdun yang dag bzhugs//sems can thams cad ma dag pas///
383b7(rgyud): rang rig las kyis dag ma gyur//de tshe sems can khams rnams ni//rang bzhin gyis ni gso dka' phyir//rang gi las ni sbyangs don du//btang snyoms chen po mdzad pa yin//
384a1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can//sems dpe' chen po bde ba che//byang chub chen por thugs brtan pas//skad cig gis ni yang dag bskul//san+na
384a2(rgyud): can la phan bsod nams tshogs//byang chub sems ni brtan pa dag/sems can khams ni rgud 'gyur bas//shin tu btang snyoms ma mdzad cig/de nas sangs rgyas
384a3(rgyud): gis gsungs pa//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can//thugs rje'i bdag nyid can gyi thabs//byang chub sems mchog khyod smros shig/de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin//de tsha
384a4(rgyud): kun nas byin gyis brlabs//bde ba chen po rdo rje che//dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa yin//khams gsum 'khor ba'i rgya khyon gyi//'khor lo chen po gdod nas byung //
384a5(rgyud): de yis khoms gsum gnas pa yis//sems can thams cad yang dag bsgrubs//sangs rgyas kun sogs dngos grub la//de tshe dag pa 'grub par 'gyur//de nas sangs
384a6(rgyud): rgyas thams cad la//'dus nas gsol ba 'debs mdzad pa//de bzhin gshegs pa'i rin po che//sangs rgyas kun mchog bshad du gsol//de nas sangs rgyas thams cad
384a7(rgyud): kyis//sku gsung thugs la yang dag gnas//sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje la//yang dag spros te 'di gsungs//oM b+h+rU~M khaM/de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis//sangs rgyas thams
384b1(rgyud): cad 'dus nas ni//bdud bcom la sogs mdzad nas ni//byang chub snying por byin gyis brlabs//de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin//dkyil 'khor gyi ni mchog gsungs pa//sems
384b2(rgyud): can la ni bde don phyir//rtag pa kun gyi bde ba che//de nas yong dag bshad bya ba//dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste//dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi rol mchog/rdo rje 'khor lo yang
384b3(rgyud): dag bri//'khor lo lte bar sangs rgyas nyid//'dzum pa'i tshems ni mi snang ba//su ra ta sa ma ya s+t+waM/oM sid+d+h+ya mAM zhes brjod dgod//mdun du bdud las rnam par rgyal//mdzad pa'i
384b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas yang dag bri//g.yasu byang chub sems dpa' yi//nor chen pos ni dbang bskur ba//rgyab du byang chub sems dpa' dang //mnyam du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor//g.yon
384b5(rgyud): du log par rnam dregs pa//sdig pa bsdus pa 'byin pa'o//de nas 'di rnams kyi snying po ni//badz+ra satwa/badz+ra rat+na/badz+ra d+harma/badz+ra karma/de nas phyag rgya rnams te/satwa badz+ra/
384b6(rgyud): badz+ra rat+na/badz+ra pad me/bi shwe badz+ri/mtshams kyi char ni rdo rje dang //rin chen sdong bu nar bu dri'o//mtshams rnamasu ni lha mo ste//g+ha k+Shu la sogs sgo rnamasu//de bzhin snga ma
384b7(rgyud): lta bar//'khor lo de ni rtag par bya//mchod pa'i thal mo snying kar bcings//g.yon du de bzhin bskor bar bya//me tog dang bcas phyag rgya 'di//sangs rgyas kun gyi de ma tshig
385a1(rgyud): rim//me tog bcas te s+yAng kar bcing //bsam pa ga yas pas gdung par bya//mgon la mgo bas phyag byas la//bskor ba lan gsum byas nas na/
385a2(rgyud): zhugs nas me tog dor bar bya//shin tu gsang ba yang dag dgug/de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba dang /dbang du bya ba dang /dgug pa dang //bsgrub
385a3(rgyud): par bya ba'i snying po 'di yi nau taM/aM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harma NI/a d+ya nuta pa na na tA ta/de nas cho ga ji bzhin du//ston la me tog sil ma dor//sangs rgyas byang chub rab
385a4(rgyud): grub phyir//'gro ba'i mgon la de nyid brjod//de yis kun nas sangs rgyas ni//thams cad 'dus pa nyid du 'gyur//thams cad mi dmigs sbyor ba yis//dngos grub
385a5(rgyud): thams cad stsol bar mdzad//dkyil 'khor der zhugs pa la ni//dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//dga' ba la sogs mtshan ma mchog/sna tshogs pa ni 'byung bar
385a6(rgyud): 'gyur//de nas de bzhin cho ga ni//rgyas pas slob ma mchog tu zhugs//mchod pa'i thal mos 'khor lo che/mchod nas slar ni dbyung bar bya//sgrub pa byas nas dngos grub
385a7(rgyud): kyang //cho gtso bzhin rab bshang bya//ras la bcom ldan bdud la sogs//rnam par rgyal ba mnyes par bri//sgrub 'di lan gcig tsam gyis ni//de 'dra'i sgrub pas 'grub par
385b1(rgyud): 'gyur//sku gzugs sogs mdun yang dag par//ye shes khu tshur yongs bzung la//rdo rje'i tshig gi cho ga bzhin//bzlas brjod stong phrag brgya bya'o//mdor na 'bum ni rdzogs pa na/
385b2(rgyud): ci 'dod dngos grub thams cad dang //tshe mchog 'di la sangs rgyas nyid//thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom med//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i sgrub pa chen po'i rgyud ni//
385b3(rgyud): phyag rgya gang rung gcig bcings nas//bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsgoms na//phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub che//brtan par myur du thob por 'gyur//de nas dam tshig sgrub pa'i rgyud
385b4(rgyud): ni//snying khar rdo rje gzugs bzhag ste//sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod la//bzlas brjod 'bum gyis bsgrub nas ni//dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur//de nas las kyi phyag rgya
385b5(rgyud): thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud ni//bdud las rgyal ba'i mchog bcings te//chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor//mtshungs med sems can don byas la//las kyi phyag rgya rtag tu 'grub
385b6(rgyud): cecas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungaso//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi mchog sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud//de nas mo bsgrubs dngos grub mchog/las rnams
385b7(rgyud): rab 'byams dag pa ste//sdig pa kun sel sna tshogs pa/go rims bzhin du rab bshad bya//'di lta ste/nad thams cad dang /mya ngan dang gnod pa dang /gnod byed dang /
386a1(rgyud): dug thams cad dang /sbyar ba'i dug dang /gsheng byed dang /g.yeng byed dang /ro lang pa dang /sngags dang /sman dang /bgrogs dang /lag 'dren
386a2(rgyud): dang /sdig pa dang /rmi lam ngan pa dang /dus ma yin par 'tsho ba dang /rims dang /gdon dang /mang 'gro ma dang /nye bar 'tshe ba dang /'go ba'i nad dang /nyon mongs pa/
386a3(rgyud): dang /lus dang /ngag dang /sems kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par bshig pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sdug bsngal 'phrog par byed paso//tshe dang lang tsho dang /
386a4(rgyud): gzugs dang /kha dag dang /gzi byin chen po dang /mdangs dang /stobs dang /spro ba dang /brtson 'grus dang /dpal dang /skal pa bzang po dang /bsod nams
386a5(rgyud): dang /ming dang /snyan pa dang /grags pa dang /dran pa dang /blo gros dang /brtan pa dang /rtog pa dang /stobs dang /tinge 'dzin dang /phung po dang /'du byed dang /sku
386a6(rgyud): dang /gsung dang /thugs 'phel ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen po so//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sbyin pa dang /tshul khrims dang /bzod
386a7(rgyud): pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab dang /ye shes dang /stobs dang /thabs dang /rdo rje dang /sgrub pa dang /gzungs dang /sa dang /spyod pa
386b1(rgyud): dang /so so yang dag por rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang /chos dang /lus dang /sna tshogs pa'i bya ba dang /sems can gyi don dang /sangs rgyas kyi mdzad
386b2(rgyud): pa'i don dang /sku dang /gsung dang thugs grub pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad kyis//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i
386b3(rgyud): sems bskyed pa/kun tu bzang po'i cho ga spyod pa rdzogs par bya ba dang /sems can thams cad kyi don dang 'pho ba dang /skye ba'i sa dang /gzhon nu'i rol pa ston pa dang /mngon par
386b4(rgyud): byeng pa dang /dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang /byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang /bdud thams cad 'dul ba dang /byang chub chen por mngon par byang chub pa dang /chos kyi 'khor
386b5(rgyud): lo bskor ba dang /nu stegs thams cad char gcod pa dang /'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang /lha las babs pa dang /'dus pa chen po'i byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
386b6(rgyud): gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba dang /'dul ba la rab tu bzhag pa dang /ngan 'gro thams cad las 'don pa dang /mdo sde thams cad ston par mdzad pa dang /rtog pa thams cad byin
386b7(rgyud): kyis brlabs pa dang /dngos grub thams cad sbyin pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /gsung dang /thugs las dmigs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang /cho 'phrul sgrub pa
387a1(rgyud): la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs kyi rdo rje so//ci ltar phyag rgya 'di dag gis//byang chub sems la mngon ston pa//de ltar byang chub
387a2(rgyud): spyod tshogs kyis//byang chub dam pa thob mi 'gyur//don yod bsod nams dam pa yis//las kyi rab 'byam sgrub byed pa//cho ga ma grub pa rnams grub//sangs rgyas chos ni rab
387a3(rgyud): ster byed//rnam pa kun tu dang ldan pa'i//sem+ba canakun la sbyin par bya//dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs po//skad cig gis ni sbyor bar byed//dpal mchog dang po rtog pa'i rgyal
387a4(rgyud): po las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje rtog pa rgyas pa'o//de nas sna tshogs las chen po//khyab bdag rdo rje 'dzin chen po/gdug pa
387a5(rgyud): thams cad 'dul ba'i mchog/sems can kun la rjes ston mdzad//de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bskyed cing //gang phyir nyes byas kyis gdug pa'i//rang gi rang sems
387a6(rgyud): spyod pa yis//zhi bas sems can kun gyi don//gdul bar rab tu sgrub mi nus//sangs rgyas kun gyis po sgrub bya ba'i//'gro ba 'di dag thams can yin//gang tshe bde
387a7(rgyud): gshegs sems can don//dam pa mdzad par mi spyod pa//de tshe nyid kyis dngos po kun//gtso bos rdo rje gsol ba btab//sems can thams cad 'dul mdzad pa//
387b1(rgyud): bcam ldan 'das la gsal ba btab//u tiSh+Tha sA ma yA kro d+hA ni sud+d+ha dz+wA la bar+d+ha hA/de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis//phyag na rdo rje rang nyid gtso//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las//slar
387b2(rgyud): byung nas ni mdun na gnas//khro chen rgyal ba'i sku yis ni//sems dpa'i skyil dkrungs kyis lags bzhugs//'bar ba'i phreng 'od kyis gsal ba//sreg pa'i bskal pa gzhan 'dra ba/
387b3(rgyud): g.yon pa'i rdo rje snyems pa che//drag tu gsor bas bskyod mdzad cing //'bar ba'i rdo rje cher 'bar ba//rnam par 'phos pas sreg pa yang //'bar ba chen pos gsod pa ni//bskal pa'i me
387b4(rgyud): yi phung po 'dra//dang po'i rdo rje khro gnyer bcas//rdo rje mchog 'dzin pas gsungs pa//de la rdo rje me dang nyi ma ltar//'bar ba zhes bya'i snying po 'di yin te//hUM de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam
387b5(rgyud): kyis//sdig pa kun gyi bud shing zad//'jig rten khams kyi 'jig rten gsum//thams cad g.yos zhing 'dul bar 'gyur//lha chen la sogs lha rnams ni//gso ba med cing rmongs par
387b6(rgyud): 'gyur//rdo rje 'bar ba 'khrugs pa kun//de bzhin 'jig pa lta bur 'gyur//nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal rnams//mya ngan 'das par nye bar 'gro//lha la sogs pa'i srid gsum kun//de tshe
387b7(rgyud): kun tu rmongs par 'gyur//sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yin//sangs rgyas byang chub yang bstan mdzad//sems dpa' kun gyis thabs chen po//dam pa yang ni thug su tshung/
388a1(rgyud): denas de rje 'dra du'omachog//'bar ba'i spong ba 'byugs bya'o ste//rdordza mched gadzugs pa na/shA sa rbang du babs pasgon//gzhan na/
388a2(rgyud): 'gas par blugs//sbyin 'bar 'jig du R+sha ga/dashAm+bu gyen du rdzi shi ga//kun n+tu m+b+ha khyil 'bar dgas pa'i rnal 'byu/sa
388a3(rgyud): yul can rnams//phyung nas kun tu 'gro ba rnams//thams cad du ni 'bar bar 'khrug/rlung bskyod bskal pa'i me lta bur/
388a4(rgyud): 'byer ba'i phreng ba kun tu 'khrugs//'jig rten khams
388a5(rgyud): nam lus ni//sangs rgyas thams cad sres bcas pa//yang dag zhugs pa legs bskul te//'jig rten thams cad yongasu
388a6(rgyud): 'gyum pa'i phyi/di na ga ma na nga //rgyu nas da nas 'i la / TIg na
388a7(rgyud): gas // slo gas smin pa ga sa rlo/rgyu nga seMts+tsha zlams smang //den skyeg ma
388a8(rgyud): rnams cad dun shi ba gso//sangs rgyas dpa'i bas brgyal rgya cing // rje can gyis khyong rjes tsul//drin sa rje 'dzin khabs//'bar ba'i rdo rdzog par byed cing // med
388b1(rgyud): ga la gnas shes//sna tshags pa la bka' rab bas+ho//de rnams kyis gsol ba//'di su nod lags//bcom ldan rgya ni zhi ba la//gnod sbyin gzugs can gang lags gsungs//nga
388b2(rgyud): kyidamachog ci 'dra ba//zhus pa bde ba'i tshig tu gsungs//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'di ni sangs rgyas rnam grol ba//gdang hU~M sI rje gnad sbyin /dkon mchag gsum
388b3(rgyud): drung de bzhin du//nga la stabasu 'gro bar gyis//'jig rten gsum gyis 'di thos nas//tshogs bdag tshogs kyi dbang phyug bcas//bskal pa'i mi dpung lta bu yi//'bar ba'i mtshon
388b4(rgyud): gyis 'thub pa brtsams//de rnams kyis smras pa//bdag cag gis ni rangs rgyab gas//rdo rje gnad sbyin shes ma ston//bdag ca 'jig rten gsum baM ga cig/gnad sbyin na
388b5(rgyud): byas ci byed bya//de nas rdo rje 'dzin khros nas//khro ga nyer dpral bar bkrus te gnas//de nas khro gnyer thams cad ni//rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rje su spyad//g.yon pa snyems pa rgyu btsas pas//
388b6(rgyud): smin ma sbyin bsdus pas rgod cing //namada' khyab pa'i dbyangs kyis ni//rtag tu khros bcas pas smraso//de la khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i nye ba'i snying ba//sems can ma
388b7(rgyud): lus rgyal ba la ni 'di yin te//haM de nas snying po 'di phyung bas//nges brgyal bcu cig bcings pa dang //dam tshig brten pa 'dzin du bcug/rdo rje ming gi dbang bsgyur nas/
389a1(rgyud): lag na rdo rje 'dzin mchog byas//rdo rje ming ni byin nasu//'jig rten gsum po ting 'dzin bzhag/de nas rdo rje chen po mchog/mgon po yis ni gsol btab pa//
389a2(rgyud): sems can kun la rjes ston pas//rtog pa 'di ni bshad du gsol//rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs pa yi//dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi rol tu//'bar ba'i 'khor lo yang dag bri//
389a3(rgyud): yi dbusu bzhag bya ba//sngon po 'bar ba gzugs bzang ba//zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs//zhal ni khro dang bcas pas bzhad//sems dpa'i skyil krungs kyis legs
389a4(rgyud): bzhugs//bsnyems bcas shas cher 'bar ba la//'od zer 'bar ba 'khrugs pa yi//rdo rje gsor ba mdzad la brtson//de yi nges ni thams cad du//rdo rje rnal 'byor ma yi
389a5(rgyud): gzugs//rdo rje mtshan cha mdud chen dang //ral gri zhags pa mtshon 'dzin pa//mtsham su mda' dang kha T+wAM ga/'khor lo ba dan sna tshogs 'dzin//rdo rje'i rigs ni sna tshogs
389a6(rgyud): pa//'bar ba'i 'khor los yongasu bskor//dkyil 'khor dgod par bya ba ni//thig bdun gyis ni yang dge tu//dang po rdo rje phyag rgya gdab//gnyis pa sngags kyi lha mo ste//gsum
389a7(rgyud): pa rdo rje rgyal po ni//rdo rje lha mos yang dag bskor//rdo rje chen mo sgeg mo che//bzhi pa glu mkhan ma la sogs//rgyal rigs gsol ka bran rnams kyis//khro ba rnams ni lnga pa las//
389b1(rgyud): drag par rdo rje pha nya mchog/gnod sbyin srin pa/ ka ra//dbang phyug dam pa drag po sogs//gtum pa chen po 'dul bar mdzad//phyi yi dkyil 'khor dbyibs rnams//mdaran
389b2(rgyud): ming po gsum la sogs//lha la sogs pa'i tshogs thams cad//legs par 'dri 'am bzhag par bya//mtsham su lha mo rab bshad pa//de rnams kyi ni sgro dbu su'ang //lcags kyul
389b3(rgyud): sogs de bzhin du//dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis na//go rims dag ni ci bzhin du//cho ga rgyas ba ci bzhin bya//khros pas rdo rje gsor ba dang //khro gnyer 'dzum dang bcas
389b4(rgyud): pas mdud//de nas khro zhing slob dpon che//rdo rje can mchog rab zhugs la//rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis bsdigs mdzub//hU~M mdzad rab tu sbyar bar bya//snyoms dang bcas pas rgyas gdab
389b5(rgyud): nyid//de bzhin khro bas gdul ba la//rdo rje 'chang chen rgyas pa yas//gdug pa nyid la rab tu dgyes//de nas me tog blangs nas ni//khros pas bdag po che la gtor//rdo rje 'bar
389b6(rgyud): ba'i lcags kyu chas//yang dag par yang dgug par bya//oM ma hA badz+ra dz+wa la yA na lArka ya hi dzaHsarba badz+ra ku la pra be sha ya hUM/sarba mu dAM gA nA na ban d+ha na tra Ta/sarba sa ma yai sA d+ha ya
389b7(rgyud): phaT/sarba duSh+TA na ha ha pa tsa b+ha smai ku ru ma hA kr-i d+ha ag+ni badz+ra Na hUM phaT/a e e a/de nas bcom ldan khro bo yis//rgyal po bstan pa tshe byon 'gyur//rdo rje rigs la sogs
390a1(rgyud): /bkun//dngam grub thams cad gsol bar mdzad//de nas d+d+hi mdzad la sagos smras//mtshan nu rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur//dul te srid na las
390a2(rgyud): la//snying khar dbab pa phra ba skyeng //de nas rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis/phyag rgyas slob ma gzhug par bya//bcug nas dang po'i sems dpa' bo//rang gi snying po brjod par bya//hUM hUM badz+ra
390a3(rgyud): prahA ra Ni phaT/hUM badz+ra shu la~M yA br-i ni tri ta/ma ta/sahU~M badz+ra ka Sha ts+tshinA haM/oM badz+ra a ma lo pra she maT/rdo rje 'gugs pa dang /rdo rje mdung dang /rdo rje ral bri dang /rdo rje nagra/
390a4(rgyud): pa ste/rdo rje khro ba'i srung ba'o//de nas 'di rnams kyi phyag rgya rdo rje don yod thogs pa med pa shin tu grub pa//stobs dang pha rol gnon pa rnams sems can mngon par rgyus
390a5(rgyud): gdab pa nus pa rnams bskul bar bya'o//oM badz+ra gu N+ye sid+d+hi pa ri ma yo gi shwa ri hi/hU~M badz+ra tsaN+Di ho Sha T+wAM ga ma hA badz+ra ka pA la ya ma ku ste/ru lu ru lu NI hU~M badz+ra nA rA da na~M dzi/
390a6(rgyud): hUM badz+ra pa Ta ke dzi/rdo rje khro bo'i mkha' 'gro ma lan gcig bzlas te dgod pa 'am/bri bar bya'o//bcom ldan 'das de kho na nyid kyi snying pos gzhugasu gsal na dngas grub tham

397a5(rgyud): pa dang //dngos grub chen po kun bsgrubs pa//go rims ji bzhin rab bshad bya//'di lta ste/'byor pa thams cad dgug pa dang /gzhug pa dang /bo cing ba dang /
