397a7(rgyud): pa dang /'bebs pa dang /brdeg pa dang /sbyang ba dang /rnyed pa dang /nyo ba dang /btsong ba dang /kun tu 'gyed pa dang /nye bar dgod pa dang /brtan par bya ba dang /
397b1(rgyud): rdo rje bya bra dang /'byor pa thams cad sgrub pa dang /'byor pa thams cad kyi mchog sgrub pa la rdo rje rin chen gyis dbang bskur bso//dpal thams cad dgug pa dang /gzhug
397b2(rgyud): pa dang /bcing ba dang /dbang du bya ba dang /dbrog pa dang /bsags pa dang /len pa dang /'dren pa dang /'gugs pa dang /gtod pa dang /'phen pa dang /'a
397b3(rgyud): pa dang /brdeg pa dang /sbyang ba dang /rnyed pa dang /nyo ba dang /btsong ba dang /kun tu 'gad pa dang /nye bar dgos pa dang /brtan par bya ba dang /rdo rjer bya ba dang 'byor
397b4(rgyud): pa thams cad sgrub pa dang ngo //'byor pa thams cad kyi mchog sgrub pa ni/rdo rje rin chen dpal gyiso//phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dgug pa dang /gzhug pa dang /bcing ba dang /
397b5(rgyud): dbang du bya ba dang /dbrog pa dang /bsag pa dang /len pa dang /'dren pa dang /'gugs pa dang /gtod pa dang /gzhig pa dang /'phen pa dang /'degs pa dang /
397b6(rgyud): 'bebaso pa dang /rdeg pa dang /sbyang ba dang /rnyed pa dang /nyo ba dang /btsong ba dang /kun tu 'gyed pa dang /nye bar dgos pa dang /brtan par bya ba dang /rdo rjer bya
397b7(rgyud): ba dang /'byor pa thams cad sgrub pa dang /'byor pa thams cad kyi mchog sgrub pa la ni rdo rje rin chen phun sum tshogs pa so//mchod pa thams cad dgog pa dang /gzhug pa
398a1(rgyud): dang /bcing ba dang /dbang du bya ba dang /dbrog pa dang /bsags pa dang /len pa dang /'dren pa dang /'gugs pa dang /gtod pa dang /
398a2(rgyud): gzhig pa dang /'phen pa dang /'degs pa dang /'bebs pa dang /rdeg pa dang /sbyang ba dang /rnyed pa dang /nyo ba dang /btsong ba dang /kun tu dgod pa dang /nye bar
398a3(rgyud): dgod pa dang /brtan par bya ba dang /rdo rjer bya ba dang /'byor pa thams cad sgrub pa dang //'byor pa thams cad kyi mchog sgrub pa la ni rdo rje rin chen gyi mchod pa sgrubs
398a4(rgyud): pas//zhes kyang gsungasau//sems can thams cad bde don du//rdo rje sems dpa' nor che ba//rang gi rgyal mchog lan gcig sgrub//yi ge traM ni sbyar bar bya//dpal
398a5(rgyud): mchog dang po rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa rdo rje rin chen gyi rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o////de nas rgyal ba rdo rje
398a6(rgyud): 'dzin//'jig rten gsum po khams gsum pa//'jig rten gsum bdag thams cad la//'jig rten gsum mchog 'dul mdzad pa//cho ga bzhin du sgom 'gyur
398a7(rgyud): zhing //sems can don phyir cho gas bzhugs//'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams//rtag tu rnam par gnas pa yin//mi mnyam pa yis rten gyur na//dug nyid du ni nye
398b1(rgyud): bar 'gro/bdud rtsi nyid kyis brten gyur na//bdud rtsi nyid du'ang 'gyur ba yin//'dod chags tshungs pa mchog 'byin pa//zhe sdang drag po'i ting 'dzin gyis//gti mug
398b2(rgyud): khyab 'jug brtan mdzad nas//'jig rten gsum po byin gyis brlabs//'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/rtag tu gnas pas srid gsum gnas//chos kyi rten nas gsuM
398b3(rgyud): mchog ste//chos min rten pas ngan song gsum//'dod chags sbrang rtsir byed par bshad//zhe sdang rgyal bar byed par bshad//gti mug don ni sgrub byed ces//kun tu gsang
398b4(rgyud): ba'i ming yin//nga ni 'jig rten gcig pu nyid//'jig rten gsum du rab tu bshad//nga ni 'dod pa gcig pu nyid//tshangs pa drag po g.yung drung yi ni//de nas gsum po 'di
398b5(rgyud): yis mchog/sbyang phyir rdo rje sbyang 'dzin pa//gzugs ni gsum pa 'di dag nyid//bdag nyid kho na 'byung ba yin//gang phyir 'jig rten 'di dag ni//rtag tu yang ni 'di skad smra//
398b6(rgyud): tshangs sogs kyi mi 'dul yang dag pa'i//sangs rgyas byang chub snod ma yin//de rnams sbyang phyir bcom ldan 'das//rdo rje 'chang chen rang nyid ni//gzugs ni gsum pa 'di mdzad
398b7(rgyud): nas//phyis ni sangs rgyas nyid mi 'gyur//de nas tshangs pa la sogs lha//'jig rten gsumo mchog dbang phyug che//dkyil 'khor der ni gsang snying po'o//rang gi rang grub phyir
399a1(rgyud): rab bul//oM b+hur b+hu baHswAHzur bzhi pa la sgo bani pa//sgo sbyang bzhis ni rab srung ba//kha khyer gyis ni legs bskor ba//phye yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya//
399a2(rgyud): de yi nang ma nyid dang ni//dkyil 'khor go zhu yi dbyibs can la//sbrang rtsi byed dang rgyal nyid byed//sgrub pa thams cad sgrub pa ni//go rims dag ni ci bzhin du//legs par
399a3(rgyud): bri'am bzhag par bya//dbus mo gnyis kyis zhugs la der//rtse gsum dam tshig gis mtshan pas//zhugs te dam tshig bcings nas ni//yang dag par ni dgug par bya//oM
399a4(rgyud): b+hur+NA baHswaHswasten mad+h+ya swA hA//nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa yis//thams cad thams cad kyis bskor ba//thams cad grub phyir 'ongs pa la//de snyed pa yi gtor ma sbyin//slob
399a5(rgyud): dpon rab tu zhugs pa yi//slob ma thams cad gzhug par bya//de nyid gsang ba brjod nas ni//dam tshig mchog ni sbyin paro bya//gal te khyod kyis rtse gsum bcag/snying
399a6(rgyud): po snod yin la smra sam//ji skad smras pa'i chos rnams ni//gal te 'dir ni ma spyad dam//snying stobs rdul dang mun po nyid//tshangs pa drag po g.yung drung ste//ming po gsum
399a7(rgyud): po 'di nyid ni//nam yang brnyes par mi bya'o//gang zhig 'di rnams sgom pa slob//yang dang yang du zhugs nas ni//dkyil 'khor mchod par byed pa dang //dngos grub
399b1(rgyud): thams cad thob par 'gyur//rang gis phyag rgya bslabs nas ni//de la gar gyi mchod pa dang //'dod yon dam pa lnga rnams kyis//rtag tu dkyil 'khor mchod par bya//'jig
399b2(rgyud): rten gsum 'byin pa'i rgyudo///de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin//sems can kun rje ston mdzad pa//'jig rten gsum byung don grub tu//slar yang srong mo rnams
399b3(rgyud): 'byin mdzad//kun tu tshogs dang zhe sdang rmongs//brtan par byed pa'i rgyu yino//dga' dang phra dog bud med ni//rab tu grags pa'i grub kun ster//gang zhig 'jig rten kun tu
399b4(rgyud): bshad//tshogs kun gyis mchod lha mo rnams//zhi dang 'jigs ma de bzhin gser//grub pa dang ni zhi bar bshad//phyi rol sems can phan phyir dang //rtogs don khong du chud
399b5(rgyud): bya'i phyir//de rnams kyi ni snying po dang //dkyil 'khor de bzhin dam tshig bshad//hUM hU~M shrI sh+ya/dkyil 'khor chen po bzhi pa ni//srud bu gsum gyi dkyil 'khor bya//mtsham
399b6(rgyud): kyi thig ni ka ba che//bzhi po dag gi rim pa bzhin//de yi dbusu dkyil 'khor ni//bzhi po dag gi de bzhin bya//rang gi snying po bzhi po ni//rang gi sbyor ni phyogs pa bzhag
399b7(rgyud): skal bzang lag nar shi mtshon//sring mo phub can zhi ba ma//phag mo lag na gter nyid de//grub mo ni snyems dang bcas//de nas dang po'i dkyil 'khor du//kun nas de bzhin
400a1(rgyud): bzhugs nas ni//sring mo rnams kyis rang gi rgyas//go rims drag ni ci bzhin du//zhugs nas de bzhin cho ga bya//spros la sogs pas mchod par
400a2(rgyud): bya//de nyid gsang ba rab sgrub pas//kun nasu dgub pa dag tu bya//A~M suM b+ha ga ra tISh+Tha ma ya d+hi b+ha~M/rAk+Shi sa mA tiSh+Tha ma ya h+ni b+hur b+h+rU~M baH/bi rat+na a mir+yA tA ma ya swAH/
400a3(rgyud): sid+d+he ke sad+g+ha sa ma ya hi I mA m+bi mu dA b+hi/hrI hUM shrI b+h+yo//de nas lus ni thams cad kyis//de bzhin du ni legs bzhugs la//de nas phyag rgya bcings brtan te//gsang
400a4(rgyud): ba mchog 'di brjod par bya//gal te gsang nyid ma bsrungs na//gang zhig sems can don bzhugs dang //gang yang dkyil 'khor sgrub byed po//de rnams khyed kyis bsad par
400a5(rgyud): 'gyur//chos dang ldan la bdud rtsi nyid//chos min pas ni dug pas lhags//ci snyed pa dang dus ci bzhin//yul rnams nye bar bsten pa dang //phyag rgya gar gyi bshad
400a6(rgyud): pa yis//ci bde b.re ni rtag tu mched//sring mo bzhi'i rgyu do////de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin//sa yi dbang phyug kun gyi mchog/'dod chags
400a7(rgyud): zhe sdang gti mug ce//sgrub pa dag ni rab sgrib nyid//'dod chags sogs dug gzhag phyir dang //kun nas bdud rtsi nyid bya'i phyir//zhe sdang las byung klu yi ni//dkyil
400b1(rgyud): 'khor dam pa 'byung bar 'gyur//de la snying po 'di yin te//phu zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa//srad pu thams cad yang dag bri//sgo khyud klu yi gdengs ka mchog/mtshams kyi rtsa
400b2(rgyud): mchog mjug ma mdud//de yi dbus klu rgyal ni//mtha' yas gdangs ka bcas pa ni//klu yi rigs ni brgyad po dag/shes rab can gyis kun tu bri//de nas khros dang zhugs
400b3(rgyud): nas ni//klu 'dzin pa yi shugs kyis ni//zhugs nas dkyil 'khor de nyid du//sbrul gyi gdengs kas dgug par bya//oM hrI a nI la dza baM begA pre thi b+hin da ri She sha ya hi phu/
400b4(rgyud): sar+b+ba nA ga ku lA n+yA na phu/sa ma ya pra be sha ya phu/sarbA na sA d+ha ya phu/ta ta sar+b+ba nA ga pu tra ka phu/dr-i ltar byas na legs par bzhugs shing dga' bar 'gyur ro//de nas
400b5(rgyud): slob dpon gyis dug med par bsam par bya'o//nga nas brtsams te dug thams cad zos pas kyang bdud rtsir 'gyu ro//nor rgyas brtse bar byed//dug thams cad sbar ba dang
400b6(rgyud): gzhig pa nus par 'gyur ro//de nas mna'o snying po sbyin par bya ste//'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams//'jig rten na ni 'di gsum dug/gal te bden pa las 'das nas//
400b7(rgyud): 'di dag gis ni rtag gsod 'gyur//khyed kyi glog l-i brnyas mi bya//ser ba bzlon par mi bya zhing //gal te dngos grub la dga' na//ci nas sbrul ni bsad mi bya//klu'i dkyil
401a1(rgyud): /'khor ra////de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin//rtag bsngal thams cad sel ba'i mchog/sems can kun la bde ba'i phyir//gdon gyi pa
401a2(rgyud): 'khor bsdu ba yin//'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams//nyes byas kyi ni dug nyid 'gyur//gdon dang rims dang sdig pa dang //dmyal bar yang ni 'gyur ba yin//de nas
401a3(rgyud): gdug pa'i snying po ni//haM zur bzhi pa le sgo bzhi par//gdon gyi dkyil 'khor kun tu bri//de'i dbus dang por gdon la sogs//cho ga rgyas pa dgod par bya//de nas/
401a4(rgyud): bshad pa bzhin zhugs nas//dgod cing myur du dkyil 'khor du//rdo rje 'dzin pa zhugs nas ni//khros pas rkang pa g.yon pas mnye//de nas gdon dang rims sdig kun//
401a5(rgyud): dmyal ba thams cad rtag tu ni//sdig pa chen po byed pa yang //rdo rjes rab tu 'jigs par 'gyur//zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungaso//sdug bsngal
401a6(rgyud): thams cad 'don pa'i rgyu ///de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin//kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa yis//sems can kun don rab sgrub bIr//dkyil 'khor
401a7(rgyud): thams cad gsungs pa yin//de la snying po 'di yin te//oM AHhUM hrIHtraM/de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis//kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa yin//gzugs kun
401b1(rgyud): g+has ni kun mchog ni//dbang phyug dam pa mdzad pa yin//gsang ba chen po lnga yis ni//gang tshe 'dul bar ma gyur pa//de tshe sna tshogs cher mdzad pa//'gro ba 'dul bya'i'o dmang //
401b2(rgyud): yin//dam pa yang dag bshad bya ste//kun mchog sna tshogs rnam par rgyal//kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa yi//dkyil 'khor chen po bris nas ni//de yi dbu sa cho ga bzhin/
401b3(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' rab bzhag la//rdo rje lha mo tshogs dkyil 'khor//de yi ngos ni thams cad du//kun mchog bdag po sku rnam so//rdo rje mchog bcas mtshan mi ni//rang gi
401b4(rgyud): rigs kyis bskor ba bzhag/rgyal po rdo rje med rnyed bu'o//gzugs 'drin 'khyer lo rnam par // bdag rdo rjen ni dang//gaN+DI bang rdo rje mdung bsnams pa/
401b5(rgyud): brangad 'byung pad+ma 'byung //rdo rje 'dzin pa tshangs pa'i gzugs//na mkha'i snying po 'dod pa'i gzugs//rdo rje dang bcas me tog mtshon//dkyil 'khor gyi ni mchims rnams su//
401b6(rgyud): rigs kyi lha ma~M bri bar bya//rdo rje dpal mo dkar mo dang //rdo rje sgrol ma mkha' rdo rje//de nas dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po 'di rnams kyi snying po bshad par bya ste//oM badz+ra nA rA ya
401b7(rgyud): Na ts+tshin+da pra ti ha na badz+ra tsakr-i Na ho//b+ha ga bAM badz+ra ta thA ga ta/dzaHhU~M baM hoHbadz+ra d+ha ra taM/badz+ra ta thA ga ta hUM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA yo gi nI ga Nau shwa ra/ma hA badz+ra kuM lo gra ba ne he/b+he ga
402a1(rgyud): bAM badz+ra tsan+ne shwa rA ya/hA ha ha ha hIHbadz+ra pad+mo b+ha/ba ho//b+ha ga baM badz+ra lo ke shwa re/ma hA pra me sid d+ha/oM b+hU ra b+hu baHsmaHswistA na ma
402a2(rgyud): swA hA/he badz+ra ku su mA yu d+ha/sarbe kA ma me sA d+ha ya horma b+ha ga baM bidz+ri A kA sha gar+b+he/ba pa Tu Ta tAM/badz+ra A kA sha gar+b+he a shaM Shi mu dr-i/na mo ye na sA d+h+waM na/b+ha
402a3(rgyud): grI pa te pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA yu d+hA/tsId+d+ha badz+rA NaM tsakre NA te na sa t+ye na pA pa kAn/oM d+hIHshrI shru ti s+thi ti bi dza ye swA hA/badz+ra pa ra maM/oM badz+ra go ri ma hA bid+yA trai lo kye bi dza ye sha
402a4(rgyud): ri badz+ra kro d+hi ap+ti sa me yai/badz+ri d+ha ri nA mo s+yAstA/tad+ya thA/au hai li mi li le li lA li badz+ra mu ka ye swA hI//badz+ra sa ma ya/na mo ye na sA d+ha na b+ha ga ba taM/bud+d+ha bud+d+hi
402a5(rgyud): bud+d+ha d+ha rA/bidz+ra d+har+m+ma pra yo ge na/tai na saM t+yaM na sid+d+ha mai/au tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/badz+ra d+ha mau ta/i kI mA badz+dzi Ni sid+d+ha sid+d+ha bi shud+d+ha sa d+h+yed+h+yaM ba hi/ga ga nod+b+ha
402a6(rgyud): yo gai naM sid d+ha maM pa ri maM ke re/tad+ya thA/ga gA na bi shud d+he/sar+b+baM ma b+hi pra yi ba ri pU ra nI swA hA//phyi yi dkyil 'khor niganas rnamasu//rdo rje 'dzin pa
402a7(rgyud): rab spyod gnas//lha dbang dang ni ma mo nyid//'jig rten skyong rnams dgod par bya//tsho gas kyi dbang phyug rdo rje yi//rol mo che bcu rdung byed pa//phye'i dkyil 'khor
402b1(rgyud): khakhyer la//blo dang mtshan su 'ang 'ang bri'o//sgo rnams kun tu 'jug du ni//rang gI phyag rgyas rab tu gzhug/dkyil 'khor dam pa lnga par ni//dang po'i sbyor bas 'jug par bya
402b2(rgyud): de nas dbus 'dug nas ni//dang po lcags kyu che ba nyid//snying po 'di ni brjod byed cing //'gugs pa 'di ni brjod par bya//oM ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa sid+d+hi hU~M/sar+b+ba ta thA gra tA no/
402b3(rgyud): s+yA ma ya A kAR+Sha ya dzaHbadz+ra ku la dI paM da ma ye ta pra be shaM ya hUM/sar+b+ba lo ke shwa raM pra bi sha ya sa ma ya ban+te na baM/sa ma ya sar+b+ba rat+na dI pa~M ma hA ma Ni rI dz+nyA nA/ba shrI ku ru ha
402b4(rgyud): hUM aHhU~M trAMHtAM/de nas gros de ba chen po yi//snying po bzang po 'di brjod pas//rdo rje 'chang chen rgyal po ni//'khor lo thams cad dang bicas pas//bkug ci rab tu
402b5(rgyud): bcug pa dang //bden pas bcings te dbang du byas//dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog thams cad//dngos grub kun gyi sgrub par 'gyur//de nas go rims ci bzhin du//dkyil
402b6(rgyud): 'khor thams cad sgrub pa dang //dngos grub de rnams nyid kyang ni//thams cad kyang ni bsgrub par bya//bde ba thams cad mi 'gyur gnas//bde ba chen po zhes brjod do//
402b7(rgyud): rdo rje 'di ni sgrub la sogs//'di ni tshe 'dir 'grub par 'gyur//de ltar sna tshogs pa'i don sbyang ba'i don gyis cho ga 'gro ba dpag tu med pa 'dul ba mtha' med cing sna tshogs
403a1(rgyud): pas mnyam pa med cing phul du phyung ba de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad 'dzin pa'i bde ba'i mchog byed pa rgyal ba thams cad
403a2(rgyud): kyis byin gyis brlabs pa srid pa'i bde ba'i mchog byed pa gsungs pa yin//dpal mchog dang po'i rgyal po las rtog pa thams cad kyi rgyud phyi ma'i rtsa ba'i rgyud kun gyi
403a3(rgyud): mchog dbang phyug dam pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzog so///sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba che//dam tshig mchog gi sgrub pa dang //bde ba
403a4(rgyud): chen po'i gzhal yas khang //dngos grub kun gyi lus byas pa//de bzhin gshegs mchog chen po yi//rin chen rgyal ba sogs kyi rgyan//bde ba chen po'i chags pa/
403a5(rgyud): che//glu dang rol mo rjes chags pa//bla med dga' ba chen po yi//mchod pa kun gyis rab tu mchod//dpa' ba chen po dpal gyi gnas//rang gi bzhugs gnas mchog
403a6(rgyud): de la//rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po mchog/mi 'gyur mchog tu yang dag bzhugs//rdo rje sems dpa' bdag rang nyid//rab tu dga' ba mi 'gyur mchog/kun tu
403a7(rgyud): bzang po 'khor ba dang //byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/rdo rje snyems pa'i bdag po'i bdag/kun mchog
403b1(rgyud): rmugs pa chen po yi//drangos grub dbang phyug rjes grub pa//glu dang rol mo thog mtha' med//mchog ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs//hU~M de nas 'di ni gsung tsam gyis//
403b2(rgyud): rdo rje thams cad 'dzin pa ni//gsang ba lnga yi de nyid che//phyag rgya'i lha mo byung bar gyur//rtag tu chags dang dngos grub che//rnam rgyal dbang phyug lhag pa'i lha//phyag rgya dam
403b3(rgyud): pa bzhi pa ste//sems dpas byin gyis brlabs pa'i sku//de nas de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di yin te//kun mchog so sor rtog pa dang //dngos grub kun gyis bde ba'o mchog/
403b4(rgyud): kun mchog rnam rgyal mthong ba dang //thams cad dbang phyug mchod pa che//dngos grub rnams dang phun tshogs dang //dga' ba dag dang bdag po rnams//rdo rje lha mo thog
403b5(rgyud): mtha' med//rdo rje sems dpa' sku yi mchog/ces bya'o//de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i mi rnams ni dga' ba chen po dpal don yod dga' ba'i dam tshig 'dod pa'i rdo rje ma
403b6(rgyud): dang //dga' ba chen po dpal don yod la chags pa'i dam tshig gi rdo rje ki li ki li dang /dga' ba chen po dpal rdo rje don yod la chags pa'i dam tshig rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje
403b7(rgyud): ma dang //dga' ba chen po dpal rdo rje don yod la chags pa'i dam tshig rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma'o//'di rnams gsang ba'i mtshan dag ni//mkhas pas gang zhig dang
403'a1(rgyud): pas brjod//de ni phyag rgya thams cad kyi//dngos po kun bdag bdag por 'gyur//zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu
403'a2(rgyud): gsang bas gsung ba yin//de nas 'di sgrub bshad bya ba//dngos grub shin tu brtag pa ste//sdig pa che las dga' ba dang //sgrub pa gang zhig ma grub kyang //rdo rje sem
403'a3(rgyud): dpas gsungs pa bzhin//de dag kyang ni myur du 'grub//nyin re 'am ni zla re 'am//de bzhin lo ni re rI la//ci mngon mngon 'dod bsgrub par bya//tsa rnyed pa dang ci bde
403'a4(rgyud): bas//ras la bcom ldan bri bar bya//kun bdag dam tshig dbang phyug ste//gang zhig bris par gyur na ni//mchog tu rtag pa'i thar pa thob//bzhud pa dang bcas zla ba'i
403'a5(rgyud): 'od//sna tshogs pad+ma'i 'od 'bar ba//sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur sogs//sna tshogs rgyan dang na bza' ldan//sems dpa'i skyil mo krungs kyis bzhugs//rdo rje
403'a6(rgyud): bsnyems pa'i mchog 'chang ba//g.yon pa dril bu mchog bsnyems pa//rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu brtag/de yi logs na bzhugs po rnams//de yi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor
403'a7(rgyud): brtan//rab tu dga' ba bde ba'i sku//gsang ba chen po dgod par bya//dang po pad+ma ltar dkar dmar//gzhan ni pa la sha ltar dkar//gzhan ni ud pa la 'dab ltar sngo//
403'b1(rgyud): rnams ma stor po 'dzin//dang ba dung na gtos pa dag/g.yas kyi logs la ston pa 'o//gsum pa dang ni dro'i pongag/gson gyi lags ban pa yin//rdo \u0f7f kau kA laH/
403'b2(rgyud): rlung ste dbyas par ste//dri yi logs mdza tshe//bad 'a digs dbral badzin pa//snyems pa'i byig gis 'ongs 'byud pa'o//naseMn rgyal mchen bab+h+ring dang brtsa
403'b3(rgyud): gsan pad dang y-i/ ching ngas pa y-i ga/sa sa r+b+bas rten rgyun dbang bad+mar mnas//rnams cad sta m+b+hi /rgyug gas//ra la bdag pa zugs pad pa/
403'b4(rgyud): zung du ba zhing bzhugs pa'o//ras ris 'di na mdzong y-is//rtag pa'i bsod nams the'i par 'gyur//mchod pa dang ni po rtag pa gyis//mchog tu dga' bo'i thar pa zag/
403'b5(rgyud): zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungaso//de ltar mchog tu dga' ba rab tu 'dod pa ni//mchog tu dga' ba dam pa'i dngos grub 'gyur//gsal zhing rgyal ba'i
403'b6(rgyud): rak+Sha ris chen po 'di//thams cad gzigs rnams mchod pa chen po'i dpal 'dis rol//'khor lo de ni brtag byasta nas//mchog tu gsang pa'i dkyil la bar ni//rnam par das
403'b7(rgyud): pa'i khang bar ram//yang na skyed mos tshal sogs//de bzhin gshegs mchog chen po yi//ras ris rgyal po sogs kyis rgyan//dril bu dang bcas yid dga' ba'i//bla res du /
404a1(rgyud): /bas mchog gyur pa'i//rdo rta g+hA yi mchod tshogs dang //glu dang rol mos rnam 'phrul pa//me tog spos sogs rab sbyor ba//mar mo'i sbyor bas yang
404a2(rgyud): dag mchod//khang pa gsum rtsegs dkyil 'khor du//mchog gi gsang ba baid+hU pa bar bya//yang ni bdag nyid kho na mchog/rang gi lhag pa'i lhar bsgom bya//de
404a3(rgyud): nas 'khor lor ma zhugs kyang //rang nyid kyis ni rtagazhugs nas//rdo rje kun 'chang slob dpon ni//dngos grub kun la grub par 'gyur//rang nyid khrus byas dri zhom bsgos/
404a4(rgyud): ci rnyed rgyun dreng gos dang ldan//sna tshogs gos kyis yang dag klubs//phreng bcas khe ni dri zhim pa//rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis//me tog spros dang dri snod bcas/
404a5(rgyud): rdo rje glu ni 'di dag gis//gar byeng grong khyer 'jug par bya//dri la mchog tu gsang ba'i dpal dam tshig gsum 'jug la mchog tu gsang ba'i klu'i mchod pa mchog tu
404a6(rgyud): grub pa 'di yin te//dngos grub kun gyi bde ba nyams dgo' bu'i//thar pa'i grong du bcom ldan bde chen 'jug/mchog tu bde ba dam pa'i dngos grub kyis//dzaHhUM
404a7(rgyud): bi hoHrab tu grub par mdzod//rab tu zhugs te g.yon pa yis//rdo rje mig gis mgon la 'dud//g.yon pa bsnyems pa cung zad bzhad//bstod cing mdzes pa'i mig gri
404b1(rgyud): btsums pa de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pas ma ma tshig gsum gyi phyag 'tshal ba'i me tog gi sil mdor ba'i mchog tu gsung ba rdo rje klu'i mchod pa mchog tu grub pa 'di yin te
404b2(rgyud): mchog tu bde ba'i sems na rol par ldan//sgeg pa'i phyag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'dud//dz+dzaHhUM baM hoH/hi hi hi hi hi/mgon po snyim pa'i me tog bri zhesu gsol//de nas/
404b3(rgyud): me tog snrel mdor//rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur bas//rdo rje dril bu'i byeg rgya drang //ldan pa'i 'od gsal sbyar bar bya//de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig
404b4(rgyud): gsum gyi rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bsgyur ba'i mchog tu gasdang ba'i rdo rje'i klu'i mchod pa mchog tu grub pa 'di yin te/AM sangs rgyas kun ldan rin chen mchog gis rgyun//
404b5(rgyud): lha yi cod phrin dang bcas khyod la 'dud//rdo rje 'chang bdag rin chen dbang bsgyur bas//sems dpa' sa ma yA s+t+waM hUM//de nyid kyis ni rdo rje bzung //chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya//
404b6(rgyud): dam tshig gris ni phyag rgya cher//byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzlas//rdo rje lnga sogs thob pazung bas//rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa 'dra//rdo rje thams cad 'dzin rgyal po/
404b7(rgyud): rdo rje can gyis byin gyis brlabs//'gyur zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyis bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa'i sgrub pa gcig pu'i cho ga mchog
405a1(rgyud): tu grub pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung so//de nas 'dir grub bshad bya ba//dngos grub shin tu brtag pa yang //gang gis sgrub pa dam
405a2(rgyud): pa dang //sdig chen byed pa rnams kyang ni//rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa bzhin//ma sgrub rnams kyang grub par 'gyur//lugs ma 'am ni brdungs pa 'am//'dus byas pa 'am bris
405a3(rgyud): pa'am//dang po'i sems dpa' bzhugs gsol nas//de yi mdun du cho ga bzhin//rtag tu rdo rje dril 'chang zhing //dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya//thams cad dgug
405a4(rgyud): dang mchod pa che//bdag byin rlab sogs sgrub rnamaso//de la ci ltar mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi dngos grub thams cad dgug pa'i rgyu ni 'di yin te/
405a5(rgyud): rang lhag lha yi skor ba las//thams cad dgug pa'i sbyor ba las//yan lag mchog gi rol bcas pas//gar bya zhing ni dgug par bya//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
405a6(rgyud): cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi glu'i mchod pa ni 'di yin te/dza mchog dang po'i rdo rje 'chang ba rdo rje sems dpa' bde rtogs rab tu dga' ba
405a7(rgyud): khyod bdag sangs rgyas so sor rtogs//hUM mchog rdo rje las ri mchog tu zad med srid pa mi 'gyur bde dang yid bde dam tshig bdag la de grub mdzod//bam mchog bdag gi
405b1(rgyud): sku 'dzin rnal 'byor thams cad rnam rgyal bsgreng ba rab mchog dag pa bde bar 'gyur ba'i pad+ma'i rgyal po kye/ho rab mchog gi ni mchog pa dngos grub dam pa thams cad dbang phyug
405b2(rgyud): dam par bdag sbyor cig/rtag par bdag 'phel na mkha'i snying po khyod//hu lu hu lu'i sgrub pas dbab par mdzod//dam tshig chen pos yang dag dgug pa khyod//de bzhin gshegs
405b3(rgyud): pa kun gyi dam tshig ste//rab tu dga' ba mchog dang po//de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi dngos grub thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po'i cho ga ji ltar yin/
405b4(rgyud): rang lha'i rnal 'byor ci bzhin du//mchod pa kun mchog sku rnams kyis//rol mo'i rnam 'phrul gyis rjes mchod//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchog gi dngos grub/
405b5(rgyud): kyi mchod pa chen po'i cho ga'i mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi rdo rje'i glu'i mchod pa ni 'di yin te//thams cad rje su chags pa bde ba dam pa'i thugs//rdo rje sems dpa' khyod na
405b6(rgyud): rab tu dga' ba yin//bde ba chen po gsal mthong bdag la brtan gyur cig/myur du so sor mkhyen nas rab tu 'dod pa bsgrubs//de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal//dam
405b7(rgyud): tshig gsum gyi dngos grub thams cad byin gyis brlabs kyis sgrub pa chen po ci ltar ya ni//rang lha'i sbyor ba ci bzhin du//phyag rgya kun gyis byin rlabs pas//de nyid chen po'i
406a1(rgyud): mchog gis ni//rang nyid bsgrubs te snying po bzla//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub byin gyis brlabs pa'i
406a2(rgyud): gsang ba chen po dam pa'i dam tshig gi rdo rje'i glu'i ma chod pa mchog tu grub pa ni 'di yin te/oM na mkha' skye ba mtshan ldan phyir//thog ma tha mo med pa'i mchog/sems/
406a3(rgyud): dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin//rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod//kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste//dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha//rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal//mi 'gyur/
406a4(rgyud): mchog tu bdag grub mdzod//nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa khyod//'dod chags kyis ni rjes chags pa//'dod pa chen po dga' ba che//bcom ldan de nyid kyis grub mdzod//shin tu
406a5(rgyud): dag pa kun gyi mchog/gdong nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs//kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid//byang chub sems dpar bdag grub mjed//dngos grub chen po kun gyi
406a6(rgyud): mchog/dbang phyug chen po phyag rgya'i mchog/grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pas//rdo rje bsnyems bdag bdag mdzod cig/dpal mchog dang po'i bcom ldan khyed//
406a7(rgyud): gang gis don dang glu yis bstod//de ni dngos grub kun gyi mchog/dbang phyug chen po nyid grub 'gyur//zhes bya ba mchog gi de kho na nyid kyis mchog tu gsang
406b1(rgyud): bo'i glu tshun po mchog tu grub pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs//dngos grub rgya klu 'di ni//rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag rtags//kun mchog dngos grub
406b2(rgyud): chen po yi//dbang phyug nyid ni rab sgrub pa'i//kun nas 'od zer ston sogs dang //so sor ston pa'i rmed byung rnams//rdo rje'i tshig gis rang lha las//ngo mi tshur
406b3(rgyud): gyur rnams mthong bar gyur//rtog pa kun gyis sna tshogs che//dngos grub dbang phyug bde rnams kyis//myur du rang gi byin rlabs pas//rdo rje slob dpon gyis thob bya
406b4(rgyud): zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' ma cho ga dang pos gsungs//de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gi lha thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis
406b5(rgyud): brlabs pa'i sgrub pa chen po'i rgyud ci ltar yin//rang lha rnal 'byor ci bzhin du//lta kun bdag nyid sku rnams kyis//rang lha rnal 'byor bdag nyid kyis//rong lhag lha
406b6(rgyud): nyid bsgrub par bya//de nus mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal du ma tshig gsum gyi kun mchog dngos grub chen po'i dbang phyug chen po'i bdag nyid la sogs pa'i dngos
406b7(rgyud): grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs mchog tu mi 'gyur ba dam pa bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba bde ba dam pa dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa'i
407a1(rgyud): cho ga rgyas brjes sgrub pa ni 'di yin to//rang lha'i rnal 'byor ci bzhin du//rdo rje kun mchog thu rnams kyis//glu dang rom mo'i cho ga no//rdo rje nyid kyis rdzas
407a2(rgyud): chags 'gyur//rang lha'i sbyor ba bzhin du//dbyangs kyi zla ba rnams sod pas//glu dang ri'i mo'i tsho ba ni//dril bu nyid kyis rje suM brjod//rang lha'i b+hu re ba ji bzhin du/
407a3(rgyud): rna tshogs phyug rgyu'i bdag po mchog/glu dang rol mo'i cho ga ni//dam tshig gis ni rjes bsgrub bya//de yi rtag pa thams cad la//rdo rje 'dengs pa rab srid byas//
407a4(rgyud): gais+t+ra paM dam che ba ni//thams cad bzhi 'gyur 'grub par 'gyur//mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i'o dngul//dam tshig gsum gyi glu chen po dang /rol mo'i cho ga mchogs
407a5(rgyud): tu gsang ba mchog tu grub pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungaso//de nas rdo rjes gnas ji bzhin//ji snyed pa ni ci bde bas//me tog spos kyis mchod nas ni//
407a6(rgyud): khangadra pa 'am skyes mos tshal sogasu//bdag nyid ci 'dod rab bsgrubs nas//tsa snyed rkyen dang gos dang ldan//sna tshogs gos kyis yang dag klubs//me tog phreng bcas
407a7(rgyud): kha dri zhim//lugs ma 'am ni brdungs pa'am//'dus pa'am ri mor bri//dang po'i 'khor lo de mdun du//tshig bzhin du bshugs gsol nas//rang lha'i rnal 'byor ci
407b1(rgyud): nadu//rdo rdo dril bu rab sad pas//thams cad dgug dang mchod pa che//bdag byin rlab sogs bsgrub par bya//sngon du ldan gcig bsgrubs byas nas//de nas de rjes ci 'dod//
407b2(rgyud): ba//tsaM 'did ci spyod ci smras pa//thams cad bza' zhing thams cad byed//langs pa 'am ni 'dug pa'am//rab tu dgod dam smra ba'i ma//ci bzhin de bzhin de dang der//
407b3(rgyud): ci 'dod par na ci bzhi ni bzhag/gsang ba mchog gi 'khor lo ni//me tog stsogs kyis mchod nas ni//ci bzhin du ni rjes bslab bya//'dis ni 'dad pa kun dbang phyug/
407b4(rgyud): 'gro dang 'od dang 'dod na 'phur//dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug 'grub//rga shi med pa'i gtso bor 'gyur//rdo rje sems dpa' grub chen po//phyag rgya kun gyis dbang phyug bdag
407b5(rgyud): rdo rje kun 'dzin rgyal ba ni//rdo rje mtshon cha thams cad 'dzin//mi thub pa dang mi sor cing //thams cad byed cing kun gyi rten//sems can kun gyi rgyal po che//tshar gcod
407b6(rgyud): rjesu bzung bar nus//kun mchog rje su chags pa che//'dod pa grub pa bde ba mchod//kun las rnam rgyal grub 'gyur te//kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa yin//dngos
407b7(rgyud): grub chen po kun gyi mchog/dbang phyug chen po'i go 'pha' nas//rgyal po rdo rje kun 'dzin pa//sangs rgyas thams cad rab 'grub 'gyur//de ltar mchog tu rjes chags
408a1(rgyud): dga' ba pad+ma'i rA ba che//mchog tu gsang ba grub pa'i bla na med pa'i dngos grub stsal//mchog gi rgyal mtshan spring bas gang zhig rje su bsten pa ste/

408a3(rgyud): pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum dang dngos grub thams cad dgug pa dang mchod pa chen po dang bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'i sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o//

408a5(rgyud): pa'i sems dpa' ni//rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che//kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid//rdo rje snyems tshul bdag po'i bdag/'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das//lhag

408b1(rgyud): dpal mchog dang po las dka' ba chen po'i dpal rdo rje don yod pa'i dga' ba'i dam tshig rnal 'byor thams cad kyi dang phyug de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal rang gi dam tshig

408b3(rgyud): bzung ba bshad par bya'o//zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung so//de la dang po kho nar re shig de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i
408b4(rgyud): sngags 'di lan gcig brjod pas sems bskyed du bcug ste/oM sarba yo ga tsit+taM ud pA da yA mi/'di brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mi 'bral
408b5(rgyud): zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang /bdud thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i phyag rgya byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du yang rtogs par bya'o zhes bya ba yang gsung so///
408b6(rgyud): byang chub sems ni bla med pa//mchog tu bskyed par byas nas ni//snying khar rdo rje rab bzhag nas//su ra ta sa ma ya s+t+waM ho//snying po rdo rje ci der sgrub//'di yis rdo rje bskul ba
408b7(rgyud): no//'dod pa kun las 'grub par 'gyur//de nyid bskul bas myur du ni//byang chub sems ni rab bla na med pa//kun mchog dngos grub chen po'i phyir//rdo rje sems dpa' nyid
409a1(rgyud): du 'gyur//nas bya ba'i mchog bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung so//gar b+has sti bor thul mo snyam/gos kyis gdong ni g.yogs pa rnams
409a2(rgyud): 'dod dngos grub 'dod pa yis//slong ma thams cad gzhug par bya//ci 'dod dngos grub sems dpa' yis//slob ma me tog der du gzhug/bya ba rgya gang la de bcas
409a3(rgyud): pa'o//de de'i lha mo bsgrub par bya//de nas gdong g.yogs dkrol byas la//rnam pa kun gyi yon blangs nas//sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur gyis//dam tshig
409a4(rgyud): gsum ni gasngal bar sbyin//de la rdo rje chen po mna'i chus dbang bskor de 'di ltar brjod par bya'o//'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu//dam tshig 'das na sreg par
409a5(rgyud): byed//dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni//rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis 'grub//rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya ni//gal te dkyil 'khor mthong smraso//skye bo 'dus pa'i
409a6(rgyud): nang na gnas//dad pa med pas bzhad gang smod//zhes bya ba muna' bsgag go//de la sangs rgyas kyi rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/rdo rje chu
409a7(rgyud): yis dbang bskur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog dbang bskur ba'i gnas su bzhag ste//oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA sa ma ya/a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM/
409b1(rgyud): sar+b+ba r+m+mA r+N+Na sa r+b+ba sdug dun du rnams tu pa sgyu//'du sa sa sa spyod// nga ga / sum dun

409b3(rgyud): bude 'di yin te/oM badz+ra kar+m+ma bad+d+hi d+hi shrI badz+ra nA ma snyid d+ha sA ma ya s+t+wa~M/b+hur b+hu baHglang la rdo rje'i ming btags pa de la kye'i sgra dang por sbyar bar bya'o//
409b4(rgyud): de'i ming de yang ci snang byang chub snying po'i mther thug pa'i bar gyi/de bzhin gshegs pa yi yang ming du 'gyur ro//de la mchog tu gsang ba dam po'i dpal dmatshig
