409b6(rgyud): badz+ra/rjes bya ba bcom ldan 'das dang lnga mchog dang po'i skyes bu mchog gi de khon nyid gsang ba lnga'i du kho na nyid ba shad par byas nas rdo rje sbyin par bya'o//'di btsan+da
409b7(rgyud): ldan 'das sring po'i bdag pa dam pa kun gyi mchog/dbang phyug gi dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid chos kyi mchog gi bka' yang dag par grol bar mdzad pa ni//srid
410a1(rgyud): pa'i rang bzhin gyi ni dag/rang bzhin gyis ni srid bral byas//rang bzhin dgu pa'i sems dpa' mchog/srid pa'i mchog ni mdzad pa
410a2(rgyud): yin//mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid 'bebs pa ni dril bu'o//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa bya ba 'am/lha sgrub pa dkrol bar bya'o//de nas
410a3(rgyud): chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rab tu sad pa'i phab pa rnams kyis sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa yin no//rdo rje thams cad 'bebs par byed pa dang /rab tu
410a4(rgyud): sgrub par byed pa dang /dbang du byed pa dang /rab tu dang bar byed pa zhes bya ba sgrib par 'gyur ro//de nas srid pa dge pa'i thabs kyi mchog rtog pa thams cad kyi gsang
410a5(rgyud): bi chen po dam tshig la rtag tu bsten par bya'o zhes bya ba'o//de la 'di ni deng khyod kyi//srid bde shin tu gyur pa ni//sdug bsngal chen po dag bya'i phyir//shin tu bde
410a6(rgyud): ba dam pa'i thabs//dam tshig 'di ni rtag tu bskyed//'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la//ci 'dod par ni rten bzhin du//rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis//bdag dang
410a7(rgyud): gzhan la mchod par bya//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i mchog tu gsang ba'i theg pa chen po'i yang chen po dam tshig gi sgyu ra ba ni/bcom ldan
410b1(rgyud): 'das dam tshig go/'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis kyang //'da' ba ru ni mI mdzad pas//phyag rgya dmajug ces ni dablags//yid kyi spyanI brtan phyir ro//zhes
410b2(rgyud): bya ba mchog tu gsung ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//de la 'di brjod par bya ste//ci srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni//mdzes mchog 'dug par
410b3(rgyud): gyur pa'i tshe//ci srid mtshungs med sems can don//mya ngan mo 'da' byed par nus//gsang ba dom pa dam tshig thubs//bsod nams byin gyis brlabs bsgrub pa//rtag
410b4(rgyud): tu dngos grub kun dbang phyug/sems can don ni byed pa yin//dam tshig 'dis ni bdag sgrub cing //ci bde bar ni sgrub byed pa//nyes pa spyad kyang sdig kun gyis//rnam
410b5(rgyud): pa kun tu gnod mi 'gyur//'dod pa chen po sgrub par 'gyur//kun bdag dam tshig dbang phyug dang //thams cad rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po//kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa'o//
410b6(rgyud): las kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyis//ma lus bsgrubs pas 'grub par 'gyur//bdag gzhan thams cad rgyas btab pas//yang na bsgrub bya kun la yang //don yod mtshan
410b7(rgyud): tu grub par 'gyur//rnal 'byor thams cad rjes sgrub byed//dpal ldan sdug bsngal kun 'phrog byed//dam tshig 'di ni 'da' bar dka' ba'o//zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang
411a1(rgyud): /bya bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//rdo rje la sogs thob 'dzin pas//dngos po kun gyi bde ba kun//phab pas
411a2(rgyud): rdo rje slob ma yis//dkyil 'khor du ni nyams su myong //de nas thams cad gzangs bstod pas//sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid dngos//rdo rje'i ming gis dbang
411a3(rgyud): bskur bas//de bzhin gshegs ni lung bston bya//de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lung bston pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i tshig 'di yin te/sangs rgyas
411a4(rgyud): kun gyi bstan pa che//gzengs bstod pa yis gang lung bstan//de ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid//rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba'o//aM 'di ni ngas khyod lung bstan
411a5(rgyud): to//rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir//srid pa'i ngan 'gro las khyod bton//he badz+ra nA maHta thA ga ta sod d+ha sa ma yo s+t+waM/b+hur
411a6(rgyud): b+hu ba rtsa swaHgang la gzengs bstod pa 'di dang //phyag rgya chen pos lung bstan mchog tu gsang ba'i cho gas byas pa de la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
411a7(rgyud): pa thams cad dang /rdo rje 'chang dang bcas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rang gi dam tshig gi slob
411b1(rgyud): dpon rnams dang //mgron gcig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lung bstan par mdzad do//'di lta ste/gzengs bstod pa 'di nyid kyi phyag rgya chen po
411b2(rgyud): dang /mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dngos grub kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'odi dang /sngags kyi stobs las dad par bya'o//de nas ci lta ba bzhin du zhugs pa rnams
411b3(rgyud): la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa la/sogs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba sbyin par bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje 'tshang dang bcas pa
411b4(rgyud): ji snyed pa/byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa gang yin pa/de dag thams cad rang gi dam tshig la rjes su chags pa 'dir dgug pa dang /
411b5(rgyud): rab tu zhugs pa dang /dbang du bya ba dang /sgrub pa dang /rjes su sgrub pa rnams kyis rdo rje'i dbyings thams cad bstan par 'gyur ba nyid kyis 'od brtan par
411b6(rgyud): 'gyur ba chos kyi dbyings thams cad kun tu khyab pa nyid kyis kun tu zhugs pa/nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyis rgya che ba nyid kyis 'dir rab tu bzhugs
411b7(rgyud): zhing /legs par rab tu bzhugs pa gang yin pa de dang de dag/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi dam tshig la rag las pa'i de bzhin gshegs
412a1(rgyud): pa nyid la lhug par dmigs nas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon de bzhin pashegs pa thams
412a2(rgyud): cad 'di yin no//zhes bya ba byin gyis brlabs nas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon gyis/ngam tshig gis mgrin
412a3(rgyud): gcig tu khyed rnams las dbugs dbyung ba mdzad pa yin te/dang par bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dbugs dbyung ba 'di
412a4(rgyud): yin te/gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni//mthong ba dang ni zhugs pas stong //sdig pa kun las nges grol zhing //khyed rnams 'dir ni legs par gnas//bde
412a5(rgyud): chen thob pa 'di las ni//slar 'chi ba ni yod min te//mi tshugs pa dang mi song bas//ces kyang mi 'jigs rol par gyis//srid pa'i sdug bsngal ldog pa ni//
412a6(rgyud): srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir//ston pa mchog tu gyur pa khyod//srid pa shin tu grub pa yin//dam tshig sdom pa grub pa 'di//khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar bya//sangs
412a7(rgyud): rgyas kun gyis 'thun par gsungs//dam pa brtag pa'i bka' yin no//gang zhig bskyed pa tsam gyis ni//sangs rgyas nyid du dogs med pa'o//byang chub sems
412b1(rgyud): ni btang mi bya//phyag rgya rdo rje gang yin pa'o//dam pa'i chos ni mi smad cing //nam yang btang bar mi bya'o//mi shes pa dang rmongs pa yis//de ni smad par mi bya'o//
412b2(rgyud): rang gi bdag nyid yongs spangs nas//bka' thub rnams kyis gdung mi bya//ci bde bar ni bde bar gzung //'di ni ma byon rdzogs sangs rgyas//rdo rje dril
412b3(rgyud): bu'i phyag rgya rnams//nam yang yongs su spang mi bya//slob dpon smad par mi bya ste//'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang 'dra//sangs rgyas kun mtshungs bla ma yi//slob
412b4(rgyud): dpen la ni gang smad pa//des ni sangs rgyas kun smad pas//rtag tu sdug bsngal thob 'gyur te//rims dang dug dang sbyar dug dang //mkha' 'gro rnams kyis gtses
412b5(rgyud): pa dang //gdon dang log 'dren gtum po yis//bsad nas sems can da mya le bar ltung //de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis//rdo rje slob dpon blo gros che//dge ba
412b6(rgyud): rab tu mi spyoms pa//nam yang smad par mi bya'o//bla ma la ni gus bcus yin//rjes 'thun khyod kyi sbyin par bya//des ni rims sogs gnod pa rnams//phyir
412b7(rgyud): zhing 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//rang gi dam tshig slob dpon ni//sbyin min bu dang chung ma dang //ring srog gis brtags bsten bya na//longs spyod g.yo ba smos ci dgos//
413a1(rgyud): gang gis bsgral pa ba na//grangs med par yang rnyed da/'a bu'o//sangs rgyas nyid//brtson ldan ma/'di nyid la sbyor bar rgyung
413a2(rgyud): rtag tu rang gi dmache ba snang //rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mchod//rtag tu bla ma la yang mchod//'di ni sangs rgyas kun dang 'dre//de byin sangs rgyas thams
413a3(rgyud): la//rtag tu byin pa nyid du 'gyur//de d+hin bsod nams tshogs yin te//chags las dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur//de phyir 'di ni legs gnas pas//deng khyod
413a4(rgyud): skye ba 'bras bur bcas//rang byung dum tshig lha dang mnyam//deng da gyur pa the tshom med//sangs rgyas rje 'dzin bcas pa//kun gyis dang khyod dbang bsgyur
413a5(rgyud): sa//khams gsum gyi ni rgyu \u0f7f//rgyal po bdag por bstan po rten//da ni bdud las rnam rgyal to//grong khyer mchog tu rab tu zhugs//khyed na ma
413a6(rgyud): ni sangs rgyas nyid//deng 'dir thob pa the tshom med//ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /rdo rje 'chung dong /byang chub sems dpa' tshon pa'i 'khor
413a7(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu bden pas gsung so//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang
413b1(rgyud): bde bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dpal rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon dang /slob ma'i tshogs rnams kyis dbugs dbyeng ba ni 'di yin te/phyir mi ldog pa'i
413b2(rgyud): byug rgyu yis//byang chub sems dang sbyin cig bskyed//sangs rgyas nyid ni rtags bya ste//zhes bya ba'o//de'i rgyu gang yin rten/ga gI phyir khyod rnams kyi bdag
413b3(rgyud): nyid thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed pa tsam gyis/mthu nyid kyis phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba yin no//phyir mi ldog pa nyid kyi phyir/nges pa'i phung
413b4(rgyud): la rnam par gnas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa nyid/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs
413b5(rgyud): rgyas par rjes su rtogs par bya'o//zhes bya'o//de nas thams cad kyi dpal dam tshig gi slob dpon gyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dbugs dbyung ba yin te/rdo rje sems
413b6(rgyud): dpa'i bdag sbyor ba//rnal 'byor kun dang rjes sbyor ldan//sangs rgyas nyid du rtogs bya ste//mkhas pa mchog tu brtag pa'o//zhes bya'o//de'i rgyu gang yin
413b7(rgyud): zhen/gong gi phyir khyed rnams kyis/bdag nyid thams cad 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi dam tshig yongs su gzung ba gdon mi za ba nyid kyi phyir/
414a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung chub mngon par par sangs rgyas pa nyid du rtogs par dang /
414a2(rgyud): u zhin pa shegs pazim kyim rtseg tu myed pa 'i ni ni tha~M d-i d-i
414a3(rgyud): yang dag par 'brel bar s+ho//bdag nyid la ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par brtson pade bzhin du gzhan rnams la nA tsha
414a4(rgyud): phyi rol du mu stegs pa dang /nyan thos thams cad dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung bas 'di shin tu
414b1(rgyud): bsod pa yin no//ngag ni shin tu mi smra bas so//sems ni shin tu 'gags pas so//gang gis kyang khyod kyi lus ngag/yid gsum gyi rdo rje rnams de bzhin gshegs
414b2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dpal rang gi dam tshig bla na med pa'i dngos grub mchog tu rtogs par 'gyur//zhes bya ba yang gsungs so//'dod pa'i longs/
414b3(rgyud): spyod thams cad kyis//ces kyang mi 'jigs rol par gyis//dam tshig 'di ni 'da' dka' ste//sdig pa med kyis ma 'jigs shig/ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems
414b4(rgyud): dpa' mchog tu bden pas gsungs so//byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis thugs la dgongs pa yino//
414b5(rgyud): de ltar yid ni rab dang rdo rje nyid du gyis//rang gi dam+ba tshig mi zad bde ster bsten par gyis//deng ni 'gro ba myur ba rdo rje sems dpa' dang //rab tu mnyam zhing rtog pa nyid
414b6(rgyud): du dogs par gyis//de nas ro dang bza' ba spyod klu//rol mo'i mchod sogs kyis ni mgon mchod la//rdo rje bla ma chen po bde phul nas//rang dang gzhan dag ci 'dod/
414b7(rgyud): mchod par gyis//myos byed myos bral btung po ni//ci 'dod pas ni bstan pa yis//glu dang rol mo'i cho ga sogs//ji bzhin rjes 'gro'i bzlas pa bya//rang gsang tsha
415a1(rgyud): gas blangs pa yi//glu dang rol myo gar rnamasak+Shi//sna tshogs phyag rgya'i mchod pa dang //rdo rje sems dpa'i rol mo sogs//bud no
415a2(rgyud): sogs dang ldan pa 'am//rang gi slob ma dang bcas pa//ci 'dod pa yi longs spyod kyis//mchod pa byas pas myur du 'grub//ces bya ba mchog tu gsung ba btsam
415a3(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//de la gsang ba'i cho ga'i khyad par ni 'di yin te//hUM bcom ldan 'das mchog dang po'i rdo rje sems dpa'i 'o//a daM
415a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi'o//hi dpal 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'o//oM pad+ma'i snying po'i 'o//hA nam mkha'i snying po ste/byang chub sems
415a5(rgyud): dpa' chen po'i rgyal po nam mkha'i snying po yin no//zhes bya ba gsungs so//rang gsang snying po'i glu dag ni/yi ge lnga pos bya ba ste//rang gsang tshogs blangs
415a6(rgyud): bya 'di//mchog tu gshegs pa kun gyi yin//de nas mchog tu gsang ba rdo rje glu yi mchod pa ni//rdo rje dril bu mnyam sogs bcas//rnam par dben par
415a7(rgyud): ros mo dkrol//rang gsang tshogs glu blangs pa//gsang ba'i rol ma rab tu sgrub//de nas mchog tu shin tu gsang ba'i rdo rje gar gyi mchad pa ni//'dzin pa dang
415b1(rgyud): bcas bzung ba che'i//bgyi ba rab tu byas nas kyang //dkyil 'khor 'dra ba'i gar byas nas//yongs su bskor bas rab mchod bya//de na sa mchog tu gsang ba'i phyag rgya sna
415b2(rgyud): tshogs pa'i mchod pa ni//rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs lha'i//rtog pa thams cad rnam 'phrul pa//gtam brgyud phyag mtshan phyag rgya yis//gang zhig gar do rol ma yin//
415b3(rgyud): gser rab yang na dngul dang ni//de bzhin shing las byas pa yi//rang gi lha yi gdong rnams kyis//grub pa'i phyag rgyas gar rnams bya//dkyil 'khor gang dang gang brten
415b4(rgyud): pa//phyag rgya sna tshogs mchod pa yis//slob ma'i tshogs ni de dang de//bzla zhing thams cad mchog tu gzhug/sna tshogs cho ga 'dadi yis ni//sdig pa kun las
415b5(rgyud): rnam grol 'gyur//bsod nams kun kyang 'phel 'gyur te//rtag tu srung bar 'gyur ba yin//rims dang gdon dang dug dang nad//sbyar drug mkha' 'gro'i
415b6(rgyud): 'tshe ba dang //bdud dang gsod par byed pa rnams//'di ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur//dngos grub dag ni phun sum tshogs//dga' ba de bzhin bdag po rnams//
415b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyis//rnal 'byor dam pa thob par 'gyur//zhes bya ba shin tu gsang ba'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//
416a1(rgyud): de nas phyag rgya sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa//lhag pa'i lha thams cad re re'i mchog gsang 'jug pa'i rdo rje glu'i mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa
416a2(rgyud): mngon par brjod nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis byas pa 'am//de las gzhan ci 'dod pa'i glu rol mo rnams kyis rtog pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i dam tshig chen po'i mchog
416a3(rgyud): tu grub pa zhes bya ba ste/der re shig thog ma kho nar bcom ldan 'das dpal mchog dang pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi 'jug pa'i glu'i mchod pa ni/
416a4(rgyud): thams cad rje su chags pa bde ba dam pa'i thugs//rdo rje sems dpa'i khyod ni rab dga' dam tshig ste//bde ba chen po brtan zhing mtho ba gsal gyur cig/so sor rtogs
416a5(rgyud): nas mngon du phyogs shing myur du bdag bsgrubs shig/de nus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rigs kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi 'jug pa'i rdo rje glu'i
416a6(rgyud): mchod pani/rdo rje sems dpa' bsdusaM pas nas//rdo rje rin chen bla na med//rdo rje chos ni glur blangs pas//rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur//de nas rdo rje rigs
416a7(rgyud): da kyi mchog tu gseng ba dam tshig gi 'dun pa dun klu'i mchod du na/hUM rdo rje meda' gzhi dang bcas khyod la 'dud//rdo rje chags pa'i dam tshig dpe'i khyod 'du/
416b1(rgyud): kha T+wAM 'jig dus rdo rje khyod la 'dud//rdo rje dril bu bskyod pa'i dpal khyod 'dud//de nas pad mo'i rigs thams cad mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi/'jug pa'i
416b2(rgyud): rdo rje glu'i mchod pa ni//la lar skye bo ma rungs pa yi srog 'phrog byed pa shin tu drag po'i sku//la lar 'gro ba mtha' yas 'dul phyir shin tu rno ba'i 'khor lo 'dzin
416b3(rgyud): ba'i sku//laM lar pad ma'i gdan gyi shin tu zhi ba'i sku ste 'gyur ba med pa ste//lA lar shin tu 'bar ba'i 'dod pa'i dam tshig pad ma'i rgyal po
416b4(rgyud): bdage bsgrubs shig/de nas nor bu'i rigs thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi 'jug pa rdo rje glu'i mchod pa ni//dbang
416b5(rgyud): bskur thams cad dbang phyug dam pa las//yang dag bsgrubs shing mi zad gter gyi mchog/kun mchog rgyal mtshan rnam rgyal
416b6(rgyud): sgreng ba las/rdo rje rin chen dpal dag legs mchod la gyur/de nas rang mying ga sum ni b+hur b+hu bswade nas
416b7(rgyud): sring mo bzhi rnams kyis ts+tshi hUM shrI b+h+yo//de nas klu'i rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ni phu phu/de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon
417a1(rgyud): chen po lag na rdo rje'i sdig pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rdo rje'i glu'i mchod pa ni/sarna ma ga maN+Dal ma bad+d+ha d+ha rak+Sha ma bi mdza b+h+rik+Shidza b+hi kA ra b+hu b+h+yar+b+ha ungs
417a2(rgyud): da ya/ nA sha ya/ha na da ha/pa tsa b+h+yAM smai ku ru kro d+ha hUM ka rA man+t+ri na/de nas thams cad kyi mchog dbang phyug dam pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi rdo rje glub
417a3(rgyud): mchod pa ni/la lar dri med zla ba'i dkyil 'khor snying gi 'od kyi sku ni rnam par mdzes//la lar 'jig dus nyi ma 'char ka byed pa'i 'od zer tshogs ni 'jigs chen 'bar//la lar
417a4(rgyud): mdangs dang 'od zer dang ldan bde zhing zhi ba'i rgyal po'i sku 'dzin pa//la lar shin tu mdzes pa'i gzugs 'chang mchog gi mda' dang bcas pa'i gzhu 'dzin pa//la lar gdul bya rnam
417a5(rgyud): par sbyang phyir brtson pa'i rdo rje sems khyod mkha' bzhin bzhugs//ma lus 'dul ba mkhas pa'i bde ba dam pa nyid phyir bdag la 'grub gyur cig/de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga dam
417a6(rgyud): pa'i gsang ba'i mchog dpal dam tshig gsum gyi mjug pa'i rdo rje glu'i mchog tu grub pa ni 'di yin te/dngos grub kun gyi bde ba nyams dga' ba'i//thar pa'i grong khyer bcom ldan
417a7(rgyud): bde chen 'jug/mchog tu bde ba dam pa'i dngos grub kyis//dzaHhUM baM hoHrab tu grub par mdzod/de nas shin tu mchab tu gsang ba'i cho ga mchog tu gsang ba bla na med pa'i dam pa'i
417b1(rgyud): dpal dam tshig bla na med pa'i mchog shin tu gsang ba'i rdo rje'i glu'i mchod pa mchog tu shin tu grub pa zhes bya ba mngon par brjod nas shin tu mchog gang kho na nyid kyi rdo rje'i mchod pa'i glu
417b2(rgyud): dang gar dang cho gas ci lta ba bzhin du rjes su bsgrubs nas so sor rjes su bsgrub par bya'o//zhes bya ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu shin tu gsang ba bla na med
417b3(rgyud): pa'i rtog pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i dam tshig chen po'i mchod pa mchog tu grub pa yin no//zhes bya bar yang gsungs so//sna tshogs cho ga 'di yi ni//rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa
417b4(rgyud): yin//kun mchog sna tshogs chen po yi//rnal 'byor dbang phyug rab tu grub//ces bya ba shin tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//de ltar dpal mchog
417b5(rgyud): dang po'i rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas pa gtam brgyud sna tshogs can/mchog tu gseng ba'i rol mo bla na med pa'i dngos grub nyams dang ldan pa ste/gang gis sna tshogs pa'i rgyal mtshan mthon
417b6(rgyud): po dang ldan pa/kun tu rjes su bsten pa mchog gi dngos grub bde ba chen po nyid ni/de yis yang dag nyams su myong //don yod mchog tu bsod nams ldan//cho ga mchog tu brtag
417b7(rgyud): pa ste//kun mchog gsang ba chen po ni//dngos grub thams cad myur grub byed//gang zhig grong mchog rab dgyes par//zhugs te sgrub par byed pa ni//shin tu mchog gi 'dod pa
418a1(rgyud): //yi//dngos grub dbang phyug bde des thob//gang gis dngos grub ma thob na//bsod nams phun tshogs byed pa rnams//dkyil 'khor mchog tu rab zhugs na//sgrub
418a2(rgyud): po 'di ni rab grub 'gyur//gral te rdo rje sems dpa' mchog/nye ba'i snying pos bsgrubs byas kyang //ma grub 'dir zhubs grub par 'gyur//dpal mchog dang po'i rtswa rgyud du//de
418a3(rgyud): bzhin myur du grub pa min//ci ltar dang po'i khyim zhugs nas//rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor grub pa ltar//dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub pa yis//de ltar thams cad grub pa min//ci ltar
418a4(rgyud): mchog tu gsar ba yis//khang bzang dam pa mthong ba yis//dam tshig rnams las nyams pa dang //sgrib pa kun gyis bsgribs pa dang //bdud sogs gdon gyis reg pa yang //rtag pa'i
418a5(rgyud): thar pa thob par 'gyur//dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs pa 'am//yang na dkyil 'khor ma grub pa//slar yang mchog tu rab zhugs na//de dag myur du grub par 'gyur//sgrub min 'di ni cung zad
418a6(rgyud): med//dngos grub las dang bde de bzhin//dngos grub thams cad bzhin 'gyur du//rtog pa kun las bsgrub par bya zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//
418a7(rgyud): dpal mchog dang po las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga shin tu gsang ba rdzogs so///de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
418b1(rgyud): cad kyi 'jig rten gsum gyi dam tshib mchog gi gsang ba'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te//dam tshig chen po gsum 'di yin te//byang chub sems dpa' mchog
418b2(rgyud): 'dzin pa'i//ras la dkon mchog gsum bri bya//go cha dang bcus rdo rje mchog/go cha sogs kyis legs par rgyan//rdo rje mtshon cha brjod pa dang //pad+ma rin chen 'chang ba'o//'khor lo
418b3(rgyud): de ni btags nas su//gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa'o//ci rigs par ni bsgrubs byas nas//sum 'gyur du ni 'grub par 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen
418b4(rgyud): po zhes bya ba'i snying po mchog gi dngos grub ma lus pa ster ba 'di yin te/oM b+hu khaM/khyim nam yang na nags tshal lam//snga ma bzhin du rgyun nas ni//mtshon cha mchog gi cho ga yis//
418b5(rgyud): thams cad byas la 'di brjod bya//de nyid kyis ni bcom ldan 'das//byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//lta ngan rnams la phan pa'i phyir//'di dag mya ngan 'das pa ston//ma
418b6(rgyud): lus 'dul ba la brtson pa sdu//brtan zhing nges pa'i cho ga dgos//shin tu srid pa la gnas mchog/cho ga la sogs dgos pa yin//sangs rgyas chos drang dge 'dun zhes//dkon
418b7(rgyud): mchog gsum du 'gyur ba yin//srid pa shin tu grub pa yis//rnam par dag pa'i dpal mdzad mchog/ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i rdo rje'o//
419a1(rgyud): de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid kyi dril bu ni/thams cad namapa'i mtshan nyid do//na mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med//na mkha' dang mnyam sbyor ba yis//
419a2(rgyud): kun mchog mnyam pa nyid du gsal//zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//de nas dam tshig chen po gsum gyi sdom pa zhes bya ba ni/longs spyod kun la longs spyod pa//rang
419a3(rgyud): lha bdag nyid kyis bsten na//dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i mchog/bdag gis bya zhes brjod cing mchod//ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor sgrub pa'o//
419a4(rgyud): thabs kyi cho ga 'di yis ni//'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyang //bza' min pa yang bza' byas na//rtag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur//zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa
419a5(rgyud): thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig chen po gsum mo//de ltar brjod nas snying po byin lo/phyag rgya bcing ba slob tu bcug nas ci ltar mngon par 'dod pa bsgrubs par bya'o//
419a6(rgyud): de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa slob dpon gyis//rdo rje mchod pas mchod nas ni//ci 'dod pa yi mchod pa yis//slob ma thams cad mchod du gzhug/longs spyod kun la longs spyod kyang //
419a7(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum po la phul ba//'dod pas bdag kyang gzhan rnams la//mchod pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur//dpal mchog dang po las mchog tu gsang ba'i cha ga'o//
419b1(rgyud): denas rdo rje chen po khro bo'i rgyal po'i mchog tu gsang ba'i cho gra ni/ras la bcom ldan bI bya ste//rdo rje'i ribras kuni bdag po ni//rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar//cho ga ci bzhin mchog
419b2(rgyud): tu'o//de yi pad 'deb gcig bzhugs pa//de yi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rten//gsung ba'i rdo rje'i rnal 'byor che'i//mkha' 'gro ma rnams logs la bri//dang por dmar dang dkar ba dang /
419b3(rgyud): gzhan ni thal ba ltar dkar ba//gsum pa dkar dang lta ba dang //bzhi pa gser ltar dri med pa'o//rdo rje gtum pa'i dbang phyug grub//rdo rje kha T+wAM bsnyungs dang bcas//rdo rje 'dod pa me ltar 'bar//
419b4(rgyud): de yI logs la mtshan ma btod//rdo rje khyab 'jug ma rdo rje'i//'khor lo bstod pa de bzhin gzhan//rdo rje dril bu ba dan nam//dwe yi logs ni g.yon skems ma//cung zad mche ba gtsigs
419b5(rgyud): pa yis//khro dang bcas pas zhal bzhad pa//rang bdag la ni thugs gtad cing //sku ni zur gyi phyogs la bzhugs//de nas 'di yi snying po ni//hUM/de nas nye ba'i snying po ni//rdo rje dril
419b6(rgyud): sogs lhan cig tu//rnam dben rol mo brdungs pa yis//ha~M yis glu dang rol mo ni//brdung zhing zur bzhi rab tu sgrub//ces bya ba ni 'dir bzlas pa'i cho ga'o//'khor lo de ni
419b7(rgyud): brtag byas nas//gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni//mtshon cha mchog gi cho ga yis//cho ga thams cad rgyas pa'o//de nas de kho na nyid dang //chos dang dam tshig cho ga sbyin pa ni//
420a1(rgyud): rtag tu chags pa las byung khro//rdo rje me yi phung po'i sku//'bar ba'i rdo rje khro bo che//rab 'bar ba yi tshogs kyi sku//rdo rje 'bar ba'i rnal 'byor che//mkha' 'gro
420a2(rgyud): ma rnams kun tu 'bar//zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'o//de nas chos ni/thams cad na mkha'i mtshan nyid de//nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med//na mkha' dang mnyam rnal 'byor pas//thams
420a3(rgyud): cad myur ba nyid du sgrub//na mkha' kun mchog sbyor ba yis//thams cad na mkha' zhes brjod cing //rdo rje phyag rgyas rgyas btab pas//'jig rten gsum yang za bar byed//
420a4(rgyud): ces bya ba ni rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi mkha' 'gro ma'i mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig go/cho ga 'di yis thams cad du//mnyam par gzhag pas bsgrub par bya//kun mchog dngos
420a5(rgyud): grub chen po yis//las kyi tshogs rnams mi zad pa'o//zhes bya ba'o//de ni nga lta ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho gas rang gi phyag rgya rnams kyis gar gyi mchod pa byas nas 'grub par
420a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro//dpal mchog dang po las rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi cho ga'o//de ni sa mchog tu phra ba dang //shin tu bzad pa'i rdo rje'o//grub mchog gsang ba'i rnal 'byor gyis//mkha'
420a7(rgyud): 'gro ma yi 'khor lor bshad//grong khyer skyed mos tshal sogs ni//ji lta ba bzhin rgyas byas nas//rdo rje 'dzin kun slob dpon gyis//ci bzhin du ni rab sgrub pa'i//yid 'ang
420b1(rgyud): shrI dang lhan cig tu//rang gis phyag rgyas me tog stod//ji lta ba bzhin grong khyer 'jug/g.yon pa'i kha ni gyen du stod//rdo rje drag po bzhad chen po//sgra sgrogs mchog go phyag
420b2(rgyud): rgya yis//'jug ste mgon la phyag 'tshal bya//de la phyag ni 'di yin te//o zhes bya ba brjod byas la//shin tu dga' ba'i dbugs rlung gis//ru lu ru lulpaM/drug ldan par
420b3(rgyud): mo'i ru lu ru lul+la s+t+waM/'di ni rdo rje drag po phyag 'tshal ba'i sgra sgrogs pa'i mchog ces bya ba 'dir rdo rje phyag rgya phyag rgya ste phyag rgya thams cad dang /gzhan rmongs pa dang /thogs pa
420b4(rgyud): med pa'i dngos grub thams cad dang /las thams cad la dgongs shing mchog tu grub pa'o//zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu gsang bas 'di gsungs so//de
420b5(rgyud): nas yid 'ong dam bcas pas//me tog sil ma dor nas ni//rdo rje pad+ma'i dbang bskur gyis//dam tshig gsum ni gsal bar sbyin//de la rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin
420b6(rgyud): te/pad+ma'i thod pa la bya ste/de yang rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs pas na rdo rje pad+ma zhes bya'o//de nas 'dir phyag rgya btsang ba ni/sor mo thams cad phan tshun sbyar//kun mchog rtse mo
420b7(rgyud): dang bcas pa//mthe bo rdo rje bkab pa ni//rdo rje pad+ma zhes grub bo//rdo rje pad+ma'i phyag rgya 'dis//rdo rje sems dpa'i dngang bskur ba'i sbyor ba dang /rdo rje pad+ma'i rin po che'i cod pan gyi
421a1(rgyud): dbang bskur bar bya'o//'di dbang bskur ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis shin rngu gdug pa dang /drag pa dang /rab tu gtum pa dang /ma rungs pa'i
421a2(rgyud): sems can thal bar brlag nas khams gsum ma lus pa'i stobs chen po dang ldan pa'i 'khor los bsgyur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya bar byin gyis rlob par
421a3(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang /mchog tu brtag pa'i srung bar yang 'gyur ro//zhes mchog tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungaso//de nyid kyis ni rdo rje gzung //chos kyi
421a4(rgyud): dril bu dkrol bar bya'o//dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya che//byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzla//rdo rje la sogs thob par bzung //rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa 'dra//rdo rje
421a5(rgyud): rnal 'byor dbang phyug grub//rdo rje can gyis byini rlabs 'gyur//bud med rnams kyang 'bebs gyur nas//ston pa'i rdo rje phab pa yis//rdo rje dang bcas phyag mtshan 'dzem//
421a6(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma rnams rab tu 'gyur//de la thog mar re shig rdo rje nyi ma mi ltar 'bar ba chen po thal bar rab tu rlog pa zhes bya ba/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen
421a7(rgyud): bo'i khro bo'i rgyal po'i bdag po mchog dang po yang dag par 'bebs par byed pa ste/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rje chen po'i thabs kyis 'khon du 'dzin pa'i kho
421b1(rgyud): bro'i me 'bar ba'i rdo rje rdo rje dang bcas pa'i kha T+wAM ga'i rgyal mtshan dang nges par sbyor ba/ba dan dang bcas pa'i dril bu 'chang ba/rdo rje snyems pa'i bdag po shin tu khro ba 'bebs pas
421b2(rgyud): sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i smin 'tshams kyi khro ga nyer shin tu 'jigs par byed pa'i spyan ser po dang ldan pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i 'jigs pa chen pos
421b3(rgyud): 'jigs par byed pa'i sbyin gyis lta ba'i phyag rgya 'dis stong phrag brgya bzlas pas 'grub par mdzad do//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su chags pa dang /dgug pa dang /
421b4(rgyud): gzhug pa dang /dbang du bya ba dang /'bebs par nus so//thams cad na mkha' sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang lan gcig brjod pa tsam gyis khams gsum ma lus pa'i rje/
421b5(rgyud): bdud rtsi la sogs pa'i bdud thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bdud pa dang /drag por rab tu gtum pa dang /ma rungs pa'i sems can rnams dang /
421b6(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma drag po thams cad dang /gang zhig nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams te de dag kyang thal bar rlog par gyur na/dgra bo la sogs pa gzhan lta smos kyang
421b7(rgyud): ci dgos/don yod cing thogs pa med pa dang /dngos grub thams cad dang /las kyi tshogs rnams la dgongs shing mchog tu grub pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das
422a1(rgyud): /thugs rje chen po'i zlabs shin tu drug pa'i man dag gi bzlas pa ni d+h+rU'i dbugs bya ba nyid kyis badren pa'i rdo rje tshigag grub pa'i yid kyi 'dod pa las thams da
422a2(rgyud): kyi dngos grub kyi tshogs rnams la dam pa chog tu grub pa'o//hUM/de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug ma'i lha chen mo rnams kyis bshad par bya ste/da
422a3(rgyud): la thog mar re shig rdo rje chen po 'dod pa'i me 'bar bri zhes bya ba'i lha mo chen mo rdo rje gzhu dang /mnga' bstod pa'i spyan g.yon pa ste/rdo rje spyan gyis lta ba'i phyag rgya 'dis thams
422a4(rgyud): cad sgrub par mdzad pa dang /sgeg pa dang bcus shing g.yo ba'i sbyin gyis zur gyis gzegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa tsam gyis thams cad la rgyas 'drebs par mdzad pa
422a5(rgyud): dang /don yod cing thogs pa med pa dngos po thams cad dang las kyi tshogs rnams la dgongs shing mchog tu grub pa'o//de bcom ldan 'das yum 'di'i rdo rje phra mo'i
422a6(rgyud): g.yon pa'i khro bo'i bzlas pa ni yid kyis 'dod pas dngos grub thams cad dang las kyi tshogs rnams las mchog tu grub pa'o//hrI/gnyis pa ni rdo rje chen po 'dod pa'i me 'bar
422a7(rgyud): ba'i dam tshig gi lan zhes bya ba'i lha mo ste dbus su rang gi lhag pa'i lha bstod pa'i zhal 'dzum pa'i spyan nung zhig 'dzums shing dga' ba chen po'i rdo rje'i lta ba'i phyag rgyas 'dis
422b1(rgyud): thams cad grub par mdzad pa dang /rnam pa dang mkhyud pa la so byas pa'i rlob pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa tsam gyis thams cad la rgyas 'dubyas par mdzad pa dang /phyag rgya thams cad lams
422b2(rgyud): par mdzad pa dang /thams cad kyi gsod par mdzad pa dang /don yod cing thogs parjod pa dngos grub thams cad dang /las kyi tshogs rnams las dgongs shing mchog tu grub pa'o//
422b3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das yum 'di'i bya rog gi mgrin pa'i dbyangs kyis rdo rje ngag gi khro bo'i bzlas pa ni yid kyi 'dod pas dngos grub thams cad dang las kyi tshogs rnams la
422b4(rgyud): mchog tu grub pa'o//b+h+rUM/gsum pa ni rdo rje chen po'i mo 'bar ba thal bar rlog pa zhes bya ba'i lha mo chen mo ste/bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje chen po dang /kha T+wAM ga'i rgyal
422b5(rgyud): mtshan 'chang ba dang /sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i bzhad pa sprin 'tshams kyi khro gnyer gyi khro bo'i spyan te/rdo rje chen po'i khro bo'i ki lilI ki la khro bo'i spyan gyi lta ba'i phyag rgya 'dis
422b6(rgyud): thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa'o//badz+ra zhes bya ba dang ru lu ru lu ru lAM hU~M zhes bya btsum gyis bdud thams cad 'joms pa dang don yod cing thogs po med par dngos grub thams
422b7(rgyud): cad dang las kyi tshogs rnams la dgongs shing mchog tu grub pa'o//haM/bzhi pa ni rdo rje chen po'i did pa'i me 'bar ba thal bar rlig pa 'chi ba slong zhes bya ba g.yon rnams pa
423a1(rgyud): g.yas pas rang gi spyi bor rdo rje dril bu bskyod par mdzad pa/sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i spyan gyi shin tu gdangs pa ste/rdo rje rgyal po drin gyi spyan gyis lta ba'i phyag
423a2(rgyud): rgyas thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa/thol lcag la sogs pa dang /bzhad gang dang /bdeg pa dang /phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'i 'chi ba thams cad slong blor mdzad pa/don
423a3(rgyud): yod cing thogs pa med pa dngos grub thams cad dang las kyi tshogs la dgongs shing mchog tu grub pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das yum 'di'i dril bu'i dbyangs kyi rdo rje khro
423a4(rgyud): bo'i bzlas pa ni yid kyis 'dod pas dngos grub thams cad kyi tshogs thams cad mchog tu grub pa'o//Sh+Tha/de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/chos dbyings mnyam dang mi
423a5(rgyud): mnyam pa//na mkha'i khams ltar grangs med cing //na mkha' kun gyis gan+da skabs kyis//dkyil 'khor 'di la rab zhugs pa/rdo rje mcho gi rnal 'byor gyi//dbang phyug ma lus kun nas
423a6(rgyud): 'byibs//de nas rdo rje rnal 'byur ba ston pa des rnal 'byor pa rang gi logs dag tu dgod pa yin te/zla tshes dkyil 'khor rnam pa yi//dkyil 'khor du ni dgod par bya//
423a7(rgyud): bkod nas thams cad kun mchog gi/dngos grub dam pa bsgrub par bya//thams cad dgug dang mchod pa che//bdag byin rlab sogs sgrub pa yis//shin tu gsang ba'i
423b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ro//brtag pa dang ni bsgrubs nas kyang //rdo rje 'dzin kun slob dpon gyis//rdorje slob ma rnams gzhug bya//de la re shig zlog ma kho nar slong dben gyis badrug ste tshogs
423b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khar du dam tshig gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs kyis//rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams logs dag tu bzhag nas skyes pa rnams kyang gzhug cing byang chub kyi sems kyis rdo rje chen po'i khro bo'i
423b3(rgyud): dam tshig dang sdom pa dag len du gzhug par bya'o//khye'u dang bu mo rnams rab tu bzhag la tshogs dang bcas po'i rang bzhin gyis zhugs te srung ba dang /bskyab pa dang /sba ba thams cad
423b4(rgyud): bya'o//de nas 'dir slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni/byang chub sems ni bla mang pa//mchog tu bskyed pa byas nas ni//gar byas spyi bor thal sbyar mchod//slob ma thams
423b5(rgyud): tsod gzhug par bya//ci 'dod pa yi dngos grub bskyed//slob ma me tog dor du gzhug/rnal 'byor ma ni gang la babs//de dang de yi lho mo 'grub/de nas gdod g.yogs bkrol
423b6(rgyud): naswa ni//rnam pa kun tu yon blangs nas//rdo rje pad+ma'i dbade bskur gyis//dam tshig gsum ni gsal bar sbyin//'dir mna' bsgrag pa dang /dbang bskur ba ni de nyid do//de la
423b7(rgyud): 'dir dam tshig gsum sbyin pa ni 'di yin te/mi byed pa dang so sor rtogs//gdug pa thams cad gnon pa dang //sangs rgyas kun dngos rdo rje ste//byang chub sems ni che zhing bstan//
424a1(rgyud): mtshon cha de ni rgyal kun gyis//kun tu bzang po'i lag tu sbyin//bstan pa thams cad grub pa'i phyir//de phyir phyag na rdo rje yin//de nas rdo rje ma ma ltar
424a2(rgyud): 'bar ba'i mchog tu gsang ba ni//rtog tu chags pa las byung khro//rdo rje sems dpa' gdul bya'i phyir//rdo rje nyi mi me lhor 'bar//mchog tu 'jigs par byed pa yin//de nas
424a3(rgyud): mchog tu gsang ba'i rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi gsang ba ni/rdo rje nyi ma 'tshar las byung //de bzhin gshegs pa'i grib ma 'dri//sprul te ma lus bdud la sogs//
424a4(rgyud): gdug pa'i khrag ni gsol bar spong //ces bya ba ni gsang ba mchog gi de kho na nyid do//de nas 'dir mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid 'bebs pa'i dril bu ni//shin tu gdug cing drag
424a5(rgyud): pa dang //bdag po rigs po bu rnams dang //shin tu gnyid ni log pa dag/rdo rje mchog ni 'dzin pas gsungs//zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so//mchog tu gsang
424a6(rgyud): ba'i chos nyid 'bebs pa'i rdo rje kha T+wAM ga ba dan gyi dril bu thams cad 'bebs pa dang /rab tu sgrub par byed pa dang /thams cad ltung bar byed pa dang /slong bar byed pa'o//de nas rnal
424a7(rgyud): 'byor mchog gi dam tshig ni/khra'i chen ga bur dang bcas pa//tsan dan dmar dang sbyar ba ni//tshigs kyi nang nas rab zhugs nas//rdo rje dang bcas rdo rje 'dzin//srin lag
424b1(rgyud): ma rgyu rma yis//rnam pa' thams da ts+tsha rgog ldan//zla ba'i 'dung ba shin mya san//rtag 'i dngon zu bo par 'gyur//'dod bkun la longs spyod cing // na
424b2(rgyud): bsten bzhin du//nam mkha' kun mchos sbyor ba yis//dngos grung thams cad thob par 'gyur//na mkha' kun mchog sbyor ba yis//nu mkha' thams cad zhes brjod cing //rdo rje
424b3(rgyud): phyag rgyas btab pa yis//'jig rten gsum yang bza' bar bya//dngos grub las dang de bzhi ni bde//'di la cung zad mi slob med//las kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyis//don sgrub ma
424b4(rgyud): lus sgrub par 'gyur//don yod mchog tu grub pa dang //gdug pa thams cad gnon par byed//sdug bsngal kun 'gro dpel dang ldan//rnal 'byor 'di ni las kun byed//ces bya ba
424b5(rgyud): mchog tu gsang ba'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//de nas ro dang bza' ba spyod pa glu//rol mo'i mchod pa sogs kyis mgron lo spyod//phul ba de yi rdo rje bla ma che/
424b6(rgyud): bdag dang gzhan rnams mchod par bya//myos byed myos byed btung ba ni//ci 'dod par ni brten pa yis//rdo rje nyi ma me 'bar sogs//ji bzhin rjes 'gro'i bzlas pa bzla//rang gsung
424b7(rgyud): cho gas blangs pa yi//glu dang rol mo gar rnams dang //sna tshogs phyag rgya'i mchod pa dang //khams gsum rnam rgyal la sogs pa//bud meng tshogs dang bcas pa yi//mchod pa
425a1(rgyud): A/rgyo chen thams cadang //ci 'dod pa yi longs spyod kyis//mchod pa byas nas rab tu sgrub//ces bya ba mchog tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems
425a2(rgyud): dpas gsung so//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa la so gos pa'i dbugs dbyung ba sbyin par bya ste/'gro ba kun gyi khams rnams kyi//phra rab rdul dang mnyam pa
425a3(rgyud): nyid//rtog pa'i rgyal po grub pa ste//sangs rgyas la sogs mchog grub pa'o//gang zhig blo na depago med pa'i//khyad par du ni dmigs mi 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs
425a4(rgyud): pas bden pa ni//dam pa thams cad bsdus pa'o//zad pa thams cad zad 'gyur dang //'phel ba thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur//gang zhig mthong bas mi snang 'gyur//
425a5(rgyud): gang nas kyang ni 'jigs med byed//drag po dbang po nya dbang zla//nyi ma mkha' 'gro tshogs dkyil 'khor//khros nas yi ge hUM tsam gyis//ma lus pa ni thal bur
425a6(rgyud): byed//rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro ma'i dkyil 'khor//mchog tu zhugs nas mthong nas ni//sdig pa kun las rnam grol te//khyed rnams dang ni rab tu gnas//slar khyod
425a7(rgyud): 'chi ba yod min to//khyad par du ni ngan 'gro med//gzhan gyis mi thub mi yod cing //cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis//shin tu srid pa'i dngos grub rnams//
425b1(rgyud): ston pa'i mchog tu gyur pa yin//dam tshig sdom pa grub pa 'di//rtag tu yang ni srung ba 'di//sangs rgyas kun gyis mthun par gsungs//dam pa brtag pa'i bka' yin no//byang chub
425b2(rgyud): sems ni spang mi bya//dam chos de bzhin dam tshig dang //slob dpo na smad par mi bya ste//gang phyir rdo rje 'dzin kun de//sems can kun la phan phyir dang //theg pa thams cad grub
425b3(rgyud): pa'i phyir//gdug pa 'dul bras dag pa zhes//rdo rje mchog ni 'dzin pas gsungs//shin tu gdug cing gtum pa dang //bdag po'i grogs po bu rnams kyang //phyag rgya'i rnal
425b4(rgyud): 'byor mngon spyod kyis//shin tu gnyid ni log tu gzhug/rtag tu rang gi dam tshig srungs//rtag tu de bzhin gshegs rnams mchod//rtag tu bla ma la yang dbul//de la phul na
425b5(rgyud): 'bras bu che//de byin sangs rgyas thams cad la//rtag tu byin pa nyid du 'gyur//de byin bsod nams tshogs rdzogs te//tshogs las dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur//dang khyod skye ba
425b6(rgyud): 'bras bur bcas//gang phyir 'di la rab tu banas//dam tshig rgyal po dang mnyam par//sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs//sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin rnams kyis//de ring
425b7(rgyud): khyod la dbang bskur bas//khams gsum gyi ni rgyal srid tshe'i//stobs dpal 'khor los bsgyur ba yin//rdo rje dam pa'i gsang mchog rnal 'byor ma'i//mchog gi dmachog
426a1(rgyud): sa / ga n+d+ha na rgyu d+hA na rgo na na// na du na
426a2(rgyud): jug/dadu lta ts+tshag dang ba las mi tshig tu gasma di na la byor rnam pa'i drugs 'khor gyi rgyu bo shin tu byub /
426a3(rgyud): byu gi mchog tu gas btag pa 'dul ba'i rnyog //rapo la bcom ldan bri ba r+yaH//pad+ma kar TI ba shA/gi 'khor lo nga sa
426a4(rgyud): ba'i//'khor ba'i rnam 'phrul g+hir rnams kyis//baid+mal sogs phyug mtshan bri//phyag rgya 'khor lo ltar medad pa//de yi logs ni thams cad la//khro gnyer
426a5(rgyud): sogs bri bar bya//dreg pa la sogs phyag mnan gzugs//pUd+ma'i lha mor pad+ma ban po//dkyil 'khor de ni bcug byasta nas//gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni//mtshan
426a6(rgyud): rgyum tsug sa chog gis//rnams cad myos nas 'di sbrid bye//de ni sa sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das//spyan ras gtsugs sbyi nga p+lakaste//'dul ba'i thubs kyis da /
426a7(rgyud): rol mo'i gar gyis mdad pan//zhes bya ba ni mchog gi rdo rje d+he//ji ltar bad+ma dmar po ni//gnas kyi nyes pa sna tshogs kyis//shirkyen gyi nyes pas mi gos pa//de bzhin
426b1(rgyud): khams gsum dag pa'o//zhes bya ba ni/mchog tu gsang ba'i chos kyi dril bu'o//cho ga gang dang gang dag gis//'gro ba rnams kyi 'dul 'gyur ba//pad+ma dag mchog rnal 'byor bdag
426b2(rgyud): de dang de yi bdag por bya//zhes bya ba ni rdo rje thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig go//de nas ji lta ba bzhin du pad+ma gar gyi mchod pas mchod la/cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad par bya'o//de nas
426b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das na mkha'i snying po don thams cad 'grub pa'i cho ga ste/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni//ras ris de ni blo gros che//ljang ku bai DUR+Ya dang mtshungs//na mkha'i snying po bri
426b4(rgyud): bar bya//de yi 'od kyi 'khor lor brten//dbang bskur ma dang gter ma dang //rgyal mchog mnga' ba mchod pa'o//gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa de'i//'khor lo brtag par byas
426b5(rgyud): nas ni//mtshon cha mchog gi cho ga yis//cho ga rgyas pa ji bzhin pa'o//de ni rdo rje mchog de ni//nyi ma 'di ni dam pa ste//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong //nam mkha'i snying po
426b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das//bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs mdzad//de nas chos kyi rin po che'i dril bu ni/bsam pa grub pa thams cad kyi//nor gyi bsam pa grub pa mchog/de yang
426b7(rgyud): 'dod pa rab sgrub phyir//'dod las thar pa bde ba che//zhes bya ba'o//dman min rnams ni sbyin bya'o//'dod pa kun gyi bde ba rnams//bdag nyid dang gzhan rnams la ni//bsam pa
427a1(rgyud): thams cad rdzogs phyir ro//zhes bya ba ni dam tshig gi mchog go/dam tshig 'di yis mchog tu ni//rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che//myur du yang dag dam pa
427a2(rgyud): mchog/mi 'gyur mchog ni grub par mdzod//de ltar gsang ba mchog go tshul dag ni//ji bzhin cho ga mchog tu rgyas pa ste//mchog chen de ni rtog pa thams cad kyi//khyad
427a3(rgyud): par dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//dpal mchog dang po las rtog pa thams cad kyi sgrub pa'i cho ga'o//de nas grub chen thams cad kyi//sgrub pa'i mchog ni bde
427a4(rgyud): ba che//rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya ste//rtog pa kun mchog grub pa'i phyir//snod ma yin pa'i sems can gang //sdig pa thams cad byed rnams la//mthong ba la sogs
427a5(rgyud): sems can don//sems dpa' chen pos mdzad pa yin//mthong med long ba de rnams ni//bsod nams med tshogs rtags ldan la//rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa'
427a6(rgyud): mchog/mthong ba'i thabs kyi rgyu rnams na//bsod nams sems sogs sems mchog go//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis//dam tshig mchog ni bcing ba ste//dam
427a7(rgyud): tshig 'da' bar dka' ba'o//rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' yi//gang phyir sku rnams brtan pa ni//de yi phyag rgyar grags pa ste//dngos grub kun phyir de dag
427b1(rgyud): sprul//gang dag gzung ba tsam gyis ni//rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs mchog/mthong zhing mngon par mthong ba nyid//mchog bsdus nyid du gyur pa yin//phyag rgya bcings pa tsam
427b2(rgyud): gyis ni//gang phyir bsdus par gyur pa ste//rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' rnams//nyams pas 'jigs pas 'grub mi 'gyur//ci ltar rgyal po rnams kyi dka'i//rtags kyi/
427b3(rgyud): phyag rgya 'da' dka' ba//phyag rgya gsang ba kun gyis kyang //'da' bar nus pa ma yin no//sangs rgyas nyid dam rdo rje 'dzin//de ltar bskal pa bye bas kyang //thob par mi
427b4(rgyud): 'gyur myur du ni//ji ltar phyag rgya mchog gzung ba'o//ji ltar 'dul ldan 'jig rten ni//de ltar dngos grub gsungs pa yi//de yI thabs ni phyag rgya ste//dngos grub thams
427b5(rgyud): cad mchog tu byed//gang zhog bcing ba tsam byis ni//'dus na bde ba chen po rnams//rdo rje sems sogs skad cig gis//byin gyis brlabs par bstan par mdzad//
427b6(rgyud): ces bya ba'o//de nas 'di gsungs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhas shing mchog tu phra ba dang zab pa dang /rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa mchog tu dag pa thog ma
427b7(rgyud): dang tha ma med pa/mi zad cing zad pa med pa don yod cing thogs pa shin tu mchog tu dga' ba ma lus pa'i bde ba chen po dang /yid mi bde ba ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems
428a1(rgyud): can gyi khams thams cad kyi dngos grub chen po'i dbang phyug chen po'i mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i dngos grub thams cad kyi mchog rdo rje dbab pa rnams kyis rab tu yud
428a2(rgyud): par mdzad nas/bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i don yong pa'i mchog gi gsang ba zhes bya ba'i mtshon cha mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga rgyud phyi ma'i mchog byin gyis rlob par mdzad pa'o//
428a3(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gis bdag la byin gyis brlab pa gcig pu'i cho ga bshad par bya'o//zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//
428a4(rgyud): nyin re sngon du lan gcig tu//phyag rgya che dang snying po bzla//kun gyi phyag rgya rab grub pa'i//bdag byin rlabs pa gcig pus 'grub//ces bya ba ni mchog tu grub pa'o//de nas
428a5(rgyud): mchog tu gsang ba bdag la byin gyis brlab pa gcig tu sgrub pa'i cho ga mchog grub pa ni/lan cig dam tshig gsum mchog tu//gsang ba dam po'i khang par ni//rdo rje la sogs thob
428a6(rgyud): bzung na//rdo rje can gyi byin rlabs 'gyur//de nas shin tu mchog tu gsang ba'i bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa gcig pu sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i khyad par shin tu mchog tu grub pa ni/
428a7(rgyud): rdo rje dril bu kun bdag nyid//sna tshogs phyag rgya'i skur bdag ldan//phyag rgya kun gyi rnal 'byor bdag/rdo rje sems dpa'i nyid du 'gyur//grub pa'i cho ga 'di yis ni//rdo rje sems
428b1(rgyud): dpa' yang dag bsdus//kun mchog dngos grub chen po yis//dbang phyug chen po nyid byin brlab//don yod rab tu bdag byin rlabs//rang bzhin gyis ni thams cad du//mdor na phyag rgya tham
428b2(rgyud): cad ni//dngos grub las dang de bzhin bde//thams cad byin rlabs sgrub pa yis//mi 'gyur ba ni kun sgrub byed//zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung sa//dpal mchog
428b3(rgyud): dang po las dngos grub thams cad byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba'o//de nas yang mchog tu gsang ba'i rnal 'byor thams cad kyi cho ga rjesu bshad par bya'o//zhes bya
428b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung so//de la thog ma kho nar re shig don yod cher ni rnal 'byor gyi skad kyi dbyang so//'di yang brtson pa yin no zhes bya ba ni skad cig dbyings kyi don to//
428b5(rgyud): gang gi brtson pa yin zhe na/smras pa/rang gi lhag pa'i lha rjes su dran par sbyor bas na rnal 'byor ro//slar yang gzhan ni yang dag par bsdu ba dang /yang dag par kun tu sbyor ba dang /
428b6(rgyud): yang dag par kun tu sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor brjod pa'i rnam grangaso//gang yang dag par kun tu sbyar ba yin zhe na/keng gi lhag pa'i d+d+he su dran pa'i rnal 'byor rje su bsgrubs
428b7(rgyud): pas rang gi lhag pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o//de la ji ltar thams cad kyi rnal 'byor yin zhe na/dam tshig gi rnal 'byor na thams cad kyi rnal 'byor zhes byang
429a1(rgyud): na//de bzhin na/shegs pa kun gyis nga //'dU' bcuni mi mdzad pas//phyag rgya ma dzod tsas su bsgrasmras//yid kyi gzugs ni tsun por ro//nAs d+hA/
429a2(rgyud): ba ni dam tshig gi don to//de la rjes su sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor ni dam tshig di rnal 'byor te thams cad kyi rnal 'byor zhes bya'o//'di lta ste/rdzas mang po yang dag par sbyar bas sbyor
429a3(rgyud): zhes bya ba sgrub pa de bzhin du/thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis yang dag par kun tu sbyor bso na thams cad kyi rnal 'byor ni dam tshig gi rnal 'byor ro//de la ji ltar na
429a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor yin zhe na/sangs rgyas kun po dag yang dag sbyor//ji lta'i dbyibs dang sku dang ldan//badrag nyid bdug nyid nyid la ni//bkod nas rje 'u bsgrub
429a5(rgyud): par bya//zhes bya ba ni rang gi dam tshig rnal 'byor thams cad kyi rnal 'byor zhes bya'o//de la rjesu skyob pa ni/lhag pa'i lha ni gang gang gi sa//phyag rgya gang dang gang 'ching gi/
429a6(rgyud): dang de yi rnal 'byor gyis//phyag rgya de dang der sbyor bya//zhes bya ba'o//gnas mchog tu gasdang ba'i rab mchog gi rje su sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i mchog tu shin tu grub pa ni/bdag ni
429a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad nyid//gzi brjid can no nyid kyang yin//rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor gyis de phyir bdag nyid brtag par bya//phyag rgya thabs kyi rnal 'byor chen po mchog tu
429b1(rgyud): gsang ba zhes bya'o//de nas mchog tu shin tu gsang ba'i mchog gis rjes su sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i khyad par shin tu mchog tu grub pan+de/rang lha'i sbyor ba ni bzhin du//sna tshogs
429b2(rgyud): phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ldan//phyag rgya kun bdag rnal 'byor bdag/mi 'gyur mchog tu grub par 'gyur//rtog pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'o dam tshig mchog gi rnal 'byor
429b3(rgyud): nI yang dgu par kun tu sbyor ba zhes bya'o//de nas gzhan yang slar mchog tu gsang ba mchog tu gsang ba mchog gi rje su sgrub pa'i tshig rgyas pa'i khyad par mchog tu grub pa los
429b4(rgyud): shin tu mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba ni/rdo rje sems dpar bdag sbyor ba'i//ji bzhin dbyings dang skur ldan pa//kun bdag phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor bdag/mi 'gyur mi tshig ni grub pa
429b5(rgyud): 'gyur//'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//dam tshig gsal po'i rjes 'gro ba//rnal 'byor kun bdage grub pa ste//gsal shing shin tu grub mchog yin//'di yis mi 'grub
429b6(rgyud): cung zad med//dngos grub las dang de bzhin bde//las kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub dang //dngos grub ma lus myur du 'grub//ces bya ba ni gsang ba'i dam tshig gi rnal 'byor te shin
429b7(rgyud): tu mchog tu rab tu grub pa'o//'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing //ci 'dod par ni brten pa yis//rnal 'byor dag ni 'di dag gis//rang gi bdag nyid rab mchod bya//zhes bya
430a1(rgyud): ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shin tu gsang ba bla na med pa theg pa chen po'i dam tshig chen po'i rnal 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
430a2(rgyud): dpal gyi rang gi dam tshig rnal 'byor dga' ba chen po'i dpal rdo rje don yod pa'i dga' ba'i dam tshig rnal 'byor thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i bcud kyis len gyi mchog gi dngos grub kyi
430a3(rgyud): rnal 'byor gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa'o//rdo rje sems dpa'i mchog gi tshe dang /na tshod gzhon pa dang /nad med pa dang /gzugs dang /
430a4(rgyud): kha dog dang /gzi brjid dang /mthu dang /stobs dang /spro ba dang /dngos grub mchog thams cad dang /dpal dang /skal pa bzang po dang /dga' ba chen po dang /shin tu bde ba dang /yid
430a5(rgyud): bde ba thams cad la dam pa mchog tu 'grub pa'o//ji srid ma lus shing lus pa med pa lus pa'i dngos grub chen po dam pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug chen po'i bdag nyid la sogs pa'i dngos
430a6(rgyud): grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs mchog tu grub pa ste/rgyas btab pa tsam gyis skad cig gis rab tu grub pa yin no//de'i rgyu gang gi phyir zhe na/'di lta ste/spyod pa phyag rgya la rag
430a7(rgyud): lus//phyag rgya rnal 'byor la gnas pa//rnal 'byor khyad par gyis sgrub bya//rnal 'byor dam tshig gis sgrub byed//sems ni stong pa sgyu mar mtshungs//lus dang bral bar ma
430b1(rgyud): sgrub ste//lus de yang ni rtsig pa 'dra//bya ba med cing sems dang bral//sems cang lus dang bral ba dang //lus kyang sems dang bral ba ni//grub pa ma yin de bzhin 'di//phyag rgya/
430b2(rgyud): rnal 'byor cho gar brjod//ji ltar lus ni sems kyis dang //sems kyang lus kyis 'grub 'gyur ba//de bzhin phyag rgya rnal 'byor gyis//rnal 'byor dam tshig bsgrubs pas so//
430b3(rgyud): de ltar dam tshig rnal 'byor dag/phan tshun du ni sgrub pa'i phyir//phan tshun du ni rtag bdag nyid//de bzhin gshegs par grub par 'gyur//zhes bya ba ni shin tu mchog tu gsang ba
430b4(rgyud): mchog bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung so//de la ji ltar phyag rgya thams cad dang rnal 'byor dag rje su sgrub pa yin zhe na/phyag rgya sku ni bstan pa'i phyir//de yang bde bas
430b5(rgyud): brtan pa 'gyur//sdug bsngal gyis ni g.yo 'gyur ram//yang na 'chi ba thob par 'gyur//de ni rnal 'byor sems las byung //yid bde ba yis rab tu sgrub//yid mi bde bas g.yo ba
430b6(rgyud): 'am//yang 'gog pa yang thob par 'gyur//de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis//phyag rgya rnal 'byor rjes sgrub byed//dka' thub med cing nges pa med//bde ba dga' bas bsgrub par bya//
430b7(rgyud): zhes bya ba shin tu gsang ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungaso//de la dam tshig thams cad kyi rnal 'byor rje su sgrub pa'i bde ba de gang yin zhe na/'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing
431a1(rgyud): ci 'dod par ni brten pa yis//rang gI lha yi rnal 'byor gyis//bdag dang gzhan rnams mchod par gyis//zhes bya ba'o//de bzhin gshegs pa thams//
431a2(rgyud): cad mchog tu gsang ba bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'i rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu bde ba zhes bya'o//de la dam tshig thams cad rnal 'byor rjes
431a3(rgyud): sgrub pa de gang yin zhe na/dka' thub nyes pa mi bzad pas//sdug bsngal ldan pas myur du bskams//sdug bsngal gyis ni sems g.yengs 'gyur//rnal 'byor pa ni sbyor ba
431a4(rgyud): mini//de phyir ci 'dod la spyod pa//kun za de bzhin thams cad byed//ci 'dod bya ba la spyod pa//ci 'dod par ni spyod pa spyod//gang dang gang du 'chag pa dang //dgod pa 'am
431a5(rgyud): ni smra ba 'am//gang yang de ru rje bzhin to//dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs pa//sgrib pa rnams dang ldan pa 'am//ring gi lho yi rnal 'byor dadag/tshig gis kyang ni de bzhin
431a6(rgyud): 'gyur//de nyid rnal 'byor 'di yis ni//thams cad nyid ni bsgrub pa bya//ngan spyod sdig pa thams cad kyis//rnam pa kun tu gnod mi 'gyur//'dod pa chen po kun bdag
431a7(rgyud): nyid//dbang phyug dam pa 'grub par 'gyur//thams cad rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po//kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa'o//sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' nyid//rnal 'byor 'di yis
431b1(rgyud): rnyed sla na//dngos grub rnams dang las mchog gi//tshogs rnams gzhan lta smos ci dgos//don yod mchog tu grub pa dang //phyag rgya thams cad rjes sgrub byed//dpal ldan sdug bsngal
431b2(rgyud): kun 'phrog pa'i//rnal 'byor 'di ni mi 'gyur mchog/ces bya ba mchog tu yid bde ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//de la rnal 'byor thams cad bcing ba ci ltar zhe na/
431b3(rgyud): bsam pa med cing thams cad smra//de bzhin thams cad bsams nas kyang //ye shes tsam le snyoms 'jug pa//rang bzhin nyid du snyoms par zhugs//de la ji ltar rnal 'byor thams
431b4(rgyud): cad bcing ba dang lung bstan pa yin zhe na//rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis//dngos grub thams cad rab sbyor bas//ye shes tsam la sbyor ba 'dis//rnal 'byor zhes ni brjod pa yin//
431b5(rgyud): zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya thams cad kyi rnal 'byor gyi cho ga mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor chen po dang /shin tu rnal 'byor
431b6(rgyud): bcings pa dang //lung bstan pa gsungs te//rdo rje sems dpa' bdag sbyor bas//mchod pa kun gyis rjes sbyor ba//rnal 'byor thams cad rab sbyor 'di//rnal 'byor zhes ni
431b7(rgyud): brjod par bya//de la 'di ltar brjod bya ste//de nyid chen po 'di 'grub ste//mchog gi bdag nyid 'di nyid ni//shin tu mchog tu gsang ba ste//so so'i skye bo la brjod min//rdo rje
432a1(rgyud): slob dpon slob ma mchog/de nyid dad pa'i rjes 'brang ba//thams cad rnal 'byor cho ga sbyor//gzhan rnams la ni rims kyis so//'di la sgrub med dung
432a2(rgyud): zad med//dngos grub las drang bde ba dang //thams cad rnal 'byor rjes sgrub pas//mi 'gyur thams cad sgrub par byed//rnal 'byor cho ga gsal ba 'di//cig bu'ang gang
432a3(rgyud): la yod gyur na//gzhan gyis mi thub mi sod cing //bdud la sogs pas non mi 'gyur//de la rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin//rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//
432a4(rgyud): kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi//rnal 'byor dbang phyug rab grub 'gyur//zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungaso//dpal mchog drang po
432a5(rgyud): las shin tu gsang po'i rnal 'byor thams cad kyi mchog tu gsung ba'o//de nas rtog pa thams cad don yod cing thogs pa med pa mchog tu mkhas shing phra la rgya che zhing zab
432a6(rgyud): lA bsam gyis mi khyab cing shin tu tshad med pa/ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad rab tu mchog tu grub pa'i rgyas
432a7(rgyud): pa'i rgyud bshad par bya'o//zhes bya ba phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o//zhes bya ba phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rgyud bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
432b1(rgyud): sems dngas gsungs so//g.yon pa'i dbang par dgrod pa la//zhabs kyi bad+ma ni de kAr//sems dpa'i skyil mo klungs bcings te//rang nyid lus ni drang por 'dzin//rdo rje gsar rabs
432b2(rgyud): kun las rgyal//mchog gis dngos grub kun gyi b+hir//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis//rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur//'dis ni rdo rje sems dpa' 'am//sangs rgyas nyid
432b3(rgyud): ni gzi can nyid//dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug yin//tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur//zhes bya ba thams cad kyi bdag nyid bstan pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas
432b4(rgyud): gsungaso//dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs kyang //phyag rgya chen po yongs bzung bas//bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang //phyag byas mchod cing bkur bar 'gyur//
432b5(rgyud): gang gis 'di mthong phyag byed pa//bstod pa dang ni mchod par byed//ston pa mthong ba phyag byed dang //de yis bdag po mchod par 'gyur//dngos grub kun gyi chags chen po'o//bde ba
432b6(rgyud): phran tshogs dbang phyug che//phyag rgya chen pos 'grub 'gyur te//rdo rje sems dpa' gnyis pa 'dra//lha la sogs pa'i dngos grub kun//las kun gyi ni bde ba yang //phyag rgya chen
432b7(rgyud): po'i byin rlabs kyis//khyad par du ni rab tu 'jug/de yis mi 'grub gang yang med//dngos grub las dang de bzhin te//phyag rgya chen po'i byin rlabs pas//bsgrubs pa'i
433a1(rgyud): stobs kyis mchog kun 'byung //de nas thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sems dpa' chen po kun gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i thams cad
433a2(rgyud): kyi dam tshig dang /chos dang /las dang /gdon mi za bar dgug pa dang /gzhug pa dang /'bebs pa dang /rjes su chags pa dang /dbang du byed pa dang /sgrub pa thams cad dang /
433a3(rgyud): mchog gi sgrub pa dang /mchog gi sgrub pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i gsang ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'o//de bcing ba ni 'di yin te/sor mo thams
433a4(rgyud): cad mnyam sbyor bas//rdo rje thal ma dris brjod do//kun mchog nang du bsngags pa yis//rdo rje bsdams pa bshad pa yin//rdo rje bsdams pa'i nang du ni//mdzub mo mabye bong yang
433a5(rgyud): dag sbyar//g.yas pa'i mthe bo rtags kyis ni//rtse mo bkug nas btsir bar bya//mda' lngas dasdus pas bcings nas ni//dbus ma bcings pa'i nang du gnas//mthe bong mthe chung
433a6(rgyud): rdo rje snyoms//de yi dang po'i rdo rje mchog/rdo rje bsdams pa de bcings nas//dbus ma'i rdo rje lcags kyu gnyis//dgug pa'i tshul ni de nyid kyis//ring gi snying khar lcags kyus
433a7(rgyud): 'dengs//lcags kyu'i rgyal po 'di yis ni//rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che//dga' ba'i rdo rje lcags kyus dgug/slar yang nye ba'i snying po sgrub//snying khar brdeg pa dag
433b1(rgyud): bon//rjes su tshogs pa'i me yis gdungs//snying po phyogs papa dbang gyur dgyes//myur du byon nas 'grub par 'gyur//zhes bcom ldan 'das chags pa chen po dang bde ba chen na
433b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chad chen pos gsungs//de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /byang chub sems dpa'i rdo rje la sogs pa drang /brtan pa dang /g.yo ba'i dngos po
433b3(rgyud): thams cad rgyas btab pas 'ongs te myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro//gal te ma 'ongs na 'jig par 'gyur ro//bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po'i mchog gi phyag
433b4(rgyud): rgya'o//rdo rje mchod yon rdo rje thal mo shin tu rab tu brkyang ba'i thal mo'o//de nas dang po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i dbus ma'i rdo rje gzung ba'i me tog gi lcug mas bzla bar bya'o//rdo rje'i chu dang /
433b5(rgyud): rdorje'i khu tshur gyis dbang bskur na thams cad bdag po nyid dang /cha 'phel ba la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad la dgos pa yin pas btung ba byas na sdug bsngal thams cad 'jom
433b6(rgyud): pa yin no//de nas dang po dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i phyag d+ha ni/ba dan gsum dang kha T+wAM ga/bcing nas mi nus par ni dga'//rdo rje gar bskor la bA ya~M//yongasu bskor
433b7(rgyud): pa 'dzin pa che//ka pra ta yi kha sbyor ni//spyi bor bzhag ste phab nas kyang //sgeg bcas ma dzub mo mthe chung sogs//bkol nas rdo rje can la dngul//'di yi 'khor du ma zhugs kyang
434a1(rgyud): rdo rje slob dpon nyid thob 'gyur//rang nyid zhugs pa tsam gyis ni//mchod pas don yod grub phyir ro//yong du rdzogs pa ma tshang ba//yang na sbyar yang ci skyed
434a2(rgyud): pa'i//me tog la stsogs mchod pa yis//thun mong dngos grub kun 'grub pa'i//badran gsum mchog kha T+wA~M ga/sgeg bcas mtha' ma la sogs bkrol//glog 'gyu mchog tu
434a3(rgyud): bskor ba yis//rdo rje gar gyi mchod pas mchod//sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i 'dzum pa'i mig gis phyag 'tshal byas rdo rje sems dpa' dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang rjesu
434a4(rgyud): chags par byas nas phyag byed du gzhug pa'o//rdo rje thal mo bskor bas ma lus par byas nas thams cad la bstod pa'i phyag rgya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lcags kyu
434a5(rgyud): mchog ni rdo rje bsdams pa'i mthe bo brtan pa'i skyil mo krungs mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa'i lus can dbus ma mnyam pa'i kha 'bus pa'i mchog gi yan lag spyi bor bzhag la g.yas
434a6(rgyud): logs thams cad la cod pan bcings la bdun rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis mdud pa'i tshul byas te/phreng ba bcings pa byas la sgeg pa dang bcas pas mthe'u chung la sogs pa
434a7(rgyud): bkrol te/logs gnyis la dar dbyangs 'ching ba'i tshul byas la mnyam pa'i thal mo rgyas btab pas rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur bar 'gyur ba yin no//de nas bde ba chen po'i
434b1(rgyud): rdo rje'i pad+ma ci'i rgyus dang bsgyur bar byaste/thams cad d+hAdz+ra slob dan nyid dang rdo rje'achang rkun pa nyid du 'byur ba yin//rdo khu tshur gyi rdo rtse lhu rdo rjeni 'ang zer 'bar ba'i rgya
434b2(rgyud): can la dog dmar por sbyin par d+ha'o//slob mas kyang thob dpon la yon dul la de nas me tig la migs pa'i dang sgyu ba thams cad kyi rnye de dab ni lus rdo rje thal mo bskor ba'i byug
434b3(rgyud): 'tshal pa'aM b+hag rgyas b+h+ri byur byA ste/de ltar na dkyil 'khor thams da kyi che ga'o//dranas dngos grub thams cad kyi phyag grub pa'i dzi rje tsha chen po rgyal po sgrub pa'i byug
434b4(rgyud): ts+tshaSh+Ta rlung ni 'di sa chen po'i gso pa chen po'i lhanas rtswa rang gi stong ba'i sngags lan cig brjod pa pa rdo rje skyengs dpa stan de //mas 'i snrel tshe rgyas ldan pas rdo
434b5(rgyud): spyod pa'i dul bas drug 'gyu ba'i byar dang /rdorje khu ra yongs sku gzung bas snyenas pa dang bcas pa'i rdo rje mtshan chel stobs pa b+h+ri bar bras lce sgeg myo pa'i rnams sdug bya'o//

434b7(rgyud): blang bar bya ste/thams cid bde bdes pa rjes su chags pa'i thugs//rdo rje sems dpa'i khyod ni rab tu dga' ba yin//bde ba chen po brtan ning 'thar par bdag gyur cig
435a1(rgyud): sor rtogs nas myur du bsgrubs shing drugra 'tshal lho//rdo rje r+m+ma nI 'di nyid kyis//dade chen la ni lan cig bstod//rjes chags nas shin tu dkyus//brtan//
435a2(rgyud): par gyur nas sgrub par 'gyur//phyag rgya chen po lan gcig tu//snying pos bdag byin brlab par bya'o//shin tu g.yo med lce rtsi dang //so dang mchu gnyis yang dag ldan//
435a3(rgyud): rdo rje dag ni dbyangs dang bral//rigs kun rab tu sgrub par byed//ri be ta sogs hUM gau glu//rgyan ldan ci 'dod mi nus par//drug ldan la sogs snyan dA'i glu//ci 'dod gra ma
435a4(rgyud): rer go'i glu//rab dga' rdo rje mchog gis ni//gA ni d+ha ra ba yi glu mchog blang //ngag 'di ni mchog tu grub pa yin te bzlas pa thams cad la dgos pa ji srid mngon par 'dod pa'i
435a5(rgyud): bzlas pa'o//bzlas pa'i don ni nye ba'i snying po shes pa yin te/rdo rje sems dpa' sgrub pa'o//phyag rgya chen pos rang lde byin gyis brlabs pas//rdo rje'i lta bas de bzhin du lta zhing rdo rje
435a6(rgyud): snyems pas 'dzin cing /yi ge hUM gis glu'i bzlas pa bcom ldan 'das bsgrub par bya'o//lon gcig sgrub pa ni ji lta ba bzhin mngon par 'dod pa'i bzlas pas so//de nas de'i
435a7(rgyud): 'og tu ji ltar mngon par brtson po dang ji ltar 'dod pa dang ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa dang /ji ltar byin gyis brlabs nas yi ge hUM gis rlung gi bzlas pas dga' ba chen po rdo rje don
435b1(rgyud): d+hod pa'i dga' ba'i shugs kyi rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos po thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du 'dod pa dang /ji ltar dga' ba sgrub pa'o//de nas phyag rgya chen po ni//sku gsung thugs kyi
435b2(rgyud): yis//ji bzhin gzugs kyis rjes 'brangs pas//mtshan ma'i phyag rgya yang dag ldan//sems dpa' chen po rang nyid 'gyur//de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni bde ba chen po rdo rje bshad pa'o//
435b3(rgyud): 'di las rdo rje mdar la sogs pa'i 'byung ba yin no//'di lta ste/phyi rol du kha bltas pa'i mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa tsam ni rdo rje'i mda'o//mthe bong yongasu bcings pa ni rdo rje ki li ki la'o//
435b4(rgyud): mthe bong gnyis kha phye nas mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mos dbus ma 'dren pa'i sprin lagr-I dang mthe chung mnyam pa'i kha phye ba ni rdo rje chu srin no//brla gnyis la bskor zhing gnas pa ni rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang
435b5(rgyud): phyug ma'o//rdo rje thal mo rang gi snying khar bskor bas sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i mig gis lta zhing mgo bos phyag byas la spyi bor bzhag la phab ste gyen du gtor ba dang /'og tu blugs pa dang /mthe
435b6(rgyud): bad sbyar nas bskor ba dang /rab tu byug pa ni me tog dang /spros dang /mar me dang /dril bu dang ldan pa'i rdo rje mchod pa rnams su brjod pa yin no//phyi'i mtshams rnams su rdo rje thal mo snying
435b7(rgyud): khar bskor bas sgeg pa'o//kha l-i yongs su bskor nas spyi bor 'jog pa'o//g.yon pa'i mdzub mo bkug g.yon pa g.yas pas bkug pas rdo rje pi wang sgreng zhing rdo rje glus mngon par bstod
436a1(rgyud): pa//rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis slar byas la spyi bor rdo rje thal mo bcing ba'o//rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings pa'i gams pa'i mdzub mo ljags kyu'o//mang+ga rba
436a2(rgyud): gnyis kyis mdud pa'o//mdzub ma dang mthe bong gnyis kyis mdud pa'o//gnyis kyis nang du mthe bong bcings pa'o//de nas gsang ba'i dam tshig rnams ni bde ba chen por rdo rje dam tshig
436a3(rgyud): gi gsang ba'i lcags kyu ste/de las byung ba ni/mtheb mdzub rtse skyer dbus ma'i tshe//mig 'bras ltar byas 'dzin pa'o//dbus ma rdo rje'i 'og tu ni//mthe bong gis munan pacir
436a4(rgyud): bar bya//rdo rje 'dren pa dang 'dra ba//srin lag mthe chung khwa phye 'o//bskor nas dbus mor bzhag pa ste//gzhan rnams thams cad ji bzhin bshad//dam tshig gi rdo rje 'bebs
436a5(rgyud): pa mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa rdo rje khu tshur ro//de las dam tshig pi phyag rgya ni rdo rje dang bcas pa'o khu tshur gnyis kyis so//'di lta ste/g.yon pa sems pas g.yas pa bstod
436a6(rgyud): nga'i tshul gyis snying khur bzung ba ni rdo rje snyems pa'o//bstod pa dang bcas pa'i snying khar 'dzin pa'o//rdo rje bstod pa'i tshul nI ko li ki la'o//rgyal mtshan skyed ba'o//sems
436a7(rgyud): pa gnyis bsdud pa ni 'dod po thams cad kyi rdo rje dbang phyug mi'o//mtshams rnams su rdo rje gar bshad pa'o//sgeg mo la sogs pa yang de bzhin no//rdo rje sde pa rnams kyi ba ni
436b1(rgyud): g.yon pa'i mdud pa ldag pa g.yas pa steng du byung bas rdo rje dkra' bsgo ba byed pa'o//mdzub mo dang mthe bong khrig mar bzung ste mdud do btsiraH'o//rang gi snying khar dril bu dkrol ba'i rlung/
436b2(rgyud): /di rnams kyis thams cad krig pa ng+gA /bting bdu /gzug pa don yod par bstab par bya'o//zhes byeb pad+mag sus so//ti krI ni pa'i madz+nyA mA rnams/
436b3(rgyud): dngos grub chen po myur du gsol//dang ba'i phyag rgya dge 'di dang //dkyil 'khor med pa rnams kyang 'grub//de nas dngos grub med pa sgrub pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcing ba ni dang

437a3(rgyud): basbyor zhing thams cad du dran pa'o//mthe'u chung dang /mthe bong dang /dbus ma'i rdo rje bzhi snying khur bya'o//mdzubo mo gnyis kyis yi ge hUM dang bcas pas dgug pa

437a7(rgyud): spyi bo dang /rnying kha dang /kha dang /phyogs su bskor ba'o//snying khar bzhag nas rang gi rdo rjer sgom pa'o//rang nyid byang chub sems dpar sgom pa'o//rang de bzhin gshegs pa
437b1(rgyud): rdo dran pa'o//rang nyid rdo rje 'chang chen por rjes su dran pa'o//do na sA las kyi tshogs thams cad sgrub pa'i phyag rgya'i rgyud ni rdo rje gar lngas byung ba'i phyab rgya rdo rje 'chang bdag dang de bzhin bshu
437b2(rgyud): ba thams cad kyis kyang don med cing thogs pa med pa'o//rdo rje sku mchog gi btsug tor gyi las ni rdorje brnams pa btsi ba dang /dbus ma'i nor bu dang /brda ba dang /sor ma tham sa nyid rdo
437b3(rgyud): dang /sor mi lhag pa'i 'ad zer gyi 'khor gyi'o//wi ba~M dz+re dz+haiM khu tshur gnyis kyi 'khor lo blor zhing bskor du'o//khar 'dUr bya'o//b+h+rUM khar pa cing 'byur bar byed pas phyog
437b4(rgyud): thams cad du rdo rje 'bar ba'i ra ba ste/khro bo chen po 'byer po'i rdo rje ngag gi kyang 'jug par nus so//dam tshig brjod par bya'o//sgrub pa la brtsam mo//rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje lta bu'i

438a1(rgyud): /sa g+sa so//bldanas na pan// sa d+hak+ko/rna rdza shA dom ma sa rnams nag na nyis 'byum
438a2(rgyud): byani rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o//des 'thil phra bar brdab pa'i//mdzo mo'i sen mo dru pa'o//dbus ma'i rdo rje brtan pa'o//byangs nang m+b+hir du phyug d+hAng grol ba'o//snor mo sbyar nas

438a4(rgyud): kyi las so//mdud pa btsir bya'o//gcig car du phyag rgya dgrol ba'o//bitsir nas dral ba'o//dbus mas bsnun te na mkha' las ltung ba'i tshul lo//slong ba'i tshul yang ngo //ba dran
438a5(rgyud): sam pa gnyis mnyam pa'i ma'u rlud d+hi n+do'i rdo rje dbus ma mdu pas yongs su bskor ba la dab du bsku ba'i gnas su mang ba mo'i ts+tsho mo bzhug pa'o//da ba yai ni'i swA
438a6(rgyud): gis so//gdon las dgrol bA ni yi ge hUM gis so//'chi ba srong ba ni yi ge a yis so//tshe 'phel ba ni yi ge trUM gi brus so//shin tu srung ba ni yi ge haM gi chos kyi
438a7(rgyud): dag gis so//pad+ma chen po bcings nas ji srid 'dod pa'i bzlas pa 'am/yang na pad+ma'i khu tshur g.yon pa bsnyen pas mar dang /til mar dang /til dang /'bras dang
438b1(rgyud): khams kyi phyim sbyin phrag mchog tu grub bAn+te/oM na ba ra Na sarbad+harma ta d+ha hanata/oM bai rA rdo drug tu/sarbad+harmA dz+dza ha raNahA/oMs ni ba sarbad+harmA b+hU ti bid+hA bad+dad+harA/
438b2(rgyud): ni ri tI mi ta sarba d+hirma tI badz+ra ha ra Ni ha~M/oM sarba b+ha wa b+h+ya sa rA sarba d+harmA ha~M raNihaM/kA ta ka gnyis kyi rdo rje bsnams pa legs par byed de'i tshul gyis srin mo drung ba'o//reg dang snang
438b3(rgyud): du rdo rje bsdams pas bskyod pa'o//rdo rje bsdams pa'i mthe'u chung la sogs pa dgrol bas gar ro//rdo rje bsdams pa'i mdzub mos ngag 'byin po/bde pa chen po rdo rje don yod
438b4(rgyud): nga'i dam tshig gi lcags kyus brten pa dang /dayo ba'i dngos pa thams cad la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams dang /gzugs brnyan gyi tshul gyis gsal bar ston pa dang /
438b5(rgyud): sgra brnyan gyi tshul gyis sems can thams cad dang bdag nyid la bden pa thos su gzhug pa'o//rdo rje khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis bcings nas rdo rje lta ba'i las so//'di lta ste/'dzum
438b6(rgyud): med pa'i lta ba sbyin pa'o//mig 'bras steng du yongs su bskor ba'o//btsum pas myur du ltung ba'o//'og nas blang ba'o//byab pa yang ngo //rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas mdzub ma
438b7(rgyud): bkug cing yongs su bskor te mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i 'jigs pa'i gdong gi g.yo bi med pa nyid do//yan lag thams cad glod par 'gyur ba'o//rab tu gnyid log cing kha
439a1(rgyud): gdangs pa'o//rang gi snying khar brdeg pa'o//myur du myang ba'o//rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas kha gdangs te 'jigs par byed pa'i kha dang ldan pa skra gyen du brdzes pa'o//
439a2(rgyud): spyi bos 'og nas gyen du blang bar bya ba'i las ni yi ge b+ho dang rdo rje khu tshur mnan pa dang yi ge hUM drang bcas pa'i yan lag gi mchog gi bsdigs mdzu ba dang rang nyid myur du khros pas
439a3(rgyud): ltung ba'o//rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya srin lag dang mthe'u chung mnyam pa kha phye ba'i ba dan rgyal mchog gi dpung rgyan gyi las ni phyag 'tshal ba dang /dgod pa dang /lce bskyod pa
439a4(rgyud): dang /dpung pa gnyis snyoms pas bstod pa dang /rgyal mtshan sgreng ba'o//sems dpa'i skyil mo krungs kyis gnas shing rdo rje gsor ba nyid kyis ni nam mkha' dbugs gtor ba dang /
439a5(rgyud): kun tu g.yo zhing btsums pa'i lta bas char 'bebs pa'i tshul dang /khro bo'i rdo rje nyi ma me ltor 'bar ba'i bzlas pa dang /lta ba dbrog pa dang /drang bas yan lag bskor zhing
439a6(rgyud): thams cad rab tu 'bar bar byed pa 'bebs pa'o//rdo rje bsdams pa'i rdo rje dran ma'o//rdo rje bsdams pa'i g.yon pa'i mdzub mo bkug pa'i shing bu'i g.yas pa'i mdzub
439a7(rgyud): mos bsdus pa ni rdo rje pi wang ngo //rdo rje bsdams pa'i lag mthil dang mnye ba'o//kha dbus mnyam pa'i dbus ma lce'o//rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o//bde ba chen po'i
439b1(rgyud): rdo rje mchod pa'i las ni dang po'i gru'i bzlas pa ji srid mngon par 'dod pa'o//g.yo ba med rdzing dgod pa dang /dbug pa ni rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i lte nga'i lcags kyu mas so//rang gi ma
439b2(rgyud): mchu so dag gis nang du yongasu bzung ba'o//rang gi dbang po bskyod pa'o//rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje gar gyis yid kyis 'dod pa'i bka' bsgo ba yang sti bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'
439b3(rgyud): la sbyor ba des kyang 'da' bar mi nus na bstan pa dang g.yo ba'i dngos po gzhan lta smos kyang ci dwags/rdo rje thal mo'i mthe bo gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gi mdzub mo sgreng ba ni bcom
439b4(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje'i sku mchog ste/'di skad cig bzung bas shin tu byin gyis brlabs nas bcom ldan 'das bzung zhing mchod nas sgrub par 'gyur ba dang /dngos
439b5(rgyud): grub thams cad la grub pa dang dgos pa yin no//spyi bo'i steng nas g.yas su bskor bar bya'o//sa la bzhag nas khro gnyer gyis gyen du drang bar bya'o//gnod sbyin gyi gzugs
439b6(rgyud): brnyan bris la de'i snying khar bzhag par byas na mngag gzhug tu 'gyur ro//dbang phyug chen po'i gnas su khro zhing bzla bar bya'o//ma mo'i gnas su bcing ba la yi gaM b+h+rU~M sbyar bar
439b7(rgyud): bya ste/ma mo 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur ba dang /rol mo li sogs pa'i bka' bsgo ba thams cad byed par 'gyur ro//rdo rje gsor ba dang bcos pa'i bzhad
440a1(rgyud): pa'i gdong gi las 'di ltar bya ba yin te/'dus na rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas bsgrub par bya'o//mdun du gzhon nu ma sgrub cing mig gnyis kyis
440a2(rgyud): 'phrog pa sbyar bar bya'o//b+ha ga bris nas ltas te bsgrub pa bya'o//dbang phyug chen po rkang pa g.yon pas man nI la yi ge hUM la sbyar bar bya'o//'dod pa'i dbang phyug rdo rje mangs
440a3(rgyud): bsnun te/de nas 'og tu kha lta bar bzhag ste gsor bar byed pa'o//rdo rje gsang ba'i mchod pas bde ba chen po'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i bshad pa'o//thams cad rdo rjer byed pa ni rdo rje
440a4(rgyud): khu tshur gnyis kyis go cha bcing bar byas la spyi bo dang dbang bskur ba'i gnas su gnyis gnyis bzhag la logs gnyis la gnyis dang phreng ba'i tshul gyis de bzhin du dar dpyangs bcing
440a5(rgyud): pa'o//g.yon du rdo rje mda' 'phang ba'o//rdo rje snyems ma'o//phyag rgya chen po yang ngo //dpal mchog dang po las phyag rgya thams cad kyi rgyud kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o////de nas de
440a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud ni sems dpa'i rdo rje ma'o//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur ro//rdo rje rin chen gyi dbang bskur ba byas na rdo rje rtse lnga pa
440a7(rgyud): 'od zer dang bcas pa sbyin par bya'o//mchid pa ni mnyam pa'i thal mo ji lte ba bzhin du gyen du gtor ba la sogs pa rnams kyis so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur gnyis
440b1(rgyud): na na ma /Sh+Ta da/ twA smra du/na du nga rgya ga
440b2(rgyud): zhin ga shegs pa rnams gyes rlu gas du hU~M/don 'a sngags maud pa di thA ba da sa
440b3(rgyud): /thu dang ldan pa dang 'dudu la gyi pa gzhan gyis bya par sa //rgyag kyi bye kyis pa de ni da na pa
440b4(rgyud): na sa pa mams sarjod par gyu // /rkyen dpam kyi tshigs //dem tshi nAM dz+nyA ni//de
440b5(rgyud): / na gyi shegs byams ca du bar da // na sbyin te shegs khams pa ts+tshed pa ts+tsha slo
441a1(rgyud): bshad do//g.yon pa chos gos dang bcas pa rang gi snying khar stod nga'i tshul gyis bzung ste/g.yas pas sa gnon cing rab tu rgyal bar byed pa zhes bya ba ste des
441a2(rgyud): bdud kyi stobs rnams 'joms pa'o//de nyid yongs su bskor te gyen du kha lta bar bzung nas gzengs bstod pa zhes bya ba ltung ba slong bar byed cing lung ston par byed pa'o//de
441a3(rgyud): nyid chos gos mtha' mar pad+ma'i 'dab ma khwa 'byed par byed pa chos 'byung ste/chos thams cad sbyor bar byed pa'o//de nyid ba dan gsum gyis bzung ba slong bar byed pa ste
441a4(rgyud): gdon mi za bar dngos grub rtsol ba'o//'di rnams g.yos pas las byed cing don yod pa dang bcings pa tsam gyis 'grub pa'o//lhag ma ni ci lta ba bzhin du bzung bso//
441a5(rgyud): de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur nad gzir ba'o//mig yongs su sbyang ba'o//snying khar bzhag pa'o//khyab pa'o//khu tshur
441a6(rgyud): gyis 'phrog pa'o//bza' ba'o//khros nas gtor bar bya'o//phur bu gdon pa'o//rting pa la brdeg pa'o//yi ge oM dris nas dbyi bar bya'o//so rnams kyis bzung /
441a7(rgyud): bar bya'o//yi ge hUM dang bcas pas brdeg par bya'o//mtshon cha bris nas dbyi bar bya'o//kun tu sbyin bsreg bya'o//dur ba'i sbyin bsreg bya'o//spyi bor bzhag la lta
441b1(rgyud): bas byab par bya'o//steng du la T+wAM gra bzung ba'o//rang gi khyim du bsgo ba //rang gi khyim du bzhag par bya'o//'jug par bya'o//snying kha las gdon par bya'o//lus la bskor
441b2(rgyud): bar bya'o//dag 'byin ra'o//snying khar btsir bar bya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po ni sku mchog ri//brtan par bya'o//dbang po la bzhag par bya'o//
441b3(rgyud): kha la'o//de nyid du bskor bar bya'o//dpral bar bzhag par bya'o//snying khar ro//dpud pa gnyis la'o//baR+Ya gnyis la'o//phreng ba bcing ba'o//dbang po rnams la'o//spyi
441b4(rgyud): bo la'o//gdod pa la'o//kha las gton nus so//thams cad du bskor bar bya'o//phyogs rnams su bskor ba bya'o//rang dang gzhan dag de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su
441b5(rgyud): dran pa'o//snying kha las rjes su dran pa'o//snying khar bzhag nas dga' ba poskyed par bya'o//sangs rgyas nyid bskyed par bya'o//sangs rgyas thams cad nyid sgom pa'o//
441b6(rgyud): phung po lnga la bzhag par bya'o//rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo ltar bskor bar bya'o//lus rjes su dran pa'o//lce bzhag par bya'o//yid kyis mngon par gdud par bya'o//
441b7(rgyud): gtong pa rjes su dran pa'o//tshul khrims so//byams pa'o//brtson 'grus so//ting nge 'dzin no//shes rab bo//ye shes so//stobs so//thabs so//nges par brjod
442a1(rgyud): pa'o//sa'o//spyod du'o//smyo tsor yang dag par rik+ta/pa'o//ma 'dres du'o//chos s+t+wa~M/sgras rdzogs s+ho//sums can don no//ngas rgyas
442a2(rgyud): kyang don no//lus so//dgu go//sgyid do//rdo rje chen de'o//oM baMd+hIdz+re/A~M sa man+ta b+hut+ne tsAr+ye d+hI/oM tsin+d+ra ma Ni/oM a ts+tshi rod+ha/oM dzi ti b+hir te/oM sAHdz+nyA naM/A~M man+ta
442a3(rgyud): ga d+harmA t+te/oM bI d+yA kA ba ts+tsha/oM badz+ra d+h+r-i r+thats+tshit+taM hUM/oM sarba ta thA ga twe/oM swa d+ha baM bi shud+d+heH/d+harma tA dz+nyA na bi shud+d+he/oM karma bi shud+d+he/hUM sum+b+ha badz+ri Ni phaT/oM kar+m+ma rI
442a4(rgyud): gau.oM dzaH d+hI/oM b+h+yAs mi.oM ak+Sha mu khaM/A~M prad+b+ha pA rA mi t+ta //oM sarba tA thA ga ta kA smr-i g+h+ra A~M ba~Mrba~M tA thA ga tA d+ha bi shwad+d+ha/
442a5(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga tA tsit+ta badz+rA aH/dri nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngag gi phyag rgya ni dbyangs shin tu zab pa'i sgra dang ldan pa'i phyag d+ha'i chos kyi ngag skye de bzhin gshegs pa
442a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi dag thogs pa med par 'gyu ba da'o//de nas bzlas pa ni rjes su dran po'o//zlab bu la de bzhin no//les lnga nye bar sbyor ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/
442a7(rgyud): cad rjes su dran pas so//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcing ba'o//de nas rdo rje nyi ma me ltar 'bar ba'i phyag rgyob cing ba ni de la phyag rgya chen po ni bdag
