442b1(rgyud): nyid thams cad kyis rjes na'o//dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i rgyud ni rdo rje bsdum s+ya ba nang du bci la por mo thar ba cad kyi dbar bya'i dkyil 'khor gyinang man bdun rdo rje zhag la khams gsum
442b2(rgyud): pa thams cad sreg pa dang /'tshed pa dang /thal bar byed par nes te bcom ldan 'angs kyis kyad dbang du byed par 'gyur ro//de nyid sdig yon pa'i sor mo sdig 'dzu byi zhing g.yas
442b3(rgyud): lcags thus dgug par byas na thams cad 'gug pa'o//rdo rje d+hI ci m+b+ha bA n+te ni rgyo ba dzo bu ro gnyis pa'i rdo rje pa'i rlung gi lcag smras pacing sa te/des bsdigs ma dzu
442b4(rgyud): mas cid da da sa zla thams cad nyams su myong pa yinano//rdo rje thal nas sa da po sa khyog nga du zhig pa d+d+he sa stug tu myur du 'dre na na ra don rdo rje
442b5(rgyud): ra ro//thams cad sbyin par byed pa dang /thams cad 'dum bar byed pa dade/rab tu 'brel bar byed pa ni zlo gnyer ni phyug rgya'o//rnarnaM thal mos logs par bsgyur bar gzhan deni/
442b6(rgyud): dzum mo lcag su na ste dgug pa dang bzhag pa dang sgrub pa dmupa rji la don stod pa'o//rdo rje pad+ma bras mnyes pa'i kha 'bras kyi mdzod de//rdo rje ba d+ha ni thams cad gcong par byed pa//
442b7(rgyud): rje bsdam sa pa ni ma dzong dang mdzu ba che'i gdu byas g.yas pa'i hUM gis mdzub mos brdud ste thams cad dgag pa dang /gzhug pa dang /me chog tu grub pa'o//rdo rje hUM mdzad las byung ba ni ga
443a1(rgyud): pa'i mdzub mos g.yon pa'i yi ge hUM bzung ba ste gzhur rgyud 'dren pa zhes bya ba thams cad rjes su chags par byed pa dang 'bigs par byed pa'o//rdo rje bsdams pa las
443a2(rgyud): rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi mchog go//rdo rje bsdams pa'i g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur g.yas pa'i rtse gesum gyis mtshan pas yongs su bzung ba ste/thams cad dral bar byed pa'o//rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi
443a3(rgyud): g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyi mthe'u chung yang dag par brkyang ba g.yon lag pa'i steng du bzhag pa ni kha T+wAM ga sgreng ba ste/'dug pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya phye zhing dral bar byed pa dang /rgyas 'debs pa
443a4(rgyud): dang /gsod pa dang /za ba la sogs pa'i yo byad thams cad g.yas pas 'khor lo bzung ba'i tshul gyis stod cing dor ba ste/thams cad gcod pa dang /gcod par byed pa'o//rdo rje
443a5(rgyud): chen po'i khro bo'i rdo rje'o//g.yas pa'i rdo rje 'bebs pa dang /sbyor ba spro zhing g.yo ba'i 'dab ma can gyi ba dan gsum pa'o//rdo rje bsdams pa'i mthe bong dang mdzub mo gnyis kyi
443a6(rgyud): rdo rje las byung ba'i srin lag mnyam par sbyar zhing mthe'u chung kho phye'o//dpal thams cad byed pa dang /rnam par rgyal bar byed pa dang /gdug pa thams cad 'joms par
443a7(rgyud): byed pa dang /thams cad 'bebs par byed pa'o//rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur bshad pa'o//rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi ni//rdo rje thal mo mnyam byas la//mdzub
443b1(rgyud): me gnyis kyis dar dpyangs bcing //mthe khong srin lag rdo rje ni//yongs su bskor te dbang bskur ro//'bar bu'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa phyag nas bzung bar bya'o//ci 'byor pas slob dpon la yA
443b2(rgyud): phul te dngos grub thams cad kyi mchog phun sum tshogs pa rnams 'grub pa 'gyur ro//zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungaso//rdo rje phyag rgya rdo rje ti rin+da tI
443b3(rgyud): ri las byung ba ste/don yod thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o//de nas las kyi phyag rgya bzhi ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i lha mo rnams so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi las kyi dam tshig
443b4(rgyud): ni rdo rje khu tshur g.yon pas snyems pa thams cad sgrub pa dang /g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje gsor ba ste 'dis thams cad ngargyal ba dang /'bar ba dang /sreg pa dang /ltung ba dang /
443b5(rgyud): rgyas btab pa dang /bsad pa dang /slong ba dang /khams gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang /brtan pa dang /g.yo ba thams cad la nges par sbyor ba dang /dngos grub dang /mchog thams
443b6(rgyud): cad sgrub pa'o//de nas las kyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje khu tshur bsdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i mdzub mo ni khro bo'i khu tshur ro//de dag gi lasau dam tshig phyag rgya'o//mdzub mo'i sor
443b7(rgyud): mo gnyis kyis thams cad dgug pa'o//snying khar cig shos dang g.yas pas gdug pa thams cad gcod pa'o//'khrig ma'i mdud pas g.ya sau pa'i khro bo 'gugs pas thams
444a1(rgyud): cad dgug pa dang rab tu gzhug pa'o//bstod pa dang bcas pa'i 'da' 'phangs pa'o//de bzhin du rdo rje rtse gsum pa la sogs pa'i rdo rje gur gyi sbyor ba pa rang
444a2(rgyud): phyag rgya gyen du 'phang ba'o//las kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya gnyis su byas la rdo rje thal mo rnams kyi lus kyi phyag rgya ste/rdo rje gar gyi sbyor bas rang gi dam tshi gri phyag rgya steng du dor ba ste/
444a3(rgyud): thams cad las rgyas gdab pa dang /sgrub pa dang /gsod pa dang /'bebs pa dang /'tsho bar byed pa ni rdo rje bor gyi mchod pa'o//de nas ngag gi phyag rgya ni sprin gyi sgra sgrogs pa'i hU~M
444a4(rgyud): yi ge hUM pra ba'i sgra dang bcas pa khro zhing gsal ba'i khro bo'i rdo rje ngag go//sgrub pa'i don bsgrub par bya'o//de nas ma grub na las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba'o//sgrub pa ni de bzhin du
444a5(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po lan gcig tu bya'o//las la nges par sbyor ba khro gnyer gyis so//rdo rje hUM mdzad las byung ba'o//ske tshe dang bcas pa'i til mar rnon po'i sreg ni g.yas
444a6(rgyud): pas so//de nyid kyis btang ba'o//de nyid kyis thams cad 'ching pa'o//g.yo ba med pa nyid do//gAnyid log pa bstan pa'o//khro bo'i rdo rje lta ba'i bsdigs mdzub bo//phyag
444a7(rgyud): rgya glod par gyur pa'o//mdzub mo gnyis yang dag par sbyar nas phye ba'o//de dag nyid kyis gdu bu bcing ba'o//mche bas btsir ba'o//de nas dral ba'o//g.yas pas bdeg
444b1(rgyud): pa'o//mdzub mo gnyis kyis 'bar ba'o//g.yas pa'i mdzub mo g.yon pa ltung ba'i tshul lo//mdzub mo gnyis kyi 'brar bar phye ba'o//bcor pa'o//mdzub mo gnyis kyis sor ma
444b2(rgyud): sbyar ba'i rtse mo garjod pa'o//lag pa gnyis drag tu gnye ba'o//thams cad du ser mo thams cad dor ba'o//gcig car du phyag rgya dgrol ba'o//drang zhing g.yo bas bsdigs mdzub
444b3(rgyud): bo//g.yas pa'i mdzub myo gdengs ka bskyod pas bsdigs mdzub bo//g.yas pa'i mdzub mo mche bas bzung ba'o//du ba dang /dgod pa dang /rgyug bya la sogs pas bstan pa'o//
444b4(rgyud): mdzub mo gnyis kyis so gol rdebs pa'o//g.yon pa'i steng du g.yas pa nye bar bzhag pa'o//sa la rab tu bzhag pa'o//bskyod par bya'o//gar bya'o//'byin pa'o//brlab par bya'o//
444b5(rgyud): thams cad du brlab par bya'o//ha har dgod pa'o//bskor ba'i dgug par bya'o//drang bar bya'o//btang bar bya'o//yongs su bskor nas nub par bya'o//de nas dor ba'o//myur du dor
444b6(rgyud): ba'o//de bzhin du kun nas 'dren pa'o//de bzhin du gyen du drang ba'o//rang nyid kyi nga ro bya'o//bdag nyid la brdeg par bya'o//snying khyer brdeg par sbyin par bya'o//rang nyid kyis
444b7(rgyud): rang gi skra 'bal bar bya'o//sdang bar sdom pa'o//rang gi gos stod par bya'o//khro bos de bzhin du 'bar ba ston pa'o//g.yas pas mdzub mo lcags kyu'o//de nyid kyi rab tu gzhug
445a1(rgyud): pa'o//g.yas pa'i sa tshul lo//g.yon pa'i sa go lnga lo//lce reg pa ni ma dzub mo gnyis kyis so//yan lagal ba lkugayas su bskor bskor bas 'khyil ba'o/
445a2(rgyud): ltung ba la sogs pa byed pa'o//dus su sgom pa'o//khro bo'i lta bas shing drung rnams la yid kyis 'dod pa'o//de bzhin du sa la'o//lta ba'o//smin ma'o//sa'o//ngu'o//phyag rgyas brdeg
445a3(rgyud): pa'o//rgyal mtshan sgreng ba'o//khro bo dang bcas pa'i 'jigs byed kyi lta bas so//'dzum pa med pas lta bas so//de bzhin du 'bar ba 'ching bas so//phyag rgya bskor ba'o//gtsug
445a4(rgyud): tor las mdzub mo'i rdo rje bzhag par bya'o//de bzhin du snying khar ro//phyag rgya de dgrol ba'o//phyag rgya zur du bslang ba'o//mdzub mo'i rtse mo brtan par sbyar ba'o//lta bas steng nas
445a5(rgyud): 'og tu ltung ba'o//'og nas gyen du 'dren pa'o//yi ge hUM khros pa'o//'jigs byed kyi lta bus so//rdo rje kha T+wAM ga dral ba khro bas so//rdo rje snying khar sgom pa'o//rdo rje rtse
445a6(rgyud): gsum dril ba'o//gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor gzhig par bya'o//yi ge hUM gis so//hi'o/g.yas su dbugs dbyung ba'o//de nyid kyi dong rtse gsor ba'o//khro bo'i lta ba
445a7(rgyud): de bzhin du'o//khu tshur g.yas pas mnan te g.yon pas so//bzung nas dgug pa'o//dong rtse gsor ba ni gnyis kyis so//g.yon pa'i dril bu dral ba'o//de bzhin du
445b1(rgyud): rdorje rje mdzad kyi g.yas pa'i khu tshur g.yon pa rdo rdo rje khro bos mnan te mthe'u chung gi gdu bu dkrol ba'i khu tshur gyis 'phrog bang bya'o//g.yas pa'i dril du dral ba'o//tshogs dang bral ba
445b2(rgyud): lhung ba ni yid kyis so//'khor lo dral du'o//hUM gsuM dral ba'o//rdorje hU~M mdzad kyi g.yon pA ga mas de'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis mnan te de bzhin du gdu bu bkrol bas 'phrog par bya'o//
445b3(rgyud): dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /rdo rje 'chang chen po rje su dran pas mdun du bsgrub par bya'o//rdo rje khro bo rgyal po'i phyag rgya'i rgyud do//de nus
445b4(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'i rgyud ni pad+ma chen po rdo rje thal mo kha sbub pa dbu ma dang mthe bo dang //mthe'u chung kha phye ba'i 'dab ma bzhi pa chos nyid thams cad thob
445b5(rgyud): pa dang /thams cad rje su chags par byed pa'o//phyag rgya chen po rnams ni de bzhin no//dam tshig phyag rgya rdo rje pad+ma bshad pa'o//pad+ma'i rigs kyis rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'o//
445b6(rgyud): de la pad+ma de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni nang gi rdo rje bsdoms pa las byung ba'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i pad+ma dbang par gyen du kha phye ba lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ming can gyi phyag rgya
445b7(rgyud): pad+ma'i spyan zhes bya'o//rdo rje pad+ma chen po'i rdo rje pad+ma snying khar rdo rje bcing ba rdo rje pad+ma'i chags pa zhes bya'o//pad+ma chen po'i bdag po mdzub mo mnyam pa 'og tu kha lta ba dbang bar bzung
446a1(rgyud): ba pad+ma'i sgrol ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//pad+ma chen po'i ba dan rin po che gnyis bzung zhing des pad+ma sbyin pa'o//'di rnams kyi chos nyid thams cad las thob pa
446a2(rgyud): dang thams cad rje su chags pa dang srid pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshogs thams cad las sgrol ba dang /bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu grub pa zhes bya'o//
446a3(rgyud): rdo rje gsum dral ba'o//de nas pad+ma lha'i bdag po rnams kyi phyi rol gyi bsdams pa las byung ba'o//de la don yod rgyal po ni 'og tu mdzub mo gnyis kyi kha 'bus pa khro
446a4(rgyud): gnyer la bzhag par bya ste/pad+mo'i khro gAnyer gyi spyan no//rdo rje bsdams pa kha gyen du 'bar ba ni mgrin sngon gyi'o//g.yon pa'i mdzub mo bkug pa mthe bos yongasu
446a5(rgyud): bzung ste/rung gi da byib sa de g.yas pa'i mthu bong spyad pa bte ga ste/mthe'u chung mnyam pa'i kha 'bus pa'i byed+ma dang /sor mo lhag pa yang dag par brkyang pa'i 'khor la
446a6(rgyud): ni pad+ma'i khyab 'jug ma'o//pad+ma las byung ba'i mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa'i lcags kyu dang sor mo lhag ma kha phye ba'i pad+ma las byung ba'o zhes bya'o//rta mgrin gyi ni mdzub mo
446a7(rgyud): gnyis shin tu sbyar ba'i lcags kyu rgod ma'i kha shin tu rab tu brkyang ba'i srin lag gi rtse mo dang /mthe'u chung dang gnyis rab tu brkyang ba so sor phye la g.yon g.yo zhing bzung
446b1(rgyud): ban+di da d+ma'i lcags kyu zhes bya'o//'di rnams kyis dbang bskur ba thams cad dang /las thams cad dang /grol ba thams cad dang /dgug pa thams cad kyi dngos grub don yod pa'o//
446b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mchog gi ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya bshad pa'o//de nas las kyi phyag rgya ni kha T+wAM ga bcings nas pad+ma'i rigs thams cad kyi dmatshig gi phyag rgya de lta ba bzhin du
446b3(rgyud): gzung bas so//ngag gi ting nge 'dzin gyis bzungs dgug pa ni chos kyi ngag gis bzlas pa'i don shes pa'o//pad+ma chen po bcings nas yid kyi sbyin bsreg bya'o//sems kyis ni
446b4(rgyud): bar bya'o//dngos po bsrung bar bya'o//rnam par sbyang bar bya'o//zhes bya ba bsgrub par bya'o//las thams cad pa'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so//'phags pa sbyin ras gzigs dbang
446b5(rgyud): phyug gi phyag rgya'i rgyud do//de nas na mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya chen po de bzhin no//dam tshig gi phyag rgya rdo rje rin tshon te mthe bong dang mdzub mo'i sor mo bzhi ni rtse mo mnyam nas
446b6(rgyud): 'og tu rab tu bsdus te/dbang bskur ba'i rdo rje thal mos dbang bskur ba thams cad thob pa'o//des ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur ba'o//rdo rje de nyid snying khar ro//gyen du kha
446b7(rgyud): bsdu ba'o//de nyid khu tshur ro//khu tshur spyi bor bzhag la me tog l-i sogs pa'i mchod pa dbul bar bya'o//'di nyid dbus su pa~M na gnas las kyi phyag rgyar bzung ba'o//nga
447a1(rgyud): bskur ba thams cad kyi rin po che'i gter gyi mchod du thob pa'i don du yang dag par rdzogs pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis las kyi dam tshig ni gsal ba
447a2(rgyud): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o//g.yon pa'i khu tshur snying khar stod nas g.yas pa nor sbyin pa bkrol ba'o//nor bu'i khu tshur gyi phyag rgya'i nyid kyis so//snying
447a3(rgyud): po'i ngag klu'i rgyal pos bzla ba ste bka' bsgo zhing de bzhin du las la nye bar sbyor ba'o//gal te ma grub na dbang bskur bar gnas pa'i rdo rje rin tshon gyis na mkhar las thams
447a4(rgyud): cad kyi bka' bsgo ba'o//chos kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyi tshogs ni 'di'o//don yod thogs med grub pa dang /las kyi tshogs ni sgrub pa dang /ngag gi phyag rgya'i bka' bsgo ba//
447a5(rgyud): thams cad myur du mkha' las byung //zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o//de nas phyi'i rgyud ni phyag rgya chen
447a6(rgyud): po ni g.yon par kham phor dang g.yas na mda' stod pa'o//de rnams kyi dam tshig ni 'jug pa la bya ste/lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bo dang mthe'u chung gi gdu bus lu gu rgyud bcing
447a7(rgyud): bar byas la mdzub mo dang dbus ma dang /srin lag mnyam ste rtse gsum pas mtshan pa ni ming po rnams kyi'o//ji lta ba bzhin du bzung bas lha mo rnams kyi'o//rdo rje bsdams pa'i
447b1(rgyud): dbus ma dang srin lag gis sor mo'i rtse mo bzhi la mdzub mo dang ma'u chung bzhi'i rtse mo 'dus pa ni lha mo rnams kyis 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig go//sring mo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag
447b2(rgyud): rgyu'o//gang gi tshe dkyil 'khor gyi brtag par ma nus na de'i tshe 'di bcings te bltas na dkyil 'khor brtag pa dang mthong ba dang mchod pa ci dgar 'grub par 'gyur ro//gdengs kau can/
447b3(rgyud): rmyi dbang po rnams kyi ni mthe bong bcings nus phyi rol tu kha bltas pa'i sor mo gdangs ka sgreng ba ste/klu thams cad dgug pa dang /gzhug pa dang /bcing ba dang /dbang du bya ba'i dam
447b4(rgyud): tshig ste/gal te 'da' bar byed na 'chi bar 'gyur ro//lto 'phye lag pa ste thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o//dbus ma srin lag bzhi'i 'dud pa legs par byed pa'i sbyor bas nye bar spyod/
447b5(rgyud): cing bsdus la mtho chung gnyis kyi rtse mo gnyis kyis brdeg par bya ste/nye bar 'phel ba dug thams cad 'bar ba'o//kun nas bsdus na dug thams cad 'ching ba'o//'dri nyid kyis
447b6(rgyud): drug thams cad bza' ba dang 'pho ba dang drug med par bya'o//gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung ba'i rdo rjes khros nas myur du gzhig par bya'o//phyi'i phyag rgya'i rgyud do//
447b7(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mchog dbang phyug dam pa sna thigs pa'i phyag rgya ni/rdo rje thal mo mnyam gzhag nas//bdan gsum ni yongs su bzung //rdo rje khyo 'jug
448a1(rgyud): /pad+ma/dor na thams cad gcod par byed//rdo rje 'khor la'i phyag rgyas nyon mongs pa'i dgra thams cad kyi mdo rnams bcad nas mchog tu byung ba thams cad grub pa'o//mtha'
448a2(rgyud): chung mthe bong dang sbrel ba'i//lag gnyis steng dang 'og tu ni//dbus ma gsum gyi rtse gsum mtshan//rdo rje 'dzin ma zhes sgrub pa'o//rdo rje dam tshig phyag rgya rdo rje gtum pa'i dbang phyug ma
448a3(rgyud): zhes bya ba don yod pa'i dam tshig go//rdo rje pad+ma mnyam gzhag nas//gang dar ji bzhin de bzhin du//shin tu thob dka'i sangs rgyas kyang //sgrub pa bzlas pas sgrub par byed//rdo rje chos
448a4(rgyud): nyid ces bya ba'i phyag rgya sgrol ma'o//mdzub mo bsdams pa'i phyi rol dgug/mthe bong rdo rje bkab pa ste//rdo rje chen po'i nor bu ster//zhes bya ba ni rdo rje nor bu zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//
448a5(rgyud): de nas thams cad kyi dbang phyug dam pas bsgrubs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi tshogs kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud ni 'di yin te//de la dang par shig dang po'i dngos grub brgya rab tu sgrub par byed
448a6(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya rab tu sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya chen po stong 'gyur te/ji lta ba bzhin du dam tshig phyag rgya mtshan rnams kyis lag pa g.yas pa dang /g.yon pa dag gi rdo rje tshon
448a7(rgyud): po'i sbyor ba las thams cad kyi dngos grub tu sgrub par byed pa'i stong pa nyid du 'gyur te/rdo rje bsdams pa'i nang du bcings pas so//de ltar na rang gi mtshan gyi khu tshur rdo
448b1(rgyud): rje gar las byung ba'i phyag rgya stong dang blo'i las kyi tshogs brgya sgrub par byed pa'i rdo rje las byed pa gsum mo//de ltar la smra ba g.yas pa dang /g.yon pa'i gcig shos kyis las thams
448b2(rgyud): cad rab tu sgrub par byed pa'i las kyi phyag rgya stong bzhi pa'o/de ltar ma lus pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba ni lag pa ga cig gis phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba rab tu sgrub pa'o//de ltar
448b3(rgyud): 'gro ba don kun tu//'khor dang dam tshig las dang bcas//kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa ni//rdo rje sems dpas sgrub par mdzad//de ltar gsang ba rgya chen rmad du byung /
448b4(rgyud): mchog tu 'gro ba thams cad spyod byed pa//mchog dang po yi bla ma bla na med//gsal ba'i rgyud ni nga yis yang dge ba shang //dmyal mchog dang po'i rtog pa'i rgyal po las rigs
448b5(rgyud): thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud do//de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin//gseng bdun gyi bdag brtan pas//de nyid phyag rgya'i rgyud chen po//mtshon cha ngadam pa 'di gsungs so//de nas
448b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i rtog pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtog pa'i tshogs mchog tu mkhas shing phra ba/rgya che la zab pa/bsam gyis mi khyab pa/
448b7(rgyud): tshad med pa/gsal zhing mnyam pa med pa/bla na med pa'i bla ma mthar thug pa med pa'i dngos grub kyi gsang ba sgrub pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las rnams
449a1(rgyud): sgrub pa bangon yod cing thogs pa med pa bshad par bya'o//zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das mchog tu gas bus gsungs//ma mchu so rnams kyu bzung la
449a2(rgyud): dga' ba chen pos dang po'i rdo rje'i lta bas lta zhing byed pa dag gis ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i dngos grub thams cad ky-i las kyi tshogs rnams sgrub par byed pa'o//bde ba chen po'i
449a3(rgyud): gsang ba chen po'i rdo rje rdo rje can zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzhad pa chen pos dgod cing brtan pa'i rdo rje lta bu'i byed bdag gis de bzhin gshegs
449a4(rgyud): ba thams cad kyi las rnams sgrub par byed pa ste/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//khro gnyer dang bcas pa/khro bo'i rdo rje lta ba dang bcas pa'i/
449a5(rgyud): byed pa dag dang /sna'i dbugs chen po'i yi ge hU~M gis rdo rje thams cad kyi dngos grub ste/rdo rje nyi ma ltar me 'bar ba'i lta ba'i spyan zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//de bas cung zad
449a6(rgyud): 'dzum pas dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje lta ba'i byed pa rnams kyis mchu mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin rdo rje la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi ye shes
449a7(rgyud): kyi tshogs rnams sgrub par byed pa ste/pad+ma chen po'i spyan zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//snyems pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis phra bar 'dzum pa'i lta ba'i byed pa rnams dang /bzhin
449b1(rgyud): 'dzum pa dang bzhad pas nam mkha' la dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs sgrub par byed pa ste/rdo rje chen pa ni nor bu'i spyan zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//don yang thogs med grub pa dang /
449b2(rgyud): bden pa'i bdag nyid 'jig pa med//sangs rgyas kun dang bdag nyid kyang //dri ming dri'i phyag rgya lags grub stsol//kyi l-I 'khor du ni mazhugs kyang //de nas de phyir mchog dang pa/
449b3(rgyud): bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' mchog/dang po shin tu mkhas shing bral zab cing rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab ste/mchog gi mchog ni dang po dang //mchog tu gsang ba dam pa ste/dza
449b4(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgyal sogs chags//rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa yin//rdo rje 'chang chen slob dpon ni//mchog tu dang zhing rab dga' bas//snying po la sogs rnams med kyang //mur
449b5(rgyud): du thams cad sgrub par byed//snying po phyag rgya sngags rigs pa//sgrub pa 'di ni rmad byung ste//dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub pas//ma grub rnams kyang 'grub par 'gyur//gang zhig
449b6(rgyud): grub par ma g+har dang //bsod nams phun tshogs mi ldan na//bdag nyid dam ni rdo rje sems//bsgrubs na de ni myur du 'grub//gal te rdo rje sems dpa' mchog/snying po sogs
449b7(rgyud): dang nye snying pos//sgrub pa byas kyang ma grub na/'dzum pa'i phyag rgyas bsgrub par bye//de phyir gsang ba'i btsum mo 'di//rdo rje sems dpa' rab dga' byed//rdo rje sems dpa'
450a1(rgyud): dga' da n+do//dgyes bu de yis myur du 'grub//de nyid chen blo 'di grub pa//dam pa mchog gi bdag nyid ni//gsang ba mchog tu bsod nams ldan//
450a2(rgyud): sro'i skye bo la brjod min//de nyid grub pa'i rjes 'brang ba'o//rdo rje sems dpa'i grub pa grang //gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na//de bzhin gzhan la sbyin mi bya//gang
450a3(rgyud): gis grub par ma gyur na//dri la de nyid sbyin par bya//de nyid 'dzum pas myur du ni//bdag byin rlabs pas 'grub par 'gyur//de nyid chen po dag pa 'di//rdo rje can gyi mtshon
450a4(rgyud): cha mchog/phyag rgya'i rgyud ni bla med pa//mchog tu gsang ba bshad pa yin//de nyid drang po'i rjes 'byung ba'o//rdo rje slob dpon kun mchog la//gal te dngos grub
450a5(rgyud): mchog 'dod no//gzhan rnams la yang de bzhin sbyin//phyag rgya'i rgyud ni gcig pu 'di//bdag nyid gang la yod gyur na//bdud la sogs pa rnams kyis ni//mi
450a6(rgyud): thub pa dang mi sod 'gyur//de la rgyal ba rdo rje 'dzin//kun mchog dngos grub kun gsol ba//kun gsol kun byed thams cad du//bka' bsgo ba kun grub par
450a7(rgyud): 'gyur//dpal mchog dang po gsong ba'i bla ma dam pa'i dpal rang gi dam tshig gi bla na med pa'i mchog tu gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i cho ga'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal
450b1(rgyud): mchog dang po rdo rje sems dpa'i mchog dang po mchog tu mkhas shing phra la zab cing rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab la mtha' med cing shin tu mtha' yas pa tshad med cing gzhal du med pa/bla na
450b2(rgyud): med pa/don yod cing thogs pa med pa'i mchog de kho na nyid kyi snying po mchog tu gsang ba'i snying po mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub chen po'i badrag po
450b3(rgyud): nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i dam pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dang /rab tu dga' ba thams cad dang /bde ba dang yid bde ba'i
450b4(rgyud): dngos grub kyi mchog sgrub par byed pa dang /mchog gi phyag rgya'i rgyud bshad par bya'o//zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungaso//tsum pa nas 'khyud pa la sogs pa'i
450b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das mchog dang rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya thams cad ni dga' ba chen po dpal rdo rje don yod pa'i dga' ba'i dam tshig rnal 'byor zhes bya ba ste thams cad rnal 'byor zhes
450b6(rgyud): bya bar gang brjod pa'o//de dag dang gang la nye bar sbyor ba de dang der bcom ldan 'das ni/kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi//dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha//byin rlabs mchog
450b7(rgyud): ni rtags mdzad nas//rdo rje sems dpa' myur du 'grub//tsum pa na 'khyud pa la sogs pa'i reg bya'i rgya btab pa tsam gyis kyang ma lus shing lus pa med pa dang /lhag ma med pa thams
451a1(rgyud): cad kyi mchog dbang phyug chen po'i bdag nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi rdzogs yid kyi 'dod pa grub par byed pa yin no//zhes bya ba shin
451a2(rgyud): mchog tu gsad pa'i phyag rgya'o//rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa'i 'dzum zhing g.yo ba'i mig gi zur gyis lta ba'i phyag rgya ste/bcom ldan 'das kyi dga' ba chen po'i rdo rje den
451a3(rgyud): yod pa'i mnga' zhes bya bas rgyas btab pas thams cad rjes su chags pa dgug pa dang /dbang du bya ba dang /dngos grub mchog la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi
451a4(rgyud): tshogs yid kyi 'dod pa rnams sgrub par byed pa'o//'dzum zhing cung zad phye ba'i mig gi lta ba ni mchog tu dga' ba'i dpal rdo rje spyan zhes bya'i phyag rgya thams cad sgrub par byed pa
451a5(rgyud): ste 'dis lta zhing btung bar bya'o//'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu dka' ba chen po dpal rdo rje don yod dga' ba'i bcud kyis len gyi mchog gi dngos grub ces bya ba'i
451a6(rgyud): phyag rgya ste tshe zad pa thams cad kyang 'dis rdo rje sems dpa'i na chod gzhon pa dang /nad med pa dang /gzugs dang /stobs dang /gzi brjid kyi stobs dang /spro ba dang /dngos
451a7(rgyud): grub kyi mchog thams cad dang /dpal dang bskal pa bzang po dang /dga' ba chen po dang /shin tu bde ba thams cad dang /yid bde ba dang /dngos grub kyi mchog thob pa ste/
451b1(rgyud): ji srid dngos grub kyi mchog thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs mchog tu dam pa grub ste/bcom ldan 'das yum gyi rgyas btab pa tsam gyis skad cig ma gcig gis grub pa'o//snyems pa dang /
451b2(rgyud): bcas pa'i g.yon pa'i mig dkod cing bstod pa ni/bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i dpal don yod pa'i dga' ba'i rgyal mtshan mchog gi dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/'dis
451b3(rgyud): rgyas btab pas thams cad las rnam par rgyal bar byed pa dang /phyag byed du bcug pa dang rab tu sgrub par byed pa dang /ji bzhin ji srid mchog thams cad grub cing dngos grub chen
451b4(rgyud): po'i dbang phyug nyid rab tu sgrub par byed pa'o//sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i lta ba dang /'dzum pa dang gsong zhing phyag 'tshal ba dang ldan pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya phyag 'tshal ba'i
451b5(rgyud): phyag rgya ste/dga' ba chen po dpal don yod pa'i dbang phyug gi ki li ki la zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/'dis rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i brten pa dang g.yo ba'i dngos grub thams
451b6(rgyud): cad la rgyas btab pas 'dud par gyur nas dngos grub thams cad la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs kyi mchog gi dam pa'i dngos grub kyis 'grub par 'gyur ro//
451b7(rgyud): rnam par 'phrul pa dang sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i 'dzum pa'i zhal nyid ni bcom ldan 'das mchog dang po rdo rje sems dpa'i dga' ba chen po'i dpal rdo rje don yod dga' ba yis rnam
452a1(rgyud): par 'phrul pa brtson pa zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba'i rdo rje 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya te/'dis byacom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi slob dpon mchog dang /
452a2(rgyud): po'i glu ni/kun mchog dngos grub chen po ni//dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha//rdo rje 'dzi na kun+da rgyal po ste//mi 'gyur mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur//rnam 'phrul pa
452a3(rgyud): dang bac+doMs pa'i sgeg pa'i 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya rgyas btab pa tsam gyis thams cad kyis thams cad kyi dngos grub chen po'i bdag po nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad
452a4(rgyud): las kyi tshogs yid kyi 'dod pa rnams 'grub par byed do//sArba ku ru ya thA su khaM zhes bya ba brjod de/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang du theg pa chen po'i mdo
452a5(rgyud): sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po bcom ldan 'das phyag ni rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya ste/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po'i mngon
452a6(rgyud): par rtogs pa'i gsang ba'i rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba 'di rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir/chos thams cad rnam par dag pa la sogs pa ma lus shing lus
452a7(rgyud): pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid thob pa'i ye shes dang /mngon par shes pa dang /mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi
452b1(rgyud): las tshogs rnams sgrub par byed pa'o//rnam par 'phrul pa drang bcas pa'i 'dzum spring smin ma'i khro nyid rdo rje lta ba'i phyag rgya ni bcom ldan 'das kyi khra bo ki li ki la zhes bya ba'i bya
452b2(rgyud): rgya ste/'dis rgyas btab pas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dngos po thams cad rjes su chags pa dang /dgug pa dang /dbang du bya ba dang /'bebs pa dang /
452b3(rgyud): gzhug pa dang /grar dang /glu dang /rnam par 'phrul pa ston pa dang /bden drug thams cad dang /grol ba dang /pra dbab pa thams cad sgrub pa dang /sgyu ma thams cad dang /rmad du byung
452b4(rgyud): ba thams cad so sor ston pa dang /sna tshogs pa'i gzugs thams cad kyis bya ba ston pa dang /thams cadra la rgyas btab pa dang /gaunod pa dang /gdul ba dang /bsod pa dang /
452b5(rgyud): thams cad phyir 'dren pa dang /thams cad sgrub pa dang /mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa gzhom du med pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs rnams sgrub par byed pa'o//
452b6(rgyud): thams cad dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis/thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi gzugs//sna tshogs pa yi bya ba la//rab tu 'jug pa'i mchod pa byin gyis brlab/rdo rje pad+ma zhes bya ba'i ni/bcom
452b7(rgyud): ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya ste/thams cad rnam par sbyang ba dang /srung ba dang /yongs su sbyong po dang /rims thams cad dang /dug dang /
453a1(rgyud): sbyar ba'i dug dang /gdon dang /nad dang /mkha' 'ab+h+r-i ma'i phyag rgya nye bar zhi ba dang /shi ba yang dag par gso ba dang /dbang phyug thams cad thob pa dang
453a2(rgyud): gzugs sna tshogs po'i bya ba thams cad la rab tu 'jug pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub mtha' yas pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis rab tu byed pa'o//nam
453a3(rgyud): mkha' phra bar bskyod pa dag gis rol zhing rnal 'byor thams cad kyis rjes su chags par bya ste/'di la bcom ldan 'das na mkha'i snying po'i rdo rje byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba'i
453a4(rgyud): phyag rgya ste/'dis rgyas btab pas bcom ldan 'das rje su chags shing dgos pa dang /brtan par rjesu chags nus na mkha' thams cad kyi bdag nyid kun gyi dngos po nyid kyi phyir
453a5(rgyud): bosam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang /mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs yid la 'dod pa rnams sgrub par byed pa'o//zhes
453a6(rgyud): bya nga yang gsungaso//mchog dang po ni mchog nyid du//gsung ba dam pa gsungs pa yin//mig sogs phyag rgya rgyas btab pa'o//rdo rje sems dpyis gsungs pa sbyin//rdo
453a7(rgyud): kun 'dzin slob dpon gyis//tsum pa na dang 'khyud sogs kyis//thams cad rnal 'byor rjes sgrub ste//myur du kun la rgyas gdab bya//snying po phyag rgya sngags rig pa'o//
453b1(rgyud): smrab pa 'di ni rmad byung ste//grub pa med pa rnams la lang //dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub byed//brang la dngos grub mod gyur dang //bsod nams phun tshogs mod pa yang //bdag rnyed
453b2(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' ma//rgyas gradab myur du 'grub par 'gyur//gal te rdo rje sems dpa'i mchog/snying po la sogs nye snying pos//bsgrub bya grub par ma gyur na//tsumA pa sogs kyis rgyas
453b3(rgyud): gradab bya//gang phyir gsang ba'i phyag rgya ni//dngos grub kun gyi bde dam pa//rdo rje sems dpa'i mchod pa mchog/de yis myur du 'grub par 'gyur//de nyid chen po 'di grub pa//mchog
453b4(rgyud): gi bdag nyid dam pa ste//mchog tu bsad ba bsod nams ldan//so so'i skye bo la brjod min//rdo rje slob dpon slob ma mchog/de nyid dad pa'i rjes 'brang la//gal te dngos grub
453b5(rgyud): mchog 'did ni//sbyin tu gzhan l-I sbyin miH//ga N+yai 'i ba zhig gis//bdag nyid ba la bad gyur na//bdud la rtogs pa sems cadakyis//mi thub pa dang mdam
453b6(rgyud): 'gyur//de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin//kun+do mchog dngos grub kun sgrol bya//thams cad mdzad cing thams ts+tshed mkhyen//thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa yin//zhes bya ba
453b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//dpal mchog dang po las mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya rgyud phyag rgya bcu po rdzogs so///de nas
454a1(rgyud): mchog tu mkhas shing phra la zab cing rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa shin tu mtha' yas pa tshad med cing bzhal du med cing brjod kyis mi ldang zhing rab tu khyab
454a2(rgyud): pa mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i rgyud bshad pa'o//zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das mchog tu grub pa'i rdo rjes gsungs so//de la phyag rgya bcu ni bdag nyid thams cad
454a3(rgyud): bskyed par byed pa'o//rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po'i bde ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i ngom tshig las byung ba'o//sngon du dang po'i dngos grub thams cad mchog la sogs
454a4(rgyud): pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs myur du sgrub par byed pa ste/dri la 'di ni sku'i phyag rgya ste ba dan gsum pa dang /kha T+wAM ga'i phyag rgya bcings zhes g.yon pa dril bu dang /
454a5(rgyud): bcas shing g.yas pa bslang ba'i tshul du byed pa ste/sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i mdzub mo l-i sogs pa dkrol ba'i grar gyis rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma bstod pa ste/thams cad
454a6(rgyud): kyi mchod dngos grub chen po dbang phyug chen po'i mchog gi phyag rgyas dga' ba chen po'i dpal rdo rje don yod pa'i dgyes pa'i dam tshig dngos grub kyi rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug
454a7(rgyud): ma zhes bya ba ste/des rdo rje snyems ma yongs su btang bar byas na dngos grub bzhir 'gyuraro//rdo rje snyems ma de nyid kyis rgyas btab na thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub
454b1(rgyud): chen po'i dbang phyug chen po'i bdag nyid mi 'gyur ba'i mchog go/mda' gsar bas rgyas btab na rdo rje lha mo rnams kyang rje su chags par byed na bud med gzhan rnams lta smos kyang
454b2(rgyud): dgos/rdo rje ki li kI las rgyas btab na lha dang lha ma yin gyi bud med thams cad rol bar byed cing ma grub na yang thams cad sgrub par nus pa yin no//chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan
454b3(rgyud): sgreng ba'i phyag rgya 'dis thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba dang gsod pa'o//rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug mas yongs su dgod cing phreng ba dor ba'i sngags dang phyag rgyas btab pa tsam
454b4(rgyud): gyis 'dod pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug thob pa'o//mchog tu gsang ba'i ras ris kyi phyag rgya ci lta bzhin du brjod par bya'o//bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi
454b5(rgyud): mchod pas rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i mchod pa thams cad thob pa mi bzad pa'o//rdo rje stong pa'i phyag rgyas srid pa gsum thams cad bskyod pa dang rab tu byed pa'o//rdo rje hUM/
454b6(rgyud): mdzad kyis phyag rgya dang rkang pas lha'i gzugs brnyan mnan cing rgyas btab nas bsdigs mdzub byas te/lha la sogs pa'i sems can de dang de ring por mo thigs par rgyas
454b7(rgyud): btab pas dka' bsgo ba thams cad dang las rnams byed par 'gyur ro//stan mthon po la skyil krungs phyed pas 'dug ste rkang pa g.yon pas rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs
455a1(rgyud): brnyan yang mnan nas rdo rje gsor zhing rdo rje sems dpa' mnan nas/dngos grub yid du 'ong ba thams cad dang phun sum tshogs pa rnams nyamasu myong na lha la
455a2(rgyud): sogs pa'i sems can rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos/g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis rang gi rtags bzung nas g.yas pa rdo rje la sogs pa bstod pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin cing /
455a3(rgyud): yid la 'dod pa'i lha'i bu mo thams cad la rgyas 'debs shing stobs kyis rol bar byed pa 'am/sgrub par byed pa ste rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po'o//de nas dam tshig gi
455a4(rgyud): phyag rgya ni bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba ni bcu snying khar sen mo 'drud pa'o//lcags kyu bdag pa'o//g.yon pa'i lcags kyu la zhags pa de gzhug pa'i
455a5(rgyud): lcags kyu'i rtse mo btsir ba'o//phan tshun sems brud pa'i snying khar byas pa'o//lce mnyam par byin pa'o//snying khar rdo rje bston par rab tu bzhag pa'o//rdo rjes byab pa'o//
455a6(rgyud): rtse ba'i phyag rgya yang ngo //'di rnams kyi dngos grub dang /phun sum tshogs pa dang /bde ba dang /phyag rgya dang /dram tshig dang /dkyil 'khor dang /chos dang /ye shes dang las
455a7(rgyud): dang /bde ba chen po thams cad kyi dngos grub rnams don yod par thob par 'gyuraro//de nas gsong ba'i dam tshig gi rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'i las bcu ni dbus ma'i
455b1(rgyud): lcags kyus so//kha sbyor gyi nang du rdo rje sor mo rnams thams cad kyi las so//mthe bo rdo rje'o//de nyid kyis mthilu gnyis su brud pa'o//mdzub mo rdo rje de nyid kyi lcags kyu klanyis so//
455b2(rgyud): daMbus mo'i rdo rje'o//de nyid kyis sor mo'i rtse mo bcing bar bya'o//srin lag gi rdo rje'o//de nyid kyis sor mo'i rtse mo dag gi rol mo'o//mthe'u chung gi rdo rje'o//de nyid kyis mthe
455b3(rgyud): bo gnyis kyi sen mo bcing ba'o//'di rnams kyis btab pas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos po thams cad sgrub pa dang /rjesu chags pa dang /dbang du byed pa dang /dgug pa
455b4(rgyud): dang /rol pa dang /chags pas bcing ba dang /thams cad slar gzhug pa dang /gar byed du gzhug pa dang /dgod du gzhug pa dang /gsod pa'o//de nas las kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcu
455b5(rgyud): ni rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa lha dang lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams cad dang /bu mo gzhon nu ma thams cad brtan par rje su chags pa ni rdo rje lta bas so//rab tu dga' ba'i sgrub pa ni ma mchu nang
455b6(rgyud): du g.yo bar byed pas myang ba dang btung ba'o//chags pa brtan zhing ltung ba ni dbugs ring por gtong bas so//de nas las 'dod pa thams cad kyis dbang phyug thob pa ni dpung pa
455b7(rgyud): gnyis bstod pas so//thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ba ni snying khar gzhug pas so//yod pa thams cad rnyed pa la ni mig dgug pas so//'dod pa'i chags pa bskyed
456a1(rgyud): pa ni dbus dang bcas pa'i smin pa'i dadong gis ltungs so//thams cad 'debs pa'i cho ga ni rang gi snying phra bar bskyod pa'i las rnams kyis so//'dod pa'i
456a2(rgyud): chags pa bsad pa ni dbugs btang bas rang nyid ldang bar byed pas so//'dod pa thams cad kyi rje su spyod pa la sogs pa'i las thams cad kyi byed pa ni bka' bsgo bas so//
456a3(rgyud): de rnams rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dngos po thams cad la yang nye bar spyod na don yod grub pas skad cig nyid kyis brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba'i dngos grub
456a4(rgyud): kyis rgyas btab na 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung so//de naso las kyi phyag rgya bcu ni rdo rje snyems pa'i phyag rgyas thams cad sgrub pa'o//rnga
456a5(rgyud): rje mtshon chams thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba dang rje su chags pa'o//rdo rje ki li ki las rab tu dga' ba'i reg bya dang /dngos grub thams cad bde bas grub pa'i//rgyal
456a6(rgyud): mtshan sgreng bas 'thab mo thams cad las rnam par rgyal lo//rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug mas bdag po chen po nyid do//dus kyis mchod pas mchod par 'gyur ba nyid do//
456a7(rgyud): rdo rje gsor bas thams cad 'dul ba'o//rdo rje dor bas thams cad gsod pa dang /thams cad 'phrog pa'o//g.yon pa snyems shing g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis las rnams
456b1(rgyud): kyi rgyu ma dang /rdzu 'phrul thams cad dang /so sor ston pa dang /rmugs pa dang /rengs pa dang /grwanyid yod tu gzhug pa dang /bskor ba dang /bskrad pa dang /'bru dang /ltung ba 'pho ba dang /
456b2(rgyud): dbang du byed pa la sogs pa'i las thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o//rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcu ni rdo rje thal mo las byung ba'o//rdo rje sku mchog gi dngos grub thams
456b3(rgyud): cad do//mdzub mo gnyis kyi lcags kyus dngos grub thams cad do//rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bdud thams cad la sogs pa'i gdug pa 'dul ba'i de nyid kyis mthe bo'i rdo rjes btab
456b4(rgyud): pas thams cad rnyed pa'o//de nyid kyi mthe bo gnyis bcug pa'i gtsug tor rdo rjes thams cad srung ba'i mthordo rdo rje nang du bcug pa de nyid kyis rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i
456b5(rgyud): sems can thams cad rjes su tshogs pa dang /dgrag pa dang /drabang du byed pa sgrub pa'o//mya Ti'u chung rdo rje sor mo gats+tshas mdzub mo gnyis mdzub mo gnyis kyis legs par ba
456b6(rgyud): bsdu mthe bo ni dpal dgug pa dbang du byed pa'o//rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi rgyal mo de nyid kyis nor thams cad dang dpal dbrog pa'o//de nyid kyi dbus ma gnyis kyis srin lag
456b7(rgyud): gnyis kyi rtse mo yongs su btsir bas bdud la sogs pa'i gdon las grol ba dang /dbang du byas nas las thams cad la sbyor ba'o//rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rjes yul thams
457a1(rgyud): cad kyi mchog sgrub pa'o//de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje las byung ba'o//sems dpa' mnan nas rdo rje lha mo rol tu gzhug pa'o//
457a2(rgyud): yang rab tu dga' bu'i rdo rje chen po sa rgyas btab pas so//rdo rje dang bcas pa'i rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rjes so//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chags pa dang
457a3(rgyud): bral ba'i 'khor los so//mdzub mo dang /dbus ma dang /srin lagla gi 'khor lo sgreng bar byas la mthe bo dang mthe'u chung mnyam la dral bar bya ste/rab tu dga'
457a4(rgyud): ba'i rdo rje sgrub pa de kho na nyid kyis rgyas btab cing sgrub par 'gyur ro//btsir bas 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sgrub par byed pa'o//mdzub mo lcags kyis 'dod pa thams
457a5(rgyud): cad kyi bde ba dgug pa'o//mdzub mo phrag dog la sogs pa'i 'dod pa thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi ba'o//rtag tu bskyod pas rab tu dga' ba 'bebs shing de
457a6(rgyud): nas srub pa'o//skye gnas g.yo bra sA bud med dang skyes pa dag gi rab tu dga' ba la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'dod pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen po shin tu mtha'
457a7(rgyud): yas pa'o//kha sbyor btsir bas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'dus pa dang bral ba yang ngo //rtags kyi sen mo g.yon pa'i mthil brud pas shin tu brtan pa'i 'dod pa la chag/
457b1(rgyud): de nyid du 'gyur ro//gzhan gyi 'dod pa la mi lta zhing gzhan la mi 'gro bar shin tu byude ba de yid dade ba ster ba'i bud med thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro//skye gnas kyis
457b2(rgyud): sen mo brud pas skyes bu rnams so//de nas thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya bcu ste/de la lus thams cad kyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis 'khyud
457b3(rgyud): la ma mchu so rnams kyis bzung ste/rmongs pas bad ster du gzhug sgrub pas rab tu dga' bo'i dngos grub kyi rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu 'grub par 'gyu ro//mchog dang
457b4(rgyud): de'i dngos grub kyis su rA ta s+t+wa~M zhes bcom ldan 'das la brjod cing ngo kho na nyid bskul bas grub par 'gyur ro//rab tu dga' ba'i ye shes kyis thams cad sgrub
457b5(rgyud): pa'o//lag pa g.yon pa'i gseng ba khu tshur ni thams cad sgrub pa'o//bde ba chen po rdo rje las byung ba'i rdo rje chen po'i lta bas thams cad grub pa'o//smin mgyen du bteg
457b6(rgyud): pas ltung ba slong ba'o//rang gi ma mchu nang du myang bas skal ba de zang po chen po sgrub pa'o//rang gi lce bskyod pas rang nyid kyis bden pa thams cad dang de kho na nyid gsal zhing mi slu
457b7(rgyud): bar smra ba'o//rang gi lus la 'debs pas gzugs thams cad yongasu bsgyur ba ste/rdo rje sems dpa' 'am sangs rgyas su yang 'gyur ba yin no//rang gi bdag nyid rdo rje
458a1(rgyud): bsgoms pas na mkha' la 'gro ba'o//de nas dang po las thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcu ni rdo rje thal mo kha T+wAM ga so//dngos grub thams cad rdo rje khu tshur dag gis so//de
458a2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur dag gis dngos grub thams cad do//thams cad gsod pa ni khro bo'i khu tshur dag gis so//thams cad sbyar ba ni pad+ma'i khu tshur dag gis so//nor thams
458a3(rgyud): tsAng dbrog pa ni nor bu'i khu tshur gyis so//thams cad 'bebs pa ni thams cad 'bebs pa'i khu tshur gyis so//thams cad gar byed du gzhug pa ni kha T+wAM ga gtor ba'i khu tshur dag
458a4(rgyud): gis so//thams cad smrar gzhug pa ni mdzub mo mnyam pa'i lce'i khu tshur drag gis so//thams cad bskyod pa ni brtan pa'i khu tshur dag gis so//thams cad gzhug cing don yod
458a5(rgyud): par sgrub pa ni rdo rje lcags kyu'i khu tshur gyis so//de nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis ci 'dod pa'i lag pa'i sor mo'i phyag rgya bcu ste/don yod cing thogs pa med par skad cig mas myur du
458a6(rgyud): grub par byed pa 'di lta ste/pi wang dang /gling bu dang /rdza rnga dang /mu kuN+Da dang /cha lang dang /rnga bo che dang /rnga zlum dang /rnga pa Ta ha dang /buny+dza dang /ti mi li ste/'di rnams kyis
458a7(rgyud): rgyas btab na thams cad du rjes su chags pa dang /dbang du byed pa dang /'bebs pa dang /rims dang /dug dang /sbyar dug dang /gdon las grol ba dang /gsod pa dang /'thab mo las
458b1(rgyud): rgyum budang/ na rgyags nan sa du sto ba sbyin na nas b+hA ba gad //'dod chug spyod donang dang ///rdorje seMnas nga skyon pa yin//phyag tu rtag pacu/
458b2(rgyud): tu brtag ste//rdo rje slob dpon slob ma mchog/de nyid dang pa'i rjes 'brang la//rtog pa tsam gyis skad cig gis//de ni yang kun grub bde bar gsol zhes bya'o//dpal mchog dang pa
458b3(rgyud): las mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i rgyud rdzogs so///de nas na chog tu mkhas shing mtha' las 'das pa ched med cing gzhal du mod pa ma lus shing lus pa
458b4(rgyud): med pa'i mchog gi dngos grub chen po'i bdag nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyis las kyi tshogs mchog tu dam pa grub pa zhes bya ba rdo rje gar las byung ba'i tshogs rnams
458b5(rgyud): cad kyi phyag rgya stong bshad par bya'o//zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//phyag rgya chen po mnyam gzhag nas//sgeg bcas mdzub sogs bkrol ba
458b6(rgyud): yis//las kyi phyag rgya chen po rgya//thams cad gar gyis bsgrub pa bya//badri ba chen po rdo rje gsung ba'i lcags byas khyad par du las kyi bcing ba ste rgya phrag dang po mchog tu bsgrungs
458b7(rgyud): dodam tshig lha mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o//rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas ni//kha sbyar nang du gsale bste//mchog dang ba y-i gsang chen gyis//las kyi phyog rgyabargya gzhan yin 'ang/
459a1(rgyud): bya ba rdo rje lha mo gsang ba thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o//rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa che'i//thal mos spyi bor bzung nas ni//las kyi phyag rgya grub pas na//dbang po
459a2(rgyud): rnams dang sbyar bar bya//zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po'i lha mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o//rdo rje snyem sems gar bya zhing //sgeg bcos mthe chung sogs bkrol bas/
459a3(rgyud): de nyid bcings nas gar bya zhing //phyi ma 'di ni 'byung ba yin//zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi las don yod pa'i dam tshig grub pa'i dbang phyug chen po'i mchog gi phyag
459a4(rgyud): rgya brgya'o//rdo rje thal mo mnyam gzhag nas//thams cad gyis na bsgrub par bya//mchog dang po yi las chen po'i//phyag rgya mchog ni gzhan yin no//zhes bya ba
459a5(rgyud): rgyal mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya/mda' lnga bsdus pa bcings nas ni//las kyi phyag rgya bde ba brgya//rab tu dpa' mchog ma bkrol bar//bde ba nyid du mngon par
459a6(rgyud): sbyar//zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i 'dod pa ma'i phyag rgya'o//sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis//ji bzhin phyag rgya mchog sbyor bas//las kyi
459a7(rgyud): phyag rgya sna tshogs brgya//mchog dang po ni rab tu brtag/ces bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje lha mo'i phyag rgya'o//rdo rje lha mo'i kha T+wAM ga/lus
459b1(rgyud): pun dz+nyAn kar d+ya zhing //rdo rje gar mchog klu blang zhing //dang po'i phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba//ji ltar gang du brgya gsungs pa//rol mo mchog gi phyag rgya'i tshogs//rol ma
459b2(rgyud): brdung zhing glu lon pa//phyag rgya kun gyi gsal ba brgya//zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis phyag bya ste phyag rgya stong mchog tu grub pa'o//de la sogs pa
459b3(rgyud): mtha' yas mchog/chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa//namakha'i mtha' ltar grangs med pa'i//phyag rgya'i rgyal mo grub mchog ster//kun mchog dngos grub chen
459b4(rgyud): bo yi//dbang phyug chen po'i mchog grub phyir//nam mkha' kun gyi go skabs kyis//dkyil 'khor 'dir ni rab tu zhugs//dam pa mchog tu grub par byed//mchog gi dam
459b5(rgyud): pargyud chen po//dam pa mchog gi dngos grub ster//rdo rje slob dpon slob ma mchog/de nyid dad pa'i rjes 'brangs la//phyag rgya kun gyi tshul 'di ni//bstan par bya ste gzhan
459b6(rgyud): la min//de ltar mchog tu mi 'gyur dam pa'i dngos grub bde ba yi//mchog tu rnam dag rdo rje bde grub mtha' yas 'bras bur ldan//dpal mchog drang po'i gsal ba'i de nyid
459b7(rgyud): mchog gi sku'i tshul lo//mchog tu rtag pa'i tshul 'di yongs su mthar thug pa'o//dpal mchog dang po las dam pa mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i rgyud rdzog so//
460a1(rgyud): de nas sems dpa' chen po kun//rdo rje 'dzin dang bcus pa'i mchog/rdo rje 'chang tshon gtso bo ni//mgon la bde gshegs rnams kyis gsol//
460a2(rgyud): kun mchog na mkha' chen po yi//dngos grub dbang phyug rab grub phyir//rtog pa thams cad kun bsdus pa'i//de nyid sems dpa' chen pos gsungs//rnam
460a3(rgyud): rtog med pa'i chos rnams la//rtog pa'i don 'di gang brjod pa//gang gis rgyud 'di phyi ma la//dang po'i gnas mchog ji ltar lags//de bzhin rdo rje sems
460a4(rgyud): dpa' nyid//rab dga' nyid dang bzang ba nyid//rdo rje snyems bdag ji ltar lags//sems dang sems dpa'i ting 'dzin dang //de bzhin rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin//rdo rje
460a5(rgyud): 'chang chen nyid dang ni//byang chub spyod pa ji ltar lags//bdud dang bdud las rkyal ba nyid//byang chub sangs rgyas ji ltar lags//rdo rje gtum mo thar byen
460a6(rgyud): nyid//phyag na rdo rje ji ltar lugs//ji ltar dang po'i rigs byung dang //'dod pa thar pa ji ltar legs//ji ltar mgon pa rnam gsum dang //khyod ni ji ltar
460a7(rgyud): thams cad nyid//dang po'i snying po ji ltar lags//de ci nye snying ji ltar lags//bde chen rdo rje chen po yi//don yod dam tshig ji ltar lags//dkyil 'khor
460b1(rgyud): zhes bya ji skad gsungs//de yi rnam smin ji lta bu//thig gdab pa dang brtag pa yis//dngos grub ji ltar gsungs pa lags//gsang ba lnga yi de bde ba//ji ltar gyur pa ji
460b2(rgyud): lta bu/dkyil 'khor bdag po rnams dang ni//rigs rnams gsal ba ji ltar lags//thams cad dbang bskur de nyid dang //phyag mtshan tshogs kyi de nyid dang //thams
460b3(rgyud): cad dgug gzhug mchod pa che//bdag byin rlabs sogs sgrub pa che//de ni de nyid gsang ba dang //don yod pa ni mchog nyid de//mi 'gyur dam pa grub pa'i phyir//thams
460b4(rgyud): cad bdag cag rnams la gsungs//zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchog gi mdo gsungaso//de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin//rtog pa kun gyi
460b5(rgyud): bdag po ni//the tshom tshogs rnams gsan nas su//'di yi lan ni gsungs pa yin//de la rtog pa'i don gyi rgyud ji ltar yin zhe na//rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams las/
460b6(rgyud): sems can don ni yongs brtags pas//des na rtogs par gsungs pa ste//rtog pa yongasu dag phyir ro//de nas rgyud phyi ma ji ltar yin zhe na/rgyud ni rgyun zhes bya bar
460b7(rgyud): bshad//phyi ma sngar dang yang dag byung //de nyid gsang ba'i gsang ba dang //phyi ma dang bcas rgyud du 'dod//de la dang po gnas zhes bya ba'i rgyud ji ltar yin zhe na/namakha'
461a1(rgyud): /kun la rab tu gnas//rdo rje kun mchog rang bzhin mchog/dad pa chen po dka' ba tshe//gro khyor dor ni mi 'gyur mchog/ces bya ba bcom ldan la/
461a2(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' rtog pa thams cad kyi rtog pa'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba 'dre gsung so//de la thog ma tha ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' ji ltar yin zhe na/na mkha'i skye ba mtshan ldan
461a3(rgyud): phyir//thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog/sems dpa' rdo rje tshe rang bzhin//rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar brjod//de nas bcom ldan 'das de gang yin zhe na/dkon mchog dngos
461a4(rgyud): grub chen po yi//dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha//rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal//rab tu dga' ba mi 'gyur mchog/de la bcom ldan 'das dga' ba chen po nyid ji ltar yin
461a5(rgyud): zhe na/nyes pa med cing shin tu rtag/'dod chags kun gyis rjes chags pa//de nyid 'di yis gsang ba 'di//'dod chags chen po'i dga' ba che//de la ci kun tu bzang
461a6(rgyud): po nyid ji ltar yin zhe na/shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog/gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs//kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid//byang chub sems dpa'i cho ga mchog/
461a7(rgyud): de la rdo rje snyems pa'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das ji ltar yin zhe na/kun mchog dngas grub chen po yi//dbang phyug chen po'i phyag rgya'i mchog/rdo rje dbang phyug chen
461b1(rgyud): bstod pas//rdo rje snyoms pa'i bdag po bdag/ces bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das mchog dang po'i skyes bu'o//mchog dang po yi de nyid 'di//rdo rje sems dpa' gang gang brjod//
461b2(rgyud): dngos grub kun gyi 'byor pa rnams//de la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur//zhes bya ba mchog gi de kho na nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//de nas de'i 'og
461b3(rgyud): tu las kyi bye bas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi mchog nyid du bshad par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungaso//de la bcom ldan 'das thams cad
461b4(rgyud): kyis sems can ji ltar yin zhe na/bsam gyis mi khyab rgya che ba//thab dngos kun+da bde mi 'gyur ba//thams cad khyab cing dri ma med//byang chub sems ni bdag brtan pa//
461b5(rgyud): de nas 'di las khyad par ni//sems nyid brtan pa nyid sems pas//ting 'dzin de la mnyam par gzhag/rnam shes las ni rdo rje kun//rdo rje las ni 'dzin gyur te//
461b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin ji ltar yin zhe na/sems dpa'i byin rlabs sbyor ba ni//bdag la byin rlabs mchog sgrub pa//nyin re sgrub par byed na des//rdo rje sems dpa'
461b7(rgyud): nyid thob 'gyur//de la bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa ji ltar yin zhe na/snying stobs rdul dang mun pas kyang //gang phyir sems can don gyur pas//de
462a1(rgyud): phyir dra ni kun tu bzang //byang chub spyod pa'i rjes 'jug pa'o//de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bdud nyid dang 'dul bas rgyal ba ji ltar yin zhe na/sems nyid kho/
462a2(rgyud): na bdud nyid de//sems nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'o//rang sems gdul bar bya ba'i phyir//bdag ni bdud nyid gyur pa yin//de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das mngon par
462a3(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang sangs rgyas yin zhe na/rang sems so sor rtog pa'i phyir//byang chub sems mchog rdo rje nyid//de phyir de nyid sangs rgyas nyid//bdag byin rlabs
462a4(rgyud): mchog grub phyir ro//de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje yin zhe na/mi phyed so sor rtogs pa dang //gdug pa thams cad nges par gnon//sangs rgyas kun dngos
462a5(rgyud): rdo rje ste//byang chub sems ni brtan pa bdang //kun tu bzang po'i lag tu ni//mtshon cha de ni rgyal bas byin//brtan pa thams cad grub pa'i phyir//des na phyag na rdo rje des//
462a6(rgyud): de la ji ltar dang po'i rigs las byung ba shes pa rgyud zhe na/shes rab pha rol phyin pa yum//yab ni thabs la mkhas pa ste//rdo rje sems dpa' gdul ba'i phyir//rigs//
462a7(rgyud): rnams rab tu byung ba'o//de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa thar pa yin zhe na/bcom ldan 'das ni chags pa che//dngos grub thams cad rjes chags phyir//dngos grub
462b1(rgyud): thams cad mi 'gyur bde//bde ba chen po zhes brjod pa'o//de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gsum yin zhe na/bdag ni dus gsum mtha' yas phyir//nga ni srid
462b2(rgyud): gsum gdul bya'i phyir//gsum mchog 'jig rten gsum kun phyir//'jig rten gsum nga khams gsum nga//de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das thams cad nyid yin zhe
462b3(rgyud): na/dra nyid brtan pa thams cad bde//bsod nams kun mchog che ba'i phyir//g.yo ba sems kyis 'dus byas phyir//sgyu ma thams cad de yin no//zhes bya ba rang gi
462b4(rgyud): las kyi bya ba'i de kho na nyid rdo rje sems dpas gsung so//de la ji ltar dang po'i glu byung ba shes pa yin zhe na/srid pa shin tu grub pa yi//dbang phyug chen po mchog grub
462b5(rgyud): phyir/gaN+DI can sems can don mdzad phyir//bskal pa thog mar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs//de nas gang yin zhe na/'dod chags chen po bcom ldan 'das//rab
462b6(rgyud): tu dga' ba mi 'gyur mchog/gsang ba'i phyir ni snying po brjod//yi ge hUM ni mi 'gyur mchog/de nas nye ba'i snying po yi//nga kho na nyid shes pa ni//de nyid gsang zhing gsang
462b7(rgyud): ba dang /snying po rab tu brjod par bya//snying po'i rjesu sgrub par 'grub//nye ba'i snying po nyid du brjod//de la ji ltar bde ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod padam tshig gi bshad pa'i rgyud
463a1(rgyud): yin zhe na/dngos grub kun gyi mi 'gyur bde//bde ba chen po zhes brjod do//rdo rje de nyid don yod grung //dam tshig 'da' byur dka' ba'o//zhes bya ba'i mchog rga/
463a2(rgyud): dam pa'i glu bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//de la ji ltar dkyil 'khor gyi don shes pa yin zhe na/ji ltar gnas dang 'khor lo dang //ji ltar dgong bar 'gro ba
463a3(rgyud): dang //'khor dang bcas pa dgod pa gang //de 'dra'i 'khor lo mchog gi sna sprul//de nas rnam par shes pa ni//rdo rje sems sogs lha rnams kyis//'khor lo mngon sum mthong
463a4(rgyud): ba yis//rtag pa'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba//phyir na bris na'ang de bzhin no//de nas thig gdab pa'i tshe ba ni//shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bris//phyogs kun
463a5(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid dmigs la//shar dang nub dang byed dang lhor//thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad//rdo rje thig gis yongs bskor bar//ka ba brgyad kyis nyer mdzes
463a6(rgyud): shing //sgo bzhi rta babs kha khyer dang //dra ba dri phyed la sogs rgyan//der bdag po yi don shes ni//rdo rje sems dpa' ji lta bu zhe na/na mkha' skye ba mtshan ldan
463a7(rgyud): phyir//thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog/sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin//dpal mchog dang po zhes byar brjod//de nas bcom ldan 'das gang zhe na/kun mchog dngos grub
463b1(rgyud): tshon pa 'o//dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha//rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rtul//rab tu dga' ba mi 'gyur mchog/ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin dus gsungs//donas spyan dang/
463b2(rgyud): gzigs dbang gis//pad+ma rA ga dang mtshul pa//thams cad dag pa bla na med//rdo rje sems dpa' rang bdag nyid//spyan ras glezigs kyi dbang phyug nyid//de nas pad+ma'i rigs
463b3(rgyud): de kho na nyid ni/rdo rje chos ni rab grub phyir//sems can thams cad rnam dag phyir//pad+ma chen po'i rigs dgra pa'i//ting 'dzin ye shes kun nas bsdus zhes bya'o//de lnga
463b4(rgyud): sbyar nam mkha'i snying po yin zhe ni/thams cad nam pa'i bcom ldan 'das//sems can bsod nams mthong zhing che//namakha'i snying mo sems dpa' dang //de na sa nor rnga'i rigs
463b5(rgyud): kyis ni//dbang bskur ba dang gter drang ni//rdo rje rgyal mtshan mchod pa che//nor bu chen po'i rigs grub pa//bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'o//zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor
463b6(rgyud): thams cad kyi de khon nyid chen po bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi dbang 'gyur ba shes pA ni/sangs rgyas rin chen rdo rje byung //rdo rje na
463b7(rgyud): chen rdo rje la//spyan ras gzigs la rdo rje sku//nor bu nor bu 'dzin pa'o//de nas mchog dang po'i phyag mtshan gyi de kho na nyid do//kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi//dbang
464a1(rgyud): phyag chen po'i mtshon cha che//gsang ba lnga yi de nyid che//rdo rje rtse lnga zhes brjod do//de nas rigs thams cad kyi phyag mtshan de kho na nyid zhes pa ni/sangs rgyas
464a2(rgyud): thams cad sangs rgyas nyid//sna tshogs bya ba rdo rje can//'jig rten dbang phyug rdo rje ches//nor bu nor bu bsags pa'o//zhes bya ba dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi phyag mtshan gyi de
464a3(rgyud): kho na nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//de la ji ltar thams cad dgug pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/rtog pa kun gyi gsang chen gyi//rdo rje lcags kyu rol bcas pas//
464a4(rgyud): bkug te de nas rjes bsgrub pa//dril bu nyid kyi bya ba yin//ji ltar mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga yin zhe na/rtog pa kun gyi gsang chen gyi//rab tu dga' bas mchod nas ni/
464a5(rgyud): glu dang rol mos rnam 'phrul bas//mchod de slar yang rnal 'byor mchod//de la ji ltar dngos grub thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid yin zhe
464a6(rgyud): no/rtog pa kun gyi gsang chen gyi//phyag rgya kun gyi legs byin rlabs//dam tshig chen po 'di nyid kyis//rang nyid bsgrubs nas snying po bzlas//thog mtha' med pa'i sems
464a7(rgyud): dpa' ni//rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che//kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid//rdo rje snyems pa'i bdag po'i bdag/ces bya ba'i mchog dang po'i skyes bu'o//de la ji ltar rang
464b1(rgyud): lhag pa'i lha thams cad kyi sgrub pa chen po'i rgyud yin zhe na/brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba dang //rtog pa kun las bsgrub bya dang //rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas//de dag thams cad bsgrub par bya/
464b2(rgyud): de nas thams cad rje su sgrub pa'i rgyud ni/rdo rje dril bu 'dzin gyur nas//rdo rje dril bus rang sadadra cing //rtog pa thams cad rjes sgrub pas//mchog dang la sogs 'grub par 'gyur//de la
464b3(rgyud): ji ltar 'bad pa med pa thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/bsgrub bya ci 'dod bsgrubs nas ni//phyi nas ji ltar 'dod pa yi//ci 'dod spyod pa la spyod cing //thams cad byed cing thams
464b4(rgyud): cad bza'//langs pa 'am ni 'dug pa 'am//gang dang de ru 'tshog pa 'am//dgod pa dang ni smra ba 'am//gang der ci bzhin de bzhin no//dbang po gang dang gang lami 'gyur//de dang
464b5(rgyud): de yi ngo bor bya//mnyam par gzhag nas rnal 'byor gyis//rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bya//de nyid rnal 'byor 'di yis ni//thams cad nyid ni bsgrub par bya//sangs rgyas kun dngos
464b6(rgyud): thams cad ni//rtag tu mthong zhing grub par 'gyur//dam tshig chen po de nyid ni//mkhas pa gang zhig dad pas klog/de ni sdig kun dang bral bas//dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug
464b7(rgyud): 'gyur//zhes bya ba dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid do//de ltar dpal mchog dang po'i cho ga ma nyams mchog gi bla ma gsal//mchog tu gsang ba sgrub pa'i tshig bde mchog myur du
465a1(rgyud): grub phyir gsol//rdo rje mchog 'dzin dang bcas byed gshegs sras bcas rnamam+b+ha kyis rkyen rlabs pa//bde chen dam pa rdo rje 'dzin po dga' chen mchog
465a2(rgyud): gos de gsungs//dpal mchog dang po las mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga/de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin//mkhe'i ltar thug med kun tu 'gro//sangs rgyas kun gyis brtson
465a3(rgyud): nas ni//rtog pa'i mthar thug don gsungaso//bdag gi snying po dang 'di mchog chen po'o//bde chen mchog gi mchog dang rje su chags pa che//kun mchog sems
465a4(rgyud): dpa' rnams kyi rtag tu 'byung gnas ni//kun mchog 'byor pa'i dbang phyug gso ba yin//mtha' yas pa dang thog med mthar thug med pa ni//mchod bya chen po
465a5(rgyud): thams cad rnams kyi tshul chen po//namakha' dang mtshungs mchog gi dngos 'phel gsol//de ni sras kyang mthar thug byed par nus pa min//sems sngon rnams ni
465a6(rgyud): dman la zheni cing nyung la dga'//dad pa med cing bslu ba byed la ma sbyangs pa//rtag tu rje su chags bral la chags pa//de rnams la ni phran phyir 'di ni mthar thug
465a7(rgyud): ba'o//gang gi khyim ni 'di gnas gang gis rab tu sgrub pa'am//yang na ji bzhin gsungs pa rtag tu 'dir sgrub byed//so sor nyams su myong ba'i mtho yis thams cad du/
465b1(rgyud): bdud kyi la sogs rnams kyis de ni gnod mi nus//rdo rje 'chang sogs sku ni glang gis sgrub byed pa//gzugs brnyan la sogs thams cad 'dir ni ji bzhin gsungs//des na
465b2(rgyud): thams cad so sor nyams myong nus par ldan//bdud kyi la sogs rnams kyis de ni gnod mi nus//gling zhig/rdo rje la sogs gzugs brnyan la sogs pa//ji ltar 'dod pa
465b3(rgyud): 'di dag thams cad sgrub par byed//rab tu 'dod pas yI gai hUM lAs bris nas ni//'dod pa'i dngos grub de yis ster zhing thob par 'gyur//rgyal po rnams kyis rnam par sbyangs par
465b4(rgyud): mdzad pa ni//gang la don kun drag phyir mdzad par mi 'gyur min//'dir ni 'gregs byed bdud rnams kyang ni yod ma yin//rtogs bus dngos grub 'brel zhing byin gyis
465b5(rgyud): brlabs pa yin//nga ni bdud nyid mi 'gyur brtan med nyid mi 'gyur//brtan pa nyid phyir dwa ni 'arten par mdzad pa yin//rtag pa 'di ni mchog rten gang gis sgrub byed pa//de la
465b6(rgyud): da ni dngos grub myur du sgrub par byed//dngos grub chen po la thams cad du rje mu chags shing shin tu mnyes pa dang /shin tu brtan pa dang /shin tu rgyas pa dang /rtag tu rgyu
465b7(rgyud): bar 'gyur ba yin no//gang zhig mchog gi rgyal po'i snying po sgrub byed pa/rgyal ba thams cad dgyes shing rgyal ba dgyes par mdzad//de dag grags pa chen po thob nas bde
466a1(rgyud): ba'ang thob//de phyir 'di la dad cang gus par bya ba yin//de nas rgyal ba rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/yab mchog sangs
466a2(rgyud): rgyas sras ni leg so leg so//sras mchog sangs rgyas sras ni log so legs//rdo rje mchog ni rdo rje 'byung ba legs//dam pa'i chos kyi bdag nyid legs legs//sangs
466a3(rgyud): rgyas rnams kyis yang dag byin brlabs pa//rtag tu mi 'gyur don yod grub pa mchis//ji ltar dang po'i grub pa de bzhin du//phyi nas kyang ni de bzhin grub par 'gyur//de
466a4(rgyud): ltar ngag chen gsungs nas ni//sras dang bcas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams//rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yi//gsung la rje su yi rang mdzad//dpal mchog dang po las rtog
466a5(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyi mchog rdzogaso////thugs dam pa'i snying po tho ling du rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta mkha pa chen po man+ta ka la sha dang /sgra sbyar gyi lo ts+tsha
466a6(rgyud): ba lha ba can po dge slong bla ma zhi ba'i 'od kyi zhal mda' nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/lots+tsha chen po rin chen bzang po yi//dpal mchog dang po'i rgyu de 'odi bsgyur ba
466a7(rgyud): la/bar bar dpe ma rnyed pas ma 'gyur nas/bdag gis 'bod pas dpe btsal rnyed pas bsgyur/rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA na ya sha ta pany+tsa da sha ka/bod srid du//
466b1(rgyud): 'phags pa shes rabakyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul brgya lnga bcu pa/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo//'di skad bdug gis thos pa dus gcig na/
466b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegro pa thams cad kyi mkhyen pa'i bye brag rnam pa tha dad pa dang ldan pa/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che thams cad kyi cod pan gyis khams gsum du
466b3(rgyud): dbang bcu rdzogs pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mi/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa//rnal 'byor can chen po'i dbang phyug/de bzhin gshegs pa thams
466b4(rgyud): cad kyi phyag rgya chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid thug su chud pa sna tshogs kyis/bye ba mdzad de ma lus pa ni sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa rnams kyis re ba thams cad yongs su
466b5(rgyud): bskang ba'i phrin las mdzad pa/thugs rje che ba rnam par snang mdzad chen po rtag pa khams gsum gyi mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs pa sku dang gsung dang thugs thams cad rdo rje de bzhin gshegs
466b6(rgyud): pA lha'i rgyal po gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas/'dod pa'i khams thams cad na/nor bu rin po che chen pos rab tu smras pa dang /ba dran kha dog sna tshogs dril bu brgyus brlung
466b7(rgyud): gis bskyod pa dang /me tog gi phreng ba dang /rnga ma dang /rgyan phreng dang /chun 'phyang dang /zla ba lta bus mdzes par byas pa/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs bai shes
467a1(rgyud): pa bstod pa na/byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgya dang /thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa la 'di lta ste/byang chub snyoms dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rje
467a2(rgyud): dang /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /na mkha'i snying po dang /rdo rje'i khu tshur dang /'jam dpal dang /sems bad+mod ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /nam mkha'
467a3(rgyud): mdzod dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dang /de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgya dang thabs gcig
467a4(rgyud): ste/yongasu bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa'i sgo zhes bya ba/thog mar dge
467a5(rgyud): ba bar du dge ba/tha mar dge ba/don bzang po/tshig 'bru bzang po/ma 'dres pa/yongs su rdzogs pa/yongasu byang ba/yang drag par ston te/'di ltar rab tu dga' ba rnam
467a6(rgyud): par dag pa'i gnas de ni/'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so//'dod chags kyi mtha' rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa'i gnas//
467a7(rgyud): reg pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so//sdug pa'i 'ching ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa'i
467b1(rgyud): gnas so//thams cad la dbang phyug dang /dbang rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso//lta ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/'di lta ste/byung /
467b2(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i gnas so//dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso//sred pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/'di lta ste/byang chub sems
467b3(rgyud): dpa'i gnas so//snyems pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso//rgyan rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa'i
467b4(rgyud): gnas so//yid tshim par byed pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so//snang ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/'di lta ste/byang chub sems
467b5(rgyud): dpa'i gnas so//lus bde ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso//gzugs rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/'di lta ste/byang chub sems
467b6(rgyud): dpa'i gan so//sgra rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so//dri rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' gnas
467b7(rgyud): so/ro rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so//reg rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so//
468a1(rgyud): de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyi rnam par dag pa ste/chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
468a2(rgyud): yongs su dag pa'o//lag na rdo rje su la la chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa'i sgo sgrub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di lan cig thos na yang /de byang
468a3(rgyud): chub kyi snying po'i bar du sgrib pa thams cad dang /chod pa dang /nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /chos kyi sgrib pa dang /las kyi sgrib pa chen po bsags kyang sems can dmyal ba
468a4(rgyud): la sogs pa ngan song du nams kyang skye bar mi 'gyur/sdig pa yang byas ma thag tu sdug bsngal med par byang bar 'gyur ro//su zhig 'dzin pa dang /nyin re bzhin klog pa dang /
468a5(rgyud): kha ton byed pa dang /tshul bzhin yid la byed pa de tshe 'di nyid la chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin thob pas/chos thams cad la dbang bar 'gyur ro//
468a6(rgyud): chos thams cad la dga' ba dang /mgu ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba myong bar 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshes bcu drug gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/
468a7(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad pa/theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa dkyil 'khor thams
468b1(rgyud): cad la/rdo rje 'dzin mtha' dag gi sems can gyi mchog khams gsum mA lus pa dag na/'jig rten gsum po thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba/sems can gyi khams lus
468b2(rgyud): med pa/don thams cad grub pa/dam tshig chen po la rdo rje gsang ba'i sems can du mas garog byas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi don 'di ston te/bzhin
468b3(rgyud): rab tu 'dzum zhing lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje bsgyings te/thog mu'i rdo rje chen po gsor nas/rang gi snying khar bskyod pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin cing /bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod
468b4(rgyud): pa'i dam tshig ces bya rang gi de kho na nyid kyi snying po 'di smraso//hU~M/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis yang de bzhin gshegs pa
468b5(rgyud): thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/rdo rje sra ba nyid kyi phyir/rdo rje
468b6(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni/byang chub chen po'o//don gcig pa'i phyir don gyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni/byang chub chen po'o//ngo bo nyid
468b7(rgyud): rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni/byang chub chen po'o//thams cad la rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir/thams cad mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par
469a1(rgyud): byang chub pa ni/byang chub chen po'o//lag na rdo rje su la la chos mngon par sgrub pa bzhi po 'di dag nyan pa dang /'dzin pa dang /klog pa dang /skom pa de sdig pa thams
469a2(rgyud): cad spyod kyang /byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du ngan song thams cad de las yang dag par 'das par 'gyur ro//myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
469a3(rgyud): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pa/don gnas 'di ni rgya cher ston cing /bzhin rab tu 'dzum dmyal te/chos thams
469a4(rgyud): cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi snying po 'di rab tu smraso//e/de nas ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas kyang /yang chos thams
469a5(rgyud): cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi rnam par rgyal ba bsdus pa zhes bya ba/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa 'di bshad de/'dod chags kyi spros pa med pa nyid kyis/zhe sdang gi spros pa
469a6(rgyud): med pa nyid do//zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa nyid kyis/gti mug gi spros pa med pa nyid do//gti mug gi spros pa med pa nyid kyis chos thams cad spros pa med pa nyid do//chos thams
469a7(rgyud): cad kyi spros pa med pa nyid kyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spros pa med par rig par bya'o//lag na rdo rje su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang /'dzin pa
469b1(rgyud): dang /klog pa dang /sgom pa des 'dul ba'i dbang gis khams gsum du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad daskad kyang ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/rgyu du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
469b2(rgyud): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje chos 'di'i don rgya chen po ston te/'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya
469b3(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas khro gnyer dang bcas shing smin ma bteg ste/'bar bar lta la pad+ma'i gdong khro zhing dgod de/mche ba gtsigs nas rkang pa g.yon pa brkyang ba'i tshul du gnas pas
469b4(rgyud): gnas nas/rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smra'o//hUM/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ngo bo nyid dag pa'i chos nyid thob pas/yang chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid spyan
469b5(rgyud): ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/'dod chags thams cad rnam par dag pas/'jig rten na zhe sdang thams
469b6(rgyud): cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro//dri ma thams cad rnam par dag pas/'jig rten na sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro//chos thams cad rnam par dag pas/'jig rten na
469b7(rgyud): par+tha can thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/shes pa thams cad rnam par dag pas/'jig rten na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag par 'gyuraro//lag na rdo rje su la la
470a1(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'dri nyan pa dang /'dzin pa dang /klog pa dang /sgom pa de 'dod chags dang /dri ma thams cad kyi nang na 'dug kyang pad+ma lta bur dadod/
470a2(rgyud): chags kyi nyes pa rnams dang /dri ma rnams dang /glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur te/myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
470a3(rgyud): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don gyi gnas 'di nyid rgya cher ston cing /bzhin rab tu 'dzum dmyal te/pad+ma'i
470a4(rgyud): 'dab ma kha 'byed pas/'dod chags la sogs brims mi gos pa la lto zhing /pad+ma gzugs sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smraso//hrIHde nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
470a5(rgyud): gshegs pa khams gsum thams cad kyi dbang pos yang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba las byung ba'i ye shes kyi snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu
470a6(rgyud): phyin pa 'di bshad de/dbang bskur ba sbyin pa ni khams gsum thams cad kyi rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro//nor sbyin pa ni re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyu ro//chos
470a7(rgyud): sbyin pa ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro//zang zing gi sbyin pa ni lus dang ngag dang /sems kyi bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyuraro//de nas byang chub
470b1(rgyud): somasna dbu rkyen po rnamakha'i snying pyo sbyin rlu tu 'dum te/rang po mgo la du ran 'i dang bsgyung ba'i zung bang nga rlung dron 'od nyid rgyu rgyud stod te/dbang bskur ba thams cad tu/
470b2(rgyud): dam tshig rin po che zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras//dz+haiM de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rkyeg rgyu thob pa/de bzhin ge shegs pa thams
470b3(rgyud): khu tshur 'dzin pa/de bzhin gshegs pas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/
470b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i phyag rgya yongasu 'dzin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi phyag rgya yongasu 'dzin pa ni//
470b5(rgyud): chos thams cad thob par 'gyuraro//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni/ting 'dzin thams cad thob par 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa
470b6(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni/lus dang /ngag dang /sems byams cad rdo rje rdo rje'i dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur ro//su ma la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
470b7(rgyud): pa'i tshul 'di nyen po dang /'dzin pa dang /klog pa dang /lung 'bogs pa dang /skom pa des dengs grub thams cad dang /phun sum tshigs pa thams cad dang /shes pa thams cad/
471a1(rgyud): dang /dgos pa thams cad dang /lus dang /ngag dang /sems thams cad rdo rjer rdo rje'i dngos grub dam pa thob nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
471a2(rgyud): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ro//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khu tshurA dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongasu 'dzin
471a3(rgyud): pas don gnas 'di rgya cher ston te/de bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing rdo rje sra ba'i dngos grub thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smras//AHde nas bcom ldan 'das
471a4(rgyud): chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas/yang 'khor lo ltar yi ge bskor ba zhes bya ba/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ngo bo nyid med
471a5(rgyud): pa'i tshul gyis chos tham cang stong pa'o//mtshan ma med pa'i phyir/chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'o//smon pa med pa'i tshul gyis/chos thams cad smon pa med pa'o//shes
471a6(rgyud): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dgu pas/chos thams cad rA bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa drin 'di nyid rgya cher
471a7(rgyud): ston te/bzhin rab tu 'dzum bzhin du/bdeg gi ral gri des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'debs shing /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i mchog 'di
471b1(rgyud): smras so//AHdri nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor der 'dus pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo chen po la 'jug pa zhes bya ba/shes rab kyi/
471b2(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do//rdo rje mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro//don gyi mnyam pa nyid la/
471b3(rgyud): 'jug pa no//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyuraro//chos thams cad kyis mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni/dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo la/
471b4(rgyud): 'jug par bya'o//chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni/'khor lo thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur ro//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po soms bskyed ma thug tu//
471b5(rgyud): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/chos mnyam pa nyid kyi don rgya cher ston cing /bzhin 'dzum nas/rdo rje 'khor lo bskor zhing /rdo rje 'khor lo thams cad la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i snying pa
471b6(rgyud): 'di smras+ho//hUM/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa lnga mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i snod kyi/mchod pa thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba/shes rab kyi pha
471b7(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa'i chu 'di bshad do//byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa ni/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la michod pa'i cho ga rgya che ba'o//sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su
472a1(rgyud): rten te/bzhin dang kyi 'jug dang la mas rgyung don spyod / dam chi zhas d+hA 'i snying po 'di skyes/oM/denas bcom ldan 'das de zhin pa she gas
472a2(rgyud): chen ma cid 'dul nus pa/yang ye shes hrI khu rgyur po skye 'dzin pa/sems na na rnams pa de 'dul ba shes pa'i skyid pa zhes byu /shas rol tu phyin pa'i tshul di
472a3(rgyud): shi // na mas ca mnyam pa nyid pa'i// bramany+dzum hU~M //sems can thams da tshul du nyid pas//khro ba 'dum byed do//sems smin thams ca kyi
472a4(rgyud): /'i nyid do//bams can tha 'a rdo rje nyid pal/khro rje ny-id/ ci'i phyir na na/'di ltar sems can mams pa de 'dus pa na byang chub pa//dan
472b1(rgyud): semaspyo pa' bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa/don de nyid rgya cher ston to//bzhon rab tu 'dzum zhing rdo rje mtsho ba'i phyag rgya dang /rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyi khro ba'i/
472b2(rgyud): gad mo zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras//ha/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin bshegs pa/chos thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad
472b3(rgyud): de/thams cid mnyam pa nyid pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do//thams cad don nyid pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don nyid do//thams cad chos
472b4(rgyud): nyid pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos nyid do//thams cad las nyid pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyid du rig par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das
472b5(rgyud): lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don yod pa'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
472b6(rgyud): zhugs nas/don yod pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so//hUM/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad pa/rnam par snang mdzad
472b7(rgyud): kyis yang /sems can byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po thams cad
473a1(rgyud): da yon d+ha /sems can thams cad na bzhin gshegs pa' byung byonan no//thams cad stong rje'i snying pos dang bsgyur ba nyid dang/sems/
473a2(rgyud): can thams cad ni rdo rje'i snying po can no//ngag thams cad rab tu byung bas/sems can thams cad ni chos kyi snying po can no//sems can thams cad kyi bya ba byed pa la sbyor byas/
473a3(rgyud): sems can thams cad ni las kyi snying po can no//de nas pha rol gyi rdo rje rigs rnams kyis ca co'i sgra byung nas chos nyid kyi don rgya cher ston cing /snying po phul te/de nas rdo rje
