473a4(rgyud): dbang phyug chen pos rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di phul lo//tri/de nas ma mo thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/mgrin gcig tu thams cad dgug pa dang /

473a6(rgyud): phyag 'tshal te/rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di smraso//swA/de nas sring mo bzhis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di phulo//hUM/de nas bcom ldan
473a7(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas la mthar thug cing mu med pa'i chos dang ldan pas yang /cho ga 'di mthar thug par byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir/chos thams cad
473b1(rgyud): kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi mthar thug pas byin gyi brlabs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid pas/8/
473b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtha' yas pa nyid do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid pas/rdo rje thams cad mu med pa nyid//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa du ma/
473b3(rgyud): nyid pas/chos thams cad du ma nyid do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthar thug pa med pa nyid pas/chos thams cad mthar thug pa med pa nyid yino//su la la shes rab kyi
473b4(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang /'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /ston pa dang /brjod pa dang /bsgom pa des sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
473b5(rgyud): thug pa med pa'i mthar phyin te/sgrib pa thams cad zad nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/rdo rje 'dzin par myur du 'gyur ro//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus
473b6(rgyud): te/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di don yod pa dang /thogs pa med par myur du 'grub par bya ba'i phyir/lag na rdo rje la legaso zhes bya ba byin no//sems can chen po legs
473b7(rgyud): so legs/bde ba chen po legs so legs/theg pa chen po legs so legs/blo gros chen po legaso legs/cho ga 'di ni legs par smras//sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin
474a1(rgyud): kun gyis//'bras bu yod pa 'dul ba'i mchog/rdo rje mdo sde byin gyis brlabs//cho gu'i rgyal po bla na med//gang rnams 'di dag 'dzin pa ni//bdud la
474a2(rgyud): sogs pa thams cad kyis//de dag mi sod mi tshugaso//sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //dngos grub dam pa thams cad kyang //sangs rgyas kun gyis gsung
474a3(rgyud): pa bzhin//ring por mI thogs thob par 'gyur//de skad gsungs nas sngags grub phyir//rdo rje can gyis bshad pa la//kun mchog sangs rgyas mkhas bcas
474a4(rgyud): pa//thams cad kyis ni mngon par stod//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i
474a5(rgyud): chos nyid brnyas pa chos thams cad spros pa med pas yang bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mchog dang po thog ma dang tha ma
474a6(rgyud): dang dbus med pa'i dam pa 'di gsungaso//byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis 'dod chags chen po dngos grub dam pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen
474a7(rgyud): po dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bde ba chen po dngos grub dam pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po dngos grub
474b1(rgyud): chen po grub pa dam par 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi do bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po dngos grub dam pa ni/bdud chen po'i stongs thams cad rab tu
474b2(rgyud): 'joms pa dngos grub dam par 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bdud chen po'i stobs rab tu 'joms pa dngos grub dam pa ni khams gsum pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug
474b3(rgyud): chen po dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi khams gsum thams cad kyi dbang phyug chen po'i dngos grub dam pa ni ma lus pa na/sems can gyi khams
474b4(rgyud): lus pa med pa yongs su sbyong b.rA 'dod de'i rgyu'i phyir/'khor ba la yang chags shing /brtson 'grus che ba'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ma lus pa nA/sems can gyi khams
474b5(rgyud): lus pa med pa yongs su skyob pa dang /sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /bde ba dang /mchog tu shin tu bde ba chen po dngos grub dam par 'gyuraro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/ji srid 'khor
474b6(rgyud): ba'i gnas su ni//mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe//de srid mtshungs med sems can don//mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus//shes rab pha rol phyin thabs dang //ye shes
474b7(rgyud): gnas su bsrungs pas na//chos kun rnam par dag pa'i phyir//'khor ba yongasu dag par gyur//chags la sogs pas 'dul na ni//'khor ba'i bar du rtag par yang //'jig
475a1(rgyud): rten sdig byed de spyang phyir//'khor ba srid du bdag nyid 'bul//ji ltar pad+ma rab 'bar yang //tshon gyi nyes pas mi gos pa//de bzhin gnas pa'i nyes pa yis/
475a2(rgyud): 'gro phan rnams la mi gos so//'dod chags chen po rnam par dag/bde ba che zhing nor che la//khrims gsum dbang phyug thob pas na//sems can don rnams brtan par byed//
475a3(rgyud): lagan na du stsal lazung bar langs nas mchog dang po she rab la tu sbyin pa'i tshul gyisnyan rgyas kyi rnam grangs 'di nyin ning /'dren pa dang /nyan pa dang /'dzin pa dang//

475b7(rgyud): bste stang du bya ba 'am/ri mor bya ba 'am/mtshad por mi nus so//gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na yi ge 'bru gcig tsam
476a1(rgyud): thos na yang sems can de dag ni gzhan na sangs rgyas mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin na mtha' dag rdzogs pa lta ci smos/lag na rdo rje gang la la
476a2(rgyud): dag sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig gang gA'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma la bkur sti ma byas pa dang /bla mAr mo byas pa dang /bsti stang ma byas pa dang /mchod par ma byas pa de dag gis
476a3(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par mi nus so//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang la spyong ba'i sa phyogs de mchod rten du 'gyur ro//chos kyi
476a4(rgyud): rnam grangs 'di gang gi lus la thogs sam/glegs bam la bris te/spyod pa'i gang zag de phyag bye ba'i gnas su 'gyuraro//de bskal pa bye ba mang por skye ba dran par 'gyuraro//

476b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes
476b6(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po'i dam tshig byin gyis brlabs kyi rdo rje'i sku chen po dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes rin po che chen po'i cod pan
476b7(rgyud): gyi rtse ma'i gtsug phud kyis dbang bskur ba brnyes pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin chen po dang ldan pa dang /
477a1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang /gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes kyi las sna tshogs pa chen po dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung /
477a2(rgyud): drang thugs rdo rje ye shes mchod pa chen po spro ba'i dam tshig gi gsang ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ye shes dkyil 'khor chen po dam

477b4(rgyud): ma lus shing yus pa med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam rtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i rdo rje btsun mo stong phrag brgya la'ang 'di lte ste/mda'i mtshon cha'i lag ces
477b5(rgyud): bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang /dbang phyug la lta ba'i rim zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang /nye bar zhi ba'i rang bzhin ras zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang /gyen du lta ba'i bzhin ras zhes bya
477b6(rgyud): ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang //'dod zla mtshan rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang /brdang sprod pa ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang /'bri ba'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang /rol pa drang ldan
477b7(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun ma dang /'dod pa'i mchog ces bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang //dbang phyug gis bde ba'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang /dmigs pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo
478a1(rgyud): /btsun mo dang /byang las skyes zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo ste/de dag la sogs pa rdo rje btsun mo rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du 'dar to//gzhan yang
478a2(rgyud): dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje pho nya mo chen mo rnams dong /thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/de yang 'di lta ste/snying bskul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje pho nya mo chen mo dang /gdug pa thams
478a3(rgyud): cad 'gugs pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje pho nya mo chen mo dang /rje su mnyes pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje pho nya mo chen mo dang /khrag 'gugs pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje pho nya mo chen mo dang /thams

478a5(rgyud): 'di lta ste/rdo rje 'bebs pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje sgo srung ma chen mo dang /dam tshig gsum ldan ces bya ba'i rdo rje sgo srung ma chen mo dang /'jig pa'i yan lag can ces bya ba'i rdo rje sgo
478a6(rgyud): srung ma tshon mo dang /thog ma pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje skra srung ma chen mo dang /gdul dka' 'dul ces bya ba'i rdo rje sgo srung ma chen mo la sogs pa'o//gzhan yang mi mnyam pa dang

478b1(rgyud): pa'i me'i gdong zhes bya ba'i rdo rje bran mo chen mo dang /gtsigs shing rnam par 'gyur ba'i gdong zhes bya ba'i rdo rje bran mo chen mo dang /'jig rten gsum 'ching ba zhes bya ba rdo rje bran mu
478b2(rgyud): chen mo dang /bskal par gnas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rdo rje bran mo chen mo'o//gzhan yang dpe med bya'i rdo rje rol pa chen mo rnams dang yang thabs gtsog ste/de 'di 'di sa
478b3(rgyud): ste/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje dgyes pa zhes bya ba'irdo rje rol pa chen mo dang /kun nas 'bebs pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje rol
478b4(rgyud): ba chen mo dang /'jig rten gsum rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje rol po chen mo dang /rab tu dga' ba'i rje su 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i rdo rje rol pa chen mo dang /thams cad dga'
478b5(rgyud): bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje rol pa chen po la sogs pa'o//gzhan yang na mkha'i khams thams cad rgyas par gang ba'i rdo rje'i yo ba rnams dang yang thubs gcig ste/de'ang 'di lta
478b6(rgyud): ste/'dod pa'i dbang phyug ces bya ba'i rdo rje yab chen po dang /mkha' 'gro'i rdo rjes dbang phyug dang /dri yi dbang phyug dang /stug po bkod pa dang /zla ba'i 'od dang /'dun pa srel dang /
478b7(rgyud): skye bo yongasu dor ba dang /legs par sbyangs pa dang /'dod pa'i rdo rje dang /gdung ba bskyed pa dang /'dul bar byed pa dang /dug pa thams cad sel bar byed pa dang /de kha na nyid kyi
479a1(rgyud): byan po dang /kun ts+tsha / ltad da/ na rgyu dang / ba bats+tshad // ba //dgas /
479a2(rgyud): d+hI rnams so//gzhan mying mthun yis pa d+haT+Tan+ta ma~M'i byug pa na byed 'i tshugs ng+ge tsun m+b+ha/de 'dis/ded+b+ha nis bye dud /rdo rje me
479a3(rgyud): rdo rje mi 'khrugs pa dang /rdo rje rgyu dang /gzhan yang rdo rje rgyal po chen po bzhi lce 'di lte ste/zhi bar byed pa dang /rgyas b+hair byed pa dang /dbang du byed pa dang /mi shes pa thams
479a4(rgyud): cad byung bar byed pa ste de dag la sogs pa'o//gzhan yang mchog tu rgya chen po sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rab tu gnas pa'i mchod pa dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das ston pa rtagapa
479a5(rgyud): mchog gi mnga' bdag ste/kun tu bzang po'i sku yis ni//'jig rten gsum gyi dkyil 'khor spros//bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin legs bzhugs//gseng ba rgyun gyi sbyor
479a6(rgyud): bsdu so//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskyed phyur byed pa'i swam+b+ha gsang ba'i rdo rje 'dus pa b+h+yoT+Ta ste/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yang dang lhan cig tu dkyu
479a7(rgyud): ba'i bde ba rjes su byung ste/'khor dang bcas pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sdeng lhags te/rdo rje'i gru 'dis mngon par bstod nas zhu nga zhus pa/sangs rgyas kun rdo'i
479b1(rgyud): khyod phyag 'tshal//rdo rje 'thung ba khyod la 'dud//thugs kyi rin chen mchog khyod 'dud//chos kyi blo gros khyod la 'dud//chos rnams kun mchog khyod lha 'dud//sna tshogs//
479b2(rgyud): dgongs pa khyod la 'dud//dam tshig mchog gi khyod la 'dud//rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag 'tshal 'dud//grags pa chen po bdag cag ni//mgon po khyod la zhu ba zhu//
479b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed byed yum//dkyil 'khor gyi ni dkyil 'khor mchog/de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i
479b4(rgyud): yum rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum rnams de skad ma smra cig/'jig rten thams cad la khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po
479b5(rgyud): 'di la ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams dad par mi 'gyur zhing /rang gi sems yongasu sun 'byin la de mi mthong ba'i chos la ma dad pas rang gi sems yang dag par sun phyung ste/mnar
479b6(rgyud): med pa rnams su skyes nas bskal pa stong phrag mang por mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal rjes su 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de rgya lam na mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal las grol te/mi rnamasu skyes
479b7(rgyud): par gyur kyang rnam par 'gyur ba'i bzhin du 'gyur ro//rjed ngas pa rnams dang /blo gros chung ba rnams dang /khyi dang /bya rog dang /byi la dang /phag dang /stag dang /glang po che dang /seng ge'i nga ro
480a1(rgyud): 'dra ba dag tu 'gyur ro//de dang 'dre bar mi bya zhing blta bar mi bya'o//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskyed pa'i yum de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la
480a2(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sems can de rnams kyi mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal zad par 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang gis 'di'i
480a3(rgyud): ming gzung nas yongasasu zad par 'gyuraro//bsod nams de'i rgyus de'i las kyi sgrib pa zad de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi skul ba can du 'gyur ro//de nas de dag
480a4(rgyud): yid dga' ba skyes nas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi rgyus dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyal
480a5(rgyud): po sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir gang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyis dran pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das
480a6(rgyud): kyis kun tu bzang po chen po 'od 'phro ba gsal ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso//rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
480a7(rgyud): kyi sku'i dam pa 'di bka' stsal pa/dkyil 'khor kun gyis yum gyur pa//stong nyid ye shes nyid du bshad//ci zhig nga yis bstan par bya//rtogs pa thams cad rnam par spangs//
480b1(rgyud): nam na pa//gang shog zung dang bstun par bya//dkun sums sgyur//'gro ba sgyum lta du ste//das na sgyu ma m+b+ha ba yiste//sbru mam+b+ha d+ha'i la 'khoraH//ma/
480b2(rgyud): sA nga'i khams kyis khyab pa yis//thams cad rdum gyis yang dge 'khru khyer la yang ni brtan pad+hi thA//gang pa'i dkyil 'khor maM rnams kyis//pon gang dga' ba'i gnas ni//yid
480b3(rgyud): kyi legs par 'dus byas pa//na mkha' la ni thig gis gdag//thig mi rI de yi dam pas so//de nas rnal 'byor chen pos thig/gsang bu'i yum gyi dkyil 'khor ro//mu khyud dag gi rnam bdun
480b4(rgyud): du//kun nas yongs su bskor bar bya//dbus kyis chu ru dkyil 'khor ni//'khor lo lta bur bri bar bya//kun nas brgyad gnyis mdzes pa ni//dkyil 'khor bzhi yi dbus su'o//'khor
480b5(rgyud): lo'i lte ba'i dbus su ni//pad+ma ze 'bru ldan pa bri//mtshams dang mtshams su 'dab ma ni//ji lta ba bzhin bsnyems bcas pas//srad bu lnga yis yang dag 'khrugs//srad bu bzhi yis nye
480b6(rgyud): bar spras//sgo bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan//rta babs seng ge dag gis brgyan//gdugs dang rgyal mtshan bden sogs//bla res steng du bres pa dang //rin chen rdo rje pad+ma ldan sngon//
480b7(rgyud): dpag bsam shing gi lcug mas khyab//bum bzang rin chen ldan pa'i mchog/rgyun phyeng glang po ldan pa'i ni//phyi rol gnas te legs par bri//rtog dang mi rtog rnam spangs te//dkyil
481a1(rgyud): 'khor chen po'i dbus su ni//gsang ba rgyun gyi rdo rje byA//mnyam par gzhag cing spro ba yis//sems kyis bri ba nyid du bya//de nas lha mo zhal bzhi ma//shes ra
481a2(rgyud): pha rol phyin dge ba//phyag bzhi pa la spyan yangs ma//phyag gnyis kyis ni chos 'chad cing //zhi ba'i g.yas par rdo rje ste//g.yon po pad+mas rnam par brgyan//dkar dang dmar po
481a3(rgyud): cher sngo ba//sngo bsangs rin chen mchog mdzes 'od//gtsug na rin chen gtsug tor che//gtsug rgyan cod pan dam pa can//skal ba chen po 'od ldan ma//rgyan rnams
481a4(rgyud): kun gyis rnam par klubs//gos kyis lto ni legs bsgribs pa//bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor 'dzum bcas shing //sna tshogs gos ni legs gyon pa//dbu ma'i zhal ras
481a5(rgyud): gser gyi 'od//zhabs gnyis dbus su 'khor lo ste//mdun na rIn chen bdun gnas pa//pad+ma mchog ldan seng ge'i khri//zla ba rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gdan//nyi ma'i dkyil
481a6(rgyud): 'khor 'od 'phro ba//rgyab tu nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni//dpa' bo de yis bri bar bya//'di yi mdun du bri bya ba//dpa' bo mtha' yas pa yi zhal//stong phrag du ma'i phyag
481a7(rgyud): ldan ma//mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs//rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan//phyag gi rdo rje pad+ma 'chang //sna tshogs phyag rgyas phyag gzhan dkrigs/
481b1(rgyud): gtsug ldan dar gyi cod pan can//dbu brgyan pad+ma'i bzhin ras ma//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag la bzhugs//de 'od nyi ma lta bu'i 'od//dpa' bo'i rnal 'byor ldan pa yi//dnga'
481b2(rgyud): des ni bri bar bya//rdo rje sems dpa' bdag bsgom ste//der ni snyems pas 'gro bar bya//dpa' bos lho ru bri bya ba//gshin rje'i 'dab ma mdzes pa la//mchog sbyin nam
481b3(rgyud): mkha' dge mo yang //rin chen khri la legs par bzhugs//bzhin ras sngo la spyan dkar ba//'dzum bcas nor bu'i 'og bag can//mgul rgyan rin chen phreng ba mchog/
481b4(rgyud): rkang gdub gdu bu rin po che//yid bzhin nor bu'i lag pa can//sbyin pa'i pha rol phyi ni dgongs nam//de nas blo ldan rab song ste//nub tu yang ni de bzhin du//dpal dang
481b5(rgyud): ldan pas legs par bri//chu las skyes ma yid 'phrog ma//dmar po'i gos 'dzin dag pa ma//gtsug na cod pan gyis spras me//sbrul rgyan sna tshogs lus can ma//dar dang
481b6(rgyud): rin chen gyis klubs na//pad+ma 'byed pa'i sbyor ba yis//phyag gi lo 'dab dang ldan pas//zla ba'i gdan la yang dag bzhugs//nyi ma du ma'i snang ba can//ji ltar rigs pa bri bar
481b7(rgyud): bya/ na de nas byang du phyin nas su//song ste dpa' bos bri bya bo//mi g.yo bzhin ras grags chen ma//mar gad 'bar ba mtshungs pa mo//dkar po'i dar gyis yang dag klubs/
482a1(rgyud): gdun no du spyod ldan //r+m+ma dz+nyAn rgyogs dag gis sgrag/rdo rje rjem dun sa//chogs rgyun dang na ldan pa/
482a2(rgyud): ma sbyang du br-ig//khyod mams khyer mchog/de namam rnams kyi 'dabs la//me tog drug pa dri ldan ma//rdo rje skad byeng dag
482a3(rgyud): ma/mchod pa skyugs rig pa yis bris//gzugs sku dri dang dro dang reg/rang gi bdan pa'i phyogasaso//'dab ma 'dab mar khrims ci //bzhid sgrog dang byas
482a4(rgyud): chen mo//kar b+h+rUM phyag rgya grags chen po//sngags pas 'bad de byi bar bya//pad+ma la skyes 'dob ma la//thams cad du ni 'grub pa b+hi//sgra rnams dag ni thams cad la/
482a5(rgyud): sbyong d+ha nA rnam ba do// rol du yang sgra lce sogs//ming ni yang dag dri byir bya//de nas khrus byas sus byugs /me tig 'dug sogs kyi sna bdug /
482a6(rgyud): seM m+b+ha nI rang sbyin la//me tog skye da gos kyis brgya//gtsug nga cod pa dang ldan nyid //ma ma b+h+ri dang kyis yang ga sa/ la
482a7(rgyud): ldan//sbyor ba bzang ba'i rnam gzhag gis//de nas thams cad dgug par bya//rdo rje ma me dka' thub che//bzlog dang rnal ma'i phyog rgya yis//rdo rje sems dpa
482b1(rgyud): bzlas nus sa//rdo rje'i sbyor bas gar b+ha zhing //lan+da gsum du na g.yas bskor bas//rdo rje mamo'i dkyil 'khor rnams//dam tshig ldan pa thams cad byan//glu dadangs kyisan
482b2(rgyud): rgyal pos bskul//rang gi slob mi'i tshogs gar gyis//dregs pa yis ni g.yas dang g.yon//'bying ba dang ni 'dud bar bya//'dir gshegs 'dir shegs sems can don
482b3(rgyud): mdzad brtson po bo//ser sna mi mnga' sangs rgyas tshogs mchog mtha' dag dang //bde gshegs dram pa'i yum gyur sring ba'i bskyed pa bo//pha rol don mdzad dus la de ring bab
482b4(rgyud): pa lags//ces so de nas de dag rang nyid kyi//rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pas byon//mtshan ma dag ni bzang po rnams//dkyil 'khor dag tu blta bar bya//rang ngami gzhan la
482b5(rgyud): bab sogs pa'i//mtshan ma ji ltar mthong ba na//de ni nges par ma mo ni//bde gshegs thugs kyi dgongs par byon//de nas mchod yon zhabs bsol cho ga ji bzhin rab brtag
482b6(rgyud): /de tshe babs pa'i sems can bsod nams ldan la bri bar bya//gral te de ni mi smra ba na hU~M ga yi ge dang //ldan po'i glu dbyangs kyis ni yongs su bskul ba nyid du bya//de nas shes
482b7(rgyud): rab ldan ma bzhugs//slob ma'i gtso bo thal sbyar te//mig la mig dar gyis g.yogs la//rab dga' bdag yin yang dag dga'//ma mo thams cad la dmigs te//
483a1(rgyud): nA ma to ba dor bar bya//me tog gang la lhung gyur pa//ma mo de ni de yis 'grub//de nas go rims ji bzhin du//sgo sbyong ba nas brtsams nas su//
483a2(rgyud): rab pha rol phyin pa'i bar//slob mo la ni bshad par bya//dam tshig thob par gyur nas su//sdom pa dag ni bzung bar bya//ma mo'i sngags dang phyag rgya ni//mnyam par
483a3(rgyud): bzhag pas bstan par bya//gzhan du slob dpon blo ngan ni//nges par dmyal bar 'dod par 'gyur//des kyang yang dgra de 'grub cing //myur du dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur//
483a4(rgyud): brdegs dang log par 'dren pa 'am//rims dang gdon dang drug sogs kyis//gdungs te nad kyis rgyun du ni//'chi bA ru yang 'gyur ba yin//rdo rje slob dpon smad kyi
483a5(rgyud): na//rtag tu dmyal ba nyid du ni//rab tu rmongs pa'i slob ma 'gro/mkha' las rdo rje ji bzhin no//des ni bu rdzo dam tshig ni//khyod kyis rtag tu srung bar byos//mam thun gyi
483a6(rgyud): sdom pa ni//theg pa chen po'i tsho gas gnas//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te/rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyis yum rnams kyi dam tshig la
483a7(rgyud): bka' sbal pa/rin chen sems kyi dam tshig gis//rnam pa gsum ni sbyang bar bya//thog mtha' bar gyi sbyor ba yis//chung 'bring mchog gi dbye ba yis//de 'dra'i
483b1(rgyud): dam tshig yang dag pa//sangs rgyas kun gyis bka' stsal to//ji srid sems ni sbyangs kyi bar//'bad pa yis ni bsgom par bya//bud med thams cad mthong ba ni//lan gsum/
483b2(rgyud): du ni bskor nas kyang //spyi bor phyag ni byas nas su//lan gsum bar du gsol pa btab//bdag gi ma khyod bu yin te//ji srid byang chub thob bar du//byang chub yan lag nu ma la//
483b3(rgyud): byung ma rang gi 'o mas skyongs//de nas sbyor ldan rab dge ba'i//dbang bskur ba ni sbyin par bya//gser la sogs pa'i bum pa ru//dri yis chu yi yongs bkang la//dar dang ras
483b4(rgyud): sogs gis g.yogs te//me tog tshun pos mgul rgyun nas//rin chen sman gyis rab bkang ba'i//gcig lhag bcu drug bzang ba la//ma mo'i snying po nyid kyis ni//brgya rtsa brgyad/
483b5(rgyud): du bzlas pa yis//sngags shes pas ni dbang bskur ro//slob ma zhi ba bzang po yis//thog mar zhu ba byas nas kyang //zhabs gnyis la ni mgos btud nas//bdag ni che ge mo
483b6(rgyud): rdo rje//byang chub sems ni rnam sgom pa'o//slob dpon zhabs kyi chu skyes la//dbang bskur phyir ni zhu ba bgyid//bskal pa chen po bdag la stsol//slob dpon mchog tu rmad byung ba//
483b7(rgyud): dbang bskur rgyal ba thams cad kyi//sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub po//des ni bdag gi sems can rnams//don gyi dam pa bdag gis bgyi//sangs rgyas kun gyi don bgyid pa/
484a1(rgyud): sanan ga tu/na tu du na du tu NA smad rgyu rgyu ka/du rgyu
484a2(rgyud): bzhag nasas//rnam pa bzang po gcig goman//yang ni bcu drug dag gam ni//lnga'am yid na bcu y-is ni//dkyil 'khor du ni dbang bsgyu //dkyil la
484a3(rgyud): mdun du ni//dkyil 'khor bad+d+ha bri bar bya//pad+ma lo 'dab brgyad bra la//gaM ser lci ba ldan pa 'i//de yi dbus su rdo rje bri//sna tshogs rdo rje 'od+mo ra phreng //de yi mdun
484a4(rgyud): du la la shrI//chen po rin rkyen bdun gyismra bskor//b+h+rUM y-i b+h+yogs ri po ni//nub bye nyid yin te//drung du na pa'o//'a rje'i phreng 'khrugs 'ad
484a5(rgyud): tsan//grwa y-i phyogs ni thams cad du//me tog bdu /pa d-i zlum //'odi ldan pa ni la //dang sgo ni nyid do//phyi rol du yang mi 'chig na//gcig nas gci/
484a6(rgyud): tu rgyul sgrogs pa//bde byed gter bu'i cha lags te//med thos pa dang ldan pa'o//dkyil ma de yo rjes su ni//slob ma bstims dang bcas pa bzhag/chos
484a7(rgyud): bzhin gtam brjod de//de ring khyod ni rigasu skyes//'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chen//rtag pa dam pa'i dbang phyug pa//thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i dpal//dag pa'i
484b1(rgyud): dbang phyug kun gyi bdag/rdo rje pad+ma lag byin te//gnang ba bzang po rab tu sbyin//bu yis bya ba chen po gyis//sangs rgyas kun gyi blo 'phangs gnas//der ni sbyor ba 'ongs nas su//
484b2(rgyud): gsang ba'i sdom pa sbyin par bya//'di ni mchog tu dga' ba ste//yum rnams rab tu rmad byung ba'o//dus su 'dod pa nyid du gyis//dam tshig mchog tu gyur pa'o//brtul zhug
484b3(rgyud): bzang pos ci 'byor pas//de nas yon ni phul byas nas//slob dpon gyi ni zhabs la btud//ma dang chung ma bu mo dang //sring mo sring mo'i bu mo dang //bu rnams dang ni bdag nyid
484b4(rgyud): dang //rgyal po longs spyod gter dang ni//nor dang 'bru dang grong shing rta//glang po rta dang ba glang sogs//ma he dang ni ma he mo//gzhan dang gzhan yang ci 'dod pa//bla ma la ni
484b5(rgyud): chen pos dbul//bya dang mi bya rdzas kyi mchog/thams cad kyang ni dbul bar bya//de nas bcom ldan mi rnams la//rgyun phreng rnams dang bzhad gad dang //sgeg dang rtsi 'jo dga'
484b6(rgyud): ba dang //rab tu dga' ba'i bde chen dang //bza' btung bca' ba la sogs pa//rnam pa du ma thams cad kyis//mchod nas gshegasu gsol bar bya//sems can kun gyi
484b7(rgyud): don dang ni//bdag gi yang ni ches cher mdzad//bde gshegs gang du gshegs pa der//ma mo thams cad gshegs su gsol//shes rab ldan pas yon phul te//
485a1(rgyud): slob ma'i mchog dang bcas pa yis//gar byas lag pa mgur bzhag ste//rims kyis 'gyed dang 'dud par bya//de nas bzang mo rnam mnyes te//thams
485a2(rgyud): cad sgrub par byed pa'i mchog/bdag gi skal bzang stsal nas kyang //rang gi sras kyi gnas su gshegs//de bzhin gshegs po thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje
485a3(rgyud): ye shes yum chen mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs so////de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i yumA
485a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ma rnams kyis yang gsang ba 'dus pa las byung ba rang rang gi sgrub pa'i thabs rgyas pa bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces zhus so//shes rab ye shes
485a5(rgyud): mchog sgrub pa'i//sems dpa' chen pos gsung du gsol//thabs kyis sems can thams cad kun//sangs rgyas byang chub 'bras thob pa//rdo rje ye shes mchog gyur pa//rdo rje sku
485a6(rgyud): ste rdo rje mchog/dngos grub kun gyi bde ster ba//rdo rje chen po gsung du gsol//thugs kyi rin chen ldan pa'i mchog/gzi brjid rdo rje snang ba can//sems can rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul dang //
485a7(rgyud): 'grub pa'i yon tan 'byung gnas gsungs//sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che//rnal 'byor chen po dbang phyug che//dpa' bo'i sbyor bas gar gnas pa'i//dpa' bo chen pos bshad du
485b1(rgyud): gsal//las kun gyis ni 'bras ba rnyes pas//sna tshogs mkhyen pa dbang phyug che//sems can rnams kyi yab chen po//sna tshogs dam pas bshad du gsol//zhes bya bas so//
485b2(rgyud): nas bcom ldan rtag pa'i rgyal//dam pa'i dbang phyug kun mkhyen pas//gsung mchog na mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i//zab mi yi ni chos bka' stsal//'di na sgrub po gang yang med//dngos
485b3(rgyud): grub bam ni sgrub thabs kyang //thams cad rnam par rtog las byung //rnam rtog kyang ni dmigs ma yin//bdag med sangs rgyas rnams kyang med//chos rnams med cing chos nyid med//sbyor ba
485b4(rgyud): med cing sems can med//de bzhin pa dang ma yang med//bye ba med cing sbyong ba med//'bras bu med cing rgyu yod min//longs spyod med cing zab po med//shes med shes pa po yang med//
485b5(rgyud): rnam shes med cing shes bya med//brdzun min bden pa'ang ma yin pa//des na snang ba thams cad ni//sgyu ma lta bu nyid las byung //de ltar chos rnams rnam rig na//grol nas gos par mi
485b6(rgyud): 'gyur te//dngos grub chen po 'grub par 'gyur//sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po//zab mo'i chos ni thos pa na//ma las pa gang zhig dang gyur na//snying po'i phyag rgya sngags rig rnams//
485b7(rgyud): gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur//sbyor ba 'di ni bcom ldan gsungs//thams cad dag par byed pa'i mchog/gsang ba'i rgyan la legs bzhugs nas//sems can rnams la bstan
486a1(rgyud): pa po//de nas yum rnams tshim gyur te//rang byung ba la zhu ba zhus//grub pa'i sgrub thabs rab sbyor ba//mnga' bdag rnal 'byor rnams kyis gsungs//de nas yang bcom
486a2(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yum las kyi dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//nam mkha'i dkyil
486a3(rgyud): 'khor bsgom par bya//de yi steng du ma nyams pa//namakha'i mtha' klas khyab pa yi//phyogs kun tu ni rab 'phro ba'o//de yi steng du gzi brjid che//dus mtha'i me dang mtshungs 'dra ba//
486a4(rgyud): de yi stong du sa chen po//gser gyi ri bo dang mtshungs pa//de yi steng du chur shes bya//zla ba gang nga kha ba 'dra//sngags pas cho ga bzhin du ngasam//rin chen bzhi yi rang bzhin bzang //stong
486a5(rgyud): phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yi//dpag tshad kyi ni chad tsam pa//gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa//rta babs bzhi yi rtse mo can//ri bo chen po cog brgyad pa//dbus su rdo rje'i ri bo mchog/de yi steng
486a6(rgyud): du rdo rje che//kun tu phyogs pa yongs su sgom//sngo bsangs mar ga ta 'dra ba//sna tshogs 'od kyis yang dag 'khrugs//de yi steng du rdo rje che//rtse mo lnga pa rnam par bsam//dkar po
486a7(rgyud): shol dang 'dra ba po//'od zer lnga yis rnam par spras//de yi steng du rin po che//chu skyes sngon po'i 'dab 'dra ba//sna tshogs 'od zer stong gi phreng //phyogs bcu na mkha' khyab pa'o//
486b1(rgyud): de yi gtsug tu pad+ma che//na mkha' khyab pa yin ni mchog/lo ma stong phrag du ma can//lte ba dang ni ze 'brus dkrigs//de yi mdun dunyi ma che//'od zer stong phrag du ma can//de yi steng du zla du che/
486b2(rgyud): dkar po'i 'od zer 'bar bas dkrigs//na mkha'i khams ni gang ba yin//gzi brjid dkar po 'phro ba'o//de yis dbus su ma mo bri//dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang //yongs
486b3(rgyud): su dag pa mkha' 'dram//zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'gro ba mo//phyag gAnyis ma la thugs zhi ba//bsam gtan spyan ldan pasam gtan yid//bsam gtun mchog gi phyag rgya yi//ser mo gnon
486b4(rgyud): nu rab bshad pa//dkar po'i gos 'dzin mdzes pa mo//dkor po yi ni rgyan gyis brgyan//ral pa'i thor tshugs cod pan bzang //gtsug gi nor bu 'od ldan pa//ye shes gdan la
486b5(rgyud): mnyam par bzhugs//ba spu rnams kyi rtse bu gnas//rgyal ba rab tu 'phros pa ste//byang chub pha rol son par mdzad//de yi thugs kar rnam bsam pa//yi ge mchog tu mi
486b6(rgyud): 'gyur ba//yi ge rnams kyis yang dag dkrigs//thams cad ngu ni legs 'phro ba'o//sangs rgyas rnams ni mdun gnas pa//rab tu thul mo sbyor ba'o//de bzhin byang chub
486b7(rgyud): sems dpa' rnams//rig sngagal khro bo'i tshogs rnams ni//chos nyon pa yi tshul du yang //dkyil 'khor du ni bzhag par bya//sgo yi phyogs ni thams cad du//sgo skyong pa
487a1(rgyud): ni bzhi rnams so//sbyin pa la sogs ci rigs par//bcu drug pa'ang bzhag par bya//sa tag 'dug pa mar mche//ji lta ba bzhin bzhag par bya
487a2(rgyud): klu de bzhin gnod sbyin dang //dri za lha min dmyal las byung //'di rnams thams cad lhun po la//kun nas yongs su bzhag par bya//de nas me tog phreng ldan 'jug/
487a3(rgyud): dang me tog yang dag ldan//gos dkar 'dzin pa dpal dang ldan//rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan//shes rab 'phro drang lhan cig tu//rdo rje sems dpa' rjes
487a4(rgyud): dran pa//bdag pas de ni dag par bya//shes rab sbyor bas gang gnas pas//sgo yi drung du legs 'khod la//glu 'di yis ni spyan drang bya//thugs rje mnga' ba chos
487a5(rgyud): kyi dbang phyug sangs rgyas yum//ring gi yab kyi tsho gas dang sras dang bcas te byon//skyo tshig skyon cig lha dang srid mor bcas mchod pa'i//'jig rten dbang phyug yang dag byang chub
487a6(rgyud): thugs mnga' ba//spyon cig spyon cig thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'jig rten gnyen//chos kyi yo ge bde bar gshegs pas rjes bskos pa//mkha' ltar yongs dag dri med dam
487a7(rgyud): bca' dran par mdzod//ma mo rnams ni mchog glus bskul bas byon par 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das ma byon par mthong nas rang gis me tog gi snyim pa dang mchod
487b1(rgyud): yon dang zhabs sel dbul bar bya'o//aM bdag gi mchod yon zhabs bsil 'di//ci bde bar ni bzhes su gsol//de nas de dang lhan cig tu//'dres pa ru ni gyur par bsam//oM saH/
487b2(rgyud): ta thA ga tA prad+yA dz+nyA na sa mA ya hU~M sau mA ya s+t+waM/de nas 'di yis brtan par bya ste/oM sarba tA thA ga ta tsa la sa mA ya ma tsa lI s+t+waM/de nas 'dis mnyes par bya//oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ma na san+d+hu
487b3(rgyud): sbyi sa ma ye dz+haiM/oM h+ye hi dzaHoM h+ye hi dzaHde nas dpag tu med pa'i ngo mtshar chen po lta ba'i phyir/oM sar+b+ba aM ga puN+Da ri me hA b+ha ga bAn sa le sma ra sma ra s+pha ra s+pha ra sarba a ga a bA yu
487b4(rgyud): biSh+Ta ma hA bud+d+ha sa mu drAn hUM hUM aM/'di yis ma mo bskul nas su//sangs rgyas sprin ni 'od po che//dkyil 'khor ba la spro bar bya//de nas gsang sngags 'di yi ni//bsngags te
487b5(rgyud): mi tog dor bar bya//oM sarba aM ga puN+Da ri pra tits+tsha d+hI ku su ma aM dza li hUM aHdi nas ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi bum pa rnams la rig sngags 'dis jo ltar
487b6(rgyud): bshad pa ltar legs par byin gyis brlabs la rang gis dbang bskur rang gi snying po rang gis blang bar bya'o//de nas las thams cad kyi nus pa dang ldan pa dang /dngos grub
487b7(rgyud): thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro//de nas me tog la sogs dang //bza' dang datung dang ro dag gis//mchod la sngon gyi rim pa bzhin//slob ma'i rgyal po gzhug par bya/
488a1(rgyud): 'khor lus bsgyur ba'i rim pa ste//sbyor ba yis ni dbang bskur ro//rdo rin chen de bzhin dang//las kya de bzhin no//zhags pa lcags kyu rdul bu dang /
488a2(rgyud): lcags sgron rngu yab dang ni gdugs//ral gri mig smon thur ma gnyis//rgyal po'i nye bar spyod pa dang //de la rgyan rnams brtan nas su//dkyil 'khor dur ni dbang bskur
488a3(rgyud): ro//rgyal ba'i yum gyis dbang bskur ba//las kun byed pa rab tu bshad//dam tshig kam ni sdom pa yang //rang gi slob ma mnyan du gzhug/shi bA dang ni rgyas pa'i las//
488a4(rgyud): dbang dang drag shul spyod pa ni//legs par rnam par dag sems kyis//ci 'dod par ni bya ba byos//las rnams kun gyi 'bras bu yang //sbyor ba 'di yis 'grub par 'gyur//
488a5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' chen pos slar yang las dam pa rgyas par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
488a6(rgyud): lha'i gzugs kyi snod byas la//dkyil 'khor gyis ni dbus su bzhag/zho dang mar sar 'o ma ni//tsan dan dmar po dang bsres te//ga pur dang ni ldan byas la//yid la byed pas
488a7(rgyud): bzlas te sgrub//zla ba nyi ma gzas bzung tshe//sbyor ba bzang po'i rnam bzhag bya//thog mar me ni sbar byas nas//'ad pa yis ni rlung gi bu//gser gyi snod du bsdu bar bya//kha
489a1(rgyud): /sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs shing //stobs ni dpal ldan rdo rje'i mtshar//nyid 'gyur rga dang 'chi bla med//mig sman dang ni ba lang mar//mA ho dang da
489a2(rgyud): nyid dang //mi yaM mig smon nyid dag ni//mkhas pA yis ni blangs nas su//sngags pas gzung ste btso bar bya//mig sman chen po mchog tu bzung //'di yis mig sa
489a3(rgyud): byugs na ni//grub pa yid du 'ongadra bar 'gyur//mi snad 'grub pa thams cad kyis//blo gros chen po rgyal por 'gyur//sangs rgyas kun gyis chen po//nges par
489a4(rgyud): 'gyur gzhan du min//rdzas kyi gnas skab pa le'u 'di//mtshungs med chen por nyer bshad do//gos dang gdug sogs ral gri dang //mtshon cha dam pa bsgrub par
489a5(rgyud): bya/snying po snying kar byas nas ni//bsgoms na myur du 'grub bar 'gyur//rdo rje sems dpa'i rgyal po ches//pad+mo'i sems dpa' bzhin ras mchog/de yi zhal du byas
489a6(rgyud): nos su//de dang ldan pas bsgom par bya//mnga' bdag grang gis dbang phyug ltar//skad cig de la de 'gyur ro//de nyid kyi ni spyi dro'i cher//mchog gi dam pa bsam gtan
489a7(rgyud): bya//skad cig de la mchod pa che'i//sangs rgyas su ni de 'gyur ro//de yi spyi gtsug nyid du ni//sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par bye//de ni kun gyi rgyal dbang po//las
489b1(rgyud): kun byed pa'i don grub 'gyur//rdo rje snying khur bsam par bya//de yis dbus su snying po blta//de nas rdo rje rig pa 'dzin//mnga' bdag rdo rje'i dbang po 'grub//rin chen chen
489b2(rgyud): tshe brgyud nga//snying kha ru ni mkhas pas sgrom//der ni snying po dusam pa yis//rin che ni rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur//pad+ma chen po 'drab brgyad pa//yid la bsgoms pas
489b3(rgyud): skad cig la//pad+ma che ldan mnga' bdag gis//pad+ma'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur//de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa//rdo lce'i sbyor ba'i cho go yis//mchog dang dman pa
489b4(rgyud): 'bring po yi//dngos grub dam pa bsgrub par bya//snying khar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsamA//yi ge dam pa bsgom par bya//rje lta'i sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis/thams cad
489b5(rgyud): bdag tu bsgom par bya//de las langs te bdag zhi bas//zla 'od kha bA ltar bsil ba'i//'od zer sprin gyis cher gtams pas//bsgrub bya'i spyi bor bzhag par bya//skad
489b6(rgyud): cig de la 'dug pa dang //bza' dang dug sogs rab 'phyogs shing //nyi ma gcig gam bdun num ni//bsgrub bya zhi 'gyur gzhan du mun//rin chen dkyil 'khor dbus
489b7(rgyud): nan par//snying po'i mchog ni bsgom par bya//'od zer ser po'i phreng mdzes pa//bsgoms pas de ni rgyas par byed//pad+mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/
490a1(rgyud): mnyam par bzhag pas lha mau bsam//dmar du'i rang bzhinang bar dag pa//bad+hU pa bya'i sems la 'phro bar bya//slar yang bsdud pa'i sbyor ba yis//rang gi
490a2(rgyud): lum la gzhug par bya//'khor los bsgyur ba lta bu yang //de ni tsI nas dbang du 'gro/las kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par bya//de yi
490a3(rgyud): dbus su yi ge ni//mar gang 'od 'dra ba sgom par bya//'od zer srin gyis yang dag 'khrugs//mkhas pa yis ni snying khar bsam//bsgrub bya la ni snying po'i 'od//bstims

490b3(rgyud): smyung ba lce myur 'gyur//'di nyid kyi rlon la'i byed gyis//ri me no dang mar bzang po//mA khu na dang me tog kun//rlung gis dbu pa nyid du b+h+rUM//zhags pas na sbyin pa

490b6(rgyud): yid rnabargya bzlas pas ni 'bebs par 'gyur//shes rab pha rol phyin ma mchog/khro ba dang ni yang dag ljon//gsal byed kyis ni gsal byas pas//las rnams dag ni tham/
490b7(rgyud): cad bya//dur khrod ro ni ma nyams pa//mar ngo'i brgyad la bsdus nas su//byang du phyogs te bzhag par bya//de yi khar ni mnyam gzhag pas//gsang sngags legs par
491a1(rgyud): bzlas nas su//rdzas kyi dam pa ci rigs pa//ba bla mog sman rdo chu dang //ldong ros dang yang yang na bcag/dkar rtsi sol ba nyid dang ni//gur bum dang ni rgyu sa
491a2(rgyud): sam//dra rta shu dag ga pur dang //tsan dan de bzhin a ga ru//sha dang khrig dang nyid dang ni//de bzhin sor mo'i gdu bu ni//rnal 'byor ldan pas bzhag nas kyang //de yi
491a3(rgyud): steng du bsdad la bzla//nyi ma shar nas de blangs pas//grub pa'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur//dman pas dngos grub dman pa ste//rab kyis rab tu rnam par bstan//bar mas par
491a4(rgyud): mar shes par bya//mtshan ma med na dbang du byed ces so//skyes bu dag ni thams cad dang //bud med dgra ni thams cad la//reg pa tsam gyis dbang byed cing //mig la
491a5(rgyud): byugs pa yis kyang ngo //tsan dan gyis ni yongs byugs te//gur gum gyis ni thig le'o//la gu yis ni 'dug par bya//dkar rtsi sol ba btsag gis ni//ji ltar
491a6(rgyud): 'dod pa'i ming dang ni//yongs su spel te ma bris pas//dbang ma song ba dbang 'gro ste//rdo rje sems dpa'i bka' bzhin no//khams kyis ming ni bris pa ni//dbang du byed pa'i

491b1(rgyud): rus bdugs pas//dbang du byed pa'i mchog yin no//sol bas yongs su 'gugs par byed//gnod sbyin mo ni nges par 'gugs//sha dang khrag gi bdug pa yi//srin pa 'du
491b2(rgyud): pApar byed pa'i mchog/tsan dan sil hA'i bdug pa yis//lha ni dgugs par byed pa'i mchog/ga bur tsan ngan 'dug pa yis//sangs rgyas mchog tu spyan 'dren pa'o//ga bur gang
491b3(rgyud): giso zos pa yis//gzhan du'ang de yi dbang du 'gyur//rig pa chen mo yi ge bzhi//mnyam par gzhag pa'i sbyor ba yis//'khrugs pa dang ni srel ba'i dus//nges par shi ba

491b5(rgyud): rab kyi//rdzas ni blangs nas 'ongs par 'gyur//gtum po'i yi dwags nyi ma yi//rgyal gyi mtshan mo sol ba bzung //gtum mo'i me tog khu ba yis//brtul zhugs bzang pos brtags
491b6(rgyud): nas su//pad+ma'i nang du gzhag par bya//de nyid mtshan mo gcig gam gsum//de las blangs te sbyor ba yis//mkhas pa yis ni mar zhu bya//de nas lha 'am grub pa 'am//sangs
491b7(rgyud): rgyas kyis kyang bsngags pa 'am//rig sngags grub pa'i grib ma 'am//gdon mi za bar mthong bar 'gyur//'gro dang mi 'gro'i skye bo rnams//dbang ma grub pa'ang dbang du
492a1(rgyud): /byed//rang gi khrag gi ming bris la//de nyid kyi ni phye mas dgang //ji srid bskams por ma gyur par//de srid mi de 'ong bar 'gyur//gang dang gang gis lha dag
492a2(rgyud): gis//rim pa 'di yis ming bris te//khro bo ldan pas bzlas par bya//de 'di skad cig de la 'grub//de yi bka' bzhin byed pa dang //ngang gos de ni dbang du 'gyur//dkon
492a3(rgyud): mchog gsum la gnod byed pa//bsad pa'i don du sngags rig pas//'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od//zhal bzhi pa la cher 'jigs pa//zhags pa lcags kyu thod pa

492a6(rgyud): nas ni//khAng pa ru ni rgyun tu bzhag/de ni myur du nges 'gyur te//de srid du ni mI g.yor gnas//rma bya'i sgro 'am gtsug phud kyis//yongs su blangs la bsgrub par bya//

492b1(rgyud): cig de la 'khor bar 'gyur//khyi dang phag dang bya rag gi/mig ni yongasu blangs nas smra//mig sman dang ni mnyam por bya//lha mo'i sngags kyis bsngags pa yis//sgrub pa

492b3(rgyud): shi med par rnam par rgyu//rims gtong gzugs ni legs bris te//de yi kha ru gnod byed ni//sbyor ba yis ni bcug nas su//yongs su mnan la shin tu bzlas//rims gtong dri yi

492b6(rgyud): mnan nas nges par bzla//gang du gter ni yod snyam gyur//der ni sngags rig pas song ste//lce yongs bzung la bzlas pa bya//de yis gsal po'i tshig gis smra//tshad dang yod
492b7(rgyud): dang med pa dang //bgegs dang bgegs ni ji ltar gnas//ji srid doni dgyes smras na//de la gtor ma sbyin par bya//gal te bgegs ni mi smra na//der ni mchod yon rab tu brtag/
493a1(rgyud): dbus mo gnyis btsugs gus pa yis//nor 'dzin sangs rgyas yum las s+ho//phyogs bzhi dab tu phung bus gdang //de nas gnas rnams bsgrung bar bya//de nas
493a2(rgyud): mtshams ni bcing bar bya//mnyam par bzhag ste bskor bar bya//sbyor ba shes pas sngags 'di yis//de nas rdzas ni gdon par bya//oM ba su de sar+b+ba Ar+tha sA d+ha ne sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya u
493a3(rgyud): d+harA yu d+ha rak+Sha rak+Sha/satwAr+b+ba tra ni tsa yaM taM taM ma tsa Ta Ta ha ha swAhA/yang nu rig pa 'di yis kyang //las rnams dag ni thams cad bya//phyogs bcing ba dang de bzhin srung //phur bu bskrad pa de
493a4(rgyud): bzhin no//rin chen gsum ni thog mar sbyin//cha gcig dang ni nor 'dzin la'o//sdug bsngal can la cha gcig go/grogs po rnams la de dang mtshungs//lhag ma rnams ni
493a5(rgyud): rigs pas dpyad//dkon mchog gsum ni legs mchod bya//gzhan du sdug bsngal thob 'gyur te//rgyal po chom rkun sogs 'jigs pas//gal te bla ma der bzhugs
493a6(rgyud): na/skal ba bzang po gnyis dbul lo//gzhan pa yi ni spyan rnams la//rdo rje theg pa rtogs gyur pa'i//skal ba ro ni sbyin par bya//gzhan du dam tshig gdung bar 'gyur//
493a7(rgyud): 'di ni bcom ldan rnal 'byor can//gsang ba rgyan gyis rdo rjes gsungs//de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis//yum rnams kyis ni der btud nas//dpa' bo tshol zhu ba zhus/
493b1(rgyud): rgyas pa yi ni dkyil 'khor ni//gsungs cig gsungs cig dpa' ba che//yum rnams kun gyi dkyil 'khor ni//rgyal po'i dbang phyug rab gsol ba//sems can thams cad 'dor
493b2(rgyud): 'byung ba'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po'i dbang phyug dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang
493b3(rgyud): thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //dkyil 'khor ji ltar sngags sungs pa/'on kyang seng ge'i khyi dang ldan//de yi steng du pad+ma che//der ni ri bong can dkyil 'khor//de yi steng du nyi ma che//
