493b5(rgyud): ni chos 'chad cing //g.yas pa yis ni mchog sbyin pa//g.yon gyi rin chen lon bu mched//rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan//gos ni 'phyang zhing sna tshogs pa//gtsug tor
493b6(rgyud): mu taMg thor tshugs can//de yi mdun du rin chen bri//g.yon du bum pa bzang po mchog/g.yas pa ru ni dpag bsam shing //rgyab tu rin chen lan bu'o//mtshams rnamasu ni bum pa
493b7(rgyud): brgyad//gser gyi rang bzhin bzhag par bya//rin chen lnga yis yang dag 'khrugs//dri lnga dang ni yang dag ldan//bza' la sogs pa'i ros gang ba'i//bum pa bcu drug phyi rol tu//ser
494a1(rgyud): dwa'i gos rjes yongs su dkris//me tog serarA po sogs kyisu brgyan//de mdun blo ldan dri b+h+yo gu/sbyin pa'i pha rol byin dges//dmar dang po nga chos da//rag/8
494a2(rgyud): chen ldan pa'i phyag sbyin pa//ser po'i 'od ldan phreng mdzes ma//rin chen bzang po kun gyis sras//mkha' yi nyi zla skar ma yis//kun nas yongasu bskor ba'o//gtsug phud cod
494a3(rgyud): pan gos la stsogs//phreng ba dang ldan dgos pa mo//de yi lho ru bri bya ba//tshul khrims pha rol phyin dge ma//cung zad ser ba'i rin chen lus//sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par
494a4(rgyud): brgyan//sna tshogs gos ni yongs su gyon//mdzes pa'i phreng ba'i chun po'i gtsug/gos ldan gtsug na gtsug tor mchog/yid bzhin rin chen dam pa'i phyag/g.yon pa'i skyil
494a5(rgyud): klukrungs rin chen bzang //cho ga ji bzhin rab tu bsam//rgyab tu bzod pa ma zhes bya//cung zad 'dzum zhing ser mdzes ma//dmar po'i gos ni legs par gyon//rin po che yi rgyan
494a6(rgyud): gyis brgyan//thams cad rin chen mchog 'dri zhing //dmar po'i gos ni 'phyang ba ma//gtsug na rin chen mchog dang ldan//seng ge mchog gi khri la bzhugs//byang du brtson
494a7(rgyud): 'grus chen mo ni//rdo rje go chas brgyan pa la//dpal mo rin chen dbyug gu'o phyag/g.yas pa sbyin pa'i pha rol song //pri yang ku la sngo bas dkar//rdo rje seng ge'i khril
494b1(rgyud): sa//l+h+wa sa rnams sbyin byu//da snal khyo sa twe blo nan ldan//dngan nats+tsha Sh+TAm+b+ha//den rten kun gyi sa rnam par brgyan//dan nad //rin chen snam
494b2(rgyud): lag pa mchog/phyogs skyong ba ni thams cad ni//de rims bzhin du bzhig par bya//de yi phyi rol thams cad du//mi byas pas rgyu dang gnad sbyin to//rin chen dum pa bzang po dang //
494b3(rgyud): gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan lag/gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs dang //lha ba shos rab tu bzang dge ba//bza' dang btung ba'i ro mchog dang //mdod dkar nyid dang ni//zho dang bu ram
494b4(rgyud): hwags dang bcas//'o ma myur dang sbrang rtsi dang //rgyal po bza' ba dam pa'i mchog/bza' bra la sogs rab mchog go//de nas sngags pas 'jug par bya//rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan
494b5(rgyud): nas su//ser po'i gos 'dzin dge pa dang //phreng ljon dri zhib ldan pa'i las//sgo yi char ni zhugs nas su//thog mar lha ni spyan drang bya//phyag rgya btsongs te dbyangs snyan nas//8
494b6(rgyud): tu dga' ba'i yid kyis su//lhar bcas 'jig rten dgal sbyin skud du//kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dran mdzad la//rin chen dam pa song ge'i khrir bzhugs te/'khor
494b7(rgyud): bcas lha dang de bzhin gshegs pa spyon//de nas de dag legs byin te//sras bcas 'khor dang bcas rnams kyang //sems can rnams la dngos grub ster//sgrub pa po la khyad
495a1(rgyud): par du//dri nas thal mo legs sbyang la//rin chen gyis bkang me tog bcas//gsang sngags brjod de gtor bar bya//ci bde bar ni bzhi su gsal//de nas
495a2(rgyud): rang gi dbang bskur bya//de yi sngags dang phyag rgya yos//sa la lag pas reg nas su//bsnyems pa yis ni mthon par bya//de nas slob ma gzhug par bya//me tog dris ni
495a3(rgyud): yang dag sdud//ser po'i gos bzang yang dag gyon//lag na dri chen dri bzang po//dka' dang bcas te snyim pa de//snga ma'i sngags kyis dor bar bya//gang gi drung du lhung gyur
495a4(rgyud): pa//lha de de yi 'grub pa yin//de nas g.yas nas rnam bskor te//slob ma de ni 'byung bar bya//bzang po'i seng ge'i khrir bzhag ste//dbang bskur ba yi sbyor ba byas//gdugs
495a5(rgyud): dang rgyal mtshan ba ngan dang //mdzes pa'i rnga yab g.yob pa yis//de bzhin du yang dbang bskur te//bum pa brgyad dang bcu drug la//de yi sngags dang phyag rgya yos//go rims ji
495a6(rgyud): lta bo bzhin no//de nas sbyor ba de 'ongs te//'khor los bsgyur ba'i rim pa yis//'khor l-I rin chen bzang po'i lag/rgyal ba rgyal ba'i sgra dge bas//gsang ba'i sbyor ba'i
495a7(rgyud): rnal 'byor gyis//lte bo ru ni dbang bskur ro//'di bdag gi tor can rin chen 'dzin//rdo rje rin chen 'dzin par 'gyur//dam tshig gi ni dam pa yis//sangs rgyas kun gyi don
495b1(rgyud): rgyas pa//'ad pas de ring blangs pa yis//phongs pa'i dri ma 'phrog par byed//de nas dpa' bo 'chi med 'dzin//don chen tshogs kyis mchod par bya//gzhan pa yi yang du ma ni//rgyal
495b2(rgyud): bo dbang phyug dam pas so//de bzhin dbang bskur lnga po yis//skabs mod kyang ni bdag med 'gyur//gling bya ni dbang phyug dpal ldan yang //gnod pa med par thob par 'gyur//
495b3(rgyud): gsang ba las kyang ches shin tu//gsang ba yi ni mna' bsgrags te//de yi sgom dang sgrub pa'i thabs//slob ma la ni de nas bslab//gur gum dang ni tsan dran dang //dri dang mar
495b4(rgyud): me bzang po lnga//dam tshig gi ni gsal byas pa//lan gsum du ni 'thung du gzhug/bu ky-i 'thung shig gsang ba che//dam tshig tu ni 'da' ba dka'//gal te 'di las 'das gyur
495b5(rgyud): na//myur ba nyid du 'chi bar 'gyur//shi nos kyang ni dmyal sdug bsngal//rab mang du 'dod nyid du gnas//gal te mI ru skye 'dod pa'am//nam zhag dngos grub thob 'dod na//de
495b6(rgyud): bzhin phongs pa'i sdug bsngal las//ring du nges par khyod kyis skyobs//'di dag legs thos sgrub ma la//gsang ba'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya//ji ltar rgyal rigs bu mo ni/
495b7(rgyud): bzung nas gsal ba'i rnal 'byor bya//nyi ma bdun na nges par 'grub//rgyal po'i phun tshogs thob par gyur//shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mchog/dkyil 'khor sbyor bas bsam
496a1(rgyud): gtan bya//rgyal mo cho ga bzhin bzung ste//sgrub pa pos ni myur du 'grub//nyi ma gsum gyi rgyal po mchog/gdon mi za bar thob par 'gyur//bram ze'i bu
496a2(rgyud): mo skal chen mo//nor tshon la ni bsgrub par bya//rdzu rigs sna tshogs sbyor ba yis//mtshungs pa nyid du bsgrub par bya//de yis dngos grub mchog rnyed de//rgyal po 'jig rten
496a3(rgyud): gsum gyi rjed//dmangs mo dpa' bo'i sbyor ba yis//bsgrubs na sgrogs kyi dngos grub 'gyur//gnod sbyin rgyal mchog grub pa dang //gnod sbyin rnams kyi dbang phyug
496a4(rgyud): mchog/dman pa'i sems su bshad po dang //mchog gi mchog ni chen po dang //bA ra mas par me'i dngos grub ni//skye ba 'di la thob par 'gyur//de nas las rnams
496a5(rgyud): bslab par bya//zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa'i las//de bzhin dbang dang mngon spyod dang //gzhan pa yi yang sna tshogs ni//sems can rnams la dga' ba'o//shes rab pha rol
496a6(rgyud): phyin dge mo//dkyil 'khor sbyor bas bsgom par bya//kun da dkar po zla ba 'dra//'od zer dkar pos mdzes pa mo//skye bo nad pa 'chi ka ma//de yi lus la gzhug par
496a7(rgyud): byed de nas de ni stobs ldan 'gyur//brgyad gnyis pa yi lang tsher ldan//nad rnams kun las rnam par grol//rga dang 'chi ba rnam par spangs//bstan bcos kun gyi don
496b1(rgyud): reg cing //shos rab dran pa mchog dang ldan//de bzhin rang 'gyur rnal 'byor pa//nam mkha' la ni yang drag sgom//mdzes pa'i rin chen sna tshogs pa'i//thams cad du na
496b2(rgyud): 'bab pa//'di yis phongs pa rnam par sel//phongs pa rnams la rab tu brtag/mthe bong yi ni tshad tsam pa'i//nor rgyun ma yi rnam pa bya//lha mo la ni mnyam par bzhag/de
496b3(rgyud): yi mdun du gsang sngags bzlas//ji srid 'bum phrag kho na ste//de nas dngos grub bsgrub par bya//zla ba gang ba 'am bcu pozhi'am//brgyad pa 'am gzas bzung nyin par la//mchod
496b4(rgyud): pa chen po byas nas su//mkhas pas mtshan mo thog thag bzlas//de nas dga' bas gzugs brnyan de//gdon mi za bar 'bar bar 'gyur//de nas bzung ste mdor bsdu na//mi yi
496b5(rgyud): 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur//bzlas pas mtshan ma bzang byung na//rnal 'byor pa ni nor chen 'gyur//bar mas gling ni thob par 'gyur//tha ma yis ni khor yug go/thams
496b6(rgyud): cad du ni bzlas tsam gyis//ljongs spyod zad par 'gyur ma yin//rgyal po tham sngo cad dbang 'gyur zhing //bud med thams cad dga' bar 'gyur//snying khar rnal 'byor byas nas su/
496b7(rgyud): nor bu lag par bcangs nas ni//nyi mo'i dkyil 'khor la gnas sgom//myur du rin chen rgyal por 'gyur//phyag rgya 'di na byas gyur pas//rtag tu sgom pas bsgom par bya//ji ltar
497a1(rgyud): 'dod pa'i grub rnyed de//rdo rje 'dzin paji bzhin no//zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal to//de nas sbyor ba de bzhin du//yum de rnams ni legs rgyan
497a2(rgyud): nas/rna las kyi dkyil 'khor legs gnas pa//ston pa la ni zhu bzhus//gang du rgyal ba kun bzhugs nas//bla na med pa'i don mdzod pa//sems can kun la bde skad du//myur du/
497a3(rgyud): las ni 'grub pa lags//de nas bcom ldan 'das las thams cad kyi dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas//de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum skye
497a4(rgyud): dam tshig dam pa de rnams la las kyi dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/rlung gi dkyil 'khor bri ba bya//de yi dbus su gru gsum pa//de yi steng du lha mo bzhag/'bar ba'i me dang mtshungs
497a5(rgyud): pa la//zhal bzhi ma la cher 'jigs bya//mche ba rab tu gcigaso pa mo//thod pa'i phreng ba'i chad pan n+dan//rdo rje lcags kyu zod pa dang //zhags pa g.yas dang g.yon par 'dzin//
497a6(rgyud): lpags pardzun po gos su gyon//khyo ma tshig 'dras rang byung ba//mche bas mchu mnan zhal chen mo//de yi mdun du bri b+ha ga//mtha' tsha'i zhal ni mdor rdzus pa//sna tshags pa
497a7(rgyud): rang drag pa'i zhal//du ma'i phyag gis yang dag 'khrugs//zhags pa lcags kyu thod sogs dang //rdo rje can gyi sog le 'dzin//zod pas lus la bris gyur cing //cod pa ni
497b1(rgyud): pos 'jigs byed mo//gshin rje dpa' bos dri bya ba//mtha' gdong dam pa phyi ni mchog/blun po 'bar ba'i rang bzhin khros//mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan//thod pa'i bang ba'i rtsad
497b2(rgyud): pan can//stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs can//ral gri rin rgyan thod pa dang //rin chen dadrug gu 'dzin pa'i mchog/de nas lha mo legs bri ba//pad+ma'i zhal ma 'jigs chen
497b3(rgyud): po/dmar ma~M phyag na nyi zla 'dzin//bskal ba'i me dang mtshungs pa mo//g.yon pa du ni khro mo che//me spyom mya ni sgra rags mgul//lus ni rdo rje dri ldan mchog/mche ba rnam par
497b4(rgyud): gtsigs pa'i zhal//gtsug na thod pa 'jigs su rung //rab gtum stobs dang gsal ba mo//'byor ljon cho ga reg pas bris//phyi rol tu ni legs bri ba//khro bcas 'jigs pa
497b5(rgyud): dang bcas pa//ral pa'i ther tshugs chen po can//khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa dang //phyag rgya bzang pos phyeg mtshan pa'o//de yi phyi ru lha rnams ni//snying pa rab sbyar yi dam pa//thams//
497b6(rgyud): cad du ni yongs su bzhag/'jig rten skyong ba bzhag phyir bya//sgo rnams dag ni thams cad du//sgo skyong ba yang de bzhin du//de nas gtor ma'i cho ga ni//sha bcos btung ba ro dang ldan//
497b7(rgyud): de nas go cha bcings gyur pa//thod pa'i cod pan chen po dang /khrag gam zang gis bkab pa 'am//thod pa ldan pas 'jug par bya//thams cad 'grub pa'i ma mo rnams//'di yis skyed//
498a1(rgyud): ni drang bar bya//dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed pa'i//gsang ba'i don du ma mo rnams//de ring nyid du dkyil 'khor 'dir//'jigs chen ma rnams thams cad
498a2(rgyud): gshegs//'jigs pa'i sgra dang cher gtum dang //kha nas 'od zer stong phrag ni//mthong ba dang ni thos pa na//mtshan mar yang ni shes par bya//de nas de yis a rag sbyin//ci
498a3(rgyud): bder bzhes cig 'jigs mdzad ma//gdug pa chen po gsol bar mdzod//gdug gtum 'jigs par byed pa yis//de nas bdag la dbang bskur te//thod par gnas pa'i ro /
498a4(rgyud): yis ni//srang tsam gyi ni sha zos nas//ma mo thams cad bsgrub par bya//de na snga mngon spyod las rnams kun//dam tshig bsrung ba yis ni bya//dkon mchog gsum la gnod
498a5(rgyud): byed dang //bla ma rnams la 'khyal smra ba//rtag tu gsod par lha mo rnams//bgyid par po dag ni rjes su zung //de nas cho ga de nyid kyis//slob ma'i dam pa gzhug par bya//khro
498a6(rgyud): bro'i lha la bskul nas su//mye tog dmar po dor bar bya//bdag gi me tog dam pa 'di//ci bde par ni bzhes su gsol//bdug pa 'di ni bzung nas su//gsol byed 'di
498a7(rgyud): ni gsal bar mdzod//lha mo gang la lhud gyur pa//de yis de la mchog gsol lo//de nas dbang bskur byin nas su//dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun bzhag ste//thod pa ru ni
498b1(rgyud): gnas pa smos//khrag thos dang na bskur bar bya// nas sgo nub stonas su//dam tshig 'bring bus 'dzin du gzhug/rab tu gdug par byung gi khrag/babyung ba 'drin 'thung
498b2(rgyud): zhig bu//ze shig zo shig sha chen po//btung ba 'jigs pa chen po'i'athung /gzhan du na ni 'chi 'gyur te//mkha' 'gro ma dang gza' rnams dang //gnod sbyin srin po gdum
498b3(rgyud): po yi//ring por mi thogs rab tu za//de nas mngon spyod las rnams ni//stong phrag dag ni bslab par bya//de yi sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis//rang nyid khro bo bzung gyur nas//
498b4(rgyud): gnod byed thams cad bsad par bya//dgra rnams thams cad bcu' bar bya//gdug pa thams cad ban+d+ha'i bar bya//srin po thams cad gnom par bya//mtha' yas nal n+ya'i
498b5(rgyud): sbyor ba yis//bsad dang bzung po dri yis bye//zhal bzhi ma yi sbyor ba yis//thams cad 'gugs pa'i dam po yin//mkha' gdod ma yis thams cad du//rin po che yi tshogs
498b6(rgyud): 'byung ngo //pad+ma'i zhal gyi sbyor ba yis//chang gi dam pa btung bor bya//mA sgom ma yi sbyor ba yos//shu ni 'gugs pa'i mchog yin no//nam mkha' rengs pa chen po ste//dmag
498b7(rgyud): dpung 'byor pa'i dam pa'o//rmugs dang rmongs pa thams cad du//dbad pa ni mi bya'o//sngor bshad pa yi las rnams dang //ma bshad pa la ci 'dod pa//bzlas pa tsam gyis su
499a1(rgyud): ste 'thams cad du ni jo tsam med//dur khrod kyi ni thal ba la//dgra bo gzugs ni 'dud pas bya//ming dang spel bar byas nas su//mA ma'i ral bris btub par bya//
499a2(rgyud): nas nyi ma bdun na ni//bslab par 'gyur bar gdon mi za//gang lus ji ltar bcad gyur pa//de dang de yi yan log 'chang//zhal bzhi ma la sbyor ba yis//sngags pa mnyam par bzhag
499a3(rgyud): pas bcad//de yi mgrin par zhags pa ni//mkhas pas spros te bcing bar bya//lcags kyus snying khar phug nas su//rlung gis bskyod de drang por bya//de nas de yi ming bskul nas//nga ni/
499a4(rgyud): shes rab ldan pas dgug/dman dang mchog gi dbye ba yis//'di yis 'bras bung yis bshad//mdor bsdus pas ni shes par bya//sngags bya'i rgyal po'i sbyor ba yis shes so//
499a5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni//de yis dngos grub gsol mi 'gyur//nye bar 'tshe ba 'jigs rnams dang //gdon dang gnod skyon srin po bcas//mi
499a6(rgyud): zad nad kyis bteb nas su//shrI nas mnar med nyid du 'gyur//de nas de bzhin dbang bskur gyis//dkyil 'khor la bzhag yum rnams kyis//dbang bskur gsang ba'i dam tshig sbyin//
499a7(rgyud): gsang ba'i sgrub thabs nyan du gzhug/rang yum ma mo'i sa bon gyis//rang gi rnam rtog bdag yum min//lta bus yab gyur bsgrubs na ni//nyi ma bdun ni rab tu 'grub//sangs rgyas
499b1(rgyud): kun gyi yab ston pa//kun mkhyen ye shes spyod yul te//drag po kun dang bde chen po//ye shes kun gyi mchog gi mchog/shes rab kyis ni thams cad sbrus//las rgyas pa yi dam pa'i
499b2(rgyud): mchog/bye brag tu ni bskul nas su//byang chub kyi ni yan tan gyi//thams cad du ni 'od gsal ba'i//dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya//shes rab kyi ni lngas dbye bas//gzugs dang
499b3(rgyud): dbyibs nyid dag gis so//phyag rgya dang ni phyag rgya'i lan//de bzhin dkyil 'khor dam tshig dang //bza' bo dang ni nyer spyod pa//gtor ma lha bshos nyid dang ni//shin tu bde ba'i stan nyid
499b4(rgyud): dang //de dang de ni nges par sbyar//bzlas dang bsam gtan sa bon ni//rang gi lus khyab pa nyid do//gsang sngags dgo ni thams cad las//gsang sngags 'di ni rab tu bsngags//tshe
499b5(rgyud): 'dir dam pa'i rjes grub cing //gdon mi za bar thob par 'gyur//'di ni bcom ldan kun rdo rje//ye shes 'byung gnas mnga' bdag gsungs//lus kun gyi ni sbyor ba yis//'di ni skye
499b6(rgyud): mas 'gro la bzhugs//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//phyag rgya'i ye shes mchog tu dge/ye shes chen
499b7(rgyud): pos gsung du gsol//gang gis mngon par rgyas btab kun//mnga' bdag dus mi ring bar 'grub//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang ting nge 'dzin rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
500a1(rgyud): bar zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka sbrul to//myug rgya rtags su yang dag zla shad//byA stad tsam du rnam par brtags//sangs rgyas kun gyi kla k+ko'i skang //phyag rgyu
500a2(rgyud): thams cad yang dag bshad//'on kyang mgon po mchog gi brtags//lag pa'i rnam dgod mtshan ma nyid//gang gi yid ches logs skye rnams//dam tshig shes
500a3(rgyud): pa'i lha rnams ni//sgrub po rnams kyis rab bskul na//grub pa'i dam pa rab tu stsol//dus las thams cad byon nas su//slar yang gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur//
500a4(rgyud): lag pa zla ba nyi mar bya//shes rab thabs su rab tu brtag/de nas sngags pas yongs su sbyar//rang gi sa bon dag gis mtshan//oM bya dz+nyo pa yA sa mA yi ga/dri nas
500a5(rgyud): thal mo nges par sbyar//phan tshun rjes su rtogs chen po//khu tshur shin tu bzhag par ba//khu tshur bsdams pa lta bur bcing //so so ru ni sbyor bar bya//skyeng gi
500a6(rgyud): dbus su nges par bzung //g.yon pa'i steng du lag pa g.yas//bzhag skye skor mo so bor bya//lag ge mus skyed nas phyogs kun tu//'khor lo'i sbyor bas smra bar
500a7(rgyud): rdo rje sgo lcags lta bur bskum//sor mo thams cad rtsibs su bya//oM sa d+harma tsakra so ma ye//de bzhin g.yon pas yongs su spro//sor mo rtsibos kyi sbyor ba bri/
500b1(rgyud): shos rab sten du bsgreng bar bya//g.yas pa yang ni de bzhin no//rtse mo cung zad sbyar bar bya//chos kyi las ni chen po byed//de nyid snyam du bskums pa ni//las kyi phyag rgya zhes su
500b2(rgyud): grags//de bzhin ming myod byas nas su//lhag ma rnams ni gdong du sbyar//phyag rgya chen po shin tu ni//dngos grub thams cad rab tu gsol//phyag rgya 'di rnams bsdams na ni//
500b3(rgyud): rang nyid shes rab bdag por 'gyur//kun tu bzang po rgyal po che//lho dang lha min bcas pas mchod ce'o//de nas ma mo de rnams kun//slar yang gtso bo la bstod nas//shes
500b4(rgyud): rab chen po rnam bzhi yi//phyag rgya zhu ba rnam par byas//phyag rgya bzhi yi rab kyi mchog/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol cig/gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i yal ga mchog/shes rab
500b5(rgyud): thabs kyis lus bzang pa//gang zhig gsang ba'i rnal 'byor ni//gang gi rnal 'byor pa bde ba//rdzu 'phrul 'phel dang yang dag pa'i//rdzu 'phrul skyo ba 'dir rnyed pa//bcom ldan ston
500b6(rgyud): pas bka' stsal pa//gsang ba'i phyag rgya rgyal ba'i gzhi//gang gi myur du sgrub bo kun//rab tu bde bar gnas pas 'grub//de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can//mnyes te gseng ba'i dam
500b7(rgyud): pa gsungs//phyag rgya'i pha rol phyin pa rnams//bde ba chen po rab tu sgrub//rdo rje thal mo dam par bsdams//rdo rje dbus su bzhag par bya//gsang ba'i dam tshig zhes su bsgrags//
501a1(rgyud): gsang ba'i rnal 'byor rab tu sgrub//de nyid rdo rje lta bur byas//brgyud pas bde ba brgyad par rab byed//'di ni chos 'dzin zhes bya ba'o//phyag rgya gsang ba sgyur
501a2(rgyud): pa'o//g.yon par thabs ni bskums nas su//bskyod pas bde ba 'bugs par byed//dag pa'i las zhes rab tu grags//bde ba thams cad rab stsol byed//de nyid khaM dang
501a3(rgyud): rkan la ni//sbyar ba chen mo zhes su bshad//rdo rje phan tshun yang dag sbyar//lcags kyu'i khwa ni bskyod par bya//khA ni pan rgyun yongs sgyur ba//gsong ba'i zhags pa
501a4(rgyud): byis su grags//de bzhin bskums par byas nas su//dam du bsdams te bcing bar bya//'di ni gus rab sboms pa'i rgyu//ye shes sdoms pa rab tu 'grub//thams cad
501a5(rgyud): rdorje ltar rdo rje//de bzhin bskyed cing bskor bar bya//de 'di gsang ba rab nim pa//tshim pa'i don ni ster bar byed//lha gro ma phyag rgya chen po ru//shes bya phyag rgya mdor bsdus/
501a6(rgyud): pa'o//de nyid las kyis phyag rgya mchog/las kyi dbye bas sbyar byar bya//zhes so//de nas mya mo de rnams kun//yid ni tshim nying mgu ba yis//rdo rje sems dpya' mtshan
501a7(rgyud): yangs pa'o//legs so ba ni nges par phul//legs legs so gsang chen po//legs so legs mchod chen po//legs so leg so rnal 'byor che/leg so la gso ra
501b1(rgyud): chos mdzad//de nas bcom ldan 'das ma rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje btsun mo rnams kyis dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor zhu ba bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/spangs
501b2(rgyud): rgyas rang bzhin khyod la 'dud//spyod pa'i rin chen khyod la 'dud//dam pa'i rgyu 'gyur khyod la 'dud//sna tshogs mdzad pa khyod la 'dud//dpa' bo 'dul ba khyod la 'dud//gsangs pa'i chos
501b3(rgyud): ldan khyod la 'dud//zhi ba'i thugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud//mgon po khyod la bdag cig zhu//bdag gi dkyil 'khor zhu ba'i phyir//mnga' bdag rgyal dang sems can rnams//de nas
501b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje btsun mo'i dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas su//dbus su pha rol phyin ma dgod//d+hI zhes bya/
501b5(rgyud): bshes rab can//thabs dang ldan pas gsal byas pa//'di yis sngags pa 'jigs med par//zla ba phyed kyis nges par 'gyur//reg pa 'di yis de yis ni//las rnams thams/
501b6(rgyud): cad byed pa dang //dbang dang dgug drang dbye ba dang //tshim dang 'phrog dang 'bras chen po//zhi bras zhi ba zhes su bshad//brnyes ma zhes pas rgyas par bshad//dbang dang dgug dang dbye
501b7(rgyud): ba la//byed ma'o dbang la drag mo yin//sha yi mtha' ru bdud gsod ma//gsod pa dang ni spel bar bya//'gro ba dang ni yang dag ldan//sor mo zhags pas dkri bar bya//thams cad
502a1(rgyud): du ni drag bu dgu/drag po dra pa'i go 'bang gnas//'di yi chog ldan pa yis//las kyis tshogs kyi mchog kun bya//sems ldan lta 'gyur lags bsam ste/
502a2(rgyud): brgya brgya kho na bzlas pa yis//dbang bcas nyid ngam dbang chen po//stobs kyis mgo bo mnan nas su//mA mo'i tshogs kun de yis bzla//dus mi ring bar 'grub par 'gyur//gzi
502a3(rgyud): brjed chen pos bka' bzhin du//mgo bos nye bar phyag 'tshal te//'di yis ma mo thams cad kun//gzi brjid kyisra ni gzi ldan pa//sngags kyi rgyal po 'od ldan pas//
502a4(rgyud): rims ji lta ba bzhin du//dpe zla med pa'i dngos grub byed//grub pa'i lam la rab tu gnas//sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa yi//'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa yi//'di ni ston
502a5(rgyud): pa chen pos gsungs//ma skyes skye ba med la bzhugs//rtag pa ston pa thams cad pa//nam mkha' nyi zla dri ma med//de dag thams cad rab dga' ste//dngos po spangs pa'i btsun
502a6(rgyud): mo yis//gar dang glu dang si l-i snyan mchog/bzhad dang sgeg pa'i sbyor ba dang //bud meng sgyu ma'i rnam 'phrul dang //gling bu pi wang rdza rnga sogs//ting ting shag dang dung skra
502a7(rgyud): dang //ro dang reg pa dri chen po//gzugs dang sgra sogs bde ldan paso//dpa' chen la ni mchod byas nas//snrums dang bcas pas phyag 'tshal te//slar yang mgon po la
502b1(rgyud): gsol btab//rdo rje btsun ma'i dkyil 'khor rnams//margan po tsa y-i phyir mo gsungs//yab rnams can thams cad dang //yum rnams kyi ni mdor bsdus pa//mchod pa yang ni thams cad
502b2(rgyud): de//bran bcas po nya pho nya mo//'jig rten pa ni mdza' dag gi/gtso bo chen pos gsung du gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos yang de
502b3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gnyis su med pa rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/de dag nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje la gzhug pa dang /
502b4(rgyud): dbug pa dang /bcings pa dang /mnyes par bya ste/nyid kyi sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje gnyis su med pa bstings pa dang /ldan pa la mnyam par gzhag ste bzhugs so//de nas yang bde ba
502b5(rgyud): yongs su skyes pa rab tu dgyes pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad lhan cig spyod pa dang bcas pa/bran dang bcas pani de la 'di skad ces gsol to//mgon po dbang phyug rdo rje sems//rdo rje snang
502b6(rgyud): ba mdzes pa'i sku//gsang ba rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor ni//dpa' bo chen pos gsung du gsol//gang gi rgyal ba kun skyed pa//byang chub sems dpa' grags chen po//de nas bcom ldan
502b7(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang brgyan gyi bkod pa dkyil 'khor chen po'i mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to//
503a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis//zhu ba rab tu zhus pa ni//gang phyir nga la dngos med cung //zhu ba zhus pa thams cad thos//gsang ba chen po'i smon lam dang //
503a2(rgyud): bzhin snying rje'i pha rol phyin//dran pa mdo las dran pa yang //dran 'gyur dran po bzhin gnas pa//sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen po//shes rab pha rol phyin dge ba/
503a3(rgyud): chos dang chos min rnam par spangs//brjod du med pa bshad par bya//de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag nyid de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
503a4(rgyud): gsang ba rgyan gyi bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po bka' stsal pa'i phyir/slar yang glu'i dbyangs 'dis zhu ba zhus pa/chos dbyings mi g.yo de la legs bzhugs dam
503a5(rgyud): pa'i thugs//phyogs bcu mtha' yas sangs rgyas kyis zhabs legs btud pa//bde mchog lho yi lha ste sa dbang 'jig rten bla//dkyil 'khor bde ba mchog la bzhugs
503a6(rgyud): gsol bde chen gyis//sa gnyis gtsug gi phyag byas bde ldan pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyis//karnam pa kun tu gar mdzad sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa gsungs shig kye/
503a7(rgyud): 'gro kun phan dgongs rab tu gzhug gsol mchod pa chen po kye//cha lugs rnam pa du mas 'gro kun 'dul mdzad kun gyi dam pa kye//de nas bcom ldan 'das de
503b1(rgyud): na gshegs pa rnams cad kyis gsol ba ga tub bskul ba'i nog nyid kyi thug stsal bzhag nas/do dgan+d+ha gshegs pa thams cad kyi kyilnga 'khor bsgyur ba chen po rab tu
503b2(rgyud): snyim pa bde bya la longs spyod pa rnam par bsgyings pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin lnga snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin gyis brlabs te/bde ba chen
503b3(rgyud): bo 'khor los bsgyur ba la rab tu gnas nas nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams la rab tu byung ngo //dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la/de yi lto bar 'di dgrod
503b4(rgyud): do//rdo rje chen po bsam gtan pa//'dod pa'i dbang phyug drug dang ldan//de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi yag//kun gyi theg mtha' rab byung ba//de la stsogs pa'i rim
503b5(rgyud): pa yis//thams cad kun tu brdugs par bya//pad+mo lo ma rtsi bAs la ni//rang gi chos dang rab tu sbrel//ma mo rnams ni thams cad kyis//mchod pa la sogs rab tu brtag/
503b6(rgyud): na pa yongs su brgya'o// ts+tsha ru zla ba /brkyen mo spyan cig da //kun nusam+b+ha na pa ste//den pa rang gi sa kyis//klu dru gnang sbyin
503b7(rgyud): gzhan//dri za rnams dang mi 'am ci//lho mnon mkha' ldong de bzhin//'jig rten skyong ba thams cad ni//sgo ru gnyis gnyis bzhag par bya//gdon dang drug dong rims dang nang //yi dwags
504a1(rgyud): sha za bran po dang //dmyal ba brgyang po phyogs brgyad kyi//'khor lo'i phyi ru bzhag par bya//de nas 'khor lo'i mye khyud bri//chen po rin chen bdun rang bzhin//da yar+b+ba ru
504a2(rgyud): bri bya ba//shar du 'dod chags skyes gnas lag/zhe sdang drag po lus gnag pa//byang du legs par bri bar bya//gti mug nub tu bri bar bya//lho ru nga rgyal nyid yin no//sog le dang ni gos
504a3(rgyud): nag po//de bzhin dbyug gu 'jigs chen po//'di rnams phyag rgyar brtags pa'o//de nas ji lta ba bzhin 'jug/de nas gsang ba rdo rje'i phyag rgya nges parwa bcings pa'i lag par gyur pas rang
504a4(rgyud): gi dam tshig rjesu dran pas phyag rgya de nyid kyis 'gugs pa'i rnam pa dang /rdo rje'i glu 'dris bskul te/dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang por bya'o//'dir gshegs 'dir gshegs sangs
504a5(rgyud): rgyas zhal ras sangs rgyas dpal//bde bar gshegs pa yum dang bcas pa mtha' dag gis bskor te/'dir gshegs 'dir gshegs pad+ma'i spyan ras par las 'khrungs//dam tshig rnam
504a6(rgyud): drag rnams kyis dpa' bo dam pa'i phyag/glu dbyangs rgyal po 'di yis ni//rdo rje'i blo gros nges par bskul/byon 'gyur song shig song shog ces//'khod cig 'khod cig 'khod par bya//
504a7(rgyud): tshim zhing tshim la rab tu tshim//zhugs shig zhugs shig 'jug par bya//kA kye zhes brjod bskul ba yi//sa la gnas kun rab tu 'bebs//de nas me tog dor bar bya//bcom ldan po
504b1(rgyud): mtsham samamamacam mas samamasamasamaman/thas namathaHsa tham thamamams yamakas na/mal thasa' tham tham sa/sa
504b2(rgyud): bar bzhes su gsol//lha dbang gang la lhung 'gyur bzung //de yi sgrub thabs brtsam par bya//yang na yid la gang 'dod pa'i//sgrub byed sgrub po dam pas byed//de nyid du ni dbang bskur ba//rnal 'byor pa
504b3(rgyud): ni mkhas pas blang //de nas slob ma gzhug par bya//rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan//dar la sogs pas gdong g.yogs te//phyag rgya bcings pa'i lag bzang pos//de bzhin du ni me tog
504b4(rgyud): dor sa ma ya s+t+waM bdag gis brjod//me tog gang la lhung gyur pa//de yis sbyor bas dbang bskur bya//yang na gang 'dod rnal 'byor gyis//sbyor ba bsgoms te dbang bskur bya//yang na bdag po'i
504b5(rgyud): rnal 'byor gyis//gal te de ni sbyor ldan 'gyur//gdugs dang rgyal mtshan bla dro sogs//b+h+r-i g+ha r-i yi bum pa dang //rnga yab rnam pa sna tshogs dang //seng ge'i khri ni bzang po dang //gser dang
504b6(rgyud): dngul gyi dbyug gu dang //rin tshon byug gu du ma ni//dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid du bzhag/dpung bskur spro ba chen po yis//de ni stan la bzhag nas su//rnal 'byor ldan pas dbang bskur ro//
504b7(rgyud): dbang bskur ji ltar rigs pa yi//gsang pa'i sbyor bas dbang bsku ro//thog mar sdom pa ldan pa yis//de ni dam tshig 'dzin du gzhug/'dir ni nga yis dam tshig zung //phyi dang gsang ba rnam pa
504b8(rgyud): ba'i//sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa ni//sangs rgyas ye shes rab gsal byed//gdug pa thams cad gsang par bya//'jungs pa rnams kyi nor da brog bya//lta ba ngan la brdzun du smra//srog chags
505a1(rgyud): gsod la smra bar bya//g+hu/na gyi bud med mngon bskyed par//ci bde bar ni phrogs shig sa//k+Shan+dan rdzas 'brug par byed rnams dang //dkon mtshan
505a2(rgyud): gsum la 'gal byed pa//gsad dong gzhom par bya ba dang //de bzhin khrag rnams btung ba ru//'bad pa yis ni thams cad byos//dam tshig rnam pa gsum pa yis//
505a3(rgyud): de nas yon ni phul nas su//bla ma la ni gus pa yis//zhabs la lago bas nges gtugs te//rang lus rgyal po'i ljongs spyod dang //chub ma 'am yang na bu mo dang //
505a4(rgyud): rnams dang ni bran nyid dang //sring mo sring mo'i bu mo dang //ma dang rang gi mna' ma dang //grong dang yul gyi longs spyod dang //shing rta 'gro dang glang po dang //rnam par bkra ba'i rta rnams
505a5(rgyud): dang //nor gyis gang ba'i glong rnams dang //bu glang ma he ra rnams dang //lug rgod rnams dang gzhan rnams dang //rnga mo mdzes pa'i rngam mo//gzhan yang gzhan yang gang 'dod
505a6(rgyud): pa ji ltar rigs pas mchod par bya//rim bzhin rang gi slob ma'i chags//mgon po mchod nas gshegs su gsol//gang gzhan rdo rje spun la yang //de nas sgrub thabs dam
505a7(rgyud): pa bslag//srog dang thur sol sbyor po yis//sems kyi brtan pa nyid du bya//zla ba nya ga lta bur dgang //cha shes dag ni bcu drug kyang //de yi dbus su rnam bsam pa//gtso chen
505b1(rgyud): 'dod pa'i dbang phyug go/mdor bsdus nas ni spro bar bya//brtul zhugs can gyis rang lus bsdam//bdag nyid 'dod pa'i dbang phyug rgyal//'dod pa'i zil gyis mnan nas su//rnal 'byor
505b2(rgyud): can bdag dpal ldan 'grub//lha dbang bcas pas phyag 'tshal zhing //nad dang mya ngan 'jigs pa sel//rga dang 'chi ba rnam par spangs//zla ba gcig tsam bzlas pa yis//dpa'
505b3(rgyud): los las kun byed par 'gyur//zhi dang rgyas dang de bzhin dbang //drag shul spyod pa rim pa yis//dgug dang dbab pa'i las rnams ni//skad cig tsam zhig bskul ba yis//sngags
505b4(rgyud): pas thams cad byed par 'gyur//sngags kyi sbyor bas sngags bzlos pas//'di de bcom ldan rnal 'byor gsungs//yan lag lnga las skyes pa bzung //'byung po'i nyi ma mtshan mo gung //
505b5(rgyud): lcags gsum gyis ni dkris byas la//rang gi kha ru gzhug par bya//bdag nyid rnal 'byor ldan pas bzlas//de ni nad par mthong mi 'gyur//lhar bcas grub pa'i sems can gyis//thams
505b6(rgyud): cad rnam par kun tu'o//bskal par gnas shing shes rab che//bstan bcos thams cad rab tu mkhas//gzugs dang lad tsho phun sum tshogs//rig pa 'dzin pa'i mnga' bdag 'gyur//
505b7(rgyud): bcu bzhi'i nyin par shi ba yi//rdol ba'i g.yon gyi rtsib logs ni//sbyor bas bzung ste 'phur 'gro mi//gzugs brnyan lag pa bzhi pa bya//zhags pa lcags kyu rtse gsum mtshan/
506a1(rgyud): g.yon par thod pa 'dzin pa po//rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa//spyan gsum rnam byar gtsigs pa po//thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan can//gtum ldan snga
506a2(rgyud): zur chen po pa//'jigs pa chen po'i dur khrod du//rnal 'byor ldan pas de bzhag ste//cho gla ji bzhin mchod par bya//gsang sngags rgyal po bzlas par bya//thod pa'i phreng ba'i
506a3(rgyud): tsid pan can//khrag dang sha dang mar khu yis//de nas lha mau de'i grub bo//mtshan ma yang ni blta bar bya//mtshan mra yis ni dngos grub che//dus mi ring bar bzang po 'thob//
506a4(rgyud): dman pas dman pa'i dngos grub ste//bar ma yis ni bar ma'o//mtshan ma med na chung ngu ni//bAr du 'grub par dpyad mi dgos//lha min bzang po dgug par bya//mi dang mda' ni
506a5(rgyud): bskul ba yis//de yi skad cig nyid la byed//khrag nyid kyis ni bris pa yi//dbang du bya ba'ang 'di nyid kyis//de bzhi ni bud med thams cad dgug/grub pa'i rdzas kyang ming nyid kyis//
506a6(rgyud): dgug pa'i sbyor bas dgug par bya//dmag dpung rnam par bzlog pa ni//rgyal mtshan rtse mor rnam bzhag go/rengs dang rmugs par bya ba dang //rmongs dang 'ching ba de bzhin du//gyib
506a7(rgyud): dang bsang po thams cad ni//cho ga dag dang ldan pas byed//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum rnams dang yab rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsang brgyan gyi dkyil 'khor
506b1(rgyud): la m+b+ha ts+tshan rnyan pa ny-id nas pa /klung thugs dus rgyal pa sa// myu dang ya nan sna du//dmas bas rgyu ny-i//snyoms can namasan rnye
506b2(rgyud): gsang ba rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi//rnal 'byor chen po'i rlom dbye ba//gang gis ma 'ongs mi rnam pa ni//bde bas sangs rgyas nyid la 'jog/denas bcom ldan rdo rje can//'drim
506b3(rgyud): bcas pa'i spyan rgyas pas//gsung ba rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor ni//gsang ba chen po bka' stsal pa//gang phyir bdag nyid dkyil 'khor bshad//sems can dge ba'i rdo rje can//bdag
506b4(rgyud): nyid gsang po'i brgyan zhes bya//snying po phyug rgyu sngags nyid de//bdag nyid ri/sngags dam tshig kyang //gang phyir bdag nyid sdom pa ste//bdag nyid bshad dang 'chad pa'o//pha dang
506b5(rgyud): ma rnams de bzhin te//dngos grub sgrub po las kyis mchog/pade dang sdug bsngal khams gsum pa zhes so//de nas bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum dang /
506b6(rgyud): yab rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol lo//de phyir gsungs shig ba/ma ldan 'das//bde bar gshegs pas gsung du gsel//sangs rgyas byang chub sems kun gyis//phan dang
506b7(rgyud): bde ba thob pa'i phyir zhes so//de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum dang yab nyer longs spyod pa rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
507a1(rgyud): nas/nyid kyi sgyu dang gsung thugs rdo rje las 'di byung ngo //sman bshad cho ga'i rim pa yis//dkyil 'khor yang dag bris nas su//de yidangs su bdag pa ma g+ha/
507a2(rgyud): dkar dang dmar dang 'odra chen po//sna tshogs rgyan gyis lus la spras//dmar po'i phreng ba gtsug torar+ya n+dan//sna tshogs gos ni legs banabs pa//dmar po'i 'od kyi bla gos can/
507a3(rgyud): phyag bzang g.yon na dril bu ste//bsnyems bcas 'dzum bag ldan pa'i zhal//phyag gzhan na ni rdo rje can//snying khar rab tu gsor mdzad pa//pad+ma rgyus 'dra'i zhal mnga' ba/
507a4(rgyud): zhal gyi dkyil 'khor nyi shar mtshungs//rdo rje seng ga'u khri la bzhugs//dmar po'i gos ni 'chang ba po//mdor bsdus nas ni bri bar bya//g.yon du shes rab yongs su bri//sngon
507a5(rgyud): bshad pa yi gzugs can la//g.yas de'i phyag ni 'phyang ba'o//lho ru sbyin pa chen mo ni//phyug rab rin chen sol ba mo//byang du bzod pa chen mo ni//byams pa'i ya la 'dzin pa
507a6(rgyud): mo//bdun du brtson 'grus chen mo ni//rdo rje'i log pa tshor dazang pa//shA dang lho yi mtshams pu ni//bsam gtan pha rol phyin ma bri//bsam gtan phyug can spyan yangs ma//
507a7(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od bzang ba'o//bden bral du ni 'phel ma bri//rin po che yi rgyan gyis brgyan//nor gyi rgyan ni stong phrag gis//sems can mang po bde bar byed//smon lam bri
507b1(rgyud): rlung gi ni//mtshams su yang dgra mtshon par bya//dbyangs snyan pa yi dag brjod pas//sems can thams cad bskul bar byed//blo gros ldan pas dbang ldan du//thabs kyi ye shes
507b2(rgyud): slob pa mo//lag pa gnyis kyis gar byed pa//sgog dang dga' bas 'khrugs pa bri//dpa' bos shar sgor bri bya ba//shes rab pha rol phyin dge ma//ye shes lcags kyu mdzes pa'i
507b3(rgyud): phyophyag/dmar po'i dar gyis mngon par mdzes//dbang ni nub kyi sgo ru ni//'ching ba'i bdag nyid bri bar bya//shin tu byi ru dang mtshungs pa//rdo rje ljags sgrog 'dzin pa mo//byang gi sgo
507b4(rgyud): ru bri byA ba//stobs kyi pha rol phyin ma mchog/rgyal ba thams cad mnyes byed pa//dril bu bzang po 'khrim pa'i bdag/gshin rje cho 'phrul byi bar bya//'bar ba'i sprin gyi yang dag 'bru/
507b5(rgyud): phyag ni rdo rje zhags bkra ba//rdo rje'i glog phreng dang mtshungs ma'o//nga yi mdun du shes ldan gyis//'dod pa'i dbang phyug rgyan pa bri//pad+ma rA ga'i 'od gsal ba//mda' dang gzhu ni 'dzin pa'i
507b6(rgyud): mchog/de yi mdun du dkar pa blo//zla ba'i 'od 'dra grags chen po//zla ba shwa ra ka'i 'od mdzes pa//'dzum bag can la gzhon nu'i gzugs//rdo rje 'dun pa cher dmar ba//mda' lnga
507b7(rgyud): dang ni gzhu 'dzin pa//skye ba 'joms pa dpa' bo ni//leg na 'khor lo gzi brjid mchog/de yi g.yon du bri bya ba//dkar dang dmar ba'i 'od chen po//rdo rje dzar sgrogs rgyal po ni//
508a1(rgyud): /dril bu 'khrol ba dang ldan pa//de yi rgyab tu bri bar bya//gsor dang gur gum dang 'dra bya'o//lho yi phyogs su bri byA ba//mkho' 'gro'i dbang phyug dpal dang ldan//
508a2(rgyud): sngon mo char sprin dang 'dra ba//lag na ral gri rin chen ldan//de mdun dpa' chen 'dod pa yis/rgyal po bdag nyid chen po bri//'od zer dmar po lag na gzhu//rin chen 'bar bas
508a3(rgyud): rnam par brgyan//de yi lho ru bri bya ba//rdo rje rnam par smod pa mchog/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lag pa can//rab tu rno ba'i 'bar ba'i phreng //rdo rje dam pa 'dul mdzad dpal//rdo rje rin
508a4(rgyud): chen mchog gi tog/kha dog dkar po cher spro ba//gos sngon rnam par 'phyang mi po//rdo rje DA ki'i dbang phyug rigs//lag na rin chen shin tu mdzes//de yi rgyab tu bri bya ba//dgrod dang
508a5(rgyud): bcas pa'i bzhin ras mchog/nga yi rgyab tu bri bya ba//dri yi dbang phyug dbang phyug che//lag na pad+ma snying khar 'chang //ban d+hu'i me tog rnam pa 'dra//de la mngon par phyogs pa yi//rdo rje
508a6(rgyud): sgrol ba spyan mdzes bri//dkar sder bzang po sna tshogs pa//lag na ut+pal sngon po bzang //de yi g.yon du dag pa yi//lag na 'khor lo ches dkar bri//sngon pos legs pa'i gnas
508a7(rgyud): thob pa//mchog tu 'dzum pa'i bzhin ras can//lo ma'i rtse mo rgyab tu bri//lag na yid bzhin nor bu mchog/kha dog sngo bsangs dpa' chen po//sems dpa' ldan pa'i thugs chen po//
508b1(rgyud): de sr-i khyau yo na ru ni//chos 'an du mchog ni bri bA byA//chu mtshan phyag ldan pa dkar ba//nyi ma shar kA'i snang ba 'dra//nga yi byad du bri bya ba//stug po bkod pa grags chen po//shin tu ldang
508b2(rgyud): bA'i man mtshungs//las kyi rdo rje mchog 'dzin pa'o//de yi bdun du bri bya ba//rdo rje skyong ba yid 'phrog bkre/byand bcas rdo rje'i lag pa can//rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan//
508b3(rgyud): ye lho ru b+hi bya ba//'gro ba'i rtse mo legs brgyan pa//lhang cher nag po phreng ba 'dra//rdo rje'i gsal shing 'dzin pa po//rgyab tu rdo rje 'ching ba bri//lag pa yang dag sbyar bsdams pa//rin chen
508b4(rgyud): kun gyi 'od dag cing //'dzum bcas mchog tu ngo mtshar ba//'khor byed g.yon du bri bya ba//lag na 'gal me'i 'khor lo cen//legs sngo dar la bab pa po//rab rgyas pad+ma lta bu'i
508b5(rgyud): zhal//de nas sgo yi chu dag tu//skyo ba rnam pa bzhi po bri//shar du rdo rje mi g.yo baM//lag na rdo rje lcags kyu che//lho yi sgo ru rdo rje maM//lagle na rdo rje zhags pa 'bar//nub tu rlung ni sngon
508b6(rgyud): ste/rdo rje lcags sgrog 'dzin pa'o//lus ngan du ni chu bri ste//zhe nas pa ldan pa'i dril bu 'dzin//de nas sbyor ldan 'ongs nas su//dkyil 'khor gyi nI shar d+ha bri//shar du mngar
508b7(rgyud): yi mtshon ci lag/rab dmar pad+ma ltar 'bar ba//m+b+ha ru chen po dbang phyug can//sngon mo dbang phyug rdo rje ma//leg na rin chen snyem can//rin po che yi rgyan gyis brgyan//rdo rje nye bar
509a1(rgyud): ni dkar mdzes mA//rgyab tu rtag tu bri bar bya//lag na pad+ma bzang po bro//pad+ma'i phreng bsna rnam par dargyan//rdo rje stong zhal mdzes mni//sngo bsangs kun rgyu yon
509a2(rgyud): tan ldan//lus ngan du ni shes ldan gyi//grayas su rdo rje rtswa gcig bri//shar gyi mtshams su rdo rje ni//dus tshigs zhes bya bzang mo bri//dbyar gyi sprin ltar mdzes pa mo//lag na bdug
509a3(rgyud): spos dregs chen mo//nub kyi mtsham su ri ri ta//lag na me tog phreng ba 'bar//cung zad dmar la dkar ba mo//sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan//nub byang du ni bri bya ba//lag na yi
509a4(rgyud): ge sna tshogs bri//lag na sgron me rab dmar bA//cung zad sngo ba'i gos gyon pa//dri yi glang po ltar 'gying bya'i//rol pa ldan ma mkhas pas bri//sngo bsangs dmar po mthon mthing
509a5(rgyud): 'dra//rab tu dgod cing mi mdzes ma//rdo rje'i lag pa mi mdzes ma'o//de shar du bri bye ba//rdo rje mchog gi 'od ldan pa'i//rdo rje dbang phyug bde bA ma'o//de bzhin lho ru pri bya
509a6(rgyud): ba/gser sogs dang ni mthon mthing 'dra//rin chen sgron ma rin chen lag/'od mchog ldan pa'i lha mo ni//nub kyi dkyil 'khor dag la bri//'od kyis snang zhing mdzes
509a7(rgyud): pa la//lag na 'od zer legs mdzes pa'o//rdo rje brang skyes cher bkra ba//sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan//lag na sna tshogs gos ldan pa//byang du rtag tu bri bar
509b1(rgyud): bya//de bzhin sbyor bas dri s+yo nas su//pho nya mo yang lpags par bri//snying bskul byed pa mdzes ma ni//shar du legs par bri bar bya//rdo rje myug gu mda' ldan dmar//mig
509b2(rgyud): gnyis dang ni glos sngon po'o//de dang nye bar dpa' mo ni//lag na lcags kyu zhigaso pa mchog/gdug pa 'gugs pa'i lha mo bri//sngo bsangs dmar la legs brjid pa'o//
509b3(rgyud): rje su mnyes ma'i pho nya tshe//nub tu rtag tu bri bar bya//rgyal ba thams cad mnyes byed ma//lpags pa'i zhags pas lag pa mdzes//khrage 'gugs pa yi pho nya mo//byang du gnas pa
509b4(rgyud): bri bar bya//mdag gnag pa la cher za ba//lcog na thod pa legs mdzad pa'o///thams cad 'phrog pa'i pho nya mo//me yi mtshams su bri bar bya//rdo rje lcags kyu zhogs pa
509b5(rgyud): mchog/dmar gnag dka' thub chen po ma'o//de yi byang du dpa' bo yis//sgo skyong stobs chen bri bar bya//rdo rje 'bebs ma legs dmar ba//lag mthil dril bu dang
509b6(rgyud): ldan pa'o//dam tshig gsum ldan spyan gsum ma//rtswa gsum rdo rje 'dzin pa mo//'jigs pa'i lus can tsher gsal ma//'od zer dmar po 'bar bas 'khrugs//'bar
509b7(rgyud): ba'i me lce'i lag pa can//de yi phyogs su yang dag brten//lha mo chen mo thog ma ma//lag na rdo rje'i gtsub shing can//dmar zhing sngo ba bri bya ste//ji lta ba yi rim pas so//
510a1(rgyud): gdul dka' 'dul ba'i lha ma ni//sgo skyong bA ya~M gnas na gnas//dpa' mo rdo rje dathug pu'i ldag/byin za 'bar ba dang mtshungs ma'o//de nas bran mo bri bar/
510a2(rgyud): byad/rang gi phyag rgyas lag pa mtshan//'jig rten gsumo 'ching blun mo ni//nub tu yang dag dri bar bya//'ching ba chen mo'i lag pa can//rab dmar gur gum 'od zer can//

510a4(rgyud): 'khrug pa'i tshul la rab 'jigs ma//lag na thod pa rlon pa can//shin tu dmar zhing 'od chen mo//sku gsung thugs 'ching bran mo ni//shar du yang dag bri bair bya/

510b1(rgyud): chen pos bsdigs par byed//mnyam par gzhag pas shar du bri//rab tu dga' ba rjes rtog ma//sngags pa spobs chub tu bri//'dod chags phyag rgya'i lag pa ma//'gro

511a2(rgyud): log rab tu mdzes//de nas mchod pa rnam par bri//rdo rje me tog 'thor ba'i gzugs//lagan me tog snyom pa mdzes//me tog phreng bas rnam par brgyan//sngags pas rdo rje
511a3(rgyud): bdug pa bri//yid sim byed pa'i dam pa ni//lag na 'dug pa mig yungs ma//khur tshos cung zad dkar ba maM'o//lha mo rdo rje snang byed ni//gser bsregs pa yi mdog 'dra la//leg

511a7(rgyud): na ro yi snod 'dzin pa//rkyen rnams thams cad yang dge rdzogs//mtshan nyid kun dang yang dag ldan//rdo rje reg bya sngo sangs che//chu skyes sngon po 'dab 'dra'i mig/rnam par gsal
511b1(rgyud): zhing cher dgod pa//rang gi dpung pa bsdams pa mo//bzhad pa'i rdo rje bod bcas pa//rnal 'byor pas ni mdor bsdus te//pri bya sna tshogs gos 'dzin dkar//rgyan rnams thams cad 'dzin
511b2(rgyud): pa mo//rdo rje sgeg mo dkar mo che//sgeg dang bcas shing yid du 'ong //rked par khu tshur gnyis bzhag cing //mdzes pa'i phreng ba'i chun po btsug/rdo rje glu mkhan legs dmar lus//

512a1(rgyud): wang rgyud gsum sgya ba N+Da//pi wAng rgyu ga/sum sbyang babri//rdo rje mkhar khrol l+h+wa mche//dmar ba m+bu ni gos dgos pa'o//rdo rje gling bu rnal gyur

512a3(rgyud): ma lag na zangs dung 'dzin//'dod pa'i gzugs mchog 'dzin pa mo//rgyal ba'i dril bus lag pa mdzes//khrol ba yang dag bri bar bya//legs spyi ba la gzi
512a4(rgyud): brjid che//rnam par rgyal ba spro byed ma'o//pad+ma'i gar gyi dbang phyug dmyur//pad+ma dmar po kha 'byed ma//gar gyi rgyu mas rab gnos pa'i//lag pa spyong ldan

513a1(rgyud): du bdur ba'o//byi ru dmyal ba brgyad baphro//yi dwags kyang ni thams cad du//rdo hUM mdzad la gnas pa//sngags pas cho ga bzhin bris te//bya yi rdo rje bri bar/

513a3(rgyud): bskor//chu ltar tshangs pa chen po ni//gdod pa bzhi pa bri bar bya//rdo rje dbyug gu'i lag pa mchog/zhi ba la sogs rnams kyis bskor//gshin rjer 'khor lo'i lag pa

513a5(rgyud): mdzes//mig stong pa ni che ba'i lus//bde sogs sogs kyis mdun du bdar//dbang ldan du ni dbang ldan bri//me yi phyogs su me lha'o//bden bral du ni bden bral

513a7(rgyud): shes pas//dkyil 'khor bzang po bris nas su//sangs rgyas thams cad dgug par bya//yab yum gtso bo dam pa rnams//cho ga ji bzhin sngags pas gzhug
513b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor na ni dkyil 'khor bdag/rdo rje lcags kyu'i lag pa yis//cho ga ji bzhin bdag rgyan te//rdo rje sems dpar bsnyems byas nas//snyoms dang bcas pas langs

513b5(rgyud): yang mthong mi 'gyur//des ni slar yad gsol ba gdab//yang dang yang du bskul bar bya//lha yi rnal 'byor de nyid kyis//nga rgyal yang dang yang byas te//mchod pa shin tu

514a3(rgyud): sgo ru mkhas pas gzhag/dam tshig dam pa mnyan du gzhug/ma dang sring mo nyid dang yang //de bzhin bu mo dag kyang ni//som nyi rnam par bral sems kyis//khyed kyis rtag tu

514b1(rgyud): can don lo badzin pas bya//gsang ba'i dam chog 'di dag ni//zla gros ldan pas d+ha sgragasu mo b+ha//da mchog ldan bla ma gtogs pa//bla ma'i bka' gnang sngags pa mo//sangs rgyas

514b6(rgyud): ud g+ha Ta ya ti tsak+Shu ShiH/mgonr-i po chen po ltos shig bu//sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag po mchog/ye shes chen po kun gyi mchog/rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen po//rim pa ji bzhin

515a2(rgyud): basbyinan po rnam pa y-i// bstsu sanas //gsung ba'i rgyun zhes rnaM hU~M//dengs smra sheste bsnyed rU stA ro//gas ng+gA ni rgyu ba'i na 'i ng+gal hU~M/de na
515a3(rgyud): minu yis la nus brdung ste/lce l-I rje mo mkhas pas sbyar//rdo rje 'am yod na chu skyes kyis/phyag rgya dang ni phyag rgya'i la ni//de nas 'dzin ma rnam par sbyin//de nyid la yang
515a4(rgyud): mkhas pas sbyin//gsang ba rgyan gyis sbyor ba yis//gsang ba'i bde ba bsgrub por bya//zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal to//de nas yon ni dbul bar bya//

515a7(rgyud): kun gyi don gyi phyir//dkyil 'khor ba'ang legs par mchod//pa dang spyan yang mchod par bya//de bzhini sprin zla'i bu yang mchod//bza' btung yid du 'ong ba dang //gas//
515b1(rgyud): dang rgyun dang me tog dang //de bzhin dri dang bdug pa sogs//ji ltar bdog pa thams cad kyis//mchod pa byas te btang par bya//lha rnams dag ni thams cad la//de bzhin du na
515b2(rgyud): mchod par bya//gsang sngags rgyal po gshegasu gsol//badz+ra muHzhes brjod pas gshegs//de nas sngags pa'i slob ma'i mchog de la//gsang ba rnam par 'dzin la
515b3(rgyud): gsang ba yi//rgyal pos gsal mdzad rgyal ba'i gsang bdag gis//gsang bu mtha' yang legs par breslab par bya//gsang ba'i phyag rgya mig yang sa ma//blo gros
515b4(rgyud): bstan pas bsgrub par bya//rang byin rlabs pa'i rim pa yis//shes rab kyis ni byin gyis brlab//bdag nyid sems dpa' legs bsgoms te//gsang ba rgyun gyi sbyor
515b5(rgyud): yis//nyi ma bdun gyis legs 'a blo//'gyur ba 'di la ni tsam med//ma shes rab rgyu de yang //rang nyid rdo rje rme ga ste//namakha' kun gyi mchog pa'i ga/
515b6(rgyud): dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur//'dod pa'i dbang phyug rnal 'byor rje//bdag nyid 'dod byar dgongs pa yis//'ding ba'i longs spyod 'grub par 'gyur//'dod pa'idabang phyug
515b7(rgyud): tsa sa//de yang 'dod pa'i bang lha mor//'gru 'byor 'di la po tshom med//'dod pa'i khams kyi dang phyug kun//bran dang 'dra bar 'khod par 'gyur//nam pa'i
516a1(rgyud): 'khor yid 'odra bar//mkha' 'gro'i sa bon dusgom par bya//de ni sbyor bas spros nas su//rang gi snying khar gzhug par bya//bcug nas rin chen chen po ni//srid pa
516a2(rgyud): 'joms par bsgom par bya//yid bzhin rang bzhin rin chen mdzes//nyi ma bdun ni de 'gyur ro//'dam skyes dmar po'i dbus sgra ni//'bad pas kun nas dri yis dgang //dri yid
516a3(rgyud): byug rgyal po che//bdag nyid sem sna pa' yid ches bsgom//de nas myur du blo ldan to//dri za'i bdag po'i bdag por 'gyur//dri yis myur ba nyid du ni//brgyan dang g.yo ba'i dug
516a4(rgyud): 'gugs byed//don yod kyi ni dkyil 'khor du//snying po snying gi sbyor ba bsam//yid la bsam pa'i dngos grub 'gyur//de yi phyag rgya'ang de dang mtshungs//rin chen gyi yang rin chen
516a5(rgyud): tshe//rin chen gyi ni mig 'od gsal//de bzhin dri dang ldan pa ni//sgrub pa po yis 'grub par 'gyur//de la sogs pa'i dbye ba yis//lha gzhan dag kyang rig par bya//dkyi
516a6(rgyud): 'khor ram ni dam tshig kyang //bsgoms pas myur du 'grub par 'gyur//snying po sngags dang phyag rgya dang //rig sngags kyi yang sbyor ba yis//de rnams kyis ni de nyid ni//bsgoms na
516a7(rgyud): mAr dnges par 'grub//'di ni bcom ldan rnal 'byor can//gsang ba rgyan bdag dam pas gsungs//phyag rgya bzhi yi mchog gi mchog/phyag rgya thams cad 'grub par 'gyur zhes/
516b1(rgyud): so//dr-i nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yub dang yum de rnams kyis gsol ba/myur du sbyor ba mchog bsgrubs pas//sgrub pa pos ni ji ltar 'grub//de dag thams cad myur du/
516b2(rgyud): gsungs//bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang bdag gis//snying po sngags dang phyag rgya dang //rig sngags kyang ni legs par 'grub//btsun mo mchog gi gnas dbang phyug/dpa' bo chen ngos gsung
516b3(rgyud): du gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba rnam par bgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
516b4(rgyud): zhugs te/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab dang yum rnams kyis zhu ba'i tshig rdo rje 'di nyid kyis sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las rnam par byung ngo //lha rnams kyi ni snying
516b5(rgyud): bo dang //sngags dang phyag rgya de bzhin du//dkyil 'khor du ni legs par bshad//ji ltar sngon du kha dog sogs//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis slar yang 'di skad ces
516b6(rgyud): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung du gsol//sems can rnams la phan bde'i phyir//rnal 'byor ma yi phyag rgya dang //mtshan ma la sogs dam pa rnams//de nas
516b7(rgyud): bcom ldan kun tu bzeng //rdo rje dam pa gsor mdzad nas//lag pa'i mtshan ma bka' stsal pa//gang gi lha rnams mtshon gyur pa'o//lag pa zla ba nyi ma ru//mkhas pa yis ni
517a1(rgyud): bsam par bya//shes rab drungs kyi sa bon ni//rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu s+ho//slar yang srud pa'i sbyor ba yi//rdo rje pad+mar rnam pasam bya//de nas shes rab pha rol bya
517a2(rgyud): sor mo'i rtse mo dgod par bya//de nyid sbyor ba'i bsdus nus su//phan tshun nges par sbyar bar bya//rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor ba'i//bde ba myangs pas 'grub par 'gyur//'ching ba chen pos
517a3(rgyud): bcings nas su//lha mo'i sa bon gyis mtshan pa'i//gsang sngags rgyal po sngogs rig pas//yang dang yang du byin gyis brlabs//bcangs te 'od ldan rnam pa gnyis//rkyang
517a4(rgyud): nas rtse mo sbyar bar bya//de yi snying po zhes bya ba'o//gnyis pa grags pa ldan pa yin//snying po yis ni mtshan byas nas//rim gyis snying khar bskor bar bya//rdo rje mnyam par sbyang
517a5(rgyud): byas te//der ni bcings pa gzhug par bya//'di ni dam tshig zhes bya ste//dam tshig mA lus bsgrub par byed//'di yis lha mo mtha' yas zhal//thams cad du ni nges par 'grub/
517a6(rgyud): dro nyid bsdigs pa lta bur sbyar//las kun byed pa'i mchog tu 'gyur//rdo rje gnyis ni pad+ma yi//sbyor bri bstan pa mchog tu rmad//de las phyi rol bsnams pa ni//gsum paru
517a7(rgyud): ni 'gyur ba yi//sIng kha ru ni snying po bsam//snying dga' byed pa zhes byar brjod//rdo rje gnyis po de bzhin sbyar//dam tshig bdag nyid byed du 'gyur//de nyid kun gyis 'byung
517b1(rgyud): gnas gsal//chen pa'i las ni byed par 'gyur//de nyid mdzod spur phyung ba'i brjid//phyag rgya bdag nyid chen por 'gyur//de nyid chu skyes rnam pa ru//snying khar bzhag pa skyed
517b2(rgyud): mchog/de bzhin rdo rje mAnyam sbyar ba//dmachog bdag nyid can du 'gyur//d+hi khar kun pa stegs sbyong ba yis//rab rgyas bi yu~M bzhin ras mchog/bsnyems pa byed pa
517b3(rgyud): thams cad byung //'dis ni lam+b+ha byed 'brub pa yin//de nyid khu du sa bas ni//phyag tu rten dro rab tu 'byung//de nyid 'di ldan rje smoni//thung du bstan te s+t+rI khar bzhin
517b4(rgyud): ni 'gyur ba med pa yi//snying po'i chos skud byed pa'o//de nyid snying khar yongs su bskor//snying gi dkyil 'a dir nyid du bzung //'di ni dam tshig dngos grub tshe//bdag nyid chen
517b5(rgyud): por bslab par bya//las kyi rdo rje mnyes pa yis//las rnams thams cad rab sgrub byed//dbab nga 'khor ba nyid dang ni//gar byed chen po de bzhin du//de bzhin thal mo sbyar
517b6(rgyud): nAs su//snre pang bzhag pa snying por bshad//spyi bor bskor ba byas pa ni//dam lkog zhes byu da dag nyid che//snyi de bsdigs pa las su 'gyur//mchod pa ma skyes rab
517b7(rgyud): byed de rnong po la chags lag tu bzung //chos la sogs par yongs su ta//de nyid ste sbyi par bdan/snying po zhis bu lags pa bad//bang ba dam tshig nas b+h+yo/
518a1(rgyud): las thams cad ni de bzhin no//de las thal mo rdo rje gnyis//stong sgang snying po la sogs bzhin/sngon bshad lha mo thams cad kyi//gsang sngags rig pas
518a2(rgyud): shes par bya//gnyis su byas la g.yas min pas//bsgrub bya'i mgrin pa gzung nas su//mngon par phyogs te bzheg par bya//gzugs kyi snying po ches che ba'o//de nyid la
518a3(rgyud): yi phyogs bzhag pa//sgra yi snying po yid 'phrog pa'o//de nyid cung zad bskums nas su//lha yi rnam pas kha ru bzhag/ro myang ba yi sbyor ba yis//de nyid la yang rnam pa bzhi//
518a4(rgyud): phyag rgya sngags pas shes par bya//ro 'phrog pa yi las rnams so//de ni gnyis su byas nas su//g.yas pa 'am ni g.yon pa yis//snying khar legs skur sbyor bdag gis/
518a5(rgyud): rig pa'i phyag rgya ngo mtshar che//'di yis chos dang dam tshig dang //las kyang rab tu skye ba yin//cho ga shes pas rnal 'byor sbyar//regu pas 'bebs pa'i mchog yin no//
518a6(rgyud): de bzhin sbyar bas so sor bya//g.yon pa rked par bzhag par bya//g.yas pa kha yi phyogasu bzung //khro bo'i tshul gyis de bzhin du//'di ni bzhad ldan zhes bya ba'i//phyag rgya
518a7(rgyud): mchog tu smad 'byung ba'o//de 'am bkrol de snga ma bzhir//rked pa ru ni legs par bzhag/de las langs te slar yang khar//mkhas pas dal gyis bskyod par bya//de gnyis
518b1(rgyud): yongs spyad//brnyan sa pas bdud dang 'gyed par bya//ji srid sgo bar gtugs pa 'iste//rgyas dang la stsogs kun tu 'gyur//snying po la sogs sngags rig pasdu//b+hag
518b2(rgyud): rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pa//dngos grub thams cad thob 'gyur te//rdo rje sems dbye'i dkang bzhin no//zil mo mnyam par legs par skad//g.yon pa'i steng du de bzhin gyi
518b3(rgyud): de dag snying khar bsgreng bar bya//de ni phan tshun shes rab yin//sngags pa chen pos sbyar bar bya//gzhan ni sbyong bas rnam par spro//'di ni chos kyi pha rol tu//'gro ba'i chos kyi
518b4(rgyud): mchog tu bshad//de bzhin thal mo mnya mra byor sbyar//sgyid khar ge yon par bzhag par b+ha//'od ldan rdo rje'i gdod pa dang //mdi bsdus nas ni sgrar nus so//g.yas babur du
518b5(rgyud): 'byung bar bya//de bzhin steng bskrun mchog sbyin no//me tog zlum pa yang dag sbyar//rdo rje gnyis ni dbus su bzhag/bzod pa gnyis po de la sbyar//sbyin pa dag ni phyi ru bskum//de
518b6(rgyud): snong du legs par bzhig/'di na sangs rgyas thams cad //yid bzhin skye khro ba'i 'bras bu s+thir//de ni spyir bas su sor bya//g.yon pa snying ra yong su bzhag/gams pa smra
518b7(rgyud): po mos//yongs su laskor shing banar nas//gsas badran panag par bya//rdo rje la ma brgyanas so//de dri'i steng dud mangs sa//rgyas phrul ni m+b+hir bayis//dam
519a1(rgyud): du gdod pa bzlog/phyag rgya 'di ni phyag rgya che//brdzun 'grus pha rol phyin dge ma'o//de bzhin lag pa steng du sbyar//rtsibs mchog rin chen mA ru 'gyur//lhag ma'i bya
519a2(rgyud): ba de nyid kyis//de bzhin zhag cig bsam par bya//sbyor ba de yi bcing po ru//snga des shes gtso bo sngags pas bya//rdo rje thol mo mnyam par sbyar//khro mo'i rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis/
519a3(rgyud): snying khar blo gros ldan pas bzung //de ni lcags kyu'i rnam pa yis//bltas nas lus can 'gugs par byed//de las ser mo'i rnga mo rnams//cung zad stsol te bskyang bar bya/
519a4(rgyud): rdo rje na ched lta bur spring //kha sbyar sgrol byed de mtshar che//rgyu 'di rnams kyis rgyus btab ma/las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur//de las thal mo sbyar nas su//gzi brjid rdo rje
519a5(rgyud): de bzhin no//de ltar lcags kyus dgug pa ste//de yi mtha' gdong zhags pa'o//sog le'i thal mo nges par ni//'dir ni thod pa nyid du 'gyur//'di ni gnyis pa nyid yin te//
519a6(rgyud): las kun gyi ni dam pa sgrub//de bzhin ba ning ba legs bcings nas//rab tu sbyin pa brkyang bar bya//g.yos pa steng du byas nas su//gsang ba lta bur bcing bar bya//'di ni rdo rje
519a7(rgyud): mdung thung ste//srin po thams cad phye mar byed//'dir ni de bzhin thod pa dang //zhags pa lcags kyu nyid dang yang //sog le dang ni gri thung ni//rdo rje thal mo'i tshogs bya//rdo rje
519b1(rgyud): thal mo so sor bya//lag pa g.yas pa steng du ni//rin chen lta bur byas la bzung //sor mo thams cad spro bar bya//g.yon pa'ang de badzin spro bar bya//de dag nyi zur shes par bya//thal
519b2(rgyud): mo sgreng ste shes rab dang //las d+d+hi rdo rje rtse mo sbyar//'di na las rnams thams cad kyi//sna tshogs las mchog rtsub par byed//de bzhin dbug dang nags pa dang //thod pa rdo rje nyid
519b3(rgyud): yin no//de las thal mo thod pa yis//phyag rgya'i dbus su dru ga ni//sgron ma can ces legs bshad de//'di na rdo rje mtshar che//zhags pa lcags kyu de bzhin du//sleb dben/
519b4(rgyud): blo gros ldan pas shes//gzungs rnams dang ni thams cad kyis//sngar bshad pa yi phyag rgya nyid//thod pa rdo rje 'du shes par bya//phan tshun gcig la gcig tu ni//thams cad
519b5(rgyud): gzungs kyi phyag rgya ru//dkyil 'khor du ni rab tu bsgrags//'di rnams sbyor ba ji lta bar//dkyil 'khor bzhi ni rtag pa ru//rdo rje slob dpon gyis bya ste//phyag na rdo rje'i bka'
519b6(rgyud): bzhin no//'di ni bcom ldan rnal 'byor bsung //kun bzang bdag nyid chen po pa//sems can kun mchog las kyi mchog/sangs rgyas mchog gtso mnga' bdede che//
519b7(rgyud): zhes so de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de dag thams cad
520a1(rgyud): la yang dang yang du gzigs te/sems can thams cad brtson 'grus zhan pa spobs pa dman pa la mos par gzigs nas do rnams la bka' bsgrag
520a2(rgyud): dbang po'i ma mo rnams kyis shod//rI rang byi ni sgrub sna tshogs//de nas de rnams legs tshom nas//rdo rje can la gsol ba ni//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/
520a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya//daM yi stang du rdo rje tshe//rdo rje la ni dang po mchog/nyi ma gsar mdog dang mtshungs par//gsang sngags shes pas de bsgom bya//rang gi lus
520a4(rgyud): las spros nas su//rang gi rnam par bas ma par bya//de nas sngags bdag 'grub par 'gyur//sngags kyi de nyid bdag po cher//kun tu 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi//rdo rje sems
520a5(rgyud): dpa' 'dra ba bzhin//gnyis pa'i de nyid sgom pa ni//dkyil 'khor pad+ma las byung ba//dmar po'i gos la gzi brjid che//'bar ba dag ni me ring mtshungs//rang las spro
520a6(rgyud): thams cad du//'jig rten dbang phyug lta bur 'gyur//dkyil 'khor dbang chen bzhug par bya//dkyil 'khor lnga ni cher dge ma//dang po'i lha me drod dang ldan//radzi ni
520a7(rgyud): lus la nges par khyab//bsdus nas bdag dang 'dra ba'i bdag/yid bzhin nor bu'i snang bar 'gyur//rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus son par//'gro ba'i sgo gtad lha
520b1(rgyud): rang lus lus ldan thams cad du//ljang gu dang ni ljang skor ma//las kun sgrub pa'i dam pA yis//rdo rje 'dzin pa dpal ldan 'gyur//ma mo bzhi dang yang dag ldan//
520b2(rgyud): shes rab ye shes dam pa gnas//dkyil 'khor kun gyi dmA pa ru//mkhas pas yis ni bsgom par bya//kun gyi bdage po dpal dang ldan//kun bzang mnga'
520b3(rgyud): bdag chen por 'gyur//bsam gtan dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis//thams cad nyid ni bsgrub par bya//chos kyi yi ge yang dag sbyar//lha min bdag por bdag 'gyur
520b4(rgyud): ro//zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal to//gsang brgyan gyi bkod pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum gyi
520b5(rgyud): phyag rgya'i ye shes mchog gi dkyil 'khor yong su rdzogs so///de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab
520b6(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pa rnams slar yang 'dus par gyur te/bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po la glu dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab pa/thams cad khyab pa'i ye shes che//
520b7(rgyud): nam mkha' rlung ltar cher gshegs pa//yab kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bcang //kun mchog dam pas bshad du gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos de bzhin gshegs pa
521a1(rgyud): thams cad kyi rgyal po mchog rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ye shes chen po'i phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung /
521a2(rgyud): dang thugs rdo rje rgyas pa las nges par phyung ngo //dbus su nyi mtshon po nI//hUM yig sbyong bas bsam par bya//sor mo kun gyi rtse gnas su//sa bon lnga yi yab dgod bya/
521a3(rgyud): tshigs kyi nang ni thams cad du//yi ge thams cad rnam par bsam//nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dag la ni//bzang po thams cad rnam bsdam bya//'khor lo chen po phyag
521a4(rgyud): rgya'i tshul//lag pa g.yon par bsam par bya//de yi dbus su shes rab che//de bzhin gzhan yang dgod par bya//de nas spro ba'i de nyid ni//gsang sngags 'di yis
521a5(rgyud): sbyor bar bya//oM pra dz+nyo pA ya ma yo go hUM a//de nas phan tshun sbyar byas nas//rdo rje thal mo rab tu gnas//rdo rje bsdams par byas nas su//rdo rje bsdams par rnam par bsam/
521a6(rgyud): de nas shes rab che sgreng ste//rtse mo cung zad bskum par bya//'dod pa'i dbang phyug snying por 'gyur//snying khur bzhag ni snying po 'grub//de nyid bsdigs pa'i sbyor ba yis//las
521a7(rgyud): mchog tu gyur pa yin//de nyid snying khar bsdams pa ni//phyag rgya chen po zhes su grags//thams cad kyis kyang mdor bsdus pa'i//las rnams thams cad rab sgrub byed//de
521b1(rgyud): bzhin legs par bcing bar bya//sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa gnyis//phyi yi rgyab tu bskum par bya//mkha' 'gro'i dbang phyug snying dga' ba'o//shes rab dag ni de bzhin sbyar//dam tshig zhes par//
521b2(rgyud): rab tu grags//lhag ma rnam par spro bar bya//las kyi gnas 'khod chen por grags//shes rab dag ni zum tshul gyis//dri yi dbang phyug rab dgyes pa'o//bzod dang brtson 'gras gdong pa
521b3(rgyud): gnyis//lo mi'i tshul du brkyang bar bya//dam tshig grub pa ster bar bshad//'di las rtse mo rnam phye ba//las kun byed pa zhes bshad de//re ba thams cad rdzogs par byed//de nyid rtse
521b4(rgyud): mor snying khar sbyar//bdag nyid chen po'i phyag rgya mchog/rgyal po mchog lha'i rgyal po ru//'di yis myur du 'grub par 'gyur//rdo rje bsdams pas shes rab mgo/dril bu'i dam pa snying
521b5(rgyud): po mchog/bzod dang brtson 'grus gdong sbyar ba//dam tshig mnyam pa nyid du gnas//cud zad gdong pa bskum par bya//las byed pa ya mchog tu 'gyur//gdong pa legs par brkyang
521b6(rgyud): nas sra//steng du shes rab rtse mo gcig/'di ni chen por shes bya ste//dbang phyug thams cad byed pa'i mchog/sna tshogs byed pa mchog gi mchog/'di yis myur du 'grub par 'gyur//
521b7(rgyud): rang gi bsdams las shes rab sgreng //rdo rje sra ba'i chos dang ldan//gdong pa che ste rin po che//'di ni dam tshig ldan pa'i mchog/de gnyis de bzhin rnam par bzhag/sbyin pa'i
522a1(rgyud): pha rol phyin dag dag/gargyung bzhi yi sems dpa' yi//las rnams thams cad byed par bshad//de banan tshul khrims phyi rol phyin//'di ni rnon pa dam/
522a2(rgyud): pa'o//bsnams las bzod dang brtson 'grus dag/lags par brkyang ste bstod pa ni//snying po'i zla ba ltar bcings pa//dam tshig 'di zer 'phro ba'o//phan tshun gyi ni gdong sbyar
522a3(rgyud): pa//'di ni las byed dam pa ste//lhag ma khu tshur ltar byas la//phyag rgya chen po zhes su 'grub//rdo rje bsdams pa legs par bcing //rtse mo'i rnam par sbyar ba bya//
522a4(rgyud): shes rab 'ba' zhig rtse mor bya//lhag ma dag ni de bzhin no//lhag ma bsdams te gzhug par bya//snying po ches ni byed pa'i mchog/khu tshur g.yon pa g.yon du bzung //
522a5(rgyud): rdo rje can gyis brkyang //g.yos pa'i sbyin pa brkyang nas ni//rna ba'i rtsa ba re dgug par bya//'di ni las byed zhes bya ste//sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed//rdo rje bsdams pa/
522a6(rgyud): brkyang nas su//snying khar 'khor lo'i tshul du ni//g.ya sa pa'i rtse me lcags kyur bya//sbyin pa smin pa'i pha rol son//de bzhin bcing ba legs bsdom bya//gnyi ga de
522a7(rgyud): bzhin lcags kyu ste//de ltar 'og ma bcug nas su//snying khar bzhag pa las rdzas 'bring //de nyid dgug par sbyor ba ni//thams cad dgug par rab tu 'grub//de bzhin
522b1(rgyud): smyon pa byurnams nas su//yung dang yang du brkyang bar bya//snying khar bskor ba zhes su bshad//de nyid 'og tu bstan phra ni//dam tshig can zhes rab tu grags//rdo rje chos su bshad pa ste/
522b2(rgyud): ru ga yo bar byed pa'i mchog/las las rnam par ni ma~M zhes bya//las kun byed pa'i dam pa ster//lag paM bcings pa las bkrol te//shes rab mdzod du rab tu brtag/'di ni dam
522b3(rgyud): tshig cher mdzes pa//de phyir de ltar chos mdzad do//g.yas pas rab tu bsgrims pa ni//mi snang mdzod de des na las//rin chen pad+ma ldan pa'i gdong //snying kha rA bzhag pa snying por
522b4(rgyud): 'gyur//bsdams nas go char byas nasu//bskor ba dam tshig zhes su 'dod//'khyud pa chos ldan zhesu grags//bsnun pa las byed pi re brjod//bsdams las nyi ma rnam par spro//bskor
522b5(rgyud): pabadam tshig mchog yin no//lag pa'i mtha' mchos chen po//kun bsdud las kun byed pa'o//bsdams pa sbyin pa bskyed par bya//rtse mo gsum bya gnas mdzes pa'o//de nyid steng du bskor/
522b6(rgyud): nas su//spros pas chos sgrub byed pa'o//rdo rje ba ru sbyar ba las//dbang bskud dam pa sgrub par byed//de nyid stong du spro ba ni//lus kun byed pa'i mchog yin no//snying khar legs bzung
522b7(rgyud): snying po ste/mdzod spur bzhig pa dam tshig mchog/khar bzhag pa ni chos shes bya//las rnams thams cad rib sgrub pa'o//'di ni bcom ldan rdo rje can//re ba kun rdzogs mdzad
523a1(rgyud): byas gsangs//rdo rje ba rnams pa rnam par brnyes//pad+ma'i rnam pa m+b+ha ga tu b+hu//skyer byed pa ni mig wAr d+ha//snyid khar bzhag pakun mAn zla 'byug/da mog
523a2(rgyud): bcug las yin no//bzhi pas kyi ste med+d+ha ts+tshaste//dmagagasnang ba'i mgu yinate/pad+ma mdzod la rab tu garnaMs//zil po yang dag sbyar ba ni//b+h+ring mchog tu rme
523a3(rgyud): /khwa ni chung zad bya ba ni//dam tshig mchog gi mchog yin no//skyed khar shin tu gsol phyog//ma gas lnga pa nI radwa tu tu ga// du bad+hA ni//chos snying mchog tu byung rje/
523a4(rgyud): pa'o//'di rnams kyis ni myur 'grub ste//sngags pas sngags kyis bskul bas so//dri bzhin 'ching ba legs bcings te//snying khor 'khor lo nyid du kyi//'khor lo gsum pa nyid rje
523a5(rgyud): byad rtsibs bzhis legs rgyan chos su blta//bskor ba las kyi rdo rje'o//'di rnams ji lta bzhin sbyar na//grub pa'i dam pa 'grub par 'gyur//rdo rje bsdams pa legs sgreng ste//shes
523a6(rgyud): rab myu gu dag tu bya//sbyin pa rin chen ltar byas pa//sems dpa'i gnas su nges par sbyar//'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//las rnams tham cad bsgrub pa'o//snying khar
523a7(rgyud): chos kyi dam tshig dang //snying po reg sngags legs par sbyar//de bzhin shes rab gnyis po sgreng //'og gi 'khrug pa de bzhin no//mthe chung bzang po'i khe sbyar ba//kun gong /
523b1(rgyud): rje ldan par bya//gnas ni bzhi yi sbyor ba yis//phyag rgya bzhi ni rab tu 'grub//spyi bor las su bshad pa sde//snying khar snying po brtag par bya//bskor ba yis ni dam tshig ste//ngag
523b2(rgyud): gis kun bskul chos yin te//bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs//bcings nas shes rab dag ni sgreng //'od lnga ni dag ni rtsa bar sbyar//'di ni dang por shes par bya//
523b3(rgyud): thams cad nas ni thams cad 'gro/bcings las de bzhin shes rab cig/rtse mo mche ba gdug yid 'phrog/de bzhin du ni 'di sbyar bas//los rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'o//
523b4(rgyud): gsang ba'i bcing ba legs bcings te//rdo rje nang du de bzhin no//snying khar rnal 'byor pa yis sbyar//ji snyed las kyis ming bzang po//rdo rje rab brkyang mgrin par bzung //kun tu bskor
523b5(rgyud): ba rab tu bya//'di yi las rnams thams cad ni//byed 'gyur srung sogs go 'phang bzang //lhag mcho ga bzhin rnal 'byor//rnal 'byor de nyid rab tu sbyar//phyag rgya rtags dang mi rnams
523b6(rgyud): ni//lha rnams kun la sbyar bar bya//'di ni bcom ldan rnal 'byor che'i//dbang phyug dpal rdo rje sems gsung //de nas de rnams legs tshim nas//phyag 'tshal nas ni thal sbyar
523b7(rgyud): te//zhu ba rdo rje bla na med//dpa' bo rdo rje can la zhus//yongs su rtog pa kun spangs pa//sangs rgyas rnams ni rang byung la//yab dang yum ni bla na med//ci phyir 'di dag brtag pa
524a1(rgyud): /langs// khor ba lang ni yod pa bsgo//nga sa rgyas ji ltar 'byung ba lags//zong du chos ni ston+d+ra pa las//ji ltar bar pa rab tu 'byug/gang du rnal 'gyur/
524a2(rgyud): pa grol 'gyur//dang na 'chi ba rab tu gnas//gang gis rnal 'byor pa rab 'grub//gang las rnal 'byor pa zhes bgyi//gsang sngags ji ltar gsang sngags la byas//
524a3(rgyud): po zhes bya'i snying po gang //phyag rgyas gang phyir phyag rgyar 'gyur//rig sngags rig pa ji ltar ljagaso//ji ltar lha rnams dgug pa dang //gzhug pa rnal 'byor pa yis
524a4(rgyud): bgyid//rnam par grol rnams bcing ba dang //mnyes dang bskul ba de bzhin du//ji ltar gnyi sa med 'gyur zhing //num pa 'khyud pa nyid dang yang //mthong nas rjes su
524a5(rgyud): chags pa dang //lag pa'i dgos pa ji snyed pas//phyag rgya ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur//gar dang glu dang cher dgod pa//sgeg dang smra ba ji ltar lags//gzugs dang sgra
524a6(rgyud): dang de bzhin dri//gtso bo ro dang reg par 'gyur//me tog bdug pa mtshig dang dri//mar me gsal ba mchog gang lags//mchod pa thams cad ji ltar 'brug//ji ltar
524a7(rgyud): mchod pas 'grub par 'gyur//rgyal bas zhu ba 'di dag gis//phreng ba can la zhus zheso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen pos zhu ba thams cad rnam par dpyod pa
524b1(rgyud): rang spyod padz+ran nas pa N+Di la b+h+yas p+par zhugs nas de bzhon gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhu bzhus pa 'ad dag byung //shos dbu sgyum du lags pa shad do//yaban
524b2(rgyud): thabs pa ma khas pa'o//'di ni bsten pa nyid kyis ni//bring las thar ba rab tu 'grub//bag chags sbyor ba dang ldan pas//gnyi ga dag ni gdon yin to//grol dang ma grol zhes bshad//
524b3(rgyud): ni rnal 'byor ba ru brjod//gsang sngags yid du dri shad pa ste//snying po yang ni de bzhin no//yid l-i rnam pa de bzhag na ni//gsang sngags mkhas pas 'grub par 'gyur//thar pa/
524b4(rgyud): kyi rgya mtsho yin//lha rnams gang la rgyas bta ba de'i//phyag 'di yis 'grub 'gyur te//dngos grub bde pa blan med//rig sngags ye shes mA lus te//rig sngags pa rol
524b5(rgyud): byin par bshad//de shes pas ni 'grub 'gyur te//grub nas bde ba rnam pa gsum//shes rab la ni shes rab ni//gzhug deng dgug pa de bzhin no//gsheg su gsol ba
524b6(rgyud): btab par shes//bcings pa brten par byed du'o//mas pa yis ni legs tshi ma yin//'phrul ba 'gro ba nyid du bshad//bisam pa gcig tu gyur ba ni//gnyis su med pa zhes su
524b7(rgyud): brtags//ro gcig de nyid bshad pa ni//'jig rten pa yi lha ru brjod//tsum pa rdo rje rna la 'byor te//rdo rje ye shes zhesu bshad//shes dang mi shes mnyam sbyor ngas//rdo rje'i lo
525a1(rgyud): shos+t+ra zhes bshad do//shes dang mi shes mnyam sbyor bas//num pa na zhes dris par bshad//gnas pas rtags zhes bshad pa ste//rtags ni lu'o zhes
525a2(rgyud): brjod pa yin//de yi 'khyud pa reg par shes//chags pa mthong ba'i phyag rgya'o//lag pa'i 'od rnams lha mo ste//rdo rje pad+ma mnyam bgrod pa'o//phyag rgya 'di las phyag rgya
525a3(rgyud): ste/lag pa'i dgod pa'i sbyor bas so//gar dang glu sogs rnams kyis ni//lha rnams thams cad mnyes par 'gyur//'di rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas rnams//mchod na dngos
525a4(rgyud): grub thams cad ster//zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal to//gsang ba rgyan gyi bkod pa'i rgyud chen po las gsung ba rgyan gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor
525a5(rgyud): gyi rgyal po yong su rdzog so////de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
525a6(rgyud): kyi mchod pa dang /mchod pa'i lan dang /gar dang gar gyi lan dang /glu dang /glu'i lan dang /sil snyan dang /sil snyan gyi lan dang /rnam 'gyur gyi lan dang /dbrog dang /
525a7(rgyud): 'gugs pa'i lan dang /brda dang brda'i lan dang /dri ba dang /dri ba'i lan dang /blta ba dang blta ba'i lan dang /dam tshig dang /dam tshig gi lan dang /dkyil 'khor dang /
525b1(rgyud): dal 'byor gyi lan dang /gsang ba dang /gsang pa'i lan dang /gsad chen dang /gsang tshon gyi lan dang /de kho na nyid dang /de kho na nyid kyi lan la sogs pa rnams dang /klu'i rgyal ba
525b2(rgyud): 'dis gsol ba btab par gyur to//sangs rgyas sems can kun gyi don//ye shes kun don thams cad mdzad//thams cad khyab pa sems can don//gnyis dang gnyis med phyag
525b3(rgyud): 'tshal bstod//'di dag thams cad gsung du gsol//sgrub pa po la phan dgyes pas//sgrub pa dngos grub dag dga' ba//gang gis dngos grub 'grub 'gyur ba//de nas bcom ldan
525b4(rgyud): 'das kun tu bzang pos thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la blta ba rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//me tog bdug pa
525b5(rgyud): dri zhim dang //gos bzang rgyan dang bza' ba dang //btung ba ro dang sgron ma gsol/mal khri spyan dag yid 'ong ba//'dri yis sangs rgyas thams cad mchod//yid ni bde bar gnas
525b6(rgyud): par byed//slob dpon rdo rje can dang ni//khyad par du ni sgrub pos bya//dgod dang skrag dang de bzhin glu//sil spyan gar ni rnab dga' bo//mchod pa'i lan te shin tu ni//sangs rgyas
525b7(rgyud): phyag rgyas 'grub par 'gyur//gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri//ro dang rig pa yid 'ong ba//'di ni mchod pa'i lan du 'grub//sangs rgyas byang chub bde ba che//phyag na/
526a1(rgyud): skyes bu'i rnam pa ste//phyag rgya'i lan ni rang gzugs te//gnyis pa phyag rgya chen po ste//phyag rgya'i lan ni las bzang can//phyag rgya rang gi
526a2(rgyud): bdag por shes//phyag rgya'i lan ni sgrub pa po//ji srid dbye ba stong phrag ni//dbye ba'i gzhi ru brtag par bya//zhes so//gA rI ne gar gyis sbyor ba yis//gar gyi
526a3(rgyud): lan ni gar mkhan ma'o//ji srid dbye ba stong phrag kyang //dbye ba bzhi ru brtag par bya//kun tu bzang po la rten nas//ji srid las kyi rjes 'brang ba'o//las kyi
526a4(rgyud): sbyor lnga yang dag rten//ji srid bzang po'i rjes 'byung ba'o//blo 'og yang dge bskyod pa yis//gar dang steng gi gar bskor ba//rnyog pa'i sbyor bas brtag par b+ha/rtog pa
526a5(rgyud): pris ni rab tu gsang //ji lta'i sil spyan rdung spyad ni//rdung ba'i bdag nyid can gyiso dkrol//de las byung ba'i skyil snyan lan//bsil bas sil stan nyid du brjod//sngags
526a6(rgyud): kyi yi ge'i cho ga sbyar//ji srid las mchog spyod yul ba//de nas sbyor bas 'thon nas su//kun tu bzang por 'gro bar bya//sgrogs pas glu zhes brjod pa ste//'dren pa gsum
526a7(rgyud): las legs par 'byung //dbyangs rnams rnam drug shes par bya//grwa yi phyag rgya zhes su 'grub//de nas sbyor bas 'dzin nas su//ji srid mgo dang snying khar son//mdzi
526b1(rgyud): b+hU s+t+ra yi sbyor ba dang //mgul pa gso ba nyid kyis so//'gyur bas rnam par 'gyur ba ste//lon dang gtong ba'i cho ba rim//chos rnams thams cad blang ba dang //gdon
526b2(rgyud): gyi tshod po rnams bzlog pa ste/rnam 'gyur las ni slar yang 'dir//sems kyi rnam par rtog pa'o//ji srid las ni rjes sbyor ba//sangs rgyas rnams kyi rjes
526b3(rgyud): 'brang //sems dang lus kyi rnam bgyings pas//gdug pa thams cad bzlog par bya//lag pa rkang pa'i rim pa kun//rnam 'gyur gyi ni lan yin no//'brog
526b4(rgyud): pa dgug par shes bya ste//btang ba dag ni 'brog pa'i lan//dbrog pa mchog tu shes bya ba//bgegs kyi gnas ni rab gnon pa'o//dpyog pa'i lan ni rab
526b5(rgyud): bzlog ste//bsdigs pa'i rkang pa'i dgos par shes//brda ni dran pa'i don du skye//phan tshun yongs su brjod pa yas//'grub dang ma 'grub sbyor ba rnams//slob
526b6(rgyud): dpon slob ma sogs pas sgrub//brda len lha mo rnams kyis ni//bskul dang so sor bskul ba'o//dri ba d+ma dang 'dri ba ste//mthong nas 'dri ba 'dre ba'i len//legs
526b7(rgyud): pa'i gzugs mthong ba lta blo ste//lha yi ye shes spyod yul lo//blta po'i lan ni de las sler//sbyor ba mchog gis sbyor ba'o//lha dang lha mo rnams kyis ni//gang //
527a1(rgyud): g.yon da lta bya ba lta ba ste//ji snyed nga lta ba'i sbyor ba yis//sgrub par byed pa'i lan yin no//dam tshig sangs rgyas rnams cad kyi//ga wAdas//
527a2(rgyud): byas pa nyid du 'dod//gang phyir thos paM 'dzin pa yi/sgrub po lan du shes par bya//dkyil 'khor lus su bshad pa ste//ye shes lnga yis byin rlabs pa'o//dkyil
527a3(rgyud): 'khor lan ni lha mo rnams//gcig tu byed pa'i dam pa'o//gsang ba spras par bshad pa ste//gsang ba'i lan ni legs smras pa'o//gsang chen sems kyi 'du shes te/
527a4(rgyud): bde ba'i rnam pa rab rtogs pa'o//so sor rtog pa lha mo dang //lha yi bde ba bde chen po//sangs rgyas sras bcas thams cad kyi//gsang chen lan du brjod pa'o//zhes
527a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal to//de nas de rnams slar yang 'dus par gyur te//yang bcom ldan 'das la legs par bskul ba//rdo rje sems dpa' nga
527a6(rgyud): rab mchog/shes rab mchog rab grol ba'o//mchod pa'i ye shes legs 'grub pa'i//gsang ba chen po gsung du gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu grung

528a2(rgyud): 'byor can 'grub 'gyur//gir gyi dbang phyug gtso bo che//bcud ni zla ba sogs mdzes pa//sha sogs bza' ba'i dkyil 'khor dang //tsan dan la sogs byugs pa

528a4(rgyud): yige hUM dang bcas pa yis//zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal to//sbyor ldan kun lo gnas nas su//g.yas pa yis yang gor sgor las//rdo
528a5(rgyud): rje bsdams pa'i sbyor ba yis//snying khar de bzhin bsgreng bar bya//yang na gnyis pa nyid kyang ste//shes rab gang yin rdo rjer bya//skar ma lcags kyu de bzhin 'dir/
528a6(rgyud): 'dir ni bsnyemaso bcas rjes su chags//de las rdo rje'i sbyor ba sbyar//yang dang yang du dgrol bar bya//'di yis las rnams thams cad ni//byed 'gyur
528a7(rgyud): 'di la gdon mi za//de nyid snying khar khu tshur te//rdo rje gdong po skar ma'i kha//rang gi gnas su bzhag pa ste//dbang bskur ba ni gnyis pa'o//de nyid bstims/
528b1(rgyud): pas cher bstan to//yang dang yang du yongs su bskyod//de nyid 'od zer rnam pa ru//thams cad du ni spro bar bya//nga nyid kha ru bstan pa ni//rdo rje bshad par rnam par bshad//'di rnams
528b2(rgyud): kyis ni don rnams kun//mkhas pa yis ni bskyob pa bya//de nyid pad+ma'i sbyor ba dang //mig gi sbyor ba gnyis pa'o//shes rab sker me de nas sgreng //lte ba byas pa 'khor lo can/

528b7(rgyud): rgyan gyi dkyil 'khon gyi//dpa' chen la ni zhu ba zhus//sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor don phyir dang //ma mo rnams kyi don dam ni//yongs su rtog pa thams cad spangs//sangs
529a1(rgyud): rgyas kun nachog dam pa'i bra sang //dkyil 'khor thams cad rgyan pA ya//mdzes pas bcom ldan gsang du gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu
529a2(rgyud): bzang pos de dag gis gsal ba btab pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//dang po dang ni gnyis pa dang //drug dang lce dang de bzhin bcu//mdor bsdus nas ni bsgom par
529a3(rgyud): bya//rdo rje rin chen chu skyes las//rang gi dkyil 'khor go rims kyis//gsang sngags 'dzin pas gnas lngar dgod//dkar dang ser po ches dA mar ba//sngon po'i

529a5(rgyud): te/dkyil 'khor rgyal ba rnams kyi brten//bsten pas sgrub po shin tu yang //dus mi rung por sa stengs 'grub//'di ni bcom ldan rdo rje can//kun sbyor dri ba med pa'i gtso/
529a6(rgyud): spangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal po che//skye dang 'chi ba 'joms pas gsungs//de nas rgyal ba thams cad dang //sbyor ba'i ma dang yum rnams ni//legs tshig rdo rje sems dpa'

529b1(rgyud): nab+h+yoH//dang la ldan s+yA Ar+b+basmras sa rgyas padagu zlas//smrasarbas nA nI nA ldan su myod ma dang drug sasangs rgyas//sang sa rgyas smos pa ngas par man dgas su
529b2(rgyud): skyes kyisasbyor bas blo gros sbyin rnams legs par tsam mAng du ba// la rgyu rdo rje dri mi rdo rje ye sheswA dz+haiM/rdo rje'i snang bas 'jig rten rab tu gsal mdzad pa/
529b3(rgyud): 'i rdo rdo sbyor ba ldan pas legs brten te//rdo rje'i bdag nyid dro bor mdzad pa'i ma ste rje//dngal b+hai rin+ya chen ni rkyen byung gan n+dan chen sprin//rin chen rnams la
529b4(rgyud): rin chen gyis da gyes rin chen mdzes//mdzes pa'i brjid ldan rin rten rgyu la mtshan gyis//skye bo rnams kyi phongs dang sdig pa rnams ma nas//dpal gyi d+d+hi d+d+ha
529b5(rgyud): 'i bla ma pa sems dpag/pang+yas rab gyes d+hA la se 'khengs pad+mo //drangs t+t+ra mtha'i dag das par rgyus mdzad de//pang+ka'i rigs la 'jog par mdzad pa'i ba bar
529b6(rgyud): po//sna tshogs dang lnga ldan kun gyi bdag po sna tshugs mkhyen//hU~M tshogs dang phyug tshogs yum gyi mgos pa//sems cani rnams ni 'dul legs 'jog pa chags/

530a1(rgyud): khyod phyag/'tshal la//sbyangs rgyas 'byung ba khyod la 'ang //sangs rgyas ye shes khyod phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas
530a2(rgyud): gzing rjed phyag 'tshal 'dud//sangs rgyas dpa' bo khyod la 'dud//rdo rje khro bo'i yid las 'khrungs//sdig pa bcom pa khyod phyag 'tshal/
530a3(rgyud): sdig pa bsal la phyag 'tshal 'dud//phyag na rin chen khyod phyag 'tshal//gtsug na rin chen gzi brjid can+de//sdug bsngal bcom pa khyod
530a4(rgyud): le 'dung //thams cad grub la phyag 'tshal 'dud//chos kyi dag pa khyod la 'dud//pad+ma dag la rtogs pa'i phyir//'dod chags chags pa
530a5(rgyud): khyod la 'dud//'dod chags bral la phyag 'tshal 'dud//sna tshogs rdo rje khyod la 'dud//sna tshogs sbyor ba khyod phyag 'tshal//sna tshogs tshul
530a6(rgyud): con khyod la 'dud//sna tshogs 'di can phyag 'tshal 'dud//bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni//chos dang ldan pa thams cad du//sbyi nu re zhing ni bstod
530a7(rgyud): byed na//bsams pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur//de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos shes rab
530b1(rgyud): gyis pa kyi 'khrir dun du tshul legs pa gnas pa rjes na pa ts+tshe/
531a1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyi dang gsung dang thugs gsang brgyan gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po yongasu rdzogs so//
531a2(rgyud): rgya gar gyi mkhan po brda sprod pa chen po bde bar gshegs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba dang /de bskur byed kyi mkhas pa sgra yi gzhung lugs la blo gros dkar ba kun
531a3(rgyud): dga' rgyal mtshan gyis dbyel sa sgyu'i dben gnas dam par bsgyur/mda' lnga'i gtsug ldan yid kyi srub shing gi/dregs pa'i dra ba rnam par dral ba'i phyir/
531a4(rgyud): rgyud rgyal rgya mtsho'i rgyal po ltar thob 'di//bsgyur la 'gal gang 'di la 'phags rnams dgongs//
